atk-s0401a:15: Yaṃ upagato gatamalaṃ, vande tamanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ.
atk-s0401a:23: Pañcahi yā saṅgītā, anusaṅgītā ca pacchāpi.
atk-s0401a:33: Dīghassa majjhimassa ca, yā me atthaṃ vadantena.
atk-s0401a:34: “Vitthāravasena sudaṃ, vatthūni ca tattha yāni vuttāni;
atk-s0401a:35: Tesampi na idha bhiyyo, vitthārakathaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0401a:36: “Suttānaṃ pana atthā, na vinā vatthūhi ye pakāsanti;
atk-s0401a:44: “Iti pana sabbaṃ yasmā, visuddhimagge mayā suparisuddhaṃ;
atk-s0401a:45: Vuttaṃ tasmā bhiyyo, na taṃ idha vicārayissāmi.
atk-s0401a:54_0: Tattha aṅguttarāgamo nāma ekakanipāto dukanipāto tikanipāto catukkanipāto pañcakanipāto
atk-s0401a:54_1: chakkanipāto sattakanipāto aṭṭhakanipāto navakanipāto dasakanipāto ekādasakanipātoti
atk-s0401a:57_0: Tassa nipātesu ekakanipāto ādi, suttesu cittapariyādānasuttaṃ. Tassāpi “evaṃ me suta”ntiādikaṃ
atk-s0401a:57_1: āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādi. Sā panesā paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti
atk-s0401a:57_2: sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya ādimhi vitthāritā, tasmā sā tattha vitthāritanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:59_0: 1. Yaṃ panetaṃ “evaṃ me suta”ntiādikaṃ nidānaṃ, tattha evanti nipātapadaṃ, metiādīni
atk-s0401a:59_1: nāmapadāni. Sāvatthiyaṃ viharatīti ettha vīti upasaggapadaṃ, haratīti ākhyātapadanti
atk-s0401a:60_1: Tathā hesa “evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti evamādīsu upamāyaṃ āgato.
atk-s0401a:60_2: “Evaṃ te abhikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ te paṭikkamitabba”ntiādīsu upadese. “Evametaṃ bhagavā,
atk-s0401a:60_3: evametaṃ sugatā”tiādīsu sampahaṃsane. “Evamevaṃ panāyaṃ vasalī yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā
atk-s0401a:60_4: tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”tiādīsu garahaṇe. “Evaṃ, bhanteti kho
atk-s0401a:60_5: te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosu”ntiādīsu vacanasampaṭiggahe. “Evaṃ byākho ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:60_6: bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”tiādīsu ākāre. “Ehi tvaṃ, māṇavaka, yena samaṇo
atk-s0401a:60_7: ānando tenupasaṅkama; upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ
atk-s0401a:60_8: lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha – ‘subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhavantaṃ ānandaṃ
atk-s0401a:60_9: appābādhaṃ…pe… phāsuvihāraṃ pucchatī’ti, evañca vadehi “sādhu kira bhavaṃ ānando
atk-s0401a:60_10: yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa nivesanaṃ, tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”tiādīsu
atk-s0401a:60_11: nidassane. “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, kālāmā, ime dhammā kusalā vā akusalā vāti? Akusalā,
atk-s0401a:60_12: bhante. Sāvajjā vā anavajjā vāti? Sāvajjā, bhante. Viññugarahitā vā viññuppasatthā
atk-s0401a:60_13: vāti? Viññugarahitā, bhante. Samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti no vā,
atk-s0401a:60_14: kathaṃ vo ettha hotīti? Samattā, bhante, samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti,
atk-s0401a:60_15: evaṃ no ettha hotī”tiādīsu avadhāraṇe. Svāyamidha ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇesu daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0401a:61_0: Tattha ākāratthena evaṃsaddena etamatthaṃ dīpeti – nānānayanipuṇaṃ anekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:61_2: sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchantaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ sabbappakārena
atk-s0401a:61_3: ko samattho viññātuṃ, sabbathāmena pana sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi evaṃ me sutaṃ, mayāpi
atk-s0401a:62: Nidassanatthena “nāhaṃ sayambhū, na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento “evaṃ me sutaṃ, mayāpi evaṃ suta”nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0401a:63_0: Avadhāraṇatthena “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ
atk-s0401a:63_1: ānando, satimantānaṃ, gatimantānaṃ, dhitimantānaṃ, upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti
atk-s0401a:63_2: evaṃ bhagavatā, “āyasmā ānando atthakusalo dhammakusalo byañjanakusalo niruttikusalo
atk-s0401a:63_3: pubbāparakusalo”ti evaṃ dhammasenāpatinā ca pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ
atk-s0401a:63_4: dassento sattānaṃ sotukāmataṃ janeti “evaṃ me sutaṃ, tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato
atk-s0401a:63_5: vā anūnamanadhikaṃ, evameva, na aññathā daṭṭhabba”nti.
atk-s0401a:64_0: Mesaddo tīsu atthesu dissati. Tathā hissa “gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyya”ntiādīsu
atk-s0401a:64_1: mayāti attho. “Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu mayhanti
atk-s0401a:64_2: attho. “Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavathā”tiādīsu mamāti attho. Idha pana “mayā
atk-s0401a:64_3: suta”nti ca, “mama suta”nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
atk-s0401a:65_0: Sutanti ayaṃ sutasaddo saupasaggo ca anupasaggo ca gamana-vissuta-kilinnaupacitānuyoga-sotaviññeyya-sotadvārānusāraviññātādianekatthappabhedo.
atk-s0401a:65_1: Tathā hissa – “senāya pasuto”tiādīsu gacchantoti attho. “Sutadhammassa passato”tiādīsu
atk-s0401a:65_3: “Tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappaka”ntiādīsu upacitanti attho. “Ye jhānappasutā dhīrā”tiādīsu
atk-s0401a:65_4: jhānānuyuttāti attho. “Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ muta”ntiādīsu sotaviññeyyanti attho. “Sutadharo
atk-s0401a:65_5: sutasannicayo”tiādīsu sotadvārānusāraviññātadharoti attho. Idha panassa sotadvārānusārena
atk-s0401a:65_6: upadhāritanti vā upadhāraṇanti vāti attho. Me-saddassa hi mayāti atthe sati “evaṃ
atk-s0401a:65_7: mayā sutaṃ sotadvārānusārena upadhārita”nti yujjati. Mamāti atthe sati “evaṃ mama
atk-s0401a:66_0: Evametesu tīsu padesu evanti sotaviññāṇādiviññāṇakiccanidassanaṃ. Meti vuttaviññāṇasamaṅgipuggalanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0401a:66_2: tassā sotadvārānusārena pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattabhāvappakāsanaṃ.
atk-s0401a:66_3: Meti attappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti dhammappakāsanaṃ. Ayañhettha saṅkhepo – “nānappakārena
atk-s0401a:66_4: ārammaṇe pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ, idaṃ pana kataṃ, ayaṃ dhammo suto”ti.
atk-s0401a:67: Tathā evanti niddisitabbappakāsanaṃ. Meti puggalappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti puggalakiccappakāsanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ suttaṃ niddisissāmi, taṃ mayā evaṃ sutanti.
atk-s0401a:68_0: Tathā evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0401a:68_1: tassa nānākāraniddeso. Evanti hi ayaṃ ākārapaññatti. Meti kattuniddeso. Sutanti visayaniddeso.
atk-s0401a:68_2: Ettāvatā nānākārappavattena cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino kattu visaye gahaṇasanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0401a:69_0: Atha vā evanti puggalakiccaniddeso. Sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso. Meti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso.
atk-s0401a:69_1: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – mayā savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅginā puggalena viññāṇavasena
atk-s0401a:70_0: Tattha evanti ca meti ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti. Kiñhettha
atk-s0401a:70_1: taṃ paramatthato atthi, yaṃ evanti vā meti vā niddesaṃ labhetha. Sutanti vijjamānapaññatti.
atk-s0401a:70_2: Yañhi taṃ ettha sotena upaladdhaṃ, taṃ paramatthato vijjamānanti. Tathā evanti ca
atk-s0401a:70_3: meti ca taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbato upādāpaññatti. Sutanti diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbato upanidhāpaññatti.
atk-s0401a:71_0: Ettha ca evanti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpeti. Na hi sammūḷho nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho
atk-s0401a:71_1: hoti. Sutanti vacanena sutassa asammosaṃ dīpeti. Yassa hi sutaṃ sammuṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0401a:71_2: na so kālantarena mayā sutanti paṭijānāti. Iccassa asammohena paññāsiddhi, asammosena
atk-s0401a:71_3: pana satisiddhi. Tattha paññāpubbaṅgamāya satiyā byañjanāvadhāraṇasamatthatā, satipubbaṅgamāya
atk-s0401a:72_0: Aparo nayo – evanti vacanena yoniso manasikāraṃ dīpeti, ayoniso manasikaroto hi nānappakārapaṭivedhābhāvato.
atk-s0401a:72_1: Sutanti vacanena avikkhepaṃ dīpeti, vikkhittacittassa savanābhāvato. Tathā hi vikkhittacitto
atk-s0401a:72_2: puggalo sabbasampattiyā vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ, puna bhaṇathā”ti bhaṇati. Yoniso
atk-s0401a:72_3: manasikārena cettha attasammāpaṇidhiṃ pubbe ca katapuññataṃ sādheti sammā appaṇihitattassa
atk-s0401a:72_4: pubbe akatapuññassa vā tadabhāvato. Tathā avikkhepena saddhammassavanaṃ sappurisūpanissayañca
atk-s0401a:72_5: sādheti. Na hi vikkhittacitto sotuṃ sakkoti, na ca sappurise anupassayamānassa savanaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0401a:73_0: Aparo nayo – yasmā “evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:73_1: hoti, tassa nānākāraniddeso”ti vuttaṃ. So ca evaṃ bhaddako ākāro na sammā appaṇihitattano
atk-s0401a:73_2: pubbe akatapuññassa vā hoti, tasmā evanti iminā bhaddakenākārena pacchimacakkadvayasampattimattano
atk-s0401a:73_3: dīpeti. Sutanti savanayogena purimacakkadvayasampattiṃ. Na hi appatirūpadese vasato
atk-s0401a:73_4: sappurisūpanissayavirahitassa vā savanaṃ atthi. Iccassa pacchimacakkadvayasiddhiyā
atk-s0401a:73_5: āsayasuddhi siddhā hoti, purimacakkadvayasiddhiyā payogasuddhi. Tāya ca āsayasuddhiyā
atk-s0401a:73_6: adhigamabyattisiddhi, payogasuddhiyā āgamabyattisiddhi. Iti payogāsayasuddhassa āgamādhigamasampannassa
atk-s0401a:73_7: vacanaṃ aruṇuggaṃ viya sūriyassa udayato, yoniso manasikāro viya ca kusalakammassa,
atk-s0401a:73_8: arahati bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitunti ṭhāne nidānaṃ ṭhapento evaṃ me sutantiādimāha.
atk-s0401a:74_0: Aparo nayo – evanti iminā nānappakārapaṭivedhadīpakena vacanena attano atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāsampattisabbhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:74_2: Evanti ca idaṃ yoniso manasikāradīpakavacanaṃ bhāsamāno “ete mayā dhammā manasā anupekkhitā
atk-s0401a:74_3: diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā”ti dīpeti. Sutanti idaṃ savanayogadīpakavacanaṃ bhāsamāno
atk-s0401a:74_4: “bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitā”ti dīpeti. Tadubhayenapi atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ
atk-s0401a:74_5: dīpento savane ādaraṃ janeti. Atthabyañjanaparipuṇṇaṃ hi dhammaṃ ādarena assuṇanto
atk-s0401a:74_6: mahatā hitā paribāhiro hotīti ādaraṃ janetvā sakkaccaṃ dhammo sotabboti.
atk-s0401a:75_0: Evaṃ me sutanti iminā pana sakalena vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:75_1: attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ atikkamati, sāvakattaṃ paṭijānanto sappurisabhūmiṃ
atk-s0401a:75_2: okkamati. Tathā asaddhammā cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, saddhamme cittaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. “Kevalaṃ
atk-s0401a:75_3: sutamevetaṃ mayā, tasseva pana bhagavato vacana”nti dīpento attānaṃ parimoceti, satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:76_0: Apica “evaṃ me suta”nti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimavacanaṃ vivaranto
atk-s0401a:76_1: “sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa
atk-s0401a:76_4: vacanaṃ, na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kattabbā”ti
atk-s0401a:76_5: sabbadevamanussānaṃ imasmiṃ dhamme assaddhiyaṃ vināseti, saddhāsampadaṃ uppādeti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0401a:79: Ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso. Samayanti paricchinnaniddeso. Ekaṃ samayanti aniyamitaparidīpanaṃ. Tattha samayasaddo –
atk-s0401a:81: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati”.
atk-s0401a:82_0: Tathā hissa “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0401a:82_1: samavāyo attho. “Ekova kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu
atk-s0401a:82_3: “Samayopi kho te bhaddāli appaṭividdho ahosi, bhagavā kho sāvatthiyaṃ viharati, bhagavāpi
atk-s0401a:82_4: maṃ jānissati ‘bhaddāli nāma bhikkhu satthu sāsane sikkhāya aparipūrakārī’ti, ayampi
atk-s0401a:82_5: kho te, bhaddāli, samayo appaṭividdho ahosī”tiādīsu hetu. “Tena kho pana samayena
atk-s0401a:82_6: uggāhamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya
atk-s0401a:83: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-s0401a:85_0: Ādīsu paṭilābho. “Sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā”tiādīsu pahānaṃ. “Dukkhassa
atk-s0401a:85_1: pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”tiādīsu paṭivedho.
atk-s0401a:85_3: pacchimayāma-muhuttādīsu kālappabhedabhūtesu samayesu ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti.
atk-s0401a:86_0: Tattha kiñcāpi etesu saṃvaccharādīsu yaṃ yaṃ suttaṃ yamhi yamhi saṃvacchare utumhi
atk-s0401a:86_1: māse pakkhe rattibhāge divasabhāge vā vuttaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ therassa suviditaṃ suvavatthāpitaṃ
atk-s0401a:86_2: paññāya. Yasmā pana “evaṃ me sutaṃ asukasaṃvacchare asukautumhi asukamāse asukapakkhe
atk-s0401a:86_3: asukarattibhāge asukadivasabhāge vā”ti evaṃ vutte na sakkā sukhena dhāretuṃ vā uddisituṃ
atk-s0401a:86_4: vā uddisāpetuṃ vā, bahu ca vattabbaṃ hoti, tasmā ekeneva padena tamatthaṃ samodhānetvā
atk-s0401a:87_0: Ye vā ime gabbhokkantisamayo jātisamayo saṃvegasamayo abhinikkhamanasamayo dukkarakārikasamayo
atk-s0401a:87_2: evamādayo bhagavato devamanussesu ativiya suppakāsā anekakālappabhedā eva samayā,
atk-s0401a:87_3: tesu samayesu desanāsamayasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti. Yo cāyaṃ ñāṇakaruṇākiccasamayesu
atk-s0401a:88_0: Kasmā panettha yathā abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacara”nti ca, ito aññesu ca suttapadesu
atk-s0401a:88_1: “yasmiṃ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca bhummavacanena niddeso
atk-s0401a:88_2: kato, vinaye ca “tena samayena buddho bhagavā”ti karaṇavacanena niddeso kato, tathā
atk-s0401a:88_3: akatvā “ekaṃ samaya”nti upayogavacanena niddeso katoti. Tattha tathā, idha ca aññathā
atk-s0401a:88_4: atthasambhavato. Tattha hi abhidhamme ito aññesu suttapadesu ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho
atk-s0401a:88_5: ca sambhavati. Adhikaraṇaṃ hi kālattho samūhattho ca samayo, tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ
atk-s0401a:88_6: khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyati, tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:89_0: Vinaye ca hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati. Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi
atk-s0401a:89_1: dubbiññeyyo, tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto
atk-s0401a:89_2: sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi. Tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:90_0: Idha pana aññasmiñca evaṃjātike accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati. Yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0401a:90_1: imaṃ aññaṃ vā suttantaṃ desesi, accantameva taṃ samayaṃ karuṇāvihārena vihāsi. Tasmā
atk-s0401a:90_2: tadatthajotanatthaṃ idha upayogavacananiddeso katoti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0401a:92: Aññatra samayo vutto, upayogena so idhā”ti.
atk-s0401a:93_0: Porāṇā pana vaṇṇayanti – “tasmiṃ samaye”ti vā “tena samayenā”ti vā “ekaṃ samaya”nti
atk-s0401a:93_1: vā abhilāpamattabhedo esa, sabbattha bhummamevatthoti. Tasmā “ekaṃ samaya”nti vuttepi
atk-s0401a:94: Bhagavāti garu. Garuñhi loke “bhagavā”ti vadanti. Ayañca sabbaguṇavisiṭṭhatāya sabbasattānaṃ garu, tasmā “bhagavā”ti veditabbo. Porāṇehipi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0401a:96: Garu gāravayutto so, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:100: Imissāpi gāthāya vasenassa padassa vitthārato attho veditabbo. So ca visuddhimagge buddhānussatiniddese vuttoyeva.
atk-s0401a:101_0: Ettāvatā cettha evaṃ me sutanti vacanena yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ dassento bhagavato dhammasarīraṃ
atk-s0401a:101_1: paccakkhaṃ karoti. Tena “na idaṃ atikkantasatthukaṃ pāvacanaṃ, ayaṃ vo satthā”ti
atk-s0401a:101_2: satthu adassanena ukkaṇṭhitaṃ janaṃ samassāseti. Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavāti vacanena
atk-s0401a:101_3: tasmiṃ samaye bhagavato avijjamānabhāvaṃ dassento rūpakāyaparinibbānaṃ sādheti. Tena
atk-s0401a:101_4: “evaṃvidhassa nāma ariyadhammassa desako dasabaladharo vajirasaṅghātasamānakāyo sopi
atk-s0401a:101_5: bhagavā parinibbuto, kena aññena jīvite āsā janetabbā”ti jīvitamadamattaṃ janaṃ saṃvejeti,
atk-s0401a:101_6: saddhamme cassa ussāhaṃ janeti. Evanti ca bhaṇanto desanāsampattiṃ niddisati. Me
atk-s0401a:101_7: sutanti sāvakasampattiṃ. Ekaṃ samayanti kālasampattiṃ. Bhagavāti desakasampattiṃ.
atk-s0401a:102_0: Sāvatthiyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Viharatīti avisesena
atk-s0401a:102_3: tena ṭhitopi gacchantopi nisinnopi sayānopi bhagavā viharaticceva veditabbo. So hi
atk-s0401a:102_4: ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:103_0: Jetavaneti jetassa rājakumārassa vane. Tañhi tena ropitaṃ saṃvaḍḍhitaṃ paripālitaṃ,
atk-s0401a:103_1: so cassa sāmī ahosi, tasmā jetavananti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ, tasmiṃ jetavane. Anāthapiṇḍikassa
atk-s0401a:103_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyātitattā anāthapiṇḍikassāti saṅkhaṃ gate ārāme. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0401a:103_4: vitthāro pana papañcasūdaniyā majjhimaṭṭhakathāya sabbāsavasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto.
atk-s0401a:104_0: Tattha siyā – yadi tāva bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati, “jetavane”ti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:104_1: Atha tattha viharati, “sāvatthiya”nti na vattabbaṃ. Na hi sakkā ubhayattha ekaṃ samayaṃ
atk-s0401a:104_2: viharitunti. Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nanu avocumha “samīpatthe bhummavacana”nti.
atk-s0401a:104_3: Tasmā yathā gaṅgāyamunādīnaṃ samīpe goyūthāni carantāni “gaṅgāya caranti, yamunāya
atk-s0401a:104_4: carantī”ti vuccanti, evamidhāpi yadidaṃ sāvatthiyā samīpe jetavanaṃ, tattha viharanto
atk-s0401a:104_5: vuccati “sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane”ti. Gocaragāmanidassanatthaṃ hissa sāvatthivacanaṃ,
atk-s0401a:105_0: Tattha sāvatthivacanena āyasmā ānando bhagavato gahaṭṭhānuggahakaraṇaṃ dasseti, jetavanādikittanena
atk-s0401a:105_3: ca dhammadesanābhiyogaṃ, pacchimena vivekādhimuttiṃ. Purimena karuṇāya upagamanaṃ,
atk-s0401a:105_4: pacchimena paññāya apagamanaṃ. Purimena sattānaṃ hitasukhanipphādanādhimuttitaṃ,
atk-s0401a:105_7: pacchimena devatānaṃ. Purimena loke jātassa loke saṃvaḍḍhabhāvaṃ, pacchimena lokena
atk-s0401a:105_8: anupalittataṃ. Purimena “ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya
atk-s0401a:105_9: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. Katamo ekapuggalo?
atk-s0401a:105_10: Tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti vacanato yadatthaṃ bhagavā uppanno, tadatthaparinipphādanaṃ,
atk-s0401a:105_11: pacchimena yattha uppanno, tadanurūpavihāraṃ. Bhagavā hi paṭhamaṃ lumbinivane, dutiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:105_12: bodhimaṇḍeti lokiyalokuttarāya uppattiyā vaneyeva uppanno. Tenassa vaneyeva vihāraṃ
atk-s0401a:106_0: Tatrāti desakālaparidīpanaṃ. Tañhi yaṃ samayaṃ viharati, tatra samaye. Yasmiñca ārāme
atk-s0401a:106_1: viharati, tatra ārāmeti dīpeti. Bhāsitabbayutte vā desakāle dīpeti. Na hi bhagavā
atk-s0401a:106_2: ayutte dese vā kāle vā dhammaṃ bhāsati. “Akālo kho tāva, bāhiyā”tiādi cettha sādhakaṃ.
atk-s0401a:106_3: Khoti padapūraṇamatte avadhāraṇe ādikālatthe vā nipāto. Bhagavāti lokagarudīpanaṃ.
atk-s0401a:106_4: Bhikkhūti kathāsavanayuttapuggalavacanaṃ. Api cettha “bhikkhakoti bhikkhu, bhikkhācariyaṃ
atk-s0401a:106_5: ajjhupagatoti bhikkhū”tiādinā nayena vacanattho veditabbo. Āmantesīti ālapi abhāsi
atk-s0401a:106_6: sambodhesīti ayamettha attho. Aññatra pana ñāpanepi hoti. Yathāha – “āmantayāmi vo,
atk-s0401a:106_7: bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo, bhikkhave”ti. Pakkosanepi. Yathāha – “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0401a:107_1: Bhikkhanasīlatāguṇayuttopi hi bhikkhu, bhikkhanadhammatāguṇayuttopi bhikkhu, bhikkhane
atk-s0401a:107_2: sādhukāritāguṇayuttopīti saddavidū maññanti. Tena ca nesaṃ bhikkhanasīlatādiguṇayogasiddhena
atk-s0401a:107_3: vacanena hīnādhikajanasevitaṃ vuttiṃ pakāsento uddhatadīnabhāvaniggahaṃ karoti. Bhikkhavoti
atk-s0401a:107_5: karoti. Teneva ca kathetukamyatādīpakena vacanena tesaṃ sotukamyataṃ janeti. Teneva
atk-s0401a:107_6: ca sambodhanatthena sādhukaṃ savanamanasikārepi te niyojeti. Sādhukaṃ savanamanasikārāyattā hi sāsanasampatti.
atk-s0401a:108_0: Aparesupi devamanussesu vijjamānesu kasmā bhikkhūyeva āmantesīti ce? Jeṭṭhaseṭṭhāsannasadāsannihitabhāvato.
atk-s0401a:108_1: Sabbaparisasādhāraṇā hi bhagavato dhammadesanā. Parisāya ca jeṭṭhā bhikkhū paṭhamuppannattā,
atk-s0401a:108_2: seṭṭhā anagāriyabhāvaṃ ādiṃ katvā satthucariyānuvidhāyakattā sakalasāsanapaṭiggāhakattā
atk-s0401a:108_3: ca. Āsannā te tattha nisinnesu satthusantikattā. Sadāsannihitā satthusantikāvacarattāti.
atk-s0401a:108_4: Apica te dhammadesanāya bhājanaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattisabbhāvatotipi te eva āmantesi.
atk-s0401a:109_0: Kimatthaṃ pana bhagavā dhammaṃ desento paṭhamaṃ bhikkhū āmantesi, na dhammameva desesīti?
atk-s0401a:109_1: Satijananatthaṃ. Bhikkhū hi aññaṃ cintentāpi vikkhittacittāpi dhammaṃ paccavekkhantāpi
atk-s0401a:109_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontāpi nisinnā honti, te anāmantetvā dhamme desiyamāne “ayaṃ
atk-s0401a:109_3: desanā kiṃnidānā kiṃpaccayā katamāya aṭṭhuppattiyā desitā”ti sallakkhetuṃ asakkontā
atk-s0401a:109_4: duggahitaṃ vā gaṇheyyuṃ, na vā gaṇheyyuṃ. Tena nesaṃ satijananatthaṃ bhagavā paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0401a:110_0: Bhadanteti gāravavacanametaṃ, satthu paṭivacanadānaṃ vā. Api cettha “bhikkhavo”ti
atk-s0401a:110_1: vadamāno bhagavā te bhikkhū ālapati. “Bhadante”ti vadamānā te bhagavantaṃ paccālapanti.
atk-s0401a:110_2: Tathā “bhikkhavo”ti bhagavā ādimhi bhāsati, “bhadante”ti te paccābhāsanti. “Bhikkhavo”ti
atk-s0401a:110_3: paṭivacanaṃ dāpeti, “bhadante”ti paṭivacanaṃ denti. Te bhikkhūti ye bhagavā āmantesi,
atk-s0401a:110_4: te. Bhagavato paccassosunti bhagavato āmantanaṃ paṭiassosuṃ, abhimukhā hutvā suṇiṃsu
atk-s0401a:110_5: sampaṭicchiṃsu paṭiggahesunti attho. Bhagavā etadavocāti bhagavā etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ
atk-s0401a:110_6: sakalaṃ suttaṃ avoca. Ettāvatā ca yaṃ āyasmatā ānandena imassa suttassa sukhāvagāhaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:110_7: kāladesadesakaparisāpadesapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ, tassa atthavaṇṇanā samattāti.
atk-s0401a:112_0: Idāni nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmītiādinā nayena bhagavatā nikkhittassa
atk-s0401a:112_1: suttassa vaṇṇanāya okāso anuppatto, sā panesā suttavaṇṇanā yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvāva
atk-s0401a:112_2: vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti, tasmā suttanikkhepavicāraṇā tāva veditabbā. Cattāro hi suttanikkhepā
atk-s0401a:112_3: attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo pucchāvasiko aṭṭhuppattikoti. Tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā
atk-s0401a:112_4: parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva kathesi, seyyathidaṃ – ākaṅkheyyasuttaṃ
atk-s0401a:112_5: vatthasuttanti evamādīni, tesaṃ attajjhāsayo nikkhepo. Yāni pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa
atk-s0401a:112_6: vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ uttari āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti
atk-s0401a:112_7: evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ manaṃ abhinīhāraṃ bujjhanabhāvañca oloketvā parajjhāsayavasena
atk-s0401a:112_8: kathitāni, seyyathidaṃ – rāhulovādasuttaṃ dhammacakkappavattananti evamādīni, tesaṃ
atk-s0401a:112_9: parajjhāsayo nikkhepo. Bhagavantaṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā te te devamanussā tathā tathā
atk-s0401a:112_10: pañhaṃ pucchanti. Evaṃ puṭṭhena bhagavatā yāni kathitāni devatāsaṃyuttabojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni,
atk-s0401a:112_11: tesaṃ pucchāvasiko nikkhepo. Yāni pana uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca kathitāni dhammadāyādasuttaputtamaṃsūpamādīni,
atk-s0401a:112_12: tesaṃ aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo. Evamimesu catūsu nikkhepesu imassa suttassa parajjhāsayo
atk-s0401a:112_13: nikkhepo. Parajjhāsayavasena hetaṃ nikkhittaṃ. Kesaṃ ajjhāsayenāti? Rūpagarukānaṃ purisānaṃ.
atk-s0401a:113_0: Tattha nāhaṃ, bhikkhavetiādīsu nakāro paṭisedhattho. Ahanti attānaṃ niddisati. Bhikkhaveti
atk-s0401a:113_1: bhikkhū ālapati. Aññanti idāni vattabbā itthirūpato aññaṃ. Ekarūpampīti ekampi rūpaṃ.
atk-s0401a:113_2: Samanupassāmīti dve samanupassanā ñāṇasamanupassanā ca diṭṭhisamanupassanā ca. Tattha
atk-s0401a:113_3: “aniccato samanupassati, no niccato”ti ayaṃ ñāṇasamanupassanā nāma. “Rūpaṃ attato
atk-s0401a:113_4: samanupassatī”tiādikā pana diṭṭhisamanupassanā nāma. Tāsu idha ñāṇasamanupassanā
atk-s0401a:113_5: adhippetā. Imassa pana padassa nakārena sambandho veditabbo. Idaṃ hi vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0401a:113_6: – ahaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbaññutaññāṇena olokentopi aññaṃ ekarūpampi na samanupassāmīti.
atk-s0401a:113_7: Yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatīti yaṃ rūpaṃ rūpagarukassa purisassa
atk-s0401a:113_8: catubhūmakakusalacittaṃ pariyādiyitvā gaṇhitvā khepetvā tiṭṭhati. “Sabbaṃ hatthikāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:113_9: pariyādiyitvā”tiādīsu hi gahaṇaṃ pariyādānaṃ nāma. “Aniccasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā
atk-s0401a:113_10: bahulīkatā sabbaṃ kāmarāgaṃ pariyādiyatī”tiādīsu khepanaṃ. Idha ubhayampi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0401a:113_11: Tattha idaṃ rūpaṃ catubhūmakakusalacittaṃ gaṇhantaṃ na nīluppalakalāpaṃ puriso viya
atk-s0401a:113_12: hatthena gaṇhāti, nāpi khepayamānaṃ aggi viya uddhane udakaṃ santāpetvā khepeti.
atk-s0401a:113_13: Uppattiñcassa nivārayamānameva catubhūmakampi kusalacittaṃ gaṇhāti ceva khepeti cāti
atk-s0401a:113_14: veditabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:114_0: Yathayidanti yathā idaṃ. Itthirūpanti itthiyā rūpaṃ. Tattha “kiñca, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ
atk-s0401a:114_1: vadetha? Ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā rūpanti vuccati. Kena ruppati? Sītenapi
atk-s0401a:114_2: ruppati uṇhenapi ruppatī”ti suttānusārena rūpassa vacanattho ceva sāmaññalakkhaṇañca
atk-s0401a:114_4: anekesu atthesu vattati. Ayañhi “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”nti ettha
atk-s0401a:114_5: rūpakkhandhe vattati. “Rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī”ti ettha rūpabhave. “Ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0401a:114_6: arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti ettha kasiṇanimitte. “Sarūpā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti
atk-s0401a:114_7: pāpakā akusalā dhammā no arūpā”ti ettha paccaye. “Ākāso parivārito rūpanteva saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0401a:114_8: gacchatī”ti ettha sarīre. “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti
atk-s0401a:114_9: ettha vaṇṇe. “Rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno”ti ettha saṇṭhāne. Ādisaddena “piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ,
atk-s0401a:114_10: arasarūpo”tiādīnipi saṅgaṇhitabbāni. Idha panesa itthiyā catusamuṭṭhāne rūpāyatanasaṅkhāte
atk-s0401a:114_11: vaṇṇe vattati. Apica yo koci itthiyā nivatthanivāsanassa vā alaṅkārassa vā gandhavaṇṇakādīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:114_12: vā piḷandhanamālādīnaṃ vāti kāyappaṭibaddho ca vaṇṇo purisassa cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:114_13: hutvā upakappati, sabbametaṃ itthirūpanteva veditabbaṃ. Itthirūpaṃ, bhikkhave, purisassa
atk-s0401a:114_14: cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatīti idaṃ purimasseva daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Purimaṃ vā
atk-s0401a:114_15: “yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthirūpa”nti evaṃ opammavasena vuttaṃ, idaṃ pariyādānānubhāvadassanavasena.
atk-s0401a:115_0: Tatridaṃ itthirūpassa pariyādānānubhāve vatthu – mahādāṭhikanāgarājā kira cetiyagirimhi
atk-s0401a:115_1: ambatthale mahāthūpaṃ kārāpetvā giribhaṇḍapūjaṃ nāma katvā kālena kālaṃ orodhagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0401a:115_2: cetiyagiriṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ deti. Bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhāne nāma
atk-s0401a:115_3: na sabbesaṃ sati sūpaṭṭhitā hoti, rañño ca damiḷadevī nāma mahesī paṭhamavaye ṭhitā
atk-s0401a:115_4: dassanīyā pāsādikā. Atheko cittatthero nāma vuḍḍhapabbajito asaṃvaraniyāmena olokento
atk-s0401a:115_5: tassā rūpārammaṇe nimittaṃ gahetvā ummādappatto viya ṭhitanisinnaṭṭhānesu “handa
atk-s0401a:115_6: damiḷadevī, handa damiḷadevī”ti vadanto vicarati. Tato paṭṭhāya cassa daharasāmaṇerā
atk-s0401a:115_7: ummattakacittattherotveva nāmaṃ katvā vohariṃsu. Atha sā devī nacirasseva kālamakāsi.
atk-s0401a:115_8: Bhikkhusaṅghe sivathikadassanaṃ gantvā āgate daharasāmaṇerā tassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:115_9: evamāhaṃsu – “bhante cittatthera, yassatthāya tvaṃ vilapasi, mayaṃ tassā deviyā sivathikadassanaṃ
atk-s0401a:115_10: gantvā āgatā”ti. Evaṃ vuttepi assaddahanto “yassā vā tassā vā tumhe sivathikadassanatthāya
atk-s0401a:115_11: gatā, mukhaṃ tumhākaṃ dhūmaṇṇa”nti. Ummattakavacanameva avoca. Evaṃ ummattakacittattherassa
atk-s0401a:116_0: Aparampi vatthu – saddhātissamahārājā kira ekadivasaṃ orodhagaṇaparivuto vihāraṃ
atk-s0401a:116_1: āgato. Eko daharo lohapāsādadvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā asaṃvare ṭhito ekaṃ itthiṃ olokesi.
atk-s0401a:116_2: Sāpi gamanaṃ pacchinditvā taṃ olokesi. Ubhopi abbhantare uṭṭhitena rāgagginā ḍayhitvā
atk-s0401a:116_3: kālamakaṃsu. Evaṃ itthirūpaṃ daharassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0401a:117_0: Aparampi vatthu – kalyāṇiyamahāvihārato kireko daharo uddesatthāya kāḷadīghavāpigāmadvāravihāraṃ
atk-s0401a:117_1: gantvā niṭṭhituddesakicco atthakāmānaṃ vacanaṃ aggahetvā “gataṭṭhāne daharasāmaṇerehi
atk-s0401a:117_2: puṭṭhena gāmassa niviṭṭhākāro kathetabbo bhavissatī”ti gāme piṇḍāya caranto visabhāgārammaṇe
atk-s0401a:117_3: nimittaṃ gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato tāya nivatthavatthaṃ sañjānitvā “kahaṃ,
atk-s0401a:117_4: bhante, idaṃ laddha”nti pucchanto tassā matabhāvaṃ ñatvā “evarūpā nāma itthī maṃ
atk-s0401a:117_5: nissāya matā”ti cintento antouṭṭhitena rāgagginā ḍayhitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi. Evampi
atk-s0401a:117_6: idaṃ itthirūpaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:118_0: 2. Dutiyādīni saddagarukādīnaṃ āsayavasena vuttāni. Tesu itthisaddoti itthiyā cittasamuṭṭhāno
atk-s0401a:119_1: kira nissāya mahantaṃ hatthināgakulaṃ vasati. Avidūraṭṭhāne cassa mahāparibhogasaro
atk-s0401a:119_2: atthi, tasmiṃ kāyūpapanno suvaṇṇakakkaṭako atthi. So taṃ saraṃ otiṇṇotiṇṇe saṇḍāsena
atk-s0401a:119_3: viya aḷehi pāde gahetvā attano vasaṃ netvā māreti. Tassa otārāpekkhā hatthināgā ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:119_4: mahāhatthiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā vicaranti. So ekadivasaṃ taṃ hatthināgaṃ gaṇhi. Thāmasatisampanno
atk-s0401a:119_5: hatthināgo cintesi – “sacāhaṃ bhītaravaṃ ravissāmi, sabbe yathāruciyā akīḷitvā palāyissantī”ti
atk-s0401a:119_6: niccalova aṭṭhāsi. Atha sabbesaṃ uttiṇṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā tena gahitabhāvaṃ attano bhariyaṃ
atk-s0401a:124: Sā taṃ sutvā sāmikassa gahitabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ tamhā bhayā mocetuṃ hatthinā ca kuḷīrena ca saddhiṃ sallapantī evamāha –
atk-s0401a:126: Pathabyā cāturantāya, suppiyo hosi me tuvaṃ.
atk-s0401a:128: Tesaṃ tvaṃ vārijo seṭṭho, muñca rodantiyā pati”nti. ;
atk-s0401a:129_0: Kuḷīro saha itthisaddassavanena gahaṇaṃ sithilamakāsi. Atha hatthināgo “ayamevetassa
atk-s0401a:129_1: okāso”ti ekaṃ pādaṃ gahitākāreneva ṭhapetvā dutiyaṃ ukkhipitvā taṃ piṭṭhikapāle akkamitvā
atk-s0401a:129_2: vicuṇṇikaṃ katvā thokaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā tīre khipi. Atha naṃ sabbahatthino sannipatitvā
atk-s0401a:129_3: “amhākaṃ verī”ti vicuṇṇayiṃsu. Evaṃ tāva itthisaddo suvaṇṇakakkaṭakassa cittaṃ pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0401a:130: Suvaṇṇamoropi himavantaṃ anupavisitvā mahantaṃ pabbatagahanaṃ nissāya vasanto niccakālaṃ sūriyassa udayakāle sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ ulloketvā attano rakkhaṃ karonto evaṃ vadati –
atk-s0401a:136: Te me namo te ca maṃ pālayantu;
atk-s0401a:141: So divasaṃ gocaraṃ gahetvā sāyanhasamaye vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisanto atthaṅgataṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ oloketvāpi imaṃ gāthaṃ vadati –
atk-s0401a:147: Te me namo te ca maṃ pālayantu;
atk-s0401a:152_0: Iminā niyāmena satta vassasatāni vītināmetvā ekadivasaṃ parittakammato puretarameva
atk-s0401a:152_1: morakukkuṭikāya saddaṃ sutvā parittakammaṃ asaritvā raññā pesitassa luddakassa vasaṃ
atk-s0401a:152_2: upagato. Evaṃ itthisaddo suvaṇṇamorassa cittaṃ pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhatīti. Chātapabbatavāsī
atk-s0401a:152_3: daharo pana sudhāmuṇḍakavāsī daharo ca itthisaddaṃ sutvā anayabyasanaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0401a:153_0: 3. Tatiye itthigandhoti itthiyā catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ. Svāyaṃ itthiyā sarīragandho
atk-s0401a:153_1: duggandho hoti, kāyāruḷho pana āgantukaanulepanādigandho idha adhippeto. Ekaccā hi
atk-s0401a:153_2: itthī assagandhinī hoti, ekaccā meṇḍakagandhinī, ekaccā sedagandhinī, ekaccā soṇitagandhinī.
atk-s0401a:153_3: Ekacco andhabālo evarūpāyapi itthiyā rajjateva. Cakkavattino pana itthiratanassa
atk-s0401a:153_4: kāyato candanagandho vāyati, mukhato ca uppalagandho. Ayaṃ na sabbāsaṃ hoti, āgantukaanulepanādigandhova
atk-s0401a:153_5: idha adhippeto. Tiracchānagatā pana hatthiassagoṇādayo tiracchānagatānaṃ sajātiitthīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:153_6: utugandhena yojanadviyojanatiyojanacatuyojanampi gacchanti. Itthikāye gandho vā hotu
atk-s0401a:154_0: 4. Catutthe itthirasoti itthiyā catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ rasāyatanaṃ. Tipiṭakacūḷanāgacūḷābhayattherā
atk-s0401a:154_1: pana “svāyaṃ itthiyā kiṃkārapaṭissāvitādivasena savanaraso ceva paribhogaraso ca,
atk-s0401a:154_2: ayaṃ itthiraso”ti vadanti. Kiṃ tena? Yo panāyaṃ itthiyā oṭṭhamaṃsasammakkhanakheḷādirasopi,
atk-s0401a:154_3: sāmikassa dinnayāgubhattādīnaṃ rasopi, sabbo so itthirasotveva veditabbo. Aneke hi
atk-s0401a:154_4: sattā attano mātugāmena yaṃkiñci sahatthā dinnameva madhuranti gahetvā anayabyasanaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0401a:155_0: 5. Pañcame itthiphoṭṭhabboti itthiyā kāyasamphasso, itthisarīrāruḷhānaṃ vatthālaṅkāramālādīnampi
atk-s0401a:155_1: phasso itthiphoṭṭhabbotveva veditabbo. Sabbopesa purisassa cittaṃ pariyādiyati mahācetiyaṅgaṇe
atk-s0401a:156_0: Iti satthā sattānaṃ āsayānusayavasena rūpādīsu ekekaṃ gahetvā aññaṃ īdisaṃ na passāmīti
atk-s0401a:156_1: āha. Yathā hi rūpagarukassa purisassa itthirūpaṃ cittuppādaṃ gameti palibundhati
atk-s0401a:156_2: bajjhāpeti baddhāpeti moheti saṃmoheti, na tathā sesā saddādayo. Yathā ca saddādigarukānaṃ
atk-s0401a:156_3: saddādayo, na tathā rūpādīni ārammaṇāni. Ekaccassa ca rūpādīsu ekamevārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0401a:156_4: pariyādiyati, ekaccassa dvepi tīṇipi cattāripi pañcapi. Iti ime pañca suttantā pañcagarukavasena
atk-s0401a:156_5: kathitā, na pañcagarukajātakavasena. Pañcagarukajātakaṃ pana sakkhibhāvatthāya āharitvā
atk-s0401a:156_6: kathetabbaṃ. Tatra hi amanussehi kantāramajjhe katāya āpaṇādivicāraṇāya mahāpurisassa
atk-s0401a:156_7: pañcasu sahāyesu rūpagaruko rūpārammaṇe bajjhitvā anayabyasanaṃ patto, saddādigarukā
atk-s0401a:156_8: saddārammaṇādīsu. Iti taṃ sakkhibhāvatthāya āharitvā kathetabbaṃ. Ime pana pañca
atk-s0401a:157_0: 6. Yasmā ca na kevalaṃ purisāyeva pañcagarukā honti, itthiyopi hontiyeva, tasmā tāsampi
atk-s0401a:157_1: vasena puna pañca suttante kathesi. Tesampi attho vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Vatthūsupi
atk-s0401a:157_2: paṭhamasutte lohapāsādadvāre ṭhitaṃ daharaṃ oloketvā matāya rājorodhāya vatthu veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:158_0: 7. Dutiyasutte bārāṇasiyaṃ rūpūpajīvino mātugāmassa vatthu veditabbaṃ. Guttilavīṇāvādako
atk-s0401a:158_1: kirekissā itthiyā sahassaṃ pahiṇi, sā taṃ uppaṇḍetvā gaṇhituṃ na icchi. So “karissāmettha
atk-s0401a:158_2: kattabba”nti sāyanhakālasamanantare alaṅkatapaṭiyatto tassā gehassa abhimukhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:158_3: aññasmiṃ gehadvāre nisinno vīṇāya tantiyo same guṇe patiṭṭhāpetvā tantissarena gītassaraṃ
atk-s0401a:158_4: anatikkamanto gāyi. Sā itthī tassa gītasaddaṃ sutvā dvāranti saññāya “vivaṭavātapānena
atk-s0401a:158_5: tassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti ākāseyeva jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā.
atk-s0401a:159_0: 8. Tatiyasutte cakkavattirañño kāyato candanagandho vāyati, mukhato ca uppalagandhoti
atk-s0401a:159_1: idaṃ āharitabbaṃ. Idaṃ cettha vatthu veditabbaṃ. Sāvatthiyaṃ kirekissā kuṭumbikadhītāya
atk-s0401a:159_2: sāmiko satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā, “na sakkā mayā ayaṃ dhammo gihibhūtena pūretu”nti
atk-s0401a:159_3: aññatarassa piṇḍapātikattherassa santike pabbaji. Athassa bhariyaṃ “assāmikā aya”nti
atk-s0401a:159_4: ñatvā rājā pasenadikosalo antepuraṃ āharāpetvā ekadivasaṃ ekaṃ nīluppalakalāpaṃ ādāya
atk-s0401a:159_5: antepuraṃ paviṭṭho ekekissā ekekaṃ nīluppalaṃ dāpesi. Pupphesu bhājiyamānesu tassā
atk-s0401a:159_6: itthiyā dve hatthaṃ pattāni. Sā pahaṭṭhākāraṃ dassetvā upasiṅghitvā parodi. Rājā
atk-s0401a:159_7: tassā ubhayākāraṃ disvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā pucchi. Sā attano pahaṭṭhakāraṇañca rodanakāraṇañca
atk-s0401a:159_8: kathesi. Yāvatatiyaṃ kathitepi rājā assaddahanto punadivase sakalarājanivesane sabbamālāvilepanādisugandhagandhaṃ
atk-s0401a:159_9: harāpetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa āsanāni paññāpetvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0401a:159_10: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne taṃ itthiṃ “kataro te thero”ti
atk-s0401a:159_11: pucchitvā, “aya”nti vutte ñatvā satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante, tumhehi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0401a:159_12: gacchatu, amhākaṃ asukatthero anumodanaṃ karissatī”ti āha. Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:159_13: vihāraṃ gato. There anumodanaṃ vattuṃ āraddhamatte sakalaṃ rājanivesanaṃ gandhapūraṃ
atk-s0401a:159_14: viya jātaṃ. Rājā “saccamevesā āhā”ti pasīditvā punadivase satthāraṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0401a:159_15: Satthā “ayaṃ atīte dhammakathaṃ suṇanto ‘sādhu sādhū’ti sādhukāraṃ pavattento sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0401a:159_16: assosi, tammūlako tena mahārāja ayamānisaṃso laddho”ti ācikkhi.
atk-s0401a:162: Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti. Imasmiṃ vagge vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0401a:167_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame ekadhammampīti ettha “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontī”tiādīsu
atk-s0401a:167_1: viya nissattaṭṭhena dhammo veditabbo. Tasmā ekadhammampīti nissattaṃ ekasabhāvampīti
atk-s0401a:167_2: ayamettha attho. Anuppannovāti ettha pana “bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:167_3: vā anuggahāya yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā”ti evamādīsu viya samuccayattho
atk-s0401a:167_4: vāsaddo daṭṭhabbo, na vikappattho. Ayañhettha attho – yena dhammena anuppanno ca
atk-s0401a:167_5: kāmacchando uppajjati, uppanno ca kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0401a:167_6: tamahaṃ yathā subhanimittaṃ, evaṃ aññaṃ na passāmīti. Tattha anuppannoti ajāto asañjāto
atk-s0401a:167_7: apātubhūto asamudāgato. Kāmacchandoti “yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā”tiādinā
atk-s0401a:167_8: nayena vitthāritaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ. Uppajjatīti nibbattati pātubhavati. So panesa
atk-s0401a:167_9: asamudācāravasena vā ananubhūtārammaṇavasena vā anuppanno uppajjatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:167_10: Aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppanno nāma natthi.
atk-s0401a:168_0: Tattha ekaccassa vattavasena kileso na samudācarati, ekaccassa ganthadhutaṅgasamādhi-
atk-s0401a:168_1: vipassanānavakammādīnaṃ aññataravasena. Kathaṃ? Ekacco hi vattasampanno hoti, tassa
atk-s0401a:168_3: ca karontasseva kileso okāsaṃ na labhati. Aparabhāge panassa vattaṃ vissajjetvā bhinnavattassa
atk-s0401a:168_4: carato ayonisomanasikārañceva sativossaggañca āgamma uppajjati. Evampi asamudācāravasena
atk-s0401a:169_0: Ekacco ganthayutto hoti, ekampi nikāyaṃ gaṇhāti dvepi tayopi cattāropi pañcapi. Tassa
atk-s0401a:169_1: tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ atthavasena pāḷivasena anusandhivasena pubbāparavasena gaṇhantassa
atk-s0401a:169_2: sajjhāyantassa vācentassa desentassa pakāsentassa kileso okāsaṃ na labhati. Aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:169_3: panassa ganthakammaṃ pahāya kusītassa carato ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma
atk-s0401a:169_4: uppajjati. Evampi asamudācāravasena anuppanno uppajjati nāma.
atk-s0401a:170_0: Ekacco pana dhutaṅgadharo hoti, terasa dhutaṅgaguṇe samādāya vattati. Tassa pana
atk-s0401a:170_1: dhutaṅgaguṇe pariharantassa kileso okāsaṃ na labhati. Aparabhāge panassa dhutaṅgāni
atk-s0401a:170_2: vissajjetvā bāhullāya āvattassa carato ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:171_0: Ekacco aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasī hoti, tassa paṭhamajjhānādīsu āvajjanavasiādīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:171_1: vasena viharantassa kileso okāsaṃ na labhati. Aparabhāge panassa parihīnajjhānassa
atk-s0401a:171_2: vā vissaṭṭhajjhānassa vā bhassādīsu anuyuttassa viharato ayonisomanasikārasativossagge
atk-s0401a:171_3: āgamma uppajjati. Evampi asamudācāravasena anuppanno uppajjati nāma.
atk-s0401a:172_0: Ekacco pana vipassako hoti, sattasu vā anupassanāsu aṭṭhārasasu vā mahāvipassanāsu
atk-s0401a:172_1: kammaṃ karonto viharati. Tassevaṃ viharato kileso okāsaṃ na labhati. Aparabhāge panassa
atk-s0401a:172_3: āgamma uppajjati. Evampi asamudācāravasena anuppanno uppajjati nāma.
atk-s0401a:173_0: Ekacco navakammiko hoti, uposathāgārabhojanasālādīni kāreti. Tassa tesaṃ upakaraṇāni
atk-s0401a:173_1: cintentassa kileso okāsaṃ na labhati. Aparabhāge panassa navakamme niṭṭhite vā vissaṭṭhe
atk-s0401a:173_2: vā ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma uppajjati. Evampi asamudācāravasena anuppanno uppajjati nāma.
atk-s0401a:174_0: Ekacco pana brahmalokā āgato suddhasatto hoti, tassa anāsevanatāya kileso okāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:174_1: na labhati. Aparabhāge panassa laddhāsevanassa ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma
atk-s0401a:174_2: uppajjati. Evampi asamudācāravasena anuppanno uppajjati nāma. Evaṃ tāva asamudācāravasena
atk-s0401a:175_0: Kathaṃ ananubhūtārammaṇavasena? Idhekacco ananubhūtapubbaṃ manāpiyaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:175_1: labhati, tassa tattha ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma rāgo uppajjati. Evaṃ ananubhūtārammaṇavasena
atk-s0401a:176_0: Uppannoti jāto sañjāto nibbatto abhinibbatto pātubhūto. Bhiyyobhāvāyāti punappunabhāvāya.
atk-s0401a:176_1: Vepullāyāti vipulabhāvāya rāsibhāvāya. Tattha sakiṃ uppanno kāmacchando na nirujjhissati,
atk-s0401a:176_2: sakiṃ niruddho vā sveva puna uppajjissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ. Ekasmiṃ pana niruddhe tasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:176_3: vā ārammaṇe aññasmiṃ vā ārammaṇe aparāparaṃ uppajjamāno bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati nāma.
atk-s0401a:177_0: Subhanimittanti rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ. “Sanimittā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā
atk-s0401a:177_1: akusalā dhammā, no animittā”ti ettha nimittanti paccayassa nāmaṃ. “Adhicittamanuyuttena,
atk-s0401a:177_2: bhikkhave, bhikkhunā pañca nimittāni kālena kālaṃ manasikātabbānī”ti ettha kāraṇassa.
atk-s0401a:177_3: “So taṃ nimittaṃ āsevati bhāvetī”ti ettha samādhissa. “Yaṃ nimittaṃ āgamma yaṃ nimittaṃ
atk-s0401a:177_4: manasikaroto anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti ettha vipassanāya. Idha pana rāgaṭṭhāniyo
atk-s0401a:177_6: ayonisomanasikāro? Anicce niccanti, dukkhe sukhanti, anattani attāti, asubhe subhanti,
atk-s0401a:177_7: ayonisomanasikāro uppathamanasikāro, saccavippaṭikūlena vā cittassa āvajjanā anvāvajjanā
atk-s0401a:177_8: ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro. Ayaṃ vuccati ayonisomanasikāro”ti imassa manasikārassa
atk-s0401a:178_0: 12. Dutiye byāpādoti bhattabyāpatti viya cittassa byāpajjanaṃ pakativijahanabhāvo.
atk-s0401a:178_1: “Tattha katamaṃ byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ? Anatthaṃ me acarīti āghāto jāyatī”ti evaṃ vitthāritassa
atk-s0401a:178_2: byāpādanīvaraṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Paṭighanimittanti aniṭṭhaṃ nimittaṃ. Paṭighassapi
atk-s0401a:178_3: paṭighārammaṇassapi etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ – “paṭighampi
atk-s0401a:178_4: paṭighanimittaṃ, paṭighārammaṇopi dhammo paṭighanimitta”nti. Sesamettha kāmacchande
atk-s0401a:178_5: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Yathā cettha, evaṃ ito paresupi. Tattha tattha hi visesamattameva vakkhāmāti.
atk-s0401a:179_0: 13. Tatiye thinamiddhanti thinañceva middhañca. Tesu cittassa akammaññatā thinaṃ,
atk-s0401a:179_1: ālasiyabhāvassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ akammaññatā middhaṃ, kapimiddhassa
atk-s0401a:179_2: pacalāyikabhāvassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ubhinnampi “tattha katamaṃ thinaṃ? Yā cittassa
atk-s0401a:179_3: akalyatā akammaññatā olīyanā sallīyanā. Tattha katamaṃ middhaṃ? Yā kāyassa akalyatā
atk-s0401a:179_4: akammaññatā onāho pariyonāho”tiādinā nayena vitthāro veditabbo. Aratītiādīni vibhaṅge
atk-s0401a:180_0: “Tattha katamā arati? Pantesu vā senāsanesu aññataraññataresu vā adhikusalesu dhammesu
atk-s0401a:180_1: arati aratitā anabhirati anabhiramanā ukkaṇṭhitā paritassitā, ayaṃ vuccati arati.
atk-s0401a:180_2: Tattha katamā tandī? Yā tandī tandiyanā tandimanatā ālassaṃ ālassāyanā ālassāyitattaṃ,
atk-s0401a:180_3: ayaṃ vuccati tandī. Tattha katamā vijambhitā? Yā kāyassa jambhanā vijambhanā ānamanā
atk-s0401a:180_4: vinamanā sannamanā paṇamanā byādhiyakaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati vijambhitā. Tattha katamo bhattasammado?
atk-s0401a:180_5: Yā bhuttāvissa bhattamucchā bhattakilamatho bhattapariḷāho kāyaduṭṭhullaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0401a:180_6: bhattasammado. Tattha katamaṃ cetaso ca līnattaṃ? Yā cittassa akalyatā akammaññatā
atk-s0401a:180_7: olīyanā sallīyanā līnaṃ līyanā līyitattaṃ thinaṃ thiyanā thiyitattaṃ cittassa, idaṃ
atk-s0401a:181_0: Ettha ca purimā cattāro dhammā thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa sahajātavasenāpi upanissayavasenāpi
atk-s0401a:181_1: paccayā honti, cetaso ca līnattaṃ attanova attanā sahajātaṃ na hoti, upanissayakoṭiyā pana hotīti.
atk-s0401a:182_0: 14. Catutthe uddhaccakukkuccanti uddhaccañceva kukkuccañca. Tattha uddhaccaṃ nāma
atk-s0401a:182_1: cittassa uddhatākāro. Kukkuccaṃ nāma akatakalyāṇassa katapāpassa tappaccayā vippaṭisāro.
atk-s0401a:182_2: Cetaso avūpasamoti uddhaccakukkuccassevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Avūpasantacittassāti jhānena vā
atk-s0401a:182_3: vipassanāya vā avūpasamitacittassa. Ayaṃ pana avūpasamo uddhaccakukkuccassa upanissayakoṭiyā paccayo hotīti.
atk-s0401a:183: 15. Pañcame vicikicchāti “satthari kaṅkhatī”tiādinā nayena vitthāritaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ. Ayonisomanasikāro vuttalakkhaṇoyevāti.
atk-s0401a:184_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe anuppanno vā kāmacchando nuppajjatīti asamudācāravasena vā ananubhūtārammaṇavasena
atk-s0401a:184_1: vāti dvīheva kāraṇehi anuppanno na uppajjati, tathā vikkhambhitova hoti, puna hetuṃ
atk-s0401a:184_2: vā paccayaṃ vā na labhati. Idhāpi vattādīnaṃyeva vasena asamudācāro veditabbo. Ekaccassa
atk-s0401a:184_3: hi vuttanayeneva vatte yuttassa vattaṃ karontasseva kileso okāsaṃ na labhati, vattavasena
atk-s0401a:184_4: vikkhambhito hoti. So taṃ tathāvikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti
atk-s0401a:185_0: So kirāyasmā rohaṇajanapade gāmeṇḍavālamahāvihārassa bhikkhācāre nesādakule nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:185_1: Vayaṃ āgamma katagharāvāso “puttadāraṃ posessāmī”ti adūhalasataṃ saṇṭhapetvā pāsasataṃ
atk-s0401a:185_2: yojetvā sūlasataṃ ropetvā bahuṃ pāpaṃ āyūhanto ekadivasaṃ gehato aggiñca loṇañca
atk-s0401a:185_3: gahetvā araññaṃ gato. Pāse baddhamigaṃ vadhitvā aṅgārapakkamaṃsaṃ khāditvā pipāsito
atk-s0401a:185_4: hutvā gāmeṇḍavālamahāvihāraṃ paviṭṭho pānīyamāḷake dasamattesu pānīyaghaṭesu pipāsāvinodanamattampi
atk-s0401a:185_5: pānīyaṃ alabhanto, “kiṃ nāmetaṃ ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne pipāsāya āgatānaṃ
atk-s0401a:185_6: pipāsāvinodanamattaṃ pānīyaṃ natthī”ti ujjhāyituṃ āraddho. Cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissatthero
atk-s0401a:185_7: tassa kathaṃ sutvā tassa santikaṃ gacchanto pānīyamāḷake dasamatte pānīyaghaṭe pūre
atk-s0401a:185_8: disvā “jīvamānapetakasatto ayaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā, “upāsaka, sace pipāsitosi,
atk-s0401a:185_9: piva pānīya”nti vatvā kuṭaṃ ukkhipitvā tassa hatthesu āsiñci. Tassa kammaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0401a:185_10: pītapītaṃ pānīyaṃ tattakapāle pakkhittamiva nassati, sakalepi ghaṭe pivato pipāsā
atk-s0401a:185_11: na pacchijji. Atha naṃ thero āha – “yāva dāruṇañca te, upāsaka, kammaṃ kataṃ, idāneva
atk-s0401a:186_0: So tassa kathaṃ sutvā laddhasaṃvego theraṃ vanditvā tāni adūhalādīni visaṅkharitvā
atk-s0401a:186_1: vegena gharaṃ gantvā puttadāraṃ oloketvā satthāni bhinditvā dīpakamigapakkhino araññe
atk-s0401a:186_2: vissajjetvā theraṃ paccupasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Dukkarā, āvuso, pabbajjā, kathaṃ
atk-s0401a:186_3: tvaṃ pabbajissasīti? Bhante, evarūpaṃ paccakkhakāraṇaṃ disvā kathaṃ na pabbajissāmīti?
atk-s0401a:186_4: Thero tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājesi. So vattārabhito hutvā buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0401a:186_5: uggaṇhanto ekadivasaṃ devadūtasutte “tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā puna mahāniraye
atk-s0401a:186_6: pakkhipantī”ti imaṃ ṭhānaṃ sutvā “ettakaṃ dukkharāsiṃ anubhavitasattaṃ puna mahāniraye
atk-s0401a:186_7: pakkhipanti, aho bhāriyo, bhante, mahānirayo”ti āha. Āmāvuso, bhāriyoti. Sakkā, bhante,
atk-s0401a:186_8: passitunti? “Na sakkā passituṃ, diṭṭhasadisaṃ kātuṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassessāmī”ti sāmaṇere
atk-s0401a:186_9: samādapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhe alladārurāsiṃ kārehīti. So tathā kāresi. Thero yathānisinnova
atk-s0401a:186_10: iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā mahānirayato khajjopanakamattaṃ aggipapaṭikaṃ nīharitvā passantasseva
atk-s0401a:186_11: tassa therassa dārurāsimhi pakkhipi. Tassa tattha nipāto ca dārurāsino jhāyitvā chārikabhāvūpagamanañca
atk-s0401a:187_0: So taṃ disvā, “bhante, imasmiṃ sāsane kati dhurāni nāmā”ti pucchi. Āvuso, vipassanādhuraṃ,
atk-s0401a:187_1: ganthadhuranti. “Bhante, gantho nāma paṭibalassa bhāro, mayhaṃ pana dukkhūpanisā
atk-s0401a:187_2: saddhā, vipassanādhuraṃ pūressāmi kammaṭṭhānaṃ me dethā”ti vanditvā nisīdi. Thero
atk-s0401a:187_3: “vattasampanno bhikkhū”ti vattasīse ṭhatvā tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. So kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:187_4: gahetvā vipassanāya ca kammaṃ karoti, vattañca pūreti. Ekadivasaṃ cittalapabbatamahāvihāre
atk-s0401a:187_5: vattaṃ karoti, ekadivasaṃ gāmeṇḍavālamahāvihāre, ekadivasaṃ gocaragāmamahāvihāre.
atk-s0401a:187_6: Thinamiddhe okkantamatte vattaparihānibhayena palālavaraṇakaṃ temetvā sīse ṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:187_7: pāde udake otāretvā nisīdati. So ekadivasaṃ cittalapabbatamahāvihāre dve yāme vattaṃ
atk-s0401a:187_8: katvā balavapaccūsakāle niddāya okkamituṃ āraddhāya allapalālaṃ sīse ṭhapetvā nisinno
atk-s0401a:192_0: Idaṃ ṭhānaṃ sutvā “mādisassa āraddhavīriyassa bhikkhuno sammāsambuddhena idaṃ kathitaṃ
atk-s0401a:192_1: bhavissatī”ti pītiṃ uppādetvā jhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā anāgāmiphale
atk-s0401a:192_2: patiṭṭhāya aparāparaṃ vāyamanto saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Parinibbānakāle
atk-s0401a:194: Pattosmi tatiyaṃ ṭhānaṃ, ettha me natthi saṃsayo”ti.
atk-s0401a:195: Evarūpassa vattavasena vikkhambhitakileso tathā vikkhambhitova hoti.
atk-s0401a:196_0: Ekaccassa vuttanayeneva ganthe yuttassa ganthaṃ uggaṇhantassa sajjhāyantassa vācentassa
atk-s0401a:196_1: desentassa pakāsentassa ca kileso okāsaṃ na labhati, ganthavasena vikkhambhitova
atk-s0401a:196_2: hoti. So taṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti maliyadevatthero
atk-s0401a:196_3: viya. So kirāyasmā tivassabhikkhukāle kallagāmake maṇḍalārāmamahāvihāre uddesañca
atk-s0401a:196_4: gaṇhāti, vipassanāya ca kammaṃ karoti. Tassekadivasaṃ kallagāme bhikkhāya carato
atk-s0401a:196_5: ekā upāsikā yāguuḷuṅkaṃ datvā puttasinehaṃ uppādetvā theraṃ antonivesane nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0401a:196_7: ganthakammaṃ karomi, upāsiketi. Tena hi tāta yāva ganthakammaṃ karosi, idheva nibaddhaṃ
atk-s0401a:196_8: bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāsīti. So taṃ adhivāsetvā tattha nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāti, bhattakiccāvasāne
atk-s0401a:196_9: anumodanaṃ karonto “sukhaṃ hotu, dukkhā muccatū”ti padadvayameva kathetvā gacchati.
atk-s0401a:196_10: Antovasse temāsaṃ tassāyeva saṅgahaṃ karonto piṇḍāpacitiṃ katvā mahāpavāraṇāya saha
atk-s0401a:196_11: paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Nevāsikamahāthero āha – “āvuso mahādeva, ajja vihāre
atk-s0401a:196_12: mahājano sannipatissati, tassa dhammadānaṃ dadeyyāsī”ti. Thero adhivāsesi.
atk-s0401a:197_0: Daharasāmaṇerā upāsikāya saññaṃ adaṃsu – “ajja te putto dhammaṃ kathessati, vihāraṃ
atk-s0401a:197_1: gantvā suṇeyyāsī”ti. Tātā, na sabbeva dhammakathaṃ jānanti, mama putto ettakaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0401a:197_2: mayhaṃ kathento “sukhaṃ hotu, dukkhā muccatū”ti padadvayameva kathesi, mā keḷiṃ karothāti.
atk-s0401a:197_3: Mā, tvaṃ upāsike, jānanaṃ vā ajānanaṃ vā upaṭṭhahassu, vihāraṃ gantvā dhammameva
atk-s0401a:197_4: suṇāhīti. Upāsikā gandhamālādīni gahetvā gantvā pūjetvā parisante dhammaṃ suṇamānā
atk-s0401a:197_5: nisīdi. Divādhammakathiko ca sarabhāṇako ca attano pamāṇaṃ ñatvā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Tato
atk-s0401a:197_6: maliyadevatthero dhammāsane nisīditvā cittabījaniṃ gahetvā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ vatvā
atk-s0401a:197_7: – “mayā mahāupāsikāya tayo māse dvīheva padehi anumodanā katā, ajja sabbarattiṃ tīhi
atk-s0401a:197_8: piṭakehi sammasitvā tasseva padadvayassa atthaṃ kathessāmī”ti dhammadesanaṃ ārabhitvā
atk-s0401a:197_9: sabbarattiṃ kathesi. Aruṇuggamane desanāpariyosāne mahāupāsikā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:198_0: Aparopi tasmiṃyeva mahāvihāre tissabhūtitthero nāma vinayaṃ gaṇhanto bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:198_1: antogāmaṃ paviṭṭho visabhāgārammaṇaṃ olokesi. Tassa lobho uppajji, so patiṭṭhitapādaṃ
atk-s0401a:198_2: acāletvā attano patte yāguṃ upaṭṭhākadaharassa patte ākiritvā “ayaṃ vitakko vaḍḍhamāno
atk-s0401a:198_3: maṃ catūsu apāyesu saṃsīdāpessatī”ti tatova nivattitvā ācariyassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:198_4: vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito āha – “eko me byādhi uppanno, ahaṃ etaṃ tikicchituṃ sakkonto
atk-s0401a:198_5: āgamissāmi, itarathā nāgamissāmi. Tumhe divā uddesañca sāyaṃ uddesañca maṃ oloketvā
atk-s0401a:198_6: ṭhapetha, paccūsakāle uddesaṃ pana mā ṭhapayitthā”ti evaṃ vatvā malayavāsimahāsaṅgharakkhitattherassa
atk-s0401a:198_7: santikaṃ agamāsi. Thero attano paṇṇasālāya paribhaṇḍaṃ karonto taṃ anoloketvāva “paṭisāmehi,
atk-s0401a:198_8: āvuso, tava pattacīvara”nti āha. Bhante, eko me byādhi atthi, sace tumhe taṃ tikicchituṃ
atk-s0401a:198_9: sakkotha, paṭisāmessāmīti. Āvuso, uppannaṃ rogaṃ tikicchituṃ samatthassa santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:198_10: āgatosi, paṭisāmehīti. Subbaco bhikkhu “amhākaṃ ācariyo ajānitvā evaṃ na vakkhatī”ti
atk-s0401a:198_11: pattacīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā therassa vattaṃ dassetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:199_0: Thero “rāgacarito aya”nti ñatvā asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. So uṭṭhāya pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0401a:199_1: aṃse laggetvā theraṃ punappunaṃ vandi. Kiṃ, āvuso, mahābhūti atirekanipaccakāraṃ
atk-s0401a:199_2: dassesīti? Bhante, sace attano kiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissāmi, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce,
atk-s0401a:199_3: idaṃ me pacchimadassananti! Gacchāvuso, mahābhūti tādisassa yuttayogassa kulaputtassa
atk-s0401a:199_4: na jhānaṃ vā vipassanā vā maggo vā phalaṃ vā dullabhanti. So therassa kathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0401a:199_5: nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā āgamanakāle vavatthāpitaṃ channaṃ sepaṇṇigacchamūlaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:199_6: pallaṅkena nisinno asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahatte
atk-s0401a:199_7: patiṭṭhāya paccūsakāle uddesaṃ sampāpuṇi. Evarūpānaṃ ganthavasena vikkhambhitā kilesā
atk-s0401a:200_0: Ekaccassa pana vuttanayeneva dhutaṅgāni pariharato kileso okāsaṃ na labhati, dhutaṅgavasena
atk-s0401a:200_1: vikkhambhitova hoti. So taṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti
atk-s0401a:200_2: gāmantapabbhāravāsī mahāsīvatthero viya. Thero kira mahāgāme tissamahāvihāre vasanto
atk-s0401a:200_3: tepiṭakaṃ atthavasena ca pāḷivasena ca aṭṭhārasa mahāgaṇe vāceti. Therassa ovāde
atk-s0401a:200_4: ṭhatvā saṭṭhisahassa bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tesu eko bhikkhu attanā paṭividdhadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:200_5: ārabbha uppannasomanasso cintesi – “atthi nu kho idaṃ sukhaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyassā”ti.
atk-s0401a:200_6: So āvajjento therassa puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ekenupāyena therassa saṃvegaṃ uppādessāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:200_7: attano vasanaṭṭhānato therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā vattaṃ dassetvā nisīdi. Atha
atk-s0401a:200_8: naṃ thero “kiṃ āgatosi, āvuso, piṇḍapātikā”ti āha. “Sace me okāsaṃ karissatha, ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:200_9: dhammapadaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti āgatosmi, bhanteti. Bahū, āvuso, gaṇhanti, tuyhaṃ okāso
atk-s0401a:200_10: na bhavissatīti. So sabbesu rattidivasabhāgesu okāsaṃ alabhanto, “bhante, evaṃ okāse
atk-s0401a:200_11: asati maraṇassa kathaṃ okāsaṃ labhissathā”ti āha. Tadā thero cintesi – “nāyaṃ uddesatthāya
atk-s0401a:200_12: āgato, mayhaṃ panesa saṃvegajananatthāya āgato”ti. Sopi thero “bhikkhunā nāma, bhante,
atk-s0401a:200_13: mādisena bhavitabba”nti vatvā theraṃ vanditvā maṇivaṇṇe ākāse uppatitvā agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:201_0: Thero tassa gatakālato paṭṭhāya jātasaṃvego divā uddesañca sāyaṃ uddesañca vācetvā
atk-s0401a:201_1: pattacīvaraṃ hatthapāse ṭhapetvā paccūsakāle uddesaṃ gahetvā otarantena bhikkhunā
atk-s0401a:201_2: saddhiṃ pattacīvaramādāya otiṇṇo terasa dhutaguṇe paripuṇṇe adhiṭṭhāya gāmantapabbhārasenāsanaṃ
atk-s0401a:201_3: gantvā pabbhāraṃ paṭijaggitvā mañcapīṭhaṃ ussāpetvā “arahattaṃ apatvā mañce piṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0401a:201_4: na pasāressāmī”ti mānasaṃ bandhitvā caṅkamaṃ otari. Tassa “ajja arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmi
atk-s0401a:201_5: ajja arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti ghaṭentasseva pavāraṇā sampattā. So pavāraṇāya upakaṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:201_6: “puthujjanabhāvaṃ pahāya visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāressāmī”ti cintento ativiya kilamati.
atk-s0401a:201_7: So tāya pavāraṇāya maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā uppādetuṃ asakkonto “mādisopi nāma āraddhavipassako
atk-s0401a:201_8: na labhati, yāva dullabhañca vatidaṃ arahatta”nti vatvā teneva niyāmena ṭhānacaṅkamabahulo
atk-s0401a:201_9: hutvā tiṃsa vassāni samaṇadhammaṃ katvā mahāpavāraṇāya majjhe ṭhitaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ
atk-s0401a:201_10: disvā “kiṃ nu kho candamaṇḍalaṃ visuddhaṃ, udāhu mayhaṃ sīla”nti cintento “candamaṇḍale
atk-s0401a:201_11: sasalakkhaṇaṃ paññāyati, mayhaṃ pana upasampadato paṭṭhāya yāvajjadivasā sīlasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:201_12: kāḷakaṃ vā tilako vā natthī”ti āvajjetvā sañjātapītisomanasso paripakkañāṇattā pītiṃ
atk-s0401a:201_13: vikkhambhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Evarūpassa dhutaṅgavasena vikkhambhito
atk-s0401a:202_0: Ekaccassa vuttanayeneva paṭhamajjhānādisamāpajjanabahulatāya kileso okāsaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0401a:202_1: samāpattivasena vikkhambhitova hoti. So taṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā
atk-s0401a:202_2: arahattaṃ gaṇhāti mahātissatthero viya. Thero kira avassikakālato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī.
atk-s0401a:202_3: So samāpattivikkhambhitānaṃ kilesānaṃ asamudācārena uggahaparipucchāvaseneva ariyamaggasāmantaṃ
atk-s0401a:202_4: katheti, saṭṭhivassakālepi attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ na jānāti. Athekadivasaṃ mahāgāme
atk-s0401a:202_6: “thero āgantvā amhākaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetū”ti. Thero adhivāsetvā “mama santike mahallakataro
atk-s0401a:202_7: bhikkhu natthi, mahātissatthero kho pana me kammaṭṭhānācariyo, taṃ saṅghattheraṃ
atk-s0401a:202_8: katvā gamissāmī”ti cintento bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto therassa vihāraṃ gantvā divāṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:203_0: Thero āha – “kiṃ, dhammadinna, cirassaṃ āgatosī”ti? “Āma, bhante, tissamahāvihārato
atk-s0401a:203_1: me bhikkhusaṅgho sāsanaṃ pesesi, ahaṃ ekako na gamissāmi, tumhehi pana saddhiṃ gantukāmo
atk-s0401a:203_2: hutvā āgatomhī”ti sāraṇīyakathaṃ kathentova papañcetvā “kadā, bhante, tumhehi ayaṃ
atk-s0401a:203_3: dhammo adhigato”ti pucchi. Saṭṭhimattāni, āvuso dhammadinna, vassāni hontīti. Samāpattiṃ
atk-s0401a:203_4: pana, bhante, vaḷañjethāti. Āma, āvusoti. Ekaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ māpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyātha,
atk-s0401a:203_5: bhanteti? “Na, āvuso, etaṃ bhāriya”nti vatvā sammukhaṭṭhāne pokkharaṇiṃ māpesi. “Ettha,
atk-s0401a:203_6: bhante, ekaṃ padumagacchaṃ māpethā”ti ca vutto tampi māpesi. Idānettha mahantaṃ pupphaṃ
atk-s0401a:203_7: dassethāti. Thero tampi dassesi. Ettha soḷasavassuddesikaṃ itthirūpaṃ dassethāti.
atk-s0401a:203_8: Thero soḷasavassuddesikaṃ itthirūpaṃ dassesi. Tato naṃ āha – “idaṃ, bhante, punappunaṃ
atk-s0401a:203_9: subhato manasi karothā”ti. Thero attanāva māpitaṃ itthirūpaṃ olokento lobhaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0401a:203_10: Tadā attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “avassayo me sappurisa hohī”ti antevāsikassa santike
atk-s0401a:203_11: ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdi. “Etadatthamevāhaṃ, bhante, āgato”ti therassa asubhavasena sallahukaṃ
atk-s0401a:203_12: katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā therassa okāsaṃ kātuṃ bahi nikkhanto. Suparimadditasaṅkhāro
atk-s0401a:203_13: thero tasmiṃ divāṭṭhānato nikkhantamatteyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:203_14: Atha naṃ saṅghattheraṃ katvā dhammadinnatthero tissamahāvihāraṃ gantvā saṅghassa
atk-s0401a:203_15: dhammakathaṃ kathesi. Evarūpassa samāpattivasena vikkhambhito kileso tathā vikkhambhitova hoti.
atk-s0401a:204_0: Ekaccassa pana vuttanayeneva vipassanāya kammaṃ karontassa kileso okāsaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0401a:204_1: vipassanāvasena vikkhambhitova hoti. So taṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā
atk-s0401a:204_2: arahattaṃ gaṇhāti, buddhakāle saṭṭhimattā āraddhavipassakā bhikkhū viya. Te kira
atk-s0401a:204_3: satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vivittaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ
atk-s0401a:204_4: karontā kilesānaṃ asamudācāravasena “paṭividdhamaggaphalā maya”nti saññāya maggaphalatthāya
atk-s0401a:204_5: vāyāmaṃ akatvā “amhehi paṭividdhadhammaṃ dasabalassa ārocessāmā”ti satthu santikaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0401a:205_0: Satthā tesaṃ pure āgamanatova ānandattheraṃ āha – “ānanda, padhānakammikā bhikkhū
atk-s0401a:205_1: ajja maṃ passituṃ āgamissanti, tesaṃ mama dassanāya okāsaṃ akatvā ‘āmakasusānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:205_2: allaasubhabhāvanaṃ karothā’ti pahiṇeyyāsī”ti. Thero tesaṃ āgatānaṃ satthārā kathitasāsanaṃ
atk-s0401a:205_3: ārocesi. Te “tathāgato ajānitvā na kathessati, addhā ettha kāraṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:205_4: āmakasusānaṃ gantvā allaasubhaṃ olokentā lobhaṃ uppādetvā “idaṃ nūna sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0401a:205_5: diṭṭhaṃ bhavissatī”ti jātasaṃvegā laddhamaggaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:205_6: Satthā tesaṃ vipassanāya āraddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova imaṃ obhāsagāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:207: Kāpotakāni aṭṭhīni, tāni disvāna kā ratī”ti. ;
atk-s0401a:208: Gāthāpariyosāne arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Evarūpānaṃ vipassanāvasena vikkhambhitā kilesā tathā vikkhambhitāva honti.
atk-s0401a:209_0: Ekaccassa vuttanayeneva navakammaṃ karontassa kileso okāsaṃ na labhati, navakammavasena
atk-s0401a:209_1: vikkhambhitova hoti. So taṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti
atk-s0401a:209_2: cittalapabbate tissatthero viya. Tassa kira aṭṭhavassikakāle anabhirati uppajji,
atk-s0401a:209_3: so taṃ vinodetuṃ asakkonto attano cīvaraṃ dhovitvā rajitvā pattaṃ pacitvā kese ohāretvā
atk-s0401a:209_4: upajjhāyaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ thero āha – “kiṃ, āvuso mahātissa, atuṭṭhassa
atk-s0401a:209_5: viya te ākāro”ti? Āma, bhante, anabhirati me uppannā, taṃ vinodetuṃ na sakkomīti.
atk-s0401a:209_6: Thero tassāsayaṃ olokento arahattassa upanissayaṃ disvā anukampāvasena āha – “āvuso
atk-s0401a:209_7: tissa, mayaṃ mahallakā, ekaṃ no vasanaṭṭhānaṃ karohī”ti. Dutiyakathaṃ akathitapubbo
atk-s0401a:210_0: Atha naṃ thero āha – “āvuso, navakammaṃ karonto uddesamaggañca mā vissajji, kammaṭṭhānañca
atk-s0401a:210_1: manasi karohi, kālena ca kālaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ karohī”ti. “Evaṃ karissāmi, bhante”ti
atk-s0401a:210_2: theraṃ vanditvā tathārūpaṃ sappāyaṭṭhānaṃ oloketvā “ettha kātuṃ sakkā”ti dārūhi pūretvā
atk-s0401a:210_3: jhāpetvā sodhetvā iṭṭhakāhi parikkhipitvā dvāravātapānādīni yojetvā saddhiṃ caṅkamanabhūmibhittiparikammādīhi
atk-s0401a:210_4: leṇaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā mañcapīṭhaṃ santharitvā therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:210_5: niṭṭhitaṃ leṇe parikammaṃ, vasathā”ti āha. Āvuso, dukkhena tayā etaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0401a:210_6: ajja ekadivasaṃ tvaññevettha vasāhīti. So “sādhu, bhante”ti vanditvā pāde dhovitvā
atk-s0401a:210_7: leṇaṃ pavisitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno attanā katakammaṃ āvajji. Tassa “manāpaṃ
atk-s0401a:210_8: mayā upajjhāyassa kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ kata”nti cintentassa abbhantare pīti uppannā. So
atk-s0401a:210_9: taṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Evarūpassa
atk-s0401a:210_10: navakammavasena vikkhambhito kileso tathā vikkhambhitova hoti.
atk-s0401a:211_0: Ekacco pana brahmalokato āgato suddhasatto hoti. Tassa anāsevanatāya kileso na samudācarati,
atk-s0401a:211_1: bhavavasena vikkhambhito hoti. So taṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:211_2: gaṇhāti āyasmā mahākassapo viya. So hi āyasmā agāramajjhepi kāme aparibhuñjitvā mahāsampattiṃ
atk-s0401a:211_3: pahāya pabbajitvā nikkhanto antarāmagge paccuggamanatthāya āgataṃ satthāraṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:211_4: vanditvā tīhi ovādehi upasampadaṃ labhitvā aṭṭhame aruṇe saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:211_5: pāpuṇi. Evarūpassa bhavavasena vikkhambhito kileso tathā vikkhambhitova hoti.
atk-s0401a:212_0: Yo pana ananubhūtapubbaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ labhitvā tattheva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:212_1: vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti, evarūpassa ananubhūtārammaṇavasena kāmacchando anuppannova nuppajjati nāma.
atk-s0401a:213_0: Uppanno vā kāmacchando pahīyatīti ettha uppannoti jāto bhūto samudāgato. Pahīyatīti
atk-s0401a:213_2: nissaraṇappahānanti imehi pañcahi pahānehi pahīyati, na puna uppajjatīti attho. Tattha
atk-s0401a:213_3: vipassanāya kilesā tadaṅgavasena pahīyantīti vipassanā tadaṅgappahānanti veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:213_4: Samāpatti pana kilese vikkhambhetīti sā vikkhambhanappahānanti veditabbā. Maggo samucchindanto
atk-s0401a:213_5: uppajjati, phalaṃ paṭippassambhayamānaṃ, nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi nissaṭanti imāni
atk-s0401a:214_0: Asubhanimittanti dasasu asubhesu uppannaṃ sārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ. Tenāhu porāṇā
atk-s0401a:214_2: “Tattha katamo yonisomanasikāro? Anicce anicca”ntiādinā nayena vuttassa upāyamanasikārassa
atk-s0401a:214_3: vasena manasikaroto. Anuppanno ceva kāmacchando nuppajjatīti asamudāgato na samudāgacchati.
atk-s0401a:214_4: Uppanno ca kāmacchando pahīyatīti samudāgato ca kāmacchando pañcavidhena pahānena pahīyati.
atk-s0401a:215_0: Apica cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattanti – asubhanimittassa uggaho, asubhabhāvanānuyogo,
atk-s0401a:215_1: indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, kalyāṇamittatā sappāyakathāti. Dasavidhañhi
atk-s0401a:215_2: asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhantassāpi kāmacchando pahīyati, bhāventassāpi, indriyesu pihitadvārassāpi,
atk-s0401a:215_3: catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ ālopānaṃ okāse sati udakaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlatāya bhojane mattaññunopi. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0401a:218_1: pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu dasaasubhanissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0401a:219_0: 17. Sattame mettā cetovimuttīti sabbasattesu hitapharaṇakā mettā. Yasmā pana taṃsampayuttacittaṃ
atk-s0401a:219_1: nīvaraṇādīhi paccanīkadhammehi vimuccati, tasmā sā “cetovimuttī”ti vuccati. Visesato
atk-s0401a:219_2: vā sabbabyāpādapariyuṭṭhānena vimuttattā sā cetovimuttīti veditabbā. Tattha “mettā”ti
atk-s0401a:219_3: ettāvatā pubbabhāgopi vaṭṭati, “cetovimuttī”ti vuttattā pana idha tikacatukkajjhānavasena
atk-s0401a:219_4: appanāva adhippetā. Yonisomanasikarototi taṃ mettaṃ cetovimuttiṃ vuttalakkhaṇena
atk-s0401a:220_0: Apica cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattanti – mettānimittassa uggaho, mettābhāvanānuyogo,
atk-s0401a:220_3: pahīyati, odhiso anodhiso disāpharaṇavasena mettaṃ bhāventassāpi. “Tvaṃ etassa kuddho
atk-s0401a:220_4: kiṃ karissasi, kimassa sīlādīni nāsetuṃ sakkhissasi, nanu tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā
atk-s0401a:220_5: attano kammeneva gamissasi? Parassa kujjhanaṃ nāma vītaccitaṅgāratattaayasalākagūthādīni
atk-s0401a:220_6: gahetvā paraṃ paharitukāmatāsadisaṃ hoti. Esopi tava kuddho kiṃ karissati, kiṃ te
atk-s0401a:220_7: sīlādīni nāsetuṃ sakkhissati? Esa attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissati,
atk-s0401a:220_8: appaṭicchitapaheṇakaṃ viya paṭivātaṃ khittarajomuṭṭhi viya ca etassevesa kodho matthake
atk-s0401a:220_9: patissatī”ti evaṃ attano ca parassa ca kammassakataṃ paccavekkhatopi, ubhayakammassakataṃ
atk-s0401a:220_10: paccavekkhitvā paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhitassāpi, assaguttattherasadise mettābhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte
atk-s0401a:220_11: sevantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu mettānissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati.
atk-s0401a:220_12: Tena vuttaṃ – “cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti. Sesamidha ito paresu
atk-s0401a:220_13: ca vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, visesamattameva pana vakkhāmāti.
atk-s0401a:221_0: 18. Aṭṭhame ārambhadhātūādīsu ārambhadhātu nāma paṭhamārambhavīriyaṃ. Nikkamadhātu
atk-s0401a:221_1: nāma kosajjato nikkhantattā tato balavataraṃ. Parakkamadhātu nāma paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:221_2: akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ārambho cetaso kāmānaṃ panūdanāya,
atk-s0401a:221_3: nikkamo cetaso palighugghāṭanāya, parakkamo cetaso bandhanacchedanāyā”ti vatvā “tīhi
atk-s0401a:222_0: Āraddhavīriyassāti paripuṇṇavīriyassa ceva paggahitavīriyassa ca. Tattha catudosāpagataṃ
atk-s0401a:222_1: vīriyaṃ āraddhanti veditabbaṃ. Na ca atilīnaṃ hoti, na ca atipaggahitaṃ, na ca ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0401a:222_2: saṃkhittaṃ, na ca bahiddhā vikkhittaṃ. Tadetaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti – kāyikaṃ, cetasikañca.
atk-s0401a:222_3: Tattha “idha bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”ti
atk-s0401a:222_4: evaṃ rattidivasassa pañca koṭṭhāse kāyena ghaṭentassa vāyamantassa kāyikavīriyaṃ
atk-s0401a:222_5: veditabbaṃ. “Na tāvāhaṃ ito leṇā nikkhamissāmi, yāva me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ
atk-s0401a:222_6: vimuccatī”ti evaṃ okāsaparicchedena vā, “na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:222_7: evaṃ nisajjādiparicchedena vā mānasaṃ bandhitvā ghaṭentassa vāyamantassa cetasikavīriyaṃ
atk-s0401a:222_8: veditabbaṃ. Tadubhayampi idha vaṭṭati. Duvidhenāpi hi iminā vīriyena āraddhavīriyassa
atk-s0401a:222_9: anuppannañceva thinamiddhaṃ nuppajjati, uppannañca thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati milakkhatissattherassa
atk-s0401a:222_10: viya, gāmantapabbhāravāsimahāsīvattherassa viya, pītimallakattherassa viya, kuṭumbiyaputtatissattherassa
atk-s0401a:222_11: viya ca. Etesu hi purimā tayo aññe ca evarūpā kāyikavīriyena āraddhavīriyā, kuṭumbiyaputtatissatthero
atk-s0401a:222_12: aññe ca evarūpā cetasikavīriyena āraddhavīriyā, uccāvālukavāsī mahānāgatthero pana
atk-s0401a:222_13: dvīhipi vīriyehi āraddhavīriyova. Thero kira ekaṃ sattāhaṃ caṅkamati, ekaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0401a:222_14: ekaṃ nisīdati, ekaṃ nipajjati. Mahātherassa ekairiyāpathopi asappāyo nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:222_15: catutthe sattāhe vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:223_0: Apica cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattanti – atibhojane nimittaggāho, iriyāpathasamparivattanatā,
atk-s0401a:223_2: viya bhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhāne nisinnassa hi samaṇadhammaṃ karoto
atk-s0401a:223_3: thinamiddhaṃ mahāhatthī viya ottharantaṃ āgacchati, catupañcaālopaokāsaṃ pana ṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:223_4: pānīyaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlassa bhikkhuno taṃ na hotīti evaṃ atibhojane nimittaṃ gaṇhantassāpi
atk-s0401a:223_5: thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati. Yasmiṃ iriyāpathe thinamiddhaṃ okkamati, tato aññaṃ parivattentassāpi,
atk-s0401a:223_6: rattiṃ candālokadīpālokaukkāloke divā sūriyālokaṃ manasikarontassāpi, abbhokāse vasantassāpi,
atk-s0401a:223_8: pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu dhutaṅganissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0401a:224: 19. Navame vūpasantacittassāti jhānena vā vipassanāya vā vūpasamitacittassa.
atk-s0401a:225_0: Apica cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattanti – bahussutatā, paripucchakatā,
atk-s0401a:225_1: vinaye pakataññutā, vuddhasevitā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti. Bāhusaccenāpi hi
atk-s0401a:225_2: ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi
atk-s0401a:225_4: ciṇṇavasībhāvatāya pakataññunopi, vuḍḍhe mahallakatthere upasaṅkamantassāpi, upālittherasadise
atk-s0401a:225_5: vinayadhare kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-s0401a:225_6: kappiyākappiyanissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ – “cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa
atk-s0401a:226: 20. Dasame yoniso, bhikkhave, manasikarototi vuttanayeneva upāyato manasikarontassa.
atk-s0401a:227_0: Apica cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya saṃvattanti – bahussutatā, paripucchakatā,
atk-s0401a:227_1: vinaye pakataññutā, adhimokkhabahulatā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti. Bahusaccenāpi
atk-s0401a:227_2: hi ekaṃ vā…pe… pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi vicikicchā
atk-s0401a:227_3: pahīyati, tīṇi ratanāni ārabbha paripucchābahulassāpi, vinaye ciṇṇavasībhāvassāpi,
atk-s0401a:227_5: kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ
atk-s0401a:227_6: guṇanissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ – “cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya
atk-s0401a:232_0: 21-22. Tatiyassa paṭhame abhāvitanti avaḍḍhitaṃ bhāvanāvasena appavattitaṃ. Akammaniyaṃ
atk-s0401a:232_1: hotīti kammakkhamaṃ kammayoggaṃ na hoti. Dutiye vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:232_2: Ettha ca paṭhame cittanti vaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṃ, dutiye vivaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṃ.
atk-s0401a:232_3: Tattha ca vaṭṭaṃ vaṭṭapādaṃ, vivaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭapādanti ayaṃ pabhedo veditabbo. Vaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0401a:232_4: nāma tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ, vaṭṭapādaṃ nāma vaṭṭapaṭilābhāya kammaṃ, vivaṭṭaṃ nāma nava
atk-s0401a:232_5: lokuttaradhammā, vivaṭṭapādaṃ nāma vivaṭṭapaṭilābhāya kammaṃ. Iti imesu suttesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.
atk-s0401a:233_0: 23-24. Tatiye vaṭṭavaseneva uppannacittaṃ veditabbaṃ. Mahato anatthāya saṃvattatīti
atk-s0401a:233_3: detīti mahato anatthāya saṃvattati nāmāti. Catutthe cittanti vivaṭṭavaseneva uppannacittaṃ.
atk-s0401a:234_0: 25-26. Pañcamachaṭṭhesu abhāvitaṃ apātubhūtanti ayaṃ viseso. Tatrāmayadhippāyo –
atk-s0401a:234_1: vaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṃ nāma uppannampi abhāvitaṃ apātubhūtameva hoti. Kasmā? Lokuttarapādakajjhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānesu
atk-s0401a:234_2: pakkhandituṃ asamatthattā. Vivaṭṭavasena uppannaṃ pana bhāvitaṃ pātubhūtaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0401a:234_3: Kasmā? Tesu dhammesu pakkhandituṃ samatthattā. Kurundakavāsī phussamittatthero panāha
atk-s0401a:235: 27-28. Sattamaṭṭhamesu abahulīkatanti punappunaṃ akataṃ. Imānipi dve vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena uppannacittāneva veditabbānīti.
atk-s0401a:236_0: 29. Navame “jātipi dukkhā”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ dukkhaṃ adhivahati āharatīti dukkhādhivahaṃ.
atk-s0401a:236_2: dukkhena adhivāhīyati pesīyatīti dukkhādhivāhaṃ. Idampi vaṭṭavasena uppannacittameva.
atk-s0401a:236_3: Tañhi vuttappakārā devamanussādisampattiyo dadamānampi jātiādīnaṃ adhivahanato dukkhādhivahaṃ,
atk-s0401a:237_0: 30. Dasame vivaṭṭavasena uppannacittameva cittaṃ. Tañhi mānusakasukhato dibbasukhaṃ,
atk-s0401a:237_1: dibbasukhato jhānasukhaṃ, jhānasukhato vipassanāsukhaṃ, vipassanāsukhato maggasukhaṃ,
atk-s0401a:237_2: maggasukhato phalasukhaṃ, phalasukhato nibbānasukhaṃ adhivahati āharatīti sukhādhivahaṃ
atk-s0401a:237_3: nāma hoti, sukhādhivāhaṃ vā. Tañhi lokuttarapādakajjhānādiariyadhammābhimukhaṃ supesayaṃ
atk-s0401a:237_4: vissaṭṭhaindavajirasadisaṃ hotīti sukhādhivāhantipi vuccati. Imasmimpi vagge vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.
atk-s0401a:242: 31. Catutthassa paṭhame adantanti savisevanaṃ adantahatthiassādisadisaṃ. Cittanti vaṭṭavasena uppannacittameva.
atk-s0401a:243: 32. Dutiye dantanti nibbisevanaṃ dantahatthiassādisadisaṃ. Imasmimpi suttadvaye vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena uppannacittameva kathitaṃ. Yathā cettha, evaṃ ito paresupīti.
atk-s0401a:246: 35-36. Pañcamachaṭṭhāni arakkhitaṃ rakkhitanti padavasena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttāni. Attho panettha purimasadisoyeva.
atk-s0401a:247: 37-38. Sattamaṭṭhamesupi eseva nayo. Upamā panettha asaṃvutagharadvārādivasena veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:248: 39-40. Navamadasamāni catūhipi padehi yojetvā vuttāni. Imasmimpi vagge vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.
atk-s0401a:253_0: 41. Pañcamassa paṭhame seyyathāpīti opammatthe nipāto. Tatra bhagavā katthaci atthena
atk-s0401a:253_1: upamaṃ parivāretvā dasseti vatthasutte viya, pāricchattakopama- aggikkhandhopamādisuttesu
atk-s0401a:253_2: viya ca, katthaci upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dasseti loṇambilasutte viya, suvaṇṇakārasuttasūriyopamādisuttesu
atk-s0401a:253_3: viya ca. Imasmiṃ pana sālisūkopame upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dassento seyyathāpi,
atk-s0401a:253_4: bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha sālisūkanti sāliphalassa sūkaṃ. Yavasūkepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0401a:253_5: Vā-saddo vikappattho. Micchāpaṇihitanti micchāṭhapitaṃ. Yathā vijjhituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0401a:253_6: na evaṃ uddhaggaṃ katvā ṭhapitanti attho. Bhecchatīti bhindissati, chaviṃ chindissatīti
atk-s0401a:253_7: attho. Micchāpaṇihitena cittenāti micchāṭhapitena cittena. Vaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṃ
atk-s0401a:253_8: sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Avijjanti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇabhūtaṃ ghanabahalaṃ mahāavijjaṃ.
atk-s0401a:253_9: Vijjaṃ uppādessatīti ettha vijjanti arahattamaggañāṇaṃ. Nibbānanti taṇhāvānato nikkhantabhāvena
atk-s0401a:253_10: evaṃ vuttaṃ amataṃ. Sacchikarissatīti paccakkhaṃ karissati.
atk-s0401a:254_0: 42. Dutiye sammāpaṇihitanti yathā bhindituṃ sakkoti, evaṃ uddhaggaṃ katvā suṭṭhu
atk-s0401a:254_1: ṭhapitaṃ. Akkantanti ettha pādeneva akkantaṃ nāma hoti, hatthena uppīḷitaṃ. Ruḷhisaddavasena
atk-s0401a:254_2: pana akkantanteva vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha ariyavohāro. Kasmā pana aññe sepaṇṇikaṇṭakamadanakaṇṭakādayo
atk-s0401a:254_3: mahante aggahetvā sukhumaṃ dubbalaṃ sālisūkayavasūkameva gahitanti? Appamattakassāpi
atk-s0401a:254_4: kusalakammassa vivaṭṭāya samatthabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Yathā hi sukhumaṃ dubbalaṃ sālisūkaṃ
atk-s0401a:254_5: vā yavasūkaṃ vā hotu, mahantamahantā sepaṇṇikaṇṭakamadanakaṇṭakādayo vā, etesu yaṃkiñci
atk-s0401a:254_6: micchā ṭhapitaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhindituṃ lohitaṃ vā uppādetuṃ na sakkoti, sammā
atk-s0401a:254_7: ṭhapitaṃ pana sakkoti, evameva appamattakaṃ tiṇamuṭṭhi mattadānakusalaṃ vā hotu,
atk-s0401a:254_8: mahantaṃ velāmadānādikusalaṃ vā, sace vaṭṭasampattiṃ patthetvā vaṭṭasannissitavasena
atk-s0401a:254_9: micchā ṭhapitaṃ hoti, vaṭṭameva āharituṃ sakkoti, no vivaṭṭaṃ. “Idaṃ me dānaṃ āsavakkhayāvahaṃ
atk-s0401a:254_10: hotū”ti evaṃ pana vivaṭṭaṃ patthentena vivaṭṭavasena sammā ṭhapitaṃ arahattampi paccekabodhiñāṇampi
atk-s0401a:258_0: 43. Tatiye paduṭṭhacittanti dosena paduṭṭhacittaṃ. Cetasā cetopariccāti attano cittena
atk-s0401a:258_1: tassa cittaṃ paricchinditvā. Yathābhataṃ nikkhittoti yathā āharitvā ṭhapito. Evaṃ
atk-s0401a:258_2: nirayeti evaṃ niraye ṭhitoyevāti vattabbo. Apāyantiādi sabbaṃ nirayavevacanameva.
atk-s0401a:258_3: Nirayo hi ayasaṅkhātā sukhā apetoti apāyo, dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggati,
atk-s0401a:258_4: dukkaṭakārino ettha vivasā nipatantīti vinipāto, nirassādatthena nirayo.
atk-s0401a:259: 44. Catutthe pasannanti saddhāpasādena pasannaṃ. Sugatinti sukhassa gatiṃ. Saggaṃ lokanti rūpādisampattīhi suṭṭhu aggaṃ lokaṃ.
atk-s0401a:260_0: 45. Pañcame udakarahadoti udakadaho. Āviloti avippasanno. Luḷitoti aparisaṇṭhito.
atk-s0401a:260_1: Kalalībhūtoti kaddamībhūto. Sippisambukantiādīsu sippiyo ca sambukā ca sippisambukaṃ.
atk-s0401a:260_2: Sakkharā ca kaṭhalāni ca sakkharakaṭhalaṃ. Macchānaṃ gumbaṃ ghaṭāti macchagumbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:260_3: Carantampi tiṭṭhantampīti ettha sakkharakaṭhalaṃ tiṭṭhatiyeva, itarāni carantipi
atk-s0401a:260_4: tiṭṭhantipi. Yathā pana antarantarā ṭhitāsupi nisinnāsupi nipajjamānāsupi “etā gāviyo
atk-s0401a:260_5: carantī”ti carantiyo upādāya itarāpi “carantī”ti vuccanti, evaṃ tiṭṭhantameva sakkharakaṭhalaṃ
atk-s0401a:260_6: upādāya itarampi dvayaṃ “tiṭṭhanta”nti vuttaṃ, itaraṃ dvayaṃ carantaṃ upādāya sakkharakaṭhalampi
atk-s0401a:261_0: Āvilenāti pañcahi nīvaraṇehi pariyonaddhena. Attatthaṃ vātiādīsu attano diṭṭhadhammiko
atk-s0401a:261_1: lokiyalokuttaramissako attho attattho nāma. Attanova samparāye lokiyalokuttaramissako
atk-s0401a:261_2: attho parattho nāma hoti. So hi parattha atthoti parattho. Tadubhayaṃ ubhayattho
atk-s0401a:261_3: nāma. Apica attano diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikopi lokiyalokuttaro attho attattho nāma,
atk-s0401a:261_4: parassa tādisova attho parattho nāma, tadubhayampi ubhayattho nāma. Uttariṃ vā manussadhammāti
atk-s0401a:261_5: dasakusalakammapathasaṅkhātā manussadhammā uttariṃ. Ayañhi dasavidho dhammo vināpi
atk-s0401a:261_6: aññaṃ samādāpakaṃ satthantarakappāvasāne jātasaṃvegehi manussehi sayameva samādinnattā
atk-s0401a:261_7: manussadhammoti vuccati, tato uttariṃ pana jhānavipassanāmaggaphalāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0401a:261_8: Alamariyañāṇadassanavisesanti ariyānaṃ yuttaṃ, ariyabhāvaṃ vā kātuṃ samatthaṃ ñāṇadassanasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0401a:261_9: visesaṃ. Ñāṇameva hi jānanaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ, dassanaṭṭhena dassananti veditabbaṃ, dibbacakkhuñāṇavipassanāñāṇamaggañāṇaphalañāṇapaccavekkhaṇañāṇānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0401a:262_0: 46. Chaṭṭhe acchoti abahalo, pasannotipi vaṭṭati. Vippasannoti suṭṭhu pasanno. Anāviloti
atk-s0401a:262_1: na āvilo, parisuddhoti attho, pheṇapubbuḷasaṅkhasevālapaṇakavirahitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0401a:262_2: Anāvilenāti pañcanīvaraṇavimuttena. Sesaṃ catutthe vuttanayameva. Imasmimpi suttadvaye
atk-s0401a:263_0: 47. Sattame rukkhajātānanti paccatte sāmivacanaṃ, rukkhajātānīti attho. Rukkhānametaṃ
atk-s0401a:263_1: adhivacanaṃ. Yadidanti nipātamattaṃ. Mudutāyāti mudubhāvena. Koci hi rukkho vaṇṇena
atk-s0401a:263_2: aggo hoti, koci gandhena, koci rasena, koci thaddhatāya. Phandano pana mudutāya ceva
atk-s0401a:263_3: kammaññatāya ca aggo seṭṭhoti dasseti. Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvitaṃ bahulīkatanti
atk-s0401a:263_4: ettha samathavipassanāvasena bhāvitañceva punappunakatañca cittaṃ adhippetaṃ. Kurundakavāsi
atk-s0401a:263_5: phussamittatthero panāha – “ekantaṃ mudu ceva kammaniyañca cittaṃ nāma abhiññāpādakacatutthajjhānacittameva, āvuso”ti.
atk-s0401a:264_0: 48. Aṭṭhame evaṃ lahuparivattanti evaṃ lahuṃ uppajjitvā lahuṃ nirujjhanakaṃ. Yāvañcāti
atk-s0401a:264_1: adhimattapamāṇatthe nipāto, ativiya na sukarāti attho. Idanti nipātamattaṃ. Cittanti
atk-s0401a:264_2: ekacce tāva ācariyā “bhavaṅgacitta”nti vadanti, taṃ pana paṭikkhipitvā “idha cittanti
atk-s0401a:264_3: yaṃkiñci antamaso cakkhuviññāṇampi adhippetamevā”ti vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ panatthe milindarājā
atk-s0401a:264_4: dhammakathikaṃ nāgasenattheraṃ pucchi, “bhante nāgasena, ekasmiṃ accharākkhaṇe pavattitacittasaṅkhārā
atk-s0401a:264_5: sace rūpino assu, kīva mahārāsi bhaveyyā”ti? “Vāhasatānaṃ kho, mahārāja, vīhīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:264_6: aḍḍhacūḷañca vāhā vīhisattambaṇāni dve ca tumbā ekaccharākkhaṇe pavattitassa cittassa
atk-s0401a:264_7: saṅkhampi na upenti, kalampi na upenti, kalabhāgampi na upentī”ti. Atha kasmā sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0401a:264_8: “upamāpi na sukarā”ti vuttaṃ? Yatheva hi upamaṃ paṭikkhipitvāpi kappadīghabhāvassa
atk-s0401a:264_10: saggasukhassa ca cakkavattisampattiyā upamā katā, evamidhāpi kātabbāti? Tattha “sakkā
atk-s0401a:264_11: pana, bhante, upamā kātu”nti evaṃ pucchāvasena upamā katā, imasmiṃ sutte pucchāya
atk-s0401a:264_12: abhāvena na katā. Idañhi suttaṃ dhammadesanāpariyosāne vuttaṃ. Iti imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0401a:265_0: 49. Navame pabhassaranti paṇḍaraṃ parisuddhaṃ. Cittanti bhavaṅgacittaṃ. Kiṃ pana
atk-s0401a:265_1: cittassa vaṇṇo nāma atthīti? Natthi. Nīlādīnañhi aññataravaṇṇaṃ vā hotu avaṇṇaṃ vā
atk-s0401a:265_2: yaṃkiñci parisuddhatāya “pabhassara”nti vuccati. Idampi nirupakkilesatāya parisuddhanti
atk-s0401a:265_3: pabhassaraṃ. Tañca khoti taṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ. Āgantukehīti asahajātehi pacchā javanakkhaṇe
atk-s0401a:265_4: uppajjanakehi. Upakkilesehīti rāgādīhi upakkiliṭṭhattā upakkiliṭṭhaṃ nāmāti vuccati.
atk-s0401a:265_5: Kathaṃ? Yathā hi sīlavantā ācārasampannā mātāpitaro vā ācariyupajjhāyā vā dussīlānaṃ
