atk-s0401a:265_7: putte vā antevāsikasaddhivihārike vā na tajjenti na sikkhāpenti na ovadanti nānusāsantī”ti
atk-s0401a:265_8: avaṇṇaṃ akittiṃ labhanti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ācārasampannā mātāpitaro viya
atk-s0401a:265_9: ca ācariyupajjhāyā viya ca bhavaṅgacittaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, puttādīnaṃ vasena tesaṃ akittilābho
atk-s0401a:265_10: viya javanakkhaṇe rajjanadussanamuyhanasabhāvānaṃ lobhasahagatādīnaṃ cittānaṃ vasena
atk-s0401a:265_11: uppannehi āgantukehi upakkilesehi pakatiparisuddhampi bhavaṅgacittaṃ upakkiliṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-s0401a:266_0: 50. Dasamepi bhavaṅgacittameva cittaṃ. Vippamuttanti javanakkhaṇe arajjamānaṃ adussamānaṃ
atk-s0401a:266_2: vippamuttaṃ nāma hoti. Idhāpi yathā sīlavantānaṃ ācārasampannānaṃ puttādīnaṃ vasena
atk-s0401a:266_3: mātādayo “sobhanā eteyeva attano puttakādayo sikkhāpenti ovadanti anusāsantī”ti vaṇṇakittilābhino
atk-s0401a:266_4: honti, evaṃ javanakkhaṇe uppannakusalacittavasena idaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ āgantukehi
atk-s0401a:271_0: 51. Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame taṃ assutavā puthujjanoti taṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ sutavirahito
atk-s0401a:271_1: puthujjano. Tattha āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo assutavā iti. Yo hi idaṃ suttaṃ ādito
atk-s0401a:271_2: paṭṭhāya atthavasena upaparikkhanto “idaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ nāma pakatiparisuddhampi
atk-s0401a:271_3: javanakkhaṇe uppannehi lobhādīhi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭha”nti neva āgamavasena na
atk-s0401a:271_5: yathābhūtañāṇapaṭivedhasādhako neva āgamo, paṭipattiyā adhigantabbassa anadhigatattā
atk-s0401a:271_6: na adhigamo atthi. So āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo assutavā iti. Svāyaṃ –
atk-s0401a:274: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Yathāha –
atk-s0401a:275_0: “Puthu kilese janentīti puthujjanā, puthu avihatasakkāyadiṭṭhikāti puthujjanā, puthu
atk-s0401a:275_1: satthārānaṃ mukhullokikāti puthujjanā, puthu sabbagatīhi avuṭṭhitāti puthujjanā,
atk-s0401a:275_2: puthu nānābhisaṅkhāre abhisaṅkharontīti puthujjanā, puthu nānāoghehi vuyhantīti puthujjanā,
atk-s0401a:275_3: puthu nānāsantāpehi santappantīti puthujjanā, puthu nānāpariḷāhehi pariḍayhantīti
atk-s0401a:275_4: puthujjanā, puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhopannā laggā
atk-s0401a:275_5: laggitā palibuddhāti puthujjanā, puthu pañcahi nīvaraṇehi āvutā nivutā ovutā pihitā
atk-s0401a:276_0: Puthūnaṃ vā gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ
atk-s0401a:276_1: antogadhattāpi puthujjano, puthu vā ayaṃ visuṃyeva saṅkhaṃ gato, visaṃsaṭṭho sīlasutādiguṇayuttehi
atk-s0401a:276_2: ariyehi janoti puthujjano. Evametehi “assutavā puthujjano”ti dvīhi padehi ye te –
atk-s0401a:279: Dve puthujjanā vuttā, tesu andhaputhujjano vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:280_0: Yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti “idañca bhavaṅgacittaṃ evaṃ āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0401a:280_1: nāma hoti, evaṃ vippamuttaṃ nāmā”ti yathāsabhāvato na jānāti. Tasmāti yasmā na jānāti,
atk-s0401a:280_2: tasmā. Cittabhāvanā natthīti cittaṭṭhiti cittapariggaho natthi, natthibhāveneva “natthī”ti vadāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:281_0: 52. Dutiye sutavāti sutasampanno. Vitthārato panettha assutavāti padassa paṭipakkhavasena
atk-s0401a:281_1: attho veditabbo. Ariyasāvakoti atthi ariyo na sāvako, seyyathāpi buddhā ceva paccekabuddhā
atk-s0401a:281_2: ca; atthi sāvako na ariyo, seyyathāpi gihī anāgataphalo; atthi neva ariyo na sāvako
atk-s0401a:281_3: seyyathāpi puthutitthiyā. Atthi ariyoceva sāvako ca, seyyathāpi samaṇā sakyaputtiyā
atk-s0401a:281_4: āgataphalā viññātasāsanā. Idha pana gihī vā hotu pabbajito vā, yo koci sutavāti ettha
atk-s0401a:281_5: vuttassa atthassa vasena sutasampanno, ayaṃ ariyasāvakoti veditabbo. Yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0401a:281_6: pajānātīti “evamidaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ āgantukehi upakkilesehi vippamuttaṃ hoti, evaṃ
atk-s0401a:281_7: upakkiliṭṭha”nti yathāsabhāvato jānāti. Cittabhāvanā atthīti cittaṭṭhiti cittapariggaho
atk-s0401a:281_8: atthi, atthibhāveneva “atthī”ti vadāmīti dasseti. Imasmiṃ sutte balavavipassanā kathitā.
atk-s0401a:282_0: 53. Tatiyaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ kathitaṃ. Katarāyaṃ pana aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ? Aggikkhandhopamasuttantaaṭṭhuppattiyaṃ.
atk-s0401a:282_1: Bhagavā kira ekasmiṃ samaye sāvatthiṃ upanissāya jetavanamahāvihāre paṭivasati. Buddhānañca
atk-s0401a:282_2: yattha katthaci paṭivasantānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ kiccaṃ avijahitameva hoti. Pañca hi buddhakiccāni
atk-s0401a:283_0: Tatridaṃ purebhattakiccaṃ – bhagavā hi pātova vuṭṭhāya upaṭṭhākānuggahatthaṃ sarīraphāsukatthañca
atk-s0401a:283_1: mukhadhovanādisarīraparikammaṃ katvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā tāva vivittāsane vītināmetvā
atk-s0401a:283_2: bhikkhācāravelāya nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya
atk-s0401a:283_3: kadāci ekakova, kadāci bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisati
atk-s0401a:283_4: kadāci pakatiyā, kadāci anekehi pāṭihāriyehi vattamānehi. Seyyathidaṃ – piṇḍāya pavisato
atk-s0401a:283_5: lokanāthassa purato purato gantvā mudugatavātā pathaviṃ sodhenti, valāhakā udakaphusitāni
atk-s0401a:283_6: muñcantā magge reṇuṃ vūpasametvā upari vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhanti, apare vātā pupphāni
atk-s0401a:283_7: upasaṃharitvā magge okiranti, unnatā bhūmippadesā onamanti, onatā unnamanti, pādanikkhepasamaye
atk-s0401a:283_8: samāva bhūmi hoti, sukhasamphassāni padumapupphāni vā pāde sampaṭicchanti. Indakhīlassa
atk-s0401a:283_9: anto ṭhapitamatte dakkhiṇapāde sarīrato chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāni
atk-s0401a:283_10: viya citrapaṭaparikkhittāni viya ca pāsādakūṭāgārādīni alaṅkarontiyo ito cito ca
atk-s0401a:283_11: dhāvanti, hatthiassavihaṅgādayo sakasakaṭṭhānesu ṭhitāyeva madhurenākārena saddaṃ
atk-s0401a:283_12: karonti, tathā bherivīṇādīni tūriyāni manussānañca kāyūpagāni ābharaṇāni. Tena saññāṇena
atk-s0401a:283_13: manussā jānanti “ajja bhagavā idha piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti. Te sunivatthā supārutā gandhapupphādīni
atk-s0401a:283_14: ādāya gharā nikkhamitvā antaravīthiṃ paṭipajjitvā bhagavantaṃ gandhapupphādīhi sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0401a:283_15: pūjetvā vanditvā “amhākaṃ, bhante, dasa bhikkhū, amhākaṃ vīsati, paññāsaṃ…pe… sataṃ
atk-s0401a:283_16: dethā”ti yācitvā bhagavatopi pattaṃ gahetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā sakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātena
atk-s0401a:283_17: paṭimānenti. Bhagavā katabhattakicco tesaṃ upanissayacittasantānāni oloketvā tathā
atk-s0401a:283_18: dhammaṃ deseti, yathā keci saraṇagamanesu patiṭṭhahanti, keci pañcasu sīlesu, keci
atk-s0401a:283_19: sotāpattisakadāgāmianāgāmiphalānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ, keci pabbajitvā aggaphale arahatteti.
atk-s0401a:283_20: Evaṃ mahājanaṃ anuggahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ gacchati. Tattha gantvā gandhamaṇḍalamāḷe
atk-s0401a:283_21: paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdati bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosānaṃ āgamayamāno. Tato
atk-s0401a:283_22: bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosāne upaṭṭhāko bhagavato nivedeti. Atha bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0401a:284_0: Atha bhagavā evaṃ katapurebhattakicco gandhakuṭiyā upaṭṭhāne nisīditvā pāde pakkhāletvā
atk-s0401a:284_1: pādapīṭhe ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ovadati – “bhikkhave, appamādena sampādetha, dullabho
atk-s0401a:284_2: buddhuppādo lokasmiṃ, dullabho manussattapaṭilābho, dullabhā khaṇasampatti, dullabhā
atk-s0401a:284_3: pabbajjā, dullabhaṃ saddhammassavana”nti. Tattha keci bhagavantaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchanti.
atk-s0401a:284_4: Bhagavā tesaṃ cariyānurūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ deti. Tato sabbepi bhagavantaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0401a:284_5: attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni gacchanti. Keci araññaṃ, keci rukkhamūlaṃ,
atk-s0401a:284_6: keci pabbatādīnaṃ aññataraṃ, keci cātumahārājikabhavanaṃ…pe… keci vasavattibhavananti.
atk-s0401a:284_7: Tato bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā sace ākaṅkhati, dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno
atk-s0401a:284_8: muhuttaṃ sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti. Atha samassāsitakāyo uṭṭhahitvā dutiyabhāge lokaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0401a:284_9: Tatiyabhāge yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati, tattha mahājano purebhattaṃ
atk-s0401a:284_10: dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ sunivattho supāruto gandhapupphādīni ādāya vihāre sannipatati.
atk-s0401a:284_11: Tato bhagavā sampattaparisāya anurūpena pāṭihāriyena gantvā dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0401a:284_12: nisajja dhammaṃ deseti kālayuttaṃ samayayuttaṃ, atha kālaṃ viditvā parisaṃ uyyojeti,
atk-s0401a:284_13: manussā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pakkamanti. Idaṃ pacchābhattakiccaṃ.
atk-s0401a:285_0: So evaṃ niṭṭhitapacchābhattakicco sace gattāni osiñcitukāmo hoti, buddhāsanā uṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:285_1: nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisitvā upaṭṭhākena paṭiyāditaudakena gattāni utuṃ gaṇhāpeti. Upaṭṭhākopi
atk-s0401a:285_2: buddhāsanaṃ ānetvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññapeti. Bhagavā surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0401a:285_3: kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ ekaṃsaṃ katvā tattha āgantvā nisīdati ekakova
atk-s0401a:285_4: muhuttaṃ paṭisallīno, atha bhikkhū tato tato āgamma bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0401a:285_5: Tattha ekacce pañhaṃ pucchanti, ekacce kammaṭṭhānaṃ, ekacce dhammassavanaṃ yācanti.
atk-s0401a:285_6: Bhagavā tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ sampādento purimayāmaṃ vitināmeti. Idaṃ purimayāmakiccaṃ.
atk-s0401a:286_0: Purimayāmakiccapariyosāne pana bhikkhūsu bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pakkantesu sakaladasasahassilokadhātudevatāyo
atk-s0401a:286_1: okāsaṃ labhamānā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti yathābhisaṅkhataṃ antamaso
atk-s0401a:286_2: caturakkharampi. Bhagavā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento majjhimayāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0401a:287_0: Pacchimayāmaṃ pana tayo koṭṭhāse katvā purebhattato paṭṭhāya nisajjāpīḷitassa sarīrassa
atk-s0401a:287_1: kilāsubhāvamocanatthaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ caṅkamena vītināmeti, dutiyakoṭṭhāse gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0401a:287_2: pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti. Tatiyakoṭṭhāse paccuṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:288_0: Tampi divasaṃ bhagavā imasmiṃyeva kicce ṭhito lokaṃ olokento idaṃ addasa – mayā kosalaraṭṭhe
atk-s0401a:288_1: cārikaṃ carantena aggikkhandhena upametvā ekasmiṃ sutte desite saṭṭhi bhikkhū arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:288_2: pāpuṇissanti, saṭṭhimattānaṃ uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ mukhato uggacchissati, saṭṭhimattā gihibhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:288_3: gamissanti. Tattha ye arahattaṃ pāpuṇissanti, te yaṃkiñci dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pāpuṇissanteva.
atk-s0401a:288_4: Itaresaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgahatthāya cārikaṃ caritukāmo hutvā, “ānanda, bhikkhūnaṃ ārocehī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:289_0: Thero anupariveṇaṃ gantvā, “āvuso, satthā mahājanassa saṅgahatthāya cārikaṃ caritukāmo,
atk-s0401a:289_1: gantukāmā āgacchathā”ti āha. Bhikkhū mahālābhaṃ labhitvā viya tuṭṭhamānasā “labhissāma
atk-s0401a:289_2: vata mahājanassa dhammaṃ desentassa bhagavato suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ oloketuṃ madhurañca
atk-s0401a:289_3: dhammakathaṃ sotu”nti paruḷhakesā kese ohāretvā malaggahitapattā patte pacitvā kiliṭṭhacīvarā
atk-s0401a:289_4: cīvarāni dhovitvā gamanasajjā ahesuṃ. Satthā aparicchinnena bhikkhusaṅghena parivuto
atk-s0401a:289_5: kosalaraṭṭhaṃ cārikāya nikkhanto gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā ekadivasaṃ gāvutaaḍḍhayojanatigāvutayojanaparamaṃ
atk-s0401a:289_6: cārikaṃ caranto ekasmiṃ padese mahantaṃ susirarukkhaṃ agginā sampajjalitaṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:289_7: “imameva vatthuṃ katvā sattahi aṅgehi paṭimaṇḍetvā dhammadesanaṃ kathessāmī”ti gamanaṃ
atk-s0401a:289_8: pacchinditvā aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nisajjākāraṃ dassesi. Ānandatthero
atk-s0401a:289_9: satthu adhippāyaṃ ñatvā “addhā kāraṇaṃ bhavissati, na akāraṇena tathāgatā gamanaṃ
atk-s0401a:289_10: pacchinditvā nisīdantī”ti catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpesi. Satthā nisīditvā bhikkhū
atk-s0401a:289_11: āmantetvā “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandha”nti aggikkhandhopamasuttantaṃ deseti.
atk-s0401a:290_0: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇe bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ mukhato
atk-s0401a:290_1: uggañchi, saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattiṃsu, saṭṭhimattānaṃ
atk-s0401a:290_2: bhikkhūnaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu. Tañhi veyyākaraṇaṃ sutvā saṭṭhimattānaṃ
atk-s0401a:290_3: bhikkhūnaṃ nāmakāyo santatto, nāmakāye santatte karajakāyo santatto, karajakāye santatte
atk-s0401a:290_4: nidhānagataṃ uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ mukhato uggañchi. Saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū “dukkaraṃ vata buddhasāsane
atk-s0401a:290_5: yāvajīvaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritu”nti sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattā,
atk-s0401a:290_6: saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū satthu desanābhimukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0401a:291_0: Tattha yesaṃ uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ mukhato uggañchi, te pārājikaṃ āpajjiṃsu. Ye gihibhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:291_1: pattā, te khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni maddantā vicariṃsu. Ye arahattaṃ pattā,
atk-s0401a:291_2: te parisuddhasīlāva ahesuṃ. Satthu dhammadesanā imesaṃ tiṇṇampi saphalāva jātāti.
atk-s0401a:291_3: Arahattaṃ pattānaṃ tāva saphalā hotu, itaresaṃ kathaṃ saphalā jātāti? Tepi hi sace
atk-s0401a:291_4: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ na suṇeyyuṃ, pamattāva hutvā ṭhānaṃ jahituṃ na sakkuṇeyyuṃ. Tato
atk-s0401a:291_5: nesaṃ taṃ pāpaṃ vaḍḍhamānaṃ apāyesuyeva saṃsīdāpeyya. Imaṃ pana desanaṃ sutvā jātasaṃvegā
atk-s0401a:291_6: ṭhānaṃ jahitvā sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā dasa sīlāni pūretvā yoniso manasikāre yuttappayuttā
atk-s0401a:291_7: keci sotāpannā keci sakadāgāmino keci anāgāmino ahesuṃ, keci devaloke nibbattiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:291_8: evaṃ pārājikāpannānampi saphalā ahosi. Itare pana sace imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ na suṇeyyuṃ,
atk-s0401a:291_9: gacchante gacchante kāle anupubbena saṅghādisesampi pārājikampi pāpuṇitvā apāyesuyeva
atk-s0401a:291_10: uppajjitvā mahādukkhaṃ anubhaveyyuṃ. Imaṃ pana desanaṃ sutvā “aho sallekhitaṃ buddhasāsanaṃ,
atk-s0401a:291_11: na sakkā amhehi yāvajīvaṃ imaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūretuṃ, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya upāsakadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:291_12: pūretvā dukkhā muccissāmā”ti gihibhāvaṃ upagamiṃsu. Te tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya pañca
atk-s0401a:291_13: sīlāni rakkhitvā upāsakadhammaṃ pūretvā keci sotāpannā keci sakadāgāmino keci anāgāmino
atk-s0401a:291_14: jātā, keci devaloke nibbattāti. Evaṃ tesampi saphalāva ahosi.
atk-s0401a:292_0: Imaṃ pana satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā devasaṅghā yehipi sutā, yehipi na sutā, sabbesaṃyeva
atk-s0401a:292_1: ārocentā vicariṃsu. Bhikkhū sutvā sutvā “dukkaraṃ, bho, buddhānaṃ sāsane yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0401a:292_2: paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritu”nti ekakkhaṇeneva dasapi bhikkhū vīsatipi
atk-s0401a:292_3: saṭṭhipi satampi sahassampi bhikkhū gihī honti. Satthā yathāruciyā cārikaṃ caritvā
atk-s0401a:292_4: puna jetavanameva āgantvā bhikkhū āmantesi – “bhikkhave, tathāgato cārikaṃ caramāno
atk-s0401a:292_5: ciraṃ ākiṇṇo vihāsi, icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave, aḍḍhamāsaṃ paṭisallīyituṃ, nāmhi kenaci
atk-s0401a:292_6: upasaṅkamitabbo aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakenā”ti. Aḍḍhamāsaṃ ekībhāvena vītināmetvā
atk-s0401a:292_7: paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito ānandattherena saddhiṃ vihāracārikaṃ caramāno olokitolokitaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:292_8: tanubhūtaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā jānantoyeva theraṃ pucchi – “ānanda, aññasmiṃ kāle
atk-s0401a:292_9: tathāgate cārikaṃ caritvā jetavanaṃ āgate sakalavihāro kāsāvapajjoto isivātappaṭivāto
atk-s0401a:292_10: hoti, idāni pana tanubhūto bhikkhusaṅgho dissati, yebhuyyena ca uppaṇḍupaṇḍukajātā
atk-s0401a:292_11: bhikkhū, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti? Etarahi bhagavā tumhākaṃ aggikkhandhopamadhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:292_12: kathitakālato paṭṭhāya bhikkhū saṃvegappattā hutvā “mayaṃ etaṃ dhammaṃ sabbappakārena
atk-s0401a:292_13: paripūretuṃ na sakkhissāma, asammāvattantānañca janassa saddhādeyyaṃ paribhuñjituṃ
atk-s0401a:293_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhagavato dhammasaṃvego uppajji. Tato theraṃ āha – “mayi paṭisallāne
atk-s0401a:293_1: vītināmente na koci mama puttānaṃ ekaṃ assāsaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. Sāgarassa hi otaraṇatitthāni
atk-s0401a:293_2: viya bahūni imasmiṃ sāsane assāsakāraṇāni. Gacchānanda, gandhakuṭipariveṇe buddhāsanaṃ
atk-s0401a:293_3: paññāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātehī”ti. Thero tathā akāsi. Satthā buddhāsanavaragato
atk-s0401a:293_4: bhikkhū āmantetvā, “bhikkhave, mettāya sabbapubbabhāgo nāma neva appanā, na upacāro,
atk-s0401a:293_5: sattānaṃ hitapharaṇamattamevā”ti vatvā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā imaṃ cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0401a:294_0: Tattha accharāsaṅghātamattanti accharāpaharaṇamattaṃ, dve aṅguliyo paharitvā saddakaraṇamattanti
atk-s0401a:294_1: attho. Mettācittanti sabbasattānaṃ hitapharaṇacittaṃ. Āsevatīti kathaṃ āsevati? Āvajjento
atk-s0401a:294_2: āsevati, jānanto āsevati, passanto āsevati, paccavekkhanto āsevati, cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahanto
atk-s0401a:294_3: āsevati, saddhāya adhimuccanto āsevati, vīriyaṃ paggaṇhanto āsevati, satiṃ upaṭṭhāpento
atk-s0401a:294_4: āsevati, cittaṃ samādahanto āsevati, paññāya pajānanto āsevati, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto
atk-s0401a:294_5: āsevati, pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto āsevati, pahātabbaṃ pajahanto āsevati, bhāvetabbaṃ
atk-s0401a:294_6: bhāvento āsevati, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaronto āsevatīti. Idha pana mettāpubbabhāgena
atk-s0401a:295_0: Arittajjhānoti atucchajjhāno apariccattajjhāno vā. Viharatīti iriyati pavattati pāleti
atk-s0401a:295_1: yapeti yāpeti carati viharati. Tena vuccati viharatīti. Iminā padena mettaṃ āsevantassa
atk-s0401a:295_2: bhikkhuno iriyāpathavihāro kathito. Satthusāsanakaroti satthu anusāsanikaro. Ovādapatikaroti
atk-s0401a:295_3: ovādakārako. Ettha ca sakiṃvacanaṃ ovādo, punappunavacanaṃ anusāsanī. Sammukhāvacanampi
atk-s0401a:295_4: ovādo, pesetvā parammukhāvacanaṃ, anusāsanī. Otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ vacanaṃ ovādo, otiṇṇe
atk-s0401a:295_5: vā anotiṇṇe vā vatthusmiṃ tantiṭhapanavasena vacanaṃ anusāsanī. Evaṃ viseso veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:295_6: Paramatthato pana ovādoti vā anusāsanīti vā ese eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte
atk-s0401a:295_7: taññevāti. Ettha ca “accharāsaṅghātamattampi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mettācittaṃ āsevatī”ti
atk-s0401a:295_8: idameva satthusāsanañceva ovādo ca, tassa karaṇato esa sāsanakaro ovādapatikaroti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:296_0: Amoghanti atucchaṃ. Raṭṭhapiṇḍanti ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya raṭṭhaṃ nissāya pabbajitena
atk-s0401a:296_1: paresaṃ gehato paṭiladdhattā piṇḍapāto raṭṭhapiṇḍo nāma vuccati. Paribhuñjatīti cattāro
atk-s0401a:296_2: paribhogā theyyaparibhogo iṇaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo sāmiparibhogoti. Tattha dussīlassa
atk-s0401a:296_3: paribhogo theyyaparibhogo nāma. Sīlavato apaccavekkhitaparibhogo iṇaparibhogo nāma.
atk-s0401a:296_4: Sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ paribhogo dāyajjaparibhogā nāma. Khīṇāsavassa paribhogo sāmiparibhogo
atk-s0401a:296_5: nāma. Tattha imassa bhikkhuno ayaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaparibhogo dvīhi kāraṇehi amogho hoti.
atk-s0401a:296_6: Accharāsaṅghātamattampi mettācittaṃ āsevanto bhikkhu raṭṭhapiṇḍassa sāmiko hutvā,
atk-s0401a:296_7: aṇaṇo hutvā, dāyādo hutvā paribhuñjatītipissa amogho raṭṭhapiṇḍaparibhogo. Accharāsaṅghātamattampi
atk-s0401a:296_8: mettaṃ āsevantassa bhikkhuno dinnadānaṃ mahaṭṭhiyaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0401a:296_9: mahājutikaṃ mahāvipphārantipissa amogho raṭṭhapiṇḍaparibhogo. Ko pana vādo ye naṃ
atk-s0401a:296_10: bahulīkarontīti ye pana imaṃ mettācittaṃ bahulaṃ āsevanti bhāventi punappunaṃ karonti,
atk-s0401a:296_11: te amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjantīti ettha vattabbameva kiṃ? Evarūpā hi bhikkhū
atk-s0401a:296_12: raṭṭhapiṇḍassa sāmino aṇaṇā dāyādā hutvā paribhuñjantīti.
atk-s0401a:297_0: 54-55. Catutthe bhāvetīti uppādeti vaḍḍheti. Pañcame manasi karotīti manasmiṃ karoti.
atk-s0401a:297_1: Sesaṃ imesu dvīsupi tatiye vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Yo hi āsevati, ayameva bhāveti,
atk-s0401a:297_2: ayaṃ manasi karoti. Yena cittena āsevati, teneva bhāveti, tena manasi karoti. Sammāsambuddho
atk-s0401a:297_3: pana yāya dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā desanāvilāsappatto nāma hoti, tassā suppaṭividdhattā
atk-s0401a:297_5: nissāya ekakkhaṇe uppannaṃ ekacittameva tīhi koṭṭhāsehi vibhajitvā dassesīti.
atk-s0401a:298_0: 56. Chaṭṭhe ye kecīti aniyāmitavacanaṃ. Akusalāti tesaṃ niyāmitavacanaṃ. Ettāvatā
atk-s0401a:298_1: sabbākusalā asesato pariyādinnā honti. Akusalabhāgiyā akusalapakkhikāti akusalānamevetaṃ
atk-s0401a:298_2: nāmaṃ. Akusalāyeva hi ekacce akusalaṃ sahajātavasena, ekacce upanissayavasena bhajanti
atk-s0401a:298_3: ceva, tesañca pakkhā bhavantīti “akusalabhāgiyā akusalapakkhikā”ti vuccanti. Sabbete
atk-s0401a:298_4: manopubbaṅgamāti mano pubbaṃ paṭhamataraṃ gacchati etesanti manopubbaṅgamā. Ete hi
atk-s0401a:298_5: kiñcāpi manena saddhiṃ ekuppādā ekavatthukā ekanirodhā ekārammaṇā ca honti. Yasmā
atk-s0401a:298_6: pana tesaṃ mano uppādako kārako janako samuṭṭhāpako nibbattako, tasmā manopubbaṅgamā nāma honti.
atk-s0401a:299_0: Paṭhamaṃ uppajjatīti yathā nāma “rājā nikkhanto”ti vutte “rājāyeva nikkhanto, sesā
atk-s0401a:299_1: rājasenā nikkhantā anikkhantā”ti pucchitabbakāraṇaṃ natthi, sabbā nikkhantāteva paññāyanti,
atk-s0401a:299_2: evameva mano uppannoti vuttakālato paṭṭhāya avasesā sahajātasaṃsaṭṭhasampayuttā uppannā
atk-s0401a:299_3: na uppannāti pucchitabbakāraṇaṃ natthi, sabbe te uppannā tveva paññāyanti. Etamatthavasaṃ
atk-s0401a:299_4: paṭicca tehi saṃsaṭṭhasampayutto ekuppādekanirodhopi samāno mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0401a:299_5: paṭhamaṃ uppajjatīti vutto. Anvadevāti anudeva, saheva ekatoyevāti attho. Byañjanacchāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:299_6: pana gahetvā paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, pacchā cetasikāti na gahetabbaṃ. Attho hi
atk-s0401a:299_7: paṭisaraṇaṃ, na byañjanaṃ. “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayā”ti gāthāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-s0401a:300: 57. Sattame kusalāti catubhūmakāpi kusalā dhammā kathitā. Sesaṃ chaṭṭhe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:301: 58. Aṭṭhame yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, pamādoti ettha, bhikkhaveti ālapanaṃ, yathā ayaṃ pamādoti attho. Pamādoti pamajjanākāro. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0401a:302_0: “Tattha katamo pamādo? Kāyaduccarite vā vacīduccarite vā manoduccarite vā pañcasu
atk-s0401a:302_1: vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa vossaggo vossaggānuppadānaṃ kusalānaṃ vā dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya
atk-s0401a:302_3: nikkhittadhuratā anadhiṭṭhānaṃ ananuyogo anāsevanā abhāvanā abahulīkammaṃ. Yo evarūpo
atk-s0401a:302_4: pamādo pamajjanā pamajjitattaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati pamādo”ti.
atk-s0401a:303: Uppannā ca kusalā dhammā parihāyantīti idaṃ jhānavipassanānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Maggaphalānaṃ pana sakiṃ uppannānaṃ puna parihānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0401a:304: 59. Navame appamādo pamādassa paṭipakkhavasena vitthārato veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:310: 61. Sattamassa paṭhame vīriyārambhoti catukiccassa sammappadhānavīriyassa ārambho, āraddhapaggahitaparipuṇṇavīriyatāti attho.
atk-s0401a:311: 62. Dutiye mahicchatāti mahālobho. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0401a:312_1: pañcahi vā kāmaguṇehi asantuṭṭhassa bhiyyokamyatā, yā evarūpā icchā icchāgatā mahicchatā
atk-s0401a:312_2: rāgo sārāgo cittassa sārāgo. Ayaṃ vuccati mahicchatā”ti.
atk-s0401a:313_0: 63. Tatiye appicchatāti alobho. Appicchassāti anicchassa. Ettha hi byañjanaṃ sāvasesaṃ
atk-s0401a:313_1: viya, attho pana niravaseso. Na hi appamattikāya icchāya atthibhāvena so appicchoti
atk-s0401a:313_2: vutto, icchāya pana abhāvena punappunaṃ āsevitassa alobhasseva bhāvena appicchoti vutto.
atk-s0401a:314_0: Apicettha atricchatā, pāpicchatā, mahicchatā appicchatāti ayaṃ bhedo veditabbo. Tattha
atk-s0401a:314_1: sakalābhe atittassa paralābhe patthanā atricchatā nāma, yāya samannāgatassa ekabhājane
atk-s0401a:314_2: pakkapūvepi attano patte patite na supakko viya khuddako ca viya khāyati, sveva pana
atk-s0401a:314_3: parassa patte pakkhitto supakko viya mahanto viya ca khāyati. Asantaguṇasambhāvanatā
atk-s0401a:314_4: pana paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā pāpicchatā nāma, sā “idhekacco assaddho samāno saddhoti
atk-s0401a:314_5: maṃ jano jānātū”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatāyeva, tāya samannāgato puggalo kohaññe
atk-s0401a:314_6: patiṭṭhāti. Santaguṇasambhāvanatā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā mahicchatā nāma,
atk-s0401a:314_7: sāpi “idhekacco saddho samāno saddhoti maṃ jano jānātūti icchati, sīlavā samāno sīlavāti
atk-s0401a:314_8: maṃ jano jānātū”ti iminā nayena āgatāyeva. Tāya samannāgato puggalo dussantappayo
atk-s0401a:314_9: hoti, vijātamātāpissa cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0401a:317_0: Santaguṇanigūhanatā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññutā appicchatā nāma, tāya samannāgato
atk-s0401a:317_1: puggalo attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ paṭicchādetukāmatāya saddho samāno “saddhoti maṃ
atk-s0401a:317_2: jano jānātū”ti na icchati. Sīlavā, pavivitto, bahussuto, āraddhavīriyo, samādhisampanno,
atk-s0401a:317_3: paññavā, khīṇāsavo samāno “khīṇāsavoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati seyyathāpi majjhantikatthero.
atk-s0401a:318_0: Thero kira mahākhīṇāsavo ahosi, pattacīvaraṃ panassa pādamattameva agghati. So asokassa
atk-s0401a:318_1: dhammarañño vihāramahadivase saṅghatthero ahosi. Athassa atilūkhabhāvaṃ disvā manussā,
atk-s0401a:318_2: “bhante, thokaṃ bahi hothā”ti āhaṃsu. Thero “mādise khīṇāsave rañño saṅgahaṃ akaronte
atk-s0401a:318_3: añño ko karissatī”ti pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā saṅghattherassa ukkhittapiṇḍaṃ gaṇhantoyeva
atk-s0401a:318_4: ummujji. Evaṃ khīṇāsavo samāno “khīṇāsavoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati. Evaṃ appiccho
atk-s0401a:318_5: ca pana bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti, uppannaṃ thāvaraṃ karoti, dāyakānaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0401a:318_6: ārādheti. Yathā yathā hi so attano appicchatāya appaṃ gaṇhāti, tathā tathā tassa
atk-s0401a:319_0: Aparopi catubbidho appiccho – paccayaappiccho, dhutaṅgaappiccho, pariyattiappiccho,
atk-s0401a:319_1: adhigamaappicchoti. Tattha catūsu paccayesu appiccho paccayaappiccho nāma. So dāyakassa
atk-s0401a:319_2: vasaṃ jānāti, deyyadhammassa vasaṃ jānāti, attano thāmaṃ jānāti. Yadi hi deyyadhammo
atk-s0401a:319_3: bahu hoti, dāyako appamattakaṃ dātukāmo, dāyakassa vasena appaṃ gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammo
atk-s0401a:319_4: appo, dāyako bahuṃ dātukāmo, deyyadhammassa vasena appaṃ gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammopi bahu,
atk-s0401a:319_5: dāyakopi bahuṃ dātukāmo, attano thāmaṃ ñatvā pamāṇeneva gaṇhāti.
atk-s0401a:320_0: Dhutaṅgasamādānassa attani atthibhāvaṃ najānāpetukāmo dhutaṅgaappiccho nāma. Tassa
atk-s0401a:320_1: vibhāvanatthaṃ imāni vatthūni – sosānikamahākumāratthero kira saṭṭhi vassāni susāne
atk-s0401a:320_2: vasi, añño ekabhikkhupi na aññāsi. Tenevāha –
atk-s0401a:322: Dutiyo maṃ na jāneyya, aho sosānikuttamo”ti.
atk-s0401a:323_0: Cetiyapabbate dve bhātikattherā vasiṃsu. Kaniṭṭho upaṭṭhākena pesitaṃ ucchukhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0401a:323_1: gahetvā jeṭṭhassa santikaṃ agamāsi “paribhogaṃ, bhante, karothā”ti. Therassa ca bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0401a:323_2: katvā mukhavikkhālanakālo ahosi. So “alaṃ, āvuso”ti āha. Kacci, bhante, ekāsanikatthāti?
atk-s0401a:323_3: Āharāvuso, ucchukhaṇḍikanti paññāsa vassāni ekāsaniko samānopi dhutaṅgaṃ nigūhamāno
atk-s0401a:323_4: paribhogaṃ katvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā puna dhutaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gato.
atk-s0401a:324_0: Yo pana sāketatissatthero viya bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati, ayaṃ pariyattiappiccho
atk-s0401a:324_1: nāma. Thero kira “khaṇo natthīti uddesaparipucchāsu okāsaṃ akaronto kadā maraṇakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:324_2: bhante, labhissathā”ti codito gaṇaṃ vissajjetvā kaṇikāravālikasamuddavihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:324_3: Tattha antovassaṃ theranavamajjhimānaṃ upakāro hutvā mahāpavāraṇāya uposathadivase
atk-s0401a:325_0: Yo pana sotāpannādīsu aññataro hutvā sotāpannādibhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati, ayaṃ
atk-s0401a:325_1: adhigamappiccho nāma tayo kulaputtā viya ghaṭīkārakumbhakāro viya ca. Imasmiṃ panatthe
atk-s0401a:325_2: laddhāsevanena balavaalobhena samannāgato sekkhopi puthujjanopi appicchoti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:326: 64. Catutthe asantuṭṭhitāti asantuṭṭhe puggale sevantassa bhajantassa payirupāsantassa uppanno asantosasaṅkhāto lobho.
atk-s0401a:327_0: 65. Pañcame santuṭṭhitāti santuṭṭhe puggale sevantassa bhajantassa payirupāsantassa
atk-s0401a:327_1: uppanno alobhasaṅkhāto santoso. Santuṭṭhassāti itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgatassa.
atk-s0401a:327_2: So panesa santoso dvādasavidho hoti. Seyyathidaṃ – cīvare yathālābhasantoso, yathābalasantoso,
atk-s0401a:328_0: Tassāyaṃ pabhedasaṃvaṇṇanā – idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā.
atk-s0401a:328_1: So teneva yāpeti aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa cīvare yathālābhasantoso.
atk-s0401a:328_2: Atha pana pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā, garuṃ cīvaraṃ pārupanto kilamati.
atk-s0401a:328_3: So sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:328_4: Ayamassa cīvare yathābalasantoso. Aparo paṇītapaccayalābhī hoti. So paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:328_5: aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā pana cīvarāni labhitvā “idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ,
atk-s0401a:328_6: idaṃ bahussutānaṃ anurūpaṃ, idaṃ gilānānaṃ, idaṃ appalābhānaṃ hotū”ti datvā tesaṃ
atk-s0401a:328_7: purāṇacīvaraṃ vā saṅkārakūṭādito vā nantakāni uccinitvā tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi
atk-s0401a:329_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ
atk-s0401a:329_1: na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathālābhasantoso. Yo pana
atk-s0401a:329_2: attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, yenassa paribhuttena
atk-s0401a:329_3: aphāsu hoti, so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0401a:329_4: samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathābalasantoso. Aparo
atk-s0401a:329_5: bahuṃ paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhati. So taṃ cīvaraṃ viya theracirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ
atk-s0401a:329_6: datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:330_0: Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā, so tena neva somanassaṃ
atk-s0401a:330_1: na domanassaṃ uppādeti, antamaso tiṇasanthārakenāpi yathāladdheneva tussati. Ayamassa
atk-s0401a:330_2: senāsane yathālābhasantoso. Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā
atk-s0401a:330_3: senāsanaṃ labhati, yatthassa vasato aphāsu hoti, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā
atk-s0401a:330_4: tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa senāsane yathābalasantoso.
atk-s0401a:331_0: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati. So tāni
atk-s0401a:331_2: vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa senāsane yathāsāruppasantoso. Yopi “uttamasenāsanaṃ
atk-s0401a:331_3: nāma pamādaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha nisinnassa thinamiddhaṃ okkamati, niddābhibhūtassa puna
atk-s0401a:331_4: paṭibujjhato pāpavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi
atk-s0401a:331_5: na sampaṭicchati, so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasantopi santuṭṭhova
atk-s0401a:332_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so yaṃ labhati, teneva
atk-s0401a:332_1: tussati, aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa gilānapaccaye yathālābhasantoso.
atk-s0401a:332_2: Yo pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa
atk-s0401a:332_3: hatthato telaṃ gahetvā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:333_0: Aparo mahāpuñño bahuṃ telamadhuphāṇitādipaṇītabhesajjaṃ labhati. So taṃ cīvaraṃ viya
atk-s0401a:333_1: theracirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatena yena kenaci yāpentopi
atk-s0401a:333_2: santuṭṭhova hoti. Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ
atk-s0401a:333_3: – “gaṇhatha, bhante, yadicchaka”nti vuccamāno “sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
atk-s0401a:333_4: atha muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇita”nti catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena
atk-s0401a:333_5: bhesajjaṃ karontopi paramasantuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa gilānapaccaye yathāsāruppasantoso.
atk-s0401a:333_6: Imesaṃ pana paccekapaccayesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ santosānaṃ yathāsāruppasantosova aggo.
atk-s0401a:334: 66-67. Chaṭṭhasattamesu ayonisomanasikārayonisomanasikārā heṭṭhā vuttalakkhaṇāva. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0401a:335: 68. Aṭṭhame asampajaññanti asampajānabhāvo, mohassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Asampajānassāti ajānantassa sammuḷhassa.
atk-s0401a:336: 69. Navame sampajaññanti sampajānabhāvo, paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sampajānassāti sampajānantassa.
atk-s0401a:337: 70. Dasame pāpamittatāti yassa pāpā lāmakā mittā, so pāpamitto. Pāpamittassa bhāvo pāpamittatā, tenākārena pavattānaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānamevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0401a:338_0: “Tattha katamā pāpamittatā? Ye te puggalā assaddhā dussīlā appassutā maccharino duppaññā.
atk-s0401a:338_1: Yā tesaṃ sevanā nisevanā saṃsevanā bhajanā sambhajanā bhatti sambhatti sampavaṅkatā.
atk-s0401a:343: 71. Aṭṭhamassa paṭhame kalyāṇamittatāti kalyāṇā mittā assāti kalyāṇamitto, tassa bhāvo kalyāṇamittatā. Sesaṃ vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:344_0: 72-73. Dutiye anuyogoti yogo payogo. Ananuyogoti ayogo appayogo. Anuyogāti anuyogena.
atk-s0401a:344_1: Ananuyogāti ananuyogena. Kusalānaṃ dhammānanti catubhūmakakusaladhammānaṃ. Tatiyaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0401a:345_0: 74. Catutthe bojjhaṅgāti bujjhanakasattassa aṅgabhūtā satta dhammā. Yāya vā dhammasāmaggiyā
atk-s0401a:345_1: so bujjhati, sammohaniddāto vā vuṭṭhāti, catusaccadhammaṃ vā sacchikaroti. Tassā
atk-s0401a:345_2: bodhiyā aṅgabhūtātipi bojjhaṅgā. “Bojjhaṅgāti kenaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā? Bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā,
atk-s0401a:345_3: anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, paṭibujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, bodhāya
atk-s0401a:345_4: saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti. Evaṃ panetaṃ padaṃ vibhattameva.
atk-s0401a:346_0: 75. Pañcame bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantīti iminā padena bojjhaṅgānaṃ yāthāvasarasabhūmi
atk-s0401a:346_1: nāma kathitā. Sā panesā catubbidhā hoti – vipassanā, vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ, maggo,
atk-s0401a:346_2: phalanti. Tattha vipassanāya uppajjanakāle bojjhaṅgā kāmāvacarā honti, vipassanāpādakajjhānamhi
atk-s0401a:346_3: uppajjanakāle rūpāvacaraarūpāvacarā, maggaphalesu uppajjanakāle lokuttarā. Iti imasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:347_0: 76. Chaṭṭhassa aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo. Aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ hetaṃ nikkhittaṃ, sambahulā
atk-s0401a:347_1: kira bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā. Tesaṃ antare bandhulamallasenāpatiṃ ārabbha
atk-s0401a:347_2: ayaṃ kathā udapādi, “āvuso, asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ pubbe bahuñātikaṃ ahosi bahupakkhaṃ,
atk-s0401a:347_3: idāni appañātikaṃ appapakkhaṃ jāta”nti. Atha bhagavā tesaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā “mayi
atk-s0401a:347_4: gate mahatī desanā bhavissatī”ti ñatvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0401a:347_5: nisīditvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti āha. Bhagavā aññā
atk-s0401a:347_6: gāmanigamādikathā natthi, asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ pubbe bahuñātikaṃ ahosi bahupakkhaṃ,
atk-s0401a:347_7: idāni appañātikaṃ appapakkhaṃ jātanti vadantā nisinnamhāti. Satthā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā
atk-s0401a:347_8: appamattikā esā, bhikkhave, parihānīti idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0401a:348_0: Tattha appamattikāti parittā parittappamāṇā. Etāya hi parihāniyā saggato vā maggato
atk-s0401a:348_1: vā parihāni nāma natthi, diṭṭhadhammikaparihānimattameva etanti āha. Etaṃ patikiṭṭhanti
atk-s0401a:348_2: etaṃ pacchimaṃ etaṃ lāmakaṃ. Yadidaṃ paññāparihānīti yā esā mama sāsane kammassakatapaññāya
atk-s0401a:348_3: jhānapaññāya vipassanāpaññāya maggapaññāya phalapaññāya ca parihāni, esā pacchimā,
atk-s0401a:349_0: 77. Sattamampi aṭṭhuppattiyameva kathitaṃ. Dhammasabhāyaṃ kira nisinnesu bhikkhūsu
atk-s0401a:349_1: ekacce evaṃ āhaṃsu – “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ pubbe appañātikaṃ appapakkhaṃ ahosi, idāni
atk-s0401a:349_2: taṃ bahuñātikaṃ bahupakkhaṃ jāta”nti. Kaṃ sandhāya evamāhaṃsūti? Visākhaṃ upāsikaṃ
atk-s0401a:349_3: vesālike ca licchavī. Satthā tesaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā purimanayeneva āgantvā dhammāsane
atk-s0401a:349_4: nisinno “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchi. Te yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0401a:349_5: kathayiṃsu. Satthā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā imaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi. Tattha appamattikāti
atk-s0401a:349_6: taṃ sampattiṃ nissāya saggaṃ vā maggaṃ vā sampattānaṃ abhāvato parittā. Yadidaṃ paññāvuddhīti
atk-s0401a:349_7: kammassakatapaññādīnaṃ vuddhi. Tasmāti yasmā ñātīnaṃ vuddhi nāma diṭṭhadhammikamattā
atk-s0401a:349_8: appā parittā, sā saggaṃ vā maggaṃ vā pāpetuṃ asamatthā, tasmā. Paññāvuddhiyāti kammassakatādipaññāya vuddhiyā.
atk-s0401a:350_0: 78. Aṭṭhamampi aṭṭhuppattiyameva kathitaṃ. Sambahulā kira bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:350_1: sannisinnā mahādhanaseṭṭhiputtaṃ ārabbha “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ pubbe mahābhogaṃ mahāhiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:350_2: ahosi, taṃ idāni appabhogaṃ jāta”nti kathayiṃsu. Satthā purimanayeneva āgantvā tesaṃ
atk-s0401a:351_0: 79. Navamampi aṭṭhuppattiyameva vuttaṃ. Dhammasabhāyaṃ kira sannisinnā bhikkhū kākavaliyaseṭṭhiñca
atk-s0401a:351_1: puṇṇaseṭṭhiñca ārabbha “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ pubbe appabhogaṃ ahosi, taṃ idāni mahābhogaṃ
atk-s0401a:351_2: jāta”nti kathayiṃsu. Satthā purimanayeneva āgantvā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā imaṃ suttaṃ
atk-s0401a:351_3: ārabhi. Sesaṃ imesu dvīsupi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:352_0: 80. Dasamampi aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Dhammasabhāyaṃ kira bhikkhū kosalamahārājānaṃ
atk-s0401a:352_1: ārabbha “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ pubbe mahāyasaṃ mahāparivāraṃ ahosi, idāni appayasaṃ appaparivāraṃ
atk-s0401a:352_2: jāta”nti kathayiṃsu. Bhagavā purimanayeneva āgantvā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:357_0: 81. Navamassāpi paṭhamaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyameva kathitaṃ. Sambahulā kira bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:357_1: nisinnā kumbhaghosakaṃ ārabbha “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ pubbe appayasaṃ appaparivāraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0401a:357_2: idāni mahāyasaṃ mahāparivāraṃ jāta”nti kathayiṃsu. Satthā purimanayeneva āgantvā
atk-s0401a:357_3: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā imaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:358: 82. Dutiyādīsu mahato anatthāyāti mahantassa anatthassa atthāya. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0401a:363_0: 98. Dasame ajjhattikanti niyakajjhattavasena ajjhattikaṃ. Aṅganti kāraṇaṃ. Iti karitvāti
atk-s0401a:363_1: evaṃ katvā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ attano santāne samuṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0401a:363_2: kāraṇanti katvā na aññaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇampi samanupassāmīti.
atk-s0401a:364: 110-114. Bāhiranti ajjhattasantānato bahi bhavaṃ. Saddhammassāti suddhammassa, sāsanassāti attho. Sammosāyāti vināsāya. Antaradhānāyāti apaññāṇatthāya.
atk-s0401a:365: 115. Ṭhitiyāti ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ. Asammosāya anantaradhānāyāti vuttapaṭipakkhanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Sesamettha catukkoṭike vuttanayameva.
atk-s0401a:366_0: 130. Ito paresu adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpentītiādīsu suttantapariyāyena tāva dasa kusalakammapathā
atk-s0401a:366_1: dhammo, dasa akusalakammapathā adhammo. Tathā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā
atk-s0401a:366_2: cattāro iddhipādā pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti
atk-s0401a:366_3: sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā dhammo nāma; tayo satipaṭṭhānā tayo sammappadhānā
atk-s0401a:366_4: tayo iddhipādā cha indriyāni cha balāni aṭṭha bojjhaṅgā navaṅgiko maggoti ca cattāro
atk-s0401a:366_5: upādānā pañca nīvaraṇāni satta anusayā aṭṭha micchattāni ca ayaṃ adhammo.
atk-s0401a:367_0: Tattha yaṃkiñci ekaṃ adhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā “imaṃ adhammaṃ dhammoti karissāma,
atk-s0401a:367_1: evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyakulaṃ niyyānikaṃ bhavissati, mayaṃ ca loke pākaṭā bhavissāmā”ti
atk-s0401a:367_2: taṃ adhammaṃ “dhammo aya”nti kathayantā adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpenti nāma. Tatheva dhammakoṭṭhāsesu
atk-s0401a:367_3: ekaṃ gahetvā “ayaṃ adhammo”ti kathentā dhammaṃ adhammoti dīpenti nāma. Vinayapariyāyena
atk-s0401a:367_4: pana bhūtena vatthunā codetvā sāretvā yathāpaṭiññāya kattabbaṃ kammaṃ dhammo nāma,
atk-s0401a:367_5: abhūtena vatthunā acodetvā asāretvā apaṭiññāya kattabbaṃ kammaṃ adhammo nāma.
atk-s0401a:368_0: Suttantapariyāyena rāgavinayo dosavinayo mohavinayo saṃvaro pahānaṃ paṭisaṅkhāti
atk-s0401a:368_1: ayaṃ vinayo nāma, rāgādīnaṃ avinayo asaṃvaro appahānaṃ apaṭisaṅkhāti ayaṃ avinayo
atk-s0401a:368_2: nāma. Vinayapariyāyena vatthusampatti, ñattisampatti, anussāvanasampatti, sīmāsampatti,
atk-s0401a:368_3: parisasampattīti ayaṃ vinayo nāma. Vatthuvipatti, ñattivipatti, anussāvanavipatti,
atk-s0401a:369_0: Suttantapariyāyena cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā…pe… ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
atk-s0401a:369_1: maggoti idaṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena; tayo satipaṭṭhānā tayo sammappadhānā tayo
atk-s0401a:369_2: iddhipādā cha indriyāni cha balāni aṭṭha bojjhaṅgā navaṅgiko maggoti idaṃ abhāsitaṃ
atk-s0401a:369_3: alapitaṃ tathāgatena. Vinayapariyāyena cattāro pārājikā terasa saṅghādisesā dve aniyatā
atk-s0401a:369_4: tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyāti idaṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena; tayo pārājikā cuddasa
atk-s0401a:369_5: saṅghādisesā tayo aniyatā ekatiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyāti idaṃ abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena.
atk-s0401a:370_1: buddhacakkhunā lokavolokanaṃ aṭṭhuppattivasena suttantadesanā jātakakathāti idaṃ
atk-s0401a:370_2: āciṇṇaṃ, na devasikaṃ phalasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ…pe… na jātakakathāti idaṃ anāciṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:370_3: Vinayapariyāyena nimantitassa vassāvāsaṃ vasitvā apaloketvā cārikāpakkamanaṃ pavāretvā
atk-s0401a:370_4: cārikāpakkamanaṃ, āgantukehi saddhiṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭisanthārakaraṇanti idaṃ āciṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:371_0: Suttantapariyāyena cattāro satipaṭṭhānā…pe… aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti idaṃ paññattaṃ nāma;
atk-s0401a:371_1: tayo satipaṭṭhānā…pe… navaṅgiko maggoti idaṃ apaññattaṃ nāma. Vinayapariyāyena cattāro
atk-s0401a:371_2: pārājikā…pe… tiṃsanissaggiyā pācittiyāti idaṃ paññattaṃ nāma; tayo pārājikā…pe… ekatiṃsa
atk-s0401a:372_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ sabbasuttānaṃ pariyosāne tecimaṃ saddhammaṃ antaradhāpentīti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0401a:372_1: tattha pañca antaradhānāni nāma adhigamaantaradhānaṃ, paṭipattiantaradhānaṃ, pariyattiantaradhānaṃ,
atk-s0401a:372_2: liṅgaantaradhānaṃ, dhātuantaradhānanti. Tattha adhigamoti cattāro maggā, cattāri
atk-s0401a:372_3: phalāni, catasso paṭisambhidā, tisso vijjā, cha abhiññāti. So parihāyamāno paṭisambhidāto
atk-s0401a:372_4: paṭṭhāya parihāyati. Buddhānaṃ hi parinibbānato vassasahassameva paṭisambhidā nibbattetuṃ
atk-s0401a:372_5: sakkonti, tato paraṃ cha abhiññā, tato tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā nibbattenti.
atk-s0401a:372_6: Gacchante gacchante kāle tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sukkhavipassakā honti. Eteneva
atk-s0401a:372_7: upāyena anāgāmino sakadāgāmino sotāpannāti. Tesu dharantesu adhigamo anantarahito
atk-s0401a:372_8: nāma na hoti. Pacchimakassa pana sotāpannassa jīvitakkhayena adhigamo antarahito
atk-s0401a:373_0: Paṭipattiantaradhānaṃ nāma jhānavipassanāmaggaphalāni nibbattetuṃ asakkontā catupārisuddhisīlamattaṃ
atk-s0401a:373_1: rakkhanti. Gacchante gacchante kāle “sīlaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā rakkhāma, padhānañca
atk-s0401a:373_2: anuyuñjāma, na ca maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā sacchikātuṃ sakkoma, natthi idāni ariyadhammapaṭivedho”ti
atk-s0401a:373_3: vosānaṃ āpajjitvā kosajjabahulā aññamaññaṃ na codenti na sārenti akukkuccakā honti,
atk-s0401a:373_4: tato paṭṭhāya khuddānukhuddakāni maddanti. Gacchante gacchante kāle pācittiyathullaccayāni
atk-s0401a:373_5: āpajjanti, tato garukāpattiṃ. Pārājikamattameva tiṭṭhati. Cattāri pārājikāni rakkhantānaṃ
atk-s0401a:373_6: bhikkhūnaṃ satepi sahassepi dharamāne paṭipatti anantarahitā nāma na hoti. Pacchimakassa
atk-s0401a:373_7: pana bhikkhuno sīlabhedena vā jīvitakkhayena vā antarahitā hotīti idaṃ paṭipattiantaradhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0401a:374_0: Pariyattīti tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sāṭṭhakathā pāḷi. Yāva sā tiṭṭhati, tāva pariyatti
atk-s0401a:374_1: paripuṇṇā nāma hoti. Gacchante gacchante kāle rājayuvarājāno adhammikā honti, tesu
atk-s0401a:374_2: adhammikesu rājāmaccādayo adhammikā honti, tato raṭṭhajanapadavāsinoti. Etesaṃ adhammikatāya
atk-s0401a:374_3: devo na sammā vassati, tato sassāni na sampajjanti. Tesu asampajjantesu paccayadāyakā
atk-s0401a:374_4: bhikkhusaṅghassa paccaye dātuṃ na sakkonti, bhikkhū paccayehi kilamantā antevāsike
atk-s0401a:374_5: saṅgahetuṃ na sakkonti. Gacchante gacchante kāle pariyatti parihāyati, atthavasena
atk-s0401a:374_6: dhāretuṃ na sakkonti, pāḷivaseneva dhārenti. Tato gacchante gacchante kāle pāḷimpi
atk-s0401a:374_7: sakalaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkonti, paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ parihāyati. Parihāyamānaṃ
atk-s0401a:374_8: matthakato paṭṭhāya parihāyati. Paṭhamameva hi paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇaṃ parihāyati,
atk-s0401a:374_9: tasmiṃ parihīne yamakaṃ, kathāvatthu, puggalapaññatti, dhātukathā, vibhaṅgo, dhammasaṅgahoti.
atk-s0401a:375_0: Evaṃ abhidhammapiṭake parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya suttantapiṭakaṃ parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi
atk-s0401a:375_1: aṅguttaranikāyo parihāyati, tasmimpi paṭhamaṃ ekādasakanipāto, tato dasakanipāto…pe…
atk-s0401a:375_2: tato ekakanipātoti. Evaṃ aṅguttare parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya saṃyuttanikāyo parihāyati.
atk-s0401a:375_3: Paṭhamaṃ hi mahāvaggo parihāyati, tato saḷāyatanavaggo, khandhavaggo, nidānavaggo,
atk-s0401a:375_4: sagāthāvaggoti. Evaṃ saṃyuttanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya majjhimanikāyo parihāyati.
atk-s0401a:375_5: Paṭhamaṃ hi uparipaṇṇāsako parihāyati, tato majjhimapaṇṇāsako, tato mūlapaṇṇāsakoti.
atk-s0401a:375_6: Evaṃ majjhimanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya dīghanikāyo parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi
atk-s0401a:375_7: pāthikavaggo parihāyati, tato mahāvaggo, tato sīlakkhandhavaggoti. Evaṃ dīghanikāye
atk-s0401a:375_8: parihīne suttantapiṭakaṃ parihīnaṃ nāma hoti. Vinayapiṭakena saddhiṃ jātakameva dhārenti.
atk-s0401a:375_9: Vinayapiṭakaṃ lajjinova dhārenti, lābhakāmā pana “suttante kathitepi sallakkhentā
atk-s0401a:375_10: natthī”ti jātakameva dhārenti. Gacchante gacchante kāle jātakampi dhāretuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0401a:375_11: Atha tesaṃ paṭhamaṃ vessantarajātakaṃ parihāyati, tato paṭilomakkamena puṇṇakajātakaṃ,
atk-s0401a:375_12: mahānāradajātakanti pariyosāne apaṇṇakajātakaṃ parihāyati. Evaṃ jātake parihīne vinayapiṭakameva dhārenti.
atk-s0401a:376_0: Gacchante gacchante kāle vinayapiṭakampi matthakato paṭṭhāya parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi
atk-s0401a:376_1: parivāro parihāyati, tato khandhako, bhikkhunīvibhaṅgo, mahāvibhaṅgoti anukkamena
atk-s0401a:376_2: uposathakkhandhakamattameva dhārenti. Tadāpi pariyatti antarahitā na hoti. Yāva pana
atk-s0401a:376_3: manussesu cātuppadikagāthāpi pavattati, tāva pariyatti anantarahitāva hoti. Yadā
atk-s0401a:376_4: saddho pasanno rājā hatthikkhandhe suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakamhi sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapāpetvā
atk-s0401a:376_5: “buddhehi kathitaṃ cātuppadikagāthaṃ jānanto imaṃ sahassaṃ gaṇhatū”ti nagare bheriṃ
atk-s0401a:376_6: carāpetvā gaṇhanakaṃ alabhitvā “ekavāraṃ carāpite nāma suṇantāpi honti assuṇantāpī”ti
atk-s0401a:376_7: yāvatatiyaṃ carāpetvā gaṇhanakaṃ alabhitvā rājapurisā taṃ sahassatthavikaṃ puna rājakulaṃ
atk-s0401a:376_8: pavesenti, tadā pariyatti antarahitā nāma hoti. Idaṃ pariyattiantaradhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0401a:377_0: Gacchante gacchante kāle cīvaraggahaṇaṃ pattaggahaṇaṃ sammiñjanapasāraṇaṃ ālokitavilokitaṃ
atk-s0401a:377_1: na pāsādikaṃ hoti. Nigaṇṭhasamaṇā viya alābupattaṃ bhikkhū pattaṃ aggabāhāya pakkhipitvā
atk-s0401a:377_2: ādāya vicaranti, ettāvatāpi liṅgaṃ anantarahitameva hoti. Gacchante gacchante pana
atk-s0401a:377_3: kāle aggabāhato otāretvā hatthena vā sikkāya vā olambitvā vicaranti, cīvarampi rajanasāruppaṃ
atk-s0401a:377_4: akatvā oṭṭhaṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ katvā vicaranti. Gacchante gacchante kāle rajanampi na hoti
atk-s0401a:377_5: dasacchindanampi ovaṭṭikavijjhanampi, kappamattaṃ katvā vaḷañjenti. Puna ovaṭṭikaṃ
atk-s0401a:377_6: vijjhitvā kappaṃ na karonti. Tato ubhayampi akatvā dasā chetvā paribbājakā viya caranti.
atk-s0401a:377_7: Gacchante gacchante kāle “ko iminā amhākaṃ attho”ti khuddakaṃ kāsāvakhaṇḍaṃ hatthe
atk-s0401a:377_8: vā gīvāya vā bandhanti, kesesu vā allīyāpenti, dārabharaṇaṃ vā karontā kasitvā vapitvā
atk-s0401a:377_9: jīvikaṃ kappetvā vicaranti. Tadā dakkhiṇaṃ dentā saṅghaṃ uddissa etesaṃ denti. Idaṃ
atk-s0401a:377_10: sandhāya bhagavatā vuttaṃ – “bhavissanti kho, panānanda, anāgatamaddhānaṃ gotrabhuno
atk-s0401a:377_11: kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā, tesu dussīlesu saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dassanti, tadāpāhaṃ,
atk-s0401a:377_12: ānanda, saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ appameyyaṃ vadāmī”ti. Tato gacchante kāle
atk-s0401a:377_13: nānāvidhāni kammāni karontā “papañco esa, kiṃ iminā amhāka”nti kāsāvakhaṇḍaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0401a:377_14: araññe khipanti. Etasmiṃ kāle liṅgaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti. Kassapadasabalassa kira
atk-s0401a:377_15: kālato paṭṭhāya yonakānaṃ setavatthaṃ pārupitvā caraṇaṃ cārittaṃ jātanti. Idaṃ liṅgaantaradhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0401a:378_0: Dhātuantaradhānaṃ pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ – tīṇi parinibbānāni, kilesaparinibbānaṃ –
atk-s0401a:378_2: ahosi, khandhaparinibbānaṃ kusinārāyaṃ, dhātuparinibbānaṃ anāgate bhavissati. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0401a:378_3: Tato tattha tattha sakkārasammānaṃ alabhamānā dhātuyo buddhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabalena
atk-s0401a:378_4: sakkārasammānalabhanakaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti. Gacchante gacchante kāle sabbaṭṭhānesu
atk-s0401a:378_5: sakkārasammāno na hoti. Sāsanassa hi osakkanakāle imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe sabbā dhātuyo
atk-s0401a:378_6: sannipatitvā mahācetiyaṃ, tato nāgadīpe rājāyatanacetiyaṃ, tato bodhipallaṅkaṃ gamissanti.
atk-s0401a:378_7: Nāgabhavanatopi devalokatopi brahmalokatopi dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti.
atk-s0401a:378_8: Sāsapamattāpi dhātu antarā na nassissati. Sabbā dhātuyo mahābodhimaṇḍe sannipatitvā
atk-s0401a:378_9: buddharūpaṃ gahetvā bodhimaṇḍe pallaṅkena nisinnabuddhasarīrasiriṃ dassenti. Dvattiṃsa
atk-s0401a:378_10: mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni asīti anubyañjanāni byāmappabhāti sabbaṃ paripuṇṇameva hoti.
atk-s0401a:378_11: Tato yamakapāṭihāriyadivase viya pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā dassenti. Tadā manussabhūtasatto
atk-s0401a:378_12: nāma tattha gato natthi, dasasahassacakkavāḷe pana devatā sabbāva sannipatitvā “ajja
atk-s0401a:378_13: dasabalo parinibbāyati, itodāni paṭṭhāya andhakāraṃ bhavissatī”ti paridevanti. Atha
atk-s0401a:378_14: dhātusarīrato tejo samuṭṭhāya taṃ sarīraṃ apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gameti. Dhātusarīrato
atk-s0401a:378_15: samuṭṭhitā jālā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati, sāsapamattāya sesāyapi dhātuyā sati
atk-s0401a:378_16: ekajālāva bhavissati. Dhātūsu pariyādānaṃ gatāsu pacchijjissati. Evaṃ mahantaṃ ānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:378_17: dassetvā dhātuyo antaradhāyanti. Tadā sannipatitā devasaṅghā buddhānaṃ parinibbutadivase
atk-s0401a:378_18: viya dibbagandhamālātūriyādīhi sakkāraṃ katvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vanditvā
atk-s0401a:378_19: “anāgate uppajjanakaṃ buddhaṃ passituṃ labhissāma bhagavā”ti vatvā sakasakaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0401a:379_0: Imassa pañcavidhassa antaradhānassa pariyattiantaradhānameva mūlaṃ. Pariyattiyā hi
atk-s0401a:379_1: antarahitāya paṭipatti antaradhāyati, pariyattiyā ṭhitāya paṭipatti patiṭṭhāti. Teneva
atk-s0401a:379_2: imasmiṃ dīpe caṇḍālatissamahābhaye sakko devarājā mahāuḷumpaṃ māpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:379_3: ārocāpesi “mahantaṃ bhayaṃ bhavissati, na sammā devo vassissati, bhikkhū paccayehi
atk-s0401a:379_4: kilamantā pariyattiṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkhissanti, paratīraṃ gantvā ayyehi jīvitaṃ
atk-s0401a:379_5: rakkhituṃ vaṭṭati. Imaṃ mahāuḷumpaṃ āruyha gacchatha, bhante. Yesaṃ ettha nisajjaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:379_6: nappahoti, te kaṭṭhakhaṇḍepi uraṃ ṭhapetvā gacchantu, sabbesampi bhayaṃ na bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:379_7: Tadā samuddatīraṃ patvā saṭṭhi bhikkhū katikaṃ katvā “amhākaṃ ettha gamanakiccaṃ
atk-s0401a:379_8: natthi, mayaṃ idheva hutvā tepiṭakaṃ rakkhissāmā”ti tato nivattitvā dakkhiṇamalayajanapadaṃ
atk-s0401a:379_9: gantvā kandamūlapaṇṇehi jīvikaṃ kappentā vasiṃsu. Kāye vahante nisīditvā sajjhāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:379_10: karonti, avahante vālikaṃ ussāretvā parivāretvā sīsāni ekaṭṭhāne katvā pariyattiṃ
atk-s0401a:379_11: sammasanti. Iminā niyāmena dvādasa saṃvaccharāni sāṭṭhakathaṃ tepiṭakaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dhārayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:380_0: Bhaye vūpasante sattasatā bhikkhū attano gataṭṭhāne sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake ekakkharampi
atk-s0401a:380_1: ekabyañjanampi anāsetvā imameva dīpamāgamma kallagāmajanapade maṇḍalārāmavihāraṃ
atk-s0401a:380_2: pavisiṃsu. Therānaṃ āgamanappavattiṃ sutvā imasmiṃ dīpe ohīnā saṭṭhi bhikkhū “there
atk-s0401a:380_3: passissāmā”ti gantvā therehi saddhiṃ tepiṭakaṃ sodhentā ekakkharampi ekabyañjanampi
atk-s0401a:380_4: asamentaṃ nāma na passiṃsu. Tasmiṃ ṭhāne therānaṃ ayaṃ kathā udapādi “pariyatti nu
atk-s0401a:380_5: kho sāsanassa mūlaṃ, udāhu paṭipattī”ti. Paṃsukūlikattherā “paṭipattimūla”nti āhaṃsu,
atk-s0401a:380_6: dhammakathikā “pariyattī”ti. Atha ne therā “tumhākaṃ dvinnampi janānaṃ vacanamatteneva
atk-s0401a:380_7: na karoma, jinabhāsitaṃ suttaṃ āharathā”ti āhaṃsu. Suttaṃ āharituṃ na bhāroti “ime
atk-s0401a:380_8: ca, subhadda, bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṃ, asuñño loko arahantehi assāti. Paṭipattimūlakaṃ,
atk-s0401a:380_9: mahārāja, satthusāsanaṃ paṭipattisārakaṃ. Paṭipattiyā dharantāya tiṭṭhatī”ti suttaṃ
atk-s0401a:380_10: āhariṃsu. Imaṃ suttaṃ sutvā dhammakathikā attano vādaṭhapanatthāya imaṃ suttaṃ āhariṃsu –
atk-s0401a:382: Tāva dakkhanti ālokaṃ, sūriye abbhuṭṭhite yathā.
atk-s0401a:384: Tamo bhavissati loke, sūriye atthaṅgate yathā.
atk-s0401a:386: Paṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito dhīro, yogakkhemā na dhaṃsatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:387_0: Imasmiṃ sutte āhaṭe paṃsukūlikattherā tuṇhī ahesuṃ, dhammakathikattherānaṃyeva vacanaṃ
atk-s0401a:387_1: purato ahosi. Yathā hi gavasatassa vā gavasahassassa vā antare paveṇipālikāya dhenuyā
atk-s0401a:387_2: asati so vaṃso sā paveṇi na ghaṭīyati, evamevaṃ āraddhavipassakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satepi
atk-s0401a:387_3: sahassepi saṃvijjamāne pariyattiyā asati ariyamaggapaṭivedho nāma na hoti. Yathā
atk-s0401a:387_4: ca nidhikumbhiyā jānanatthāya pāsāṇapiṭṭhe akkharesu ṭhapitesu yāva akkharāni dharanti,
atk-s0401a:387_5: tāva nidhikumbhi naṭṭhā nāma na hoti. Evamevaṃ pariyattiyā dharamānāya sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma na hotīti.
atk-s0401a:392: 140. Ekādasame vagge adhammaṃ adhammotiādīni vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0401a:397_0: 150. Dvādasame pana anāpattiṃ āpattītiādīsu “anāpatti ajānantassa atheyyacittassa
atk-s0401a:397_1: namaraṇādhippāyassa anullapanādhippāyassa namocanādhippāyassā”ti tattha tattha vuttā
atk-s0401a:397_2: anāpatti anāpatti nāma, “jānantassa theyyacittassā”tiādinā nayena vuttā āpatti āpatti
atk-s0401a:397_3: nāma, pañcāpattikkhandhā lahukāpatti nāma, dve āpattikkhandhā garukāpatti nāma. Dve
atk-s0401a:397_4: āpattikkhandhā duṭṭhullāpatti nāma, pañcāpattikkhandhā aduṭṭhullāpatti nāma. Cha
atk-s0401a:397_5: āpattikkhandhā sāvasesāpatti nāma, eko pārājikāpattikkhandho anavasesāpatti nāma.
atk-s0401a:397_6: Sappaṭikammāpatti nāma sāvasesāpattiyeva, appaṭikammāpatti nāma anavasesāpattiyeva.
atk-s0401a:402_0: 170. Ekapuggalavaggassa paṭhame ekapuggaloti eko puggalo. Ettha ekoti dutiyādipaṭikkhepattho
atk-s0401a:402_1: gaṇanaparicchedo. Puggaloti sammutikathā, na paramatthakathā. Buddhassa hi bhagavato
atk-s0401a:402_2: duvidhā desanā – sammutidesanā, paramatthadesanā cāti. Tattha “puggalo satto itthī
atk-s0401a:402_3: puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti evarūpā sammutidesanā, “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā
atk-s0401a:402_4: khandhā dhātū āyatanāni satipaṭṭhānā”ti evarūpā paramatthadesanā. Tattha bhagavā
atk-s0401a:402_5: ye sammutivasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesaṃ adhigantuṃ
atk-s0401a:402_6: samatthā, tesaṃ sammutidesanaṃ deseti. Ye pana paramatthavasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ
atk-s0401a:402_7: paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesamadhigantuṃ samatthā, tesaṃ paramatthadesanaṃ deseti.
atk-s0401a:403_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – yathā hi desabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇanako ācariyo
atk-s0401a:403_1: ye damiḷabhāsāya vutte atthaṃ jānanti, tesaṃ damiḷabhāsāya ācikkhati. Ye andhabhāsādīsu
atk-s0401a:403_2: aññatarāya bhāsāya, tesaṃ tāya tāya bhāsāya. Evaṃ te māṇavakā chekaṃ byattaṃ ācariyamāgamma
atk-s0401a:403_3: khippameva sippaṃ uggaṇhanti. Tattha ācariyo viya buddho bhagavā, tayo vedā viya
atk-s0401a:403_4: kathetabbabhāve ṭhitāni tīṇi piṭakāni, desabhāsākosallamiva sammutiparamatthakosallaṃ,
atk-s0401a:403_5: nānādesabhāsā māṇavakā viya sammutiparamatthavasena paṭivijjhanasamatthā veneyyasattā,
atk-s0401a:403_6: ācariyassa damiḷabhāsādiācikkhanaṃ viya bhagavato sammutiparamatthavasena desanā
atk-s0401a:410_0: Apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti – hirottappadīpanatthaṃ, kammassakatādīpanatthaṃ,
atk-s0401a:410_3: hiriyanti ottappantī”ti hi vutte mahājano na jānāti, sammohamāpajjati, paṭisattu
atk-s0401a:410_4: hoti “kimidaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanāni hiriyanti ottappanti nāmā”ti? “Itthī hiriyati
atk-s0401a:410_5: ottappati, puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti vutte pana jānāti, na sammohamāpajjati,
atk-s0401a:410_6: na paṭisattu hoti. Tasmā bhagavā hirottappadīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0401a:411: “Khandhā kammassakā, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā kammassakatādīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0401a:412: “Veḷuvanādayo mahāvihārā khandhehi kārāpitā, dhātūhi āyatanehī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā paccattapurisakāradīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0401a:413_0: “Khandhā mātaraṃ jīvitā voropenti, pitaraṃ, arahantaṃ, ruhiruppādakammaṃ, saṅghabhedakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:413_1: karonti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā ānantariyadīpanatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:414: “Khandhā mettāyanti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā brahmavihāradīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0401a:415: “Khandhā pubbenivāsamanussaranti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā pubbenivāsadīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0401a:416_0: “Khandhā dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi mahājano na jānāti, sammohaṃ
atk-s0401a:416_1: āpajjati, paṭisattu hoti “kimidaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanāni paṭiggaṇhanti nāmā”ti? “Puggalā
atk-s0401a:416_2: paṭiggaṇhanti sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammo”ti vutte pana jānāti, na sammohaṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0401a:416_3: na paṭisattu hoti. Tasmā bhagavā dakkhiṇāvisuddhidīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0401a:417: Lokasammutiñca buddhā bhagavanto nappajahanti, lokasamaññāya lokaniruttiyā lokābhilāpe ṭhitāyeva dhammaṃ desenti. Tasmā bhagavā lokasammutiyā appahānatthampi puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0401a:418_0: Iti eko ca so puggalo cāti ekapuggalo. Kenaṭṭhena ekapuggalo? Asadisaṭṭhena guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhena
atk-s0401a:418_1: asamasamaṭṭhenāti. So hi dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ paṭipāṭiyā āvajjanaṃ ādiṃ katvā bodhisambhāraguṇehi
atk-s0401a:418_2: ceva buddhaguṇehi ca sesamahājanena asadisoti asadisaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo. Ye cassa
atk-s0401a:418_3: te guṇā, te sesasattānaṃ guṇehi visiṭṭhāti guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo. Purimakā
atk-s0401a:418_4: sammāsambuddhā sabbasattehi asamā, tehi saddhiṃ ayameva eko rūpakāyaguṇehi ceva nāmakāyaguṇehi
atk-s0401a:419_0: Loketi tayo lokā – sattaloko, okāsaloko, saṅkhāralokoti. Tesaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge
atk-s0401a:419_1: vuttā. Tesu idha sattaloko adhippeto. Sattaloke uppajjamānopi cesa na devaloke, na
atk-s0401a:419_2: brahmaloke, manussalokeyeva uppajjati. Manussalokepi na aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe, imasmiṃyeva
atk-s0401a:420_0: “Puratthimāya disāya gajaṅgalaṃ nāma nigamo, tassa parena mahāsālā, tato parā paccantimā
atk-s0401a:420_1: janapadā, orato majjhe. Puratthimadakkhiṇāya disāya sallavatī nāma nadī, tato parā
atk-s0401a:420_2: paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. Dakkhiṇāya disāya setakaṇṇikaṃ nāma nigamo, tato
atk-s0401a:420_3: parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. Pacchimāya disāya thūṇaṃ nāma brāhmaṇagāmo,
atk-s0401a:420_4: tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. Uttarāya disāya usīraddhajo nāma pabbato,
atk-s0401a:420_5: tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe”ti evaṃ paricchinne āyāmato tiyojanasate
atk-s0401a:420_6: vitthārato aḍḍhateyyayojanasate parikkhepato navayojanasate majjhimadese uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:420_7: Na kevalañca tathāgatova, paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā asīti mahātherā buddhamātā buddhapitā
atk-s0401a:420_8: cakkavattī rājā aññe ca sārappattā brāhmaṇagahapatikā ettheva uppajjanti.
atk-s0401a:421_0: Uppajjamāno uppajjatīti idaṃ pana ubhayampi vippakatavacanameva. Uppajjamāno bahujanahitāya
atk-s0401a:421_1: uppajjati, na aññena kāraṇenāti evaṃ panettha attho veditabbo. Evarūpañcettha lakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:421_2: na sakkā etaṃ aññena saddalakkhaṇena paṭibāhituṃ.
atk-s0401a:422_0: Apica uppajjamāno nāma, uppajjati nāma, uppanno nāmāti ayamettha bhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:422_1: Esa hi dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya laddhabyākaraṇo buddhakārake dhamme pariyesanto
atk-s0401a:422_2: dasa pāramiyo disvā “ime dhammā mayā pūretabbā”ti katasanniṭṭhāno dānapāramiṃ pūrentopi
atk-s0401a:422_3: uppajjamāno nāma. Sīlapāramī…pe… upekkhāpāramīti imā dasa pāramiyo pūrentopi, dasa
atk-s0401a:422_4: upapāramiyo pūrentopi uppajjamāno nāma. Dasa paramatthapāramiyo pūrentopi uppajjamānova
atk-s0401a:422_5: nāma. Pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Attatthacariyaṃ ñātatthacariyaṃ
atk-s0401a:422_6: lokatthacariyaṃ pūrayamānopi uppajjamāno nāma. Kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0401a:422_7: buddhakārake dhamme matthakaṃ pāpentopi uppajjamāno nāma. Vessantarattabhāvaṃ pahāya
atk-s0401a:422_9: tiṭṭhantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Devatāhi yācito pañcamahāvilokitaṃ viloketvā mahāmāyādeviyā
atk-s0401a:422_10: kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantopi, anūnādhike dasa māse gabbhavāsaṃ vasantopi uppajjamāno
atk-s0401a:422_11: nāma. Ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe tiṭṭhantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Kāmesu ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0401a:422_12: nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā rāhulabhaddassa jātadivase channasahāyo kaṇḍakaṃ vāhanavaraṃ
atk-s0401a:422_13: āruyha nikkhamantopi uppajjamānova nāma. Tīṇi rajjāni atikkamantopi anomānadītīre
atk-s0401a:422_14: pabbajantopi uppajjamāno nāma. Chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṃ karontopi uppajjamāno nāma.
atk-s0401a:422_15: Paripakkagate ñāṇe oḷārikāhāraṃ āharantopi uppajjamānova nāma. Sāyanhasamaye visākhapuṇṇamāya
atk-s0401a:422_16: mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha mārabalaṃ vidhametvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā
atk-s0401a:422_17: majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ parisodhetvā pacchimayāmasamanantare dvādasaṅgaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-s0401a:422_18: anulomapaṭilomato sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhantopi uppajjamānova nāma.
atk-s0401a:422_20: anāgāmiphalakkhaṇepi uppajjamānova nāma. Arahattamaggakkhaṇe pana uppajjati nāma.
atk-s0401a:422_21: Arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppanno nāma. Buddhānaṃ hi sāvakānaṃ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīni
atk-s0401a:422_22: uppajjanti, saheva pana arahattamaggena sakalopi sabbaññutaññāṇādi guṇarāsi āgatova
atk-s0401a:422_23: nāma hoti. Tasmā te nipphattasabbakiccattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppannā nāma honti.
atk-s0401a:422_24: Imasmimpi sutte arahattaphalakkhaṇaṃyeva sandhāya “uppajjatī”ti veditabbo, uppanno
atk-s0401a:423_0: Bahujanahitāyāti mahājanassa hitatthāya uppajjati. Bahujanasukhāyāti mahājanassa
atk-s0401a:423_1: sukhatthāya uppajjati. Lokānukampāyāti sattalokassa anukampaṃ paṭicca uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:423_2: Katarasattalokassāti? Yo tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā amatapānaṃ pivitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:423_3: paṭivijjhi, tassa. Bhagavatā hi mahābodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā bodhimaṇḍā
atk-s0401a:423_4: isipatanaṃ āgamma “dveme, bhikkhave, antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā”ti dhammacakkappavattanasutte
atk-s0401a:423_5: desite āyasmatā aññāsikoṇḍaññattherena saddhiṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhā brahmāno amatapānaṃ
atk-s0401a:423_6: piviṃsu, etassa sattalokassa anukampāya uppanno. Pañcamadivase anattalakkhaṇasuttantapariyosāne
atk-s0401a:423_7: pañcavaggiyā therā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, etassapi sattalokassa anukampāya uppanno.
atk-s0401a:423_8: Tato yasadārakappamukhe pañcapaṇṇāsa purise arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi, tato kappāsikavanasaṇḍe
atk-s0401a:423_9: tiṃsa bhaddavaggiye tayo magge ca tīṇi phalāni ca sampāpesi, etassapi sattalokassa
atk-s0401a:423_10: anukampāya uppanno. Gayāsīse ādittapariyāyasuttapariyosāne jaṭilasahassaṃ arahatte
atk-s0401a:423_11: patiṭṭhāpesi, tālaṭṭhivane bimbisārappamukhā ekādasa nahutā brāhmaṇagahapatikā satthu
atk-s0401a:423_12: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, ekaṃ nahutaṃ saraṇesu patiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0401a:423_13: Tirokuṭṭaanumodanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassehi amatapānaṃ pītaṃ. Sumanamālākārasamāgame
atk-s0401a:423_14: caturāsītiyā ca. Dhanapālakasamāgame dasahi pāṇasahassehi, khadiraṅgārajātakasamāgame
atk-s0401a:423_15: caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassehi, jambukaājīvakasamāgame caturāsītiyā ca. Ānandaseṭṭhisamāgame
atk-s0401a:423_16: caturāsītiyā ca pāṇasahassehi amatapānaṃ pītaṃ. Pāsāṇakacetiye pārāyanasuttantakathādivase
atk-s0401a:423_17: cuddasa koṭiyo amatapānaṃ piviṃsu. Yamakapāṭihāriyadivase vīsati pāṇakoṭiyo, tāvatiṃsabhavane
atk-s0401a:423_18: paṇḍukambalasilāya nisīditvā mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:423_19: desentassa asīti pāṇakoṭiyo, devorohane tiṃsa pāṇakoṭiyo, sakkapañhasuttante asīti
atk-s0401a:423_20: devatāsahassāni amatapānaṃ piviṃsu. Mahāsamayasuttante maṅgalasuttante cūḷarāhulovāde
atk-s0401a:423_21: samacittapaṭipadāyāti imesu catūsu ṭhānesu abhisamayaṃ pattasattānaṃ paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0401a:423_22: Etassapi sattalokassa anukampāya uppannoti. Yāvajjadivasā ito paraṃ anāgate ca sāsanaṃ
atk-s0401a:423_23: nissāya saggamokkhamagge patiṭṭhahantānaṃ vasenāpi ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:424_0: Devamanussānanti na kevalaṃ devamanussānaṃyeva, avasesānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi atthāya
atk-s0401a:424_1: hitāya sukhāyeva uppanno. Sahetukapaṭisandhike pana maggaphalasacchikiriyāya bhabbe
atk-s0401a:424_2: puggale dassetuṃ etaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā etesampi atthāya hitāya sukhāyeva uppannoti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:425: Katamo ekapuggaloti ayaṃ pucchā. Pucchā ca nāmesā pañcavidhā hoti – adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā, diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchā, vimaticchedanā pucchā, anumatipucchā, kathetukamyatāpucchāti.
atk-s0401a:426_0: Tāsaṃ idaṃ nānattaṃ – katamā adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā? Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti
atk-s0401a:426_1: adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ abhāvitaṃ. Tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya
atk-s0401a:426_2: vibhūtatthāya vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati, ayaṃ adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā.
atk-s0401a:427_0: Katamā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchā? Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ
atk-s0401a:427_1: vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ. So aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0401a:428_0: Katamā vimaticchedanā pucchā? Pakatiyā saṃsayapakkhanto hoti vimatipakkhanto dveḷhakajāto
atk-s0401a:428_1: “evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho”ti. So vimaticchedanatthāya pañhaṃ
atk-s0401a:429_0: Katamā anumatipucchā? Bhagavā hi bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā pañhaṃ pucchati – “taṃ kiṃ
atk-s0401a:429_1: maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti? “Aniccaṃ, bhante”. “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ,
atk-s0401a:429_2: dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti? “Dukkhaṃ, bhante”. “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ,
atk-s0401a:429_3: kallaṃ nu kho taṃ samanupassituṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti? “No hetaṃ,
atk-s0401a:430: Katamā kathetukamyatāpucchā? Bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ kathetukamyatāya pañhaṃ pucchati – “cattārome, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānā. Katame cattāro”ti? Ayaṃ kathetukamyatāpucchāti.
atk-s0401a:431_0: Tattha buddhānaṃ purimā tisso pucchā natthi. Kasmā? Buddhānaṃ hi tīsu addhāsu kiñci
atk-s0401a:431_1: saṅkhataṃ addhāvimuttaṃ vā asaṅkhataṃ adiṭṭhaṃ ajānitaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ
atk-s0401a:431_2: avibhāvitaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā tesaṃ adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā natthi. Yaṃ pana bhagavatā
atk-s0401a:431_3: attano ñāṇena paṭividdhaṃ, tassa aññena samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena
atk-s0401a:431_4: vā brahmunā vā saddhiṃ saṃsandanakiccaṃ natthi. Tenassa diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā natthi.
atk-s0401a:431_5: Yasmā panesa akathaṃkathī tiṇṇavicikiccho sabbadhammesu vihatasaṃsayo, tenassa vimaticchedanāpucchā
atk-s0401a:431_6: natthi. Itarā pana dve pucchā bhagavato atthi, tāsu ayaṃ kathetukamyatāpucchāti veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:432_0: Idāni tāya pucchāya puṭṭhaṃ ekapuggalaṃ vibhāvento tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddhoti
atk-s0401a:432_1: āha. Tattha tathāgatoti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato – tathā āgatoti tathāgato,
atk-s0401a:432_2: tathā gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti
atk-s0401a:432_3: tathāgato, tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathavāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato,
atk-s0401a:433_0: Kathaṃ bhagavā tathā āgatoti tathāgato? Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā
atk-s0401a:433_1: sammāsambuddhā āgatā, yathā vipassī bhagavā āgato, yathā sikhī bhagavā, yathā vessabhū
atk-s0401a:433_2: bhagavā, yathā kakusandho bhagavā, yathā koṇāgamano bhagavā, yathā kassapo bhagavā
atk-s0401a:433_3: āgatoti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yena abhinīhārena ete bhagavanto āgatā, teneva amhākampi
atk-s0401a:433_4: bhagavā āgato. Atha vā yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe… yathā kassapo bhagavā dānapāramiṃ
atk-s0401a:433_6: imā dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo
atk-s0401a:433_7: pūretvā, aṅgapariccāgaṃ nayanadhanarajjaputtadārapariccāganti ime pañca mahāpariccāge
atk-s0401a:433_9: koṭiṃ patvā āgato, tathā amhākampi bhagavā āgato. Yathā ca vipassī bhagavā …pe… kassapo
atk-s0401a:433_10: bhagavā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne cattāro sammappadhāne cattāro iddhipāde pañcindriyāni
atk-s0401a:433_11: pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅge ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgato, tathā
atk-s0401a:439_0: Kathaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yathā sampatijāto vipassī bhagavā gato…pe… kassapo
atk-s0401a:439_1: bhagavā gato. Kathañca so gatoti? So hi sampatijātova samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:439_2: uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gato. Yathāha – “sampatijāto, ānanda, bodhisatto
atk-s0401a:439_3: samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati
atk-s0401a:439_4: setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne, sabbā ca disā anuviloketi, āsabhiñca vācaṃ bhāsati
atk-s0401a:439_5: ‘aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, ayamantimā jāti,
atk-s0401a:439_6: natthi dāni punabbhavo”’ti. Tañcassa gamanaṃ tathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ
atk-s0401a:439_7: pubbanimittabhāvena. Yañhi so sampatijātova samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahi, idamassa caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa
atk-s0401a:439_8: pubbanimittaṃ, uttarābhimukhabhāvo pana sabbalokuttarabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ, sattapadavītihāro
atk-s0401a:439_13: ayaṃ bhagavāpi gato. Tañcassa gamanaṃ kathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ tesaṃyeva visesādhigamānaṃ
atk-s0401a:449_0: Atha vā yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe… yathā kassapo bhagavā, ayampi bhagavā tatheva nekkhammena
atk-s0401a:449_1: kāmacchandaṃ pahāya gato, abyāpādena byāpādaṃ, ālokasaññāya thinamiddhaṃ, avikkhepena
atk-s0401a:449_2: uddhaccakukkuccaṃ, dhammavavatthānena vicikicchaṃ pahāya gato, ñāṇena avijjaṃ padāletvā
atk-s0401a:449_3: gato, pāmojjena aratiṃ vinodetvā, paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇakavāṭaṃ ugghāṭetvā, dutiyajjhānena
atk-s0401a:449_4: vitakkavicāraṃ vūpasametvā, tatiyajjhānena pītiṃ virājetvā, catutthajjhānena sukhadukkhaṃ
atk-s0401a:450_0: Aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṃ pahāya, dukkhānupassanāya sukhasaññaṃ, anattānupassanāya
atk-s0401a:450_1: attasaññaṃ, nibbidānupassanāya nandiṃ, virāgānupassanāya rāgaṃ, nirodhānupassanāya
atk-s0401a:450_2: samudayaṃ, paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānaṃ, khayānupassanāya ghanasaññaṃ, vayānupassanāya
atk-s0401a:450_3: āyūhanaṃ, vipariṇāmānupassanāya dhuvasaññaṃ, animittānupassanāya nimittasaññaṃ, appaṇihitānupassanāya
atk-s0401a:450_7: kilese bhañjitvā, sakadāgāmimaggena oḷārike kilese pahāya, anāgāmimaggena aṇusahagate
atk-s0401a:450_8: kilese samugghātetvā, arahattamaggena sabbakilese samucchinditvā gato. Evampi tathā gatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0401a:451_0: Kathaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato? Pathavīdhātuyā kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇaṃ tathaṃ
atk-s0401a:451_1: avitathaṃ, āpodhātuyā paggharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, tejodhātuyā uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ, vāyodhātuyā
atk-s0401a:452: Rūpassa ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ, vedanāya vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ, saññāya sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ, saṅkhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, viññāṇassa vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:453: Vitakkassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇaṃ, vicārassa anumajjanalakkhaṇaṃ, pītiyā pharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, sukhassa sātalakkhaṇaṃ, cittekaggatāya avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ, phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:454: Saddhindriyassa adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyindriyassa paggahalakkhaṇaṃ, satindriyassa upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ, samādhindriyassa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ, paññindriyassa pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:455: Saddhābalassa assaddhiye akampiyalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyabalassa kosajje, satibalassa muṭṭhassacce, samādhibalassa uddhacce, paññābalassa avijjāya akampiyalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:457_2: sammāvāyāmassa paggahalakkhaṇaṃ, sammāsatiyā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ, sammāsamādhissa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:458_0: Avijjāya aññāṇalakkhaṇaṃ, saṅkhārānaṃ cetanālakkhaṇaṃ, viññāṇassa vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:458_1: nāmassa namanalakkhaṇaṃ, rūpassa ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ, saḷāyatanassa āyatanalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:458_2: phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ, vedanāya vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ, taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇaṃ, upādānassa
atk-s0401a:458_3: gahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, bhavassa āyūhanalakkhaṇaṃ, jātiyā nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ, jarāya jīraṇalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:459_0: Dhātūnaṃ suññatālakkhaṇaṃ, āyatanānaṃ āyatanalakkhaṇaṃ, satipaṭṭhānānaṃ upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:459_1: sammappadhānānaṃ padahanalakkhaṇaṃ, iddhipādānaṃ ijjhanalakkhaṇaṃ, indriyānaṃ adhipatilakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:459_2: balānaṃ akampiyalakkhaṇaṃ, bojjhaṅgānaṃ niyyānalakkhaṇaṃ, maggassa hetulakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:460: Saccānaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ, samathassa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ, vipassanāya anupassanālakkhaṇaṃ, samathavipassanānaṃ ekarasalakkhaṇaṃ, yuganaddhānaṃ anativattanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:461: Sīlavisuddhiyā saṃvaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ, cittavisuddhiyā avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ, diṭṭhivisuddhiyā dassanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:462: Khaye ñāṇassa samucchedalakkhaṇaṃ, anuppāde ñāṇassa passaddhilakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:463_0: Chandassa mūlalakkhaṇaṃ, manasikārassa samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ, phassassa samodhānalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:463_1: vedanāya samosaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ, samādhissa pamukhalakkhaṇaṃ, satiyā ādhipateyyalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:463_2: paññāya tatuttariyalakkhaṇaṃ, vimuttiyā sāralakkhaṇaṃ, amatogadhassa nibbānassa pariyosānalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:463_3: tathaṃ avitathaṃ. Evaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto anuppattoti
atk-s0401a:464_0: Kathaṃ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato? Tathadhammā nāma cattāri
atk-s0401a:464_1: ariyasaccāni. Yathāha – “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0401a:464_2: Katamāni cattāri? ‘Idaṃ dukkha’nti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathameta”nti
atk-s0401a:464_3: vitthāro. Tāni ca bhagavā abhisambuddho, tasmā tathānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti
atk-s0401a:465_0: Apica jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe…
atk-s0401a:465_1: saṅkhārānaṃ avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho. Tathā avijjāya
atk-s0401a:465_2: saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho, saṅkhārānaṃ viññāṇassa paccayaṭṭho…pe… jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa
atk-s0401a:465_3: paccayaṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho. Taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavā abhisambuddho. Tasmāpi tathānaṃ
atk-s0401a:465_4: dhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti vuccati. Evaṃ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato.
atk-s0401a:466_0: Kathaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato? Bhagavā yaṃ sadevake loke…pe… sadevamanussāya aparimāṇāsu
atk-s0401a:466_1: lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma
atk-s0401a:466_2: atthi, taṃ sabbākārato jānāti passati. Evaṃ jānatā passatā ca tena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena
atk-s0401a:466_3: vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānakapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ?
atk-s0401a:466_4: Yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ
atk-s0401a:466_5: pītaka”ntiādinā nayena anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ
atk-s0401a:466_6: tathameva hoti, vitathaṃ natthi. Esa nayo sotadvārādīsupi āpāthamāgacchantesu saddādīsu.
atk-s0401a:466_7: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sadevamanussāya
atk-s0401a:466_8: diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0401a:466_9: tamahaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, taṃ tathāgatassa viditaṃ, taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsī”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0401a:466_10: tathadassitāya tathāgato. Tattha tathadassīatthe tathāgatoti padasambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:467_0: Kathaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato? Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno
atk-s0401a:467_1: tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, yañca rattiṃ
atk-s0401a:467_2: yamakasālānaṃ antare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi, etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe
atk-s0401a:467_3: kāle paṭhamabodhiyāpi majjhimabodhiyāpi pacchimabodhiyāpi yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ
atk-s0401a:467_4: suttaṃ geyyaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ atthato ca byañjanato ca anupavajjaṃ anūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:467_5: anadhikaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ rāgamadanimmadanaṃ dosamohamadanimmadanaṃ, natthi tattha
atk-s0401a:467_6: vālaggamattampi avakkhalitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya ekanāḷikāya
atk-s0401a:467_7: mitaṃ viya ekatulāya tulitaṃ viya ca tathameva hoti avitathaṃ. Tenāha – “yañca, cunda,
atk-s0401a:467_8: rattiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhati, yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya
atk-s0401a:467_9: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati, yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati, sabbaṃ
atk-s0401a:467_10: taṃ tatheva hoti no aññathā. Tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī”ti. Gadattho hi ettha gatasaddo.
atk-s0401a:468: Apica āgadanaṃ āgado, vacananti attho. Tatho aviparīto āgado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evampetasmiṃ atthe padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:469_0: Kathaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato? Bhagavato hi vācāya kāyo anulometi kāyassapi vācā,
atk-s0401a:469_1: tasmā yathāvādī tathākārī yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti. Evaṃ bhūtassa cassa yathā
atk-s0401a:469_2: vācā, kāyopi tathā gato, pavattoti attho. Yathā ca kāyo, vācāpi tathā gatāti tathāgato.
atk-s0401a:469_3: Tenevāha – “yathāvādī, bhikkhave, tathāgato tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī. Iti yathāvādī
atk-s0401a:469_4: tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī. Tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti. Evaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato.
atk-s0401a:470_0: Kathaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato? Upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:470_1: tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi
atk-s0401a:470_2: vimuttiyāpi, na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi, atulo appameyyo anuttaro rājarājo
atk-s0401a:470_3: devadevo sakkānamatisakko brahmānamatibrahmā. Tenāha – “sadevake loke, bhikkhave…pe…
atk-s0401a:470_4: sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthu daso vasavattī. Tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:471_0: Tatrevaṃ padasiddhi veditabbā – agado viya agado. Ko panesa? Desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo
atk-s0401a:471_1: ca. Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko dibbāgadena sappe viya sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca
atk-s0401a:471_2: lokaṃ abhibhavati. Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo
atk-s0401a:471_3: ca agado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo. Evaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato.
atk-s0401a:472_0: Apica tathāya gatotipi tathāgato, tathaṃ gatotipi tathāgato, gatoti avagato atīto
atk-s0401a:472_1: patto paṭipannoti attho. Tattha sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya gato avagatoti
atk-s0401a:472_2: tathāgato. Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato, lokanirodhaṃ
atk-s0401a:472_3: sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato, lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathāya
atk-s0401a:472_4: gato paṭipannoti tathāgato. Tena yaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0401a:473_0: “Loko, bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokasmā tathāgato visaṃyutto. Lokasamudayo,
atk-s0401a:473_1: bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokasamudayo tathāgatassa pahīno. Lokanirodho,
atk-s0401a:473_2: bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokanirodho tathāgatassa sacchikato. Lokanirodhagāminī
atk-s0401a:473_3: paṭipadā, bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadā tathāgatassa
atk-s0401a:473_4: bhāvitā. Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatena abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0401a:474: Tassapi evaṃ attho veditabbo. Idampi ca tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvadīpane mukhamattameva. Sabbākārena pana tathāgatova tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya.
atk-s0401a:475_0: Arahaṃ sammāsambuddhoti padadvaye pana ārakattā, arīnaṃ arānañca hatattā, paccayādīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:475_1: arahattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi arahanti veditabbo. Sammā sāmañca
atk-s0401a:475_2: sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā pana sammāsambuddhoti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panetaṃ
atk-s0401a:476_0: 171. Dutiye pātubhāvoti uppatti nipphatti. Dullabho lokasminti imasmiṃ sattaloke
atk-s0401a:476_1: dullabho sudullabho paramadullabho. Kasmā dullabhoti? Ekavāraṃ dānapāramiṃ pūretvā
atk-s0401a:476_2: buddhena bhavituṃ na sakkā, dve vāre dasa vāre vīsati vāre paññāsa vāre vārasataṃ
atk-s0401a:476_3: vārasahassaṃ vārasatasahassaṃ vārakoṭisatasahassampi dānapāramiṃ pūretvā buddhena
atk-s0401a:476_4: bhavituṃ na sakkā, tathā ekadivasaṃ dve divase dasa divase vīsati divase paññāsa
atk-s0401a:476_5: divase divasasataṃ divasasahassaṃ divasasatasahassaṃ divasakoṭisatasahassaṃ. Ekamāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:476_6: dve māse…pe… māsakoṭisatasahassaṃ. Ekasaṃvaccharaṃ dve saṃvacchare…pe… saṃvaccharakoṭisatasahassaṃ.
