atk-s0401a:476_7: Ekakappaṃ dve kappe…pe… kappakoṭisatasahassaṃ. Kappānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0401a:476_8: tīṇi asaṅkhyeyyāni dānapāramiṃ pūretvā buddhena bhavituṃ na sakkā. Sīlapāramīnekkhammapāramī…pe…
atk-s0401a:476_9: upekkhāpāramīsupi eseva nayo. Pacchimakoṭiyā pana kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri
atk-s0401a:476_10: asaṅkhyeyyāni dasa pāramiyo pūretvā buddhena bhavituṃ sakkāti iminā kāraṇena dullabho.
atk-s0401a:477_0: 172. Tatiye acchariyamanussoti acchariyo manusso. Acchariyoti andhassa pabbatārohaṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:477_1: viya niccaṃ na hotīti attho. Ayaṃ tāva saddanayo. Ayaṃ pana aṭṭhakathānayo – accharāyoggoti
atk-s0401a:477_2: acchariyo, accharaṃ paharitvā passitabboti attho. Apica “tathāgatassa, bhikkhave,
atk-s0401a:477_3: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā pātubhavantī”ti
atk-s0401a:477_4: evamādīhi anekehi acchariyabbhutadhammehi samannāgatattāpi acchariyamanusso. Āciṇṇamanussotipi acchariyamanusso.
atk-s0401a:478_0: Abhinīhārassa hi sampādake aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā ekabuddhassa sammukhe mahābodhimaṇḍe
atk-s0401a:478_1: mānasaṃ bandhitvā nisajjanaṃ nāma na aññassa kassaci āciṇṇaṃ, sabbaññubodhisattasseva
atk-s0401a:478_2: āciṇṇaṃ. Tathā buddhānaṃ santike byākaraṇaṃ labhitvā anivattakena hutvā vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:478_3: adhiṭṭhāya buddhakārakadhammānaṃ pūraṇampi na aññassa kassaci āciṇṇaṃ, sabbaññubodhisattasseva
atk-s0401a:478_4: āciṇṇaṃ. Tathā pāramiyo gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā vessantarattabhāvasadise attabhāve ṭhatvā
atk-s0401a:478_5: sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitānaṃ hatthīnaṃ sattasatāni assānaṃ sattasatānīti evaṃ sattasatakamahādānaṃ
atk-s0401a:478_6: datvā jālikumārasadisaṃ puttaṃ, kaṇhājināsadisaṃ dhītaraṃ, maddīdevisadisaṃ bhariyañca
atk-s0401a:478_7: dānamukhe niyyātetvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā dutiye attabhāve tusitabhavane paṭisandhiggahaṇampi
atk-s0401a:478_8: na aññassa kassaci āciṇṇaṃ, sabbaññubodhisattasseva āciṇṇaṃ. Tusitapure yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0401a:478_9: ṭhatvā devatānaṃ āyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā pañcamahāvilokanaṃ viloketvā satassa sampajānassa
atk-s0401a:478_10: tusitapurā cavitvā mahābhogakule paṭisandhiggahaṇampi na aññassa kassaci āciṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:478_12: satassa sampajānassa mātukucchiyaṃ nivāsopi, satassa sampajānassa mātukucchito nikkhamanadivase
atk-s0401a:478_14: dhāraṇampi, dibbavāḷabījanukkhepopi, sabbadisāsu sīhavilokanaṃ viloketvā attanā paṭisamaṃ
atk-s0401a:478_15: kañci sattaṃ adisvā “aggohamasmi lokassā”ti evaṃ sīhanādanadanampi, paripākagate
atk-s0401a:478_16: ñāṇe mahāsampattiṃ pahāya mahābhinikkhamanampi, mahābodhimaṇḍe pallaṅkena nisinnassa
atk-s0401a:478_17: māravijayaṃ ādiṃ katvā pubbenivāsānussatidibbacakkhuvisodhanāni katvā paccūsasamaye
atk-s0401a:478_19: anuttaraṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dhammacakkappavattanampīti evamādi sabbaṃ na aññassa kassaci
atk-s0401a:478_20: āciṇṇaṃ, sabbaññubuddhasseva āciṇṇaṃ. Evaṃ āciṇṇamanussotipi acchariyamanusso.
atk-s0401a:479_0: 173. Catutthe kālakiriyāti ekasmiṃ kāle pākaṭā kiriyāti kālakiriyā. Tathāgato hi
atk-s0401a:479_1: pañcacattālīsa vassāni ṭhatvā tīṇi piṭakāni pañca nikāye navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ caturāsīti
atk-s0401a:479_2: dhammakkhandhasahassāni pakāsetvā mahājanaṃ nibbānaninnaṃ nibbānapoṇaṃ katvā yamakasālānamantare
atk-s0401a:479_3: nipanno bhikkhusaṅghaṃ āmantetvā appamādena ovaditvā sato sampajāno anupādisesāya
atk-s0401a:479_4: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Ayamassa kiriyā yāvajjatanā pākaṭāti ekasmiṃ kāle pākaṭā
atk-s0401a:479_5: kiriyāti kālakiriyā. Anutappā hotīti anutāpakarā hoti. Tattha cakkavattirañño kālakiriyā
atk-s0401a:479_6: ekacakkavāḷe devamanussānaṃ anutāpakarā hoti. Buddhānaṃ kālakiriyā dasasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0401a:479_7: devamanussānaṃ anutāpakarā hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “bahuno janassa anutappā hotī”ti.
atk-s0401a:480_0: 174. Pañcame adutiyoti dutiyassa buddhassa abhāvā adutiyo. Cattāro hi buddhā sutabuddho,
atk-s0401a:480_1: catusaccabuddho, paccekabuddho, sabbaññubuddhoti. Tattha bahussuto bhikkhu sutabuddho
atk-s0401a:480_2: nāma. Khīṇāsavo catusaccabuddho nāma. Kappasatasahassādhikāni dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo
atk-s0401a:480_3: pūretvā sāmaṃ paṭividdhapaccekabodhiñāṇo paccekabuddho nāma. Kappasatasahassādhikāni
atk-s0401a:480_4: cattāri vā aṭṭha vā soḷasa vā asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0401a:480_5: madditvā paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo sabbaññubuddho nāma. Imesu catūsu buddhesu sabbaññubuddhova
atk-s0401a:480_6: adutiyo nāma. Na hi tena saddhiṃ añño sabbaññubuddho nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:481_0: Asahāyoti attabhāvena vā paṭividdhadhammehi vā sadiso sahāyo nāma assa natthīti asahāyo.
atk-s0401a:481_1: “Laddhasahāyo kho pana so bhagavā sekhānañceva paṭipadāna”nti iminā pana pariyāyena
atk-s0401a:481_2: sekhāsekhā buddhānaṃ sahāyā nāma honti. Appaṭimoti paṭimā vuccati attabhāvo, tassa
atk-s0401a:481_3: attabhāvasadisā aññā paṭimā natthīti appaṭimo. Yāpi ca manussā suvaṇṇarajatādimayā
atk-s0401a:481_4: paṭimā karonti, tāsu vālaggamattampi okāsaṃ tathāgatassa attabhāvasadisaṃ kātuṃ samattho
atk-s0401a:482_0: Appaṭisamoti attabhāvenevassa paṭisamo nāma koci natthīti appaṭisamo. Appaṭibhāgoti
atk-s0401a:482_1: ye tathāgatena “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā nayena dhammā desitā, tesu “na cattāro
atk-s0401a:482_2: satipaṭṭhānā, tayo vā pañca vā”tiādinā nayena paṭibhāgaṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthīti
atk-s0401a:482_3: appaṭibhāgo. Appaṭipuggaloti añño koci “ahaṃ buddho”ti evaṃ paṭiññaṃ kātuṃ samattho
atk-s0401a:482_4: puggalo natthīti appaṭipuggalo. Asamoti appaṭipuggalattāva sabbasattehi asamo. Asamasamoti
atk-s0401a:482_5: asamā vuccanti atītānāgatā sabbaññubuddhā, tehi asamehi samoti asamasamo.
atk-s0401a:483_0: Dvipadānaṃ aggoti sammāsambuddho apadānaṃ dvipadānaṃ catuppadānaṃ bahuppadānaṃ rūpīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:483_1: arūpīnaṃ saññīnaṃ asaññīnaṃ nevasaññīnāsaññīnaṃ sattānaṃ aggova. Kasmā idha dvipadānaṃ
atk-s0401a:483_2: aggoti vutto? Seṭṭhataravasena. Imasmiñhi loke seṭṭho nāma uppajjamāno apadacatuppadabahuppadesu
atk-s0401a:483_3: na uppajjati, dvipadesuyeva uppajjati. Kataradvipadvesūti? Manussesu ceva devesu
atk-s0401a:483_4: ca. Manussesu uppajjamāno tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ vase vattetuṃ samattho buddho
atk-s0401a:483_5: hutvā uppajjati. Devesu uppajjamāno dasasahassilokadhātuṃ vasavattī mahābrahmā hutvā
atk-s0401a:483_6: uppajjati. So tassa kappiyakārako vā ārāmiko vā sampajjati. Iti tatopi seṭṭhataravasenesa
atk-s0401a:484_0: 175-186. Chaṭṭhādīsu ekapuggalassa, bhikkhave, pātubhāvā mahato cakkhussa pātubhāvo
atk-s0401a:484_1: hotīti, bhikkhave, ekapuggalassa tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvena
atk-s0401a:484_2: mahantassa cakkhussa pātubhāvo hoti. Tasmiṃ puggale pātubhūte taṃ pātubhūtameva hoti,
atk-s0401a:484_3: na vinā tassa pātubhāvena pātubhavati. Pātubhāvoti uppatti nipphatti. Katamassa cakkhussāti?
atk-s0401a:484_5: samādhipaññāsadisassāti. Ālokādīsupi eseva nayo. Ubhinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ paññāālokasadisoyeva
atk-s0401a:484_6: hi ettha āloko, paññāobhāsasadisoyeva obhāso adhippeto. “Mahato cakkhussa, mahato
atk-s0401a:484_7: ālokassa, mahato obhāsassā”ti imāni ca pana tīṇipi lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0401a:485_0: Channaṃ anuttariyānanti uttaritaravirahitānaṃ channaṃ uttamadhammānaṃ. Tattha dassanānuttariyaṃ,
atk-s0401a:485_2: imāni cha anuttariyāni. Imesaṃ pātubhāvo hotīti attho. Āyasmā hi ānandatthero sāyaṃpātaṃ
atk-s0401a:485_3: tathāgataṃ cakkhuviññāṇena daṭṭhuṃ labhati, idaṃ dassanānuttariyaṃ. Aññopi sotāpanno
atk-s0401a:485_4: vā sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā ānandatthero viya tathāgataṃ dassanāya labhati, idampi
atk-s0401a:485_5: dassanānuttariyaṃ. Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabalaṃ dassanāya
atk-s0401a:485_6: labhitvā taṃ dassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti. Idaṃ dassanameva nāma, mūladassanaṃ
atk-s0401a:486_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca abhikkhaṇaṃ dasabalassa vacanaṃ sotaviññāṇena sotuṃ labhati,
atk-s0401a:486_1: idaṃ savanānuttariyaṃ. Aññepi sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya tathāgatassa vacanaṃ
atk-s0401a:486_2: savanāya labhanti, idampi savanānuttariyaṃ. Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero
atk-s0401a:486_3: viya tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sotuṃ labhitvā taṃ savanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0401a:486_4: Idaṃ savanameva nāma, mūlasavanaṃ pana savanānuttariyaṃ nāma.
atk-s0401a:487_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca dasabale saddhaṃ paṭilabhati, idaṃ lābhānuttariyaṃ. Aññepi sotāpannādayo
atk-s0401a:487_1: ānandatthero viya dasabale saddhāpaṭilābhaṃ labhanti, idampi lābhānuttariyaṃ. Aparo
atk-s0401a:487_2: pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabale saddhāpaṭilābhaṃ labhitvā taṃ
atk-s0401a:487_3: lābhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti, ayaṃ lābhoyeva nāma, mūlalābho pana lābhānuttariyaṃ nāma.
atk-s0401a:488_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca dasabalassa sāsane tisso sikkhā sikkhati, idaṃ sikkhānuttariyaṃ.
atk-s0401a:488_1: Aññepi sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya dasabalassa sāsane tisso sikkhā sikkhanti,
atk-s0401a:488_2: idampi sikkhānuttariyaṃ. Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:488_3: sāsane tisso sikkhā sikkhitvā tā sikkhā vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti. Ayaṃ sikkhāyeva
atk-s0401a:489_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca abhiṇhaṃ dasabalaṃ paricarati, idaṃ pāricariyānuttariyaṃ. Aññepi
atk-s0401a:489_1: sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya abhiṇhaṃ dasabalaṃ paricaranti, idampi pāricariyānuttariyaṃ.
atk-s0401a:489_2: Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabalaṃ paricaritvā taṃ pāricariyaṃ
atk-s0401a:489_3: vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti, ayaṃ pāricariyāyeva nāma, mūlapāricariyā pana pāricariyānuttariyaṃ nāma.
atk-s0401a:490_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca dasabalassa lokiyalokuttare guṇe anussarati, idaṃ anussatānuttariyaṃ.
atk-s0401a:490_1: Aññepi sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya dasabalassa lokiyalokuttare guṇe anussaranti,
atk-s0401a:490_2: idampi anussatānuttariyaṃ. Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:490_3: lokiyalokuttare guṇe anussaritvā taṃ anussatiṃ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti,
atk-s0401a:490_4: ayaṃ anussatiyeva nāma, mūlānussati pana anussatānuttariyaṃ nāma. Imāni cha anuttariyāni,
atk-s0401a:490_5: imesaṃ pātubhāvo hoti. Imāni ca pana cha anuttariyāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0401a:491_0: Catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ sacchikiriyā hotīti catasso hi paṭisambhidāyo atthapaṭisambhidā,
atk-s0401a:491_2: ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dhammesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, atthadhammaniruttābhilāpe
atk-s0401a:491_3: ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0401a:491_4: vitthāro panetāsaṃ abhidhamme āgatoyeva. Imāsaṃ catassannaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0401a:491_5: paccakkhakiriyā hoti, na vinā buddhuppādā. Etāsaṃ sacchikiriyāti attho. Imāpi lokiyalokuttarāva
atk-s0401a:492_1: paṭivedho hoti, na vinā buddhuppādenāti attho. Nānādhātupaṭivedhoti ettha imāva aṭṭhārasa
atk-s0401a:492_2: dhātuyo nānāsabhāvato nānādhātuyoti veditabbā. Yo panetāsaṃ “nānāsabhāvā etā”ti evaṃ
atk-s0401a:492_3: nānākaraṇato paṭivedho, ayaṃ nānādhātupaṭivedho nāma. Vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyāti
atk-s0401a:492_4: ettha vijjāti phale ñāṇaṃ, vimuttīti tadavasesā phalasampayuttā dhammā. Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāti
atk-s0401a:492_5: sototi paṭhamamaggo, tena sotena pattabbaṃ phalanti sotāpattiphalaṃ. Sakadāgāmiphalādīni pākaṭāneva.
atk-s0401a:493: 187. Anuttaranti niruttaraṃ. Dhammacakkanti seṭṭhacakkaṃ. Cakkasaddo hesa –
atk-s0401a:497_0: Ettha uracakke āgato. “Cakkasamāruḷhā jānapadā pariyāyantī”ti ettha iriyāpathacakke.
atk-s0401a:497_1: “Atha kho so, bhikkhave, rathakāro yaṃ taṃ cakkaṃ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṃ, taṃ pavattesī”ti
atk-s0401a:497_2: ettha dārucakke. “Addasā kho doṇo brāhmaṇo bhagavato pādesu cakkāni sahassārānī”ti
atk-s0401a:497_3: ettha lakkhaṇacakke. “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0401a:497_4: catucakkaṃ vattatī”ti ettha sampatticakke. “Dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ pātubhavatī”ti ettha
atk-s0401a:498_0: Pavattitanti ettha dhammacakkaṃ abhinīharati nāma, abhinīhaṭaṃ nāma, uppādeti nāma,
atk-s0401a:498_1: uppāditaṃ nāma, pavatteti nāma, pavattitaṃ nāmāti ayaṃ pabhedo veditabbo. Kuto paṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:498_2: dhammacakkaṃ abhinīharati nāmāti? Yadā sumedhabrāhmaṇo hutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme
atk-s0401a:498_3: ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā sattasatakamahādānaṃ datvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañca abhiññā
atk-s0401a:498_4: aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbatteti, tato paṭṭhāya dhammacakkaṃ abhinīharati nāma.
atk-s0401a:499_0: Kuto paṭṭhāya abhinīhaṭaṃ nāmāti? Yadā aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā dīpaṅkarapādamūle
atk-s0401a:499_1: mahābodhimaṇḍatthāya mānasaṃ bandhitvā “byākaraṇaṃ aladdhā na vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:499_2: adhiṭṭhāya nipanno dasabalassa santikā byākaraṇaṃ labhi, tato paṭṭhāya dhammacakkaṃ abhinīhaṭaṃ nāma.
atk-s0401a:500_0: Kuto paṭṭhāya uppādeti nāmāti? Tato paṭṭhāya dānapāramiṃ pūrentopi dhammacakkaṃ uppādeti
atk-s0401a:500_1: nāma. Sīlapāramiṃ pūrentopi…pe… upekkhāpāramiṃ pūrentopi dhammacakkaṃ uppādeti nāma.
atk-s0401a:500_2: Dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyo pūrentopi, pañca mahāpariccāge
atk-s0401a:500_3: pariccajantopi, ñātatthacariyaṃ pūrentopi dhammacakkaṃ uppādeti nāma. Vessantarattabhāve
atk-s0401a:500_4: ṭhatvā sattasatakamahādānaṃ datvā puttadāraṃ dānamukhe niyyātetvā pāramikūṭaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0401a:500_5: tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devatāhi āyācito paṭiññaṃ datvā
atk-s0401a:500_6: pañcamahāvilokanaṃ vilokentopi dhammacakkaṃ uppādetiyeva nāma. Mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:500_7: gaṇhantopi, paṭisandhikkhaṇe dasasahassacakkavāḷaṃ kampentopi, mātukucchito nikkhantadivase
atk-s0401a:500_8: tatheva lokaṃ kampentopi, sampatijāto satta padāni gantvā “aggomahasmī”ti sīhanādaṃ
atk-s0401a:500_9: nadantopi, ekūnatiṃsa saṃvaccharāni agāramajjhe vasantopi, mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamantopi,
atk-s0401a:500_10: anomānadītīre pabbajantopi, mahāpadhāne chabbassāni vīriyaṃ karontopi, sujātāya dinnaṃ
atk-s0401a:500_11: madhupāyāsaṃ bhuñjitvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ nadiyā pavāhetvā sāyanhasamaye bodhimaṇḍavaragato
atk-s0401a:500_12: puratthimaṃ lokadhātuṃ olokento nisīditvā sūriye dharamāneyeva mārabalaṃ vidhametvā
atk-s0401a:500_13: paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantopi, majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhentopi, paccūsakālasamanantare
atk-s0401a:500_14: paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhantopi, sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikarontopi,
atk-s0401a:500_15: sakadāgāmimaggaṃ sakadāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmimaggaṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikarontopi, arahattamaggaṃ
atk-s0401a:501_0: Arahattaphalakkhaṇe pana tena dhammacakkaṃ uppāditaṃ nāma. Buddhānañhi sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇarāsi
atk-s0401a:501_1: arahattaphaleneva saddhiṃ ijjhati. Tasmā tena tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammacakkaṃ uppāditaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0401a:502_0: Kadā pavatteti nāma? Bodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā isipatane migadāye aññākoṇḍaññattheraṃ
atk-s0401a:502_1: kāyasakkhiṃ katvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṃ desento dhammacakkaṃ pavatteti nāma.
atk-s0401a:503_0: Yadā pana aññākoṇḍaññattherena dasabalassa desanāñāṇānubhāvanibbattaṃ savanaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0401a:503_1: sabbapaṭhamaṃ dhammo adhigato, tato paṭṭhāya dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ nāma hotīti
atk-s0401a:503_2: veditabbaṃ. Dhammacakkanti cetaṃ desanāñāṇassapi nāmaṃ paṭivedhañāṇassapi. Tesu desanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:503_3: lokiyaṃ, paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ. Kassa desanāpaṭivedhañāṇanti? Na aññassa kassaci,
atk-s0401a:504_0: Sammadevāti hetunā nayena kāraṇeneva. Anuppavattetīti yathā purato gacchantassa pacchato
atk-s0401a:504_1: gacchanto taṃ anugacchati nāma, evaṃ paṭhamataraṃ satthārā pavattitaṃ thero anuppavatteti
atk-s0401a:504_2: nāma. Kathaṃ? Satthā hi “cattārome, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānā. Katame cattāro”ti kathento
atk-s0401a:504_3: dhammacakkaṃ pavatteti nāma, dhammasenāpati sāriputtattheropi “cattārome, āvuso,
atk-s0401a:504_4: satipaṭṭhānā”ti kathento dhammacakkaṃ anuppavatteti nāma. Sammappadhānādīsupi eseva
atk-s0401a:504_5: nayo. Na kevalañca bodhipakkhiyadhammesu, “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, ariyasaccāni.
atk-s0401a:504_6: Cattārome, bhikkhave, ariyavaṃsā”tiādīsupi ayaṃ nayo netabbova. Evaṃ sammāsambuddho
atk-s0401a:504_7: dhammacakkaṃ pavatteti nāma, thero dasabalena pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ anuppavatteti nāma.
atk-s0401a:505_0: Evaṃ dhammacakkaṃ anuppavattentena pana therena dhammo desitopi pakāsitopi satthārāva
atk-s0401a:505_1: desito pakāsito hoti. Yo hi koci bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā devo
atk-s0401a:505_2: vā sakko vā māro vā brahmā vā dhammaṃ desetu pakāsetu, sabbo so satthārā desito pakāsitova
atk-s0401a:505_3: nāma hoti, sesajano pana lekhahārakapakkhe ṭhitova nāma hoti. Kathaṃ? Yathā hi raññā
atk-s0401a:505_4: dinnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vācetvā yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ karonti, taṃ taṃ kammaṃ yena kenaci katampi
atk-s0401a:505_5: kāritampi raññā kāritanteva vuccati. Mahārājā viya hi sammāsambuddho. Rājapaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:505_6: viya tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ. Paṇṇadānaṃ viya tepiṭake nayamukhadānaṃ paṇṇaṃ vācetvā
atk-s0401a:505_7: taṃtaṃkammānaṃ karaṇaṃ viya catunnaṃ parisānaṃ attano balena buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0401a:505_8: paresaṃ desanā pakāsanā. Tattha yathā paṇṇaṃ vācetvā yena kenaci katampi kāritampi
atk-s0401a:505_9: taṃ kammaṃ raññā kāritameva hoti, evameva yena kenaci desitopi pakāsitopi dhammo
atk-s0401a:505_10: satthārā desito pakāsitova nāma hotīti veditabbo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0401a:512_0: 188. Etadaggesu paṭhamavaggassa paṭhame etadagganti etaṃ aggaṃ. Ettha ca ayaṃ aggasaddo
atk-s0401a:512_1: ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu dissati. “Ajjatagge, samma dovārika, āvarāmi dvāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:512_2: nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu hi ādimhi dissati. “Teneva aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ parāmaseyya,
atk-s0401a:512_3: ucchaggaṃ veḷagga”ntiādīsu koṭiyaṃ. “Ambilaggaṃ vā madhuraggaṃ vā tittakaggaṃ vā,
atk-s0401a:512_4: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse.
atk-s0401a:512_5: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā…pe… tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe.
atk-s0401a:512_6: Svāyamidha koṭiyampi vaṭṭati seṭṭhepi. Te hi therā attano attano ṭhāne koṭibhūtātipi
atk-s0401a:512_7: aggā, seṭṭhabhūtātipi. Tasmā etadagganti esā koṭi eso seṭṭhoti ayamettha attho. Eseva nayo sabbasuttesu.
atk-s0401a:513_0: Ayañca etadaggasannikkhepo nāma catūhi kāraṇehi labbhati aṭṭhuppattito āgamanato
atk-s0401a:513_1: ciṇṇavasito guṇātirekatoti. Tattha koci thero ekena kāraṇena etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhati,
atk-s0401a:513_2: koci dvīhi, koci tīhi, koci sabbeheva catūhipi āyasmā sāriputtatthero viya. So hi
atk-s0401a:513_3: aṭṭhuppattitopi mahāpaññatāya etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhi āgamanādīhipi. Kathaṃ? Ekasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:513_4: hi samaye satthā jetavanamahāvihāre viharanto kaṇḍambarukkhamūle titthiyamaddanaṃ
atk-s0401a:513_5: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā “kahaṃ nu kho purimabuddhā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā vassaṃ
atk-s0401a:513_6: upagacchantī”ti āvajjento “tāvatiṃsabhavane”ti ñatvā dve padantarāni dassetvā tatiyena
atk-s0401a:513_7: padena tāvatiṃsabhavane paccuṭṭhāsi. Sakko devarājā bhagavantaṃ disvā paṇḍukambalasilāto
atk-s0401a:513_8: uṭṭhāya saddhiṃ devagaṇena paccuggamanaṃ agamāsi. Devā cintayiṃsu – “sakko devarājā
atk-s0401a:513_9: devagaṇaparivuto saṭṭhiyojanāyāmāya paṇḍukambalasilāya nisīditvā sampattiṃ anubhavati,
atk-s0401a:513_10: buddhānaṃ nāma nisinnakālato paṭṭhāya na sakkā aññena ettha hatthampi ṭhapetu”nti.
atk-s0401a:513_11: Satthāpi tattha nisinno tesaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā mahāpaṃsukūliko viya muṇḍapīṭhakaṃ
atk-s0401a:513_12: sabbameva paṇḍukambalasilaṃ avattharitvā nisīdi. Evaṃ nisīdanto pana attano vā sarīraṃ
atk-s0401a:513_13: mahantaṃ katvā māpesi, paṇḍukambalasilaṃ vā khuddakaṃ akāsīti na sallakkhetabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:513_14: Acinteyyo hi buddhavisayo. Evaṃ nisinno pana mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ
atk-s0401a:513_15: “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā”ti abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desesi.
atk-s0401a:514_0: Pāṭihāriyaṭṭhānepi sabbāpi dvādasayojanikā parisā anuruddhattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0401a:514_1: “kahaṃ, bhante, dasabalo gato”ti pucchi. Tāvatiṃsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vassaṃ
atk-s0401a:514_2: upagantvā abhidhammakathaṃ desetuṃ gatoti. Bhante, na mayaṃ satthāraṃ adisvā gamissāma.
atk-s0401a:514_3: Kadā satthā āgamissatīti satthu āgamanakālaṃ jānāthāti? Mahāmoggallānattherassa bhāraṃ
atk-s0401a:514_4: karotha, so buddhānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sāsanaṃ āharissatīti. Kiṃ pana therassa tattha
atk-s0401a:514_5: gantuṃ balaṃ natthīti? Atthi, visesavantānaṃ pana visesaṃ passantūti evamāha. Mahājano
atk-s0401a:514_6: mahāmoggallānattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthu sāsanaṃ gahetvā āgamanatthāya yāci. Thero
atk-s0401a:514_7: passanteyeva mahājane pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā antosinerunā gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0401a:514_8: āha – “bhante, mahājano tumhākaṃ dassanakāmo, āgamanadivasaṃ vo jānituṃ icchatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:514_9: Tena hi “ito temāsaccayena saṅkassanagaradvāre passathā”tissa vadehīti. Thero bhagavato
atk-s0401a:514_10: sāsanaṃ āharitvā mahājanassa kathesi. Mahājano tattheva temāsaṃ khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0401a:514_11: vasi. Cūḷaanāthapiṇḍiko dvādasayojanāya parisāya temāsaṃ yāgubhattaṃ ādāsi.
atk-s0401a:515_0: Satthāpi sattappakaraṇāni desetvā manussalokaṃ āgamanatthāya ākappaṃ dassesi. Sakko
atk-s0401a:515_1: devarājā vissakammaṃ āmantetvā tathāgatassa otaraṇatthāya sopānaṃ māpetuṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0401a:515_2: So ekato sovaṇṇamayaṃ ekato rajatamayaṃ sopānaṃ māpetvā majjhe maṇimayaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0401a:515_3: Satthā maṇimaye sopāne ṭhatvā “mahājano maṃ passatū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Attano ānubhāveneva
atk-s0401a:515_4: “mahājano avīcimahānirayaṃ passatū”tipi adhiṭṭhāsi. Nirayadassanena cassa uppannasaṃvegataṃ
atk-s0401a:515_5: ñatvā devalokaṃ dassesi. Athassa otarantassa mahābrahmā chattaṃ dhāresi, sakko devarājā
atk-s0401a:515_6: pattaṃ gaṇhi, suyāmo devarājā dibbaṃ vāḷabījaniṃ bīji, pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto
atk-s0401a:515_7: beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ samapaññāsāya mucchanāhi mucchitvā vādento purato otari. Buddhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:515_8: pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitakāle “ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ vandissāmi, ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ vandissāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:515_9: mahājano aṭṭhāsi. Saha mahāpathavīakkamanena pana bhagavato neva mahājano na asītimahāsāvakā
atk-s0401a:515_10: paṭhamakavandanaṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu, dhammasenāpati sāriputtattheroyeva pana sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:516_0: Atha satthā dvādasayojanāya parisāya antare “therassa paññānubhāvaṃ jānantū”ti puthujjanapañcakaṃ
atk-s0401a:516_1: pañhaṃ ārabhi. Paṭhamaṃ lokiyamahājano sallakkhessatīti puthujjanapañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0401a:516_2: Ye ye sallakkhiṃsu, te te kathayiṃsu. Dutiyaṃ puthujjanavisayaṃ atikkamitvā sotāpattimagge
atk-s0401a:516_3: pañhaṃ pucchi. Puthujjanā tuṇhī ahesuṃ, sotāpannāva kathayiṃsu. Tato sotāpannānaṃ
atk-s0401a:516_4: visayaṃ atikkamitvā sakadāgāmimagge pañhaṃ pucchi. Sotāpannā tuṇhī ahesuṃ, sakadāgāminova
atk-s0401a:516_5: kathayiṃsu. Tesampi visayaṃ atikkamitvā anāgāmimagge pañhaṃ pucchi. Sakadāgāmino
atk-s0401a:516_6: tuṇhī ahesuṃ, anāgāminova kathayiṃsu. Tesampi visayaṃ atikkamitvā arahattamagge pañhaṃ
atk-s0401a:516_7: pucchi. Anāgāmino tuṇhī ahesuṃ, arahantāva kathayiṃsu. Tato heṭṭhimakoṭito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:516_8: abhiññāte abhiññāte sāvake pucchi, te attano attano paṭisambhidāvisaye ṭhatvā kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:516_9: Atha mahāmoggallānaṃ pucchi, sesasāvakā tuṇhī ahesuṃ, therova kathesi. Tassāpi visayaṃ
atk-s0401a:516_10: atikkamitvā sāriputtattherassa visaye pañhaṃ pucchi. Mahāmoggallāno tuṇhī ahosi,
atk-s0401a:516_11: sāriputtattherova kathesi. Therassāpi visayaṃ atikkamitvā buddhavisaye pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0401a:516_12: Dhammasenāpati āvajjentopi passituṃ na sakkoti, puratthimapacchimuttaradakkhiṇā catasso
atk-s0401a:516_13: disā catasso anudisāti ito cito ca olokento pañhuppattiṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0401a:517_0: Satthā therassa kilamanabhāvaṃ jānitvā “sāriputto kilamati, nayamukhamassa dassessāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:517_1: “āgamehi tvaṃ, sāriputtā”ti vatvā “nāyaṃ tuyhaṃ visayo pañho, buddhānaṃ esa visayo
atk-s0401a:517_3: samanupassasī”ti āha. Thero “catumahābhūtikakāyapariggahaṃ me bhagavā ācikkhatī”ti
atk-s0401a:517_4: ñatvā “aññātaṃ bhagavā, aññātaṃ sugatā”ti āha. Etasmiṃ ṭhāne ayaṃ kathā udapādi –
atk-s0401a:517_5: mahāpañño vata, bho, sāriputtatthero, yatra hi nāma sabbehi anaññātaṃ pañhaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0401a:517_6: buddhehi ca dinnanaye ṭhatvā buddhavisaye pañhaṃ kathesi, iti therassa paññānubhāvo
atk-s0401a:517_7: yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ buddhānaṃ kittisaddena otthaṭaṃ, sabbaṃ ajjhottharitvā gatoti evaṃ
atk-s0401a:517_8: tāva thero aṭṭhuppattito mahāpaññatāya etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0401a:518: Kathaṃ āgamanato? Imissāyeva hi aṭṭhuppattiyā satthā āha – sāriputto na idāneva paññavā, atīte pañca jātisatāni isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvāpi mahāpaññova ahosi –
atk-s0401a:523_0: Evaṃ pabbajjaṃ upabrūhayamāno ekasmiṃ samaye bārāṇasiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatto. Tayo
atk-s0401a:523_1: vede uggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto “pabbajitvā ekaṃ mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0401a:523_2: cittaṃ uppādesi. Tasmiṃ kāle bodhisattopi kāsiraṭṭhe udiccabrāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatto
atk-s0401a:523_3: vuddhimanvāya uggahitasippo kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:523_4: pahāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā pañca abhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0401a:523_5: nibbattetvā vanamūlaphalāhāro himavantappadese vasati. Sopi māṇavo nikkhamitvā tasseva
atk-s0401a:523_6: santike pabbaji. Parivāro mahā ahosi pañcasatamattā isayo.
atk-s0401a:524_0: Athassa so jeṭṭhantevāsiko ekadesaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā loṇambilasevanatthaṃ manussapathaṃ
atk-s0401a:524_1: agamāsi. Tasmiṃ samaye bodhisatto tasmiṃyeva himavantappadese kālaṃ akāsi. Kālakiriyasamayeva
atk-s0401a:524_2: naṃ antevāsikā sannipatitvā pucchiṃsu – “atthi tumhehi koci viseso adhigato”ti. Bodhisatto
atk-s0401a:524_3: “natthi kiñcī”ti vatvā aparihīnajjhāno ābhassarabrahmaloke nibbatto. So kiñcāpi ākiñcaññāyatanassa
atk-s0401a:524_4: lābhī, bodhisattānaṃ pana arūpāvacare paṭisandhi nāma na hoti. Kasmā? Abhabbaṭṭhānattā.
atk-s0401a:524_5: Iti so arūpasamāpattilābhī samānopi rūpāvacare nibbatti. Antevāsikāpissa “ācariyo
atk-s0401a:524_6: ‘natthi kiñcī’ti āha, moghā tassa kālakiriyā”ti na kiñci sakkārasammānaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:524_7: Atha so jeṭṭhantevāsiko atikkante vassāvāse āgantvā “kahaṃ ācariyo”ti pucchi. Kālaṃ
atk-s0401a:524_8: katoti. Api nu ācariyena laddhaguṇaṃ pucchitthāti? Āma pucchimhāti. Kiṃ vadetīti?
atk-s0401a:524_9: Natthi kiñcīti. Mayampi “ācariyena laddhaguṇo nāma natthī”ti nāssa sakkārasammānaṃ
atk-s0401a:524_10: karimhāti. Tumhe bhāsitassa atthaṃ na jānittha, ācariyo ākiñcaññāyatanassa lābhīti.
atk-s0401a:525_0: Atha te jeṭṭhantevāsikassa kathaṃ na saddahiṃsu. So punappunaṃ kathentopi saddahāpetuṃ
atk-s0401a:525_1: nāsakkhi. Atha bodhisatto āvajjamāno “andhabālo mahājano mayhaṃ jeṭṭhantevāsikassa
atk-s0401a:525_2: kathaṃ na gaṇhāti, imaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti brahmalokato otaritvā assamapadamatthake
atk-s0401a:525_3: ṭhito ākāsagatova jeṭṭhantevāsikassa paññānubhāvaṃ vaṇṇetvā imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0401a:530_0: Evaṃ isigaṇaṃ saññāpetvā bodhisatto brahmalokameva gato. Sesaisigaṇopi aparihīnajjhāno
atk-s0401a:530_1: hutvā kālaṃ katvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo jāto. Tattha bodhisatto sabbaññutaṃ patto, jeṭṭhantevāsiko
atk-s0401a:530_2: sāriputtatthero jāto, sesā isayo buddhaparisā jātāti evaṃ atītepi sāriputto mahāpaññova
atk-s0401a:530_3: saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ jānituṃ samatthoti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:536: Imampi jātakaṃ kathesi. Tassa purimajātake vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:538: “Ye saññino tepi duggatā, yepi asaññino tepi duggatā;
atk-s0401a:539: Etaṃ ubhayaṃ vivajjaya, taṃ samāpattisukhaṃ anaṅgaṇa”nti. –
atk-s0401a:540: Imaṃ anaṅgaṇajātakaṃ kathesi. Ettha ca ācariyo kālaṃ karonto antevāsikehi pucchito “nevasaññī nāsaññī”ti āha. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:544_0: Idaṃ candābhajātakaṃ kathesi. Etthāpi ācariyo kālaṃ karonto antevāsikehi pucchito
atk-s0401a:544_1: “odātakasiṇaṃ candābhaṃ nāma, pītakasiṇaṃ sūriyābhaṃ nāmāti taṃ ubhayaṃ yo paññāya
atk-s0401a:544_2: gādhati pavisati pakkhandati, so avitakkena dutiyajjhānena ābhassarūpago hoti, tādiso
atk-s0401a:544_3: aha”nti sandhāya – “candābhaṃ sūriyābha”nti āha. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:547: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu.
atk-s0401a:551: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu.
atk-s0401a:556: Bahū hi phassā ahitā hitā ca,
atk-s0401a:559: Na hi cintāmayā bhogā, itthiyā purisassa vā.
atk-s0401a:571: Na cāpi me koci naṃ etadakkhā;
atk-s0401a:574_0: Imaṃ terasanipāte sarabhajātakañca kathesi. Imāni pana pañcapi jātakāni atītepi saṃkhittena
atk-s0401a:574_1: bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ mayhaṃ putto jānātīti satthārā dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa
atk-s0401a:574_2: paññānubhāvappakāsanatthameva kathitānīti evaṃ āgamanatopi thero mahāpaññatāya etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0401a:575: Kathaṃ ciṇṇavasitoti? Ciṇṇaṃ kiretaṃ therassa catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ kathento cattāri saccāni amuñcitvā kathetīti evaṃ ciṇṇavasitopi thero mahāpaññatāya etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0401a:576_0: Kathaṃ guṇātirekatoti? Ṭhapetvā hi dasabalaṃ añño koci ekasāvakopi mahāpaññatāya
atk-s0401a:576_1: dhammasenāpatinā sadiso nāma natthīti evaṃ guṇātirekatopi thero mahāpaññatāya etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0401a:577_0: Yathā ca sāriputtatthero, evaṃ mahāmoggallānattheropi sabbeheva catūhipi imehi kāraṇehi
atk-s0401a:577_1: etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhi. Kathaṃ? Thero hi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo nandopanandasadisampi
atk-s0401a:577_2: nāgarājānaṃ damesīti evaṃ tāva aṭṭhuppattito labhi. Na panesa idāneva mahiddhiko
atk-s0401a:577_3: mahānubhāvo, atīte pañca jātisatāni isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitopi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo ahosīti.
atk-s0401a:582_0: Evaṃ āgamanatopi labhi. Ciṇṇaṃ cetaṃ therassa nirayaṃ gantvā attano iddhibalena nirayasattānaṃ
atk-s0401a:582_1: assāsajananatthaṃ sītaṃ adhiṭṭhāya cakkamattaṃ padumaṃ māpetvā padumakaṇṇikāyaṃ nisīditvā
atk-s0401a:582_2: dhammakathaṃ katheti, devalokaṃ gantvā devasaṅghaṃ kammagatiṃ jānāpetvā saccakathaṃ
atk-s0401a:582_3: kathetīti evaṃ ciṇṇavasito labhi. Ṭhapetvā ca sammāsambuddhaṃ añño sāvako mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0401a:582_4: viya mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo natthīti evaṃ guṇātirekato labhi.
atk-s0401a:583_0: Yathā cesa, evaṃ mahākassapattheropi sabbehevimehi kāraṇehi etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0401a:583_1: Kathaṃ? Sammāsambuddho hi therassa tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ paccuggamanaṃ katvā tīhi ovādehi
atk-s0401a:583_2: upasampādetvā cīvaraṃ parivattetvā adāsi. Tasmiṃ samaye mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ
atk-s0401a:583_3: katvā kampi, mahājanassa abbhantare therassa kittisaddo ajjhottharitvā gato. Evaṃ
atk-s0401a:583_4: aṭṭhuppattito labhi. Na cesa idāneva dhutadharo, atīte pañca jātisatāni isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:588_0: Evaṃ āgamanatopi labhi. Ciṇṇaṃ cetaṃ therassa catuparisamajjhagato dhammaṃ kathento
atk-s0401a:588_1: dasa kathāvatthūni avijahitvāva kathetīti evaṃ ciṇṇavasito labhi. Ṭhapetvā ca sammāsambuddhaṃ
atk-s0401a:588_2: añño sāvako terasahi dhutaguṇehi mahākassapasadiso natthīti evaṃ guṇātirekato labhi.
atk-s0401a:588_3: Imināva niyāmena tesaṃ tesaṃ therānaṃ yathālābhato guṇe kittetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0401a:589_0: Guṇavaseneva hi sammāsambuddho yathā nāma rājā cakkavattī cakkaratanānubhāvena cakkavāḷagabbhe
atk-s0401a:589_1: rajjasiriṃ patvā “pattabbaṃ me pattaṃ, kiṃ me idāni mahājanena olokitenā”ti na appossukko
atk-s0401a:589_2: hutvā rajjasiriṃyeva anubhoti, kālena pana kālaṃ vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisīditvā niggahetabbe
atk-s0401a:589_3: niggaṇhāti, paggahetabbe paggaṇhāti, ṭhānantaresu ca ṭhapetabbayuttake ṭhānantaresu
atk-s0401a:589_4: ṭhapeti, evamevaṃ mahābodhimaṇḍe adhigatassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa ānubhāvena anuppattadhammarajjo
atk-s0401a:589_5: dhammarājāpi “kiṃ me idāni lokena olokitena, anuttaraṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ anubhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:589_6: appossukkataṃ anāpajjitvā catuparisamajjhe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ
atk-s0401a:589_7: brahmassaraṃ nicchāretvā dhammaṃ desayamāno niggahetabbayutte kaṇhadhamme puggale
atk-s0401a:589_8: sinerupāde pakkhipanto viya apāyabhayasantajjanena niggahetvā paggahetabbayutte kalyāṇadhamme
atk-s0401a:589_9: puggale ukkhipitvā bhavagge nisīdāpento viya paggaṇhitvā ṭhānantaresu ṭhapetabbayuttake
atk-s0401a:589_10: aññāsikoṇḍaññattherādayo sāvake yāthāvasarasaguṇavaseneva ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0401a:589_11: bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ, yadidaṃ aññāsikoṇḍaññotiādimāha.
atk-s0401a:591_0: Tattha etadagganti padaṃ vuttatthameva. Rattaññūnanti rattiyo jānantānaṃ. Ṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:591_1: hi sammāsambuddhaṃ añño sāvako aññāsikoṇḍaññattherato paṭhamataraṃ pabbajito nāma
atk-s0401a:591_2: natthīti pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya thero cirakālaṃ rattiyo jānātīti rattaññū. Sabbapaṭhamaṃ
atk-s0401a:591_3: dhammassa paṭividdhattā yadā tena dhammo paṭividdho, cirakālato paṭṭhāya taṃ rattiṃ
atk-s0401a:591_4: jānātītipi rattaññū. Apica khīṇāsavānaṃ rattidivasaparicchedo pākaṭova hoti, ayañca
atk-s0401a:591_5: paṭhamakhīṇāsavoti evampi rattaññūnaṃ sāvakānaṃ ayameva aggo purimakoṭibhūto seṭṭho.
atk-s0401a:592_0: Ettha ca yadidanti nipāto, tassa theraṃ avekkhitvā yo esoti, aggasaddaṃ avekkhitvā
atk-s0401a:592_1: yaṃ etanti attho. Aññāsikoṇḍaññoti ñātakoṇḍañño paṭividdhakoṇḍañño. Tenevāha – “aññāsi
atk-s0401a:592_2: vata, bho, koṇḍañño, aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍaññoti. Iti hidaṃ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa
atk-s0401a:593_0: Ayaṃ pana thero katarabuddhakāle pubbapatthanaṃ abhinīhāraṃ akāsi, kadā pabbajito,
atk-s0401a:593_1: kadānena paṭhamaṃ dhammo adhigato, kadā ṭhānantare ṭhapitoti iminā nayena sabbesupi
atk-s0401a:594_0: Tattha imassa tāva therassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ito kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0401a:594_1: padumuttaro nāma buddho loke udapādi, tassa paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇassa mahābodhipallaṅkato
atk-s0401a:594_2: uṭṭhahantassa mahāpathaviyaṃ ṭhapetuṃ pāde ukkhittamatte pādasampaṭicchanatthaṃ mahantaṃ
atk-s0401a:594_3: padumapupphaṃ uggañchi, tassa dhurapattāni navutihatthāni honti, kesaraṃ tiṃsahatthaṃ,
atk-s0401a:594_4: kaṇṇikā dvādasahatthā, pādena patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ ekādasahatthaṃ. Tassa pana bhagavato
atk-s0401a:594_5: sarīraṃ aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ ahosi. Tassa padumakaṇṇikāya dakkhiṇapāde patiṭṭhahante
atk-s0401a:594_6: mahātumbamattā reṇu uggantvā sarīraṃ okiramānā otari, vāmapādassa ṭhapanakālepi tathārūpaṃyeva
atk-s0401a:594_7: padumaṃ uggantvā pādaṃ sampaṭicchi. Tatopi uggantvā vuttappamāṇāva reṇu sarīraṃ okiri.
atk-s0401a:594_8: Taṃ pana reṇuṃ abhibhavamānā tassa bhagavato sarīrappabhā nikkhamitvā yantanāḷikāya
atk-s0401a:594_9: vissaṭṭhasuvaṇṇarasadhārā viya samantā dvādasayojanaṭṭhānaṃ ekobhāsaṃ akāsi. Tatiyapāduddharaṇakāle
atk-s0401a:594_10: pathamuggataṃ padumaṃ antaradhāyi, pādasampaṭicchanatthaṃ aññaṃ navaṃ padumaṃ uggañchi.
atk-s0401a:594_11: Imināva niyāmena yattha yattha gantukāmo hoti, tattha tatthāpi mahāpadumaṃ uggacchati.
atk-s0401a:595_0: Evaṃ so bhagavā loke uppajjitvā bhikkhusatasahassaparivāro mahājanassa saṅgahatthāya
atk-s0401a:595_1: gāmanigamarājadhānīsu bhikkhāya caranto haṃsavatīnagaraṃ sampāpuṇi. Tassa āgatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:595_2: sutvā pitā mahārājā paccuggamanaṃ akāsi. Satthā tassa dhammakathaṃ kathesi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0401a:595_3: keci sotāpannā keci sakadāgāmī keci anāgāmī keci arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Rājā svātanāya
atk-s0401a:595_4: dasabalaṃ nimantetvā punadivase kālaṃ ārocāpetvā bhikkhusatasahassaparivārassa bhagavato
atk-s0401a:595_5: sakanivesane mahādānaṃ adāsi. Satthā bhattānumodanaṃ katvā vihārameva gato. Teneva
atk-s0401a:595_6: niyāmena punadivase nāgarā, punadivase rājāti dīghamaddhānaṃ dānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:596_0: Tasmiṃ kāle ayaṃ thero haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbatto. Ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0401a:596_1: buddhānaṃ dhammadesanākāle haṃsavatīnagaravāsino gandhamālādihatthe yena buddho,
atk-s0401a:596_2: yena dhammo, yena saṅgho, tanninne tappoṇe tappabbhāre gacchante disvā tena mahājanena
atk-s0401a:596_3: saddhiṃ dhammadesanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Tasmiñca samaye padumuttaro bhagavā attano sāsane
atk-s0401a:596_4: paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. So kulaputto taṃ
atk-s0401a:596_5: kāraṇaṃ sutvā “mahā vatāyaṃ bhikkhu, ṭhapetvā kira buddhaṃ añño iminā paṭhamataraṃ
atk-s0401a:596_6: paṭividdhadhammo nāma natthi. Aho vatāhampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0401a:596_7: dhammaṃ paṭivijjhanasamattho bhaveyya”nti cintetvā desanāpariyosāne bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0401a:596_8: “sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantesi. Satthā adhivāsesi.
atk-s0401a:597_0: So bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sakanivesanaṃ gantvā sabbarattiṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:597_1: nisajjanaṭṭhānaṃ gandhadāmamālādāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0401a:597_2: paṭiyādāpetvā tassā rattiyā accayena sakanivesane bhikkhusatasahassaparivārassa bhagavato
atk-s0401a:597_4: ticīvarapahonake vaṅgapaṭṭe tathāgatassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā cintesi – “nāhaṃ parittakassa
atk-s0401a:597_5: ṭhānassatthāya carāmi, mahantaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthento carāmi, na kho pana sakkā ekameva
atk-s0401a:597_6: divasaṃ dānaṃ datvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetu”nti “anupaṭipāṭiyā satta divasāni mahādānaṃ
atk-s0401a:597_7: datvā patthessāmī”ti. So teneva niyāmena satta divasāni mahādānaṃ datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne
atk-s0401a:597_8: dussakoṭṭhāgāraṃ vivarāpetvā uttamasukhumavatthaṃ buddhānaṃ pādamūle ṭhapetvā bhikkhusatasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:597_9: ticīvarena acchādetvā tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, yo tumhehi ito sattadivasamatthake
atk-s0401a:597_10: bhikkhu etadagge ṭhapito, ahampi so bhikkhu viya anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa sāsane
atk-s0401a:597_11: pabbajitvā paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samattho bhaveyya”nti vatvā satthu pādamūle
atk-s0401a:598_0: Satthā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “iminā kulaputtena mahāadhikāro kato, samijjhissati nu
atk-s0401a:598_1: kho etassa ayaṃ patthanā no”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā āvajjento “samijjhissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:598_2: passi. Buddhānañhi atītaṃ vā anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā ārabbha āvajjentānaṃ āvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:598_3: nāma natthi, anekakappakoṭisatasahassantarampi ca atītaṃ vā anāgataṃ vā cakkavāḷasahassantarampi
atk-s0401a:598_4: ca paccuppannaṃ vā āvajjanapaṭibaddhameva manasikārapaṭibaddhameva hoti. Evaṃ appaṭivattiyena
atk-s0401a:598_5: ñāṇena so bhagavā idaṃ addasa – “anāgate satasahassakappapariyosāne gotamo nāma buddho
atk-s0401a:598_6: loke uppajjissati, tadā imassa patthanā samijjhissatī”ti. Atha naṃ evamāha – “ambho,
atk-s0401a:598_7: kulaputta, anāgate satasahassakappapariyosāne gotamo nāma buddho loke uppajjissati,
atk-s0401a:598_9: aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sahassanayasampanne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahissasī”ti.
atk-s0401a:599_0: Iti satthā taṃ kulaputtaṃ byākaritvā caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni desetvā anupādisesāya
atk-s0401a:599_1: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Tassa parinibbutassa sarīraṃ suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekagghanaṃ
atk-s0401a:599_2: ahosi, sarīracetiyaṃ panassubbedhena sattayojanikaṃ akaṃsu. Iṭṭhakā suvaṇṇamayā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0401a:599_3: haritālamanosilāya mattikākiccaṃ, telena udakakiccaṃ sādhayiṃsu. Buddhānaṃ dharamānakāle
atk-s0401a:599_4: sarīrappabhā dvādasayojanikaṃ phari, parinibbutānaṃ pana tesaṃ rasmi nikkhamitvā
atk-s0401a:600_0: Ayaṃ seṭṭhi buddhānaṃ sarīracetiyaṃ parivāretvā sahassaratanagghiyāni kāresi. Cetiyapatiṭṭhāpanadivase
atk-s0401a:600_1: antocetiye ratanagharaṃ kāresi. So vassasatasahassaṃ mahantaṃ dānādimayaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:600_2: katvā tato cuto devapure nibbatti. Tassa devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsarantasseva navanavuti
atk-s0401a:600_3: kappasahassāni nava kappasatāni nava ca kappā samatikkantā. Ettakassa kālassa accayena
atk-s0401a:600_4: ito ekanavutikappamatthake ayaṃ kulaputto bandhumatīnagarassa dvārasamīpe gāme kuṭumbiyagehe
atk-s0401a:600_5: nibbatto. Tassa mahākāloti nāmaṃ ahosi, kaniṭṭhabhātā panassa cūḷakālo nāma.
atk-s0401a:601_0: Tasmiṃ samaye vipassī bodhisatto tusitapurā cavitvā bandhumatīnagare bandhumassa
atk-s0401a:601_1: rañño aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbatto. Anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā dhammadesanatthāya
atk-s0401a:601_2: mahābrahmunā āyācito “kassa nu kho paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti cintetvā attano
atk-s0401a:601_3: kaniṭṭhaṃ khaṇḍaṃ nāma rājakumāraṃ tissañca purohitaputtaṃ “paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0401a:601_4: samatthā”ti disvā “tesañca dhammaṃ desessāmi, pitu ca saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti bodhimaṇḍato
atk-s0401a:601_5: ākāseneva āgantvā kheme migadāye otiṇṇo te pakkosāpetvā dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0401a:601_6: te dvepi janā caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassehi saddhiṃ arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:602_0: Athāparepi bodhisattakāle anupabbajitā caturāsītisahassā kulaputtā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā
atk-s0401a:602_1: satthu santikaṃ āgantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Satthā taṃ
atk-s0401a:602_2: tattheva khaṇḍattheraṃ aggasāvakaṭṭhāne, tissattheraṃ dutiyasāvakaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:602_3: Rājāpi taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “puttaṃ passissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0401a:602_4: tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ svātanāya nimantetvā abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:603_0: So pāsādavaragato nisīditvā cintesi – “mayhaṃ jeṭṭhaputto nikkhamitvā buddho jāto,
atk-s0401a:603_1: dutiyaputto me aggasāvako, purohitaputto dutiyasāvako. Ime ca avasesabhikkhū gihikālepi
atk-s0401a:603_2: mayhaṃ puttameva parivāretvā vicariṃsu, ime pubbepi dānipi mayhameva bhārā, ahameva
atk-s0401a:603_3: te catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmi, aññesaṃ okāsaṃ na dassāmī”ti. Vihāradvārakoṭṭhakato
atk-s0401a:603_4: paṭṭhāya yāva rājagehadvārā ubhosu passesu khadirapākāraṃ kāretvā vatthehi paṭicchādāpetvā
atk-s0401a:603_6: kāretvā heṭṭhābhūmiṃ vicittattharaṇehi santharāpetvā anto ubhosu passesu mālāgacchakesu
atk-s0401a:603_7: puṇṇaghaṭe sakalamaggavāsatthāya ca gandhantaresu pupphāni pupphantaresu gandhe ca
atk-s0401a:603_8: ṭhapāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi. Bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto antosāṇiyāva
atk-s0401a:603_9: rājagehaṃ gantvā bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ paccāgacchati. Añño koci daṭṭhumpi na
atk-s0401a:603_10: labhati, kuto pana bhikkhaṃ vā dātuṃ pūjaṃ vā kātuṃ.
atk-s0401a:604_0: Nāgarā cintesuṃ – “ajja satthu loke uppannassa sattamāsādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni,
atk-s0401a:604_1: mayañca daṭṭhumpi na labhāma, pageva bhikkhaṃ vā dātuṃ pūjaṃ vā kātuṃ dhammaṃ vā
atk-s0401a:604_2: sotuṃ. Rājā ‘mayhaṃ eva buddho, mayhaṃ dhammo, mayhaṃ saṅgho’ti mamāyitvā sayameva
atk-s0401a:604_3: upaṭṭhahati. Satthā ca uppajjamāno sadevakassa lokassa atthāya uppanno, na raññoyeva
atk-s0401a:604_4: atthāya. Na hi raññoyeva nirayo uṇho, aññesaṃ nīluppalavanasadiso. Tasmā rājānaṃ
atk-s0401a:604_5: evaṃ vadāma ‘sace no satthāraṃ deti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce deti, raññā saddhiṃ yujjhitvā
atk-s0401a:604_6: saṅghaṃ gahetvā dānādīni puññāni karoma. Na sakkā kho pana suddhanāgareheva evaṃ
atk-s0401a:604_7: kātuṃ, ekaṃ jeṭṭhakapurisampi gaṇhāmā”’ti senāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa tamatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:604_8: ārocetvā “sāmi kiṃ amhākaṃ pakkho hohisi, udāhu rañño”ti āhaṃsu. So āha – “tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:604_9: pakkho homi, apica kho pana paṭhamadivaso mayhaṃ dātabbo”ti. Te sampaṭicchiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:605_0: So rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “nāgarā, deva, tumhākaṃ kupitā”ti āha. Kimatthaṃ tātāti?
atk-s0401a:605_1: Satthāraṃ kira tumheva upaṭṭhahatha, amhe na labhāmāti. Sace idānipi labhanti, na
atk-s0401a:605_2: kuppanti. Alabhantā tumhehi saddhiṃ yujjhitukāmā, devāti. Yujjhāmi, tāta, na bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0401a:605_3: demīti. Deva, tumhākaṃ dāsā tumhehi saddhiṃ yujjhāmāti vadanti, tumhe kaṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0401a:605_4: yujjhissathāti? Nanu tvaṃ senāpatīti? Nāgarehi vinā asamattho ahaṃ, devāti. Tato
atk-s0401a:605_5: rājā “balavanto nāgarā, senāpatipi tesaṃyeva pakkho”ti ñatvā “aññāni sattamāsādhikāni
atk-s0401a:605_6: satta saṃvaccharāni mayhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ dentū”ti āha. Nāgarā na sampaṭicchiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:605_7: Rājā “chabbassāni pañcavassānī”ti evaṃ hāpetvā aññe satta divase yāci. Nāgarā “atikakkhaḷaṃ
atk-s0401a:605_8: dāni raññā saddhiṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti anujāniṃsu. Rājā sattamāsādhikānaṃ sattannaṃ
atk-s0401a:605_9: saṃvaccharānaṃ sajjitaṃ dānamukhaṃ sattannameva divasānaṃ sajjetvā cha divase kesañci
atk-s0401a:605_10: apassantānaṃyeva dānaṃ datvā sattame divase nāgare pakkosāpetvā “sakkhissatha, tātā,
atk-s0401a:605_11: evarūpaṃ dānaṃ dātu”nti āha. Tepi “nanu amheyeva nissāyetaṃ devassa uppanna”nti vatvā
atk-s0401a:605_12: “sakkhissāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Rājā piṭṭhihatthena assūni puñchamāno bhagavantaṃ vanditvā,
atk-s0401a:605_13: “bhante, aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassaṃ aññassu bhāraṃ akatvā yāvajīvaṃ catūhi paccayehi
atk-s0401a:605_14: upaṭṭhahissāmīti cintesiṃ, nāgarānaṃ dāni me anuññātaṃ, nāgarā hi ‘mayaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ
atk-s0401a:605_15: na labhāmā’ti bhagavā kuppanti. Sveva paṭṭhāya tesaṃ anuggahaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:606_0: Atha dutiyadivase senāpati mahādānaṃ adāsi. Tato nāgarā raññā katasakkārato uttaritaraṃ
atk-s0401a:606_1: sakkārasammānaṃ katvā dānaṃ adaṃsu. Eteneva niyāmena sakalanagarassa paṭipāṭiyā gatāya
atk-s0401a:606_2: dvāragāmavāsino sakkārasammānaṃ sajjayiṃsu. Mahākālakuṭumbiko cūḷakālaṃ āha – “dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:606_3: sakkārasammānaṃ sveva amhākaṃ pāpuṇāti, kiṃ sakkāraṃ karissāmā”ti? Tvameva bhātika
atk-s0401a:606_4: jānāhīti. Sace mayhaṃ ruciyā karosi, amhākaṃ soḷasakarīsamattesu khettesu gahitagabbhā
atk-s0401a:606_5: sāliyo atthi. Sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā ādāya buddhānaṃ anucchavikaṃ pacāpemāti. Evaṃ
atk-s0401a:606_6: kayiramāne kassaci upakāro na hoti, tasmā netaṃ mayhaṃ ruccatīti. Sace tvaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0401a:606_7: na karosi, ahaṃ mayhaṃ santakaṃ mamāyituṃ labhāmīti soḷasakarīsamattaṃ khettaṃ majjhe
atk-s0401a:606_8: bhinditvā aṭṭhakarīsaṭṭhāne sīmaṃ ṭhapetvā sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā ādāya asambhinne
atk-s0401a:606_9: khīre pacāpetvā catumadhuraṃ pakkhipitvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa adāsi. Kuṭumbikassa
atk-s0401a:606_10: kho gabbhaṃ phāletvā gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ puna pūrati. Puthukakāle puthukaggaṃ nāma
atk-s0401a:606_11: adāsi, gāmavāsīhi saddhiṃ aggasassaṃ nāma adāsi, lāyane lāyanaggaṃ, veṇikaraṇe veṇaggaṃ,
atk-s0401a:606_12: kalāpādīsu kalāpaggaṃ khalaggaṃ khalabhaṇḍaggaṃ koṭṭhagganti. Evaṃ so ekasasseva
atk-s0401a:606_13: nava vāre aggadānaṃ adāsi. Tampi sassaṃ atirekaṃ uṭṭhānasampannaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0401a:607_0: Yāva buddhā dharati, yāva ca saṅgho dharati, eteneva niyāmena kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:607_1: tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devesu ceva manussesu ca saṃsaranto ekanavutikappe
atk-s0401a:607_2: sampattiṃ anubhavitvā amhākaṃ satthu loke uppannakāle kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre
atk-s0401a:607_3: doṇavatthubrāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase koṇḍaññamāṇavoti
atk-s0401a:607_4: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vuḍḍhimanvāya tayo vede uggahetvā lakkhaṇamantānaṃ pāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:607_5: Tena samayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto tusitapurā cavitvā kapilavatthupure nibbatti. Tassa
atk-s0401a:607_6: nāmaggahaṇadivase aṭṭhuttaraṃ brāhmaṇasataṃ ahatavatthehi acchādetvā appodakaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:607_7: pāyetvā tesaṃ antare aṭṭha jane uccinitvā mahātale nisīdāpetvā alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0401a:607_8: bodhisattaṃ dukūlacumbaṭake nipajjāpetvā lakkhaṇapariggahaṇatthaṃ tesaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:607_9: ānayiṃsu. Dhurāsane nisinnabrāhmaṇo mahāpurisassa sarīrasampattiṃ oloketvā dve aṅguliyo
atk-s0401a:607_10: ukkhipi. Evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā satta janā ukkhipiṃsu. Tesaṃ pana sabbanavako koṇḍaññamāṇavo,
atk-s0401a:607_11: so bodhisattassa lakkhaṇavaranipphattiṃ oloketvā “agāramajjhe ṭhānakāraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0401a:607_12: ekantenesa vivaṭṭacchado buddho bhavissatī”ti ekameva aṅguliṃ ukkhipi. Itare pana
atk-s0401a:607_13: satta janā “sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasissati, rājā bhavissati cakkavattī. Sace pabbajissati,
atk-s0401a:607_14: buddho bhavissatī”ti dve gatiyo disvā dve aṅguliyo ukkhipiṃsu. Ayaṃ pana koṇḍañño
atk-s0401a:607_15: katādhikāro pacchimabhavikasatto paññāya itare satta jane abhibhavitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi
atk-s0401a:607_16: samannāgatassa agāramajjhe ṭhānakaraṇaṃ nāma natthi, nissaṃsayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:607_17: ekameva gatiṃ addasa, tasmā ekaṃ aṅguliṃ ukkhipi. Tato brāhmaṇā attano gharāni gantvā
atk-s0401a:607_18: putte āmantayiṃsu – “tātā, amhe mahallakā, suddhodanamahārājassa puttaṃ sabbaññutappattaṃ
atk-s0401a:607_19: mayaṃ sambhāveyyāma vā no vā. Tumhe tasmiṃ kumāre sabbaññutaṃ patte tassa sāsane pabbajeyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0401a:608_0: Suddhodanamahārājāpi bodhisattassa dhātiyo ādiṃ katvā parihāraṃ upaṭṭhapento bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0401a:608_1: vuddhiṃ āpādesi. Mahāsattopi vuddhippatto devo viya sampattiṃ anubhavitvā paripakke
atk-s0401a:608_2: ñāṇe kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā rāhulakumārassa jātadivase channasahāyo
atk-s0401a:608_3: kaṇḍakaṃ āruyha devatāhi vivaṭena dvārena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā teneva rattibhāgena
atk-s0401a:608_4: tīṇi rajjāni atikkamitvā anomānadītīre pabbajitvā ghaṭikāramahābrahmunā ābhate arahaddhaje
atk-s0401a:608_5: gahitamatteyeva vassasaṭṭhikatthero viya pāsādikena iriyāpathena rājagahaṃ patvā
atk-s0401a:608_6: tattha piṇḍāya caritvā paṇḍavapabbatacchāyāya piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā raññā māgadhena
atk-s0401a:608_7: rajjasiriyā nimantiyamānopi taṃ paṭikkhipitvā anukkamena uruvelaṃ gantvā “ramaṇīyo
atk-s0401a:608_8: vata ayaṃ bhūmibhāgo, alaṃ vatidaṃ kulaputtassa padhānatthikassa padhānāyā”ti padhānābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0401a:609_0: Tena samayena itare satta brāhmaṇā yathākammaṃ gatā, sabbadaharo pana lakkhaṇapariggāhako
atk-s0401a:609_1: koṇḍaññamāṇavo arogo. So “mahāpuriso pabbajito”ti sutvā tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ putte upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0401a:609_2: evamāha – “siddhatthakumāro kira pabbajito. So hi nissaṃsayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0401a:609_3: Sace tumhākaṃ pitaro arogā assu, ajja nikkhamitvā pabbajeyyuṃ. Sace tumhepi icchatha,
atk-s0401a:609_4: etha mayaṃ taṃ mahāpurisamanupabbajissāmā”ti. Te sabbe ekacchandā bhavituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:609_5: Tayo janā na pabbajiṃsu, koṇḍaññabrāhmaṇaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā itare cattāro pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:609_6: Ime pañca pabbajitvā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu bhikkhāya carantā bodhisattassa santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:609_7: agamiṃsu. Te chabbassāni bodhisatte mahāpadhānaṃ padahante “idāni buddho bhavissati
atk-s0401a:609_8: idāni buddho bhavissatī”ti mahāsattaṃ upaṭṭhahamānā santikāvacarāvassa ahesuṃ. Yadā
atk-s0401a:609_9: pana bodhisatto ekatilataṇḍulādīhi vītināmentopi dukkarakārikāya ariyadhammapaṭivedhassa
atk-s0401a:609_10: abhāvaṃ ñatvā oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āhari, tadā te pakkamitvā isipatanaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:610_0: Atha bodhisatto oḷārikāhāraparibhogena chavimaṃsalohitapāripūriṃ katvā visākhapuṇṇamadivase
atk-s0401a:610_1: sujātāya dinnaṃ varabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ nadiyā paṭisotaṃ khipitvā “ajja
atk-s0401a:610_2: buddho bhavissāmī”ti katasanniṭṭhāno sāyanhasamaye kālena nāgarājena anekehi thutisatehi
atk-s0401a:610_3: abhitthaviyamāno mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha acalaṭṭhāne pācīnalokadhātuabhimukho pallaṅkena
atk-s0401a:610_4: nisīditvā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya sūriye dharamāneyeva mārabalaṃ
atk-s0401a:610_5: vidhamitvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā
atk-s0401a:610_6: paccūsakālasamanantare paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā anulomapaṭilomaṃ paccayākāravaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0401a:610_7: sammasanto sabbabuddhehi paṭividdhaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā nibbānārammaṇāya
atk-s0401a:611_0: Eteneva upāyena sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe viharitvā rājāyatanamūle madhupiṇḍikabhojanaṃ
atk-s0401a:611_1: paribhuñjitvā puna ajapālanigrodhamūlaṃ āgantvā tattha nisinno dhammagambhīrataṃ
atk-s0401a:611_2: paccavekkhitvā appossukkatāya citte namante mahābrahmunā yācito buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ
atk-s0401a:611_3: volokento tikkhindriyādibhede satte disvā mahābrahmuno dhammadesanāya paṭiññaṃ datvā
atk-s0401a:611_4: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti āḷārudakānaṃ kālakatabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0401a:611_5: puna cintento “bahūpakārā kho pana me pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū, ye maṃ padhānapahitattaṃ
atk-s0401a:611_6: upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti
atk-s0401a:611_7: cittaṃ uppādesi. Idaṃ pana sabbameva buddhānaṃ parivitakkamattameva, ṭhapetvā pana
atk-s0401a:611_8: koṇḍaññabrāhmaṇaṃ añño koci paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0401a:611_9: Sopi etadatthameva kappasatasahassaṃ adhikārakammaṃ akāsi, buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0401a:612_0: Atha satthā pattacīvaramādāya anupubbena isipatanaṃ gantvā yena pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū,
atk-s0401a:612_1: tenupasaṅkami. Te tathāgataṃ āgacchantaṃ disvāva attano katikāya saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:612_2: Eko pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesi, eko āsanaṃ paññāpesi, eko pādodakaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0401a:612_3: eko pāde dhovi, eko tālavaṇṭaṃ gahetvā bījamāno ṭhito. Evaṃ tesu vattaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0401a:612_4: santike nisinnesu koṇḍaññattheraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā satthā anuttaraṃ teparivaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0401a:612_5: dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṃ ārabhi. Manussaparisā pañca janāva ahesuṃ, devaparisā
atk-s0401a:612_6: aparicchinnā. Desanāpariyosāne koṇḍaññatthero aṭṭhārasahi mahābrahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:612_7: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito. Atha satthā “mayā dukkarasatābhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭhamameva
atk-s0401a:612_8: aññāsīti aññāsikoṇḍañño nāma aya”nti theraṃ ālapanto “aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍañño,
atk-s0401a:612_9: aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍañño”ti āha. Tassa tadeva nāmaṃ jātaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “iti hidaṃ
atk-s0401a:613_0: Iti thero āsāḷhipuṇṇamāyaṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito, pāṭipadadivase bhaddiyatthero,
atk-s0401a:613_1: dutiyapakkhadivase vappatthero, tatiyapakkhadivase mahānāmatthero, pakkhassa catutthiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:613_2: assajitthero sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito. Pañcamiyā pana pakkhassa anattalakkhaṇasuttantadesanāpariyosāne
atk-s0401a:614_0: Tena kho pana samayena cha loke arahanto honti. Tato paṭṭhāya satthā yasadārakappamukhe
atk-s0401a:614_1: pañcapaññāsa purise, kappāsiyavanasaṇḍe tiṃsamatte bhaddavaggiye, gayāsīse piṭṭhipāsāṇe
atk-s0401a:614_2: sahassamatte purāṇajaṭileti evaṃ mahājanaṃ ariyabhūmiṃ otāretvā bimbisārappamukhāni
atk-s0401a:614_3: ekādasanahutāni sotāpattiphale, ekaṃ nahutaṃ saraṇattaye patiṭṭhāpetvā jambudīpatale
atk-s0401a:614_4: sāsanaṃ pupphitaphalitaṃ katvā sakalajambudīpamaṇḍalaṃ kāsāvapajjotaṃ isivātapaṭivātaṃ
atk-s0401a:614_5: karonto ekasmiṃ samaye jetavanamahāvihāraṃ patvā tattha vasanto bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe
atk-s0401a:614_7: antare mama putto koṇḍañño aggo”ti dassetuṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:615_0: Theropi dve aggasāvake attano nipaccakāraṃ karonte disvā buddhānaṃ santikā apakkamitukāmo
atk-s0401a:615_1: hutvā “puṇṇamāṇavo pabbajitvā sāsane aggadhammakathiko bhavissatī”ti disvā doṇavatthubrāhmaṇagāmaṃ
atk-s0401a:615_2: gantvā attano bhāgineyyaṃ puṇṇamāṇavaṃ pabbājetvā “ayaṃ buddhānaṃ santike vasissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:615_3: tassa buddhānaṃ antevāsikabhāvaṃ katvā sayaṃ dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “bhagavā mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:615_4: gāmantasenāsanaṃ asappāyaṃ, ākiṇṇo viharituṃ na sakkomi, chaddantadahaṃ gantvā vasissāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:615_5: bhagavantaṃ anujānāpetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā satthāraṃ vanditvā chaddantadahaṃ gantvā chaddantahatthikulaṃ
atk-s0401a:615_6: nissāya dvādasa vassāni vītināmetvā tattheva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0401a:617: 189-190. Dutiyatatiyesu mahāpaññānanti mahatiyā paññāya samannāgatānaṃ. Iddhimantānanti iddhiyā sampannānaṃ. Sāriputto moggallānoti tesaṃ therānaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0401a:618_0: Imesampi pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ito satasahassakappādhike asaṅkhyeyyakappamatthake
atk-s0401a:618_1: sāriputto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti, nāmena saradamāṇavo nāma ahosi. Moggallāno
atk-s0401a:618_2: gahapatimahāsālakule nibbatti, nāmena sirivaḍḍhanakuṭumbiyo nāma ahosi. Te ubhopi
atk-s0401a:618_3: sahapaṃsukīḷitāva sahāyakā ahesuṃ. Saradamāṇavo pitu accayena kulasantakaṃ mahādhanaṃ
atk-s0401a:618_4: paṭipajjitvā ekadivasaṃ rahogato cintesi – “ahaṃ idhalokattabhāvameva jānāmi, no
atk-s0401a:618_5: paralokattabhāvaṃ, jātasattānañca maraṇaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ, mayā ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0401a:618_6: mokkhadhammagavesanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So sahāyakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “samma sirivaḍḍhana,
atk-s0401a:618_7: ahaṃ pabbajitvā mokkhadhammaṃ gavesissāmi, tvaṃ mayā saddhiṃ pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī”ti.
atk-s0401a:618_8: Na sakkhissāmi, samma, tvaṃyeva pabbajāhīti. So cintesi – “paralokaṃ gacchantā sahāye
atk-s0401a:618_9: vā ñātimitte vā gahetvā gatā nāma natthi, attanā kataṃ attanova hotī”ti. Tato ratanakoṭṭhāgāraṃ
atk-s0401a:618_10: vivarāpetvā kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā pabbatapādaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0401a:618_11: isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Tassa eko dve tayoti evaṃ anupabbajjaṃ pabbajitā catusattatisahassamattā
atk-s0401a:618_12: jaṭilā ahesuṃ. So pañcābhiññā aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā tesampi jaṭilānaṃ
atk-s0401a:618_13: kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi. Tepi sabbe pañca abhiññā aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:619_0: Tena samayena anomadassī nāma buddho loke udapādi. Nagaraṃ candavatī nāma ahosi,
atk-s0401a:619_1: pitā yasavanto nāma khattiyo, mātā yasodharā nāma devī, bodhi ajjunarukkho, nisabhatthero
atk-s0401a:619_2: ca anomatthero cāti dve aggasāvakā, varuṇatthero nāma upaṭṭhāko, sundarā ca sumanā
atk-s0401a:619_3: cāti dve aggasāvikā, āyu vassasatasahassaṃ ahosi, sarīraṃ aṭṭhapaññāsahatthubbedhaṃ,
atk-s0401a:620_0: Athekadivasaṃ paccūsakāle mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento saradatāpasaṃ
atk-s0401a:620_1: disvā “ajja mayhaṃ saradatāpasassa santikaṃ gatapaccayena dhammadesanā ca mahatī
atk-s0401a:620_2: bhavissati, so ca aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthessati, tassa sahāyako sirivaḍḍhanakuṭumbiyo
atk-s0401a:620_3: dutiyasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ, desanāpariyosāne cassa parivārā catusattatisahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:620_4: pāpuṇissanti, mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attano pattacīvaramādāya aññaṃ kañci
atk-s0401a:620_5: anāmantetvā sīho viya ekacaro hutvā saradatāpasassa antevāsikesu phalāphalatthāya
atk-s0401a:620_6: gatesu “buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū”ti tassa passantasseva saradatāpasassa ākāsato otaritvā
atk-s0401a:620_7: pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi. Saradatāpaso buddhānubhāvaṃ ceva sarīrasampattiṃ cassa disvā
atk-s0401a:620_8: lakkhaṇamante sammasitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato nāma agāramajjhe vasanto rājā
atk-s0401a:620_9: hoti cakkavattī, pabbajjanto loke vivaṭṭacchado sabbaññu buddho hoti, ayaṃ puriso
atk-s0401a:620_10: nissaṃsayaṃ buddho”ti jānitvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā āsanaṃ
atk-s0401a:620_11: paññāpetvā adāsi. Nisīdi bhagavā paññattāsane. Saradatāpasopi attano anucchavikaṃ
atk-s0401a:621_0: Tasmiṃ samaye catusattatisahassajaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni phalāphalāni gahetvā
atk-s0401a:621_1: ācariyassa santikaṃ sampattā buddhānañceva ācariyassa ca nisinnāsanaṃ oloketvā āhaṃsu
atk-s0401a:621_2: – “ācariya, mayaṃ ‘imasmiṃ loke tumhehi mahantataro natthī’ti vicarāma, ayaṃ pana
atk-s0401a:621_3: puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti. Tātā, kiṃ vadatha? Sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ
atk-s0401a:621_4: sineruṃ samaṃ kātuṃ icchatha, sabbaññubuddhena saddhiṃ mayhaṃ upamaṃ mā karittha
atk-s0401a:621_5: puttakāti. Atha te tāpasā “sace ayaṃ ittarasatto abhavissa, na amhākaṃ ācariyo evarūpaṃ
atk-s0401a:621_6: upamaṃ āhareyya, yāva mahā vatāyaṃ puriso”ti sabbeva pādesu nipatitvā sirasā vandiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:622_0: Atha ne ācariyo āha – “tātā, amhākaṃ buddhānaṃ anucchaviko deyyadhammo natthi, satthā
atk-s0401a:622_1: ca bhikkhācāravelāya idhāgato, mayaṃ yathābalaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dassāma. Tumhe yaṃ yaṃ
atk-s0401a:622_2: paṇītaṃ phalāphalaṃ, taṃ taṃ āharathā”ti. Āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā sayaṃ tathāgatassa
atk-s0401a:622_3: patte patiṭṭhāpesi. Satthārā ca phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:622_4: Tāpaso udakampi sayameva parissāvetvā adāsi. Tato bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā hatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:622_5: dhovitvā nisinne satthari sabbe antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0401a:622_6: kathento nisīdi. Satthā “dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti cintesi.
atk-s0401a:622_7: Te satthu cittaṃ ñatvā satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivārā āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:623_0: Tato saradatāpaso antevāsike āmantesi – “tātā, buddhānaṃ nisinnāsanampi nīcaṃ, samaṇasatasahassānampi
atk-s0401a:623_1: āsanaṃ natthi, tumhehi ajja uḷāraṃ buddhasakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, pabbatapādato vaṇṇagandhasampannāni
atk-s0401a:623_2: pupphāni āharathā”ti. Kathanakālo papañco viya hoti, iddhimantānaṃ pana visayo acinteyyoti
atk-s0401a:623_3: muhuttamatteneva te tāpasā vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā buddhānaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:623_4: pupphāsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ, ubhinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ tigāvutaṃ, sesabhikkhūnaṃ aḍḍhayojanikādibhedaṃ,
atk-s0401a:623_5: saṅghanavakassa usabhamattaṃ ahosi. Evaṃ paññattesu āsanesu saradatāpaso tathāgatassa
atk-s0401a:623_6: purato añjaliṃ paggahetvā ṭhito, “bhante, mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitasukhatthāya imaṃ
atk-s0401a:630_0: Evaṃ nisinne satthari dve aggasāvakā ca sesabhikkhū ca attano attano pattāsanesu
atk-s0401a:630_1: nisīdiṃsu. Saradatāpaso mahantaṃ pupphacchattaṃ gahetvā tathāgatassa matthake dhārayanto
atk-s0401a:630_2: aṭṭhāsi. Satthā “jaṭilānaṃ ayaṃ sakkāro mahapphalo hotū”ti nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0401a:630_3: Satthu samāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā dve aggasāvakāpi sesabhikkhūpi samāpattiṃ samāpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:630_4: Tathāgate sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne antevāsikā bhikkhācārakāle
atk-s0401a:630_5: sampatte vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ paribhuñjitvā sesakāle buddhānaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0401a:630_6: Saradatāpaso pana bhikkhācārampi agantvā pupphacchattaṃ gahitaniyāmeneva sattāhaṃ
atk-s0401a:631_0: Satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya dakkhiṇapasse nisinnaṃ aggasāvakaṃ nisabhattheraṃ āmantesi
atk-s0401a:631_1: – “nisabha sakkārakārakānaṃ tāpasānaṃ pupphāsanānumodanaṃ karohī”ti. Thero cakkavattirañño
atk-s0401a:631_2: santikā paṭiladdhamahālābho mahāyodho viya tuṭṭhamānaso sāvakapāramiñāṇe ṭhatvā pupphāsanānumodanaṃ
atk-s0401a:631_3: ārabhi. Tassa desanāvasāne dutiyasāvakaṃ āmantesi – “tvampi dhammaṃ desehī”ti. Anomatthero
atk-s0401a:631_4: tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā dhammaṃ kathesi. Dvinnaṃ sāvakānaṃ desanāya ekassapi
atk-s0401a:631_5: abhisamayo nāhosi. Atha satthā aparimāṇe buddhavisaye ṭhatvā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0401a:631_6: Desanāpariyosāne ṭhapetvā saradatāpasaṃ sabbepi catusattatisahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:631_7: pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthā “etha bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. Tesaṃ tāvadeva kesamassu antaradhāyi,
atk-s0401a:632_0: Saradatāpaso kasmā arahattaṃ na pattoti? Vikkhittacittattā. Tassa kira buddhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:632_1: dutiyāsane nisīditvā sāvakapāramiñāṇe ṭhatvā dhammaṃ desayato aggasāvakassa desanaṃ
atk-s0401a:632_2: sotuṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya “aho vatāhampi anāgate uppajjanakassa buddhassa sāsane
atk-s0401a:632_3: imināva sāvakena laddhadhuraṃ labheyya”nti cittaṃ udapādi. So tena parivitakkena
atk-s0401a:632_4: maggaphalapaṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi. Tathāgataṃ pana vanditvā sammukhe ṭhatvā āha
atk-s0401a:632_5: – “bhante, tumhākaṃ anantarāsane nisinno bhikkhu tumhākaṃ sāsane ko nāma hotī”ti?
atk-s0401a:632_6: Mayā pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ anuppavattetā sāvakapāramiñāṇassa koṭippatto soḷasa
atk-s0401a:632_7: paññā paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito mayhaṃ sāsane aggasāvako nisabhatthero nāma esoti. “Bhante,
atk-s0401a:632_8: yvāyaṃ mayā sattāhaṃ pupphacchattaṃ dhārentena sakkāro kato, ahaṃ imassa phalena
atk-s0401a:632_9: aññaṃ sakkattaṃ vā brahmattaṃ vā na patthemi, anāgate pana ayaṃ nisabhatthero viya
atk-s0401a:632_10: ekassa buddhassa aggasāvako bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:633_0: Satthā “samijjhissati nu kho imassa purisassa patthanā”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā
atk-s0401a:633_1: olokento kappasatasahassādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā samijjhanabhāvaṃ addasa.
atk-s0401a:633_2: Disvā saradatāpasaṃ āha – “na te ayaṃ patthanā moghā bhavissati, anāgate pana kappasatasahassādhikaṃ
atk-s0401a:633_3: asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā gotamo nāma buddho loke uppajjissati. Tassa mātā mahāmāyā
atk-s0401a:633_4: nāma devī bhavissati, pitā suddhodano nāma rājā, putto rāhulo nāma, upaṭṭhāko ānando
atk-s0401a:633_5: nāma, dutiyasāvako moggallāno nāma, tvaṃ pana tassa aggasāvako dhammasenāpati sāriputto
atk-s0401a:633_6: nāma bhavissasī”ti. Evaṃ tāpasaṃ byākaritvā dhammakathaṃ kathetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0401a:634_0: Saradatāpasopi antevāsikattherānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sahāyakassa sirivaḍḍhanakuṭumbikassa
atk-s0401a:634_1: sāsanaṃ pesesi – “bhante, mama sahāyakassa vadetha ‘sahāyakena te saradatāpasena
atk-s0401a:634_2: anomadassibuddhassa pādamūle anāgate uppajjanakassa gotamabuddhassa sāsane aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:634_3: patthitaṃ, tvaṃ dutiyasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthehī”’ti. Evañca pana vatvā therehi puretarameva
atk-s0401a:635_0: Sirivaḍḍhano “cirassaṃ vata me ayyo āgato”ti āsane nisīdāpetvā attanā nīcāsane nisinno
atk-s0401a:635_1: “antevāsikaparisā pana vo, bhante, na paññāyatī”ti pucchi. Āma samma, amhākaṃ assamaṃ
atk-s0401a:635_2: anomadassī nāma buddho āgato, mayaṃ tassa attano balena sakkāraṃ akarimha. Satthā
atk-s0401a:635_3: sabbesaṃ dhammaṃ desesi, desanāpariyosāne ṭhapetvā maṃ sesā arahattaṃ patvā pabbajiṃsūti.
atk-s0401a:635_4: Tumhe kasmā na pabbajitāti? Ahaṃ satthu aggasāvakaṃ nisabhattheraṃ disvā anāgate
atk-s0401a:635_5: uppajjanakassa gotamassa nāma buddhassa sāsane aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthesiṃ, tvampi
atk-s0401a:635_6: tassa sāsane dutiyasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthehīti. Mayhaṃ buddhehi saddhiṃ paricayo natthi,
atk-s0401a:635_7: bhanteti. Buddhehi saddhiṃ kathanaṃ mayhaṃ bhāro hotu, tvaṃ mahantaṃ adhikāraṃ sajjehīti.
atk-s0401a:636_0: Sirivaḍḍhano saradatāpasassa vacanaṃ sutvā attano nivesanadvāre rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsamattaṃ
atk-s0401a:636_1: ṭhānaṃ samatalaṃ kāretvā vālukaṃ okirāpetvā lājapañcamāni pupphāni vikiritvā nīluppalacchadanaṃ
atk-s0401a:636_2: maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā sesabhikkhūnampi āsanāni paṭiyādāpetvā mahantaṃ
atk-s0401a:636_3: sakkārasammānaṃ sajjetvā buddhānaṃ nimantanatthāya saradatāpasassa saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:636_4: Tāpaso tassa vacanaṃ sutvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā tassa nivesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:636_5: agamāsi. Sirivaḍḍhano paccuggamanaṃ katvā tathāgatassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā maṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0401a:636_6: pavesetvā paññattāsanesu nisinnassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ
atk-s0401a:636_7: datvā paṇītena bhojanena parivisitvā bhattakiccapariyosāne buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0401a:636_8: mahārahehi vatthehi acchādetvā, “bhante, nāyaṃ ārambho appamattakaṭṭhānatthāya, imināva
atk-s0401a:636_9: niyāmena sattāhaṃ anukampaṃ karothā”ti āha. Satthā adhivāsesi. So teneva niyāmena
atk-s0401a:636_10: sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā ṭhito āha –
atk-s0401a:636_11: “bhante, mama sahāyo saradatāpaso yassa satthu aggasāvako homīti patthesi, ahampi
atk-s0401a:637_0: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā byākāsi – “tvaṃ
atk-s0401a:637_1: ito kappasatasahassādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā gotamabuddhassa dutiyasāvako
atk-s0401a:637_2: bhavissasī”ti. Buddhānaṃ byākaraṇaṃ sutvā sirivaḍḍhano haṭṭhapahaṭṭho ahosi. Satthāpi
atk-s0401a:637_3: bhattānumodanaṃ katvā saparivāro vihārameva gato. Sirivaḍḍhano tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0401a:637_4: kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā dutiyattavāre kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbatto. Saradatāpaso cattāro
atk-s0401a:638_0: Tato paṭṭhāya imesaṃ ubhinnampi antarākammaṃ na kathitaṃ. Amhākaṃ pana buddhassa
atk-s0401a:638_1: nibbattito puretarameva saradatāpaso rājagahanagarassa avidūre upatissagāme sāribrāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0401a:638_2: kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Taṃdivasameva cassa sahāyopi rājagahasseva avidūre
atk-s0401a:638_3: kolitagāme moggallibrāhmaṇiyā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tāni kira dvepi kulāni
atk-s0401a:638_4: yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā ābaddhapaṭibaddhasahāyakāneva. Tesaṃ dvinnampi ekadivasameva
atk-s0401a:638_5: gabbhaparihāraṃ adaṃsu. Dasamāsaccayena jātānampi tesaṃ chasaṭṭhi dhātiyo upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:638_6: Nāmaggahaṇadivase sāribrāhmaṇiyā puttassa upatissagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā upatissoti
atk-s0401a:638_7: nāmaṃ akaṃsu, itarassa kolitagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā kolitoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Te
atk-s0401a:639_0: Upatissamāṇavassa kīḷanatthāya nadiṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā gamanakāle pañca suvaṇṇasivikāsatāni
atk-s0401a:639_1: parivārā honti, kolitamāṇavassa pañca ājaññarathasatāni. Dvepi janā pañcapañcamāṇavakasataparivārā
atk-s0401a:639_2: honti. Rājagahe ca anusaṃvaccharaṃ giraggasamajjaṃ nāma hoti, tesaṃ dvinnampi ekaṭṭhāneyeva
atk-s0401a:639_3: mañcaṃ bandhanti. Dvepi janā ekatova nisīditvā samajjaṃ passantā hasitabbaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:639_4: hasanti, saṃvegaṭṭhāne saṃvijjanti, dāyaṃ dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne dāyaṃ denti. Tesaṃ imināva
atk-s0401a:639_5: niyāmena ekadivasaṃ samajjaṃ passantānaṃ paripākagatattā ñāṇassa purimadivasesu viya
atk-s0401a:639_6: hasitabbaṭṭhāne hāso vā saṃvegaṭṭhāne saṃvejanaṃ vā dāyaṃ dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne dāyadānaṃ
atk-s0401a:639_7: vā nāhosi. Dvepi pana janā evaṃ cintayiṃsu – “kiṃ ettha oloketabbaṃ atthi, sabbepime
atk-s0401a:639_8: appatte vassasate apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gamissanti. Amhehi pana ekaṃ mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ
atk-s0401a:640_0: Tato kolito upatissaṃ āha – “samma upatissa, na tvaṃ aññasu divasesu viya haṭṭhapahaṭṭho,
atk-s0401a:640_1: anattamanadhātukosi, kiṃ te sallakkhita”nti? Samma kolita, “etesaṃ olokane sāro natthi,
atk-s0401a:640_2: niratthakametaṃ, attano mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ cintayanto nisinnomhīti,
atk-s0401a:640_3: tvaṃ pana kasmā anattamanosīti? Sopi tatheva āha. Athassa attanā saddhiṃ ekajjhāsayataṃ
atk-s0401a:640_4: ñatvā upatisso taṃ evamāha – “amhākaṃ ubhinnampi sucintitaṃ, mokkhadhammaṃ gavesantehi
atk-s0401a:640_5: pana ekā pabbajjā laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, kassa santike pabbajāmā”ti.
atk-s0401a:641_0: Tena kho pana samayena sañcayo paribbājako rājagahe paṭivasati mahatiyā paribbājakaparisāya
atk-s0401a:641_1: saddhiṃ. Te “tassa santike pabbajissāmā”ti pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ sañcayassa
atk-s0401a:641_2: santike pabbajiṃsu. Tesaṃ pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sañcayo atirekalābhaggayasaggappatto
atk-s0401a:641_3: ahosi. Te katipāheneva sabbaṃ sañcayassa samayaṃ pariggaṇhitvā, “ācariya, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:641_4: jānanasamayo ettakova, udāhu uttaripi atthī”ti pucchiṃsu. Sañcayo “ettakova, sabbaṃ
atk-s0401a:641_5: tumhehi ñāta”nti āha. Te tassa kathaṃ sutvā cintayiṃsu – “evaṃ sati imassa santike
atk-s0401a:641_6: brahmacariyavāso niratthako, mayaṃ mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ nikkhantā, so imassa santike
atk-s0401a:641_7: uppādetuṃ na sakkā. Mahā kho pana jambudīpo, gāmanigamarājadhāniyo carantā mayaṃ
atk-s0401a:641_8: avassaṃ mokkhadhammadesakaṃ ekaṃ ācariyaṃ labhissāmā”ti. Te tato paṭṭhāya yattha
atk-s0401a:641_9: yattha paṇḍitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā atthīti suṇanti, tattha tattha gantvā pañhasākacchaṃ
atk-s0401a:641_10: karonti. Tehi puṭṭhaṃ pañhaṃ aññe kathetuṃ samatthā natthi, te pana tesaṃ pañhaṃ
atk-s0401a:641_11: vissajjenti. Evaṃ sakalajambudīpaṃ pariggaṇhitvā nivattitvā sakaṭṭhānameva āgantvā,
atk-s0401a:641_12: “samma kolita, yo paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati, so ārocetū”ti katikaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:642_0: Tena samayena amhākaṃ satthā paṭhamābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena
atk-s0401a:642_1: rājagahaṃ sampatto hoti. Atha “ekasaṭṭhi arahanto loke uppannā hontī”ti vuttakāle
atk-s0401a:642_3: bhikkhūnaṃ antare pañcavaggiyabbhantaro assajitthero paṭinivattitvā rājagahameva
atk-s0401a:642_4: āgato. Punadivase pātova pattacīvaraṃ ādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0401a:643_0: Tasmiṃ samaye upatissaparibbājako pātova bhattakiccaṃ katvā paribbājakārāmaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0401a:643_1: theraṃ disvā cintesi – “mayā evarūpo pabbajito nāma na diṭṭhapubbo. Ye vata loke
atk-s0401a:643_2: arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, ayaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aññataro, yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0401a:643_3: imaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ puccheyyaṃ – ‘kaṃsi tvaṃ, āvuso uddissa, pabbajito,
atk-s0401a:643_4: ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”’ti. Athassa etadahosi – “akālo kho
atk-s0401a:643_5: imaṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ, antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho piṇḍāya carati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0401a:643_6: imaṃ bhikkhuṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandheyyaṃ atthikehi upaññātaṃ magga”nti. So theraṃ
atk-s0401a:643_7: laddhapiṇḍapātaṃ aññataraṃ okāsaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā nisīditukāmatañcassa ñatvā attano
atk-s0401a:643_8: paribbājakapīṭhakaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. Bhattakiccapariyosānepissa attano kuṇḍikāya udakaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:644_0: Evaṃ ācariyavattaṃ katvā katabhattakiccena therena saddhiṃ madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:644_1: “vippasannāni kho te, āvuso, indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto, kaṃsi tvaṃ,
atk-s0401a:644_2: āvuso uddissa, pabbajito, ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:644_3: Thero “atthāvuso, mahāsamaṇo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito, tāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa
atk-s0401a:644_4: pabbajito, so ca me bhagavā satthā, tassevāhaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ rocemī”ti āha. Atha
atk-s0401a:644_5: naṃ “kiṃvādī panāyasmato satthā, kimakkhāyī”ti pucchi. Thero cintesi – “ime paribbājakā
atk-s0401a:644_6: nāma sāsanassa paṭipakkhabhūtā, imassa sāsanassa gambhīrataṃ dassessāmī”ti. Attano
atk-s0401a:644_7: navakabhāvaṃ dassento āha – “ahaṃ kho, āvuso, navo acirapabbajito, adhunāgato imaṃ
atk-s0401a:644_8: dhammavinayaṃ, na tāvāhaṃ sakkomi vitthārena dhammaṃ desetu”nti. Paribbājako “ahaṃ
atk-s0401a:644_9: upatisso nāma, tvaṃ yathāsattiyā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā vada, etaṃ nayasatena nayasahassena
atk-s0401a:645: “Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā bhāsassu, atthaṃyeva me brūhi;
atk-s0401a:646: Attheneva me attho, kiṃ kāhasi byañjanaṃ bahu”nti. ;
atk-s0401a:647_0: Evaṃ vutte thero “ye dhammā hetuppabhavā”ti gāthaṃ āha. Paribbājako paṭhamapadadvayameva
atk-s0401a:647_1: sutvā sahassanayasampanne sotāpattimagge patiṭṭhahi. Itaraṃ padadvayaṃ sotāpannakāle niṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:648_0: So sotāpanno hutvā uparivisese appavattante “bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti sallakkhetvā
atk-s0401a:648_1: theraṃ āha – “bhante, mā upari dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhayittha, ettakameva hotu, kahaṃ
atk-s0401a:648_2: amhākaṃ satthā vasatī”ti? Veḷuvane paribbājakāti. Bhante, tumhe purato yātha, mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:648_3: eko sahāyako atthi. Amhehi ca aññamaññaṃ katikā katā “yo paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati,
atk-s0401a:648_4: so ārocetū”ti. Ahaṃ taṃ paṭiññaṃ mocetvā sahāyakaṃ gahetvā tumhākaṃ gatamaggeneva
atk-s0401a:648_5: satthu santikaṃ āgamissāmīti pañcapatiṭṭhitena therassa pādesu nipatitvā tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0401a:648_6: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā theraṃ uyyojetvā paribbājakārāmābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:649_0: Kolitaparibbājako taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā “ajja mayhaṃ sahāyakassa mukhavaṇṇo
atk-s0401a:649_1: na aññesu divasesu viya, addhā tena amataṃ adhigataṃ bhavissatī”ti amatādhigamaṃ
atk-s0401a:649_2: pucchi. Sopissa “āma āvuso, amataṃ adhigata”nti paṭijānitvā tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0401a:649_3: Gāthāpariyosāne kolito sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā āha – “kahaṃ kira, samma, satthā
atk-s0401a:649_4: vasatī”ti? “Veḷuvane kira, samma, vasatī”ti evaṃ no ācariyena assajittherena kathitanti.
atk-s0401a:649_5: Tena hi samma āyāma, satthāraṃ passissāmāti. Sāriputtatthero ca nāmesa sadāpi ācariyapūjakova,
atk-s0401a:649_6: tasmā sahāyaṃ kolitamāṇavaṃ evamāha – “samma, amhehi adhigataṃ amataṃ amhākaṃ ācariyassa
atk-s0401a:649_7: sañcayaparibbājakassāpi kathessāma. Bujjhamāno paṭivijjhissati, appaṭivijjhanto amhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:649_8: saddahitvā satthu santikaṃ gamissati, buddhānaṃ desanaṃ sutvā maggaphalapaṭivedhaṃ karissatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:650_0: Tato dvepi janā sañcayassa santikaṃ gantvā, “ācariya, tvaṃ kiṃ karosi, buddho loke
atk-s0401a:650_1: uppanno, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho. Āyāma, dasabalaṃ passissāmā”ti. So
atk-s0401a:650_2: “kiṃ vadetha, tātā”ti tepi vāretvā lābhaggayasaggappattimeva tesaṃ dīpesi. Te “amhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:650_3: evarūpo antevāsikavāso niccameva hotu, tumhākaṃ pana gamanaṃ vā agamanaṃ vā jānāthā”ti
atk-s0401a:650_4: āhaṃsu. Sañcayo “ime ettakaṃ jānantā mama vacanaṃ na karissantī”ti ñatvā “gacchatha
atk-s0401a:650_5: tumhe, tātā, ahaṃ mahallakakāle antevāsikavāsaṃ vasituṃ na sakkomī”ti āha. Te anekehipi
atk-s0401a:650_6: kāraṇehi taṃ bodhetuṃ asakkontā attano ovāde vattamānaṃ janaṃ ādāya veḷuvanaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:650_7: Atha tesaṃ pañcasu antevāsikasatesu aḍḍhateyyasatā nivattiṃsu, aḍḍhateyyasatā tehi saddhiṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:651_0: Satthā catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ desento te dūratova disvā bhikkhū āmantesi – “ete,
atk-s0401a:651_1: bhikkhave, dve sahāyā āgacchanti kolito ca upatisso ca, etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati
atk-s0401a:651_2: aggaṃ bhaddayuga”nti. Atha tesaṃ parisāya cariyavasena dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhesi. Ṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:651_3: dve aggasāvake sabbepi te aḍḍhateyyasatā paribbājakā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0401a:651_4: “etha bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. Sabbesaṃ kesamassu antaradhāyi, iddhimayaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0401a:651_5: kāyappaṭibaddhaṃ ahosi. Dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānampi iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ āgataṃ, uparimaggattayakiccaṃ
atk-s0401a:651_6: pana na niṭṭhāsi. Kasmā? Sāvakapāramiñāṇassa mahantatāya.
atk-s0401a:652_0: Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno pabbajitadivasato sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāmakaṃ
atk-s0401a:652_1: upanissāya samaṇadhammaṃ karonto thinamiddhe okkante satthārā saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ
atk-s0401a:652_2: vinodetvā tathāgatena dinnaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ suṇantova uparimaggattayakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0401a:652_3: sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto. Sāriputtattheropi pabbajitadivasato addhamāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:652_4: atikkamitvā satthārā saddhiṃ tameva rājagahaṃ upanissāya sūkarakhataleṇe viharanto
atk-s0401a:652_6: suttānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā parassa vaḍḍhitabhattaṃ bhuñjanto viya sāvakapāramiñāṇassa
atk-s0401a:652_7: matthakaṃ patto. Bhāgineyyo panassa desanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito. Iti
atk-s0401a:652_8: dvinnampi mahāsāvakānaṃ tathāgate rājagahe viharanteyeva sāvakapāramiñāṇakiccaṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0401a:652_9: pattaṃ. Aparabhāge pana satthā jetavane viharanto “mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto,
atk-s0401a:652_10: iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti dvepi mahāsāvake ṭhānantare ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:654_0: 191. Catutthe dhutavādānanti ettha dhuto veditabbo, dhutavādo veditabbo, dhutadhammā
atk-s0401a:654_1: veditabbā, dhutaṅgāni veditabbāni. Tattha dhutoti dhutakileso vā puggalo kilesadhunano vā dhammo.
atk-s0401a:655_0: Dhutavādoti ettha pana atthi dhuto na dhutavādo, atthi na dhuto dhutavādo, atthi
atk-s0401a:655_1: neva dhuto na dhutavādo, atthi dhuto ceva dhutavādo ca. Tattha yo dhutaṅgena attano
atk-s0401a:655_2: kilese dhuni, paraṃ pana dhutaṅgena na ovadati nānusāsati bākulatthero viya, ayaṃ
atk-s0401a:655_3: dhuto na dhutavādo. Yathāha – “tayidaṃ āyasmā bākulo dhuto na dhutavādo”ti. Yo pana
atk-s0401a:655_4: dhutaṅgena attano kilese na dhuni, kevalaṃ aññe dhutaṅgena ovadati anusāsati upanandatthero
atk-s0401a:655_5: viya, ayaṃ na dhuto dhutavādo. Yathāha – “tayidaṃ āyasmā upanando na dhuto dhutavādo”ti.
atk-s0401a:655_6: Yo pana ubhayavipanno lāḷudāyī viya, ayaṃ neva dhuto na dhutavādo. Yathāha – “tayidaṃ
atk-s0401a:655_7: āyasmā lāḷudāyī neva dhuto na dhutavādo”ti. Yo pana ubhayasampanno āyasmā mahākassapatthero
atk-s0401a:655_8: viya, ayaṃ dhuto ceva dhutavādo ca. Yathāha – “tayidaṃ āyasmā mahākassapo dhuto ceva dhutavādo cā”ti.
atk-s0401a:656_0: Dhutadhammā veditabbāti appicchatā santuṭṭhitā sallekhatā pavivekatā idamaṭṭhikatāti
atk-s0401a:656_1: ime dhutaṅgacetanāya parivārā pañca dhammā “appicchaṃyeva nissāyā”tiādivacanato dhutadhammā
atk-s0401a:656_2: nāma. Tattha appicchatā ca santuṭṭhitā ca alobho, sallekhatā ca pavivekatā ca dvīsu
atk-s0401a:656_3: dhammesu anupatanti alobhe ceva amohe ca, idamaṭṭhitā ñāṇameva. Tattha alobhena paṭikkhepavatthūsu
atk-s0401a:656_4: lobhaṃ, amohena tesveva ādīnavappaṭicchādakaṃ mohaṃ dhunāti. Alobhena ca anuññātānaṃ
atk-s0401a:656_5: paṭisevanamukhena pavattaṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ, amohena dhutaṅgesu atisallekhamukhena
atk-s0401a:656_6: pavattaṃ attakilamathānuyogaṃ dhunāti. Tasmā ime dhammā dhutadhammāti veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:657: Dhutaṅgāni veditabbānīti terasa dhutaṅgāni veditabbāni paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ…pe… nesajjikaṅganti.
atk-s0401a:658_0: Dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapoti yattakā dhutavādaṃ vadanti, tesaṃ sabbesampi antare
atk-s0401a:658_1: ayaṃ mahākassapatthero aggoti aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Mahākassapoti uruveḷakassapo nadīkassapo
atk-s0401a:658_2: gayākassapo kumārakassapoti ime khuddānukhuddake there upādāya ayaṃ mahā, tasmā mahākassapoti vutto.
