atk-s0401a:659_0: Imassāpi pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – atīte kira kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro
atk-s0401a:659_1: nāma satthā loke udapādi, tasmiṃ haṃsavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya kheme migadāye viharante
atk-s0401a:659_2: vedeho nāma kuṭumbiko asītikoṭidhanavibhavo pātova subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni
atk-s0401a:659_3: adhiṭṭhāya gandhapupphādīni gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0401a:659_4: nisīdi. Tasmiñca khaṇe satthā mahānisabhattheraṃ nāma tatiyasāvakaṃ “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0401a:659_5: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ, yadidaṃ nisabho”ti etadagge ṭhapesi. Upāsako
atk-s0401a:659_6: taṃ sutvā pasanno dhammakathāvasāne mahājane uṭṭhāya gate satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:659_7: sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethā”ti āha. Mahā kho, upāsaka, bhikkhusaṅghoti. Kittako
atk-s0401a:659_8: bhagavāti? Aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassanti. Bhante, ekaṃ sāmaṇerampi vihāre asesetvā
atk-s0401a:659_9: bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethāti. Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena. Upāsako satthu adhivāsanaṃ
atk-s0401a:659_10: viditvā gehaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ sajjetvā punadivase satthu kālaṃ ārocāpesi. Satthā
atk-s0401a:659_11: pattacīvaramādāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto upāsakassa gharaṃ gantvā paññatte āsane nisinno
atk-s0401a:659_12: dakkhiṇodakāvasāne yāguādīni sampaṭicchanto bhattavissaggaṃ akāsi. Upāsakopi satthu santike nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:660_0: Tasmiṃ antare mahānisabhatthero piṇḍāya caranto tameva vīthi paṭipajji. Upāsako disvā
atk-s0401a:660_1: uṭṭhāya gantvā theraṃ vanditvā “pattaṃ, bhante, dethā”ti āha. Thero pattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:660_2: “Bhante, idheva pavisatha, satthāpi gehe nisinno”ti. Na vaṭṭissati upāsakāti. Upāsako
atk-s0401a:660_3: therassa pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātassa pūretvā nīharitvā adāsi. Tato theraṃ anugantvā
atk-s0401a:660_4: nivatto satthu santike nisīditvā evamāha – “bhante, mahānisabhatthero ‘satthā gehe
atk-s0401a:660_5: nisinno’ti vuttepi pavisituṃ na icchi, atthi nu kho etassa tumhākaṃ guṇehi atireko
atk-s0401a:660_6: guṇo”ti. Buddhānañca vaṇṇamaccheraṃ nāma natthi. Atha satthā evamāha – “upāsaka,
atk-s0401a:660_7: mayaṃ bhikkhaṃ āgamayamānā gehe nisīdāma, so bhikkhu na evaṃ nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ udikkhati.
atk-s0401a:660_8: Mayaṃ gāmantasenāsane vasāma, so araññasmiṃyeva vasati. Mayaṃ channe vasāma, so abbhokāsamhiyeva
atk-s0401a:660_9: vasati. Iti tassa ayañca ayañca guṇo”ti mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamāno viya kathesi. Upāsako
atk-s0401a:660_10: pakatiyāpi jalamānadīpo telena āsitto viya suṭṭhutaraṃ pasanno hutvā cintesi – “kiṃ
atk-s0401a:660_11: mayhaṃ aññāya sampattiyā, anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike dhutavādānaṃ aggabhāvatthāya
atk-s0401a:661_0: So punapi satthāraṃ nimantetvā teneva niyāmena satta divasāni mahādānaṃ datvā sattame
atk-s0401a:661_1: divase buddhappamukhassa mahābhikkhusaṅghassa ticīvarāni datvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā
atk-s0401a:661_2: evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante, satta divasāni dānaṃ dentassa mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ mettaṃ
atk-s0401a:661_3: vacīkammaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ, imināhaṃ na aññaṃ devasampattiṃ vā sakkamārabrahmasampattiṃ
atk-s0401a:661_4: vā patthemi, idaṃ pana me kammaṃ anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike etassa mahānisabhattherena
atk-s0401a:661_5: pattaṭhānantaraṃ pāpuṇanatthāya terasadhutaṅgadharānaṃ aggabhāvassa saccakāro hotū”ti.
atk-s0401a:661_6: Satthā “mahantaṃ ṭhānaṃ iminā patthitaṃ, samijjhissati nu kho, no”ti olokento samijjhanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:661_7: disvā āha – “manāpaṃ te ṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ, anāgate satasahassakappāvasāne gotamo nāma
atk-s0401a:661_8: buddho uppajjissati, tassa tvaṃ tatiyasāvako mahākassapatthero nāma bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0401a:661_9: Taṃ sutvā upāsako “buddhānaṃ dve kathā nāma natthī”ti punadivase pattabbaṃ viya taṃ
atk-s0401a:661_10: sampattiṃ amaññittha. So yāvatāyukaṃ nānappakāraṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā nānappakāraṃ
atk-s0401a:661_11: kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tattha kālaṃ kato sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:662_0: Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavanto ito ekanavutikappe vipassisammāsambuddhe
atk-s0401a:662_1: bandhumatiṃ nissāya kheme migadāye viharante devalokā cavitvā aññatarasmiṃ parijiṇṇe
atk-s0401a:662_2: brāhmaṇakule nibbatti. Tasmiñca kāle vipassī bhagavā sattame sattame saṃvacchare
atk-s0401a:662_3: dhammaṃ katheti, mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ ahosi. Sakalajambudīpe devatā “satthā dhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:662_4: kathessatī”ti ārocenti. Brāhmaṇo taṃ sāsanaṃ assosi. Tassa ca nivāsanasāṭako ekova
atk-s0401a:662_5: hoti, tathā brāhmaṇiyā. Pārupanaṃ pana dvinnampi ekameva. Sakalanagare ekasāṭakabrāhmaṇoti
atk-s0401a:662_6: paññāyati. Brāhmaṇānaṃ kenacideva kiccena sannipāte sati brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:662_7: sayaṃ gacchati. Brāhmaṇīnaṃ sannipāte sati sayaṃ gehe tiṭṭhati, brāhmaṇī taṃ vatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:662_8: pārupitvā gacchati. Tasmiṃ pana divase brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ āha – “bhoti, kiṃ rattiṃ
atk-s0401a:662_9: dhammassavanaṃ suṇissasi, divā”ti. “Mayaṃ mātugāmajātikā nāma rattiṃ sotuṃ na sakkoma,
atk-s0401a:662_10: divā sossāmī”ti brāhmaṇaṃ gehe ṭhapetvā taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā upāsikāhi saddhiṃ divā
atk-s0401a:662_11: gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamante nisinnā dhammaṃ sutvā upāsikāhiyeva saddhiṃ āgamāsi.
atk-s0401a:662_12: Atha brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:663_0: Tasmiñca samaye satthā parisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane nisinno cittabījaniṃ ādāya
atk-s0401a:663_1: ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya sineruṃ matthaṃ katvā sāgaraṃ nimmathento viya dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0401a:663_2: kathesi. Brāhmaṇassa parisante nisinnassa dhammaṃ suṇantassa paṭhamayāmasmiṃyeva
atk-s0401a:663_3: sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajji. So pārutavatthaṃ saṅgharitvā “dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:663_4: dassāmī”ti cintesi. Atthassa ādīnavasahassaṃ dassayamānaṃ maccheraṃ uppajji. So “brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0401a:663_5: ca mayhañca ekameva vatthaṃ, aññaṃ kiñci pārupanaṃ natthi, apārupitvā ca nāma bahi
atk-s0401a:663_6: carituṃ na sakkā”ti sabbathāpi adātukāmo ahosi. Athassa nikkhante paṭhamayāme majjhimayāmepi
atk-s0401a:663_7: tatheva pīti uppajji. So tatheva cintetvā tatheva adātukāmo ahosi. Athassa majjhimayāme
atk-s0401a:663_8: nikkhante pacchimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji. So “taraṇaṃ vā hotu maraṇaṃ vā, pacchāpi
atk-s0401a:663_9: jānissāmī”ti vatthaṃ saṅgharitvā satthu pādamūle ṭhapesi. Tato vāmahatthaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0401a:663_10: dakkhiṇena hatthena tikkhattuṃ apphoṭetvā “jitaṃ me, jitaṃ me”ti tayo vāre nadi.
atk-s0401a:664_0: Tasmiñca samaye bandhumarājā dhammāsanassa pacchato antosāṇiyaṃ nisinno dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0401a:664_1: Rañño ca nāma “jitaṃ me”ti saddo amanāpo hoti. So purisaṃ pesesi – “gaccha etaṃ puccha
atk-s0401a:664_2: kiṃ vadasī”ti. So tena gantvā pucchito āha – “avasesā hatthiyānādīni āruyha asicammādīni
atk-s0401a:664_3: gahetvā parasenaṃ jinanti, na taṃ jitaṃ acchariyaṃ, ahaṃ pana pacchato āgacchantassa
atk-s0401a:664_4: duṭṭhagoṇassa muggarena sīsaṃ bhinditvā taṃ palāpento viya maccheracittaṃ madditvā
atk-s0401a:664_5: pārutavatthaṃ dasabalassa adāsiṃ, taṃ me macchariyaṃ jita”nti āha. So puriso āgantvā
atk-s0401a:664_6: taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā āha – “amhe bhaṇe dasabalassa anurūpaṃ na jānimha,
atk-s0401a:664_7: brāhmaṇo jānī”ti vatthayugaṃ pesesi. Taṃ disvā brāhmaṇo cintesi – “ayaṃ mayhaṃ tuṇhī
atk-s0401a:664_8: nisinnassa paṭhamaṃ kiñci adatvā satthu guṇe kathentassa adāsi, satthu guṇe paṭicca
atk-s0401a:664_9: uppannena mayhaṃ ko attho”ti? Tampi vatthayugaṃ dasabalasseva adāsi. Rājāpi “kiṃ
atk-s0401a:664_10: brāhmaṇena kata”nti pucchitvā “tampi tena vatthayugaṃ tathāgatasseva dinna”nti sutvā
atk-s0401a:664_11: aññānipi dve vatthayugāni pesesi. So tānipi adāsi. Rājā aññānipi cattārīti evaṃ yāva
atk-s0401a:664_12: dvattiṃsavatthayugāni pesesi. Atha brāhmaṇo “idaṃ vaḍḍhetvā gahaṇaṃ viya hotī”ti
atk-s0401a:664_13: attano atthāya ekaṃ, brāhmaṇiyā ekanti dve vatthayugāni gahetvā tiṃsa yugāni tathāgatasseva
atk-s0401a:664_14: adāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya cassa satthu vissāsiko jāto.
atk-s0401a:665_0: Atha naṃ rājā ekadivasaṃ sītasamaye satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantaṃ disvā satasahassagghanakaṃ
atk-s0401a:665_1: attano pārutarattakambalaṃ datvā āha – “ito patthāya imaṃ pārupitvā dhammaṃ suṇāhī”ti.
atk-s0401a:665_2: So “kiṃ me iminā kambalena imasmiṃ pūtikāye upanītenā”ti cintetvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:665_3: tathāgatassa mañcassa upari vitānaṃ katvā agamāsi. Athekadivasaṃ rājā pātova vihāraṃ
atk-s0401a:665_4: gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ satthu santike nisīdi. Tasmiñca samaye chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo
atk-s0401a:665_5: kambale paṭihaññanti, kambalo ativiya virocati. Rājā olokento sañjānitvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0401a:665_6: amhākaṃ esa kambalo, amhehi ekasāṭakabrāhmaṇassa dinno”ti. Tumhehi, mahārāja, brāhmaṇo
atk-s0401a:665_7: pūjito, brāhmaṇena mayaṃ pūjitāti. Rājā “brāhmaṇo yuttaṃ aññāsi, na maya”nti pasīditvā
atk-s0401a:665_8: yaṃ manussānaṃ upakārabhūtaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ katvā sabbaaṭṭhakaṃ nāma dānaṃ
atk-s0401a:665_9: datvā purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sopi “aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ nāma catusaṭṭhi hotī”ti catusaṭṭhi
atk-s0401a:665_10: salākābhattāni upanibandhāpetvā yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato cuto sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:666_0: Puna tato cuto imasmiṃ kappe koṇāgamanassa ca bhagavato kassapadasabalassa cāti dvinnaṃ
atk-s0401a:666_1: buddhānaṃ antare bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyaghare nibbatto. So vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:666_2: vasanto ekadivasaṃ araññe jaṅghavihāraṃ carati, tasmiṃ ca samaye paccekabuddho nadītīre
atk-s0401a:666_3: cīvarakammaṃ karonto anuvāte appahonte saṅgharitvā ṭhapetuṃ āraddho. So disvā “kasmā,
atk-s0401a:666_4: bhante, saṅgharitvā ṭhapethā”ti āha. Anuvāto nappahotīti. “Iminā, bhante, karothā”ti
atk-s0401a:666_5: sāṭakaṃ datvā “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kenaci parihāni mā hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:667_0: Atha gharepissa bhaginiyā saddhiṃ bhariyāya kalahaṃ karontiyā paccekabuddho piṇḍāya
atk-s0401a:667_1: pāvisi. Athassa bhaginī paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā tassa bhariyaṃ sandhāya,
atk-s0401a:667_2: “evarūpaṃ bālaṃ yojanasatena parivajjeyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Sā gehadvāre
atk-s0401a:667_3: ṭhitā sutvā “imāya dinnaṃ bhattaṃ mā esa bhuñjatū”ti pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātaṃ chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0401a:667_4: kalalassa pūretvā adāsi. Itarā disvā “bāle maṃ tāva akkosa vā pahara vā, evarūpassa
atk-s0401a:667_5: pana dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramissa pattato bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalaṃ dātuṃ na
atk-s0401a:667_6: yutta”nti āha. Athassa bhariyāya paṭisaṅkhānaṃ uppajji. Sā “tiṭṭhatha, bhante”ti
atk-s0401a:667_7: kalalaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattaṃ dhovitvā gandhacuṇṇena ubbaṭṭetvā catumadhurassa pūretvā
atk-s0401a:667_8: upari āsittena padumagabbhavaṇṇena sappinā vijjotamānaṃ paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:667_9: “yathā ayaṃ piṇḍapāto obhāsajāto, evaṃ obhāsajātaṃ me sarīraṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:667_10: Paccekabuddho anumoditvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Tepi dve jāyampatikā yāvatāyukaṃ kusalaṃ
atk-s0401a:667_11: katvā sagge nibbattitvā puna tato cavitvā upāsako kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:667_12: asītikoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti, itarāpi tādisasseva seṭṭhino dhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:668_0: Tassa vuddhippattassa tameva seṭṭhidhītaraṃ ānayiṃsu. Tassā pubbe adinnavipākassa
atk-s0401a:668_1: tassa kammassa ānubhāvena patikūlaṃ paviṭṭhamattāya ummārabbhantare sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0401a:668_2: ugghāṭitavaccakuṭi viya duggandhaṃ jātaṃ. Seṭṭhikumāro “kassāyaṃ gandho”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0401a:668_3: “seṭṭhikaññāyā”ti sutvā “nīharathā”ti ābhataniyāmeneva kulagharaṃ pesesi. Sā eteneva
atk-s0401a:669_0: Tena ca samayena kassapadasabalo parinibbāyi, tassa ghanakoṭṭimāhi satasahassagghanikāhi
atk-s0401a:669_1: rattasuvaṇṇaiṭṭhakāhi yojanubbedhaṃ cetiyaṃ ārabhiṃsu. Tasmiṃ cetiye kariyamāne sā
atk-s0401a:669_2: seṭṭhidhītā cintesi – “ahaṃ sattasu ṭhānesu paṭinivattitā, kiṃ me jīvitenā”ti attano
atk-s0401a:669_3: sarīrābharaṇabhaṇḍakaṃ bhañjāpetvā suvaṇṇaiṭṭhakaṃ kāresi ratanāyataṃ vidatthivitthinnaṃ
atk-s0401a:669_4: caturaṅgulubbedhaṃ. Tato haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ gahetvā aṭṭha uppalahatthake ādāya
atk-s0401a:669_5: cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gatā. Tasmiñca khaṇe ekā iṭṭhakāpanti parikkhipitvā āgacchamānā
atk-s0401a:669_6: ghaṭaniṭṭhakāya ūnā hoti. Seṭṭhidhītā vaḍḍhakiṃ āha – “imaṃ iṭṭhakaṃ ettha ṭhapethā”ti.
atk-s0401a:669_7: Amma, bhaddake kāle āgatāsi, sayameva ṭhapehīti. Sā āruyha telena haritālamanosilaṃ
atk-s0401a:669_8: yojetvā tena bandhanena iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā upari aṭṭhahi uppalahatthakehi pūjaṃ
atk-s0401a:669_9: katvā vanditvā “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kāyato candanagandho vāyatu, mukhato uppalagandho”ti
atk-s0401a:669_10: patthanaṃ katvā cetiyaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:670_0: Atha tasmiṃyeva khaṇe yassa seṭṭhiputtassa paṭhamaṃ gehaṃ nītā, tassa taṃ ārabbha
atk-s0401a:670_1: sati udapādi. Nagarepi nakkhattaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ hoti. So upaṭṭhāke āha – “tadā idha
atk-s0401a:670_2: ānītā seṭṭhidhītā atthi, kahaṃ sā”ti? Kulagehe sāmīti. Ānetha naṃ, nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmāti.
atk-s0401a:670_3: Te gantvā taṃ vanditvā ṭhitā “kiṃ, tātā, āgatatthā”ti tāya puṭṭhā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:670_4: Tātā, mayā ābharaṇabhaṇḍena cetiyaṃ pūjitaṃ, ābharaṇaṃ me natthīti. Te gantvā seṭṭhiputtassa
atk-s0401a:670_5: ārocesuṃ. Ānetha naṃ, piḷandhanaṃ labhissāmāti. Te ānayiṃsu. Tassā saha gharappavesanena
atk-s0401a:671_0: Seṭṭhiputto taṃ pucchi “paṭhamaṃ tava sarīrato duggandho vāyi, idāni pana te sarīrato
atk-s0401a:671_1: candanagandho, mukhato uppalagandho vāyati, kiṃ eta”nti? Sā ādito paṭṭhāya attanā
atk-s0401a:671_2: katakammaṃ ārocesi. Seṭṭhiputto “niyyānikaṃ vata buddhasāsana”nti pasīditvā yojanikaṃ
atk-s0401a:671_3: suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ kambalakañcukena parikkhipitvā tattha tattha rathacakkappamāṇehi suvaṇṇapadumehi
atk-s0401a:671_4: alaṅkari. Tesaṃ dvādasahatthā olambakā honti. So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā sagge
atk-s0401a:671_5: nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasito yojanamatte ṭhāne aññatarasmiṃ amaccakule nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:671_6: Seṭṭhikaññāpi devalokato cavitvā rājakule jeṭṭhadhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:672_0: Tesu vayapattesu kumārassa vasanagāme nakkhattaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ. So mātaraṃ āha – “sāṭakaṃ
atk-s0401a:672_1: me, amma, dehi, nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti. Sā dhotavatthaṃ nīharitvā adāsi. Amma, thūlaṃ
atk-s0401a:672_2: idaṃ, aññaṃ dehīti. Aññaṃ nīharitvā adāsi, tampi paṭikkhipi. Aññaṃ nīharitvā adāsi,
atk-s0401a:672_3: tampi paṭikkhipi. Atha naṃ mātā āha – “tāta, yādise gehe mayaṃ jātā, natthi no ito
atk-s0401a:672_4: sukhumatarassa paṭilābhāya puñña”nti. Tena hi labhanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchāmi, ammāti. Putta
atk-s0401a:672_5: ahaṃ ajjeva tuyhaṃ bārāṇasinagare rajjapaṭilābhaṃ icchāmīti. So mātaraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0401a:672_6: āha – “gacchāmi, ammā”ti. Gaccha, tātāti. Evaṃ kirassā cittaṃ ahosi – “kahaṃ gamissati,
atk-s0401a:672_7: idha vā ettha vā gehe nisīdissatī”ti? So pana puññaniyāmena nikkhamitvā bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0401a:672_8: gantvā uyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipajji. So ca bārāṇasirañño kālakatassa
atk-s0401a:673_0: Amaccā rañño sarīrakiccaṃ katvā rājaṅgaṇe nisīditvā mantayiṃsu – “rañño ekā dhītāva
atk-s0401a:673_1: atthi, putto natthi, arājakaṃ rajjaṃ na vaṭṭati, ko rājā hotī”ti mantetvā “tvaṃ hohi,
atk-s0401a:673_2: tvaṃ hohī”ti āhaṃsu. Purohito āha – “bahuṃ oloketuṃ na vaṭṭati, phussarathaṃ vissajjemā”ti.
atk-s0401a:673_3: Te kumudavaṇṇe cattāro sindhave yojetvā pañcavidhaṃ rājakakudhabhaṇḍaṃ setacchattañca
atk-s0401a:673_4: rathasmiṃyeva ṭhapetvā rathaṃ vissajjetvā pacchato tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesuṃ. Ratho
atk-s0401a:673_5: pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā uyyānābhimukho ahosi. “Paricayena uyyānābhimukho gacchati,
atk-s0401a:673_6: nivattemā”ti keci āhaṃsu. Purohito “mā nivattayitthā”ti āha. Ratho kumāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:673_7: katvā ārohanasajjo hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Purohito pārupanakaṇṇaṃ apanetvā pādatalāni olokento
atk-s0401a:673_8: “tiṭṭhatu ayaṃ dīpo, dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu dīpesu eso rajjaṃ kāretuṃ yutto”ti
atk-s0401a:673_9: vatvā “punapi tūriyāni paggaṇhatha, punapi tūriyāni paggaṇhathā”ti tikkhattuṃ tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:674_0: Atha kumāro mukhaṃ vivaritvā oloketvā “kena kammena āgatatthā”ti āha. Deva tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:674_1: rajjaṃ pāpuṇātīti. Rājā kahanti? Devattaṃ gato sāmīti. Kati divasā atikkantāti? Ajja
atk-s0401a:674_2: sattamo divasoti. Putto vā dhītā vā natthīti? Dhītā atthi deva, putto natthīti. Karissāmi
atk-s0401a:674_3: rajjanti. Te tāvadeva abhisekamaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā rājadhītaraṃ sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0401a:675_0: Athassa katābhisekassa sahassagghanakaṃ vatthaṃ upahariṃsu. So “kimidaṃ, tātā”ti
atk-s0401a:675_1: āha. Nivāsanavatthaṃ devāti. Nanu, tātā, thūlaṃ, aññaṃ sukhumataraṃ natthīti? Manussānaṃ
atk-s0401a:675_2: paribhogavatthesu ito sukhumataraṃ natthi devāti. Tumhākaṃ rājā evarūpaṃ nivāsesīti?
atk-s0401a:675_3: Āma, devāti. Na maññe puññavā tumhākaṃ rājā, suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ āharatha, labhissāma
atk-s0401a:675_4: vatthanti. Te suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ āhariṃsu. So uṭṭhāya hatthe dhovitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā
atk-s0401a:675_5: hatthena udakaṃ ādāya puratthimāya disāya abbhukkiri, tāvadeva ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0401a:675_6: aṭṭha kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Puna udakaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇaṃ pacchimaṃ uttaranti evaṃ
atk-s0401a:675_7: catassopi disā abbhukkiri, sabbadisāsu aṭṭhaṭṭha katvā dvattiṃsa kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:675_8: So ekaṃ dibbadussaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā “nandarañño vijite suttakantikā itthiyo
atk-s0401a:675_9: mā suttaṃ kantiṃsūti evaṃ bheriṃ carāpethā”ti vatvā chattaṃ ussāpetvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatto
atk-s0401a:675_10: hatthikkhandhavaragato nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādaṃ āruyha mahāsampattiṃ anubhavi.
atk-s0401a:676_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante ekadivasaṃ devī rañño mahāsampattiṃ disvā “aho tapassī”ti kāruññākāraṃ
atk-s0401a:676_1: dassesi. “Kimidaṃ devī”ti ca puṭṭhā “atimahatī te deva sampatti, atīte buddhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:676_2: saddahitvā kalyāṇaṃ akattha, idāni anāgatassa paccayaṃ kusalaṃ na karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:676_3: Kassa dassāmi, sīlavanto natthīti. “Asuñño, deva, jambudīpo arahantehi, tumhe dānameva
atk-s0401a:676_4: sajjetha, ahaṃ arahante lacchāmī”ti āha. Rājā punadivase pācīnadvāre dānaṃ sajjāpesi.
atk-s0401a:676_5: Devī pātova uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya uparipāsāde puratthābhimukhā urena nipajjitvā
atk-s0401a:676_6: “sace etissā disāya arahanto atthi, sve āgantvā amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantū”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:676_7: Tassaṃ disāyaṃ arahanto nāhesuṃ, taṃ sakkāraṃ kapaṇayācakānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:677_0: Punadivase dakkhiṇadvāre dānaṃ sajjetvā tatheva akāsi, punadivase pacchimadvāre.
atk-s0401a:677_1: Uttaradvāre sajjanadivase pana deviyā tatheva nimantite himavante vasantānaṃ padumavatiyā
atk-s0401a:677_2: puttānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ jeṭṭhako mahāpadumapaccekabuddho bhātike āmantesi
atk-s0401a:677_3: – “mārisā, nandarājā tumhe nimanteti, adhivāsetha tassā”ti. Te adhivāsetvā punadivase
atk-s0401a:677_4: anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā ākāsena āgantvā uttaradvāre otariṃsu. Manussā gantvā
atk-s0401a:677_5: “pañcasatā, deva, paccekabuddhā āgatā”ti rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā saddhiṃ deviyā gantvā
atk-s0401a:677_6: vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā paccekabuddhe pāsādaṃ āropetvā tatra tesaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne
atk-s0401a:677_7: rājā saṅghattherassa, devī saṅghanavakassa pādamūle nipajjitvā, “ayyā, paccayehi
atk-s0401a:677_8: na kilamissanti, mayaṃ puññena na hāyissāma, amhākaṃ yāvajīvaṃ idha nivāsāya paṭiññaṃ
atk-s0401a:677_9: dethā”ti. Paṭiññaṃ kāretvā uyyāne pañca paṇṇasālāsatāni pañca caṅkamanasatānīti sabbākārena
atk-s0401a:678_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante rañño paccanto kupito. So “ahaṃ paccantaṃ vūpasametuṃ gacchāmi,
atk-s0401a:678_1: tvaṃ paccekabuddhesu mā pamajjī”ti deviṃ ovaditvā gato. Tasmiṃ anāgateyeva paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:678_2: āyusaṅkhārā khīṇā. Mahāpadumapaccekabuddho tiyāmarattiṃ jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā aruṇuggamane
atk-s0401a:678_3: ālambanaphalakaṃ ālambitvā ṭhitakova anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Etenupāyena
atk-s0401a:678_4: sesāpīti sabbeva parinibbutā. Punadivase devī paccekabuddhānaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ haritupalittaṃ
atk-s0401a:678_5: kāretvā pupphāni vikiritvā dhūmaṃ datvā tesaṃ āgamanaṃ olokentī nisinnā; āgamanaṃ
atk-s0401a:678_6: apassantī purisaṃ pesesi “gaccha, tāta, jānāhi, kiṃ ayyānaṃ kiñci aphāsuka”nti. So
atk-s0401a:678_7: gantvā mahāpadumassa paṇṇasālādvāraṃ vivaritvā tattha apassanto caṅkamanaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:678_8: ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ disvā vanditvā “kālo, bhante”ti āha. Parinibbutasarīraṃ
atk-s0401a:678_9: kiṃ kathessati? So “niddāyati maññe”ti gantvā piṭṭhipāde hatthena parāmasitvā pādānaṃ
atk-s0401a:678_10: sītalatāya ceva thaddhatāya ca parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā dutiyassa santikaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0401a:678_11: evaṃ tatiyassāti sabbesaṃ parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā rājakulaṃ gato. “Kahaṃ, tāta, paccekabuddhā”ti
atk-s0401a:678_12: puṭṭho “parinibbutā devī”ti āha. Devī kandantī rodantī nikkhamitvā nāgarehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:678_13: tattha gantvā sādhukīḷitaṃ kāretvā paccekabuddhānaṃ sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo gahetvā
atk-s0401a:679_0: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgato paccuggamanaṃ āgataṃ deviṃ pucchi – “kiṃ, bhadde,
atk-s0401a:679_1: paccekabuddhesu nappamajji, nirogā ayyā”ti? Parinibbutā devāti. Rājā cintesi – “evarūpānampi
atk-s0401a:679_2: paṇḍitānaṃ maraṇaṃ uppajjati, amhākaṃ kuto mokkho”ti? So nagaraṃ agantvā uyyānameva
atk-s0401a:679_3: pavisitvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa rajjaṃ paṭiyādetvā sayaṃ samaṇakapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:679_4: pabbaji. Devīpi “imasmiṃ pabbajite ahaṃ kiṃ karissāmī”ti tattheva uyyāne pabbajitā.
atk-s0401a:679_5: Dvepi jhānaṃ bhāvetvā tato cutā brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:680_0: Tesu tattheva vasantesu amhākaṃ satthā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena
atk-s0401a:680_1: rājagahaṃ pāvisi. Satthari tattha vasante ayaṃ pippalimāṇavo magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthabrāhmaṇagāme
atk-s0401a:680_2: kapilabrāhmaṇassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatto, ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī maddaraṭṭhe
atk-s0401a:680_3: sāgalanagare kosiyagottabrāhmaṇassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattā. Tesaṃ anukkamena
atk-s0401a:680_4: vaḍḍhamānānaṃ pippalimāṇavassa vīsatime vasse bhaddāya soḷasame vasse sampatte mātāpitaro
atk-s0401a:680_5: puttaṃ oloketvā, “tāta, tvaṃ vayapatto, kulavaṃso nāma patiṭṭhāpetabbo”ti ativiya
atk-s0401a:680_6: nippīḷayiṃsu. Māṇavo āha – “mayhaṃ sotapathe evarūpaṃ kathaṃ mā kathetha, ahaṃ yāva
atk-s0401a:680_7: tumhe dharatha, tāva paṭijaggissāmi, tumhākaṃ accayena nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0401a:680_8: Te katipāhaṃ atikkamitvā puna kathayiṃsu, sopi tatheva paṭikkhipi. Punapi kathayiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:680_9: punapi paṭikkhipi. Tato paṭṭhāya mātā nirantaraṃ kathesiyeva.
atk-s0401a:681_0: Māṇavo “mama mātaraṃ saññāpessāmī”ti rattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasahassaṃ datvā suvaṇṇakārehi
atk-s0401a:681_1: ekaṃ itthirūpaṃ kārāpetvā tassa majjanaghaṭṭanādikammapariyosāne taṃ rattavatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:681_2: nivāsāpetvā vaṇṇasampannehi pupphehi ceva nānāalaṅkārehi ca alaṅkārāpetvā mātaraṃ
atk-s0401a:681_3: pakkosāpetvā āha – “amma, evarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ labhanto gehe vasissāmi, alabhanto na
atk-s0401a:681_4: vasissāmī”ti. Paṇḍitā brāhmaṇī cintesi – “mayhaṃ putto puññavā dinnadāno katābhinīhāro,
atk-s0401a:681_5: puññaṃ karonto na ekakova akāsi, addhā etena saha katapuññā suvaṇṇarūpakapaṭibhāgāva
atk-s0401a:681_6: bhavissatī”ti aṭṭha brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā sabbakāmehi santappetvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ
atk-s0401a:681_7: rathaṃ āropetvā “gacchatha, tātā, yattha amhākaṃ jātigottabhogehi samānakule evarūpaṃ
atk-s0401a:681_8: dārikaṃ passatha, imameva suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ katvā dethā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0401a:682_0: Te “amhākaṃ nāma etaṃ kamma”nti nikkhamitvā “kattha gamissāmā”ti cintetvā “maddaraṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0401a:682_1: nāma itthākaro, maddaraṭṭhaṃ gamissāmā”ti maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagaraṃ agamaṃsu. Tattha
atk-s0401a:682_2: taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ nhānatitthe ṭhapetvā ekamante nisīdiṃsu. Atha bhaddāya dhātī bhaddaṃ
atk-s0401a:682_3: nhāpetvā alaṅkaritvā sirigabbhe nisīdāpetvā nhāyituṃ āgacchantī taṃ rūpakaṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:682_4: “ayyadhītā me idhāgatā”ti saññāya santajjetvā “dubbinīte kiṃ tvaṃ idhāgatā”ti talasattikaṃ
atk-s0401a:682_5: uggiritvā “gaccha sīgha”nti gaṇḍapasse pahari. Hattho pāsāṇe paṭihato viya kampittha.
atk-s0401a:682_6: Sā paṭikkamitvā “evaṃ thaddhaṃ nāma mahāgīvaṃ disvā ‘ayyadhītā me’ti saññaṃ uppādesiṃ,
atk-s0401a:682_7: ayyadhītāya hi me nivāsanapaṭiggāhikāyapi ayuttā”ti āha. Atha naṃ te manussā parivāretvā
atk-s0401a:682_8: “evarūpā te sāmidhītā”ti pucchiṃsu. Kiṃ esā, imāya sataguṇena sahassaguṇena mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:682_9: ayyādhītā abhirūpatarā, dvādasahatthe gabbhe nisinnāya padīpakiccaṃ natthi, sarīrobhāseneva
atk-s0401a:682_10: tamaṃ vidhamatīti. “Tena hi āgacchā”ti khujjaṃ gahetvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ rathaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0401a:682_11: kosiyagottassa brāhmaṇassa gharadvāre ṭhatvā āgamanaṃ nivedayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:683_0: Brāhmaṇo paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchi. Magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthagāme
atk-s0401a:683_1: kapilabrāhmaṇassa gharatoti. Kiṃ kāraṇā āgatāti? Iminā nāma kāraṇenāti. “Kalyāṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:683_2: tātā, samajātigottavibhavo amhākaṃ brāhmaṇo, dassāmi dārika”nti paṇṇākāraṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:683_3: Te kapilabrāhmaṇassa sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu “laddhā dārikā, kattabbaṃ karothā”ti. Taṃ
atk-s0401a:683_4: sāsanaṃ sutvā pippalimāṇavassa ārocayiṃsu “laddhā kira dārikā”ti. Māṇavo “ahaṃ ‘na
atk-s0401a:683_5: labhissantī’ti cintesiṃ, ‘ime laddhāti vadanti’, anatthiko hutvā paṇṇaṃ pesessāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:683_6: rahogato paṇṇaṃ likhi “bhaddā attano jātigottabhogānurūpaṃ gharāvāsaṃ labhatu, ahaṃ
atk-s0401a:683_7: nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmi, mā pacchā vippaṭisārinī ahosī”ti. Bhaddāpi “asukassa kira
atk-s0401a:683_8: maṃ dātukāmo”ti sutvā rahogatā paṇṇaṃ likhi “ayyaputto attano jātigottabhogānurūpaṃ
atk-s0401a:683_9: gharāvāsaṃ labhatu, ahaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmi, mā pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosī”ti.
atk-s0401a:683_10: Dve paṇṇāni antarāmagge samāgacchiṃsu. Idaṃ kassa paṇṇanti? Pippalimāṇavena bhaddāya
atk-s0401a:683_11: pahitanti. Idaṃ kassāti? Bhaddāya pippalimāṇavassa pahitanti ca vutte dvepi vācetvā
atk-s0401a:683_12: “passatha dārakānaṃ kamma”nti phāletvā araññe chaḍḍetvā samānapaṇṇaṃ likhitvā ito
atk-s0401a:683_13: ca etto ca pesesuṃ. Iti tesaṃ anicchamānānaṃyeva samāgamo ahosi.
atk-s0401a:684_0: Taṃdivasameva māṇavo ekaṃ pupphadāmaṃ gahetvā ṭhapesi. Bhaddāpi, tāni sayanamajjhe
atk-s0401a:684_1: ṭhapesi. Bhuttasāyamāsā ubhopi “sayanaṃ abhiruhissāmā”ti samāgantvā māṇavo dakkhiṇapassena
atk-s0401a:684_2: sayanaṃ abhiruhi. Bhaddā vāmapassena abhiruhitvā āha – “yassa passe pupphāni milāyanti,
atk-s0401a:684_3: tassa rāgacittaṃ uppannanti vijānissāma, imaṃ pupphadāmaṃ na allīyitabba”nti. Te
atk-s0401a:684_4: pana aññamaññaṃ sarīrasamphassabhayena tiyāmarattiṃ niddaṃ anokkamantāva vītināmenti,
atk-s0401a:684_5: divā pana hāsamattampi nāhosi. Te lokāmisena asaṃsaṭṭhā yāva mātāpitaro dharanti,
atk-s0401a:684_6: tāva kuṭumbaṃ avicāretvā tesu kālaṅkatesu vicārayiṃsu. Mahatī māṇavassa sampatti
atk-s0401a:684_7: sattāsītikoṭidhanaṃ, ekadivasaṃ sarīraṃ ubbaṭṭetvā chaḍḍetabbaṃ suvaṇṇacuṇṇameva
atk-s0401a:684_8: magadhanāḷiyā dvādasanāḷimattaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati. Yantabaddhāni saṭṭhi mahātaḷākāni,
atk-s0401a:684_9: kammanto dvādasayojaniko, anurādhapurappamāṇā cuddasa gāmā, cuddasa hatthānīkā, cuddasa
atk-s0401a:685_0: So ekadivasaṃ alaṅkataassaṃ āruyha mahājanaparivuto kammantaṃ gantvā khettakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:685_1: ṭhito naṅgalehi bhinnaṭṭhānato kākādayo sakuṇe gaṇḍuppādādipāṇake uddharitvā khādante
atk-s0401a:685_2: disvā, “tātā, ime kiṃ khādantī”ti pucchi. Gaṇḍuppāde, ayyāti. Etehi kataṃ pāpaṃ kassa
atk-s0401a:685_3: hotīti? Tumhākaṃ, ayyāti. So cintesi – “sace etehi kataṃ pāpaṃ mayhaṃ hoti, kiṃ me
atk-s0401a:685_4: karissati sattāsītikoṭidhanaṃ, kiṃ dvādasayojaniko kammanto, kiṃ saṭṭhiyantabaddhāni
atk-s0401a:685_5: taḷākāni, kiṃ cuddasa gāmā? Sabbametaṃ bhaddāya kāpilāniyā niyyātetvā nikkhamma pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0401a:686_0: Bhaddāpi kāpilānī tasmiṃ khaṇe antaravatthumhi tayo tilakumbhe pattharāpetvā dhātīhi
atk-s0401a:686_1: parivutā nisinnā kāke tilapāṇake khādante disvā, “ammā, kiṃ ime khādantī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:686_2: Pāṇake, ayyeti. Akusalaṃ kassa hotīti? Tumhākaṃ, ayyeti. Sā cintesi – “mayhaṃ catuhatthavatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:686_3: nāḷikodanamattañca laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, yadi panetaṃ ettakena janena kataṃ akusalaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:686_4: hoti, addhā bhavasahassenapi vaṭṭato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkā, ayyaputte āgatamatteyeva
atk-s0401a:687_0: Māṇavo āgantvā nhāyitvā pāsādaṃ āruyha mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdi. Athassa cakkavattino
atk-s0401a:687_1: anucchavikaṃ bhojanaṃ sajjayiṃsu. Dvepi bhuñjitvā parijane nikkhante rahogatā phāsukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:687_2: nisīdiṃsu. Tato māṇavo bhaddaṃ āha – “bhadde imaṃ gharaṃ āgacchantī kittakaṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0401a:687_3: āharī”ti? Pañcapaṇṇāsa sakaṭasahassāni, ayyāti. Etaṃ sabbaṃ, yā ca imasmiṃ ghare
atk-s0401a:687_4: sattāsīti koṭiyo yantabaddhā saṭṭhitaḷākādibhedā sampatti atthi, sabbaṃ tuyhaṃyeva
atk-s0401a:687_5: niyyātemīti. Tumhe pana kahaṃ gacchatha, ayyāti? Ahaṃ pabbajissāmīti. Ayya, ahampi
atk-s0401a:687_6: tumhākaṃyeva āgamanaṃ olokayamānā nisinnā, ahampi pabbajissāmīti. Tesaṃ ādittapaṇṇakuṭi
atk-s0401a:687_7: viya tayo bhavā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Te antarāpaṇato kasāvarasapītāni vatthāni mattikāpatte
atk-s0401a:687_8: ca āharāpetvā aññamaññaṃ kese ohārāpetvā “ye loke arahanto, te uddissa amhākaṃ pabbajjā”ti
atk-s0401a:687_9: vatvā thavikāya patte osāretvā aṃse laggetvā pāsādato otariṃsu. Gehe dāsesu vā kammakāresu vā na koci sañjāni.
atk-s0401a:688_0: Atha ne brāhmaṇagāmato nikkhamma dāsagāmadvārena gacchante ākappakuttavasena dāsagāmavāsino
atk-s0401a:688_1: sañjāniṃsu. Te rodantā pādesu nipatitvā “kiṃ amhe anāthe karotha, ayyā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:688_2: “Mayaṃ bhaṇe ādittapaṇṇasālā viya tayo bhavāti pabbajimhā, sace tumhesu ekekaṃ bhujissaṃ
atk-s0401a:688_3: karoma, vassasatampi nappahoti. Tumheva tumhākaṃ sīsaṃ dhovitvā bhujissā hutvā jīvathā”ti
atk-s0401a:688_4: vatvā tesaṃ rodantānaṃyeva pakkamiṃsu. Thero purato gacchanto nivattitvā olokento
atk-s0401a:688_5: cintesi – “ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī sakalajambudīpagghanikā itthī mayhaṃ pacchato āgacchati.
atk-s0401a:688_6: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ kocideva evaṃ cinteyya ‘ime pabbajitvāpi vinā bhavituṃ
atk-s0401a:688_7: na sakkonti, ananucchavikaṃ karontī’ti. Koci vā pana amhesu manaṃ padūsetvā apāyapūrako
atk-s0401a:688_8: bhaveyya. Imaṃ pahāya mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0401a:689_0: So purato gacchanto dvedhāpathaṃ disvā tassa matthake aṭṭhāsi. Bhaddāpi āgantvā vanditvā
atk-s0401a:689_1: aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ āha – “bhadde tādisiṃ itthiṃ mama pacchato āgacchantiṃ disvā ‘ime
atk-s0401a:689_2: pabbajitvāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkontī’ti cintetvā amhesu paduṭṭhacitto mahājano
atk-s0401a:689_3: apāyapūrako bhaveyya. Imasmiṃ dvedhāpathe tvaṃ ekaṃ gaṇha, ahaṃ ekena gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0401a:689_4: “Āma, ayya, pabbajitānaṃ mātugāmo nāma malaṃ, ‘pabbajitvāpi vinā na bhavantī’ti amhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:689_5: dosaṃ dassanti, tumhe ekaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhatha, ahaṃ ekaṃ gaṇhitvā vinā bhavissāmā”ti
atk-s0401a:689_6: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ
atk-s0401a:689_7: añjaliṃ paggayha “satasahassakappappamāṇe addhāne kato mittasanthavo ajja bhijjatī”ti
atk-s0401a:689_8: vatvā “tumhe dakkhiṇajātikā nāma, tumhākaṃ dakkhiṇamaggo vaṭṭati. Mayaṃ mātugāmā
atk-s0401a:689_9: nāma vāmajātikā, amhākaṃ vāmamaggo vaṭṭatī”ti vanditvā maggaṃ paṭipannā. Tesaṃ dvedhābhūtakāle
atk-s0401a:689_10: ayaṃ mahāpathavī “ahaṃ cakkavāḷagirisinerupabbate dhāretuṃ sakkontīpi tumhākaṃ guṇe
atk-s0401a:689_11: dhāretuṃ na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya viravamānā akampi, ākāse asanisaddo viya pavatti,
atk-s0401a:690_0: Sammāsambuddho veḷuvanamahāvihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinno pathavīkampanasaddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0401a:690_1: “kassa nu kho pathavī kampatī”ti āvajjento “pippalimāṇavo ca bhaddā ca kāpilānī maṃ
atk-s0401a:690_2: uddissa appameyyaṃ sampattiṃ pahāya pabbajitā, tesaṃ viyogaṭṭhāne ubhinnampi guṇabalena
atk-s0401a:690_3: ayaṃ pathavīkampo jāto, mayāpi etesaṃ saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gandhakuṭito nikkhamma
atk-s0401a:690_4: sayameva pattacīvaramādāya asītimahātheresu kañci anāmantetvā tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0401a:690_5: katvā rājagahassa ca nālandāya ca antare bahuputtakanigrodharukkhamūle pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0401a:690_6: ābhujitvā nisīdi. Nisīdanto pana aññatarapaṃsukūliko viya anisīditvā buddhavesaṃ
atk-s0401a:690_7: gahetvā asītihatthā ghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjento nisīdi. Iti tasmiṃ khaṇe paṇṇacchattasakaṭacakkakūṭāgārādippamāṇā
atk-s0401a:690_8: buddharasmiyo ito cito ca vipphandantiyo vidhāvantiyo candasahassa-sūriyasahassa-uggamanakālo
atk-s0401a:690_9: viya kurumānā taṃ vanantaṃ ekobhāsaṃ akaṃsu. Dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasiriyā samujjalatārāgaṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:690_10: viya gaganaṃ, supupphitakamalakuvalayaṃ viya salilaṃ vanantaṃ virocittha. Nigrodharukkhassa
atk-s0401a:690_11: khandho nāma seto hoti, pattāni nāma nīlāni, pakkāni rattāni. Tasmiṃ pana divase
atk-s0401a:691_0: Mahākassapatthero “ayaṃ mayhaṃ satthā bhavissati, imāhaṃ uddissa pabbajito”ti diṭṭhaṭṭhānato
atk-s0401a:691_1: paṭṭhāya oṇatoṇato gantvā tīsu ṭhānesu vanditvā “satthā me, bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmi,
atk-s0401a:691_2: satthā me, bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī”ti āha. Atha naṃ bhagavā avoca – “kassapa,
atk-s0401a:691_3: sace tvaṃ imaṃ nipaccakāraṃ mahāpathaviyā kareyyāsi, sāpi dhāretuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-s0401a:691_4: Tathāgatassa evaṃ guṇamahantataṃ jānatā tayā kato nipaccakāro mayhaṃ lomampi cāletuṃ
atk-s0401a:691_5: na sakkoti. Nisīda, kassapa, dāyajjaṃ te dassāmī”ti. Athassa bhagavā tīhi ovādehi
atk-s0401a:691_6: upasampadaṃ adāsi. Datvā bahuputtakanigrodhamūlato nikkhamitvā theraṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:691_7: katvā maggaṃ paṭipajji. Satthu sarīraṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇavicittaṃ, mahākassapassa
atk-s0401a:691_8: sattamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ. So kañcanamahānāvāya pacchābandho viya satthu
atk-s0401a:691_9: padānupadikaṃ anugañchi. Satthā thokaṃ maggaṃ gantvā maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle
atk-s0401a:691_10: nisajjākāraṃ dassesi, thero “nisīditukāmo satthā”ti ñatvā attano pārupanapilotikasaṅghāṭiṃ
atk-s0401a:692_0: Satthā tasmiṃ nisīditvā hatthena cīvaraṃ parāmasitvā “mudukā kho tyāyaṃ, kassapa,
atk-s0401a:692_1: pilotikasaṅghāṭī”ti āha. Thero “satthā me saṅghāṭiyā mudukabhāvaṃ katheti, pārupitukāmo
atk-s0401a:692_2: bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “pārupatu, bhante, bhagavā saṅghāṭi”nti āha. Kiṃ tvaṃ pārupissasi
atk-s0401a:692_3: kassapāti? Tumhākaṃ nivāsanaṃ labhanto pārupissāmi, bhanteti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ, kassapa,
atk-s0401a:692_4: imaṃ paribhogajiṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhāretuṃ sakkhissasi? Mayā hi imassa paṃsukūlassa
atk-s0401a:692_5: gahitadivase udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi, imaṃ buddhānaṃ paribhogajiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:692_6: cīvaraṃ nāma na sakkā parittaguṇena dhāretuṃ, paṭibalenevidaṃ paṭipattipūraṇasamatthena
atk-s0401a:692_7: jātipaṃsukūlikena gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā therena saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattesi.
atk-s0401a:693_0: Evaṃ pana cīvaraparivattaṃ katvā therena pārutacīvaraṃ bhagavā pārupi, satthu cīvaraṃ
atk-s0401a:693_1: thero pārupi. Tasmiṃ samaye acetanāpi ayaṃ mahāpathavī “dukkaraṃ, bhante, akattha,
atk-s0401a:693_2: attanā pārutacīvaraṃ sāvakassa dinnapubbaṃ nāma natthi, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ guṇaṃ dhāretuṃ
atk-s0401a:693_3: na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya udakapariyantaṃ katvā kampi. Theropi “laddhaṃ dāni mayā
atk-s0401a:693_4: buddhānaṃ paribhogacīvaraṃ, kiṃ me idāni uttari kattabbaṃ atthī”ti unnatiṃ akatvā
atk-s0401a:693_5: buddhānaṃ santikeyeva terasa dhutaguṇe samādāya sattadivasamattaṃ puthujjano hutvā
atk-s0401a:693_6: aṭṭhame aruṇe saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Satthāpi “kassapo, bhikkhave,
atk-s0401a:693_7: candūpamo kulāni upasaṅkamati, apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavako kulesu
atk-s0401a:693_8: appagabbho”ti evamādīhi suttehi theraṃ thometvā aparabhāge etadeva kassapasaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0401a:693_9: aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā “mama sāsane dhutavādānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahākassapo aggo”ti theraṃ
atk-s0401a:695_0: 192. Pañcame dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddhoti dibbacakkhukabhikkhūnaṃ anuruddhatthero
atk-s0401a:695_1: aggoti vadati. Tassa ciṇṇavasitāya aggabhāvo veditabbo. Thero kira bhojanapapañcamattaṃ
atk-s0401a:695_2: ṭhapetvā sesakālaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā satte olokentova viharati. Iti
atk-s0401a:695_3: ahorattaṃ ciṇṇavasitāya esa dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo nāma jāto. Apica kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:696_0: Tatrassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi kulaputto padumuttarasseva bhagavato
atk-s0401a:696_1: kāle pacchābhattaṃ dhammassavanatthaṃ vihāraṃ gacchantena mahājanena saddhiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:696_2: Ayaṃ hi tadā aññataro apākaṭanāmo issarakuṭumbiko ahosi. So dasabalaṃ vanditvā parisapariyante
atk-s0401a:696_3: ṭhito dhammakathaṃ suṇāti. Satthā desanaṃ yathānusandhikaṃ ghaṭetvā ekaṃ dibbacakkhukaṃ
atk-s0401a:697_0: Tato kuṭumbikassa etadahosi – “mahā vatāyaṃ bhikkhu, yaṃ evaṃ satthā sayaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ
atk-s0401a:697_1: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Aho vatāhampi anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa sāsane dibbacakkhukānaṃ
atk-s0401a:697_2: aggo bhaveyya”nti cittaṃ uppādetvā parisantarena gantvā svātanāya bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0401a:697_3: saddhiṃ nimantetvā punadivase buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0401a:697_4: “mahantaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ mayā patthita”nti teneva niyāmena ajjatanāya svātanāyāti nimantetvā
atk-s0401a:697_5: satta divasāni mahādānaṃ pavattetvā saparivārassa bhagavato uttamavatthāni datvā
atk-s0401a:697_6: “bhagavā nāhaṃ imaṃ sakkāraṃ dibbasampattiyā na manussasampattiyā atthāya karomi.
atk-s0401a:697_7: Yaṃ pana tumhe ito sattadivasamatthake bhikkhuṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapayittha,
atk-s0401a:697_8: ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane so bhikkhu viya dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0401a:697_9: patthanaṃ katvā pādamūle nipajji. Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:697_10: ñatvā evamāha – “ambho purisa, anāgate kappasatasahassapariyosāne gotamo nāma buddho
atk-s0401a:697_11: uppajjissati, tassa sāsane tvaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo anuruddho nāma bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0401a:697_12: Evañca pana vatvā bhattānumodanaṃ katvā vihārameva agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:698_0: Kuṭumbikopi yāva buddho dharati, tāva avijahitameva kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā parinibbute
atk-s0401a:698_1: satthari niṭṭhite sattayojanike suvaṇṇacetiye bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:698_2: kiṃ dibbacakkhussa parikamma”nti pucchi. Padīpadānaṃ nāma dātuṃ vaṭṭati upāsakāti.
atk-s0401a:698_3: Sādhu, bhante, karissāmīti sahassadīpānaṃyeva tāva dīparukkhānaṃ sahassaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0401a:698_4: tadanantaraṃ tato parittatare, tadanantaraṃ tato pariyattatareti anekasahasse dīparukkhe
atk-s0401a:699_0: Evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:699_1: atikkamitvā kassapasammāsambuddhassa kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyagehe nibbattitvā parinibbute
atk-s0401a:699_2: satthari niṭṭhite yojanike cetiye bahu kaṃsapātiyo kārāpetvā sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā
atk-s0401a:699_3: majjhe ekekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā ujjāletvā mukhavaṭṭiyā mukhavaṭṭiṃ phusāpento cetiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:699_4: parikkhipāpetvā attano sabbamahantaṃ kaṃsapātiṃ kāretvā sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā tassā
atk-s0401a:699_5: mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ samantato vaṭṭisahassaṃ jālāpetvā majjhaṭṭhāne thūpikaṃ pilotikāya
atk-s0401a:699_6: veṭhetvā jālāpetvā kaṃsapātiṃ sīsenādāya sabbarattiṃ yojanikaṃ cetiyaṃ anupariyāyi.
atk-s0401a:699_7: Evaṃ tenāpi attabhāvena yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:700_0: Puna anuppanne buddhe tasmiṃyeva nagare duggatakulassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0401a:700_1: sumanaseṭṭhiṃ nāma nissāya vasi, annabhārotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So pana sumanaseṭṭhi
atk-s0401a:700_2: devasikaṃ kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ gehadvāre mahādānaṃ deti. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0401a:700_3: upariṭṭho nāma paccekabuddho gandhamādanapabbate nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanno. Tato
atk-s0401a:700_4: vuṭṭhāya “ajja kassa anuggahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vīmaṃsi. Paccekabuddhā ca nāma duggatānukampakā
atk-s0401a:700_5: honti. So “ajja mayā annabhārassa anuggahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā “idāni annabhāro
atk-s0401a:700_6: aṭavito attano gehaṃ āgamissatī”ti ñatvā pattacīvaramādāya gandhamādanapabbatā vehāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:701_0: Annabhāro paccekabuddhaṃ tucchapattahatthaṃ disvā paccekabuddhaṃ abhivādetvā “api,
atk-s0401a:701_1: bhante, bhikkhaṃ labhitthā”ti pucchi. Labhissāma mahāpuññāti. “Bhante, thokaṃ idheva
atk-s0401a:701_2: hothā”ti vegena gantvā attano gehe mātugāmaṃ pucchi – “bhadde, mayhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ bhāgabhattaṃ
atk-s0401a:701_3: atthi, natthī”ti? Atthi sāmīti. So tatova gantvā paccekabuddhassa hatthato pattamādāya
atk-s0401a:701_4: āgantvā “bhadde, mayaṃ purimabhave kalyāṇakammassa akatattā bhattaṃ paccāsīsamānā
atk-s0401a:701_5: viharāma, amhākaṃ dātukāmatāya sati deyyadhammo na hoti, deyyadhamme sati paṭiggāhakaṃ
atk-s0401a:701_6: na labhāma, ajja me upariṭṭhapaccekabuddho diṭṭho, bhāgabhattañca atthi, mayhaṃ bhāgabhattaṃ
atk-s0401a:702_0: Byattā itthī “yato mayhaṃ sāmiko bhāgabhattaṃ deti, mayāpi imasmiṃ dāne bhāginiyā
atk-s0401a:702_1: bhavitabba”nti attano bhāgabhattampi upariṭṭhassa paccekabuddhassa patte patiṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:702_2: adāsi. Annabhāro pattaṃ āharitvā paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapetvā, “bhante, evarūpā
atk-s0401a:702_3: dujjīvitā muccāmā”ti āha. Evaṃ hotu, mahāpuññāti. So attano uttarasāṭakaṃ ekasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:702_4: padese attharitvā, “bhante, idha nisīditvā paribhuñjathā”ti āha. Paccekabuddho tattha
atk-s0401a:702_5: nisīditvā navavidhaṃ pāṭikūlyaṃ paccavekkhanto paribhuñji. Paribhuttakāle annabhāro
atk-s0401a:704: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0401a:705_0: Anumodanaṃ katvā maggaṃ paṭipajji. Sumanaseṭṭhissa chatte adhivatthā devatā “aho
atk-s0401a:705_1: dānaṃ paramadānaṃ upariṭṭhe suppatiṭṭhita”nti tikkhattuṃ vatvā sādhukāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:705_2: Sumanaseṭṭhi “kiṃ tvaṃ maṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dānaṃ dadamānaṃ na passasī”ti āha. Nāhaṃ
atk-s0401a:705_3: tava dāne sādhukāraṃ demi, annabhārena upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhassa dinnapiṇḍapāte pasīditvā sādhukāraṃ demīti.
atk-s0401a:706_0: Sumanaseṭṭhi cintesi – “acchariyaṃ vatidaṃ, ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dānaṃ dento devataṃ
atk-s0401a:706_1: sādhukāraṃ dāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ. Ayaṃ annabhāro maṃ nissāya vasanto anurūpassa paṭiggāhakapuggalassa
atk-s0401a:706_2: laddhattā ekapiṇḍapātadāneneva sādhukāraṃ dāpesi, etassa anucchavikaṃ datvā etaṃ
atk-s0401a:706_3: piṇḍapātaṃ mama santakaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti annabhāraṃ pakkosāpetvā “ajja tayā kassaci
atk-s0401a:706_4: kiñci dānaṃ dinna”nti pucchi. Āma, ayya, upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhassa me attano bhāgabhattaṃ
atk-s0401a:706_5: dinnanti. Handa, bho, kahāpaṇaṃ gaṇhitvā etaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ mayhaṃ dehīti. Na demi ayyāti.
atk-s0401a:706_6: So yāva sahassaṃ vaḍḍhesi, annabhāro “sahassenāpi na demī”ti āha. Hotu, bho, yadi
atk-s0401a:706_7: piṇḍapātaṃ na desi, sahassaṃ gaṇhitvā pattiṃ me dehīti. “Etampi dātuṃ yuttaṃ vā ayuttaṃ
atk-s0401a:706_8: vā na jānāmi, ayyaṃ pana upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhaṃ pucchitvā sace dātuṃ yuttaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:706_9: dassāmī”ti gantvā paccekabuddhaṃ sampāpuṇitvā, “bhante, sumanaseṭṭhi mayhaṃ sahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:706_10: datvā tumhākaṃ dinnapiṇḍapāte pattiṃ yācati, dammi vā na dammi vā”ti. Upamaṃ te paṇḍita
atk-s0401a:706_11: karissāmi. Seyyathāpi kulasatike gāme ekasmiṃyeva ghare dīpaṃ jāleyya, sesā attano
atk-s0401a:706_12: attano telena vaṭṭiṃ temetvā jālāpetvā gaṇheyyuṃ, purimadīpassa pabhā atthi, natthīti.
atk-s0401a:706_13: Atirekatarā, bhante, pabhā hotīti. Evameva paṇḍita uḷuṅkayāgu vā hotu kaṭacchubhikkhā
atk-s0401a:706_14: vā, attano piṇḍapāte paresaṃ pattiṃ dentassa satassa vā detu sahassassa vā, yattakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:706_15: deti, tattakānaṃ puññaṃ vaḍḍhati. Tvaṃ dento ekameva piṇḍapātaṃ adāsi, sumanaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0401a:706_16: pana pattiyā dinnāya dve piṇḍapātā honti eko tava, eko ca tassāti.
atk-s0401a:707_0: So paccekabuddhaṃ abhivādetvā sumanaseṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā “piṇḍapāte pattiṃ gaṇha
atk-s0401a:707_1: sāmī”ti āha. Handa, kahāpaṇasahassaṃ gaṇhāti. Nāhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vikkiṇāmi, saddhāya
atk-s0401a:707_2: pana tumhākaṃ pattiṃ demīti. Tāta, tvaṃ mayhaṃ saddhāya pattiṃ desi, ahaṃ pana tuyhaṃ
atk-s0401a:707_3: guṇaṃ pūjento sahassaṃ demi, gaṇha, tātāti. So “evaṃ hotū”ti sahassaṃ gaṇhi. Tāta,
atk-s0401a:707_4: tuyhaṃ sahassaṃ laddhakālato paṭṭhāya sahatthā kammakaraṇakiccaṃ natthi, vīthiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:707_5: gharaṃ māpetvā vasa. Yena tuyhaṃ attho, taṃ maṃ āharāpetvā gaṇhāhīti. Nirodhasamāpattito
atk-s0401a:707_6: vuṭṭhitapaccekabuddhassa dinnapiṇḍapāto nāma taṃdivasameva vipākaṃ deti. Tasmā sumanaseṭṭhi
atk-s0401a:707_7: aññaṃ divasaṃ annabhāraṃ gahetvā rājakulaṃ agacchantopi taṃdivasaṃ gahetvāva gato.
atk-s0401a:708_0: Annabhārassa puññaṃ āgamma rājā seṭṭhiṃ anoloketvā annabhārameva olokesi. Kiṃ, deva,
atk-s0401a:708_1: imaṃ purisaṃ ativiya olokesīti? Aññaṃ divasaṃ adiṭṭhapubbattā olokemīti. Oloketabbayuttako
atk-s0401a:708_2: esa devāti. Ko panassa oloketabbayuttako guṇoti? Ajja attano bhāgabhattaṃ sayaṃ abhuñjitvā
atk-s0401a:708_3: upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhassa dinnattā mama hatthato sahassaṃ labhi devāti. Konāmo esoti?
atk-s0401a:708_4: Annabhāro nāma devāti. “Tava hatthato laddhattā mamapi hatthato laddhuṃ arahati,
atk-s0401a:708_5: ahampissa pūjaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā sahassaṃ adāsi. Etassa vasanagehaṃ jānātha bhaṇeti?
atk-s0401a:708_6: Sādhu devāti ekaṃ gehaṭṭhānaṃ sodhentā kuddālena āhatāhataṭṭhāne nidhikumbhiyo gīvāya
atk-s0401a:708_7: gīvaṃ āhacca ṭhitā disvā rañño ārocayiṃsu. Rājā “tena hi gantvā khanathā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:708_8: Tesaṃ khanantānaṃ khanantānaṃ heṭṭhā gacchanti. Puna gantvā rañño ārocayiṃsu. Rājā
atk-s0401a:708_9: “annabhārassa vacanena khanathā”ti āha. Te gantvā “annabhārasseva vacana”nti khaniṃsu.
atk-s0401a:708_10: Kuddālena āhatāhataṭṭhāne ahicchattakamakuḷāni viya kumbhiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu. Te dhanaṃ
atk-s0401a:708_11: āharitvā rañño santike rāsiṃ akaṃsu. Rājā amacce sannipātetvā “imasmiṃ nagare kassa
atk-s0401a:708_12: aññassa ettakaṃ dhanaṃ atthī”ti pucchi. Natthi kassaci devāti. Tena hi ayaṃ annabhāro
atk-s0401a:708_13: imasmiṃ nagare dhanaseṭṭhi nāma hotūti. Taṃdivasameva seṭṭhicchattaṃ labhi.
atk-s0401a:709_0: So tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto. Dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0401a:709_1: devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ satthu uppajjanakāle kapilavatthunagare amittodanasakkassa
atk-s0401a:709_2: gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Nāmaggahaṇadivase panassa anuruddhoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Mahānāmasakkassa
atk-s0401a:709_3: kaniṭṭhabhātā satthu cūḷapituputto paramasukhumālo mahāpuñño ahosi. Suvaṇṇapātiyaṃyevassa
atk-s0401a:709_4: bhattaṃ uppajji. Athassa mātā ekadivasaṃ “mama puttaṃ natthīti padaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:709_5: ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ aññāya suvaṇṇapātiyā pidahitvā tucchakaṃyeva pesesi. Antarāmagge
atk-s0401a:709_6: devatā dibbapūvehi pūresuṃ. Evaṃ mahāpuñño ahosi. Tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu
atk-s0401a:709_7: pāsādesu alaṅkatanāṭakitthīhi parivuto devo viya sampattiṃ anubhavi.
atk-s0401a:710_0: Amhākampi bodhisatto tasmiṃ samaye tusitapurā cavitvā suddhodanamahārājassa aggamahesiyā
atk-s0401a:710_1: kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā anukkamena vuddhippatto ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe
atk-s0401a:710_2: vasitvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anukkamena paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo bodhimaṇḍe
atk-s0401a:710_3: sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā isipatane migadāye dhammacakkappattanaṃ pavattetvā lokānuggahaṃ
atk-s0401a:710_4: karonto rājagahaṃ āgamma “putto me rājagahaṃ āgato”ti sutvā “gacchatha bhaṇe mama
atk-s0401a:710_5: puttaṃ ānethā”ti pitarā pahite sahassasahassaparivāre dasa amacce ehibhikkhupabbajjāya
atk-s0401a:710_6: pabbājetvā kāḷudāyittherena cārikāgamanaṃ āyācito rājagahato vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivāro
atk-s0401a:710_7: nikkhamitvā kapilavatthupuraṃ gantvā ñātisamāgame anekehi iddhipāṭihāriyehi sappāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0401a:710_8: vicitradhammadesanaṃ katvā mahājanaṃ amatapānaṃ pāyetvā dutiyadivase pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0401a:710_9: nagaradvāre ṭhatvā “kiṃ nu kho kulanagaraṃ āgatānaṃ sabbaññubuddhānaṃ āciṇṇa”nti
atk-s0401a:710_10: āvajjamāno “sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ āciṇṇa”nti ñatvā sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caranto
atk-s0401a:710_11: “putto me piṇḍāya caratī”ti sutvā āgatassa rañño dhammaṃ kathetvā tena sakanivesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:710_12: pavesetvā katasakkārasammāno tattha kātabbaṃ ñātijanānuggahaṃ katvā rāhulakumāraṃ
atk-s0401a:710_13: pabbājetvā nacirasseva kapilavatthupurato mallaraṭṭhe cārikaṃ caramāno anupiyaambavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:711_0: Tasmiṃ samaye suddhodanamahārājā sākiyajanaṃ sannipātetvā āha – “sace mama putto
atk-s0401a:711_1: agāraṃ ajjhāvasissa, rājā abhavissa cakkavattī sattaratanasamannāgato. Nattāpi me
atk-s0401a:711_2: rāhulakumāro khattiyagaṇena saddhiṃ taṃ parivāretvā acarissa, tumhepi etamatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:711_3: jānātha. Idāni pana me putto buddho jāto, khattiyāvassa parivārā hontu. Tumhe ekekakulato
atk-s0401a:711_4: ekekaṃ dārakaṃ dethā”ti. Evaṃ vutte ekappahāreneva sahassakhattiyakumārā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:711_5: Tasmiṃ samaye mahānāmo kuṭumbasāmiko hoti. So anuruddhasakkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca
atk-s0401a:711_6: – “etarahi, tāta anuruddha, abhiññātā abhiññātā sakyakumārā bhagavantaṃ pabbajitaṃ
atk-s0401a:711_7: anupabbajanti, amhākaṃ kule natthi koci agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito. Tena hi tvaṃ
atk-s0401a:711_8: vā pabbaja, ahaṃ vā pabbajissāmī”ti. So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gharāvāse ruciṃ akatvā
atk-s0401a:711_9: attasattamo agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito. Tassa pabbajjānukkamo saṅghabhedakakkhandhake āgatova.
atk-s0401a:712_0: Evaṃ anupiyaambavanaṃ gantvā pabbajitesu pana tesu tasmiṃyeva antovasse bhaddiyatthero
atk-s0401a:712_1: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Anuruddhatthero dibbacakkhuṃ nibbattesi, devadatto aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0401a:712_2: nibbattesi, ānandatthero sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi, bhagutthero ca kimilatthero ca
atk-s0401a:712_3: pacchā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tesaṃ pana sabbesampi therānaṃ attano attano āgataṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:712_4: pubbapatthanābhinīhāro āgamissati. Ayaṃ pana anuruddhatthero dhammasenāpatissa santike
atk-s0401a:712_5: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā cetiyaraṭṭhe pācīnavaṃsamigadāyaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto
atk-s0401a:712_6: satta mahāpurisavitakke vitakkesi, aṭṭhame kilamati. Satthā “anuruddho aṭṭhame mahāpurisavitakke
atk-s0401a:712_7: kilamatī”ti ñatvā “tassa saṅkappaṃ pūressāmī”ti tattha gantvā paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0401a:712_9: mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ kathetvā ākāse uppatitvā bhesakalāvanameva gato.
atk-s0401a:713_0: Thero tathāgate gatamatteyeva tevijjo mahākhīṇāsavo hutvā “satthā mayhaṃ manaṃ jānitvā
atk-s0401a:713_1: āgantvā aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ pūretvā adāsi. So ca me manoratho matthakaṃ patto”ti
atk-s0401a:713_2: buddhānaṃ dhammadesanaṃ attano ca paṭividdhadhammaṃ ārabbha imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0401a:716: “Yathā me ahu saṅkappo, tato uttari desayi;
atk-s0401a:719: Tisso vijjā anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. ;
atk-s0401a:720: Atha naṃ aparabhāge satthā jetavanamahāvihāre viharanto “mama sāsane dibbacakkhukānaṃ anuruddho aggo”ti aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:722_0: 193. Chaṭṭhe uccākulikānanti ucce kule jātānaṃ. Bhaddiyoti anuruddhattherena saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:722_1: nikkhamanto sakyarājā. Kāḷigodhāya puttoti kāḷavaṇṇā sā devī, godhāti panassā nāmaṃ.
atk-s0401a:722_2: Tasmā kāḷigodhāti vuccati, tassā puttoti attho. Kasmā panāyaṃ uccākulikānaṃ aggoti
atk-s0401a:722_3: vutto, kiṃ tato uccākulikatarā natthīti? Āma natthi. Tassa hi mātā sākiyānīnaṃ antare
atk-s0401a:722_4: vayena sabbajeṭṭhikā, soyeva ca sākiyakule sampattaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito. Tasmā
atk-s0401a:722_5: uccākulikānaṃ aggoti vutto. Apica pubbapatthanānubhāvena cesa anupaṭipāṭiyā pañca
atk-s0401a:722_6: jātisatāni rājakule nibbattitvā rajjaṃ kāresiyeva. Imināpi kāraṇena uccākulikānaṃ aggoti vutto.
atk-s0401a:723_0: Pañhakamme panassa ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi atīte padumuttarabuddhakāle mahābhogakule
atk-s0401a:723_1: nibbatto vuttanayeneva dhammassavanatthāya gato. Taṃdivasaṃ satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0401a:723_2: uccākulikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate ekassa buddhassa
atk-s0401a:723_3: sāsane uccākulikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tathāgataṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0401a:723_4: satta divasāni buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā, “bhante, ahaṃ
atk-s0401a:723_5: imassa dānassa phalena nāññaṃ sampattiṃ ākaṅkhāmi, anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa
atk-s0401a:723_6: sāsane uccākulikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthayitvā pādamūle nipajji.
atk-s0401a:724_0: Satthā anāgataṃ olokento samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “samijjhissati te idaṃ kammaṃ, ito
atk-s0401a:724_1: kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, tvaṃ tassa sāsane uccākulikānaṃ
atk-s0401a:724_2: bhikkhūnaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā bhattānumodanaṃ katvā vihāraṃ agamāsi. Sopi
atk-s0401a:724_3: taṃ byākaraṇaṃ labhitvā uccākulikasaṃvattanikakammaṃ pucchitvā dhammāsanāni kāretvā
atk-s0401a:724_4: tesu paccattharaṇāni santharāpetvā dhammabījaniyo dhammakathikavaṭṭaṃ uposathāgāre
atk-s0401a:724_5: padīpateladānanti evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ bahuvidhaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tattha kālakato devesu
atk-s0401a:724_6: ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto kassapadasabalassa ca amhākañca bhagavato antare bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:725_0: Tena ca samayena sambahulā paccekabuddhā gandhamādanapabbatā āgamma bārāṇasiyaṃ gaṅgāya
atk-s0401a:725_1: tīre phāsukaṭṭhāne nisīditvā piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjanti. So kuṭumbiyo tesaṃ nibaddhameva
atk-s0401a:725_2: tasmiṃ ṭhāne bhattavissaggakaraṇaṃ ñatvā aṭṭha pāsāṇaphalakāni attharitvā yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0401a:725_3: paccekabuddhe upaṭṭhahi. Athekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0401a:725_4: kapilavatthunagare khattiyakule nibbatti. Nāmaggahaṇadivase cassa bhaddiyakumāroti
atk-s0401a:725_5: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayaṃ āgamma heṭṭhā anuruddhasutte vuttanayeneva channaṃ khattiyānaṃ
atk-s0401a:725_6: abbhantaro hutvā satthari anupiyaambavane viharante satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:725_7: pāpuṇi. Atha satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre viharanto “mama sāsane uccākulikānaṃ
atk-s0401a:725_8: kāḷigodhāya putto bhaddiyatthero aggo”ti aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:727_0: 194. Sattame mañjussarānanti madhurassarānaṃ. Lakuṇḍakabhaddiyoti ubbedhena rasso,
atk-s0401a:727_1: nāmena bhaddiyo. Tassāpi pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:727_2: haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto vuttanayeneva dhammassavanatthāya vihāraṃ
atk-s0401a:727_3: gato. Tasmiṃ samaye satthāraṃ ekaṃ mañjussaraṃ bhikkhuṃ etadagge ṭhapentaṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:727_4: “aho vatāhampi anāgate ayaṃ bhikkhu viya ekassa buddhassa sāsane mañjussarānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:727_5: aggo bhaveyya”nti cittaṃ uppādetvā satthāraṃ nimantetvā satta divasāni buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0401a:727_6: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā, “bhante, ahaṃ imassa dānassa phalena na aññaṃ sampattiṃ
atk-s0401a:727_7: ākaṅkhāmi, anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane mañjussarānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0401a:727_8: patthayitvā satthupādamūle nipajji. Satthā anāgataṃ olokento samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:727_9: “samijjhissati te idaṃ kammaṃ, ito kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0401a:727_10: tvaṃ tassa sāsane mañjussarānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:728_0: Sopi taṃ byākaraṇaṃ labhitvā yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tato kālakato devesu ca
atk-s0401a:728_1: manussesu ca saṃsaranto vipassīsammāsambuddhakāle cittapattakokilo nāma hutvā kheme
atk-s0401a:728_2: migadāye vasanto ekadivasaṃ himavantaṃ gantvā madhuraṃ ambaphalaṃ tuṇḍena gahetvā
atk-s0401a:728_3: āgacchanto bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ satthāraṃ disvā cintesi – “ahaṃ aññesu divasesu
atk-s0401a:728_4: rittako tathāgataṃ passāmi, ajja pana me imaṃ ambapakkaṃ puttakānaṃ atthāya āgataṃ.
atk-s0401a:728_5: Tesaṃ aññampi āharitvā dassāmi, imaṃ pana dasabalassa dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti otaritvā ākāse
atk-s0401a:728_6: carati. Satthā tassa cittaṃ ñatvā asokattheraṃ nāma upaṭṭhākaṃ olokesi. So pattaṃ
atk-s0401a:728_7: nīharitvā satthu hatthe ṭhapesi. So kokilo dasabalassa patte ambapakkaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:728_8: Satthā tattheva nisīditvā taṃ paribhuñji. Kokilo pasannacitto punappunaṃ dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:728_9: guṇe āvajjetvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā attano kulāvakaṃ gantvā sattāhaṃ pītisukhena vītināmesi.
atk-s0401a:728_10: Ettakaṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve kalyāṇakammaṃ, imināssa kammena saro madhuro ahosi.
atk-s0401a:729_0: Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle pana cetiye āraddhe “kiṃpamāṇaṃ karoma? Sattayojanappamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:729_1: Atimahantaṃ etaṃ, chayojanaṃ karoma. Idampi atimahantaṃ, pañcayojanaṃ karoma, catuyojanaṃ,
atk-s0401a:729_2: tiyojanaṃ, dviyojana”nti vutte ayaṃ tadā jeṭṭhavaḍḍhakī hutvā “etha, bho, anāgate
atk-s0401a:729_3: sukhapaṭijaggiyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā rajjuṃ ādāya parikkhipanto gāvutamattake
atk-s0401a:729_4: ṭhatvā “ekekaṃ mukhaṃ gāvutaṃ gāvutaṃ hotu, cetiyaṃ yojanāvaṭṭaṃ yojanubbedhaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:729_5: āha. Te tassa vacane aṭṭhaṃsu. Iti appamāṇassa buddhassa pamāṇaṃ akāsīti. Tena kammena
atk-s0401a:729_6: nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne aññehi hīnatarappamāṇo ahosi. So amhākaṃ satthu kāle sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:729_7: mahābhogakule nibbatti. “Bhaddiyo”tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto satthari jetavanamahāvihāre
atk-s0401a:729_8: paṭivasante vihāraṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā satthu
atk-s0401a:729_9: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0401a:729_10: satthā aparabhāge ariyavaragaṇamajjhe nisinno mañjussarānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:731_0: 195. Aṭṭhame sīhanādikānanti sīhanādaṃ nadantānaṃ. Piṇḍolabhāradvājoti so kira arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:731_1: pattadivase avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya vihārena vihāraṃ pariveṇena pariveṇaṃ gantvā “yassa
atk-s0401a:731_2: magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā atthi, so maṃ pucchatū”ti sīhanādaṃ nadanto vicari. Buddhānampi
atk-s0401a:731_3: purato ṭhatvā “imasmiṃ, bhante, sāsane katabbakiccaṃ mayhaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti sīhanādaṃ
atk-s0401a:731_4: nadi. Tasmā sīhanādikānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:732_0: Pañhakamme panassa ayamanupubbikathā – ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle pabbatapāde
atk-s0401a:732_1: sīhayoniyaṃ nibbatto. Satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento tassa hetusampattiṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:732_2: haṃsavatiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ sīhe gocarāya pakkante tassa vasanaguhaṃ
atk-s0401a:732_3: pavisitvā ākāse pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Sīho gocaraṃ labhitvā
atk-s0401a:732_4: nivatto guhādvāre ṭhito antoguhāyaṃ dasabalaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā “mama vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:732_5: āgantvā añño satto nisīdituṃ samattho nāma natthi, mahanto vatāyaṃ puriso, yo antoguhāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:732_6: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno. Sarīrappabhāpissa samantā pharitvā gatā, mayā evarūpaṃ
atk-s0401a:732_7: acchariyaṃ nadiṭṭhapubbaṃ. Ayaṃ puriso imasmiṃ loke pūjaneyyānaṃ aggo bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:732_8: mayāpissa yathāsatti yathābalaṃ sakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti jalajathalajāni nānākusumāni
atk-s0401a:732_9: āharitvā bhūmito yāva nisinnapallaṅkaṭṭhānā pupphāsanaṃ santharitvā sabbarattiṃ sammukhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:732_10: tathāgataṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. Punadivase purāṇapupphāni apanetvā navapupphehi āsanaṃ santhari.
atk-s0401a:733_0: Eteneva niyāmena satta divasāni pupphāsanaṃ paññāpetvā balavapītisomanassaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0401a:733_1: guhādvāre ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi. Sattame divase satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya guhādvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:733_2: Sīhopi migarājā tathāgataṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā paṭikkamitvā
atk-s0401a:733_3: aṭṭhāsi. Satthā “vaṭṭissati ettako upanissayo etassā”ti vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā vihārameva gato.
atk-s0401a:734_0: Sopi sīho buddhaviyogena dukkhito kālaṃ katvā haṃsavatīnagare mahāsālakule paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:734_1: gaṇhitvā vayappatto ekadivasaṃ nagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:734_2: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ sīhanādikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0401a:734_3: sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā satthārā samijjhanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:734_4: disvā byākato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tattha kālakato devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto
atk-s0401a:734_5: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahanagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. Nāmena bhāradvājo
atk-s0401a:734_6: nāma ahosi. So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā pañca māṇavasatāni mante vācento vicarati.
atk-s0401a:734_7: So attano jeṭṭhakabhāvena nimantanaṭṭhānesu sabbesaṃ bhikkhaṃ sayameva sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0401a:734_8: Eso kira īsakaṃ loladhātuko ahosi. So tehi māṇavehi saddhiṃ “kuhiṃ yāgu kuhiṃ bhatta”nti
atk-s0401a:734_9: yāgubhattakhajjakāneva pariyesamāno carati. So gatagataṭṭhāne piṇḍameva paṭimānento
atk-s0401a:735_0: So ekadivasaṃ satthari rājagahamanuppatte dhammakathaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0401a:735_1: vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahattaṃ pattavelāyameva avāpuraṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:735_2: ādāya vihārena vihāraṃ pariveṇena pariveṇaṃ gantvā “yassa magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā
atk-s0401a:735_3: atthi, so maṃ pucchatū”ti sīhanādaṃ nadanto vicari. So ekadivasaṃ rājagahaseṭṭhinā
atk-s0401a:735_4: veḷuparamparāya ussāpetvā ākāse laggitaṃ jayasumanavaṇṇaṃ candanasārapattaṃ iddhiyā
atk-s0401a:735_5: ādāya sādhukāraṃ dadantena mahājanena parivuto vihāraṃ āgantvā tathāgatassa hatthe
atk-s0401a:735_6: ṭhapesi. Satthā jānantova paṭipucchi – “kuto te, bhāradvāja, ayaṃ patto laddho”ti?
atk-s0401a:735_7: So laddhakāraṇaṃ kathesi. Satthā “tvaṃ evarūpaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ mahājanassa
atk-s0401a:735_8: dassesi, akattabbaṃ tayā kata”nti anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā “na, bhikkhave, gihīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:735_9: uttarimanussadhammaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetabbaṃ, yo dasseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
atk-s0401a:736_0: Atha bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe kathā udapādi – “sīhanādiyatthero arahattaṃ pattadivase
atk-s0401a:736_1: bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe ‘yassa magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā atthi, so maṃ pucchatū’ti kathesi.
atk-s0401a:736_2: Buddhānampi sammukhe attano arahattappattiṃ kathesi, aññe sāvakā tuṇhī ahesuṃ. Attano
atk-s0401a:736_3: sīhanādiyabhāveneva mahājanassa pasādaṃ janetvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā candanasārapattañca
atk-s0401a:736_4: gaṇhī”ti. Te bhikkhū ime tayopi guṇe ekato katvā satthu kathayiṃsu. Buddhā ca nāma
atk-s0401a:736_5: garahitabbayuttakaṃ garahanti, pasaṃsitabbayuttakaṃ pasaṃsantīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne therassa
atk-s0401a:736_6: pasaṃsitabbayuttameva aṅgaṃ gahetvā “tiṇṇaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, indriyānaṃ bhāvitattā
atk-s0401a:736_7: bahulīkatattā bhāradvājo bhikkhu aññaṃ byākāsi – ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0401a:736_8: kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti. Katamesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ? Satindriyassa,
atk-s0401a:736_9: samādhindriyassa, paññindriyassa. Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ indriyānaṃ bhāvitattā
atk-s0401a:736_10: bahulīkatattā bhāradvājo bhikkhu aññaṃ byākāsi – ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0401a:736_11: kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī”’ti theraṃ pasaṃsitvā sīhanādikānaṃ
atk-s0401a:738_0: 196. Navame puṇṇo mantāṇiputtoti nāmena puṇṇo, mantāṇibrāhmaṇiyā pana so puttoti
atk-s0401a:738_1: mantāṇiputto. Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayaṃ kira padumuttaradasabalassa
atk-s0401a:738_2: uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase
atk-s0401a:738_3: gotamoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā sabbasippesu kovido hutvā
atk-s0401a:738_4: pañcamāṇavakasataparivāro vicaranto tayopi vede oloketvā mokkhadhammaṃ adisvā “idaṃ
atk-s0401a:738_5: vedattayaṃ nāma kadalikkhandho viya bahi maṭṭhaṃ anto nissāraṃ, imaṃ gahetvā vicaraṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:738_6: thusakoṭṭanasadisaṃ hoti. Kiṃ me iminā”ti isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā brahmavihāre nibbattetvā
atk-s0401a:738_8: pabbatapādaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Tassa parivārāni aṭṭhārassa jaṭilasahassāni
atk-s0401a:738_9: ahesuṃ. So pañca abhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā tesampi kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0401a:738_10: Te tassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbepi pañca abhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:739_0: Addhāne atikkante tassa gotamatāpasassa mahallakakāle padumuttaradasabalo paṭhamābhisambodhiṃ
atk-s0401a:739_2: vihāsi. So ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento gotamatāpasassa parisāya arahattūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0401a:739_3: gotamatāpasassa ca “ahaṃ anāgate uppajjamānakabuddhassa sāsane dhammakathikabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:739_4: aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanabhāvañca disvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā attano pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0401a:739_5: sayameva gahetvā aññātakavesena gotamatāpasassa antevāsikesu vanamūlaphalāphalatthāya
atk-s0401a:739_6: gatesu gantvā gotamassa paṇṇasālādvāre aṭṭhāsi. Gotamo buddhānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ ajānantopi
atk-s0401a:739_7: dūratova dasabalaṃ disvā “ayaṃ puriso lokato mutto hutvā paññāyati, yathā assa sarīranipphatti
atk-s0401a:739_8: yehi ca lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāramajjhe vā tiṭṭhanto cakkavattī rājā hoti, pabbajanto
atk-s0401a:739_9: vā vivaṭṭacchado sabbaññubuddho hotī”ti ñatvā paṭhamadassaneneva dasabalaṃ abhivādetvā
atk-s0401a:739_10: “ito etha bhagavā”ti buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. Tathāgato tāpasassa dhammaṃ desayamāno nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:740_0: Tasmiṃ samaye te jaṭilā “paṇītapaṇītaṃ vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ ācariyassa datvā sesakaṃ
atk-s0401a:740_1: paribhuñjissāmā”ti āgacchantā dasabalaṃ uccāsane, ācariyaṃ pana nīcāsane nisinnaṃ
atk-s0401a:740_2: disvā “passatha, mayaṃ ‘imasmiṃ loke amhākaṃ ācariyena uttaritaro natthī’ti vicarāma.
atk-s0401a:740_3: Idāni pana no ācariyaṃ nīcāsane nisīdāpetvā uccāsane nisinnako eko paññāyati, mahanto
atk-s0401a:740_4: vatāyaṃ puriso bhavissatī”ti piṭakāni gahetvā āgacchanti. Gotamatāpaso “ime maṃ dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:740_5: santike vandeyyu”nti bhīto dūrato āha – “tātā, mā maṃ vandittha, sadevake loke aggapuggalo
atk-s0401a:740_6: sabbesaṃ vandanāraho puriso idha nisinno, etaṃ vandathā”ti. Tāpasā “na ajānitvā ācariyo
atk-s0401a:740_7: kathessatī”ti sabbeva tathāgatassa pāde vandiṃsu. “Tātā, amhākaṃ aññaṃ dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:740_8: dātabbayuttakaṃ bhojanaṃ natthi, imaṃ vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ dassāmā”ti paṇītapaṇītaṃ
atk-s0401a:740_9: buddhānaṃ patte patiṭṭhāpesi. Satthā vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ paribhuñji. Tadanantaraṃ
atk-s0401a:740_10: tāpasopi saddhiṃ antevāsikehi paribhuñji. Satthā bhattakiccaṃ katvā “dve aggasāvakā
atk-s0401a:740_11: bhikkhusatasahassaṃ gahetvā āgacchantū”ti cintesi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe aggasāvako mahādevalatthero
atk-s0401a:740_12: “kahaṃ nu kho satthā gato”ti āvajjento “satthā amhākaṃ āgamanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti bhikkhusatasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:740_13: gahetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:741_0: Gotamo antevāsike āha – “tātā, amhākaṃ añño sakkāro natthi, bhikkhusaṅgho dukkhena
atk-s0401a:741_1: ṭhito. Buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa pupphāsanaṃ paññāpessāma, jalajathalajapupphāni
atk-s0401a:741_2: āharathā”ti. Te tāvadeva pabbatapādato vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni iddhiyā āharitvā
atk-s0401a:741_3: sāriputtattherassa vatthumhi vuttanayeneva āsanāni paññāpayiṃsu. Nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanampi
atk-s0401a:742_0: Satthā sattame divase nirodhato vuṭṭhāya parivāretvā ṭhite tāpase disvā dhammakathikabhāve
atk-s0401a:742_1: etadaggappattaṃ sāvakaṃ āmantesi – “iminā bhikkhu isigaṇena mahāsakkāro kato, etesaṃ
atk-s0401a:742_2: pupphāsanānumodanaṃ karohī”ti. So satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tīṇi piṭakāni sammasitvā
atk-s0401a:742_3: anumodanaṃ akāsi. Tassa desanāpariyosāne satthā sayaṃ brahmaghosaṃ nicchāretvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:742_4: desesi. Desanāpariyosāne ṭhapetvā gotamatāpasaṃ sesā aṭṭhārasa sahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:743_0: Gotamo pana tenattabhāvena paṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto bhagavantaṃ āha – “bhagavā
atk-s0401a:743_1: yena bhikkhunā paṭhamaṃ dhammo desito, ko nāma ayaṃ tumhākaṃ sāsane”ti? Ayaṃ gotama
atk-s0401a:743_2: mayhaṃ sāsane dhammakathikānaṃ aggoti. “Ahampi, bhante, imassa satta divasāni katassa
atk-s0401a:743_3: adhikārassa phalena ayaṃ bhikkhu viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane dhammakathikānaṃ
atk-s0401a:743_4: aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā pādamūle nipajji.
atk-s0401a:744_0: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā anantarāyenassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “anāgate
atk-s0401a:744_1: kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, tvaṃ tassa sāsane dhammakathikānaṃ
atk-s0401a:744_2: aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā te arahattappatte tāpase “etha bhikkhavo”ti āha. Sabbe
atk-s0401a:745_0: Gotamopi yāvajīvaṃ tathāgataṃ paricaritvā yathābalaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:745_1: devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre
atk-s0401a:745_2: doṇavatthubrāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase puṇṇamāṇavoti
atk-s0401a:745_3: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Satthari abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anupubbena āgantvā
atk-s0401a:745_4: rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharante aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero kapilavatthuṃ gantvā attano bhāgineyyaṃ
atk-s0401a:745_5: puṇṇamāṇavaṃ pabbājetvā punadivase dasabalassa santikaṃ āgantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0401a:745_6: āpucchitvā nivāsatthāya chaddantadahaṃ gato. Puṇṇopi mantāṇiputto mātulena aññāsikoṇḍaññattherena
atk-s0401a:745_7: saddhiṃ dasabalassa santikaṃ agantvā “mayhaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvāva
atk-s0401a:745_8: dasabalassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti kapilavatthusmiṃyeva ohīno yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ
atk-s0401a:745_9: karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tassa santike pabbajitakulaputtāpi pañcasatā
atk-s0401a:745_10: ahesuṃ. Thero sayaṃ dasakathāvatthulābhitāya tepi dasahi kathāvatthūhi ovadati. Te
atk-s0401a:745_11: tassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbeva arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0401a:746_0: Te attano pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ ñatvā upajjhāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āhaṃsu
atk-s0401a:746_1: – “bhante, amhākaṃ kiccaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ, dasannañca mahākathāvatthūnaṃ lābhino,
atk-s0401a:746_2: samayo no dasabalaṃ passitu”nti. Thero tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā cintesi – “mama dasakathāvatthulābhitaṃ
atk-s0401a:746_3: satthā jānāti, ahaṃ dhammaṃ desento dasa kathāvatthūni amuñcantova desemi. Mayi gacchante
atk-s0401a:746_4: sabbepime bhikkhū parivāretvā gacchissanti, evaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya gantvā pana ayuttaṃ
atk-s0401a:746_5: mayhaṃ dasabalaṃ passituṃ, ime tāva gantvā passantū”ti te bhikkhū āha – “āvuso, tumhe
atk-s0401a:746_6: purato gantvā tathāgataṃ passatha, mama vacanena dasabalassa pāde vandatha, ahampi
atk-s0401a:747_0: Te therā sabbepi dasabalassa jātibhūmiraṭṭhavāsino sabbe khīṇāsavā sabbe dasakathāvatthulābhino
atk-s0401a:747_1: attano upajjhāyassa ovādaṃ abhinditvā anupubbena cārikaṃ carantā saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0401a:747_2: atikkamma rājagahe veḷuvanamahāvihāraṃ gantvā dasabalassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0401a:747_3: nisīdiṃsu. Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:747_4: paṭisammoditunti bhagavā tehi saddhiṃ “kacci, bhikkhave, khamanīya”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0401a:747_5: madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kuto ca tumhe, bhikkhave, āgacchathā”ti pucchi. Tehi
atk-s0401a:747_6: “jātibhūmito”ti vutte “ko nu kho, bhikkhave, jātibhūmiyaṃ jātibhūmakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:747_7: sabrahmacārīhi evaṃ sambhāvito attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca bhikkhūnaṃ kattā”ti
atk-s0401a:747_8: dasakathāvatthulābhiṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchi. Tepi “puṇṇo nāma, bhante, āyasmā mantāṇiputto”ti
atk-s0401a:747_9: ārocayiṃsu. Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā āyasmā sāriputto therassa dassanakāmo ahosi.
atk-s0401a:748_0: Atha satthā rājagahato sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Puṇṇatthero dasabalassa tattha āgatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:748_1: sutvā “satthāraṃ passissāmī”ti gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃyeva tathāgataṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:748_2: Satthā tassa dhammaṃ desesi. Thero dhammaṃ sutvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā paṭisallānatthāya
atk-s0401a:748_3: andhavanaṃ gantvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi. Sāriputtattheropi tassa
atk-s0401a:748_4: gamanaṃ sutvā sīsānulokiko gantvā okāsaṃ sallakkhetvā taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0401a:748_5: therena saddhiṃ sammoditvā sattavisuddhikkamaṃ pucchi. Theropissa pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ
atk-s0401a:748_6: byākāsi. Te aññamaññassa subhāsitaṃ samanumodiṃsu. Atha satthā aparabhāge bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe
atk-s0401a:750_0: 197. Dasame saṃkhittena bhāsitassāti saṃkhittena kathitadhammassa. Vitthārena atthaṃ
atk-s0401a:750_1: vibhajantānanti taṃ desanaṃ vitthāretvā atthaṃ vibhajamānānaṃ. Aññe kira tathāgatassa
atk-s0401a:750_2: saṅkhepavacanaṃ atthavasena vā pūretuṃ sakkonti byañjanavasena vā, ayaṃ pana thero
atk-s0401a:750_3: ubhayavasenapi sakkoti. Tasmā aggoti vutto. Pubbapatthanāpi cassa evarūpāva.
atk-s0401a:751_0: Ayaṃ panassa pañhakamme anupubbikathā – ayaṃ kira padumuttarasammāsambuddhakāle gahapatimahāsālakule
atk-s0401a:751_1: nibbattitvā vuddhippatto ekadivasaṃ vuttanayeneva vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante
atk-s0401a:751_2: ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ attanā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ
atk-s0401a:751_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā “mahanto vatāyaṃ bhikkhu, yaṃ satthā evaṃ
atk-s0401a:751_4: vaṇṇeti, mayāpi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:751_5: nimantetvā vuttanayeneva sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā, “bhante, ahaṃ imassa sakkārassa
atk-s0401a:751_6: phalena na aññaṃ sampattiṃ patthemi, anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane ito sattadivasamatthake
atk-s0401a:751_7: tumhehi ṭhānantare ṭhapitabhikkhu viya ahampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ labheyya”nti patthanaṃ
atk-s0401a:751_8: katvā pādamūle nipajji. Satthā anāgataṃ olokento “samijjhissati imassa kulaputtassa
atk-s0401a:751_9: patthanā”ti disvā “ambho, kulaputta, anāgate kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho
atk-s0401a:751_10: uppajjissati, tvaṃ tassa sāsane saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ
atk-s0401a:751_11: aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:752_0: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā
atk-s0401a:752_1: kassapabuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā satthari parinibbute suvaṇṇacetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:752_2: gantvā satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāya pūjaṃ katvā “bhagavā mayhaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:752_3: sarīraṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi. Tato yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:752_4: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ dasabalassa uppattikāle ujjeninagare
atk-s0401a:752_5: purohitassa gehe nibbatti. Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase “mayhaṃ putto suvaṇṇavaṇṇasarīro
atk-s0401a:752_6: attanāva attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgato”ti kañcanamāṇavotevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0401a:752_7: tayo vede uggaṇhitvā pitu accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṃ labhi. So gottavasena kaccāno nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:753_0: Caṇḍapajjotarājā amacce sannipātetvā āha – “buddho loke nibbatto, taṃ ānetuṃ samatthā
atk-s0401a:753_1: gantvā ānetha tātā”ti. Deva, añño dasabalaṃ ānetuṃ samattho nāma natthi, ācariyo
atk-s0401a:753_2: kaccānabrāhmaṇova samattho, taṃ pahiṇathāti. Rājā taṃ pakkosāpetvā, “tāta, dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:753_3: santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti āha. Gantvā pabbajituṃ labhanto gamissāmi, mahārājāti. Yaṃkiñci
atk-s0401a:753_4: katvā tathāgataṃ ānehi, tātāti. So “buddhānaṃ santikaṃ gacchantassa mahāparisāya
atk-s0401a:753_5: kammaṃ natthī”ti attaṭṭhamo agamāsi. Athassa satthā dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0401a:753_6: saddhiṃ sattahi janehi saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Satthā “etha bhikkhavo”ti
atk-s0401a:753_7: hatthaṃ pasāresi. Taṃkhaṇaṃyeva sabbeva antarahitakesamassū iddhimayapattacīvaradharā
atk-s0401a:754_0: Thero attano kicce matthakaṃ patte tuṇhībhāvena anisīditvā kāḷudāyitthero viya satthu
atk-s0401a:754_1: ujjenigamanatthāya gamanavaṇṇaṃ kathesi. Satthā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “kaccāno attano
atk-s0401a:754_2: jātibhūmiyaṃ mama gamanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti aññāsi. Buddhā ca nāma ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0401a:754_3: gantuṃ ayuttaṭṭhānaṃ na gacchanti. Tasmā theraṃ āha – “tvaṃyeva bhikkhu gaccha, tayi
atk-s0401a:754_4: gatepi rājā pasīdissatī”ti. Thero “buddhānaṃ dve kathā nāma natthī”ti tathāgataṃ
atk-s0401a:754_5: vanditvā attanā saddhiṃ āgatehi sattahi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ujjeniṃ gacchanto antarāmagge
atk-s0401a:754_6: telapanāḷi nāma nigamo, tattha piṇḍāya cari. Tasmiṃ ca nigame dve seṭṭhidhītaro.
atk-s0401a:754_7: Tāsu ekā parijiṇṇakule nibbattā duggatā mātāpitūnaṃ accayena dhātiṃ nissāya jīvati.
atk-s0401a:754_8: Attabhāvo panassā samiddho, kesā aññāhi ativiya dīghā. Tasmiṃyeva nigame aññā issaraseṭṭhikulassa
atk-s0401a:754_9: dhītā nikkesikā. Sā tato pubbe tassā samīpaṃ pesetvā “sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā dassāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:755_0: Tasmiṃ pana divase sā seṭṭhidhītā mahākaccānattheraṃ sattahi bhikkhūhi parivutaṃ
atk-s0401a:755_1: tucchapattaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo eko brahmabandhubhikkhu yathādhoteneva
atk-s0401a:755_2: pattena āgacchati, mayhañca aññaṃ dhanaṃ natthi. Asukaseṭṭhidhītā pana imesaṃ kesānaṃ
atk-s0401a:755_3: atthāya pesesi. Idāni ito laddhauppādena sakkā therassa deyyadhammaṃ dātu”nti dhātiṃ
atk-s0401a:755_4: pesetvā there nimantetvā antogehe nisīdāpesi. Therānaṃ nisinnakāle gabbhaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0401a:755_5: dhātiyā attano kese kappāpetvā, “amma, ime kese asukāya nāma seṭṭhidhītāya datvā
atk-s0401a:755_6: yaṃ sā deti, taṃ āhara, ayyānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmā”ti. Dhāti piṭṭhihatthena assūni
atk-s0401a:755_7: puñchitvā ekena hatthena hadayamaṃsaṃ sandhāretvā therānaṃ santike paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0401a:755_8: te kese ādāya tassā seṭṭhidhītāya santikaṃ gatā.
atk-s0401a:756_0: Paṇiyaṃ nāma sāravantampi sayaṃ upanītaṃ gāravaṃ na janeti, tasmā sā seṭṭhidhītā
atk-s0401a:756_1: cintesi – “ahaṃ pubbe bahunāpi dhanena ime kese āharāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ, idāni pana
atk-s0401a:756_2: chinnakālato paṭṭhāya na yathāmūlameva labhissatī”ti. Dhātiṃ āha – “ahaṃ pubbe tava
atk-s0401a:756_3: sāminiṃ bahunāpi dhanena kese āharāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ, yattha katthaci vinipātā pana
atk-s0401a:756_4: nijjīvakesā nāma aṭṭha kahāpaṇe agghantī”ti aṭṭheva kahāpaṇe adāsi. Dhāti kahāpaṇe
atk-s0401a:756_5: āharitvā seṭṭhidhītāya adāsi. Seṭṭhidhītā ekekaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ ekekakahāpaṇagghanakaṃ
atk-s0401a:756_6: katvā therānaṃ dāpesi. Thero āvajjitvā seṭṭhidhītāya upanissayaṃ disvā “kahaṃ seṭṭhidhītā”ti
atk-s0401a:756_7: pucchi. Gabbhe, ayyāti. Pakkosatha nanti. Sā ca theresu gāravena ekavacaneneva āgantvā
atk-s0401a:756_8: there vanditvā balavasaddhaṃ uppādesi. Sukhette patiṭṭhitapiṇḍapāto diṭṭheva dhamme
atk-s0401a:756_9: vipākaṃ detīti saha therānaṃ vandanena kesā pakatibhāveyeva aṭṭhaṃsu. Therāpi taṃ
atk-s0401a:756_10: piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā passantiyāyeva seṭṭhidhītāya vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā kañcanavanuyyāne otariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:757_0: Uyyānapālo theraṃ disvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “deva, me ayyo purohito kaccāno pabbajitvā
atk-s0401a:757_1: uyyānamāgato”ti āha. Rājā caṇḍapajjoto uyyānaṃ gantvā katabhattakiccaṃ theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0401a:757_2: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “kahaṃ, bhante, bhagavā”ti pucchi. Satthā sayaṃ anāgantvā
atk-s0401a:757_3: maṃ pesesi mahārājāti. Kahaṃ, bhante, ajja bhikkhaṃ alatthāti? Thero rañño pucchāsabhāgena
atk-s0401a:757_4: sabbaṃ seṭṭhidhītāya kataṃ dukkaraṃ ārocesi. Rājā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ paṭiyādetvā
atk-s0401a:757_5: theraṃ nimantetvā nivesanaṃ gantvā seṭṭhidhītaraṃ āṇāpetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:758_0: Tato paṭṭhāya rājā therassa mahāsakkāraṃ karoti. Therassa dhammakathāya pasīditvā
atk-s0401a:758_1: mahājano therassa santike pabbaji. Tato paṭṭhāya sakalanagaraṃ ekakāsāvapajjotaṃ
atk-s0401a:758_2: isivātapaṭivātaṃ ahosi. Sāpi devī gabbhaṃ labhitvā dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0401a:758_3: Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase gopālakumāroti mātāmahaseṭṭhino nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Sā puttassa
atk-s0401a:758_4: nāmavasena gopālamātā nāma devī jātā. Sā devī there ativiya pasīditvā rājānaṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā
atk-s0401a:758_5: kañcanavanuyyāne therassa vihāraṃ kāresi. Thero ujjeninagaraṃ pasādetvā puna satthu
atk-s0401a:758_6: santikaṃ gato. Atha satthā aparabhāge jetavane viharanto madhupiṇḍikasuttaṃ kaccānapeyyālaṃ
atk-s0401a:758_7: pārāyanasuttanti ime tayo suttante aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa
atk-s0401a:763_0: 198-200. Dutiyassa paṭhame manomayanti manena nibbattitaṃ. “Manomayena kāyena, iddhiyā
atk-s0401a:763_1: upasaṅkamī”ti vuttaṭṭhānasmiñhi manena katakāyo manomayakāyo nāma jāto. “Aññataraṃ
atk-s0401a:763_2: manomayaṃ kāyaṃ upapajjatī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne manena nibbattitakāyo manomayakāyo nāma
atk-s0401a:763_3: jāto. Ayamidha adhippeto. Tattha aññe bhikkhū manomayaṃ kāyaṃ nibbattentā tayo vā
atk-s0401a:763_4: cattāro vā nibbattenti, na bahuke. Ekasadiseyeva ca katvā nibbattenti ekavidhameva
