atk-s0401a:763_5: kammaṃ kurumāne. Cūḷapanthakatthero pana ekāvajjanena samaṇasahassaṃ māpesi. Dvepi
atk-s0401a:763_6: ca jane na ekasadise akāsi na ekavidhaṃ kammaṃ kurumāne. Tasmā manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:764_0: Cetovivaṭṭakusalānampi cūḷapanthakova aggo, saññāvivaṭṭakusalānaṃ pana mahāpanthakatthero
atk-s0401a:764_1: aggoti vutto. Tattha cūḷapanthakatthero catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ lābhitāya “cetovivaṭṭakusalo”ti
atk-s0401a:764_3: vutto. Cūḷapanthako ca samādhikusalatāya cetovivaṭṭakusalo nāma, mahāpanthako vipassanākusalatāya
atk-s0401a:764_4: saññāvivaṭṭakusalo nāma. Eko cettha samādhilakkhaṇe cheko, eko vipassanālakkhaṇe.
atk-s0401a:764_5: Tathā eko samādhigāḷho, eko vipassanāgāḷho. Eko cettha aṅgasaṃkhitte cheko, eko ārammaṇasaṃkhitte.
atk-s0401a:764_6: Tathā eko aṅgavavatthāne cheko, eko ārammaṇavavatthāneti evamettha yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0401a:765_0: Apica cūḷapanthakatthero rūpāvacarajjhānalābhī hutvā jhānaṅgehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:765_1: pattoti cetovivaṭṭakusalo, mahāpanthako arūpāvacarajjhānalābhī hutvā jhānaṅgehi vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:765_2: arahattaṃ pattoti saññāvivaṭṭakusalo. Ubhopi panthe jātattā panthakā nāma jātā. Tesaṃ
atk-s0401a:765_3: paṭhamajāto mahāpanthako nāma, pacchājāto cūḷapanthako nāma.
atk-s0401a:766_0: Imesaṃ pana ubhinnampi pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – atīte kira padumuttarabuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:766_1: haṃsavatīnagaravāsino dve bhātikā kuṭumbikā saddhā pasannā nibaddhaṃ satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:766_2: gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanti. Tesu ekadivasaṃ kaniṭṭho satthāraṃ dvīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ
atk-s0401a:766_3: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ “mama sāsane manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ cetovivaṭṭakusalānañca
atk-s0401a:766_4: ayaṃ bhikkhu aggo”ti etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā cintesi – “mahā vatāyaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0401a:766_5: eko hutvā dve aṅgāni paripūretvā carati, mayāpi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane aṅgadvayapūrakena
atk-s0401a:766_6: hutvā vicarituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So purimanayeneva satthāraṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0401a:766_7: datvā evamāha – “yaṃ, bhante, bhikkhuṃ tumhe ito sattadivasamatthake manomayaṅgena
atk-s0401a:766_8: ca cetovivaṭṭakusalaṅgena ca ‘ayaṃ mama sāsane aggo’ti etadagge ṭhapayittha, ahampi
atk-s0401a:766_9: imassa adhikārakammassa phalena so bhikkhu viya aṅgadvayapūrako bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:767_0: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā anantarāyenassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate
atk-s0401a:767_1: kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, so taṃ imasmiṃ ṭhānadvaye
atk-s0401a:767_2: ṭhapessatī”ti byākaritvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Bhātāpissa ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:767_3: saññāvivaṭṭakusalaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā tatheva adhikāraṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:768_0: Te ubhopi janā satthari dharamāne kusalakammaṃ karitvā satthu parinibbutakāle sarīracetiye
atk-s0401a:768_1: suvaṇṇapūjaṃ katvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattā. Tesaṃ devamanussesu saṃsarantānaṃyeva
atk-s0401a:768_2: kappasatasahassaṃ atikkantaṃ. Tattha mahāpanthakassa antarā katakalyāṇakammaṃ na
atk-s0401a:768_3: kathiyati, cūḷapanthako pana kassapabhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni
atk-s0401a:768_4: odātakasiṇakammaṃ katvā devapure nibbatti. Atha amhākaṃ satthā abhisambodhiṃ patvā
atk-s0401a:769_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā imesaṃ dvinnaṃ nibbattiṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Rājagahe kira dhanaseṭṭhikulassa
atk-s0401a:769_1: dhītā attano dāseneva saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā “aññepi me imaṃ kammaṃ jāneyyu”nti
atk-s0401a:769_2: cintetvā evamāha – “amhehi imasmiṃ ṭhāne vasituṃ na sakkā, sace me mātāpitaro imaṃ
atk-s0401a:769_3: dosaṃ jānissanti, khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ karissanti, videsaṃ gantvā vasissāmā”ti hatthasāraṃ
atk-s0401a:769_4: gahetvā aggadvārena nikkhamitvā “yattha vā tattha vā aññehi ajānanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:770_0: Tesaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ saṃvāsamanvāya tassā kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:770_1: Sā gabbhassa paripākaṃ āgamma sāmikena saddhiṃ mantesi – “gabbho me paripākaṃ gato,
atk-s0401a:770_2: ñātimittādivirahite ṭhāne gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma ubhinnampi amhākaṃ dukkhameva, kulagehameva
atk-s0401a:770_3: gacchāmā”ti. So “ajja gacchāma, sve gacchāmā”ti divase atikkamāpesi. Sā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:770_4: “ayaṃ bālo attano dosamahantāya gantuṃ na ussahati, mātāpitaro ca nāma ekantahitā,
atk-s0401a:770_5: ayaṃ gacchatu vā mā vā, mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Tasmiṃ gehā nikkhante sā gehe parikkhāraṃ
atk-s0401a:770_6: paṭisāmetvā attano kulagharaṃ gatabhāvaṃ anantaragehavāsīnaṃ ārocetvā maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0401a:771_0: Atha so puriso gharaṃ āgato taṃ adisvā paṭivissake pucchitvā “kulagharaṃ gatā”ti
atk-s0401a:771_1: sutvā vegena anubandhitvā antarāmagge sampāpuṇi. Tassāpi tattheva gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:771_2: ahosi. So “kiṃ idaṃ bhadde”ti pucchi. Sāmi eko putto jātoti. Idāni kiṃ karissāmāti?
atk-s0401a:771_3: Yassa atthāya mayaṃ kulagharaṃ gacchāma, taṃ kammaṃ antarāva nipphannaṃ, tattha gantvā
atk-s0401a:771_4: kiṃ karissāma, nivattāmāti dvepi ekacittā hutvā nivattiṃsu. Tassa dārakassa ca panthe
atk-s0401a:771_5: jātattā panthakoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Tassā nacirasseva aparopi gabbho patiṭṭhahi. Sabbaṃ
atk-s0401a:771_6: purimanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ. Tassapi dārakassa panthe jātattā paṭhamajātassa mahāpanthakoti
atk-s0401a:771_7: nāmaṃ katvā pacchājātassa cūḷapanthakoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:772_0: Te dvepi dārake gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gatā. Tesaṃ tattha vasantānaṃ ayaṃ
atk-s0401a:772_1: mahāpanthakadārako aññe dārakajane “cūḷapitā mahāpitā ayyako ayyikā”ti vadante sutvā
atk-s0401a:772_2: mātaraṃ paṭipucchi – “amma, aññe dārakā kathenti ‘ayyako ayyikā’ti, kiṃ amhākaṃ ñātakā
atk-s0401a:772_3: natthī”ti? Āma, tāta, tumhākaṃ ettha ñātakā natthi, rājagahanagare pana vo dhanaseṭṭhi
atk-s0401a:772_4: nāma ayyako, tattha tumhākaṃ bahū ñātakāti. Kasmā tattha na gacchatha ammāti? Sā
atk-s0401a:772_5: attano agamanakāraṇaṃ puttassa akathetvā puttesu punappunaṃ kathentesu sāmikamāha
atk-s0401a:772_6: – “ime dārakā ativiya maṃ kilamenti, kiṃ no mātāpitaro disvā maṃsaṃ khādissanti,
atk-s0401a:772_7: ehi dārakānaṃ ayyakakulaṃ dassemā”ti. Ahaṃ sammukhā bhavituṃ na sakkhissāmi, taṃ
atk-s0401a:772_8: pana nayissāmīti. “Sādhu sāmi, yena kenaci upāyena dārakānaṃ ayyakakulameva daṭṭhuṃ
atk-s0401a:772_9: vaṭṭatī”ti dvepi janā dārake ādāya anupubbena rājagahaṃ patvā nagaradvāre ekissā
atk-s0401a:772_10: sālāya nivāsaṃ katvā dārakamātā dve dārake gahetvā āgatabhāvaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0401a:773_0: Te taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā saṃsāre saṃsarantānaṃ na putto na dhītā nāma natthi, te amhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:773_1: mahāparādhikā, na sakkā tehi amhākaṃ cakkhupathe ṭhātuṃ. Ettakaṃ pana dhanaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0401a:773_2: dvepi janā phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā jīvantu, dārake pana idha pesentūti. Seṭṭhidhītā
atk-s0401a:773_3: mātāpitūhi pesitaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā dārake āgatadūtānaṃ hattheyeva datvā pesesi. Dārakā
atk-s0401a:773_4: ayyakakule vaḍḍhanti. Tesu cūḷapanthako atidaharo, mahāpanthako pana ayyakena saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:773_5: dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ gacchati. Tassa niccaṃ satthu sammukhe dhammaṃ suṇantassa
atk-s0401a:773_6: pabbajjāya cittaṃ nami. So ayyakaṃ āha – “sace tumhe anujāneyyātha, ahaṃ pabbajjeyya”nti.
atk-s0401a:773_7: “Kiṃ vadesi, tāta, mayhaṃ sakalalokassapi pabbajjato taveva pabbajjā bhaddikā. Sace
atk-s0401a:773_8: sakkosi, pabbaja, tātā”ti sampaṭicchitvā satthu santikaṃ gato. Satthā “kiṃ, mahāseṭṭhi,
atk-s0401a:773_9: dārako te laddho”ti? “Āma, bhante, ayaṃ dārako mayhaṃ nattā, tumhākaṃ santike pabbajāmīti vadatī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:774_0: Satthā aññataraṃ piṇḍacārikaṃ “imaṃ dārakaṃ pabbājehī”ti āṇāpesi. Thero tassa tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:774_1: ācikkhitvā pabbājesi. So bahuṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā paripuṇṇavasso upasampadaṃ
atk-s0401a:774_2: labhi. Upasampanno hutvā yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karonto catunnaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ
atk-s0401a:774_3: lābhī hutvā jhānaṅgehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Iti so saññāvivaṭṭakusalānaṃ aggo
atk-s0401a:774_4: jāto. So jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmento cintesi – “sakkā nu kho imaṃ sukhaṃ
atk-s0401a:774_5: cūḷapanthakassa dātu”nti. Tato ayyakaseṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā “mahāseṭṭhi sace tumhe
atk-s0401a:774_6: sampaṭicchatha, ahaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ pabbājeyya”nti āha. Pabbājetha, bhanteti. Thero
atk-s0401a:774_7: cūḷapanthakadārakaṃ pabbājetvā dasasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi. Cūḷapanthakasāmaṇero bhātikassa santike.
atk-s0401a:779_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ gaṇhāti. Gahitagahitapadaṃ uparūparipadaṃ gaṇhantassa nassati. Tassa
atk-s0401a:779_1: imaṃ gāthaṃ gahetuṃ vāyamantasseva cattāro māsā atikkantā. Atha naṃ mahāpanthako
atk-s0401a:779_2: āha – “cūḷapanthaka, tvaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane abhabbo, catūhi māsehi ekagāthampi gahetuṃ
atk-s0401a:779_3: na sakkosi, pabbajitakiccaṃ pana tvaṃ kathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessasi, nikkhama ito”ti.
atk-s0401a:779_4: So therena paṇāmito vihārapaccante rodamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:780_0: Tena samayena satthā rājagahaṃ upanissāya jīvakambavane viharati. Tasmiṃ samaye jīvako
atk-s0401a:780_1: purisaṃ pesesi “pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ satthāraṃ nimantehī”ti. Tena kho pana
atk-s0401a:780_2: samayena mahāpanthako bhattuddesako hoti. So “pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ bhikkhaṃ sampaṭicchatha,
atk-s0401a:780_3: bhante”ti vutto “cūḷapanthakaṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ sampaṭicchāmī”ti āha. Cūḷapanthako
atk-s0401a:780_4: taṃ kathaṃ sutvā bhiyyosomattāya domanassappatto ahosi. Satthā cūḷapanthakassa khedaṃ
atk-s0401a:780_5: disvā “cūḷapanthako mayi gate bujjhissatī”ti gantvā avidūre ṭhāne attānaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0401a:780_6: “kiṃ tvaṃ, panthaka, rodasī”ti āha. Bhātā maṃ, bhante, paṇāmetīti. Panthaka, tuyhaṃ
atk-s0401a:780_7: bhātikassa parapuggalānaṃ āsayānusayañāṇaṃ natthi, tvaṃ buddhaveneyyapuggalo nāmāti
atk-s0401a:780_8: iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā suddhaṃ coḷakhaṇḍaṃ adāsi “imaṃ gahetvā ‘rajoharaṇaṃ rajoharaṇa’nti
atk-s0401a:781_0: So satthārā dinnaṃ coḷakhaṇḍaṃ “rajoharaṇaṃ rajoharaṇa”nti hatthena parimajjanto
atk-s0401a:781_1: nisīdi. Tassa parimajjantassa lomāni kiliṭṭhadhātukāni jātāni. Puna parimajjantassa
atk-s0401a:781_2: ukkhaliparipuñchanasadisaṃ jātaṃ. So ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamma tattha khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:781_3: cintesi – “idaṃ coḷakhaṇḍaṃ pakatiyā paṇḍaraṃ parisuddhaṃ, upādinnakasarīraṃ nissāya
atk-s0401a:781_4: kiliṭṭhaṃ jātaṃ, idaṃ cittampi evaṃgatikamevā”ti. Samādhiṃ bhāvetvā cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni
atk-s0401a:781_5: pādakāni katvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. So manomayajjhānalābhī hutvā
atk-s0401a:781_6: eko hutvā bahudhā, bahudhā hutvā eko bhavituṃ samattho ahosi. Arahattamaggeneva cassa
atk-s0401a:782_0: Punadivase satthā ekūnehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ gantvā jīvakassa nivesane
atk-s0401a:782_1: nisīdi. Cūḷapanthako pana attano bhikkhāya asampaṭicchitattāyeva na gato. Jīvako
atk-s0401a:782_2: yāguṃ dātuṃ ārabhi, satthā hatthena pattaṃ pidahi. Kasmā, bhante, na gaṇhathāti?
atk-s0401a:782_3: Vihāre eko bhikkhu atthi jīvakāti. So purisaṃ pahiṇi “gaccha, bhaṇe, vihāre nisinnaṃ
atk-s0401a:782_4: ayyaṃ gahetvā ehī”ti. Cūḷapanthakattheropi tassa purisassa pure āgamanāyeva bhikkhusahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:782_5: nimminitvā ekampi ekena asadisaṃ, ekassapi ca cīvaravicāraṇādisamaṇakammaṃ aññena
atk-s0401a:782_6: asadisaṃ akāsi. So puriso vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ bahubhāvaṃ disvā gantvā jīvakassa kathesi
atk-s0401a:782_7: – “bhante, imasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhusaṅgho bahutaro, tato pakkositabbaṃ bhadantaṃ na
atk-s0401a:782_8: jānāmī”ti. Jīvako satthāraṃ paṭipucchi – “konāmo, bhante, vihāre nisinnabhikkhū”ti?
atk-s0401a:782_9: Cūḷapanthako nāma jīvakāti. Gaccha bho “cūḷapanthako nāma kataro”ti pucchitvā ānehīti.
atk-s0401a:782_10: So vihāraṃ gantvā “cūḷapanthako nāma, bhante, kataro”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ cūḷapanthako
atk-s0401a:782_11: ahaṃ cūḷapanthako”ti bhikkhusahassampi kathesi. So punāgantvā jīvakassa kathesi “sahassamattā
atk-s0401a:782_12: bhikkhū sabbepi ‘ahaṃ cūḷapanthako ahaṃ cūḷapanthako’ti kathenti, ahaṃ ‘asuko nāma
atk-s0401a:782_13: pakkositabbo’ti na jānāmī”ti. Jīvakopi paṭividdhasaccatāya “iddhimā bhikkhū”ti nayato
atk-s0401a:782_14: ñatvā “paṭhamaṃ kathanabhikkhumeva ‘tumhe satthā pakkosatī’ti vatvā cīvarakaṇṇe gaṇha
atk-s0401a:782_15: tātā”ti āha. So vihāraṃ gantvā tathā akāsi, tāvadeva sahassamattā bhikkhū antaradhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:782_16: So theraṃ gahetvā agamāsi. Satthā tasmiṃ khaṇe yāguṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:783_0: Dasabale bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gate dhammasabhāyaṃ kathā udapādi “yāva mahantā
atk-s0401a:783_1: vata buddhā nāma cattāro māse ekagāthaṃ gaṇhituṃ asakkontaṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃmahiddhikaṃ
atk-s0401a:783_2: akaṃsū”ti. Satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā gantvā paññattāsane nisajja “kiṃ
atk-s0401a:783_3: vadetha, bhikkhave”ti pucchi. Na bhagavā aññaṃ kiñci kathema, cūḷapanthakena tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:783_4: santikā mahālābho laddhoti tumhākaṃyeva guṇaṃ kathemāti. Anacchariyaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0401a:783_5: idāni mayhaṃ ovādaṃ katvā lokuttaradāyajjalābho, ayaṃ atītepi aparipakkañāṇe ṭhitassa
atk-s0401a:783_6: mayhaṃ ovādaṃ katvā lokiyadāyajjaṃ labhīti. Bhikkhū “kadā, bhante”ti āyāciṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0401a:784_0: Bhikkhave, atīte bārāṇasīnagare brahmadatto nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Tasmiṃ samaye
atk-s0401a:784_1: cūḷakaseṭṭhi nāma paṇḍito byatto sabbanimittāni jānāti. So ekadivasaṃ rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:784_2: gacchanto antaravīthiyaṃ matamūsikaṃ disvā tasmiṃ khaṇe nakkhattaṃ samānetvā idamāha
atk-s0401a:784_3: – “sakkā cakkhumatā kulaputtena imaṃ undūraṃ gahetvā dārabharaṇañca kātuṃ kammante
atk-s0401a:784_4: ca payojetu”nti. Aññataro duggatakulaputto taṃ seṭṭhissa vacanaṃ sutvā “nāyaṃ ajānitvā
atk-s0401a:784_5: kathessatī”ti mūsikaṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ āpaṇe biḷārassatthāya datvā kākaṇikaṃ labhi.
atk-s0401a:784_6: Tāya kākaṇikāya phāṇitaṃ kiṇitvā ekena kuṭena pānīyaṃ gaṇhitvā araññato āgacchante
atk-s0401a:784_7: mālākāre disvā thokaṃ thokaṃ phāṇitakhaṇḍaṃ datvā uḷuṅkena pānīyaṃ adāsi. Te tassa
atk-s0401a:784_8: ekekaṃ pupphamuṭṭhiṃ adaṃsu. So tena pupphamūlena punadivasepi phāṇitañca pānīyaghaṭañca
atk-s0401a:784_9: gahetvā pupphārāmameva gato. Tassa taṃdivasaṃ mālākārā aḍḍhaocitake pupphagacche
atk-s0401a:784_10: datvā agamaṃsu. So nacirasseva iminā upāyena aṭṭha kahāpaṇe labhi.
atk-s0401a:785_0: Puna ekasmiṃ vātavuṭṭhidivase chaḍḍitauyyānaṃ gantvā patitadārūnaṃ rāsiṃ katvā nisinno
atk-s0401a:785_1: rājakumbhakārassa santikā soḷasa kahāpaṇe labhi. So catuvīsatiyā kahāpaṇesu jātesu
atk-s0401a:785_2: “atthi ayaṃ upāyo mayha”nti nagaradvārato avidūre ṭhāne ekaṃ pānīyacāṭiṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:785_3: pañcasate tiṇahārake pānīyena upaṭṭhahi. Te āhaṃsu – “tvaṃ, samma, amhākaṃ bahupakāro,
atk-s0401a:785_4: kiṃ te karomā”ti? Sopi “mayhaṃ kicce uppanne karissathā”ti vatvā ito cito ca vicaranto
atk-s0401a:785_5: thalapathakammikena ca jalapathakammikena ca saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ akāsi. Tassa
atk-s0401a:785_6: thalapathakammiko “sve imaṃ nagaraṃ assavāṇijako pañca assasatāni gahetvā āgamissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:785_7: ācikkhi. So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tiṇahārakānaṃ saññaṃ datvā ekekaṃ tiṇakalāpaṃ diguṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:785_8: katvā āharāpesi. Atha so assānaṃ nagaraṃ paviṭṭhavelāya tiṇakalāpasahassaṃ antaradvāre
atk-s0401a:785_9: rāsiṃ katvā nisīdi. Assavāṇijo sakalanagare assānaṃ cāriṃ alabhitvā tassa sahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:786_0: Tato katipāhaccayenassa samuddakammikasahāyako ārocesi “paṭṭanaṃ mahānāvā āgatā”ti.
atk-s0401a:786_1: So “atthi ayaṃ upāyo”ti aṭṭhahi kahāpaṇehi sabbaparivārasampannaṃ tāvakālikaṃ rathaṃ
atk-s0401a:786_2: gahetvā nāvāpaṭṭanaṃ gantvā ekaṃ aṅgulimuddikaṃ nāvikassa saccakāraṃ datvā avidūre
atk-s0401a:786_3: ṭhāne sāṇiṃ parikkhipāpetvā tattha nisinno purise āṇāpesi “bāhirakesu vāṇijesu āgatesu
atk-s0401a:786_4: tatiyena paṭihārena ārocethā”ti. “Nāvā āgatā”ti sutvā bārāṇasito satamattā vāṇijā
atk-s0401a:786_5: “bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāmā”ti āgamaṃsu. Bhaṇḍaṃ tumhe na labhissatha, asukaṭṭhāne nāma mahāvāṇijena
atk-s0401a:786_6: saccakāro dinnoti. Te tesaṃ sutvā tassa santikaṃ āgatā, pādamūlikapurisā purimasaññāvasena
atk-s0401a:786_7: tatiyena pāṭihārena tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ārocesuṃ. Te satamattāpi vāṇijā ekekaṃ sahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:786_8: datvā tena saddhiṃ nāvāya pattikā hutvā puna ekekaṃ sahassaṃ datvā pattiṃ vissajjāpetvā
atk-s0401a:786_9: bhaṇḍaṃ attano santakaṃ akaṃsu. So puriso dve satasahassāni gahetvā bārāṇasiṃ āgantvā
atk-s0401a:786_10: “kataññunā bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ekaṃ satasahassaṃ gahetvā cūḷaseṭṭhissa santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:787_0: Atha taṃ cūḷaseṭṭhi “kiṃ te, tāta, katvā idaṃ dhanaṃ laddha”nti pucchi. So “tumhehi
atk-s0401a:787_1: kathitaupāye ṭhatvā catumāsabbhantareyeva laddha”nti āha. Seṭṭhi tassa vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0401a:787_2: “idāni evarūpaṃ dārakaṃ parasantakaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vayappattaṃ dhītaraṃ datvā
atk-s0401a:787_3: sakalakuṭumbassa sāmikaṃ akāsi. Sopi kulaputto seṭṭhino accayena tasmiṃ nagare seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:787_4: gahetvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato. Satthā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:790_0: Iti satthā dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ imaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassesi. Ayaṃ dvinnampi mahāsāvakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:790_1: pubbapatthanato paṭṭhāya anupubbikathā. Aparabhāge pana satthā ariyagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0401a:790_2: dhammāsane nisinno manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ cetovivaṭṭakusalānañca cūḷapanthakattheraṃ
atk-s0401a:792_0: 201. Tatiye araṇavihārīnanti nikkilesavihārīnaṃ. Raṇanti hi rāgādayo kilesā vuccanti,
atk-s0401a:792_1: tesaṃ abhāvena nikkilesavihāro araṇavihāro nāma. So yesaṃ atthi, te araṇavihārino.
atk-s0401a:792_2: Tesaṃ araṇavihārīnaṃ subhūtitthero aggoti. Kiñcāpi hi aññepi khīṇāsavā araṇavihārinova,
atk-s0401a:792_3: therena pana dhammadesanāya etaṃ nāmaṃ laddhaṃ. Aññe hi bhikkhū dhammaṃ desento uddissakaṃ
atk-s0401a:792_4: katvā vaṇṇaṃ vā avaṇṇaṃ vā kathenti, thero pana dhammaṃ desento satthārā desitaniyāmato
atk-s0401a:792_5: anokkamitvā deseti, tasmā araṇavihārīnaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:793_0: 202. Catutthe dakkhiṇeyyānanti dakkhiṇārahānaṃ. Tattha kiñcāpi aññepi khīṇāsavā aggadakkhiṇeyyā,
atk-s0401a:793_1: thero pana piṇḍāya caranto ghare ghare mettājhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:793_2: bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāti “evaṃ bhikkhādāyakānaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Tasmā dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ
atk-s0401a:793_3: aggoti vutto. Attabhāvo panassa susamiddho, alaṅkatatoraṇaṃ viya cittapaṭo viya ca
atk-s0401a:794_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayaṃ kira padumuttare bhagavati anuppanneyeva
atk-s0401a:794_1: haṃsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti, nandamāṇavotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So
atk-s0401a:794_2: vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto attano parivārehi catucattālīsāya
atk-s0401a:794_3: māṇavakasahassehi saddhiṃ pabbatapāde isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañca abhiññā aṭṭha
atk-s0401a:795_0: Tasmiṃ samaye padumuttaro bhagavā loke nibbattitvā haṃsavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya viharanto
atk-s0401a:795_1: ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento nandatāpasassa antevāsikānaṃ jaṭilānaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0401a:795_2: nandatāpasassa ca dvīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāvakassa ṭhānantarapatthanaṃ disvā pātova
atk-s0401a:795_3: sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ pattacīvaramādāya sāriputtattherassa vatthumhi
atk-s0401a:795_4: vuttanayeneva nandatāpasassa assamaṃ agamāsi. Tattha phalāphaladānañca pupphāsanapaññāpanañca
atk-s0401a:796_0: Satthā pana nirodhā vuṭṭhito araṇavihāriaṅgena ca dakkhiṇeyyaṅgena cāti dvīhaṅgehi
atk-s0401a:796_1: samannāgataṃ ekaṃ sāvakaṃ “isigaṇassa pupphāsanānumodanaṃ karohī”ti āṇāpesi. So attano
atk-s0401a:796_2: visaye ṭhatvā tepiṭakaṃ sammasitvā anumodanaṃ akāsi. Tassa desanāvasāne satthā sayaṃ
atk-s0401a:796_3: dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne sabbe catucattālīsasahassāpi tāpasā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:796_4: Nandatāpaso pana anumodakassa bhikkhuno nimittaṃ gaṇhitvā satthu desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:796_5: pesetuṃ nāsakkhi. Satthā “etha, bhikkhavo”ti sesabhikkhūnaṃ hatthaṃ pasāresi. Sabbepi
atk-s0401a:797_0: Nandatāpaso tathāgataṃ vanditvā sammukhe ṭhito āha – “bhante, yena bhikkhunā isigaṇassa
atk-s0401a:797_1: pupphāsanānumodanā katā, ko nāmoyaṃ tumhākaṃ sāsane”ti? Araṇavihāriaṅgena ca dakkhiṇeyyaṅgena
atk-s0401a:797_2: ca etadaggaṃ patto esoti. “Bhante, ahampi iminā sattāhakatena adhikārakammena aññaṃ
atk-s0401a:797_3: sampattiṃ na patthemi, anāgate panāhaṃ ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṃ thero viya dvīhaṅgehi
atk-s0401a:797_4: samannāgato bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthā anantarāyaṃ disvā byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:797_5: Nandatāpasopi kālena kālaṃ dasabalassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke
atk-s0401a:797_6: nibbatto. Idamassa kalyāṇakammaṃ. Antarā pana kammaṃ na kathiyati.
atk-s0401a:798_0: So kappasatasahassaṃ atikkamitvā sāvatthiyaṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa gehe nibbatti, subhūtītissa
atk-s0401a:798_1: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Aparabhāge amhākaṃ satthā loke nibbatto rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharati.
atk-s0401a:798_2: Tadā anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi sāvatthiyaṃ uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā attano sahāyakassa
atk-s0401a:798_3: rājagahaseṭṭhino gharaṃ gato satthu uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā satthāraṃ sītavane viharantaṃ
atk-s0401a:798_4: upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ sāvatthiṃ āgamanatthāya
atk-s0401a:798_5: yācitvā pañcacattālīsayojane magge yojane yojane satasahassapariccāgena vihāre patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0401a:798_6: sāvatthiyaṃ rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇaṃ jetarājakumārassa uyyānabhūmiṃ koṭisanthārena
atk-s0401a:798_7: kiṇitvā tattha bhagavato vihāraṃ kāretvā adāsi. Vihāramahadivase ayaṃ subhūtikuṭimbiko
atk-s0401a:798_8: anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhinā saddhiṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto saddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:798_9: So upasampanno dve mātikā paguṇaṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā araññe samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:798_10: karonto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Dhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:798_11: desento vuttanayeneva dhammaṃ katheti, piṇḍāya caranto vuttanayeneva mettājhānato
atk-s0401a:798_12: vuṭṭhāya bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāti. Atha naṃ satthā imaṃ kāraṇadvayaṃ paṭicca araṇavihārīnañca
atk-s0401a:800_0: 203. Pañcame āraññakānanti araññavāsīnaṃ. Revato khadiravaniyoti dhammasenāpatittherassa
atk-s0401a:800_1: kaniṭṭhabhātiko. So yathā aññe therā araññe vasamānā vanasabhāgaṃ udakasabhāgaṃ bhikkhācārasabhāgañca
atk-s0401a:800_2: sallakkhetvā araññe vasanti, na evaṃ vasi. Etāni pana sabhāgāni anādiyitvā ujjaṅgalasakkharapāsāṇavisame
atk-s0401a:800_3: khadiravane paṭivasati. Tasmā āraññakānaṃ aggoti vutto.
atk-s0401a:801_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayaṃ kira atīte padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:801_1: nibbatto mahāgaṅgāya payāgapatiṭṭhānatitthe nāvākammaṃ karonto paṭivasati. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:801_2: samaye satthā satasahassabhikkhuparivāro cārikaṃ caranto payāgapatiṭṭhānatitthaṃ
atk-s0401a:801_3: sampāpuṇi. So dasabalaṃ disvā cintesi – “mayhaṃ kālena kālaṃ buddhadassanaṃ nāma
atk-s0401a:801_4: natthi, ayaṃ me kalyāṇakammāyūhanakkhaṇo”ti nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ bandhāpetvā upari celavitānaṃ
atk-s0401a:801_5: kāretvā gandhamālādāmāni osāretvā heṭṭhā varapotthakaṃ cittattharaṇaṃ attharāpetvā
atk-s0401a:802_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā ekaṃ āraññakaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadagge ṭhapesi. So nāviko taṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:802_1: “mayāpi evamevaṃ anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane āraññakānaṃ aggena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0401a:802_2: satthāraṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:802_3: tumhehi etadagge ṭhapito so bhikkhu viya ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane āraññakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:802_4: aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthā anantarāyaṃ disvā “anāgate gotamabuddhassa
atk-s0401a:802_5: sāsane tvaṃ āraññakānaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi. Antarā pana aññaṃ
atk-s0401a:803_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadhakkhette
atk-s0401a:803_1: nālakabrāhmaṇagāme sārībrāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā tiṇṇaṃ bhātikānaṃ
atk-s0401a:803_2: tissannañca bhaginīnaṃ sabbakaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti, revatotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Athassa
atk-s0401a:803_3: mātāpitaro cintesuṃ – “vaḍḍhitavaḍḍhite dārake samaṇā sakyaputtiyā netvā pabbājenti,
atk-s0401a:803_4: amhākaṃ puttaṃ revataṃ daharameva gharabandhanena bandhissāmā”ti samānakulato dārikaṃ
atk-s0401a:803_5: ānetvā revatassa ayyikaṃ vandāpetvā, “amma, tava ayyikāya mahallakatarā hohī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:803_6: Revato tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā cintesi – “ayaṃ dārikā daharā paṭhamavaye ṭhitā, imissā
atk-s0401a:803_7: kira evaṃvidhaṃ rūpaṃ mama ayyikāya rūpasadisaṃ bhavissati, pucchissāmi tāva nesaṃ
atk-s0401a:803_8: adhippāya”nti cintetvā āha – “tumhe kiṃ kathethā”ti? Tāta, “ayaṃ dārikā ayyikā viya
atk-s0401a:803_9: te jaraṃ pāpuṇātū”ti vadāmāti. So “imissā rūpaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ bhavissatī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:803_10: Tāta, kiṃ vadesi, mahāpuññā evaṃvidhā hontīti.
atk-s0401a:804_0: So cintesi – “idaṃ kira rūpaṃ iminā niyāmena valittacaṃ bhavissati palitakesaṃ khaṇḍadantaṃ,
atk-s0401a:804_1: ahaṃ evarūpe rūpe rajjitvā kiṃ karissāmi, mama bhātikānaṃ gatamaggameva gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:804_2: kīḷanto viya hutvā samavaye taruṇadārake āha – “etha, bho, vidhāvanikaṃ karissāmā”ti
atk-s0401a:804_3: nikkhami. Tāta, maṅgaladivase mā bahi gacchāti. So dārakehi saddhiṃ kīḷanto viya
atk-s0401a:804_4: attano dhāvanavāre sampatte thokaṃ gantvā papañcetvā āgacchati. Puna dutiyavāre sampatte
atk-s0401a:804_5: tato turitaṃ viya gantvā āgato, tatiyavāre sampatte “ayaṃ me kālo”ti ñatvā sammukhaṭṭhāneneva
atk-s0401a:804_6: palāyitvā paṃsukūlikabhikkhūnaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ araññaṃ gantvā there abhivādetvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:804_7: yāci. Sappurisa mayaṃ taṃ na jānāma “kassāsi putto”ti, tvañca alaṅkataniyāmeneva
atk-s0401a:804_8: āgato, ko taṃ pabbājetuṃ ussahissatīti. So ubho bāhā paggayha “vilumpanti maṃ vilumpanti
atk-s0401a:804_9: ma”nti mahāravaṃ viravi. Ito cito ca bhikkhū sannipatitvā “sappurisa, imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0401a:804_10: tava vatthaṃ vā piḷandhanaṃ vā koci gaṇhanto nāma natthi, tvañca ‘vilumpantī’ti vadasi,
atk-s0401a:804_11: kiṃ sandhāya vadasī”ti? Bhante, nāhaṃ vatthālaṅkāraṃ sandhāya vadāmi, tissannaṃ pana
atk-s0401a:804_12: me sampattīnaṃ vilopo vattati, taṃ sandhāya vadāmi. Maṃ tāva tumhe mā pabbājayittha,
atk-s0401a:804_13: bhātaraṃ pana me jānāthāti. Konāmo pana te bhātāti? Gihikāle upatisso nāma, idāni
atk-s0401a:804_14: pana sāriputto nāma jātoti vadantīti. “Āvuso, evaṃ sante ayaṃ kulaputto amhākaṃ kaniṭṭhabhātiko
atk-s0401a:804_15: nāma hoti, jeṭṭhabhātiko no dhammasenāpati puretaraṃyeva āha – ‘amhākaṃ ñātakā sabbeva
atk-s0401a:804_16: micchādiṭṭhikā, yo koci amhākaṃ ñātīti āgacchati, taṃ yena tenupāyena pabbājeyyathā’ti.
atk-s0401a:804_17: Ayaṃ pana therassa ajjhattabhātiko, pabbājetha na”nti vatvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:804_18: ācikkhitvā pabbājayiṃsu. Atha naṃ paripuṇṇavassaṃ upasampādetvā kammaṭṭhāne yojayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:805_0: Thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ avidūre ṭhāne vuttappakāraṃ khadiravanaṃ
atk-s0401a:805_1: pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. Tassa “arahattaṃ appatvā dasabalaṃ vā bhātikattheraṃ
atk-s0401a:805_2: vā na passissāmī”ti vāyamantasseva tayo māsā atikkantā, sukhumālakulaputtassa lūkhabhojanaṃ
atk-s0401a:805_3: bhuñjantassa cittaṃ valītaṃ nāma hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vimokkhaṃ na gataṃ. So temāsaccayena
atk-s0401a:805_4: pavāretvā vutthavasso hutvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. Tassa samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:805_5: karontassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ ahosi, so vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:806_0: Athāyasmā sāriputto satthāraṃ āha – “bhante, mayhaṃ kira kaniṭṭhabhātā revato pabbajito,
atk-s0401a:806_1: so abhirameyya vā na vā, gantvā naṃ passissāmī”ti. Bhagavā revatassa āraddhavipassakabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:806_2: ñatvā dve vāre paṭikkhipitvā tatiyavāre yācito arahattaṃ pattabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “sāriputta,
atk-s0401a:806_3: ahampi gamissāmi, bhikkhūnaṃ ārocehī”ti. Thero bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0401a:806_4: satthā cārikaṃ caritukāmo, gantukāmā āgacchantū”ti sabbesaṃyeva ārocesi. Dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:806_5: cārikatthāya gamanakāle ohīnakabhikkhū nāma appakā honti, “satthu suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ
atk-s0401a:806_6: passissāma, madhuradhammakathaṃ vā suṇissāmā”ti yebhuyyena gantukāmāva bahukā honti.
atk-s0401a:807_0: Athekasmiṃ padese ānandatthero dvedhāpathaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ pucchi – “bhante, imasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:807_1: ṭhāne dve maggā, kataramaggena saṅgho gacchatū”ti. Kataramaggo, ānanda, ujukoti?
atk-s0401a:807_2: Bhante, ujumaggo tiṃsayojano amanussapatho, parihāramaggo pana saṭṭhiyojaniko khemo
atk-s0401a:807_3: subhikkhoti. Ānanda, sīvali amhehi saddhiṃ āgatoti? Āma, bhante, āgatoti. Tena hi
atk-s0401a:807_4: saṅgho ujumaggameva gaṇhatu, sīvalissa puññaṃ vīmaṃsissāmāti. Satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro
atk-s0401a:807_5: sīvalittherassa puññavīmaṃsanatthaṃ aṭavimaggaṃ abhiruhi. Maggaṃ abhiruhanaṭṭhānato
atk-s0401a:807_6: paṭṭhāya devasaṅgho yojane yojane ṭhāne nagaraṃ māpetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0401a:807_7: vasanatthāya vihāre paṭiyādesi. Devaputtā raññā pesitakammakārā viya hutvā yāgukhajjakādīni
atk-s0401a:807_8: gahetvā “kahaṃ ayyo sīvali, kahaṃ ayyo sīvalī”ti pucchantā gacchanti. Thero taṃ sakkārasammānaṃ
atk-s0401a:807_9: gaṇhāpetvā satthu santikaṃ gacchati. Satthā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0401a:808_0: Imināva niyāmena satthā sakkārasammānaṃ anubhavanto devasikaṃ yojanaparamaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:808_1: tiṃsayojanikaṃ kantāraṃ atikkamma khadiravaniyattherassa sabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ patto. Thero
atk-s0401a:808_2: satthu āgamanaṃ ñatvā attano vasanaṭṭhāne buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa pahonakavihāre
atk-s0401a:808_3: dasabalassa gandhakuṭiṃ rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīni ca iddhiyā māpetvā tathāgatassa
atk-s0401a:808_4: paccuggamanaṃ gato. Satthā alaṅkatapaṭiyattena maggena vihāraṃ pāvisi. Atha tathāgate
atk-s0401a:808_5: gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe bhikkhū vassaggena pattasenāsanāni pavisiṃsu. Devatā “akālo
atk-s0401a:808_6: āhārassā”ti aṭṭhavidhaṃ pānakaṃ āhariṃsu. Satthā saṅghena saddhiṃ pānakaṃ pivi. Imināva
atk-s0401a:808_7: niyāmena tathāgatassa sakkārasammānaṃ anubhavantasseva addhamāso atikkanto.
atk-s0401a:809_0: Athekacce ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhū ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā kathaṃ uppādayiṃsu “satthā dasabalo
atk-s0401a:809_1: ‘mayhaṃ aggasāvakassa kaniṭṭhabhātā’ti vatvā evarūpaṃ navakammikabhikkhuṃ passituṃ
atk-s0401a:809_2: āgato, imassa vihārassa santike jetavanamahāvihāro vā veḷuvanavihārādayo vā kiṃ karissanti.
atk-s0401a:809_3: Ayampi bhikkhu evarūpassa navakammassa kārako, kiṃ nāma samaṇadhammaṃ karissatī”ti?
atk-s0401a:809_4: Atha satthā cintesi – “mayi ciraṃ vasante idaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākiṇṇaṃ bhavissati, āraññakā
atk-s0401a:809_5: bhikkhū nāma pavivekatthikā honti, revatassa aphāsuvihāro bhavissatī”ti tato revatassa
atk-s0401a:809_6: divāṭṭhānaṃ gato. Thero ekakova caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya pāsāṇaphalake
atk-s0401a:809_7: nisinno satthāraṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā vandi.
atk-s0401a:810_0: Atha naṃ satthā pucchi – “revata, imaṃ vāḷamigaṭṭhānaṃ, caṇḍānaṃ hatthiassādīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:810_1: saddaṃ sutvā kinti karosī”ti? Tesaṃ me, bhante, saddaṃ suṇato araññarati nāma uppajjatīti.
atk-s0401a:810_2: Satthā tasmiṃ ṭhāne revatattherassa pañcahi gāthāsatehi araññe nivāsānisaṃsaṃ nāma
atk-s0401a:810_3: kathetvā punadivase avidūre ṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā revatattheraṃ nivattetvā yehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0401a:810_4: therassa avaṇṇo kathito, tesaṃ kattarayaṭṭhiupāhanātelanāḷichattānaṃ pamussanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:810_5: akāsi. Te attano parikkhāratthāya nivattā āgatamaggeneva gacchantāpi taṃ ṭhānaṃ sallakkhetuṃ
atk-s0401a:810_6: na sakkonti. Paṭhamaṃ hi te alaṅkatapaṭiyattena maggena gantvā taṃdivasaṃ pana visamamaggena
atk-s0401a:810_7: gacchantā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdanti, jāṇukena gacchanti. Te gumbe ca
atk-s0401a:810_8: gacche ca kaṇṭake ca maddantā attano vasitasabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khadirakhāṇuke
atk-s0401a:810_9: attano chattaṃ sañjānanti, upāhanaṃ kattarayaṭṭhiṃ telanāḷiṃ sañjānanti. Te tasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:810_10: samaye “iddhimā ayaṃ bhikkhū”ti ñatvā attano parikkhāre ādāya “dasabalassa paṭiyattasakkāro
atk-s0401a:811_0: Purato gatabhikkhū, visākhā upāsikā, attano gehe nisinnakāle pucchati – “manāpaṃ
atk-s0401a:811_1: nu kho, bhante, revatattherassa vasanaṭṭhāna”nti? Manāpaṃ upāsike nandanavanacittalatādipaṭibhāgaṃ
atk-s0401a:811_2: taṃ senāsananti. Atha nesaṃ sabbapacchato āgatabhikkhū pucchi – “manāpaṃ, ayyā, revatattherassa
atk-s0401a:811_3: vasanaṭṭhāna”nti. Mā puccha upāsike, kathetuṃ ayuttaṭṭhānametaṃ, ujjaṅgalaṃ sakkharapāsāṇavisamaṃ
atk-s0401a:811_4: khadiravanaṃ etaṃ, tattha so bhikkhu viharatīti. Visākhā, purimānañca pacchimānañca
atk-s0401a:811_5: bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “kesaṃ nu kho kathā saccā”ti pacchābhatte gandhamālaṃ ādāya
atk-s0401a:811_6: dasabalassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā, vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā satthāraṃ pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0401a:811_7: revatattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ ekacce, ayyā, vaṇṇenti, ekacce nindanti, kiṃ nāmetaṃ,
atk-s0401a:811_8: bhante”ti? Visākhe ramaṇīyaṃ vā hotu mā vā, yasmiṃ ṭhāne ariyānaṃ cittaṃ ramati,
atk-s0401a:811_9: tadeva ṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ nāmāti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:812: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0401a:814: Atha satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ āraññakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:816_0: 204. Chaṭṭhe jhāyīnanti jhānalābhīnaṃ jhānābhiratānaṃ. So kira thero yā jhānasamāpattiyo
atk-s0401a:816_1: dasabalo samāpajjati, tato appataraṃ ṭhapetvā bahutarā samāpajjati. Tasmā jhāyīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:816_2: aggo nāma jāto. Kaṅkhāyanabhāvena kaṅkhārevatoti vuccati. Kaṅkhā nāma kukkuccaṃ,
atk-s0401a:816_3: kukkuccakoti attho. Kiṃ pana aññe kukkuccakā natthīti? Atthi, ayaṃ pana thero kappiyepi
atk-s0401a:816_4: kukkuccaṃ uppādesi. Tenassa kukkuccakatā atipākaṭā jātāti kaṅkhārevatotveva saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:817_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle purimanayeneva
atk-s0401a:817_1: mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:817_2: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ jhānābhiratānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena
atk-s0401a:817_3: bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti desanāvasāne satthāraṃ nimantetvā purimanayeneva sattāhaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ
atk-s0401a:817_4: katvā bhagavantaṃ āha – “bhante, ahaṃ iminā adhikārakammena na aññaṃ sampattiṃ patthemi,
atk-s0401a:817_5: yathā pana so tumhehi ito sattadivasamatthake bhikkhu jhāyīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito,
atk-s0401a:817_6: evaṃ ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane jhāyīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ
atk-s0401a:817_7: akāsi. Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate kappasatasahassāvasāne
atk-s0401a:817_8: gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, tassa sāsane tvaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:818_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:818_1: bhagavato kāle sāvatthinagare mahābhogakule nibbatto pacchābhattaṃ dhammassavanatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:818_2: gacchantena mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0401a:818_3: sutvā saddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā pabbajito upasampadaṃ labhitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā
atk-s0401a:818_4: jhānaparikammaṃ karonto jhānalābhī hutvā jhānameva pādakaṃ katvā arahattaphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:818_5: So dasabalena samāpajjitabbasamāpattīnaṃ appatarā ṭhapetvā bahutarā samāpajjanto
atk-s0401a:818_6: ahorattaṃ jhānesu ciṇṇavasī ahosi. Atha naṃ aparabhāge satthā imaṃ guṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0401a:818_7: jhāyīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. “Akappiyo, āvuso guḷo, akappiyā muggā”ti evaṃ pana kappiyesveva
atk-s0401a:818_8: vatthūsu kukkuccassa uppāditatāya kukkuccasaṅkhātāya kaṅkhāya bhāvena kaṅkhārevatoti saṅkhaṃ gatoti.
atk-s0401a:820_0: 205. Sattame āraddhavīriyānanti paggahitavīriyānaṃ paripuṇṇavīriyānaṃ. Soṇo koḷivisoti
atk-s0401a:820_1: soṇoti tassa nāmaṃ, koḷivisoti gottaṃ. Koṭivessoti vā attho, issariyena koṭippattassa
atk-s0401a:820_2: vessakulassa dārakoti adhippāyo. Yasmā pana aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vīriyaṃ nāma vaḍḍhetabbaṃ
atk-s0401a:820_3: hoti, therassa pana hāpetabbameva ahosi. Tasmā esa āraddhavīriyānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:821_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayaṃ kira atīte padumuttarabuddhakāle seṭṭhikule
atk-s0401a:821_1: nibbatti, sirivaḍḍhakumārotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto purimanayeneva vihāraṃ
atk-s0401a:821_2: gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ āraddhavīriyānaṃ
atk-s0401a:821_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0401a:821_4: dasabalaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā vuttanayeneva patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthā
atk-s0401a:821_5: tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā purimanayeneva byākaritvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:822_0: Sopi sirivaḍḍhaseṭṭhi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:822_1: atikkamitvā imasmiṃ kappe parinibbute kassapadasabale anuppanne amhākaṃ bhagavati
atk-s0401a:822_2: bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. So attano sahāyakehi saddhiṃ gaṅgāyaṃ kīḷati.
atk-s0401a:822_3: Tasmiṃ samaye eko jiṇṇacīvariko paccekabuddho “bārāṇasiṃ upanissāya gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0401a:822_4: katvā vassaṃ upagacchissāmī”ti udakena samupabyūḷhe daṇḍake ca valliyo ca saṃkaḍḍhati.
atk-s0401a:822_5: Ayaṃ kumāro sahāyakehi saddhiṃ gantvā abhivādetvā ṭhito, “bhante, kiṃ karothā”ti
atk-s0401a:822_6: pucchi. Kumāra upakaṭṭhe antovasse pabbajitānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0401a:822_7: “Bhante, ajjeva ekadivasaṃ ayyo yathā tathā āgametu, ahaṃ sve ayyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:822_8: karissāmī”ti āha. Paccekabuddho “tasseva kumārassa saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti āgatattā
atk-s0401a:822_9: adhivāsesi. So tassa adhivāsanaṃ viditvā gato punadivase sakkārasammānaṃ sajjetvā
atk-s0401a:822_10: paccekabuddhassa āgamanaṃ olokento aṭṭhāsi. Paccekabuddhopi “kahaṃ nu kho ajja bhikkhācāraṃ
atk-s0401a:822_11: labhissāmī”ti āvajjento ñatvā tasseva gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:823_0: Kumāro paccekabuddhaṃ disvā sampiyāyamāno pattaṃ ādāya bhikkhaṃ datvā “imaṃ antovassaṃ
atk-s0401a:823_1: mayhaṃ gehadvārameva āgacchatha, bhante”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā paccekabuddhe bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0401a:823_2: katvā pakkante attano sahāyakehi saddhiṃ gantvā ekadivaseneva paccekabuddhassa vasanapaṇṇasālañca
atk-s0401a:823_3: caṅkamanañca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni ca kārāpetvā adāsi. Tasseva paṇṇasālaṃ pavisanavelāya
atk-s0401a:823_4: haritūpalittāya bhūmiyā “pādesu kalalaṃ mā laggī”ti attano pārupanaṃ satasahassagghanakaṃ
atk-s0401a:823_5: rattakambalaṃ bhūmattharaṇaṃ santharitvā kambalassa vaṇṇena saddhiṃ paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0401a:823_6: sarīrappabhaṃ ekasadisaṃ disvā ativiya pasanno hutvā āha – “yathā tumhehi akkantakālato
atk-s0401a:823_7: paṭṭhāya imassa kambalassa ativiya pabhā virocati, evameva mayhampi nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:823_8: hatthapādānaṃ vaṇṇo bandhujīvakapupphavaṇṇo hotu, satakkhattuṃ vihatakappāsapaṭalaphassasadisova
atk-s0401a:823_9: phasso hotū”ti. So temāsaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā pavāritakāle ticīvaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:824_0: Sopi kulaputto devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kāḷacampānagare upaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0401a:824_1: ghare paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakālato paṭṭhāya seṭṭhikulaṃ anekāni
atk-s0401a:824_2: paṇṇākārasahassāni āgacchanti. Jātadivase ca sakalanagaraṃ ekasakkārasammānaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0401a:824_3: Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase mātāpitaro “amhākaṃ putto attano nāmaṃ gaṇhitvāva āgato,
atk-s0401a:824_4: rattasuvaṇṇarasaparisittā viyassa sarīracchavī”ti soṇakumārotvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:825_0: Athassa saṭṭhi dhātiyo upanetvā devakumāraṃ viya naṃ sukhena vaḍḍhesuṃ. Tassa evarūpaṃ
atk-s0401a:825_1: āhāravidhānaṃ ahosi – saṭṭhikarīsamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ kasitvā tividhena udakena posenti.
atk-s0401a:825_2: Kedāre pavisantīsu udakamātikāsu khīrodakassa ca gandhodakassa ca anekāni cāṭisahassāni
atk-s0401a:825_3: āsiñcanti. Sālisīsānaṃ khīraggahaṇakāle sukādīnaṃ pāṇānaṃ ucchiṭṭhakaraṇanivāraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:825_4: vīhigabbhānaṃ sukhumālabhāvatthañca pariyantaparikkhepe ca antarantarā ca thambhe
atk-s0401a:825_5: nikhanitvā upari daṇḍake datvā kilañjehi chādetvā samantā sāṇiyā parikkhipitvā sabbapariyante
atk-s0401a:825_6: ārakkhaṃ gaṇhanti. Sasse nipphanne koṭṭhe catujātigandhehi paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā upari
atk-s0401a:825_7: uttamagandhehi paribhāventi. Anekasahassapurisā khettaṃ oruyha sālisīsāni vaṇṭesu
atk-s0401a:825_8: chinditvā muṭṭhimuṭṭhiyo katvā rajjukehi bandhitvā sukkhāpenti. Tato koṭṭhakassa
atk-s0401a:825_9: heṭṭhimatale gandhe santharitvā upari sālisīsāni santharanti. Evaṃ ekantarikaṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:825_10: santharantā koṭṭhakaṃ pūretvā dvāraṃ pidahanti, tivassasampattakāle koṭṭhakaṃ vivaranti.
atk-s0401a:825_11: Vivaṭakāle sakalanagaraṃ sugandhagandhikaṃ hoti. Sālimhi pahate dhuttā thuse kiṇitvā
atk-s0401a:825_12: gaṇhanti, kuṇḍakaṃ pana cūḷupaṭṭhākā labhanti. Musalaghaṭṭitake sālitaṇḍule vicinitvā
atk-s0401a:825_13: gaṇhanti. Te suvaṇṇahīrakapacchiyaṃ pakkhipitvā satakālaṃ parissāvetvā gahite pakkuthitajātirase
atk-s0401a:825_14: ekavāraṃ pakkhipitvā uddharanti, pamukhaṭṭhānaṃ sumanapupphasadisaṃ hoti. Taṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-s0401a:825_16: katvā ādāya gantvā seṭṭhiputtassa purato ṭhapenti.
atk-s0401a:826_0: So attano yāpanamattaṃ bhuñjitvā gandhavāsitena udakena mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā hatthapāde
atk-s0401a:826_1: dhovati. Athassa dhotahatthapādassa nānappakāraṃ mukhavāsaṃ upanenti. Tassa akkamanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:826_3: honti, satakālavihatakappāsassa viya phasso, pādatalesu maṇikuṇḍalāvattavaṇṇāni lomāni
atk-s0401a:826_4: jāyiṃsu. So kassacideva kujjhitvā “ājānāhi bhūmiṃ akkamissāmī”ti vadati. Tassa vayappattassa
atk-s0401a:826_5: tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike tayo pāsāde kāretvā nāṭakāni ca upaṭṭhāpesuṃ. So mahāsampattiṃ
atk-s0401a:827_0: Atha amhākaṃ satthari sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke rājagahaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0401a:827_1: viharante pādalomadassanatthaṃ raññā māgadhena pakkosāpetvā asītiyā gāmiyasahassehi
atk-s0401a:827_2: saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ pahito dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:827_3: yāci. Atha naṃ bhagavā “anuññātosi mātāpitūhī”ti pucchitvā ananuññātabhāvaṃ sutvā
atk-s0401a:827_4: “na kho, soṇa, tathāgatā mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ pabbājentī”ti paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0401a:827_5: So “sādhu bhagavā”ti tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:827_6: gantvā anujānāpetvā satthu santikaṃ āgamma aññatarassa bhikkhuno santike pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:827_7: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panassa pabbajjāvidhānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva.
atk-s0401a:828_0: Tassa pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā rājagahe viharantassa sambahulā ñātisālohitā
atk-s0401a:828_1: ca sandiṭṭhasambhattā ca sakkārasammānaṃ āharanti, rūpanipphattiyā vaṇṇaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0401a:828_2: aññepi janā passituṃ āgacchanti. Thero cintesi – “mama santikaṃ bahū janā āgacchanti,
atk-s0401a:828_3: kammaṭṭhāne vā vipassanāya vā kammaṃ kātuṃ kathaṃ sakkhissāmi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthu
atk-s0401a:828_4: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā sītavanasusānaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ kareyyaṃ. Tatra
atk-s0401a:828_5: hi susānanti jigucchitvā bahū janā nāgamissanti, evaṃsante mama kiccaṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0401a:828_6: pāpuṇissatī”ti satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā sītavanaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:828_7: kātuṃ ārabhi. So cintesi – “mayhaṃ sarīraṃ paramasukhumālaṃ, na kho pana sakkā sukheneva
atk-s0401a:828_8: sukhaṃ pāpuṇituṃ, kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Tato ṭhānacaṅkamameva
atk-s0401a:828_9: adhiṭṭhāya padhānamakāsi. Tassa sukhumālānaṃ pādatalānaṃ antantehi phoṭā uṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:828_10: bhijjiṃsu, caṅkamo ekalohitova ahosi. Pādesu avahantesu jaṇṇukehipi hatthehipi vāyamitvā
atk-s0401a:828_11: caṅkamati. Evaṃ vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ karontopi obhāsamattampi nibbattetuṃ asakkonto cintesi
atk-s0401a:828_12: – “sace aññopi āraddhavīriyo bhaveyya, mādisova bhaveyya. Ahaṃ kho pana evaṃ vāyamantopi
atk-s0401a:828_13: maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā uppādetuṃ na sakkomi, addhā nevāhaṃ ugghaṭitaññū, na vipañcitaññū,
atk-s0401a:828_14: na neyyo, padaparamena mayā bhavitabbaṃ. Kiṃ me pabbajjāya, hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge
atk-s0401a:829_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā therassa vitakkaṃ ñatvā sāyanhasamaye bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0401a:829_1: tattha gantvā lohitena phuṭṭhaṃ caṅkamaṃ disvā theraṃ vīṇovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamathayojanatthāya
atk-s0401a:829_2: tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā gijjhakūṭameva gato. Soṇattheropi dasabalassa sammukhā
atk-s0401a:829_3: ovādaṃ labhitvā nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Atha satthā aparabhāge jetavane
atk-s0401a:829_4: bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto dhammaṃ desento theraṃ āraddhavīriyānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:831_0: 206. Aṭṭhame kalyāṇavākkaraṇānanti vākkaraṇaṃ vuccati vacanakiriyā, madhuravacanānanti
atk-s0401a:831_1: attho. Ayañhi thero dasabalena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyā tathāgatassa madhurena sarena
atk-s0401a:831_2: dhammakathaṃ kathesi. Athassa satthā sādhukāraṃ adāsi. Tasmā so kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ
atk-s0401a:831_3: aggo nāma jāto. Soṇoti tassa nāmaṃ, koṭiagghanakaṃ pana kaṇṇapiḷandhanaṃ dhāresi.
atk-s0401a:832_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi padumuttarabuddhakāle purimanayeneva
atk-s0401a:832_1: mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhatvā satthu dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:832_2: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate ekassa
atk-s0401a:832_3: buddhassa sāsane kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā dasabalaṃ
atk-s0401a:832_4: nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā, “bhante, yaṃ bhikkhuṃ tumhe ito sattadivasamatthake
atk-s0401a:832_5: kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapayittha, ahampi imassa adhikārakammassa phalena
atk-s0401a:832_6: anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane tathārūpo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthā tassa
atk-s0401a:832_7: anantarāyaṃ disvā “anāgate gotamabuddhassa sāsane kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:833_0: Sopi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto
atk-s0401a:833_1: amhākaṃ dasabalassa uppattito puretarameva devalokā cavitvā kāḷiyā nāma kuraragharikāya
atk-s0401a:833_2: upāsikāya kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Sā paripakke gabbhe rājagahanagare attano
atk-s0401a:834_0: Tasmiṃ samaye amhākaṃ satthā sabbaññutaṃ patto isipatane dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0401a:834_1: Dhammacakkappavattane dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatiṃsu. Tattha eko aṭṭhavīsatiyā
atk-s0401a:834_2: yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ abbhantare sātāgiro nāma yakkho dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0401a:834_3: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya cintesi – “kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ evaṃ madhuradhammakathā mama
atk-s0401a:834_4: sahāyena hemavatena sutā na sutā”ti? So devasaṅghassa antare olokento taṃ apassitvā
atk-s0401a:834_5: “addhā mama sahāyo tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ na jānāti, gacchāmi dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:834_6: ceva vaṇṇaṃ kathessāmi, paṭividdhadhammañca ārocessāmī”ti attano parisāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:835_0: Hemavatopi tiyojanasahassaṃ himavantaṃ akālapupphitaṃ disvā “mama sahāyena sātāgirena
atk-s0401a:835_1: saddhiṃ himavantakīḷitaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti attano parisāya saddhiṃ rājagahamatthakeneva
atk-s0401a:835_2: pāyāsi. Tesaṃ dvinnampi aggabalakāyā kulagharikāya kāḷiupāsikāya nivesanamatthake
atk-s0401a:835_3: samāgantvā “tumhe kassa parisā, mayaṃ sātāgirassa. Tumhe kassa parisā, mayaṃ hemavatassā”ti
atk-s0401a:835_4: āhaṃsu. Te haṭṭhatuṭṭhāva gantvā tesaṃ yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ ārocayiṃsu. Tepi taṃkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0401a:835_5: upāsikāya nivesanamatthake samāgacchiṃsu. Sātāgiro hemavataṃ āha – “kahaṃ, samma,
atk-s0401a:835_6: gacchasī”ti? Tava santikaṃ sammāti. Kiṃkāraṇāti? Himavantaṃ pupphitaṃ disvā tayā
atk-s0401a:835_7: saddhiṃ tattha kīḷissāmīti. Tvaṃ pana, samma, kahaṃ gacchasīti? Tava santikaṃ, sammāti.
atk-s0401a:835_8: Kiṃkāraṇāti? Tvaṃ himavantassa kena pupphitabhāvaṃ jānāsīti? Na jānāmi, sammāti.
atk-s0401a:835_9: Suddhodanamahārājassa putto siddhatthakumāro dasasahassilokadhātuṃ kampetvā paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo
atk-s0401a:835_10: dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ majjhe anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Tassa pavattitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:835_11: na jānāsīti? Na jānāmi, sammāti. Tvaṃ ettakameva ṭhānaṃ pupphitanti aññāsi, tassa
atk-s0401a:835_12: pana purisassa sakkāratthāya sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷaṃ ekamālāguḷasadisaṃ ajja
atk-s0401a:835_13: jātaṃ sammāti. Mālā tāva pupphantu, tayā so satthā akkhīni pūretvā diṭṭhoti. Āma,
atk-s0401a:835_14: samma, satthā ca me diṭṭho, dhammo ca suto, amatañca pītaṃ. Ahaṃ “etaṃ amatadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:835_15: tampi jānāpessāmī”ti tava santikaṃ āgatosmi, sammāti. Tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ kathentānaṃyeva
atk-s0401a:835_16: upāsikā sirisayanato uṭṭhāya nisinnā taṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā sadde nimittaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:835_17: “Ayaṃ saddo uddhaṃ, na heṭṭhā, amanussabhāsito, no manussabhāsito”ti sallakkhetvā
atk-s0401a:845_0: Evaṃ hemavato satthu kāyasamācārañca ājīvañca manosamācārañca pucchi. Pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ
atk-s0401a:845_1: sātāgiro vissajjesi. Evaṃ satthu sarīravaṇṇaguṇavaṇṇakathanavasena hemavatasuttante
atk-s0401a:845_2: niṭṭhite hemavato sahāyakassa dhammadesanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0401a:846_0: Atha, kāḷī upāsikā, parassa dhamme desīyamāne tathāgataṃ adiṭṭhapubbāva hutvā anussavappasādaṃ
atk-s0401a:846_1: uppādetvā parassa vaḍḍhitaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjamānā viya sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. Sā
atk-s0401a:846_2: sabbamātugāmānaṃ antare paṭhamakasotāpannā sabbajeṭṭhikā ahosi. Tassā saha sotāpattibhāvena
atk-s0401a:846_3: tameva rattiṃ gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ jātaṃ, paṭiladdhadārakassa nāmaggahaṇadivase soṇoti
atk-s0401a:846_4: nāmaṃ akāsi. Sā yathāruciyā kulagehe vasitvā kulagharameva agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:847_0: Tasmiṃ samaye mahākaccānatthero taṃ nagaraṃ upanissāya upavatte pabbate paṭivasati.
atk-s0401a:847_1: Upāsikā theraṃ upaṭṭhāti. Thero nibaddhaṃ tassā nivesanaṃ gacchati. Soṇadārakopi
atk-s0401a:847_2: nibaddhaṃ therassa santike vicaranto vissāsiko ahosi. So aparena samayena therassa
atk-s0401a:847_3: santike pabbaji. Thero taṃ upasampādetukāmo tīṇi vassāni gaṇaṃ pariyesitvā upasampādesi.
atk-s0401a:847_4: So upasampanno kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā therasseva
atk-s0401a:847_5: santike suttanipātaṃ uggaṇhitvā vutthavasso pavāretvā satthāraṃ passitukāmo hutvā
atk-s0401a:847_6: upajjhāyaṃ āpucchi. Thero āha – “soṇa, tayi gate satthā taṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasāpetvā
atk-s0401a:847_7: dhammaṃ ajjhesissati, tvaṃ dhammaṃ kathessasi. Satthā tava dhammakathāya pasīditvā
atk-s0401a:847_8: tuyhaṃ varaṃ dassati. Tvaṃ varaṃ gaṇhanto imañca imañca gaṇhāhi, mama vacanena dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:847_9: pāde vandāhī”ti. So upajjhāyena anuññāto mātuupāsikāya gehaṃ gantvā ārocesi. Sāpi
atk-s0401a:847_10: “sādhu, tāta, tvaṃ dasabalaṃ passituṃ gacchanto imaṃ kambalaṃ āharitvā satthu vasanagandhakuṭiyā
atk-s0401a:847_11: bhūmattharaṇaṃ katvā attharāhī”ti kambalaṃ adāsi. Soṇatthero taṃ ādāya senāsanaṃ
atk-s0401a:847_12: saṃsāmetvā anupubbena satthu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā dasabalassa buddhāsane nisinnavelāyameva
atk-s0401a:847_13: upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Satthā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:847_14: ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “ānanda, imassa bhikkhussa senāsanaṃ jānāhī”ti. Thero satthu
atk-s0401a:847_15: adhippāyaṃ ñatvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃyeva bhūmattharaṇaṃ ussārento viya atthari.
atk-s0401a:848_0: Atha kho bhagavā bahudevarattiṃ ajjhokāse vītināmetvā vihāraṃ pāvisi, āyasmāpi kho
atk-s0401a:848_1: soṇo bahudevarattiṃ ajjhokāse vītināmetvā vihāraṃ pāvisi. Satthā pacchimayāme sīhaseyyaṃ
atk-s0401a:848_2: kappetvā paccūsasamaye vuṭṭhāya nisīditvā “ettakena kālena soṇassa kāyadaratho paṭippassaddho
atk-s0401a:848_3: bhavissatī”ti ñatvā āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ ajjhesi – “paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsitu”nti.
atk-s0401a:848_4: Soṇatthero madhurassarena ekabyañjanampi avināsento aṭṭhakavaggiyāni suttāni abhāsi.
atk-s0401a:848_5: Kathāpariyosāne bhagavā sādhukāraṃ datvā “suggahito te bhikkhu dhammo, mayā desitakāle
atk-s0401a:848_6: ca ajja ca ekasadisāva desanā, kiñci ūnaṃ vā adhikaṃ vā natthī”ti pasannabhāvaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0401a:848_7: Soṇattheropi “ayaṃ okāso”ti sallakkhetvā upajjhāyassa vacanena dasabalaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0401a:848_8: vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbe vare yāci, satthā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:848_9: Puna thero mātuupāsikāya vacanena vanditvā “ayaṃ, bhante, upāsikāya tumhākaṃ vasanagandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:848_10: bhūmattharaṇatthaṃ kambalo pahito”ti kambalaṃ datvā uṭṭhāyāsanā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0401a:848_11: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana therassa pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:849_0: Iti thero satthu santikā aṭṭha vare labhitvā upajjhāyassa santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ
atk-s0401a:849_1: taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Punadivase mātuupāsikāya nivesanadvāraṃ gantvā bhikkhāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:849_2: Upāsikā “putto kira me dvāre ṭhito”ti sutvā vegena āgantvā abhivādetvā hatthato pattaṃ
atk-s0401a:849_3: gahetvā antonivesane nisīdāpetvā bhojanaṃ adāsi. Atha naṃ bhattakiccapariyosāne āha
atk-s0401a:849_4: – “diṭṭho te, tāta, dasabalo”ti? Āma upāsiketi. Vandito te mama vacanenāti? Āma vandito,
atk-s0401a:849_5: sopi ca me kambalo tathāgatassa vasanaṭṭhāne bhūmattharaṇaṃ katvā atthatoti. Kiṃ,
atk-s0401a:849_6: tāta, tayā kira satthu dhammakathā kathitā, satthārā ca te sādhukāro dinnoti? Tayā
atk-s0401a:849_7: kathaṃ ñātaṃ upāsiketi? Tāta, mayhaṃ gehe adhivatthā devatā dasabalena tuyhaṃ sādhukāraṃ
atk-s0401a:849_8: dinnadivase “sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷe devatā sādhukāraṃ adaṃsū”ti āha – tāta, tayā
atk-s0401a:849_9: kathitadhammakathaṃ buddhānaṃ kathitaniyāmeneva mayhampi kathetuṃ paccāsīsāmīti.
atk-s0401a:849_10: Thero mātu kathaṃ sampaṭicchi. Sā tassa adhivāsanaṃ viditvā dvāre maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0401a:849_11: dasabalassa kathitaniyāmeneva attano dhammakathaṃ kathāpesīti vatthu ettha samuṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0401a:849_12: Satthā aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:851_0: 207. Navame lābhīnaṃ yadidaṃ sīvalīti ṭhapetvā tathāgataṃ lābhīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīvalitthero
atk-s0401a:851_1: aggoti dasseti. Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi atīte padumuttarabuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:851_2: vuttanayeneva vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:851_3: bhikkhuṃ lābhīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0401a:851_4: dasabalaṃ nimantetvā purimanayeneva sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā “bhagavā ahampi iminā
atk-s0401a:851_5: adhikārakammena aññaṃ sampattiṃ na patthemi, anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane
atk-s0401a:851_6: ahampi tumhehi so etadagge ṭhapitabhikkhu viya lābhīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ
atk-s0401a:851_7: akāsi. Satthā anantarāyaṃ disvā “ayaṃ te patthanā anāgate gotamassa buddhassa sāsane
atk-s0401a:852_0: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassībuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:852_1: bandhumatīnagarato avidūre ekasmiṃ gāme paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tasmiṃ samaye bandhumatīnagaravāsino
atk-s0401a:852_2: raññā saddhiṃ sākacchitvā sākacchitvā dasabalassa dānaṃ denti. Te ekadivasaṃ sabbeva
atk-s0401a:852_3: ekato hutvā dānaṃ dentā “kiṃ nu kho amhākaṃ dānamukhe natthī”ti madhuñca guḷadadhiñca
atk-s0401a:852_4: na addasaṃsu. Te “yato kutoci āharissāmā”ti janapadato nagaraṃ pavisanamagge purisaṃ
atk-s0401a:852_5: ṭhapesuṃ. Tadā esa kulaputto attano gāmato guḷadadhivārakaṃ gahetvā “kiñcideva āharissāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:852_6: nagaraṃ gacchanto mukhaṃ dhovitvā “dhotahatthapādo pavisissāmī”ti phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:852_7: olokento naṅgalasīsamattaṃ nimmakkhikaṃ daṇḍakamadhuṃ disvā “puññena me idaṃ uppanna”nti
atk-s0401a:852_8: gahetvā nagaraṃ pavisati. Nāgarehi ṭhapitapuriso taṃ disvā, “bho purisa, kassimaṃ
atk-s0401a:852_9: āharasī”ti pucchi. Na kassaci sāmi, vikkiṇituṃ pana me idaṃ ānītanti. Tena hi, bho
atk-s0401a:852_10: purisa, imaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā etaṃ madhuñca guḷadadhiñca dehīti.
atk-s0401a:853_0: So cintesi – “idaṃ na bahumūlaṃ, ayañca ekappahāreneva bahuṃ deti, vīmaṃsituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:853_1: Tato naṃ “nāhaṃ ekakahāpaṇena demī”ti āha. Yadi evaṃ, dve gahetvā dehīti. Dvīhipi
atk-s0401a:853_2: na demīti. Etenupāyena vaḍḍhantaṃ vaḍḍhantaṃ sahassaṃ pāpuṇi. So cintesi – “atiañchituṃ
atk-s0401a:853_3: na vaṭṭati, hotu tāva, imassa kattabbakiccaṃ pucchissāmī”ti. Atha naṃ āha – “idaṃ
atk-s0401a:853_4: na bahuagghanakaṃ, tvañca bahuṃ desi, kena kammena idaṃ gaṇhāsī”ti? Idha, bho, nagaravāsino
atk-s0401a:853_5: raññā saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhitvā vipassīdasabalassa dānaṃ dentā idaṃ dvayaṃ dānamukhe
atk-s0401a:853_6: apassantā pariyesanti. Sace idaṃ dvayaṃ na labhissanti, nāgarānaṃ parājayo bhavissati.
atk-s0401a:853_7: Tasmā sahassaṃ datvā gaṇhāmīti. Kiṃ panetaṃ nāgarānameva vaṭṭati, na aññesaṃ dātuṃ
atk-s0401a:853_8: vaṭṭatīti? Yassa kassaci dātuṃ avāritametanti. Atthi pana te koci nāgarānaṃ dāne
atk-s0401a:853_9: ekadivasaṃ sahassaṃ dātāti? Natthi sammāti. Imesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ sahassagghanakabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:853_10: jānāsīti? Āma jānāmīti. Tena hi gaccha, nāgarānaṃ ācikkha – “eko puriso imāni dve
atk-s0401a:853_11: mūlena na deti, sahattheneva dātukāmo, tumhe imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kāraṇā nirussukkā hothā”ti.
atk-s0401a:853_12: Tvaṃ pana me imasmiṃ dānamukhe jeṭṭhakabhāvassa kāyasakkhī hohīti.
atk-s0401a:854_0: So gāmavāsī paribbayatthaṃ gahitamāsakena pañcakaṭukaṃ gahetvā cuṇṇaṃ katvā dadhito
atk-s0401a:854_1: kañjiyaṃ vāhetvā tattha madhupaṭalaṃ pīḷetvā pañcakaṭukacuṇṇena yojetvā ekasmiṃ paduminipatte
atk-s0401a:854_2: pakkhipitvā taṃ saṃvidahitvā ādāya dasabalassa avidūre ṭhāne nisīdi. Mahājanena āhariyamānassa
atk-s0401a:854_3: sakkārassa antare attano pattavāraṃ olokayamāno okāsaṃ ñatvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:854_4: “bhagavā ayaṃ mayhaṃ duggatapaṇṇākāro, imaṃ me anukampaṃ paṭicca gaṇhathā”ti. Satthā
atk-s0401a:854_5: tassa anukampaṃ paṭicca catumahārājadattiyena selamayena pattena taṃ paṭiggahetvā
atk-s0401a:854_6: yathā aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassassa diyyamānaṃ na khīyati, evaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi. Sopi
atk-s0401a:854_7: kulaputto niṭṭhitabhattakiccaṃ bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito āha – “diṭṭho
atk-s0401a:854_8: me bhagavā ajja bandhumatīnagaravāsikehi tumhākaṃ sakkāro āhariyamāno, ahampi imassa
atk-s0401a:854_9: kammassa nissandena nibbattanibbattabhave lābhaggayasaggappatto bhaveyya”nti. Satthā
atk-s0401a:854_10: “evaṃ hotu kulaputtā”ti vatvā tassa ca nagaravāsīnañca bhattānumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:855_0: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0401a:855_1: suppavāsāya rājadhītāya kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:855_2: sāyaṃ pātañca paṇṇākārasatāni pāpuṇanti, suppavāsā sampattiṃ gacchati. Atha naṃ puññavīmaṃsanatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:855_3: hatthena bījapacchiṃ phusāpenti, ekekabījato salākasatampi salākasahassampi nigacchati.
atk-s0401a:855_4: Ekakarīsakhettato paññāsampi saṭṭhipi sakaṭāni uppajjanti. Koṭṭhapūraṇakālepi koṭṭhadvāraṃ
atk-s0401a:855_5: hatthena phusāpenti, rājadhītāya puññena gaṇhantānaṃ gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ puna pūrati.
atk-s0401a:855_6: Paripuṇṇabhattakumbhitopi “rājadhītāya puñña”nti vatvā yassa kassaci dentānaṃ yāva
atk-s0401a:855_7: na ukkaḍḍhanti, na tāva bhattaṃ khīyati. Dārake kucchigateyeva satta vassāni atikkamiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:856_0: Gabbhe pana paripakke sattāhaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhosi. Sā sāmikaṃ āmantetvā “pure maraṇā
atk-s0401a:856_1: jīvamānāva dānaṃ dassāmī”ti satthu santikaṃ pesesi – “gaccha imaṃ pavattiṃ satthu
atk-s0401a:856_2: ārocetvā satthāraṃ nimantehi, yañca satthā vadeti, taṃ sādhukaṃ upalakkhetvā āgantvā
atk-s0401a:856_3: mayhaṃ kathehī”ti. So gantvā tassā sāsanaṃ bhagavato ārocesi. Satthā “sukhinī hotu
atk-s0401a:856_4: suppavāsā koliyadhītā, sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti āha. Rājā taṃ sutvā
atk-s0401a:856_5: bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā antogāmābhimukho pāyāsi. Tassa pure āgamanāyeva suppavāsāya
atk-s0401a:856_6: kucchito dhamakaraṇā udakaṃ viya gabbho nikkhami, parivāretvā nisinnajano assumukhova
atk-s0401a:856_7: hasituṃ āraddho. Haṭṭhatuṭṭho mahājano rañño puttasāsanaṃ ārocetuṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:857_0: Rājā tesaṃ iṅgitaṃ disvāva “dasabalena kathitakathā nipphannā maññe”ti cintesi. So
atk-s0401a:857_1: āgantvā satthu sāsanaṃ rājadhītāya ārocesi. Rājadhītā “tayā nimantitaṃ jīvitabhattameva
atk-s0401a:857_2: maṅgalabhattaṃ bhavissati, gaccha sattāhaṃ dasabalaṃ nimantehī”ti. Rājā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0401a:857_3: Sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ pavattayiṃsu. Dārako sabbesaṃ
atk-s0401a:857_4: ñātīnaṃ santattacittaṃ nibbāpento jātoti sīvalidārakotvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So satta
atk-s0401a:857_5: vassāni gabbhe vasitattā jātakālato paṭṭhāya sabbakammakkhamo ahosi. Dhammasenāpati
atk-s0401a:857_6: sāriputto sattame divase tena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpaṃ akāsi. Satthāpi dhammapade gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0401a:861_0: Atha naṃ thero evamāha – “kiṃ pana tayā evarūpaṃ dukkharāsiṃ anubhavitvā pabbajituṃ
atk-s0401a:861_1: na vaṭṭatī”ti? Labhamāno pabbajeyyaṃ, bhanteti. Suppavāsā taṃ dārakaṃ therena saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:861_2: kathentaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho me putto dhammasenāpatinā saddhiṃ kathetī”ti theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0401a:861_3: pucchi – “mayhaṃ putto tumhehi saddhiṃ kiṃ katheti, bhadante”ti? Attanā anubhūtaṃ
atk-s0401a:861_4: gabbhavāsadukkhaṃ kathetvā tumhehi anuññāto pabbajissāmīti vadatīti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0401a:861_5: pabbājetha nanti. Thero taṃ vihāraṃ netvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājento,
atk-s0401a:861_6: “sīvali, na tuyhaṃ aññena ovādena kammaṃ atthi, tayā satta vassāni anubhūtadukkhameva
atk-s0401a:861_7: paccavekkhāhī”ti. Bhante, pabbājanameva tumhākaṃ bhāro, yaṃ pana mayā kātuṃ sakkā,
atk-s0401a:861_8: tamahaṃ jānissāmīti. So paṭhamakesavaṭṭiyā ohāritakkhaṇeyeva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0401a:861_9: dutiyāya ohāritakkhaṇe sakadāgāmiphale, tatiyāya anāgāmiphale. Sabbesaṃyeva pana
atk-s0401a:861_10: kesānaṃ oropanañca arahattasacchikiriyā ca apacchā apurimā ahosi. Tassa pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0401a:861_11: paṭṭhāya bhikkhusaṅghassa cattāro paccayā yadicchakaṃ uppajjanti. Evaṃ ettha vatthu samuṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0401a:862_0: Aparabhāge satthā sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Thero satthāraṃ abhivādetvā, “bhante, mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:862_1: puññaṃ vīmaṃsissāmi, pañca me bhikkhusatāni dethā”ti āha. Gaṇha, sīvalīti. So pañcasate
atk-s0401a:862_2: bhikkhū gahetvā himavantābhimukhaṃ gacchanto aṭavimaggaṃ gacchati. Tassa paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0401a:862_3: diṭṭhā nigrodhe adhivatthā devatā satta divasāni dānaṃ adāsi. Iti so –
atk-s0401a:867_0: Sabbaṭṭhānesu satta satta divasāneva dānaṃ adaṃsu. Gandhamādanapabbate pana nāgadattadevarājā
atk-s0401a:867_1: nāma sattadivasesu ekadivasaṃ khīrapiṇḍapātaṃ adāsi, ekadivasaṃ sappipiṇḍapātaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:867_2: Bhikkhusaṅgho āha – “āvuso, imassa devarañño neva dhenuyo duyhamānā paññāyanti, na
atk-s0401a:867_3: dadhinimmathanaṃ, kuto te, devarāja, imaṃ uppajjatī”ti? “Bhante, kassapadasabalassa
atk-s0401a:867_4: kāle khīrasalākabhattadānassetaṃ phala”nti devarājā āha. Aparabhāge satthā khadiravaniyarevatassa
atk-s0401a:867_5: paccuggamanaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ attano sāsane lābhaggayasaggappattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:869_0: 208. Dasame saddhādhimuttānanti saddhāya adhimuttānaṃ, balavasaddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:869_1: vakkalitthero aggoti dasseti. Aññesaṃ hi saddhā vaḍḍhetabbā hoti, therassa pana hāpetabbā
atk-s0401a:869_2: jātā. Tasmā so saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggoti vutto. Vakkalīti panassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0401a:870_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi atīte padumuttarabuddhakāle vuttanayeneva
atk-s0401a:870_1: vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saddhādhimuttānaṃ
atk-s0401a:870_2: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttanayeneva
atk-s0401a:870_3: satthāraṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā, “bhante, ahampi
atk-s0401a:870_4: iminā adhikārakammena tumhehi saddhādhimuttānaṃ etadagge ṭhapitabhikkhu viya anāgate
atk-s0401a:870_5: ekassa buddhassa sāsane saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthā
atk-s0401a:871_0: Sopi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ satthukāle sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:871_1: brāhmaṇakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, vakkalītissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vuddhippatto tayo vede
atk-s0401a:871_2: uggaṇhitvā dasabalaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ carantaṃ disvā satthu sarīrasampattiṃ
atk-s0401a:871_3: olokento sarīrasampattidassanena atitto dasabalena saddhiṃyeva vicarati. Vihāraṃ
atk-s0401a:871_4: gacchantena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā sarīranipphattiṃ olokentova tiṭṭhati. Dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:871_5: nisīditvā dhammaṃ kathentassa sammukhaṭṭhāne ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇāti. So saddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā
atk-s0401a:871_6: “agāramajjhe vasanto nibaddhaṃ dasabalassa dassanaṃ na labhissāmī”ti pabbajjaṃ yācitvā
atk-s0401a:872_0: Tato paṭṭhāya ṭhapetvā āhārakaraṇavelaṃ avasesakāle yattha ṭhitena sakkā dasabalaṃ
atk-s0401a:872_1: passituṃ, tattha ṭhito yonisomanasikāraṃ pahāya dasabalaṃ olokentova viharati. Satthā
atk-s0401a:872_2: tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamento dīghampi addhānaṃ tasmiṃ rūpadassanavaseneva vicarante
atk-s0401a:872_3: kiñci avatvā “idānissa ñāṇaṃ paripākagataṃ, sakkā etaṃ bodhetu”nti ñatvā evamāha
atk-s0401a:872_4: – “kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati,
atk-s0401a:872_5: so maṃ passati. Yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ passati. Dhammañhi, vakkali, passanto
atk-s0401a:872_6: maṃ passati, maṃ passanto dhammaṃ passatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:873_0: Satthari evaṃ ovadantepi thero dasabalassa dassanaṃ pahāya neva aññattha gantuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0401a:873_1: Tato satthā “nāyaṃ bhikkhu saṃvegaṃ alabhitvā bujjhissatī”ti upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya
atk-s0401a:873_2: rājagahaṃ gantvā vassūpanāyikadivase “apehi, vakkalī”ti theraṃ paṇāmeti. Buddhā ca
atk-s0401a:873_3: nāma ādeyyavacanā honti, tasmā thero satthāraṃ paṭippharitvā ṭhātuṃ asakkonto temāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:873_4: dasabalassa sammukhe āgantuṃ avisahanto “kiṃ dāni sakkā kātuṃ, tathāgatenamhi paṇāmito,
atk-s0401a:873_5: sammukhībhāvaṃ na labhāmi, kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitenā”ti gijjhakūṭapabbate papātaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:873_6: abhiruhi. Satthā tassa kilamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ bhikkhu mama santikā assāsaṃ alabhanto
atk-s0401a:873_7: maggaphalānaṃ upanissayaṃ nāseyyā”ti attānaṃ dassetuṃ obhāsaṃ vissajjesi. Athassa
atk-s0401a:873_8: satthu diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya eva mahantaṃ sokasallaṃ pahīnaṃ. Satthā sukkhataḷāke
atk-s0401a:873_9: oghaṃ āharanto viya vakkalittherassa balavapītisomanassaṃ uppādetuṃ dhammapade imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:876_0: Vakkalittherassa ca “ehi, vakkalī”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. Thero “dasabalo me diṭṭho,
atk-s0401a:876_1: ehīti avhāyanampi laddha”nti balavapītiṃ uppādetvā “kuto gacchāmī”ti attano gamanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:876_2: ajānitvāva dasabalassa sammukhe ākāse pakkhanditvā paṭhamapādena pabbate ṭhitoyeva
atk-s0401a:876_3: satthārā vuttagāthaṃ āvajjento ākāseyeva pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0401a:876_4: arahattaṃ patvā tathāgataṃ vandamānova otari. Aparabhāge satthā ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno
atk-s0401a:880_0: 209. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame sikkhākāmānanti tisso sikkhā kāmayamānānaṃ sampiyāyitvā
atk-s0401a:880_1: sikkhantānanti attho. Rāhuloti attano puttaṃ rāhulattheraṃ dasseti. Thero kira pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0401a:880_2: paṭṭhāya pātova uṭṭhahanto hatthapūraṃ vālikaṃ ukkhipitvā “aho vatāhaṃ ajja dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:880_3: ceva ācariyupajjhāyānañca santikā ettakaṃ ovādañceva anusāsaniñca labheyya”nti pattheti.
atk-s0401a:881_0: 210. Dutiye saddhāpabbajitānanti saddhāya pabbajitānaṃ. Raṭṭhapāloti raṭṭhaṃ pāletuṃ
atk-s0401a:881_1: samattho, bhinnaṃ vā raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthe kule jātotipi raṭṭhapāloti saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0401a:881_2: gato. So hi satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho cuddasabhattacchede katvā
atk-s0401a:881_3: mātāpitaro pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā pabbajito. Tasmā saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:883_0: Imesaṃ pana ubhinnampi therānaṃ pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ete kira dvepi atīte
atk-s0401a:883_1: padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattiṃsu. Tesaṃ daharakāle
atk-s0401a:883_2: nāmaṃ vā gottaṃ vā na kathiyati. Vayappattā pana gharāvāse patiṭṭhāya attano attano
atk-s0401a:883_3: pitu accayena ubhopi attano attano ratanakoṭṭhāgārakammike pakkosāpetvā aparimāṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:883_4: dhanaṃ disvā – “imaṃ ettakaṃ dhanarāsiṃ ayyakapayyakādayo attanā saddhiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0401a:883_5: gantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, amhehi dāni yena kenaci upāyena imaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0401a:883_6: te ubhopi janā catūsu ṭhānesu kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ dātuṃ āraddhā. Eko attano
atk-s0401a:883_7: dānagge āgatāgatajanaṃ pucchitvā yāgukhajjakādīsu yassa yaṃ paṭibhāti, tassa taṃ
atk-s0401a:883_8: adāsi, tassa teneva kāraṇena āgatapākoti nāmaṃ jātaṃ. Itaro apucchitvāva gahitagahitabhājanaṃ
atk-s0401a:883_9: pūretvā pūretvā deti, tassapi teneva kāraṇena anaggapākoti nāmaṃ jātaṃ, appamāṇapākoti attho.
atk-s0401a:884_0: Te ubhopi ekadivasaṃ pātova mukhadhovanatthaṃ bahigāmaṃ agamaṃsu. Tasmiṃ samaye himavantato
atk-s0401a:884_1: dve mahiddhikā tāpasā bhikkhācāratthāya ākāsena āgantvā tesaṃ sahāyakānaṃ avidūre
atk-s0401a:884_2: otaritvā “mā no ete passiṃsū”ti ekapasse aṭṭhaṃsu. Te ubhopi janā tesaṃ lābubhājanādiparikkhāraṃ
atk-s0401a:884_3: saṃvidhāya antogāmaṃ sandhāya bhikkhāya gatānaṃ santikaṃ āgamma vandiṃsu. Atha ne
atk-s0401a:884_4: tāpasā “kāya velāya āgatattha mahāpuññā”ti āhaṃsu. Te “adhunāva, bhante”ti vatvā
atk-s0401a:884_5: tesaṃ hatthato lābubhājanaṃ gahetvā attano attano gehaṃ netvā bhattakiccapariyosāne
atk-s0401a:885_0: Tesu eko tāpaso sapariḷāhakāyadhātuko hoti. So attano ānubhāvena mahāsamuddaudakaṃ
atk-s0401a:885_1: dvedhā katvā pathavindharanāgarājassa bhavanaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ nisīdati. So utusappāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:885_2: gahetvā paccāgantvā attano upaṭṭhākassa gehe bhattānumodanaṃ karonto “pathavindharanāgabhavanaṃ
atk-s0401a:885_3: viya hotū”ti vadati. Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ upaṭṭhāko pucchi – “bhante, tumhe anumodanaṃ
atk-s0401a:885_4: karontā ‘pathavindharanāgabhavanaṃ viya hotū’ti vadatha, mayamassa atthaṃ na jānāma,
atk-s0401a:885_5: kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti idaṃ, bhante”ti? Āma, kuṭumbiya ahaṃ “tumhākaṃ sampatti pathavindharanāgarājasampattisadisā
atk-s0401a:885_6: hotū”ti vadāmīti. Kuṭumbiko tato paṭṭhāya pathavindharanāgarājabhavane cittaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:886_0: Itaro tāpaso tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā suññe serisakavimāne divāvihāraṃ karoti. So
atk-s0401a:886_1: āgacchanto gacchanto ca sakkassa devarājassa sampattiṃ disvā attano upaṭṭhākassa
atk-s0401a:886_2: anumodanaṃ karonto “sakkavimānaṃ viya hotū”ti vadati. Atha naṃ sopi kuṭumbiyo itaro
atk-s0401a:886_3: sahāyako taṃ tāpasaṃ viya pucchi. So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sakkabhavane cittaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:887_0: Pathavindharabhavane nibbatto pathavindharanāgarājā nāma jāto. So nibbattakkhaṇe
atk-s0401a:887_1: attano attabhāvaṃ disvā “amanāpassa vata me ṭhānassa kulupakatāpaso vaṇṇaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0401a:887_2: urena parisakkitvā vicaraṇaṭṭhānametaṃ, nūna so aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ na jānātī”ti vippaṭisārī
atk-s0401a:887_3: ahosi. Athassa taṃkhaṇeyeva alaṅkatapaṭiyattāni nāganāṭakāni sabbadisāsu tūriyāni
atk-s0401a:887_4: paggaṇhiṃsu. So tasmiṃyeva khaṇe taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇī ahosi. Anvaddhamāsañca
atk-s0401a:887_5: cattāro mahārājāno sakkassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti. Tasmā sopi virūpakkhena nāgaraññā
atk-s0401a:887_6: saddhiṃ sakkassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gato. Sakko taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā sañjāni. Atha
atk-s0401a:887_7: naṃ samīpe āgantvā ṭhitakāle “kahaṃ nibbattosi sammā”ti pucchi. Mā kathesi, mahārāja,
atk-s0401a:887_8: urena parisakkanaṭṭhāne nibbattomhi, tumhe pana kalyāṇamittaṃ labhitthāti. Samma,
atk-s0401a:887_9: tvaṃ “aṭṭhāne nibbattomhī”ti mā vitakkayi, padumuttaradasabalo loke nibbatto, tassa
atk-s0401a:887_10: adhikārakammaṃ katvā imaṃyeva ṭhānaṃ patthehi, ubho sukhaṃ vasissāmāti. So “evaṃ,
atk-s0401a:887_11: deva, karissāmī”ti gantvā padumuttaradasabalaṃ nimantetvā attano nāgabhavane nāgaparisāya
atk-s0401a:888_0: Satthā punadivase uṭṭhite aruṇe attano upaṭṭhākaṃ sumanattheraṃ āmantesi – “sumana,
atk-s0401a:888_1: ajja tathāgato dūraṃ bhikkhācāraṃ gamissati, mā puthujjanabhikkhū āgacchantu, tepiṭakā
atk-s0401a:888_2: paṭisambhidāppattā chaḷabhiññāva āgacchantū”ti. Thero satthu vacanaṃ sutvā sabbesaṃ
atk-s0401a:888_3: ārocesi. Satthārā saddhiṃ satasahassā bhikkhū ākāsaṃ pakkhandiṃsu. Pathavindharo
atk-s0401a:888_4: nāgaparisāya saddhiṃ dasabalassa paccuggamanaṃ āgato satthāraṃ parivāretvā samuddamatthake
atk-s0401a:888_5: maṇivaṇṇā ūmiyo maddamānaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ oloketvā ādito satthāraṃ, pariyosāne saṅghanavakaṃ
atk-s0401a:888_6: tathāgatassa puttaṃ uparevatasāmaṇeraṃ nāma olokento “anacchariyo sesasāvakānaṃ evarūpo
atk-s0401a:888_7: iddhānubhāvo, imassa pana taruṇabāladārakassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo ativiya acchariyo”ti
atk-s0401a:889_0: Athassa bhavane dasabale nisinne sesabhikkhūsu koṭito paṭṭhāya nisīdantesu satthu
atk-s0401a:889_1: sammukhaṭṭhāneyeva uparevatasāmaṇerassa āsanaṃ pāpuṇi. Nāgarājā yāguṃ dentopi khajjakaṃ
atk-s0401a:889_2: dentopi sakiṃ dasabalaṃ oloketi, sakiṃ uparevatasāmaṇeraṃ. Tassa kira sarīre satthu
atk-s0401a:889_3: sarīre viya dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni paññāyanti. Tato nāgarājā “ayaṃ sāmaṇero
atk-s0401a:889_4: buddhānaṃ sadiso paññāyati, kiṃ nu kho hotī”ti avidūre nisinnaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0401a:889_5: pucchi – “ayaṃ, bhante, sāmaṇero dasabalassa kiṃ hotī”ti? Putto, mahārājāti. So cintesi
atk-s0401a:889_6: – “mahā vatāyaṃ bhikkhu, evarūpassa sobhaggappattassa tathāgatassa puttabhāvaṃ labhi.
atk-s0401a:889_7: Sarīrampissa ekadesena buddhānaṃ sarīrasadisaṃ paññāyati, mayāpi anāgate evarūpena
atk-s0401a:889_8: bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā, “bhante, ahaṃ imassa adhikārakammassānubhāvena
atk-s0401a:889_9: ayaṃ uparevato viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa putto bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:889_10: Satthā anantarāyaṃ disvā “anāgate gotamabuddhassa putto bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:890_0: Pathavindharopi puna addhamāse sampatte virūpakkhena saddhiṃ sakkassa upaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:890_1: gato. Atha naṃ samīpe ṭhitaṃ sakko pucchi – “patthito te, samma, ayaṃ devaloko”ti?
atk-s0401a:890_2: Na patthito mahārājāti. Kiṃ dosaṃ addasāti? Doso natthi, mahārāja, ahaṃ pana dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:890_3: puttaṃ uparevatasāmaṇeraṃ passiṃ. Tassa me diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya aññattha cittaṃ
atk-s0401a:890_4: na nami, svāhaṃ “anāgate ekassa buddhassa evarūpo putto bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsiṃ.
atk-s0401a:890_5: Tvampi, mahārāja, ekaṃ patthanaṃ karohi, te mayaṃ nibbattaṭṭhāne na vinā bhavissāmāti.
atk-s0401a:890_6: Sakko tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ekaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā “katarakulā nu
atk-s0401a:890_7: kho nikkhamitvā ayaṃ kulaputto pabbajito”ti āvajjento “ayaṃ bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ
atk-s0401a:890_8: samatthassa kulassa putto hutvā cuddasa bhattacchede katvā mātāpitaro pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā
atk-s0401a:890_9: pabbajito”ti aññāsi. Ñatvā ca pana ajānanto viya dasabalaṃ pucchitvā sattāhaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ
atk-s0401a:890_10: katvā, “bhante, ahaṃ imassa kalyāṇakammassa nissandena tumhākaṃ sāsane ayaṃ kulaputto
atk-s0401a:890_11: viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ
atk-s0401a:890_12: akāsi. Satthā anantarāyaṃ disvā “tvaṃ, mahārāja, anāgate gotamassa buddhassa sāsane
atk-s0401a:890_13: saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi. Sakkopi attano devapurameva gato.
atk-s0401a:891_0: Te ubhopi nibbattaṭṭhānato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsarantā anekasahassakappe atikkamiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:891_1: Ito pana dvānavutikappamatthake phusso nāma buddho loke udapādi. Tassa pitā mahindo
atk-s0401a:891_2: nāma rājā ahosi, vemātikā tayo kaniṭṭhabhātaro. Rājā divase divase “mayhaṃyeva buddho
atk-s0401a:891_3: mayhaṃ dhammo mayhaṃ saṅgho”ti mamāyanto sayameva dasabalaṃ nibaddhaṃ bhojanaṃ bhojeti.
atk-s0401a:892_0: Athassa ekadivasaṃ paccanto kupito. So putte āmantesi – “tātā, paccanto kupito, tumhehi
atk-s0401a:892_1: vā mayā vā gantabbaṃ. Yadi ahaṃ gacchāmi, tumhehi iminā niyāmena dasabalo paricaritabbo”ti.
atk-s0401a:892_2: Te tayopi ekappahāreneva āhaṃsu – “tāta, tumhākaṃ gamanakiccaṃ natthi, mayaṃ core
atk-s0401a:892_3: vidhamissāmā”ti pitaraṃ vanditvā paccantaṃ gantvā core vidhamitvā vijitasaṅgāmā hutvā
atk-s0401a:892_4: nivattiṃsu. Te antarāmagge pādamūlikehi saddhiṃ mantayiṃsu – “tātā, amhākaṃ gatakkhaṇeyeva
atk-s0401a:892_5: pitā varaṃ dassati, kataraṃ varaṃ gaṇhāmā”ti? Ayyā, tumhākaṃ pitu accayena dullabhaṃ
atk-s0401a:892_6: nāma natthi, tumhākaṃ pana jeṭṭhabhātikaṃ phussabuddhaṃ paṭijagganavaraṃ gaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0401a:892_7: āhaṃsu. Te “kalyāṇaṃ tumhehi vutta”nti sabbepi ekacittā hutvā gantvā pitaraṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:892_8: Tadā pitā tesaṃ pasīditvā varaṃ adāsi. Te “temāsaṃ tathāgataṃ paṭijaggissāmā”ti varaṃ
atk-s0401a:892_9: yāciṃsu. Rājā “ayaṃ dātuṃ na sakkā, aññaṃ varaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha. Tāta, amhākaṃ aññena
atk-s0401a:892_10: varena kiccaṃ natthi, sace tumhe dātukāmā, etaṃyeva no varaṃ dethāti. Rājā tesu punappunaṃ
atk-s0401a:892_11: kathentesu attanā paṭiññātattā “na sakkā na dātu”nti cintetvā āha – “tātā, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:892_12: varaṃ demi, apica kho pana buddhā nāma durāsadā honti sīhā viya ekacarā, dasabalaṃ
atk-s0401a:893_0: Te cintayiṃsu – “amhehi tathāgataṃ paṭijaggantehi anucchavikaṃ katvā paṭijaggituṃ
atk-s0401a:893_1: vaṭṭatī”ti sabbepi ekacittā hutvā dasasīlāni samādāya nirāmagandhā hutvā satthu dānaggaparivahanake
atk-s0401a:893_2: tayo purise ṭhapayiṃsu. Tesu eko dhanadhaññuppādako ahosi, eko māpako, eko dānasaṃvidhāyako.
atk-s0401a:893_3: Tesu dhanadhaññuppādako paccuppanne bimbisāro mahārājā jāto, māpako visākho upāsako,
atk-s0401a:893_4: dānasaṃvidhāyako raṭṭhapālattheroti. So tattha yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devapure nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:893_5: Ayaṃ pana rāhulatthero nāma kassapadasabalassa kāle kikissa kāsirañño jeṭṭhaputto
atk-s0401a:893_6: hutvā nibbatti, pathavindharakumārotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Tassa satta bhaginiyo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:893_7: Tā dasabalassa satta pariveṇāni kārayiṃsu. Pathavindharo oparajjaṃ labhi. So tā bhaginiyo
atk-s0401a:893_8: āha – “tumhehi kāritapariveṇesu mayhampi ekaṃ dethā”ti. Bhātika, tumhe uparājaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:893_9: ṭhitā, tumhehi nāma amhākaṃ dātabbaṃ, tumhe aññaṃ pariveṇaṃ karothāti. So tāsaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0401a:893_10: sutvā pañca vihārasatāni kāresi. Pañca pariveṇasatānītipi vadanti. So tattha yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0401a:893_11: kusalaṃ katvā devapure nibbatti. Imasmiṃ pana buddhuppāde pathavindharakumāro amhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:893_12: bodhisattassa aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, tassa sahāyako kururaṭṭhe
atk-s0401a:894_0: Atha amhākaṃ dasabalo abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena kapilavatthuṃ
atk-s0401a:894_1: āgantvā rāhulakumāraṃ pabbājesi. Tassa pabbajjāvidhānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva. Evaṃ pabbajitassa
atk-s0401a:894_2: panassa satthā abhiṇhaovādavasena rāhulovādasuttaṃ abhāsi. Rāhulopi pātova vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:894_3: hatthena vālukaṃ ukkhipitvā “dasabalassa ceva ācariyupajjhāyānañca santikā ajja ettakaṃ
atk-s0401a:894_4: ovādaṃ labheyya”nti vadati. Bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe kathā udapādi “ovādakkhamo vata rāhulasāmaṇero
atk-s0401a:894_5: pitu anucchaviko putto”ti. Satthā bhikkhūnaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā “mayi gate ekā dhammadesanā
atk-s0401a:894_6: ca vaḍḍhissati, rāhulassa ca guṇo pākaṭo bhavissatī”ti gantvā dhammasabhāyaṃ buddhāsāne
atk-s0401a:894_7: nisinno bhikkhū āmantesi – “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti.
atk-s0401a:894_8: Rāhulasāmaṇerassa ovādakkhamabhāvaṃ kathema bhagavāti. Satthā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā
atk-s0401a:899_0: Athassa sattavassikasāmaṇerakāle “mā heva kho rāhulo daharabhāvena kīḷanatthāyapi
atk-s0401a:899_2: tathāgatassa pacchato piṇḍāya pavisantassa satthu ceva attano ca rūpasampattiṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:899_3: gehasitaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakkentassa “yaṃkiñci, rāhula, rūpa”ntiādinā nayena mahārāhulovādasuttantaṃ
atk-s0401a:899_4: kathesi. Saṃyuttake pana rāhulovādopi aṅguttare rāhulovādopi therassa vipassanācāroyeva.
atk-s0401a:899_5: Athassa satthā ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā avassikabhikkhukāle andhavane nisinno cūḷarāhulovādaṃ
atk-s0401a:899_6: kathesi. Desanāpariyosāne rāhulatthero koṭisatasahassadevatāhi saddhiṃ arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:899_7: pāpuṇi, sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmidevatānaṃ gaṇanā natthi. Atha satthā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:899_8: ariyasaṅghamajjhe nisinno theraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane sikkhākāmānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:900_0: Satthari pana kururaṭṭhe cārikāya nikkhamitvā thullakoṭṭhitaṃ anuppatte raṭṭhapālo
