atk-s0401a:900_1: kulaputto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā dasabalaṃ
atk-s0401a:900_2: upasaṅkamitvā satthu āṇattiyā aññatarassa therassa santike pabbaji. Tassa pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0401a:900_3: paṭṭhāya seṭṭhigahapati bhikkhū attano nivesanadvārena gacchante disvā “kiṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:900_4: imasmiṃ gehe kammaṃ, ekova puttako ahosi, taṃ gaṇhitvā gatattha, idāni kiṃ karissathā”ti
atk-s0401a:900_5: akkosati paribhāsati. Satthā addhamāsaṃ thullakoṭṭhite vasitvā puna sāvatthimeva
atk-s0401a:900_6: agamāsi. Tatthāyasmā raṭṭhapālo yoniso manasikaronto kammaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0401a:900_7: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. So satthāraṃ anujānāpetvā mātāpitaro dassanatthaṃ thullakoṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0401a:900_8: gantvā tattha sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caranto pitu nivesane ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0401a:900_9: taṃ amataṃ viya paribhuñjanto pitarā nimantito adhivāsetvā dutiyadivase pitu nivesane
atk-s0401a:900_10: piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatte itthijane asubhasaññaṃ uppādetvā ṭhitakova
atk-s0401a:900_11: dhammaṃ desetvā jiyā mutto viya nārāco ākāsaṃ uppatitvā korabyarañño migacīraṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:900_12: maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe nisinno dassanatthāya āgatassa rañño catupārijuññapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:900_13: desetvā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno puna satthu santikaṃyeva āgato. Evametaṃ vatthu
atk-s0401a:900_14: samuṭṭhitaṃ. Atha satthā aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane
atk-s0401a:902_0: 211. Tatiye paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānanti sabbapaṭhamaṃ salākagāhakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:902_1: kuṇḍadhānatthero aggoti dasseti. So kira thero mahāsubhaddāya nimantitadivase tathāgate
atk-s0401a:902_2: ugganagaraṃ gacchante “ajja satthā dūraṃ bhikkhācāraṃ gamissati, puthujjanā salākaṃ
atk-s0401a:902_3: mā gaṇhantu, pañcasatā khīṇāsavāva gaṇhantū”ti vutte paṭhamameva sīhanādaṃ naditvā
atk-s0401a:902_4: salākaṃ gaṇhi. Cūḷasubhaddāya nimantitadivase tathāgate sāketaṃ gacchantepi pañcannaṃ
atk-s0401a:902_5: bhikkhusatānaṃ antare paṭhamameva salākaṃ gaṇhi, sunāparantajanapadaṃ gacchantepi.
atk-s0401a:902_6: Imehi kāraṇehi thero paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggo nāma jāto. Kuṇḍadhānoti panassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0401a:903_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:903_1: kulagehe nibbatto vuttanayeneva vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0401a:903_2: paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā buddhānaṃ adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:903_3: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā satthārā anantarāyaṃ disvā byākato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ
atk-s0401a:903_4: katvā devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto kassapabuddhakāle bhūmaṭṭhakadevatā hutvā
atk-s0401a:903_5: nibbatti. Dīghāyukabuddhānañca nāma na anvaddhamāsiko uposatho hoti. Vipassīdasabalassa
atk-s0401a:903_6: hi chabbassantare chabbassantare uposatho ahosi, kassapadasabalo pana chaṭṭhe chaṭṭhe
atk-s0401a:903_7: māse pātimokkhaṃ osāresi. Tassa pātimokkhaṃ osāraṇakāle disāvāsikā dve sahāyakā bhikkhū
atk-s0401a:903_8: “uposathaṃ karissāmā”ti gacchanti. Ayaṃ bhummadevatā cintesi – “imesaṃ dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:903_9: metti ativiya daḷhā, kiṃ nu kho bhedake sati bhijjeyya, na bhijjeyyā”ti? Tesaṃ okāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:904_0: Atheko thero ekassa hatthe pattacīvaraṃ datvā sarīravaḷañjanatthaṃ udakaphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:904_1: gantvā dhotahatthapādo hutvā gumbasabhāgato nikkhamati. Bhummadevatā tassa therassa
atk-s0401a:904_2: pacchato pacchato uttamarūpā itthī hutvā kese vidhunitvā saṃvidhāya bandhantī viya
atk-s0401a:904_3: piṭṭhito paṃsuṃ puñchamānā viya sāṭakaṃ saṃvidhāya nivāsayamānā viya ca hutvā therassa
atk-s0401a:904_4: padānupadikā hutvā gumbato nikkhantā. Ekamante ṭhito sahāyakatthero imaṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:904_5: disvā domanassajāto “naṭṭho dāni me iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dīgharattānugato sineho.
atk-s0401a:904_6: Sacāhaṃ evaṃvidhabhāvaṃ jāneyyaṃ, ettakaṃ addhānaṃ iminā saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ na kareyya”nti
atk-s0401a:904_7: cintetvā āgacchantassevassa “handāvuso, tuyhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ, tādisena pāpena sahāyena
atk-s0401a:904_8: saddhiṃ ekamaggaṃ na gacchāmī”ti āha. Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā tassa lajjibhikkhuno hadayaṃ
atk-s0401a:904_9: tikhiṇasattiṃ gahetvā viddhaṃ viya ahosi. Tato naṃ āha – “āvuso, kiṃ nāmetaṃ vadasi,
atk-s0401a:904_10: ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dukkaṭamattampi āpattiṃ na jānāmi. Tvaṃ pana maṃ ajja ‘pāpo’ti
atk-s0401a:904_11: vadasi, kiṃ te diṭṭha”nti? Kiṃ aññena diṭṭhena, kiṃ tvaṃ evaṃvidhena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena
atk-s0401a:904_12: mātugāmena saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne hutvā nikkhantoti? Natthetaṃ, āvuso, mayhaṃ, nāhaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-s0401a:904_13: mātugāmaṃ passāmīti. Tassa yāvatatiyaṃ kathentassāpi itaro thero kathaṃ asaddahitvā
atk-s0401a:904_14: attanā diṭṭhakāraṇaṃyeva atthaṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃ ekamaggena agantvā aññena maggena
atk-s0401a:904_15: satthu santikaṃ gato. Itaropi aññena maggena satthu santikaṃyeva gato.
atk-s0401a:905_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa uposathāgāraṃ pavisanavelāya so bhikkhu taṃ bhikkhuṃ uposathagge
atk-s0401a:905_1: sañjānitvā “imasmiṃ uposathagge evarūpo nāma pāpabhikkhu atthi, nāhaṃ tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:905_2: uposathaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi. Bhummadevatā “bhāriyaṃ mayā kammaṃ
atk-s0401a:905_3: kata”nti mahallakaupāsakavaṇṇena tassa santikaṃ gantvā “kasmā, bhante, ayyo imasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:905_4: ṭhāne ṭhito”ti āha. Upāsaka, imaṃ uposathaggaṃ eko pāpabhikkhu paviṭṭho, ahaṃ tena
atk-s0401a:905_5: saddhiṃ uposathaṃ na karomīti vatvā nikkhamitvā bahi ṭhitomhīti. Bhante, mā evaṃ
atk-s0401a:905_6: gaṇhatha, parisuddhasīlo esa bhikkhu. Tumhehi diṭṭhamātugāmo nāma ahaṃ, mayā tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:905_7: vīmaṃsanatthāya “daḷhā nu kho imesaṃ therānaṃ metti, no daḷhā”ti lajjialajjibhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:905_8: olokentena taṃ kammaṃ katanti. Ko pana tvaṃ sappurisāti? Ahaṃ ekā bhummadevatā, bhanteti.
atk-s0401a:905_9: Devaputto kathentova dibbānubhāvena ṭhatvā therassa pādesu patitvā “mayhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:905_10: khamatha, etaṃ dosaṃ thero na jānāti, uposathaṃ karothā”ti theraṃ yācitvā uposathaggaṃ
atk-s0401a:905_11: pavesesi. So thero uposathaṃ tāva ekaṭṭhāne akāsi, mittasanthavavasena na puna tena
atk-s0401a:905_12: saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne ahosīti. Imassa therassa kammaṃ na kathiyati, cuditakatthero pana
atk-s0401a:905_13: aparāparaṃ vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:906_0: Bhummadevatā tassa kammassa nissandena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ apāyato na muccittha. Sace
atk-s0401a:906_1: pana kālena kālaṃ manussattaṃ āgacchati, aññena yena kenaci kato doso tasseva upari
atk-s0401a:906_2: patati. So amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, dhānamāṇavotissa
atk-s0401a:906_3: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā mahallakakāle satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:906_4: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji, tassa upasampannadivasato paṭṭhāya ekā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā
atk-s0401a:906_5: itthī tasmiṃ gāmaṃ pavisante saddhiṃyeva gāmaṃ pavisati, nikkhamante nikkhamati.
atk-s0401a:906_6: Vihāraṃ pavisantepi pavisati, tiṭṭhantepi tiṭṭhatīti evaṃ niccānubandhā paññāyati.
atk-s0401a:906_7: Thero taṃ na passati, tassa pana purimassa kammassa nissandena sā aññesaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0401a:907_0: Gāme yāgubhikkhaṃ dadamānā itthiyo, “bhante, ayaṃ eko yāguuḷuṅko tumhākaṃ, eko imissā
atk-s0401a:907_1: amhākaṃ sahāyikāyā”ti parihāsaṃ karonti. Therassa mahatī vihesā hoti. Vihāraṃ gatampi
atk-s0401a:907_2: naṃ sāmaṇerā ceva daharabhikkhū ca parivāretvā “dhāno koṇḍo jāto”ti parihāsaṃ karonti.
atk-s0401a:907_3: Athassa teneva kāraṇena kuṇḍadhānattheroti nāmaṃ jātaṃ. So uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya tehi
atk-s0401a:907_4: kayiramānaṃ keḷiṃ sahituṃ asakkonto ummādaṃ gahetvā “tumhe koṇḍā, tumhākaṃ upajjhāyā
atk-s0401a:907_5: koṇḍā, ācariyā koṇḍā”ti vadati. Atha naṃ satthu ārocesuṃ – “kuṇḍadhāno daharasāmaṇerehi
atk-s0401a:907_6: saddhiṃ evaṃ pharusavācaṃ vadatī”ti. Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ bhikkhū”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0401a:907_7: “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti vutte “kasmā evaṃ vadesī”ti āha. Bhante, nibaddhaṃ vihesaṃ asahanto
atk-s0401a:907_8: evaṃ kathemīti. “Tvaṃ pubbe katakammaṃ yāvajjadivasā jīrāpetuṃ na sakkosi, puna evarūpaṃ
atk-s0401a:907_9: pharusaṃ mā vada bhikkhū”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0401a:909: Dukkhā hi sārambhakathā, paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṃ.
atk-s0401a:911: Esa pattosi nibbānaṃ, sārambho te na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0401a:912_0: Imañca pana tassa therassa mātugāmena saddhiṃ vicaraṇabhāvaṃ kosalaraññopi kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:912_1: Rājā “gacchatha, bhaṇe, vīmaṃsathā”ti pesetvā sayampi mandeneva parivārena saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:912_2: therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ekamante olokento aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe thero sūcikammaṃ
atk-s0401a:912_3: karonto nisinno hoti, sāpissa itthī avidūre ṭhāne ṭhitā viya paññāyati.
atk-s0401a:913_0: Rājā taṃ disvā “atthidaṃ kāraṇa”nti tassā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Sā tasmiṃ āgacchante
atk-s0401a:913_1: therassa vasanapaṇṇasālaṃ paviṭṭhā viya ahosi. Rājāpi tāya saddhiṃyeva paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0401a:913_2: pavisitvā sabbattha olokento adisvā “nāyaṃ mātugāmo, therassa eko kammavipāko”ti
atk-s0401a:913_3: saññaṃ katvā paṭhamaṃ therassa samīpena gacchantopi theraṃ avanditvā tassa kāraṇassa
atk-s0401a:913_4: abhūtabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgamma theraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “kacci, bhante, piṇḍakena
atk-s0401a:913_5: na kilamathā”ti pucchi. Thero “vaṭṭati mahārājā”ti āha. “Jānāmi, bhante, ayyassa
atk-s0401a:913_6: kathaṃ, evarūpena ca parikkilesena saddhiṃ carantānaṃ tumhākaṃ ke nāma pasīdissanti,
atk-s0401a:913_7: ito paṭṭhāya vo katthaci gamanakiccaṃ natthi, ahaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmi,
atk-s0401a:913_8: tumhe yonisomanasikāre mā pamajjitthā”ti nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Thero rājānaṃ
atk-s0401a:913_9: upatthambhakaṃ labhitvā bhojanasappāyena ekaggacitto hutvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:913_10: pāpuṇi. Tato paṭṭhāya sā itthī antaradhāyi.
atk-s0401a:914_0: Mahāsubhaddā ugganagare micchādiṭṭhikule vasamānā “satthā maṃ anukampatū”ti uposathaṃ
atk-s0401a:914_1: adhiṭṭhāya nirāmagandhā hutvā uparipāsādatale ṭhitā “imāni pupphāni antare aṭṭhatvā
atk-s0401a:914_2: dasabalassa matthake vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhantu, dasabalo imāya saññāya sve pañcahi
atk-s0401a:914_3: bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatū”ti saccakiriyaṃ katvā aṭṭha sumanapupphamuṭṭhiyo
atk-s0401a:914_4: vissajjesi. Pupphāni gantvā dhammadesanāvelāya satthu matthake vitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:914_5: Satthā taṃ sumanapupphavitānaṃ disvā citteneva subhaddāya bhikkhaṃ adhivāsetvā punadivase
atk-s0401a:914_6: aruṇe uṭṭhite ānandattheraṃ āha – “ānanda, mayaṃ ajja dūraṃ bhikkhācāraṃ gamissāma,
atk-s0401a:914_7: puthujjanānaṃ adatvā ariyānaṃyeva salākaṃ dehī”ti. Thero bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi – “āvuso,
atk-s0401a:914_8: satthā ajja dūraṃ bhikkhācāraṃ gamissati, puthujjanā mā gaṇhantu, ariyāva salākaṃ
atk-s0401a:914_9: gaṇhantū”ti. Kuṇḍadhānatthero “āharāvuso, salāka”nti paṭhamaṃyeva hatthaṃ pasāresi.
atk-s0401a:914_10: Ānandā “satthā tādisānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ salākaṃ na dāpeti, ariyānaṃyeva dāpetī”ti vitakkaṃ
atk-s0401a:914_11: uppādetvā gantvā satthu ārocesi. Satthā “āharāpentassa salākaṃ dehī”ti āha. Thero
atk-s0401a:914_12: cintesi – “sace kuṇḍadhānassa salākā dātuṃ na yuttā assa, atha satthā paṭibāheyya,
atk-s0401a:914_13: bhavissati ekaṃ kāraṇa”nti. “Kuṇḍadhānassa salākaṃ dassāmī”ti gamanaṃ abhinīhari.
atk-s0401a:914_14: Kuṇḍadhānatthero tassa pure āgamanāva abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0401a:914_15: iddhiyā ākāse ṭhatvā “āharāvuso ānanda, satthā maṃ jānāti, mādisaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0401a:914_16: salākaṃ gaṇhantaṃ na satthā vāretī”ti hatthaṃ pasāretvā salākaṃ gaṇhi. Satthā taṃ
atk-s0401a:914_17: aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:916_0: 212. Catutthe paṭibhānavantānanti sampannapaṭibhānānaṃ vaṅgīsatthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:916_1: Ayaṃ kira thero dasabalassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamanto cakkhupathato paṭṭhāya candena
atk-s0401a:916_2: saddhiṃ upametvā, sūriyena, ākāsena, mahāsamuddena, hatthināgena, sīhena migaraññā
atk-s0401a:916_3: saddhiṃ upametvāpi anekehi padasatehi padasahassehi satthu vaṇṇaṃ vadantoyeva upasaṅkamati.
atk-s0401a:917_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:917_1: mahābhogakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā purimanayeneva vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0401a:917_2: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭibhānavantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā satthu adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:917_3: katvā “ahampi anāgate paṭibhānavantānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā satthārā
atk-s0401a:917_4: byākato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:917_5: brāhmaṇakule nibbatti. Vaṅgīsamāṇavotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhanto
atk-s0401a:917_6: ācariyaṃ ārādhetvā chavasīsamantaṃ nāma sikkhitvā chavasīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0401a:918_0: Brāhmaṇā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ jīvikamaggo”ti ñatvā vaṅgīsamāṇavaṃ paṭicchannayāne nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0401a:918_1: gāmanigamarājadhāniyo carantā nagaradvāre vā nigamadvāre vā ṭhapetvā mahājanassa
atk-s0401a:918_2: rāsibhūtabhāvaṃ ñatvā “yo vaṅgīsaṃ passati, so dhanaṃ vā labhati, yasaṃ vā labhati,
atk-s0401a:918_3: saggaṃ vā gacchatī”ti vadanti. Tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā bahū janā lañjaṃ datvā passitukāmā
atk-s0401a:918_4: honti. Rājarājamahāmattā tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “ko ācariyassa jānaviseso”ti pucchanti.
atk-s0401a:918_5: Tumhe na jānātha, sakalajambudīpe amhākaṃ ācariyasadiso añño paṇḍito nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:918_6: tivassamatthake matakānaṃ sīsaṃ āharāpetvā nakhena ākoṭetvā “ayaṃ satto asukayoniyaṃ
atk-s0401a:918_7: nibbatto”ti jānāti. Vaṅgīsopi mahājanassa kaṅkhachedanatthaṃ te te jane āvāhetvā
atk-s0401a:918_8: attano attano gatiṃ kathāpeti. Taṃ nissāya mahājanassa hatthato satampi sahassampi labhati.
atk-s0401a:919_0: Brāhmaṇā vaṅgīsamāṇavaṃ ādāya yathāruciṃ vicaritvā puna sāvatthiṃ āgamaṃsu. Vaṅgīso
atk-s0401a:919_1: jetavanamahāvihārassa avidūraṭṭhāne ṭhito cintesi – “samaṇo gotamo paṇḍitoti vadanti,
atk-s0401a:919_2: na kho pana sabbakālaṃ mayā imesaṃyeva vacanaṃ karontena carituṃ vaṭṭati, paṇḍitānampi
atk-s0401a:919_3: santikaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So brāhmaṇe āha – “tumhe gacchatha, ahaṃ na bahukehi
atk-s0401a:919_4: saddhiṃ gantvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ passissāmī”ti. Te āhaṃsu – “vaṅgīsa, mā te rucci samaṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:919_5: gotamaṃ passituṃ. Yo hi naṃ passati, taṃ so māyāya āvaṭṭetī”ti. Vaṅgīso tesaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0401a:919_6: anādiyitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:920_0: Atha naṃ satthā pucchi – “vaṅgīsa, kiñci sippaṃ jānāsī”ti. Āma, bho gotama, chavasīsamantaṃ
atk-s0401a:920_1: nāmekaṃ jānāmīti. Kiṃ so manto karotīti? Tivassamatthake matānampi taṃ mantaṃ jappitvā
atk-s0401a:920_2: sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāmīti. Satthā tassa ekaṃ niraye uppannassa
atk-s0401a:920_3: sīsaṃ dassesi, ekaṃ manussesu uppannassa, ekaṃ devesu, ekaṃ parinibbutassa sīsaṃ
atk-s0401a:920_4: dassesi. So paṭhamaṃ sīsaṃ ākoṭetvā, “bho gotama, ayaṃ satto nirayaṃ gato”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:920_5: Sādhu sādhu, vaṅgīsa, sudiṭṭhaṃ tayā, ayaṃ satto kahaṃ gatoti pucchi. Manussalokaṃ,
atk-s0401a:920_6: bho gotamāti. Ayaṃ satto kahaṃ gatoti? Devalokaṃ, bho gotamāti tiṇṇampi gataṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:920_7: kathesi. Parinibbutassa pana sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭento neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ passati.
atk-s0401a:920_8: Atha naṃ satthā “na sakkosi tvaṃ, vaṅgīsā”ti pucchi. “Passatha, bho gotama, upaparikkhāmi
atk-s0401a:920_9: tāvā”ti punappunaṃ parivatteti. Bāhirakamantena khīṇāsavassa gatiṃ kathaṃ jānissati,
atk-s0401a:920_10: athassa matthakato sedo mucci. So lajjitvā tuṇhībhūto aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā “kilamasi,
atk-s0401a:920_11: vaṅgīsā”ti āha. Āma, bho gotama, imassa sattassa gataṭṭhānaṃ jānituṃ na sakkomi.
atk-s0401a:920_12: Sace tumhe jānātha, kathethāti. “Vaṅgīsa, ahaṃ etampi jānāmi ito uttaritarampī”ti
atk-s0401a:920_13: vatvā dhammapade imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0401a:921: “Cutiṃ yo vedi sattānaṃ, upapattiṃ ca sabbaso;
atk-s0401a:922: Asattaṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:925_0: Tato vaṅgīso āha – “bho gotama, vijjāya vijjaṃ dentassa nāma parihāni natthi, ahaṃ
atk-s0401a:925_1: attanā jānanakaṃ mantaṃ tumhākaṃ dassāmi, tumhe etaṃ mantaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”ti. Vaṅgīsa,
atk-s0401a:925_2: na mayaṃ mantena mantaṃ dema, evameva demāti. “Sādhu, bho gotama, detha me manta”nti
atk-s0401a:925_3: apacitiṃ dassetvā hatthakacchapakaṃ katvā nisīdi. Kiṃ, vaṅgīsa, tumhākaṃ samaye mahagghamantaṃ
atk-s0401a:925_4: vā kiñci vā gaṇhantānaṃ parivāso nāma na hotīti? Hoti, bho gotamāti. Amhākaṃ pana
atk-s0401a:925_5: manto nipparivāsoti saññaṃ karosīti? Brāhmaṇā nāma mantehi atittā honti, tasmā so
atk-s0401a:925_6: bhagavantaṃ āha – “bho gotama, tumhehi kathitaniyāmaṃ karissāmī”ti. Bhagavā āha –
atk-s0401a:925_7: “vaṅgīsa, mayaṃ imaṃ mantaṃ dentā amhehi samānaliṅgassa demā”ti. Vaṅgīso “yaṃkiñci
atk-s0401a:925_8: katvā mayā imaṃ mantaṃ gaṇhitvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti brāhmaṇe āha. Tumhe mayi pabbajante
atk-s0401a:925_9: mā cintayittha, ahaṃ imaṃ mantaṃ gaṇhitvā sakalajambudīpe jeṭṭhako bhavissāmi. Evaṃ
atk-s0401a:925_10: sante tumhākampi bhaddakaṃ bhavissatī”ti mantatthāya satthu santike pabbaji. Satthā
atk-s0401a:925_11: “mantaparivāsaṃ tāva vasāhī”ti dvattiṃsākāraṃ ācikkhi. Paññavā satto dvattiṃsākāraṃ
atk-s0401a:925_12: sajjhāyantova tattha khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:926_0: Tasmiṃ arahattaṃ patte brāhmaṇā “kā nu kho vaṅgīsassa pavatti, passissāma na”nti
atk-s0401a:926_1: tassa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, bho vaṅgīsa, samaṇassa gotamassa santike sippaṃ sikkhita”nti
atk-s0401a:926_2: pucchiṃsu. Āma, sikkhitanti. Tena hi ehi gamissāmāti. Gacchatha tumhe, tumhehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:926_3: gantabbakiccaṃ mayhaṃ niṭṭhitanti. Paṭhamameva amhehi tuyhaṃ kathitaṃ “samaṇo gotamo
atk-s0401a:926_4: attānaṃ passituṃ āgate māyāya āvaṭṭetī”ti. Tvaṃ hi idāni samaṇassa gotamassa vasaṃ
atk-s0401a:926_5: āpanno, kiṃ mayaṃ tava santike karissāmāti āgatamaggeneva pakkamiṃsu. Vaṅgīsattheropi
atk-s0401a:926_6: yaṃ yaṃ velaṃ dasabalaṃ passituṃ gacchati, ekaṃ thutiṃ karontova gacchati. Tena taṃ
atk-s0401a:926_7: satthā saṅghamajjhe nisinno paṭibhānavantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:928_0: 213. Pañcame samantapāsādikānanti sabbapāsādikānaṃ. Upasenoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0401a:928_1: Vaṅgantabrāhmaṇassa pana so putto, tasmā vaṅgantaputtoti vuccati. Ayaṃ pana thero
atk-s0401a:928_2: na kevalaṃ attanāva pāsādiko, parisāpissa pāsādikā, iti parisaṃ nissāya laddhanāmavasena
atk-s0401a:929_0: Pañhakamme panassa ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:929_1: kulagehe nibbatto vayaṃ āgamma purimanayeneva satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇamāno
atk-s0401a:929_2: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ samantapāsādikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā satthu adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:929_3: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0401a:929_4: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde nālakabrāhmaṇagāme sāribrāhmaṇiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:930_0: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā dasabalassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0401a:930_1: pabbaji. So upasampadāya ekavassiko hutvā “ariyagabbhaṃ vaḍḍhemī”ti ekaṃ kulaputtaṃ
atk-s0401a:930_2: attano santike pabbājetvā upasampādesi. So pavāretvā saddhivihārikassa ekavassikakāle
atk-s0401a:930_3: attanā duvasso “dasabalo maṃ passitvā tusissatī”ti saddhivihārikaṃ ādāya dasabalaṃ
atk-s0401a:930_4: passituṃ āgato. Satthā taṃ vanditvā ekamante nisinnaṃ pucchi – “kativassosi tvaṃ
atk-s0401a:930_5: bhikkhū”ti? Duvasso ahaṃ bhagavāti. Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu kativassoti? Ekavasso bhagavāti.
atk-s0401a:930_6: Kintāyaṃ bhikkhu hotīti? Saddhivihāriko me bhagavāti. Atha naṃ satthā “atilahuṃ kho
atk-s0401a:930_7: tvaṃ, moghapurisa, bāhullāya āvatto”ti vatvā anekapariyāyena vigarahi. Thero satthu
atk-s0401a:930_8: santikā garahaṃ labhitvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “imināva puṇṇacandasassirikena mukhena
atk-s0401a:930_9: satthāraṃ parisameva nissāya sādhukāraṃ dāpessāmī”ti taṃdivaseyeva ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:930_10: vipassanāya kammaṃ katvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:931_0: Tato yasmā thero mahākulato nikkhamitvā pabbajito pathavighuṭṭhadhammakathikova,
atk-s0401a:931_1: tasmā tassa dhammakathāya ceva pasīditvā mittāmaccañātikulehi ca nikkhamitvā bahū
atk-s0401a:931_2: kuladārakā therassa santike pabbajanti. “Ahaṃ āraññako, tumhepi āraññakā bhavituṃ
atk-s0401a:931_3: sakkontā pabbajathā”ti terasa dhutaṅgāni ācikkhitvā “sakkhissāma, bhante”ti vadante
atk-s0401a:931_4: pabbājeti. Te attano balena taṃ taṃ dhutaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhahanti. Thero attano dasavassakāle
atk-s0401a:931_5: vinayaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā sabbeva upasampādesi. Evaṃ upasampannā cassa pañcasatamattā
atk-s0401a:932_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā jetavanamahāvihāre vasanto “icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave, addhamāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:932_1: paṭisallīyitu”nti bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocetvā ekavihārī hoti. Bhikkhusaṅghopi “yo bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0401a:932_2: dassanāya upasaṅkamati, so pācittiyaṃ desāpetabbo”ti katikaṃ akāsi. Tadā upasenatthero
atk-s0401a:932_3: “bhagavantaṃ passissāmī”ti attano parisāya saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0401a:932_4: abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ aññataraṃ therassa saddhivihārikaṃ
atk-s0401a:932_5: āmantesi – “manāpāni te bhikkhu paṃsukūlānī”ti. “Na kho me, bhante, manāpāni paṃsukūlānī”ti
atk-s0401a:932_6: vatvā upajjhāye gāravena paṃsukūlikabhāvaṃ ārocesi. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne satthā “sādhu sādhu,
atk-s0401a:932_7: upasenā”ti therassa sādhukāraṃ datvā anekapariyāyena guṇakathaṃ kathesi. Ayamettha
atk-s0401a:932_8: saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana idaṃ vatthu pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva. Atha satthā aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe
atk-s0401a:932_9: nisinno imasmiṃ sāsane theraṃ samantapāsādikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:934_0: 214. Chaṭṭhe senāsanapaññāpakānanti senāsanaṃ paññāpentānaṃ. Therassa kira senāsanapaññāpanakāle
atk-s0401a:934_1: aṭṭhārasasu mahāvihāresu asammaṭṭhaṃ pariveṇaṃ vā apaṭijaggitaṃ senāsanaṃ vā asodhitaṃ
atk-s0401a:934_2: mañcapīṭhaṃ vā anupaṭṭhitaṃ pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ vā nāhosi. Tasmā senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:934_3: aggo nāma jāto. Dabbotissa nāmaṃ. Mallarājakule pana uppannattā mallaputto nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:935_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayañhi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:935_1: kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto vuttanayeneva vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:935_2: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:935_3: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā satthārā byākato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu
atk-s0401a:935_4: saṃsaritvā kassapadasabalassa sāsanassa osakkanakāle pabbaji, tadā tena saddhiṃ apare
atk-s0401a:935_5: cha janāti satta bhikkhū ekacittā hutvā aññe sāsane agāravaṃ karonte disvā “idha
atk-s0401a:935_6: kiṃ karoma, ekamante samaṇadhammaṃ katvā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmā”ti nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0401a:935_7: uccapabbatasikharaṃ abhiruhitvā “attano cittabalaṃ jānantā nisseṇiṃ pātentu, jīvite
atk-s0401a:935_8: sālayā otarantu, mā pacchānutāpino ahuvatthā”ti vatvā sabbe ekacittā hutvā nisseṇiṃ
atk-s0401a:935_9: pātetvā “appamattā hotha, āvuso”ti aññamaññaṃ ovaditvā cittaruciyesu ṭhānesu nisīditvā
atk-s0401a:936_0: Tatreko thero pañcame divase arahattaṃ patvā “mama kiccaṃ nipphannaṃ, ahaṃ imasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:936_1: ṭhāne kiṃ karissāmī”ti iddhiyā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā, “āvuso, imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0401a:936_2: paribhuñjatha, bhikkhācārakiccaṃ mamāyattaṃ hotu, tumhe attano kammaṃ karothā”ti
atk-s0401a:936_3: āha. Kiṃ nu kho mayaṃ, āvuso, nisseṇiṃ pātentā evaṃ avocumhā “yo paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:936_4: sacchikaroti, so bhikkhaṃ āharatu, tena ābhataṃ sesā paribhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:936_5: karissantī”ti. Natthi, āvusoti. Tumhe attano pubbahetunā labhittha, mayampi sakkontā
atk-s0401a:936_6: vaṭṭassantaṃ karissāma, gacchatha tumheti. Thero te saññāpetuṃ asakkonto phāsukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:936_7: piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā gato. Aparo thero sattame divase anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā tato
atk-s0401a:937_0: Itarepi therā tato cutā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0401a:937_1: tesu tesu kulesu nibbattā. Eko gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilanagare rājagehe nibbatto,
atk-s0401a:937_2: eko pabbateyyaraṭṭhe paribbājikāya kucchimhi nibbatto, eko bāhiyaraṭṭhe kuṭumbikagehe
atk-s0401a:937_3: nibbatto, eko rājagahe kuṭumbikagehe nibbatto. Ayaṃ pana dabbatthero mallaraṭṭhe
atk-s0401a:937_4: anupiyanagare ekassa mallarañño gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tassa mātā upavijaññakāle
atk-s0401a:937_5: kālamakāsi, matasarīraṃ susānaṃ netvā dārucitakaṃ āropetvā aggiṃ adaṃsu. Tassā aggivegasantattaṃ
atk-s0401a:937_6: udarapaṭalaṃ dvedhā ahosi. Dārako attano puññabalena uppatitvā ekasmiṃ dabbatthambhe
atk-s0401a:937_7: nipati. Taṃ dārakaṃ gahetvā ayyikāya adaṃsu. Sā tassa nāmaṃ gaṇhantī dabbatthambhe
atk-s0401a:938_0: Tassa sattavassikakāle satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro mallaraṭṭhe cārikaṃ caramāno
atk-s0401a:938_1: anupiyanigamaṃ patvā anupiyambavane viharati. Dabbakumāro satthāraṃ disvā dassaneneva
atk-s0401a:938_2: pasīditvā pabbajitukāmo hutvā “ahaṃ dasabalassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti ayyikaṃ āpucchi.
atk-s0401a:938_3: Sā “sādhu, tātā”ti dabbakumāraṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā, “bhante, imaṃ kumāraṃ
atk-s0401a:938_4: pabbājethā”ti āha. Satthā aññatarassa bhikkhuno saññaṃ adāsi “bhikkhu imaṃ dārakaṃ
atk-s0401a:938_5: pabbājehī”ti. So thero satthu vacanaṃ sutvā dabbakumāraṃ pabbājento tacapañcakaṃ
atk-s0401a:938_6: kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. Pubbahetusampanno katābhinīhāro satto paṭhamakesavaṭṭiyā oropiyamānāya
atk-s0401a:938_7: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi, dutiyakesavaṭṭiyā oropiyamānāya sakadāgāmiphale, tatiyāya
atk-s0401a:938_8: anāgāmiphale. Sabbakesānaṃ pana oropanañca arahattaphalasacchikiriyā ca apacchā apure ahosi.
atk-s0401a:939_0: Satthā mallaraṭṭhe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0401a:939_1: Tatrāyasmā dabbo mallaputto rahogato attano kiccanipphattiṃ oloketvā saṅghassa veyyāvaccakaraṇe
atk-s0401a:939_2: kāyaṃ yojetukāmo cintesi – “yaṃnūnāhaṃ saṅghassa senāsanañca paññāpeyyaṃ, bhattāni
atk-s0401a:939_3: ca uddiseyya”nti. So satthu santikaṃ gantvā attano parivitakkaṃ ārocesi. Satthā tassa
atk-s0401a:939_4: sādhukāraṃ datvā senāsanapaññāpakattañca bhattuddesakattañca sampaṭicchi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0401a:939_5: “ayaṃ dabbo daharova samāno mahantaṭṭhāne ṭhito”ti sattavassikakāleyeva upasampādesi.
atk-s0401a:939_6: Thero upasampannakālatoyeva paṭṭhāya rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharantānaṃ sabbabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:939_7: senāsanāni ca paññāpeti, bhikkhañca sampaṭicchitvā uddisati. Tassa senāsanapaññāpakabhāvo
atk-s0401a:939_8: sabbadisāsu pākaṭo ahosi – “dabbo kira mallaputto sabhāgasabhāgānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:939_9: senāsanāni paññāpeti, dūrepi senāsanaṃ paññāpetiyeva. Gantuṃ asakkonte iddhiyā netīti.
atk-s0401a:940_0: Atha naṃ bhikkhū kālepi vikālepi “amhākaṃ, āvuso, jīvakambavane senāsanaṃ paññāpehi,
atk-s0401a:940_1: amhākaṃ maddakucchismiṃ migadāye”ti evaṃ senāsanaṃ uddisāpetvā tassa iddhiṃ passantā
atk-s0401a:940_2: gacchanti. Sopi iddhiyā manomaye kāye abhisaṅkharitvā ekekassa therassa ekekaṃ attanā
atk-s0401a:940_3: sadisaṃ bhikkhuṃ nimminitvā aṅguliyā jalamānāya purato purato gantvā “ayaṃ mañco,
atk-s0401a:940_4: idaṃ pīṭha”ntiādīni vatvā senāsanaṃ paññāpetvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva āgacchati.
atk-s0401a:940_5: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panidaṃ vatthu pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva. Satthā idameva kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:940_6: aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ senāsanapaññāpakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:942_0: 215. Sattame devatānaṃ piyamanāpānanti devatānaṃ piyānañceva manāpānañca pilindavacchatthero
atk-s0401a:942_1: aggoti dasseti. So kira anuppanne buddhe cakkavattī rājā hutvā mahājanaṃ pañcasu
atk-s0401a:942_2: sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā saggaparāyaṇaṃ akāsi. Yebhuyyena kira chasu kāmasaggesu nibbattadevatā
atk-s0401a:942_3: tasseva ovādaṃ labhitvā nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne attano sampattiṃ oloketvā “kaṃ nu
atk-s0401a:942_4: kho nissāya imaṃ saggasampattiṃ labhimhā”ti āvajjamānā imaṃ theraṃ disvā “theraṃ
atk-s0401a:942_5: nissāya amhehi sampati laddhā”ti sāyaṃpātaṃ theraṃ namassanti. Tasmā so devatānaṃ
atk-s0401a:942_6: piyamanāpānaṃ aggo nāma jāto. Pilindoti panassa gottaṃ, vacchoti nāmaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ
atk-s0401a:943_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:943_1: mahābhogakule nibbatto purimanayeneva satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:943_2: bhikkhuṃ devatānaṃ piyamanāpaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0401a:943_3: kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0401a:943_4: nibbatti. Pilindavacchotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So aparena samayena satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:943_5: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampanno vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:943_6: So gihīhipi bhikkhūhipi saddhiṃ kathento “ehi, vasala, gaccha, vasala, āhara, vasala,
atk-s0401a:943_7: gaṇha, vasalā”ti vasalavādeneva samudācarati. Taṃ kathaṃ āharitvā tathāgataṃ pucchiṃsu
atk-s0401a:943_8: – “bhagavā ariyā nāma pharusavācā na hontī”ti. Bhikkhave, ariyānaṃ paravambhanavasena
atk-s0401a:943_9: pharusavācā nāma natthi, apica kho pana bhavantare āciṇṇavasena bhaveyyāti. Bhante,
atk-s0401a:943_10: pilindavacchatthero uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya gihīhipi bhikkhūhipi saddhiṃ kathento, “vasala,
atk-s0401a:943_11: vasalā”ti katheti, kimettha kāraṇaṃ bhagavāti. Bhikkhave, na mayhaṃ puttassa etaṃ
atk-s0401a:943_12: idāneva āciṇṇaṃ, atīte panesa pañca jātisatāni vasalavādibrāhmaṇakule nibbatti. Iccesa
atk-s0401a:943_13: bhavāciṇṇeneva kathesi, na pharusavasena. Ariyānañhi vohāro pharusopi samāno cetanāya
atk-s0401a:943_14: apharusabhāvena parisuddhova, appamattakampettha pāpaṃ na upalabbhatīti vatvā dhammapade imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:945: Yāya nābhisaje kañci, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0401a:946_0: Athekadivasaṃ thero rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto ekaṃ purisaṃ pippalīnaṃ bhājanaṃ
atk-s0401a:946_1: pūretvā ādāya antonagaraṃ pavisantaṃ disvā “kiṃ te, vasala, bhājane”ti āha. So cintesi
atk-s0401a:946_2: – “ayaṃ samaṇo mayā saddhiṃ pātova pharusakathaṃ kathesi, imassa anucchavikameva
atk-s0401a:946_3: vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti “mūsikavaccaṃ me, bhante, bhājane”ti āha. Evaṃ bhavissati, vasalāti.
atk-s0401a:946_4: Tassa therassa dassanaṃ vijahantassa sabbaṃ mūsikavaccameva ahosi. So cintesi – “imā
atk-s0401a:946_5: pippaliyo mūsikavaccasadisā paññāyanti, sabhāvo nu kho no”ti vīmaṃsanto hatthena
atk-s0401a:946_6: uppīḷesi. Athassa undūravaccabhāvaṃ ñatvā balavadomanassaṃ uppajji. So “imāyeva nu
atk-s0401a:946_7: kho evarūpā, udāhu sakaṭepī”ti gantvā olokento sabbāpi pippaliyo tādisāva disvā hadayaṃ
atk-s0401a:946_8: hatthena sandhāretvā “idaṃ na aññassa kammaṃ, mayā pātova diṭṭhabhikkhussetaṃ kammaṃ,
atk-s0401a:946_9: addhā ekaṃ upāyaṃ bhavissati, tassa gataṭṭhānaṃ anuvicinitvā etaṃ kāraṇaṃ jānissāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:947_0: Atheko puriso taṃ ativiya caṇḍikataṃ gacchantaṃ disvā, “bho purisa, tvaṃ ativiya
atk-s0401a:947_1: caṇḍikatova gacchasi, kena kammena gacchasī”ti pucchi. So tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0401a:947_2: So tassa kathaṃ sutvā evamāha – “bho, mā cintayi, mayhaṃ ayyo pilindavaccho bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:947_3: tvaṃ etadeva bhājanaṃ pūretvā ādāya gantvā therassa purato tiṭṭha. ‘Kiṃ nāmetaṃ,
atk-s0401a:947_4: vasalā’ti vuttakāle ca ‘pippaliyo, bhante’ti vada, thero ‘evaṃ bhavissati, vasalā’ti
atk-s0401a:947_5: vakkhati. Puna sabbāpi pippaliyo bhavissantī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Sabbā pippaliyo
atk-s0401a:947_6: paṭipākatikā ahesuṃ. Idamettakaṃ vatthu. Aparabhāge pana satthā devatānaṃ piyamanāpakāraṇameva
atk-s0401a:947_7: vatthuṃ katvā theraṃ devatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:949_0: 216. Aṭṭhame khippābhiññānanti khippaṃ adhigataabhiññānaṃ dārucīriyatthero aggoti
atk-s0401a:949_1: dasseti. Ayañhi thero saṃkhittadhammadesanāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, maggaphalānaṃ
atk-s0401a:949_2: parikammakiccaṃ nāhosi. Tasmā khippābhiññānaṃ aggo nāma jāto. Bāhiyaraṭṭhe pana jātattā
atk-s0401a:949_3: bāhiyotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. So aparabhāge dārucīraṃ nivāsesi. Tasmā dārucīriyo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:950_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:950_1: kulagehe nibbatto dasabalassa dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ khippābhiññānaṃ
atk-s0401a:950_2: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0401a:950_3: kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapadasabalassa sāsanassa osakkanakāle
atk-s0401a:950_4: heṭṭhā vuttehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā paripuṇṇasīlo jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0401a:951_0: So ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke vasitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bāhiyaraṭṭhe kulagehe nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:951_1: Vayaṃ āgamma gharāvāsaṃ vasanto “vohāraṃ karissāmī”ti suvaṇṇabhūmigamanīyaṃ nāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:951_2: abhiruhi. Nāvā icchitaṃ desaṃ appatvāva samuddamajjhe bhinnā, mahājano macchakacchapabhakkho
atk-s0401a:951_3: ahosi. Ayaṃ pana ekaṃ dārukhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā sattame divase suppārakapaṭṭane uttiṇṇo
atk-s0401a:951_4: manussāvāsaṃ patvā “acelakaniyāmena manusse upasaṅkamituṃ ayutta”nti avidūre ṭhāne
atk-s0401a:951_5: ekaṃ mahātaḷākā sevālaṃ gahetvā sarīraṃ veṭhetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne patitaṃ ekaṃ kapālaṃ
atk-s0401a:952_0: Manussā taṃ disvā cintesuṃ – “sace loke arahantā nāma atthi, evaṃvidhehi bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:952_1: Kiṃ nu kho ayyo ukkaṭṭhabhāvena vatthaṃ na gaṇhāti, udāhu diyyamānaṃ gaṇheyyā”ti
atk-s0401a:952_2: vīmaṃsantā nānādisāhi vatthāni āhariṃsu. So cintesi – “sacāhaṃ na iminā niyāmena
atk-s0401a:952_3: āgamissaṃ, na me ete pasīdeyyuṃ, yaṃkiñci katvā ime vañcetvā jīvikupāyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0401a:952_4: vatthāni na paṭiggaṇhi. Manussā bhiyyosomattāya pasannā mahāsakkāraṃ kariṃsu. Sopi
atk-s0401a:952_5: bhattakiccaṃ katvā avidūraṭṭhāne devakulaṃ gato. Mahājano tena saddhiṃyeva gantvā
atk-s0401a:952_6: devakulaṃ paṭijaggitvā adāsi. So cintesi – “ime mayhaṃ sevāle nivāsanamatte pasīditvā
atk-s0401a:952_7: evaṃvidhaṃ sakkāraṃ karonti, etesaṃ mayā ukkaṭṭheneva bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sallahukāni
atk-s0401a:952_8: rukkhaphalakāni gahetvā tacchetvā vākesu āvuṇitvā cīraṃ katvā nivāsetvā pārupitvā
atk-s0401a:953_0: Atha yo so kassapabuddhakāle sattasu janesu samaṇadhammaṃ karontesu eko bhikkhu suddhāvāsabrahmaloke
atk-s0401a:953_1: nibbatto. So nibbattasamanantarameva attano brahmasampattiṃ oloketvā āgataṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:953_2: āvajjento sattannaṃ janānaṃ pabbataṃ āruyha samaṇadhammakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ disvā sesānaṃ
atk-s0401a:953_3: channaṃ nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ āvajjento ekassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ itaresaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmāvacaradevaloke
atk-s0401a:953_4: nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā kālānukālaṃ te pañca jane āvajjeti. Imasmiṃ pana kāle “kahaṃ
atk-s0401a:953_5: nu kho”ti āvajjento dārucīriyaṃ suppārakapaṭṭanaṃ upanissāya kuhanakammena jīvikaṃ
atk-s0401a:953_6: kappentaṃ disvā “naṭṭho vatāyaṃ bālo, pubbe samaṇadhammaṃ karonto atiukkaṭṭhabhāvena
atk-s0401a:953_7: arahatāpi ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ aparibhuñjitvā idāni udaratthāya anarahāva arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:953_8: paṭijānitvā lokaṃ vañcento vicarati, dasabalassa ca nibbattabhāvaṃ na jānāti, gacchāmi
atk-s0401a:953_9: naṃ saṃvejetvā dasabalassa nibbattabhāvaṃ jānāpemī”ti taṃkhaṇaṃyeva brahmalokato
atk-s0401a:954_0: So attano vasanaṭṭhāne obhāsaṃ disvā bahi nikkhamitvā ṭhito mahābrahmaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0401a:954_1: añjaliṃ paggayha “ke tumhe”ti pucchi. Ahaṃ tuyhaṃ porāṇakasahāyo anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā
atk-s0401a:954_2: brahmaloke nibbatto. Amhākaṃ pana sabbajeṭṭhako arahattaṃ patvā parinibbuto, tumhe
atk-s0401a:954_3: pañca janā devaloke nibbattā. Svāhaṃ taṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne kuhanakammena jīvantaṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:954_4: dametuṃ āgatoti vatvā idaṃ kāraṇamāha – “na kho tvaṃ, bāhiya arahā, napi arahattamaggaṃ
atk-s0401a:954_5: samāpanno, sāpi te paṭipadā natthi, yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assa arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno”ti.
atk-s0401a:954_6: Athassa satthu uppannabhāvaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ vasanabhāvañca ācikkhitvā “satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:955_0: Dārucīriyo mahābrahmunā saṃvejito “mokkhamaggaṃ gavesissāmī”ti vīsayojanasataṃ maggaṃ
atk-s0401a:955_1: ekarattivāsena gantvā satthāraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ antaraghare sampāpuṇitvā satthu
atk-s0401a:955_2: pādesu nipatitvā “desetu me, bhante, bhagavā dhammaṃ, desetu sugato dhamma”nti yāvatatiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:955_3: yāci. Satthā “ettāvatā bāhiyassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gata”nti ñatvā “tasmātiha te, bāhiya,
atk-s0401a:955_4: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”ti iminā ovādena ovadi. Sopi desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0401a:955_5: antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitova desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:956_0: So attano kiccaṃ matthakappattaṃ ñatvā bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā aparipuṇṇapattacīvaratāya
atk-s0401a:956_1: pattacīvaraṃ pariyesanto saṅkāraṭṭhānato coḷakkhaṇḍāni saṃkaḍḍhati. Atha naṃ pubbaveriko
atk-s0401a:956_2: amanusso ekissā taruṇavacchāya gāviyā sarīre adhimuccitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi. Satthā
atk-s0401a:956_3: sāvatthito nikkhamanto antaravīthiyaṃ bāhiyaṃ saṅkāraṭṭhāne patitaṃ disvā “gaṇhatha,
atk-s0401a:956_4: bhikkhave, bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa sarīra”nti nīharāpetvā sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā cātumahāpathe
atk-s0401a:956_5: cetiyaṃ kārāpesi. Tato saṅghamajjhe kathā udapādi – “tathāgato bhikkhusaṅghena bāhiyassa
atk-s0401a:956_6: sarīrajjhāpanakiccaṃ kāresi, dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ kāresi, kataramaggo nu kho tena
atk-s0401a:956_7: sacchikato, sāmaṇero nu kho so, bhikkhu nu kho”ti cittaṃ uppādayiṃsu. Satthā taṃ
atk-s0401a:956_8: aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā “paṇḍito, bhikkhave, bāhiyo”ti upari dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tassa
atk-s0401a:956_9: parinibbutabhāvaṃ pakāsesi. Puna saṅghamajjhe kathā udapādi “na ca satthārā bāhiyassa
atk-s0401a:956_10: bahu dhammo desito, arahattaṃ pattoti ca vadeti. Kiṃ nāmeta”nti? Satthā “dhammo mando
atk-s0401a:956_11: bahūti akāraṇaṃ, visapītakassa agado viya ceso”ti vatvā dhammapade gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:958: Ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammatī”ti. ;
atk-s0401a:959_0: Desanāpariyosāne caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ piviṃsu. Idañca pana bāhiyattherassa
atk-s0401a:959_1: vatthu sutte āgatattā vitthārena na kathitaṃ. Aparabhāge pana satthā saṅghamajjhe
atk-s0401a:961_0: 217. Navame cittakathikānanti vicittaṃ katvā dhammaṃ kathentānaṃ. Thero kira ekassapi
atk-s0401a:961_1: dvinnampi dhammaṃ kathento bahūhi upamāhi ca kāraṇehi ca maṇḍayitvā bodhento katheti.
atk-s0401a:962_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:962_1: kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā vayappatto dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:962_2: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ cittakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ
atk-s0401a:962_3: ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapabuddhasāsanosakkanakāle sattannaṃ
atk-s0401a:962_4: bhikkhūnaṃ abbhantaro hutvā pabbatamatthake samaṇadhammaṃ katvā aparihīnasīlo tato
atk-s0401a:962_5: cuto devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ sampattiṃ anubhavamāno amhākaṃ satthu
atk-s0401a:962_6: kāle rājagahe ekissā kuladārikāya kucchimhi uppanno. Sā ca paṭhamaṃ mātāpitaro yācitvā
atk-s0401a:962_7: pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā kulagharaṃ gatā gabbhaṃ gaṇhi. Tampi ajānantī sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā
atk-s0401a:962_8: tena anuññātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā. Tassā gabbhanimittaṃ disvā bhikkhuniyo devadattaṃ
atk-s0401a:962_9: pucchiṃsu, so “assamaṇī”ti āha. Dasabalaṃ pucchiṃsu, satthā upālittheraṃ paṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0401a:962_10: Thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṃ pakkosāpetvā sodhento “pure
atk-s0401a:962_11: laddho gabbho, pabbajjā arogā”ti āha. Satthā “suvinicchitaṃ adhikaraṇa”nti therassa sādhukāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:963_0: Sā bhikkhunī suvaṇṇabimbasadisaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi. Taṃ gahetvā rājā pasenadikosalo posāpesi,
atk-s0401a:963_1: kassapoti cassa nāmaṃ katvā aparabhāge alaṅkaritvā satthu santikaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0401a:963_2: Kumārakāle pana pabbajitattā bhagavatā “kassapaṃ pakkosatha, idaṃ phalaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ
atk-s0401a:963_3: vā kassapassa dethā”ti vutte “katarakassapassāti. Kumārakassapassā”ti evaṃ gahitanāmattā
atk-s0401a:963_4: tato paṭṭhāya vuḍḍhakālepi kumārakassapotveva vuccati. Apica rañño posāvanikaputtattāpi
atk-s0401a:964_0: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya ceva kammaṃ karoti, buddhavacanañca gaṇhāti.
atk-s0401a:964_1: Atha so tena saddhiṃ pabbatamatthake samaṇadhammaṃ katvā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā suddhāvāse
atk-s0401a:964_2: nibbatto mahābrahmā tasmiṃ samaye āvajjento kumārakassapaṃ disvā “sahāyako me vipassanāya
atk-s0401a:964_3: kilamati, gantvā tassa vipassanāya nayamukhaṃ dassetvā maggaphalapattiyā upāyaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:964_4: brahmaloke ṭhitova pañcadasa pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā rattibhāgasamanantare kumārakassapattherassa
atk-s0401a:964_5: vasanaṭṭhāne andhavane pāturahosi. Thero ālokaṃ disvā “ko etthā”ti āha. “Ahaṃ pubbe
atk-s0401a:964_6: tayā saddhiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā suddhāvāse nibbattabrahmā”ti
atk-s0401a:964_7: āha. Kena kammena āgatatthāti? Mahābrahmā attano āgatakāraṇaṃ dīpetuṃ te pañhe ācikkhitvā
atk-s0401a:964_8: “tvaṃ ime pañhe uggaṇhitvā aruṇe uṭṭhite tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā puccha, ṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:964_9: hi tathāgataṃ añño ime pañhe kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti vatvā brahmalokameva gato.
atk-s0401a:965_0: Theropi punadivase satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā mahābrahmunā kathitaniyāmeneva
atk-s0401a:965_1: pañhe pucchi. Satthā kumārakassapattherassa arahattaṃ pāpetvā pañhe kathesi. Thero
atk-s0401a:965_2: satthārā kathitaniyāmeneva uggaṇhitvā andhavanaṃ gantvā vipassanaṃ gabbhaṃ gāhāpetvā
atk-s0401a:965_3: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tato paṭṭhāya catunnaṃ parisānaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathento bahukāhi
atk-s0401a:965_4: upamāhi ca kāraṇehi ca maṇḍetvā cittakathameva katheti. Atha naṃ satthā pāyāsirañño
atk-s0401a:965_5: pañcadasahi pañhehi paṭimaṇḍetvā suttante desite taṃ suttantaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:967_0: 218. Dasame paṭisambhidāpattānanti catasso paṭisambhidā patvā ṭhitānaṃ mahākoṭṭhitatthero
atk-s0401a:967_1: aggoti dasseti. Ayaṃ hi thero attano paṭisambhidāsu ciṇṇavasibhāvena abhiññāte abhiññāte
atk-s0401a:967_2: mahāsāvake upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchantopi dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchantopi
atk-s0401a:967_3: paṭisambhidāsuyeva pañhaṃ pucchati. Iti iminā ciṇṇavasibhāvena paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:968_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:968_1: mahābhogakule nibbatto aparena samayena satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:968_2: bhikkhuṃ paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ
atk-s0401a:968_3: ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:968_4: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti. Koṭṭhitamāṇavotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:968_5: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0401a:968_6: pabbaji. So upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0401a:968_7: arahattaṃ patvā niccakālaṃ paṭisambhidāsu ciṇṇavasī hutvā pañhaṃ pucchanto paṭisambhidāsuyeva
atk-s0401a:968_8: pucchati. Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge mahāvedallasuttaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ
atk-s0401a:973_0: 219-223. Catutthassa paṭhame bahussutānantiādīsu aññepi therā bahussutā satimantā
atk-s0401a:973_1: gatimantā dhitimantā upaṭṭhākā ca atthi. Ayaṃ panāyasmā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanto
atk-s0401a:973_2: dasabalassa sāsane bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattiyaṃ ṭhatvā gaṇhi. Tasmā bahussutānaṃ aggo
atk-s0401a:973_3: nāma jāto. Imasseva ca therassa buddhavacanaṃ gahetvā dhāraṇakasati aññehi therehi
atk-s0401a:973_4: balavatarā ahosi, tasmā satimantānaṃ aggo nāma jāto. Ayameva cāyasmā ekapade ṭhatvā
atk-s0401a:973_5: saṭṭhi padasahassāni gaṇhanto satthārā kathitaniyāmeneva sabbapadāni jānāti, tasmā
atk-s0401a:973_6: gatimantānaṃ aggo nāma jāto. Tasseva cāyasmato buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanavīriyaṃ sajjhāyanavīriyañca
atk-s0401a:973_7: dhāraṇavīriyañca satthu upaṭṭhānavīriyañca aññehi asadisaṃ ahosi, tasmā dhitimantānaṃ
atk-s0401a:973_8: aggo nāma jāto. Tathāgataṃ upaṭṭhahanto cesa na aññesaṃ upaṭṭhākabhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhānākārena
atk-s0401a:973_9: upaṭṭhahi, aññe hi tathāgataṃ upaṭṭhahantā na ciraṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu, na ca buddhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:973_10: manaṃ gahetvā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Ayaṃ thero pana upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:973_11: āraddhavīriyo hutvā tathāgatassa manaṃ gahetvā upaṭṭhahi. Tasmā upaṭṭhākānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:974_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ito kira satasahassamatthake kappe padumuttaro
atk-s0401a:974_1: nāma satthā loke uppajji. Tassa haṃsavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, nando nāma rājā pitā,
atk-s0401a:974_2: sumedhā nāma devī mātā, bodhisatto uttarakumāro nāma ahosi. So puttassa jātadivase
atk-s0401a:974_3: mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamma pabbajitvā padhānamanuyutto anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā
atk-s0401a:974_5: ṭhapessāmī”ti pādaṃ abhinīhari. Atha pathaviṃ bhinditvā heṭṭhā vuttappamāṇaṃ padumaṃ
atk-s0401a:974_6: uṭṭhāsi. Tadupādāya bhagavā padumuttaroteva paññāyittha. Tassa devalo ca sujāto ca
atk-s0401a:974_7: dve aggasāvakā ahesuṃ, amitā ca asamā ca dve aggasāvikā, sumano nāma upaṭṭhāko. Padumuttaro
atk-s0401a:974_8: bhagavā pitu saṅgahaṃ kurumāno bhikkhusatasahassaparivāro haṃsavatiyā rājadhāniyā vasati.
atk-s0401a:975_0: Kaniṭṭhabhātā panassa sumanakumāro nāma. Tassa rājā haṃsavatito vīsayojanasate bhogagāmaṃ
atk-s0401a:975_1: adāsi. So kadāci kadāci āgantvā pitarañca satthārañca passati. Athekadivasaṃ paccanto
atk-s0401a:975_2: kupito sumano rañño pesesi. Rājā “tvaṃ mayā tattha kasmā ṭhapito”ti paṭipesesi. So
atk-s0401a:975_3: core vūpasametvā “upasanto, deva, janapado”ti rañño pesesi. Rājā tuṭṭho “sīghaṃ mama
atk-s0401a:975_4: putto āgacchatū”ti āha. Tassa sahassamattā amaccā honti. So tehi saddhiṃ antarāmagge
atk-s0401a:975_5: mantesi – “mayhaṃ pitā tuṭṭho sace me varaṃ deti, kiṃ gaṇhāmī”ti? Atha naṃ ekacce
atk-s0401a:975_6: “hatthiṃ gaṇhatha, assaṃ gaṇhatha, janapadaṃ gaṇhatha, satta ratanāni gaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0401a:975_7: āhaṃsu. Apare “tumhe pathavissarassa puttā, na tumhākaṃ dhanaṃ dullabhaṃ, laddhampi
atk-s0401a:975_8: cetaṃ sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyaṃ, puññameva ekaṃ ādāya gamanīyaṃ. Tasmā deve varaṃ dadamāne
atk-s0401a:975_9: temāsaṃ padumuttarabhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ varaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āhaṃsu. So “tumhe mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:975_10: kalyāṇamittā, na metaṃ cittaṃ atthi, tumhehi pana uppāditaṃ, evaṃ karissāmī”ti gantvā
atk-s0401a:975_11: pitaraṃ vanditvā pitarā āliṅgetvā matthake cumbetvā “varaṃ te putta demī”ti vutte
atk-s0401a:975_12: “icchāmahaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavantaṃ temāsaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanto jīvitaṃ
atk-s0401a:975_13: avañjhaṃ kātuṃ, imaṃ me deva varaṃ dehī”ti āha. Na sakkā, tāta, aññaṃ varehīti. Deva,
atk-s0401a:975_14: khattiyānaṃ nāma dve kathā natthi, etadeva me varaṃ dehi, na mama aññena atthoti.
atk-s0401a:975_15: Tāta, buddhānaṃ nāma cittaṃ dujjānaṃ, sace bhagavā na icchissati, mayā dinnepi kiṃ
atk-s0401a:975_16: bhavissatīti? “Sādhu, deva, ahaṃ bhagavato cittaṃ jānissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:976_0: Tena ca samayena bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho hoti, so maṇḍalamāḷe
atk-s0401a:976_1: sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. Te naṃ āhaṃsu – “rājaputta, kasmā āgatosī”ti?
atk-s0401a:976_2: Bhagavantaṃ dassanāya, dassetha me bhagavantanti. Na mayaṃ, rājaputta, icchiticchitakkhaṇe
atk-s0401a:976_3: satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmāti. Ko pana, bhante, labhatīti? Sumanatthero nāma rājaputtāti.
atk-s0401a:976_4: So “kuhiṃ, bhante, thero”ti? Therassa nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā gantvā vanditvā “icchāmahaṃ,
atk-s0401a:976_5: bhante, bhagavantaṃ passituṃ, dassetha me bhagavanta”nti āha. Thero passantasseva
atk-s0401a:976_6: rājakumārassa āpokasiṇajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā mahāpathaviṃ udakaṃ adhiṭṭhāya pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0401a:976_7: nimujjitvā satthu gandhakuṭiyaṃyeva pāturahosi. Atha naṃ bhagavā “sumana kasmā āgatosī”ti
atk-s0401a:976_8: āha. Rājaputto, bhante, bhagavantaṃ dassanāya āgatoti. Tena hi bhikkhu āsanaṃ paññāpehīti.
atk-s0401a:976_9: Puna thero passantasseva rājakumārassa buddhāsanaṃ gahetvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ nimujjitvā
atk-s0401a:976_10: bahipariveṇe pātubhavitvā pariveṇe āsanaṃ paññāpesi. Rājakumāro imāni dve acchariyākārāni
atk-s0401a:977_0: Bhagavāpi gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Rājaputto bhagavantaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0401a:977_1: paṭisanthāraṃ akāsi. “Kadā āgatosi rājaputtā”ti vutte, “bhante, tumhesu gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0401a:977_2: paviṭṭhesu, bhikkhū pana ‘na mayaṃ icchiticchitakkhaṇe bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmā’ti
atk-s0401a:977_3: maṃ therassa santikaṃ pāhesuṃ. Thero pana ekavacaneneva dasseti, thero, bhante, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:977_4: sāsane vallabho maññe”ti. Āma rājakumāra, vallabho esa bhikkhu mayhaṃ sāsaneti. Bhante,
atk-s0401a:977_5: buddhānaṃ sāsane kiṃ katvā vallabhā hontīti? Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:977_6: katvā kumārāti. Bhagavā ahaṃ thero viya buddhasāsane vallabho hotukāmo, sve mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:977_7: bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethāti. Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena. Rājakumāro attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:977_8: gantvā sabbarattiṃ mahāsakkāraṃ sajjetvā satta divasāni khandhāvārabhattaṃ nāma adāsi.
atk-s0401a:978_0: Sattame divase satthāraṃ vanditvā, bhante, mayā pitu santikā temāsaṃ antovassaṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:978_1: paṭijagganavaro laddho, temāsaṃ me vassāvāsaṃ adhivāsethāti. Bhagavā “atthi nu kho
atk-s0401a:978_2: tattha gatena attho”ti oloketvā “atthī”ti disvā “suññāgāre kho, rājakumāra, tathāgatā
atk-s0401a:978_3: abhiramantī”ti āha. Kumāro “aññātaṃ bhagavā aññātaṃ sugatā”ti vatvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:978_4: purimataraṃ gantvā vihāraṃ kāremi, mayā pesite bhikkhusatasahassena saddhiṃ āgacchathā”ti
atk-s0401a:978_5: bhagavantaṃ paṭiññaṃ gāhāpetvā pitu santikaṃ gantvā “dinnā me, deva, bhagavatā paṭiññā,
atk-s0401a:978_6: mayā pahite bhagavantaṃ peseyyathā”ti vatvā pitaraṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā yojane yojane
atk-s0401a:978_7: vihāraṃ kārento vīsayojanasataṃ addhānaṃ gato. Gantvā ca attano nagare vihāraṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:978_8: vicinanto sobhananāmassa kuṭumbikassa uyyānaṃ disvā satasahassena kiṇitvā satasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:978_9: vissajjetvā vihāraṃ kāresi. Tattha bhagavato gandhakuṭiṃ sesabhikkhūnañca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānatthāya
atk-s0401a:978_10: kuṭileṇamaṇḍape kāretvā pākāraparikkhepaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakañca niṭṭhāpetvā pitu santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:979_0: Rājā bhagavantaṃ bhojetvā “bhagavā sumanassa kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ, tumhākaṃ gamanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti
atk-s0401a:979_1: āha. Bhagavā bhikkhusatasahassaparivuto yojane yojane vihāresu vasamāno agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:979_2: Kumāro “satthā āgacchatī”ti sutvā yojanaṃ paccuggantvā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamāno vihāraṃ pavesetvā –
atk-s0401a:982_0: Vihāraṃ niyyādesi. So vassūpanāyikādivase dānaṃ datvā attano puttadāre ca amacce
atk-s0401a:982_1: ca pakkosāpetvā āha – “satthā amhākaṃ santikaṃ dūratova āgato, buddhā ca nāma dhammagarukā
atk-s0401a:982_2: na āmisacakkhukā. Tasmā ahaṃ imaṃ temāsaṃ dve sāṭake nivāsetvā dasa sīlāni samādiyitvā
atk-s0401a:982_3: idheva vasissāmi, tumhe khīṇāsavasatasahassassa imināva nīhārena temāsaṃ dānaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0401a:983_0: So sumanattherassa vasanaṭṭhānasabhāgeyeva ṭhāne vasanto yaṃ thero bhagavato vattaṃ
atk-s0401a:983_1: karoti, taṃ sabbaṃ disvā “imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekantavallabho esa thero, etasseva me ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0401a:983_2: patthetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0401a:983_3: datvā sattame divase bhikkhusatasahassassa pādamūle ticīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0401a:983_4: vanditvā, “bhante, yadetaṃ mayā sattāhaṃ khandhāvāradānato paṭṭhāya puññaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0401a:983_5: taṃ neva sakkasampattiṃ, na mārabrahmasampattiṃ patthayantena, buddhassa pana upaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:983_6: patthentena kataṃ. Tasmā ahampi bhagavā anāgate sumanatthero viya ekassa buddhassa
atk-s0401a:983_7: upaṭṭhāko homī”ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena patiṭṭhahitvā vandi. Satthā tassa anantarāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:983_8: disvā byākaritvā pakkāmi. Kumāro taṃ sutvā “buddhā ca nāma advejjhakathā hontī”ti
atk-s0401a:983_9: dutiyadivase gotamabuddhassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchanto viya ahosi.
atk-s0401a:984_0: So tasmiṃ buddhuppāde vassasatasahassaṃ dānaṃ datvā sagge nibbattitvā kassapabuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:984_1: piṇḍāya carato therassa pattaggahaṇatthaṃ uttarisāṭakaṃ datvā pūjaṃ akāsi. Puna sagge
atk-s0401a:984_2: nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasirājā hutvā uparipāsādavaragato gandhamādanato ākāsena
atk-s0401a:984_3: āgacchante aṭṭha paccekabuddhe disvā nimantāpetvā bhojetvā attano maṅgalauyyāne tesaṃ
atk-s0401a:984_4: aṭṭha paṇṇasālāyo kāretvā tesaṃ nisīdanatthāya attano nivesane aṭṭha sabbaratanamayāni
atk-s0401a:984_5: pīṭhāni ceva maṇiādhārake ca paṭiyādetvā dasa vassasahassāni upaṭṭhānaṃ akāsi. Etāni pākaṭaṭṭhānāni.
atk-s0401a:985_0: Kappasatasahassaṃ pana dānaṃ dadamānova amhākaṃ bodhisattena saddhiṃ tusitapure nibbattitvā
atk-s0401a:985_1: tato cuto amitodanasakkassa gehe nibbatti. Athassa sabbeva ñātake ānandite pamudite
atk-s0401a:985_2: karonto jātoti ānandotveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So anupubbena katābhinikkhamane sammāsambodhiṃ
atk-s0401a:985_3: patvā paṭhamagamanena kapilavatthuṃ āgantvā tato nikkhante bhagavati bhagavato parivāratthaṃ
atk-s0401a:985_4: rājakumāresu pabbajantesu bhaddiyādīhi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0401a:985_5: nacirasseva āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa santike dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0401a:986_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni anibaddhā upaṭṭhākā
atk-s0401a:986_1: ahesuṃ. Ekadā nāgasamālo pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vicari ekadā nāgito, ekadā upavāno,
atk-s0401a:986_2: ekadā sunakkhatto, ekadā cundo samaṇuddeso, ekadā sāgato, ekadā rādho, ekadā meghiyo.
atk-s0401a:986_3: Tattha ekadā bhagavā nāgasamālattherena saddhiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno dvedhāpathaṃ
atk-s0401a:986_4: patto. Thero maggā okkamma “bhagavā ahaṃ iminā maggena gacchāmī”ti āha. Atha naṃ
atk-s0401a:986_5: bhagavā “ehi bhikkhu, iminā maggena gacchāmā”ti āha. So “handa bhagavā tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0401a:986_6: gaṇhatha, ahaṃ iminā maggena gacchāmī”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0401a:986_7: Atha naṃ bhagavā “āhara bhikkhū”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gato. Tassapi bhikkhuno
atk-s0401a:986_8: itarena maggena gacchato corā pattacīvarañceva hariṃsu, sīsañca bhindiṃsu. So “bhagavā
atk-s0401a:986_9: idāni me paṭisaraṇaṃ, na añño”ti cintetvā lohitena galantena bhagavato santikaṃ āgami.
atk-s0401a:986_10: “Kimidaṃ bhikkhū”ti ca vutte taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Atha naṃ bhagavā “mā cinteyi bhikkhu,
atk-s0401a:986_11: etassa kāraṇāyeva taṃ nivārayimhā”ti vatvā samassāsesi.
atk-s0401a:987_0: Ekadā pana bhagavā meghiyattherena saddhiṃ pācīnavaṃse migadāye jantugāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:987_1: Tatrāpi meghiyo jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā nadītīre pāsādikaṃ ambavanaṃ disvā “bhagavā
atk-s0401a:987_2: tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhatha, ahaṃ tasmiṃ ambavane samaṇadhammaṃ karomī”ti vatvā
atk-s0401a:987_3: bhagavatā tikkhattuṃ nivāriyamānopi gantvā akusalavitakkehi anvāsatto paccāgantvā
atk-s0401a:987_4: taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Tampi bhagavā “imameva te kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā nivārayimhā”ti
atk-s0401a:987_5: vatvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Tattha gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0401a:987_6: nisinno bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto bhikkhū āmantesi – “bhikkhave, idānimhi mahallako,
atk-s0401a:987_7: ‘ekacce bhikkhū iminā maggena gacchāmā’ti vutte aññena gacchanti, ekacce mayhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0401a:987_8: bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipanti, mayhaṃ nibaddhupaṭṭhākaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ jānāthā”ti. Bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:987_9: dhammasaṃvego udapādi. Athāyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ,
atk-s0401a:987_10: bhante, tumheyeva patthayamāno satasahassakappādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūrayiṃ,
atk-s0401a:987_11: nanu mādiso mahāpañño upaṭṭhāko nāma vaṭṭati, ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti āha. Taṃ bhagavā
atk-s0401a:987_12: “alaṃ, sāriputta, yassaṃ disāyaṃ tvaṃ viharasi, asuññā ve sā disā, tava hi ovādo
atk-s0401a:987_13: buddhānaṃ ovādasadiso, tena me tayā upaṭṭhākakiccaṃ atthī”ti paṭikkhipi. Eteneva
atk-s0401a:987_14: upāyena mahāmoggallānaṃ ādiṃ katvā asīti mahāsāvakā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Te sabbe bhagavā paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0401a:988_0: Ānandatthero pana tuṇhīyeva nisīdi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “āvuso ānanda, bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0401a:988_1: upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ yācati, tvampi yācāhī”ti. Yācitvā laddhaṭṭhānaṃ nāma, āvuso, kīdisaṃ
atk-s0401a:988_2: hoti, kiṃ maṃ satthā na passati? Sace satthā rocissati, “ānando maṃ upaṭṭhahatū”ti
atk-s0401a:988_3: vakkhatīti. Atha bhagavā “na, bhikkhave, ānando aññehi ussāhetabbo, sayameva jānitvā
atk-s0401a:988_4: maṃ upaṭṭhahissatī”ti āha. Tato bhikkhū “uṭṭhehi, āvuso ānanda, uṭṭhehi, āvuso ānanda,
atk-s0401a:988_5: dasabalaṃ upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ yācāhī”ti āhaṃsu. Thero uṭṭhahitvā cattāro paṭikkhepā
atk-s0401a:988_6: catasso ca āyācanāti aṭṭha vare yāci.
atk-s0401a:989_0: Cattāro paṭikkhepā nāma – “sace me, bhante, bhagavā attanā laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ
atk-s0401a:989_1: na dassati, piṇḍapātaṃ na dassati, ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasituṃ na dassati, nimantanaṃ
atk-s0401a:989_2: gahetvā na gamissati, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vatvā “kaṃ panettha, ānanda,
atk-s0401a:989_3: ādīnavaṃ addasā”ti vutte āha – “sacāhaṃ, bhante, imāni vatthūni labhissāmi, bhavissanti
atk-s0401a:989_4: vattāro ‘ānando dasabalena laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati, piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjati,
atk-s0401a:989_5: ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasati, ekato nimantanaṃ gacchati. Etaṃ lābhaṃ labhanto tathāgataṃ
atk-s0401a:989_6: upaṭṭhāti, ko evaṃ upaṭṭhahato bhāro”’ti? Ime cattāro paṭikkhepe yāci.
atk-s0401a:990_0: Catasso āyācanā nāma – “sace, bhante, bhagavā mayā gahitanimantanaṃ gamissati, sacāhaṃ
atk-s0401a:990_1: tiroraṭṭhā tirojanapadā bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgataṃ parisaṃ āgatakkhaṇeyeva bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0401a:990_2: dassetuṃ lacchāmi, yadā me kaṅkhā uppajjati, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ
atk-s0401a:990_3: lacchāmi, tathā yaṃ bhagavā mayhaṃ parammukhe dhammaṃ deseti, taṃ āgantvā mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:990_4: kathessati, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vatvā “kaṃ panettha, ānanda, ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0401a:990_5: passasī”ti vutte āha – “idha, bhante, saddhā kulaputtā bhagavato okāsaṃ alabhantā
atk-s0401a:990_6: maṃ evaṃ vadanti ‘sve, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā saddhiṃ amhākaṃ ghare bhikkhaṃ gaṇheyyāthā’ti.
atk-s0401a:990_7: Sace bhagavā tattha na gamissati, icchiticchitakkhaṇeyeva parisaṃ dassetuṃ, kaṅkhañca
atk-s0401a:990_8: vinodetuṃ okāsaṃ na lacchāmi, bhavissanti vattāro ‘kiṃ ānando dasabalaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0401a:990_9: Ettakampissa bhagavā anuggahaṃ na karotī’ti. Bhagavato ca parammukhā maṃ pucchissanti
atk-s0401a:990_10: ‘ayaṃ, āvuso ānanda, gāthā, idaṃ suttaṃ, idaṃ jātakaṃ kattha desita’nti. Sacāhaṃ
atk-s0401a:990_11: taṃ na sampādayissāmi, bhavissanti vattāro – ‘ettakampi, āvuso, na jānāsi, kasmā
atk-s0401a:990_12: tvaṃ chāyā viya bhagavantaṃ avijahanto dīgharattaṃ vicarasī’ti. Tenāhaṃ parammukhā
atk-s0401a:990_13: desitassapi dhammassa puna kathanaṃ icchāmī”ti. Imā catasso āyācanā yāci. Bhagavāpissa adāsi.
atk-s0401a:991_0: Evaṃ ime aṭṭha vare gahetvā nibaddhupaṭṭhāko ahosi. Tasseva ṭhānantarassa atthāya
atk-s0401a:991_1: kappasatasahassaṃ pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇi. So upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhadivasato
atk-s0401a:991_2: paṭṭhāya dasabalassa duvidhena udakena tividhena dantakaṭṭhena hatthapādaparikammena
atk-s0401a:991_3: piṭṭhiparikammena gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ sammajjanenāti evamādīhi kiccehi upaṭṭhahanto
atk-s0401a:991_4: “imāya nāma velāya satthu imaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti divasabhāgaṃ
atk-s0401a:991_5: santikāvacaro hutvā rattibhāgasamanantare daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā ekarattiṃ gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:991_6: nava vāre anupariyāyati. Evañhissa ahosi – “sace me thinamiddhaṃ okkameyya, dasabale
atk-s0401a:991_7: pakkosante paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ na sakkuṇeyya”nti. Tasmā sabbarattiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ hatthena
atk-s0401a:991_8: na muñcati. Idamettakaṃ vatthu. Aparabhāge pana satthā jetavane viharanto anekapariyāyena
atk-s0401a:991_9: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaānandattherassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā theraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane bahussutānaṃ
atk-s0401a:991_10: satimantānaṃ gatimantānaṃ dhitimantānaṃ upaṭṭhākānañca bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:993_0: 224. Dutiye mahāparisānanti mahāparivārānaṃ uruvelakassapo aggoti dasseti. Aññesañhi
atk-s0401a:993_1: therānaṃ kañci kālaṃ parivāro mahā hoti kañci kālaṃ appo, imassa pana therassa dvīhi
atk-s0401a:993_2: bhātikehi saddhiṃ ekaṃ samaṇasahassaṃ nibaddhaparivārova ahosi. Tesu ekekasmiṃ ekekaṃ
atk-s0401a:993_3: pabbājente dve samaṇasahassāni honti, dve dve pabbājente tīṇi sahassāni honti. Tasmā
atk-s0401a:993_4: so mahāparivārānaṃ aggo nāma jāto. Kassapoti panassa gottaṃ. Uruvelāyaṃ pabbajitattā
atk-s0401a:994_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:994_1: kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vayappatto satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:994_2: bhikkhuṃ mahāparisānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ
atk-s0401a:994_3: vaṭṭatī”ti sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā ticīvarena
atk-s0401a:994_4: acchādetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā mahāparisānaṃ aggabhāvatthaṃ patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthā
atk-s0401a:994_5: anantarāyaṃ disvā anāgate gotamabuddhassa sāsane mahāparisānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:995_0: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvenavutikappamatthake
atk-s0401a:995_1: phussabuddhassa vemātikakaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatto, pitā mahindarājā nāma. Apare
atk-s0401a:995_2: panassa dve kaniṭṭhabhātaro ahesuṃ. Evaṃ te tayo bhātaro visuṃ visuṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0401a:995_3: labhiṃsu. Te heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva kupitaṃ paccantaṃ vūpasametvā pitu santikā varaṃ
atk-s0401a:995_4: labhitvā “temāsaṃ dasabalaṃ paṭijaggissāmā”ti varaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ etadahosi
atk-s0401a:995_5: – “amhehi dasabalaṃ paṭijaggantehi anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ekaṃ amaccaṃ uppādakaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:995_6: ṭhapetvā ekaṃ āyavayajānanakaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa parivesakaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:995_7: ṭhapetvā attanā dasa sīlāni samādāya temāsaṃ sikkhāpadāni rakkhiṃsu. Te tayo amaccā
atk-s0401a:995_8: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bimbisāravisākharaṭṭhapālā jātā.
atk-s0401a:996_0: Te pana rājakumārā vutthavasse dasabale sahatthā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paccayapūjāya
atk-s0401a:996_1: pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā amhākaṃ dasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva
atk-s0401a:996_2: brāhamaṇakule nibbattitvā attano gottavasena tayopi janā kassapā eva nāma jātā. Te
atk-s0401a:996_3: vayappattā tayo vede uggaṇhiṃsu. Tesaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa pañca māṇavakasatāni parivāro
atk-s0401a:996_4: ahosi, majjhimassa tīṇi, kaniṭṭhassa dve. Te attano ganthe sāraṃ olokentā diṭṭhadhammikameva
atk-s0401a:996_5: passiṃsu, na samparāyikaṃ. Atha nesaṃ jeṭṭhabhātā attano parivārena saddhiṃ uruvelaṃ
atk-s0401a:996_6: gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā uruvelakassapo nāma jāto, mahāgaṅgānadīvaṅke pabbajito
atk-s0401a:996_7: nadīkassapo nāma jāto, gayāsīse pabbajito gayākassapo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:997_0: Evaṃ tesu isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tattha vasantesu bahūnaṃ divasānaṃ accayena amhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:997_1: bodhisatto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo anukkamena dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0401a:997_2: pavattetvā pañcavaggiye there arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā yasadārakappamukhe pañcapaññāsa
atk-s0401a:997_3: sahāyakepi vinetvā saṭṭhi arahante “caratha, bhikkhave, cārika”nti bahujanahitāya
atk-s0401a:997_4: cārikaṃ pesetvā bhaddavaggiye vinetvā uruvelakassapassa hetuṃ disvā “mayi gate tayo
atk-s0401a:997_5: bhātikā saparivārā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissantī”ti ñatvā ekako adutiyo uruvelakassapassa
atk-s0401a:997_6: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vasanatthāya agyāgāraṃ yācitvā tattha kataṃ nāgadamanaṃ ādiṃ
atk-s0401a:997_7: katvā aḍḍhuḍḍhasahassehi pāṭihāriyehi uruvelakassapaṃ saparivāraṃ vinetvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0401a:997_8: Tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ ñatvā itarepi dve bhātaro saparivārā āgantvā pabbajiṃsu, sabbepi
atk-s0401a:998_0: Satthā taṃ samaṇasahassaṃ ādāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā piṭṭhipāsāṇe nisinno “kathaṃrūpā
atk-s0401a:998_1: nu kho etesaṃ dhammadesanā sappāyā”ti olokento “ime aggiṃ paricarantā vicariṃsu,
atk-s0401a:998_2: imesaṃ tayo bhave ādittāgārasadise katvā dassetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ādittapariyāyasuttaṃ
atk-s0401a:998_3: desesi. Desanāpariyosāne sabbeva arahattaṃ pattā. Satthā tehi parivuto pubbe bimbisārarañño
atk-s0401a:998_4: dinnapaṭiññattā rājagahanagare laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ agamāsi. Rājā dasabalassa āgatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:998_5: sutvā dvādasanahutehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0401a:998_6: ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā sabbāvantaṃ parisaṃ oloketvā mahājanaṃ uruvelakassapassa
atk-s0401a:998_7: nipaccakāraṃ karontaṃ disvā “ime mayhaṃ vā kassapassa vā mahantabhāvaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0401a:998_8: savitakkā ca nāma desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkontī”ti cintetvā, “kassapa, tuyhaṃ
atk-s0401a:998_9: upaṭṭhākānaṃ vitakkaṃ chindā”ti therassa saññaṃ adāsi. Thero satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0401a:998_10: uṭṭhāyāsanā satthāraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā tālappamāṇaṃ ākāsaṃ uppatitvā iddhivikubbanaṃ
atk-s0401a:998_11: dassetvā “satthā me, bhante, bhagavā, sāvakohamasmi, satthā me, bhante, bhagavā,
atk-s0401a:998_12: sāvakohamasmī”ti vatvā oruyha dasabalassa pāde vandi. Etenupāyena sattame vāre sattatālappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:998_13: ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā puna āgantvā dasabalassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:999_0: Tasmiṃ kāle mahājano “ayaṃ loke mahāsamaṇo”ti satthari nibbitakko jāto, athassa satthā
atk-s0401a:999_1: dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne rājā ekādasanahutehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:999_2: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito, ekanahutaṃ upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesi. Tepi uruvelakassapassa
atk-s0401a:999_3: parivārā sahassamattā bhikkhū attano āsevanavasena cintesuṃ – “amhākaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ
atk-s0401a:999_4: matthakaṃ pattaṃ, bahi gantvā kiṃ karissāmā”ti uruvelakassapattheraṃyeva parivāretvā
atk-s0401a:999_5: vicariṃsu. Tesu ekekasmiṃ ekekaṃ nissitakaṃ gaṇhante dve sahassāni honti, dve dve
atk-s0401a:999_6: gaṇhante tīṇi sahassāni honti. Tato paṭṭhāya yattakā tesaṃ nissitakā, tattake kathetuṃ
atk-s0401a:999_7: vaṭṭatīti. Idamettha vatthu. Aparabhāge pana satthā jetavane viharanto theraṃ mahāparisānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1001: 225. Tatiye kulappasādakānanti kulaṃ pasādentānaṃ. Ayaṃ hi thero adiṭṭhabuddhadassanaṃyeva suddhodanamahārājassa nivesanaṃ pasādesi, tasmā kulappasādakānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:1002_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:1002_1: kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ kulappasādakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1002_2: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0401a:1002_3: kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bodhisattassa mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase
atk-s0401a:1002_4: kapilavatthusmiṃyeva amaccagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Jātadivase bodhisattena saddhiṃyeva
atk-s0401a:1002_5: jātoti taṃdivasaṃyeva taṃ dukūlacumbuṭake nipajjāpetvā bodhisattassa upaṭṭhānatthāya
atk-s0401a:1002_6: nayiṃsu. Bodhisattena hi saddhiṃ bodhirukkho rāhulamātā catasso nidhikumbhiyo ārohaniyahatthī
atk-s0401a:1002_7: kaṇḍako channo kāḷudāyīti ime satta ekadivase jātattā sahajātā nāma ahesuṃ. Athassa
atk-s0401a:1002_8: nāmaggahaṇadivase sakalanagarassa udaggacittadivase jātoti udāyītveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1002_9: Thokaṃ kāḷadhātukattā pana kāḷudāyī nāma jāto. So bodhisattena saddhiṃ kumārakīḷaṃ
atk-s0401a:1003_0: Aparabhāge bodhisatto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā
atk-s0401a:1003_1: pavattitavaradhammacakko lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharati. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:1003_2: samaye suddhodanamahārājā “siddhatthakumāro abhisambodhiṃ patvā rājagahaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0401a:1003_3: veḷuvane viharatī”ti sutvā purisasahassaparivāraṃ ekaṃ amaccaṃ “puttaṃ me idha ānehī”ti
atk-s0401a:1003_4: pesesi. So saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ gantvā dasabalassa catuparisamajjhe nisīditvā dhammadesanāvelāya
atk-s0401a:1003_5: vihāraṃ pāvisi. So “tiṭṭhatu tāva raññā pahitasāsana”nti parisapariyante ṭhito satthu
atk-s0401a:1003_6: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yathāṭhitova saddhiṃ purisasahassehi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Atha nesaṃ
atk-s0401a:1003_7: satthā “etha bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi, sabbe taṃkhaṇaṃyeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā
atk-s0401a:1003_8: vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ. Arahattaṃ pattakālato paṭṭhāya pana ariyā nāma majjhattāva
atk-s0401a:1003_9: hontīti raññā pahitasāsanaṃ dasabalassa na kathesi. Rājā “neva gato āgacchati, na
atk-s0401a:1003_10: sāsanaṃ suyyatī”ti “ehi, tāta, tvaṃ gacchā”ti teneva niyāmena aññaṃ amaccaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0401a:1003_11: Sopi gantvā purimanayeneva saddhiṃ parisāya arahattaṃ patvā tuṇhī ahosi. Evaṃ navahi
atk-s0401a:1003_12: amaccehi saddhiṃ nava purisasahassāni pesesi. Sabbe attano kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1004_0: Atha rājā cintesi – “ettakā janā mayi sinehābhāvena dasabalassa idhāgamanatthāya
atk-s0401a:1004_1: na kiñci kathayiṃsu, aññe gantvāpi dasabalaṃ ānetuṃ na sakkhissanti. Mayhaṃ kho pana
atk-s0401a:1004_2: putto udāyī dasabalena saddhiṃ ekavayo sahapaṃsukīḷiko, mayi cassa sineho atthī”ti
atk-s0401a:1004_3: kāḷudāyiṃ pakkosāpetvā, “tāta, purisasahassaparivāro gantvā dasabalaṃ ānehī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1004_4: Paṭhamaṃ gatapurisā viya pabbajituṃ labhanto ānessāmi, devāti. Yaṃkiñci katvā mama
atk-s0401a:1004_5: puttaṃ dassehīti. “Sādhu, devā”ti rañño sāsanaṃ ādāya rājagahaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanāvelāya
atk-s0401a:1004_6: parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ sutvā saparivāro arahattaphalaṃ patvā ehibhikkhubhāve
atk-s0401a:1004_7: patiṭṭhāsi. Tato cintesi – “na tāva dasabalassa kulanagaraṃ gantuṃ esa kālo, vasantasamaye
atk-s0401a:1004_8: supupphitesu vanasaṇḍesu haritatiṇasañchannāya pathaviyā esa kālo bhavissatī”ti kālaṃ
atk-s0401a:1006: Saddalā haritā bhūmi, esa kālo mahāmunī”ti. –
atk-s0401a:1007_0: Saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi dasabalassa kulanagaraṃ gamanatthāya gamanavaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0401a:1007_1: Satthā “udāyī gamanavaṇṇaṃ katheti, kapilavatthunagaraṃ gantuṃ esa kālo”ti vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivāro
atk-s0401a:1008_0: Udāyitthero satthu nikkhantabhāvaṃ ñatvā “pitu mahārājassa saññaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0401a:1008_1: vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rañño nivesane pāturahosi. Suddhodanamahārājā theraṃ disvā tuṭṭhacitto
atk-s0401a:1008_2: mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano paṭiyāditassa nānaggarasabhojanassa pattaṃ pūretvā
atk-s0401a:1008_3: adāsi. Thero uṭṭhāya gamanākappaṃ dassesi. Nisīditvāva bhuñja, tātāti. Satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1008_4: gantvā bhuñjissāmi, mahārājāti. Kahaṃ pana, tāta, satthāti? Vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivāro
atk-s0401a:1008_5: tumhākaṃ dassanatthāya cārikaṃ nikkhanto, mahārājāti. Tumhe imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0401a:1008_6: yāva mama putto imaṃ nagaraṃ sampāpuṇāti, tāvassa itova piṇḍapātaṃ harathāti. Thero
atk-s0401a:1008_7: bhattakiccaṃ katvā dasabalassa āharitabbaṃ bhattaṃ gahetvā dhammakathaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0401a:1008_8: dasabalassa adassaneneva sakalarājanivesanaṃ saddhāpaṭilābhaṃ labhāpetvā sabbesaṃ
atk-s0401a:1008_9: passantānaññeva pattaṃ ākāse vissajjetvā sayampi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0401a:1008_10: ādāya satthu hatthe ṭhapesi, satthā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñji. Thero saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0401a:1008_11: yojanaparamaṃ gacchantassa satthuno divase divase rājagehato bhattaṃ āharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1008_12: Evaṃ vatthu veditabbaṃ. Atha aparabhāge satthā “mayhaṃ pitu mahārājassa sakalanivesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1010: 226. Catutthe appābādhānanti nirābādhānaṃ. Bākuloti dvīsu kulesu vaḍḍhitattā evaṃladdhanāmo thero.
atk-s0401a:1011_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayaṃ kira atīte ito kappasatasahassādhike asaṅkhyeyyamatthake
atk-s0401a:1011_1: anomadassidasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva brāhmaṇakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā vayaṃ
atk-s0401a:1011_2: āgamma uggahitavedo vedattaye sāraṃ apassanto “samparāyikatthaṃ gavesissāmī”ti pabbatapāde
atk-s0401a:1011_3: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañcābhiññā-aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī hutvā jhānakīḷitāya vītināmesi.
atk-s0401a:1011_4: Tasmiṃ samaye anomadassī bodhisatto sabbaññutaṃ patvā ariyagaṇaparivuto cārikaṃ carati.
atk-s0401a:1011_5: Tāpaso “tīṇi ratanāni uppannānī”ti sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0401a:1011_6: saraṇesu patiṭṭhito, attano ṭhānaṃ pana vijahituṃ nāsakkhi. So kālena kālaṃ satthu
atk-s0401a:1012_0: Athekasmiṃ samaye tathāgatassa udaravāto uppajji. Tāpaso satthu dassanatthāya āgato
atk-s0401a:1012_1: “satthā gilāno”ti sutvā “ko, bhante, ābādho”ti. “Udaravāto”ti vutte “ayaṃ kālo mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:1012_2: puññaṃ kātu”nti pabbatapādaṃ gantvā nānāvidhāni bhesajjāni samodhānetvā “idaṃ bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:1012_3: satthu upanethā”ti upaṭṭhākattherassa adāsi. Saha bhesajjassa upayogena udaravāto
atk-s0401a:1012_4: paṭippassambhi. So satthu phāsukakāle gantvā evamāha – “bhante, yadidaṃ mama bhesajjena
atk-s0401a:1012_5: tathāgatassa phāsukaṃ jātaṃ, tassa me nissandena nibbattanibbattabhave gaddūhanamattampi
atk-s0401a:1012_6: sarīre byādhi nāma mā hotū”ti. Idamassa tasmiṃ attabhāve kalyāṇakammaṃ.
atk-s0401a:1013_0: So tato cuto brahmaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto padumuttarabuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:1013_1: haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ appābādhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1013_2: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0401a:1013_3: kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassīdasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva
atk-s0401a:1013_4: bandhumatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatto purimanayeneva isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānalābhī
atk-s0401a:1014_1: upanissāya pitu mahārājassa saṅgahaṃ karonto kheme migadāye viharati. Athāyaṃ tāpaso
atk-s0401a:1014_2: dasabalassa loke nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgantvā satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā saraṇesu
atk-s0401a:1014_3: patiṭṭhāsi, attano pabbajjaṃ jahituṃ nāsakkhi, kālena kālaṃ pana satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0401a:1015_0: Athekasmiṃ samaye ṭhapetvā satthārañceva dve aggasāvake ca himavati pupphitānaṃ visarukkhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1015_1: vātasamphassena sesabhikkhūnaṃ matthakarogo nāma udapādi. Tāpaso satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1015_2: āgato bhikkhū sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipanne disvā – “kiṃ, bhante, bhikkhusaṅghassa aphāsuka”nti
atk-s0401a:1015_3: pucchi. Bhikkhūnaṃ tiṇapupphakarogo, āvusoti. Tāpaso cintesi – “ayaṃ kālo mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:1015_4: bhikkhusaṅghassa kāyaveyyāvatikakammaṃ katvā puññaṃ nibbattetu”nti attano ānubhāvena
atk-s0401a:1015_5: nānāvidhāni bhesajjāni saṃkaḍḍhitvā yojetvā adāsi. Sabbabhikkhūnaṃ rogo taṃkhaṇaṃyeva vūpasanto.
atk-s0401a:1016_0: So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā brahmaloke nibbattitvā ekanavutikappe devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0401a:1016_1: kassapabuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto “mayhaṃ vasanagehaṃ
atk-s0401a:1016_2: dubbalaṃ, paccantaṃ gantvā dabbasambhāraṃ āharitvā gehaṃ karissāmī”ti vaḍḍhakīhi
atk-s0401a:1016_3: saddhiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge ekaṃ jiṇṇaṃ mahāvihāraṃ disvā “tiṭṭhatu tāva mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:1016_4: gehakammaṃ, na taṃ mayā saddhiṃ gamissati, yaṃkiñci katvā pana saddhiṃ gamanakammameva
atk-s0401a:1016_5: puretaraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti teheva vaḍḍhakīhi dabbasambhāraṃ gāhāpetvā tasmiṃ vihāre
atk-s0401a:1016_6: uposathāgāraṃ kāresi, bhojanasālaṃ aggisālaṃ dīghacaṅkamaṃ jantāgharaṃ kappiyakuṭiṃ
atk-s0401a:1016_7: vaccakuṭiṃ ārogyasālaṃ kāresi, yaṃkiñci bhikkhusaṅghassa upabhogaparibhogaṃ bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:1017_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:1017_1: nibbattito puretarameva kosambiyaṃ seṭṭhigehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇadivasato
atk-s0401a:1017_2: paṭṭhāya taṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ lābhaggayasaggappattaṃ ahosi. Athassa mātā puttaṃ vijāyitvā
atk-s0401a:1017_3: cintesi – “ayaṃ dārako puññavā katādhikāro, yattakaṃ kālaṃ arogo dīghāyuko hutvā
atk-s0401a:1017_4: tiṭṭhati, tattakaṃ amhākaṃ sampattidāyako bhavissati. Jātadivaseyeva mahāyamunāya
atk-s0401a:1017_5: nhātadārakā nirogā hontī”ti nhāpanatthāya naṃ pesesi. “Pañcame divase sīsaṃ nhāpetvā
atk-s0401a:1017_6: nadīkīḷanatthāya naṃ pesesī”ti majjhimabhāṇakā. Tattha dhātiyā dārakaṃ nimujjanummujjanavasena
atk-s0401a:1017_7: kīḷāpentiyā eko maccho dārakaṃ disvā “bhakkho me aya”nti maññamāno mukhaṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0401a:1017_8: upagato. Dhātī dārakaṃ chaḍḍetvā palātā, maccho taṃ gili. Puññavā satto dukkhaṃ na
atk-s0401a:1017_9: pāpuṇi, sayanagabbhaṃ pavisitvā nipanno viya ahosi. Maccho dārakassa tejena tattaphālaṃ
atk-s0401a:1017_10: gilitvā ḍayhamāno viya vegena tiṃsayojanaṃ gantvā bārāṇasinagaravāsino macchabandhassa
atk-s0401a:1017_11: jālaṃ pāvisi. Mahāmacchā nāma jālena baddhā māriyamānāva maranti, ayaṃ pana dārakassa
atk-s0401a:1017_12: tejena jālato nīhaṭamattova mato. Macchabandhā ca mahāmacchaṃ labhitvā phāletvā vikkiṇanti,
atk-s0401a:1017_13: taṃ pana dārakassa ānubhāvena aphāletvā sakalameva kājena haritvā “sahassena demā”ti
atk-s0401a:1017_14: vadantā nagare vicariṃsu, koci na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0401a:1018_0: Tasmiṃ pana nagare aputtakaṃ asītikoṭivibhavaṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ atthi. Tassa dvāramūlaṃ
atk-s0401a:1018_1: patvā “kiṃ gahetvā dethā”ti vuttā “kahāpaṇa”nti āhaṃsu. Tehi kahāpaṇaṃ datvā gahito.
atk-s0401a:1018_2: Seṭṭhibhariyāpi aññesu divasesu macche na keḷāyati, taṃdivasaṃ pana macchaṃ phalake
atk-s0401a:1018_3: ṭhapetvā sayameva phālesi. Macchañca nāma kucchito phālenti, sā pana piṭṭhito phālentī
atk-s0401a:1018_4: macchakucchiyaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ dārakaṃ disvā “macchakucchiyaṃ me putto laddho”ti nādaṃ
atk-s0401a:1018_5: naditvā dārakaṃ ādāya sāmikassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Seṭṭhi tāvadeva bheriṃ carāpetvā
atk-s0401a:1018_6: dārakamādāya rañño santikaṃ gantvā “macchakucchiyaṃ me, deva, dārako laddho, kiṃ
atk-s0401a:1018_7: karomā”ti āha. Puññavā esa, yo macchakucchiyaṃ ārogo vasi, posehi nanti.
atk-s0401a:1019_0: Assosi kho itaraṃ kulaṃ “bārāṇasiyaṃ kira ekaṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ macchakucchiyaṃ dārakaṃ
atk-s0401a:1019_1: labhī”ti. Te tattha agamaṃsu. Athassa mātā dārakaṃ alaṅkaritvā kīḷāpiyamānaṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:1019_2: “manāpo vatāyaṃ dārako”ti gahetvā pakatiṃ ācikkhi. Itarā “mayhaṃ putto”ti āha. Kahaṃ
atk-s0401a:1019_3: te laddhoti. Macchakucchiyanti. Na tuyhaṃ putto, mayhaṃ puttoti. Kahaṃ te laddhoti.
atk-s0401a:1019_4: Mayā dasa māse kucchiyā dhārito, atha naṃ nadiyā kīḷāpiyamānaṃ maccho gilīti. Tuyhaṃ
atk-s0401a:1019_5: putto aññena macchena gilito bhavissati, ayaṃ pana mayā macchakucchiyaṃ laddhoti
atk-s0401a:1019_6: ubhopi rājakulaṃ agamaṃsu. Rājā āha – “ayaṃ dasa māse kucchiyā dhāritattā amātā kātuṃ
atk-s0401a:1019_7: na sakkā, macchaṃ gaṇhantāpi vakkayakanādīni bahi katvā gaṇhantā nāma natthīti macchakucchiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1019_8: laddhattā ayampi amātā kātuṃ na sakkā, dārako ubhinnampi kulānaṃ dāyādo hotū”ti.
atk-s0401a:1019_9: Tato paṭṭhāya dvepi kulāni ativiya lābhaggayasaggappattāni ahesuṃ. Tassa dvīhi kulehi
atk-s0401a:1020_0: Tassa viññutaṃ pattassa dvīsupi nagaresu tayo tayo pāsāde kāretvā nāṭakāni paccupaṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1020_1: Ekekasmiṃ nagare cattāro cattāro māse vasati. Ekasmiṃ nagare cattāro māse vutthassa
atk-s0401a:1020_2: saṅghāṭanāvāsu maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā tattha naṃ saddhiṃ nāṭakehi āropenti. So sampattiṃ
atk-s0401a:1020_3: anubhavamāno catūhi māsehi itaraṃ nagaraṃ gacchati. Taṃnagaravāsīni nāṭakāni “dvīhi
atk-s0401a:1020_4: māsehi upaḍḍhamaggaṃ āgato bhavissatī”ti paccuggantvā taṃ parivāretvā dvīhi māsehi
atk-s0401a:1020_5: attano nagaraṃ nenti, itarāni nāṭakāni nivattitvā attano nagarameva gacchanti. Tattha
atk-s0401a:1020_6: cattāro māse vasitvā teneva niyāmena puna itaraṃ nagaraṃ gacchati. Evamassa sampattiṃ
atk-s0401a:1021_0: Tasmiṃ samaye amhākaṃ bodhisatto sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anukkamena
atk-s0401a:1021_1: cārikaṃ caramāno kosambiṃ pāpuṇi, bārāṇasinti majjhimabhāṇakā. Bākulo seṭṭhipi kho
atk-s0401a:1021_2: “dasabalo āgato”ti sutvā bahuṃ gandhamālaṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0401a:1021_3: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. So sattāhameva puthujjano hutvā aṭṭhame aruṇe saha
atk-s0401a:1021_4: paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Athassa dvīsu nagaresu gihikāle paricārikamātugāmā
