atk-s0401a:1021_5: attano kulagharāni āgantvā tattha vasamānā cīvarāni katvā pahiṇiṃsu. Thero ekaṃ addhamāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:1021_6: kosambivāsikehi pahitaṃ cīvaraṃ bhuñjati, ekaṃ addhamāsaṃ bārāṇasivāsikehīti. Eteneva
atk-s0401a:1021_7: niyāmena dvīsupi nagaresu yaṃ yaṃ uttamaṃ, taṃ taṃ therasseva āhariyati. Therassa
atk-s0401a:1021_8: asīti vassāni agāramajjhe vasantassa dvīhaṅgulehi gandhapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā upasiṅghanamattampi
atk-s0401a:1021_9: kālaṃ na koci ābādho nāma ahosi. Āsītime vasse sukheneva pabbajjaṃ upagato. Pabbajitassāpissa
atk-s0401a:1021_10: appamattakopi ābādho vā catūhi paccayehi vekallaṃ vā nāhosi. So pacchime kāle parinibbānasamayepi
atk-s0401a:1021_12: bākulasuttaṃ kathetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Evaṃ aṭṭhuppatti
atk-s0401a:1021_13: samuṭṭhitā. Satthā pana therassa dharamānakāleyeva there yathā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare
atk-s0401a:1021_14: ṭhapento bākulattheraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane appābādhānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1023_0: 227. Pañcame pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantānanti pubbe nivutthakkhandhasantānaṃ anussaraṇasamatthānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1023_1: sobhitatthero aggoti dasseti. So kira pubbenivāsaṃ anupaṭipāṭiyā anussaramāno pañca
atk-s0401a:1023_2: kappasatāni asaññibhave acittakapaṭisandhiṃ nayato aggahesi ākāse padaṃ dassento
atk-s0401a:1023_3: viya. Tasmā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:1024_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:1024_1: kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā vayappatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:1024_2: bhikkhuṃ pubbenivāsañāṇalābhīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1024_3: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0401a:1024_4: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, sobhitotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1025_0: So aparena samayena satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1025_1: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā pubbenivāsañāṇe ciṇṇavasī ahosi. So anupaṭipāṭiyā attano
atk-s0401a:1025_2: nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ anussaranto yāva asaññibhave acittakapaṭisandhi, tāva paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1025_3: addasa. Tato paraṃ antare pañca kappasatāni pavattiṃ adisvā avasāne cutiṃ disvā “kiṃ
atk-s0401a:1025_4: nāmeta”nti āvajjamāno nayavasena “asaññibhavo bhavissatī”ti niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi. Satthā
atk-s0401a:1025_5: imaṃ kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1027_0: 228. Chaṭṭhe vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālīti vinayadharānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upālitthero
atk-s0401a:1027_1: aggoti dasseti. Thero kira tathāgatasseva santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1027_2: vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tathāgatasseva santike vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhitvā bhārukacchakavatthuṃ,
atk-s0401a:1027_3: ajjukavatthuṃ, kumārakassapavatthunti imāni tīṇi vatthūni sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1027_4: saṃsandetvā kathesi. Tasmā vinayadharānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:1028_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – padumuttarabuddhakāle kiresa haṃsavatiyaṃ kulaghare
atk-s0401a:1028_1: nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayadharānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1028_2: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0401a:1028_3: kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kappakagehe paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1028_4: gaṇhi, upālidārakotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto channaṃ khattiyānaṃ pasādhako
atk-s0401a:1028_5: hutvā tathāgate anupiyambavane viharante pabbajjatthāya nikkhamantehi teti chahi
atk-s0401a:1028_6: khattiyehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Tassa pabbajjāvidhānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva.
atk-s0401a:1029_0: So pabbajitvā upasampanno satthāraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā “mayhaṃ, bhante, araññavāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:1029_1: anujānāthā”ti āha. Bhikkhu tava araññe vasantassa ekameva dhuraṃ vaḍḍhissati, amhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:1029_2: pana santike vasantassa vipassanādhurañca ganthadhurañca paripūressatīti. Thero satthu
atk-s0401a:1029_3: vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Atha
atk-s0401a:1029_4: naṃ satthā sayameva sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhāpesi. So aparabhāge heṭṭhā vuttāni
atk-s0401a:1029_5: tīṇi vatthūni vinicchini. Satthā ekekasmiṃ vinicchite sādhukāraṃ datvā tayopi vinicchaye
atk-s0401a:1029_6: aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1031: 229. Sattame bhikkhunovādakānaṃ yadidaṃ nandakoti ayaṃ hi thero dhammakathaṃ kathento ekasamodhāne pañca bhikkhunīsatāni arahattaṃ pāpesi. Tasmā bhikkhunovādakānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:1032_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayañhi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:1032_1: kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhunovādakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1032_2: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0401a:1032_3: kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1032_4: gahetvā vayappatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho satthu santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0401a:1032_5: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, pubbenivāsañāṇe ca ciṇṇavasī ahosi. So catūsu
atk-s0401a:1032_6: parisāsu sampattāsu “sabbesaṃyeva manaṃ gahetvā kathetuṃ sakkotī”ti dhammakathikanandako
atk-s0401a:1032_7: nāma jāto. Tathāgatopi kho rohiṇīnadītīre cumbaṭakakalahe nikkhamitvā pabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1032_8: pañcannaṃ sākiyakumārasatānaṃ anabhiratiyā uppannāya te bhikkhū ādāya kuṇāladahaṃ
atk-s0401a:1032_9: gantvā kuṇālajātakakathāya nesaṃ saṃviggabhāvaṃ ñatvā catusaccakathaṃ kathetvā sotāpattiphale
atk-s0401a:1032_10: patiṭṭhāpesi. Aparabhāge mahāsamayasuttaṃ kathetvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpesi. Tesaṃ
atk-s0401a:1032_11: therānaṃ purāṇadutiyikā “amhe dāni idha kiṃ karissāmā”ti vatvā sabbāva ekacittā hutvā
atk-s0401a:1032_12: mahāpajāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu. Tāpi pañcasatā theriyā santike pabbajjañca
atk-s0401a:1032_13: upasampadañca labhiṃsu. Atītānantarāya pana jātiyā sabbāva tā nandakattherassa rājaputtabhāve
atk-s0401a:1033_0: Tena samayena satthā “bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantū”ti āha. Thero attano vāre sampatte
atk-s0401a:1033_1: tāsaṃ purimabhave attano pādaparicārikabhāvaṃ ñatvā cintesi – “maṃ imassa bhikkhunīsaṅghassa
atk-s0401a:1033_2: majjhe nisinnaṃ upamāyo ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā dhammaṃ kathayamānaṃ disvā añño pubbenivāsañāṇalābhī
atk-s0401a:1033_3: bhikkhu imaṃ kāraṇaṃ oloketvā ‘āyasmā nandako yāvajjadivasā orodhe na vissajjeti,
atk-s0401a:1033_4: sobhatāyamāyasmā orodhaparivuto’ti vattabbaṃ maññeyyā”ti. Tasmā sayaṃ agantvā aññaṃ
atk-s0401a:1033_5: bhikkhuṃ pesesi. Tā pana pañcasatā bhikkhuniyo therasseva ovādaṃ paccāsīsanti. Iminā
atk-s0401a:1033_6: kāraṇena bhagavā “attano vāre sampatte aññaṃ apesetvā sayameva gantvā bhikkhunīsaṅghaṃ
atk-s0401a:1033_7: ovadāhī”ti theraṃ āha. So satthu kathaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkonto attano vāre sampatte
atk-s0401a:1033_8: cātuddase bhikkhunisaṅghassa ovādaṃ datvā sabbāva tā bhikkhuniyo saḷāyatanapaṭimaṇḍitāya
atk-s0401a:1034_0: Tā bhikkhuniyo therassa dhammadesanāya attamanā hutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā attano
atk-s0401a:1034_1: paṭividdhaguṇaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā “kasmiṃ nu kho dhammaṃ desente imā bhikkhuniyo uparimaggaphalāni
atk-s0401a:1034_2: pāpuṇeyyu”nti āvajjento puna “taṃyeva nandakassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pañcasatāpi
atk-s0401a:1034_3: etā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissantī”ti disvā punadivasepi therasseva santikaṃ dhammassavanatthāya
atk-s0401a:1034_4: pesesi. Tā punadivase dhammaṃ sutvā sabbāva arahattaṃ pattā. Taṃdivasaṃ bhagavā tāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:1034_5: bhikkhunīnaṃ attano santikaṃ āgatakāle dhammadesanāya saphalabhāvaṃ ñatvā “hiyyo
atk-s0401a:1034_6: nandakassa dhammadesanā cātuddasiyaṃ candasadisī ahosi, ajja pannarasiyaṃ candasadisī”ti
atk-s0401a:1034_7: vatvā therassa sādhukāraṃ datvā tadeva ca kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ bhikkhunovādakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1036_0: 230. Aṭṭhame indriyesu guttadvārānanti chasu indriyesu pihitadvārānaṃ nandatthero
atk-s0401a:1036_1: aggoti dasseti. Kiñcāpi hi satthusāvakā aguttadvārā nāma natthi, nandatthero pana
atk-s0401a:1036_2: dasasu disāsu yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ oloketukāmo hoti, na taṃ catusampajaññavasena aparicchinditvā
atk-s0401a:1036_3: oloketi. Tasmā indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:1037_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:1037_1: kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vayappatto satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1037_2: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:1037_3: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kapilavatthupure
atk-s0401a:1037_4: mahāpajāpatigotamiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase ñātisaṅghaṃ
atk-s0401a:1037_5: nandayanto tosento jātoti nandakumāroteva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1038_0: Mahāsattopi sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahato
atk-s0401a:1038_1: kapilavatthupuraṃ gantvā paṭhamadassaneneva pitaraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1038_2: Punadivase pitu nivesanaṃ gantvā rāhulamātāya ovādaṃ datvā sesajanassapi dhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1038_4: tassa nivesanaṃ gantvā kumāraṃ pattaṃ gāhāpetvā pabbājetuṃ vihārābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0401a:1038_5: Nandakumāraṃ abhisekamaṅgalaṃ na tathā pīḷesi, pattaṃ ādāya gamanakāle pana janapadakalyāṇī
atk-s0401a:1038_6: uparipāsādavaragatā sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā “tuvaṭaṃ kho, ayyaputta, āgaccheyyāsī”ti
atk-s0401a:1038_7: yaṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi. Taṃ sutvā gehasitachandarāgavasena olokento panesa satthari
atk-s0401a:1038_8: gāravena yathāruciyā nimittaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi, tenassa cittasantāpo ahosi. Atha
atk-s0401a:1038_9: naṃ “imasmiṃ ṭhāne nivattessati, imasmiṃ ṭhāne nivattessatī”ti cintentameva satthā
atk-s0401a:1038_10: vihāraṃ netvā pabbājesi. Pabbajitopi paṭibāhituṃ asakkonto tuṇhī ahosi. Pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0401a:1038_11: paṭṭhāya pana janapadakalyāṇiyā vuttavacanameva sarati. Athassa sā āgantvā avidūre
atk-s0401a:1038_12: ṭhitā viya ahosi. So anabhiratiyā pīḷito thokaṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati, tassa gumbaṃ vā
atk-s0401a:1038_13: gacchaṃ vā atikkamantasseva dasabalo purato ṭhitako viya ahosi. So aggimhi pakkhittaṃ
atk-s0401a:1038_14: kukkuṭapattaṃ viya paṭinivattitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva pavisati.
atk-s0401a:1039_0: Satthā cintesi – “nando ativiya pamatto viharati, anabhiratiṃ vūpasametuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0401a:1039_1: etassa cittanibbāpanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Tato naṃ āha – “ehi, nanda, devacārikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1039_2: gacchissāmā”ti. Bhagavā kathāhaṃ iddhimantehi gantabbaṭṭhānaṃ gamissāmīti. Tvaṃ kevalaṃ
atk-s0401a:1039_3: gamanacittaṃ uppādehi, gantvā passissasīti. So dasabalassa ānubhāvena tathāgateneva
atk-s0401a:1039_4: saddhiṃ devacārikaṃ gantvā sakkassa devarañño nivesanaṃ oloketvā pañca accharāsatāni
atk-s0401a:1039_5: addasa. Satthā nandattheraṃ subhanimittavasena tā olokentaṃ disvā, “nanda, imā nu
atk-s0401a:1039_6: kho accharā manāpā, atha janapadakalyāṇī”ti pucchi. Bhante, janapadakalyāṇī imā accharā
atk-s0401a:1039_7: upanidhāya kaṇṇanāsacchinnakā makkaṭī viya khāyatīti. Nanda, evarūpā accharā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1039_8: karontānaṃ na dullabhāti. Sace me, bhante bhagavā, pāṭibhogo hoti, ahaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1039_9: karissāmīti. Vissattho tvaṃ, nanda, samaṇadhammaṃ karohi. Sace te sappaṭisandhikā
atk-s0401a:1039_10: kālakiriyā bhavissati, ahaṃ etāsaṃ paṭilābhatthāya pāṭibhogoti. Iti satthā yathāruciyā
atk-s0401a:1040_0: Tato paṭṭhāya nandatthero accharānaṃ hetu rattindivaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. Satthā
atk-s0401a:1040_1: bhikkhū āṇāpesi – “tumhe nandassa vasanaṭṭhāne ‘eko kira bhikkhu dasabalaṃ pāṭibhogaṃ
atk-s0401a:1040_2: katvā accharānaṃ hetu samaṇadhammaṃ karotī’ti tattha tattha kathentā vicarathā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1040_3: Te satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā “bhatako kirāyasmā nando, upakkitako kirāyasmā nando,
atk-s0401a:1040_4: accharānaṃ hetu brahmacariyaṃ carati, bhagavā kirassa pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1040_5: paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādīna”nti therassa savanūpacāre kathentā vicaranti. Nandatthero
atk-s0401a:1040_6: taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ime bhikkhū na aññaṃ kathenti, maṃ ārabbha kathenti, ayuttaṃ mama
atk-s0401a:1040_7: kamma”nti paṭisaṅkhānaṃ uppādetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Athassa
atk-s0401a:1040_8: arahattapattakkhaṇeyeva aññatarā devatā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi, sayampi bhagavā
atk-s0401a:1040_9: aññāsiyeva. Punadivase nandatthero bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante
atk-s0401a:1040_10: bhagavā, pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādīnaṃ, muñcāmahaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1040_11: bhante, bhagavantaṃ etasmā paṭissavā”ti. Evaṃ vatthu samuṭṭhitaṃ. Satthā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1040_12: jetavanavihāre viharanto theraṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1042_0: 231. Navame bhikkhuovādakānanti bhikkhū ovadantānaṃ mahākappinatthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1042_1: Ayaṃ kira thero ekasamodhānasmiṃyeva dhammakathaṃ kathento bhikkhusahassaṃ arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:1042_2: pāpesi. Tasmā bhikkhuovādakānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:1043_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1043_1: kulaghare nibbattitvā aparabhāge satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0401a:1043_2: bhikkhuovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1043_3: patthesi. So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapasammāsambuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:1043_4: bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā purisasahassassa gaṇajeṭṭhako hutvā gabbhasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0401a:1043_5: mahāpariveṇaṃ kāresi. Te sabbepi janā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā kappinaupāsakaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0401a:1043_6: katvā saputtadārā devaloke nibbattā. Ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1044_0: Atha amhākaṃ satthu nibbattito puretarameva ayaṃ kappino paccantadese kukkuṭavatīnagare
atk-s0401a:1044_1: rājagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, sesapurisā tasmiṃyeva nagare amaccakulesu nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1044_2: Tesu kappinakumāro pitu accayena chattaṃ ussāpetvā mahākappinarājā nāma jāto. Pubbe
atk-s0401a:1044_3: kalyāṇakammakaraṇakāle tassa gharasāminī itthī samānajātike rājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0401a:1044_4: mahākappinarañño aggamahesī jātā, anojāpupphasadisavaṇṇatāya panassā anojādevītveva
atk-s0401a:1044_5: nāmaṃ ahosi. Mahākappinarājāpi sutavittako ahosi. So pātova uṭṭhāya catūhi dvārehi
atk-s0401a:1044_6: sīghaṃ dūte pesesi – “yattha bahussute sutadhare passatha, tato nivattitvā mayhaṃ ārocethā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1045_0: Tena kho pana samayena amhākaṃ satthā loke nibbattitvā sāvatthiṃ upanissāya paṭivasati.
atk-s0401a:1045_1: Tasmiṃ kāle sāvatthinagaravāsino vāṇijā sāvatthiyaṃ uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā, taṃ
atk-s0401a:1045_2: nagaraṃ gantvā, bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā, “rājānaṃ passissāmā”ti paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā, rājakuladvāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1045_3: gantvā, “rājā uyyānaṃ gato”ti sutvā, uyyānaṃ gantvā, dvāre ṭhitā paṭihārakassa ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1045_4: Atha rañño nivedi, te rājā pakkosāpetvā niyyātitapaṇṇākāre vanditvā ṭhite, “tātā,
atk-s0401a:1045_5: kuto āgacchathā”ti pucchi. Sāvatthito, devāti. Kacci vo raṭṭhaṃ subhikkhaṃ, dhammiko
atk-s0401a:1045_6: rājāti? Āma, devāti. Atthi pana tumhākaṃ dese kiñci sāsananti? Atthi deva, na pana
atk-s0401a:1045_7: sakkā ucchiṭṭhamukhehi kathetunti. Rājā suvaṇṇabhiṅgārena udakaṃ dāpesi. Te mukhaṃ
atk-s0401a:1045_8: vikkhāletvā dasabalābhimukhā añjaliṃ paggahetvā, “deva, amhākaṃ dese buddharatanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1045_9: nāma uppanna”nti āhaṃsu. Rañño “buddho”ti vacane sutamatteyeva sakalasarīraṃ pharamānā
atk-s0401a:1045_10: pīti uppajji. Tato “buddhoti, tātā, vadathā”ti āha. Buddhoti, deva, vadāmāti. Evaṃ
atk-s0401a:1045_11: tikkhattuṃ vadāpetvā “buddhotipadaṃ aparimāṇaṃ, nāssa sakkā parimāṇaṃ kātu”nti tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0401a:1045_12: pade pasanno satasahassaṃ datvā “aparaṃ kiṃ sāsana”nti pucchi. Deva dhammaratanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1045_13: nāma uppannanti. Tampi sutvā tatheva tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā aparampi satasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:1045_14: datvā puna “aññaṃ kiṃ sāsana”nti pucchi. Saṅgharatanaṃ deva uppannanti. Tampi sutvā
atk-s0401a:1045_15: tatheva paṭiññaṃ gahetvā aparampi satasahassaṃ datvā dinnabhāvaṃ paṇṇe likhitvā,
atk-s0401a:1045_16: “tātā, deviyā santikaṃ gacchathā”ti pesesi. Tesu gatesu amacce pucchi – “tātā, buddho
atk-s0401a:1045_17: loke uppanno, tumhe kiṃ karissathā”ti? Deva tumhe kiṃ kattukāmāti? Ahaṃ pabbajissāmīti.
atk-s0401a:1045_18: Mayampi pabbajissāmāti. Te sabbepi gharaṃ vā kuṭumbaṃ vā anapaloketvā ye asse āruyha
atk-s0401a:1046_0: Vāṇijā anojādeviyā santikaṃ gantvā paṇṇaṃ dassesuṃ. Sā taṃ vācetvā “raññā tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:1046_1: bahū kahāpaṇā dinnā, kiṃ tumhehi kataṃ, tātā”ti pucchi. Piyasāsanaṃ, devi, ānītanti.
atk-s0401a:1046_2: Amhepi sakkā, tātā, suṇāpetunti? Sakkā, devi, ucchiṭṭhamukhehi pana vattuṃ na sakkāti.
atk-s0401a:1046_3: Sā suvaṇṇabhiṅgārena udakaṃ dāpesi. Te mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā rañño ārocitaniyāmeneva
atk-s0401a:1046_4: ārocesuṃ. Sāpi taṃ sutvā uppannapāmojjā teneva nayena ekekasmiṃ pade tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ
atk-s0401a:1046_5: gahetvā paṭiññāgaṇanāya tīṇi tīṇi katvā nava satasahassāni adāsi. Vāṇijā sabbānipi
atk-s0401a:1046_6: dvādasa satasahassāni labhiṃsu. Atha ne “rājā kahaṃ, tātā”ti pucchi. Pabbajissāmīti
atk-s0401a:1046_7: nikkhanto, devīti. “Tena hi, tātā, tumhe gacchathā”ti te uyyojetvā raññā saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1046_8: gatānaṃ amaccānaṃ mātugāme pakkosāpetvā “tumhe attano sāmikānaṃ gataṭṭhānaṃ jānātha
atk-s0401a:1046_9: ammā”ti pucchi. Jānāma, ayye, raññā saddhiṃ uyyānakīḷaṃ gatāti. Āma, ammā gatā, tattha
atk-s0401a:1046_10: pana gantvā “buddho uppanno, dhammo uppanno, saṅgho uppanno”ti sutvā “dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:1046_11: santike pabbajissāmā”ti gatā, tumhe kiṃ karissathāti? Tumhe pana, ayye, kiṃ kattukāmāti?
atk-s0401a:1046_12: “Ahaṃ pabbajissāmi, na tehi vantavamanaṃ jivhagge ṭhapeyyanti. “Yadi evaṃ, mayampi
atk-s0401a:1047_0: Rājāpi amaccasahassehi saddhiṃ gaṅgātīraṃ pāpuṇi, tasmiṃ samaye gaṅgā pūrā hoti.
atk-s0401a:1047_1: Atha naṃ disvā “ayaṃ gaṅgā pūrā hoti caṇḍamacchākiṇṇā, amhehi ca saddhiṃ āgatā dāsā
atk-s0401a:1047_2: vā manussā vā natthi, ye no nāvaṃ vā uḷumpaṃ vā katvā dadeyyuṃ. Etassa pana satthu
atk-s0401a:1047_3: guṇā nāma heṭṭhā avīcito upari yāva bhavaggā patthaṭā. Sace esa satthā sammāsambuddho,
atk-s0401a:1047_4: imesaṃ assānaṃ khurapiṭṭhāni mā tementū”ti udakapiṭṭhena asse pakkhandāpesuṃ. Ekassa
atk-s0401a:1047_5: assassāpi khurapiṭṭhamattaṃ na temi, rājamaggena gacchantā viya paratīraṃ patvā parato
atk-s0401a:1047_6: aññaṃ mahānadiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. “Dutiyā kinnamā”ti pucchi. Nīlavāhinī nāma gambhīratopi
atk-s0401a:1047_7: puthulatopi aḍḍhayojanamattā devāti. Tattha aññā saccakiriyā natthi, tāya eva saccakiriyāya
atk-s0401a:1047_8: tampi aḍḍhayojanavitthāraṃ nadiṃ atikkamiṃsu. Atha tatiyaṃ candabhāgaṃ nāma mahānadiṃ
atk-s0401a:1047_9: patvā tampi tāya eva saccakiriyāya atikkamiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1048_0: Satthāpi taṃdivasaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ olokento “ajja
atk-s0401a:1048_1: mahākappino tiyojanasatikaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya amaccasahassaparivāro mama santike pabbajituṃ
atk-s0401a:1048_2: āgacchatī”ti disvā “mayā tesaṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātuṃ yutta”nti pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ
atk-s0401a:1048_3: katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
atk-s0401a:1048_4: sayameva pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā ākāse uppatitvā candabhāgāya tīre tesaṃ uttaraṇatitthaabhimukhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1048_5: mahānigrodharukkho atthi, tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:1048_6: chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vissajjesi. Te tena titthena uttarantā buddharasmiyo ito cito
atk-s0401a:1048_7: ca dhāvantiyo oloketvā dasabalassa puṇṇacandasassirikaṃ mukhaṃ disvā “yaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1048_8: uddissa mayaṃ pabbajitā, addhā so eso”ti dassaneneva niṭṭhaṃ gantvā diṭṭhaṭṭhānato
atk-s0401a:1048_9: paṭṭhāya oṇamitvā vandamānā āgamma satthāraṃ vandiṃsu. Rājā gopphakesu gahetvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1048_10: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ amaccasahassena. Satthā tesaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:1048_11: Desanāpariyosāne sabbeva arahatte patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0401a:1048_12: “pubbe ime cīvaradānassa dinnattā attano pattacīvarāni gahetvāva āgatā”ti suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:1048_13: hatthaṃ pasāretvā “etha bhikkhavo, svākkhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā
atk-s0401a:1048_14: dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti āha. Sāva tesaṃ āyasmantānaṃ pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca
atk-s0401a:1049_0: Anojāpi devī rathasahassaparivārā gaṅgātīraṃ patvā rañño atthāya ābhataṃ nāvaṃ vā
atk-s0401a:1049_1: uḷumpaṃ vā adisvā attano byattatāya cintesi – “rājā saccakiriyaṃ katvā gato bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:1049_2: so pana satthā na kevalaṃ tesaṃyeva atthāya nibbatto, sace so satthā sammāsambuddho,
atk-s0401a:1049_3: amhākaṃ rathā mā udake nimujjiṃsū”ti udakapiṭṭhena rathe pakkhandāpesi. Rathānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1049_4: nemivaṭṭimattampi na temi. Dutiyanadimpi tatiyanadimpi teneva saccakārena uttari.
atk-s0401a:1049_5: Uttaramānā eva ca nigrodharukkhamūle satthāraṃ addasa. Satthāpi “imāsaṃ attano sāmike
atk-s0401a:1049_6: passantīnaṃ chandarāgo uppajjitvā maggaphalānaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyya, dhammaṃ sotuṃ
atk-s0401a:1049_7: ca na sakkhissantī”ti. Yathā aññamaññaṃ na passanti, tathā akāsi. Tā sabbāpi titthato
atk-s0401a:1049_8: uttaritvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā tāsaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0401a:1049_9: sabbā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aññamaññaṃ passiṃsu. Satthā “uppalavaṇṇā āgacchatū”ti
atk-s0401a:1049_10: cintesi. Therī āgantvā sabbā pabbājetvā ādāya bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gatā, satthā bhikkhusahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:1050_0: Athāyaṃ mahākappinatthero attano kiccaṃ matthakappattaṃ ñatvā appossukko hutvā phalasamāpattisukhena
atk-s0401a:1050_1: vītināmento araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti
atk-s0401a:1050_2: abhiṇhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. Bhikkhū kathaṃ uppādesuṃ “kappinatthero rajjasukhaṃ anussaranto
atk-s0401a:1050_3: udānaṃ udānetī”ti. Te tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā “mama putto maggasukhaṃ phalasukhaṃ
atk-s0401a:1050_4: ārabbha udānaṃ udānesī”ti vatvā dhammapade imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:1053_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā tassa antevāsikabhikkhusahassaṃ āmantetvā āha – “kacci vo, bhikkhave,
atk-s0401a:1053_1: ācariyo dhammaṃ desetī”ti. Na bhagavā deseti, appossukko diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1053_2: anuyutto viharati, kassaci ovādamattampi na detīti. Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ
atk-s0401a:1053_3: kira tvaṃ, kappina, antevāsikānaṃ ovādamattampi na desī”ti? Saccaṃ bhagavāti. Brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0401a:1053_4: mā evaṃ kari, ajja paṭṭhāya antevāsikānaṃ dhammaṃ desehīti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti thero
atk-s0401a:1053_5: satthu kathaṃ siravarena sampaṭicchitvā ekasamodhāneyeva samaṇasahassassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1053_6: desetvā sabbe arahattaṃ pāpesi. Aparabhāge satthā saṅghamajjhe nisinno paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0401a:1053_7: there ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento mahākappinattheraṃ bhikkhuovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1055_0: 232. Dasame tejodhātukusalānanti tejodhātuṃ samāpajjituṃ kusalānaṃ sāgatatthero aggoti
atk-s0401a:1055_1: dasseti. Ayañhi thero tejodhātusamāpattiyā ambatitthanāgassa tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyitvā
atk-s0401a:1055_2: taṃ nāgaṃ nibbisevanaṃ akāsi. Tasmā tejodhātukusalānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:1056_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1056_1: kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā aparabhāge satthudhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:1056_2: bhikkhuṃ tejodhātukusalānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1056_3: patthesi. So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0401a:1056_4: sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, sāgatamāṇavotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1056_5: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā
atk-s0401a:1057_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā cārikaṃ caramāno kosambinagarasamīpaṃ agamāsi. Tena ca samayena
atk-s0401a:1057_1: nadītitthe porāṇakanāvikassa bahū āgantukagamikā verino hutvā taṃ pothetvā mārayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1057_2: So viruddhena cittena patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tasmiṃyeva titthe mahānubhāvo nāgarājā
atk-s0401a:1057_3: hutvā nibbatto. So viruddhacittattā akāleyeva vassāpeti, kāle pana na vassāpeti,
atk-s0401a:1057_4: sassāni na sammā sampajjanti. Sakalaraṭṭhavāsino ca tassa vūpasamanatthaṃ anusaṃvaccharaṃ
atk-s0401a:1057_5: balikammaṃ karonti, vasanatthāya cassa ekaṃ gehaṃ akaṃsu. Satthāpi teneva titthena
atk-s0401a:1057_6: uttaritvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto “tasmiṃyeva padese rattiṃ vasissāmī”ti agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1058_0: Athāyaṃ thero “caṇḍo kirettha nāgarājā”ti sutvā “imaṃ nāgarājānaṃ dametvā nibbisevanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1058_1: katvā satthu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pariyādetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti nāgarājassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0401a:1058_2: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi. Nāgo kujjhitvā “konāmāyaṃ muṇḍako mayhaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1058_3: pavisitvā nisinno”ti dhūpāyi, thero uttaritaraṃ dhūpāyi. Nāgo, pajjali, theropi uttaritaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1058_4: pajjalitvā tassa tejaṃ pariyādiyi. So “mahanto vatāyaṃ bhikkhū”ti therassa pādamūle
atk-s0401a:1058_5: nipatitvā, “bhante, tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti āha. Mayhaṃ saraṇagamanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0401a:1058_6: dasabalassa saraṇaṃ gacchāti. So “sādhū”ti saraṇagato hutvā tato paṭṭhāya na kañci
atk-s0401a:1058_7: viheṭheti, devampi sammā vassāpeti, sassāni sammā sampajjanti.
atk-s0401a:1059_0: Kosambivāsino “ayyena kira sāgatena ambatitthakanāgo damito”ti sutvā satthu āgamanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1059_1: udikkhamānā dasabalassa mahāsakkāraṃ sajjayiṃsu. Te dasabalassa mahāsakkāraṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:1059_2: chabbaggiyānaṃ vacanena sabbagehesu kāpotikaṃ pasannaṃ paṭiyādetvā punadivase sāgatattherassa
atk-s0401a:1059_3: piṇḍāya carantassa gehe gehe thokaṃ thokaṃ adaṃsu. Thero apaññatte sikkhāpade manussehi
atk-s0401a:1059_4: yāciyamāno gehe gehe thokaṃ thokaṃ pivitvā avidūraṃ gantvāva anāhārikabhāvena satiṃ
atk-s0401a:1060_0: Satthā katabhattakicco nikkhamanto taṃ disvā gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā vigarahitvā
atk-s0401a:1060_1: sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesi. So punadivase satiṃ labhitvā attanā katakāraṇaṃ sutvā accayaṃ
atk-s0401a:1060_2: desetvā dasabalaṃ khamāpetvā uppannasaṃvego vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1060_3: Evaṃ vatthu vinaye samuṭṭhitaṃ. Taṃ tattha āgatanayeneva vitthārato veditabbaṃ. Aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1060_4: pana satthā jetavane mahāvihāre nisīditvā paṭipāṭiyā there ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento
atk-s0401a:1062_1: paṭibhānajanakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rādhatthero aggoti dasseti. Therassa hi diṭṭhisamudācārañca
atk-s0401a:1062_2: okappaniyasaddhañca āgamma dasabalassa navanavā dhammadesanā paṭibhāti. Tasmā thero
atk-s0401a:1063_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1063_1: kulagehe nibbattitvā aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0401a:1063_2: paṭibhāneyyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1063_3: patthesi. So yāvajīvaṃ tathāgataṃ paricaritvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0401a:1063_4: rājagahanagare brāhmaṇakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, rādhamāṇavotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1064_0: So mahallakakāle attano puttadārena abahumato “pabbajitvā kālaṃ vītināmessāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:1064_1: vihāraṃ gantvā there pabbajjaṃ yāci. “Jiṇṇo mahallakabrāhmaṇo”ti na koci pabbājetuṃ
atk-s0401a:1064_2: icchi. Athekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇo satthu santikaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0401a:1064_3: nisīdi. Satthā tassa upanissayasampattiṃ disvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetukāmo “kiṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0401a:1064_4: puttadārā taṃ paṭijaggantī”ti? Kuto, bho gotama, paṭijagganaṃ, mahallakoti maṃ bahi
atk-s0401a:1064_5: nīhariṃsu. Kiṃ pana te, brāhmaṇa, pabbajituṃ na vaṭṭatīti? Ko maṃ, bho gotama, pabbājessati,
atk-s0401a:1064_6: mahallakabhāvena maṃ na koci icchatīti. Satthā sāriputtattherassa saññaṃ adāsi. Thero
atk-s0401a:1064_7: satthu vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā rādhabrāhmaṇaṃ pabbājetvā cintesi – “satthā
atk-s0401a:1064_8: imaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ sādarena pabbajāpesi, na kho me etaṃ anādarena pariharituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0401a:1064_9: rādhattheraṃ ādāya gāmakāvāsaṃ agamāsi. Tatrassa adhunā pabbajitattā kicchalābhissa
atk-s0401a:1064_10: thero attano pattaṃ āvāsaṃ deti, attano pattaṃ paṇītapiṇḍapātampi tasseva datvā sayaṃ
atk-s0401a:1064_11: piṇḍāya carati. Rādhatthero senāsanasappāyañca bhojanasappāyañca labhitvā sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0401a:1064_12: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1065_0: Atha naṃ thero gahetvā dasabalaṃ passituṃ āgato. Satthā jānantova pucchi – “yo te
atk-s0401a:1065_1: mayā, sāriputta, nissitako dinno, kīdisaṃ tassa, na ukkaṇṭhatī”ti? Bhante, sāsane
atk-s0401a:1065_2: abhiramitabhikkhu nāma evarūpo bhaveyyāti. Athāyasmato sāriputtassa “sāriputtatthero
atk-s0401a:1065_3: kataññū katavedī”ti saṅghamajjhe kathā udapādi. Taṃ sutvā satthā bhikkhū āmantesi
atk-s0401a:1065_4: – “anacchariyaṃ, bhikkhave, sāriputtassa idāni kataññūkataveditā, so atīte ahetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1065_5: nibbattopi kataññūkatavedīyeva ahosī”ti. Katarasmiṃ kāle bhagavāti?
atk-s0401a:1066_0: Atīte, bhikkhave, pabbatapādamhi pañcasatamattā vaḍḍhakipurisā mahāaraññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0401a:1066_1: dabbasambhāre chinditvā mahāuḷumpaṃ bandhitvā nadiyā otārenti. Atheko hatthināgo
atk-s0401a:1066_2: ekasmiṃ visamaṭṭhāne soṇḍāya sākhaṃ gaṇhanto sākhābhaṅgavegaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0401a:1066_3: tikhiṇakhāṇuke pādena avatthāsi, pādo viddho, dukkhavedanā vattanti. So gamanaṃ abhinīharituṃ
atk-s0401a:1066_4: asakkonto tattheva nipajji. So katipāhaccayena te vaḍḍhakī attano samīpena gacchante
atk-s0401a:1066_5: disvā “ime nissāyāhaṃ jīvitaṃ labhissāmī”ti tesaṃ anupadaṃ agamāsi. Te nivattitvā
atk-s0401a:1066_6: hatthiṃ disvā bhītā palāyanti. So tesaṃ palāyanabhāvaṃ ñatvā aṭṭhāsi, puna ṭhitakāle anubandhi.
atk-s0401a:1067_0: Vaḍḍhakijeṭṭhako cintesi – “ayaṃ hatthi amhesu tiṭṭhantesu anubandhati, palāyantesu
atk-s0401a:1067_1: tiṭṭhati, bhavissati tattha kāraṇa”nti. Sabbe taṃ taṃ rukkhaṃ āruyha tassa āgamanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1067_2: paṭimānentā nisīdiṃsu. So tesaṃ santikaṃ āgantvā attano pādaṃ dassento parivattetvā
atk-s0401a:1067_3: nipajji. Tadā vaḍḍhakīnaṃ saññā udapādi – “gilānabhāvena, bho, esa āgacchati, na
atk-s0401a:1067_4: aññena kāraṇenā”ti tassa santikaṃ gantvā pāde paviṭṭhakhāṇukaṃ disvā “iminā kāraṇena
atk-s0401a:1067_5: esa āgato”ti tikhiṇavāsiyā khāṇukakoṭiyaṃ odhiṃ datvā daḷhāya rajjuyā bandhitvā kaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0401a:1067_6: nīhariṃsu. Athassa vaṇamukhaṃ pīḷetvā pubbalohitaṃ nīharitvā kasāvodakena dhovitvā
atk-s0401a:1067_7: attano jānanabhesajjaṃ makkhetvā nacirasseva phāsukaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1068_0: Hatthināgo gilānā vuṭṭhito cintesi – “ime mayhaṃ bahupakārā, ime mayā nissāya jīvitaṃ
atk-s0401a:1068_1: laddhaṃ, mayā imesaṃ kataññunā katavedinā bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1068_2: gantvā setaṃ gandhahatthipotakaṃ ānesi. Vaḍḍhakino hatthipotakaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ hatthī
atk-s0401a:1068_3: puttampi gahetvā āgato”ti ativiya tuṭṭhacittā ahesuṃ. Hatthināgo cintesi – “mayi
atk-s0401a:1068_4: tiṭṭhante ‘kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ āgato’ti mama āgatakāraṇaṃ na jānissantī”ti ṭhitaṭṭhānato
atk-s0401a:1068_5: pakkāmi. Hatthipotako pitu pacchato pacchato anupāyāsi. Hatthināgo tassa āgatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:1068_6: ñatvā nivattanatthāya saddasaññaṃ adāsi. So pitu kathaṃ sutvā nivattitvā vaḍḍhakīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:1068_7: santikaṃ gato. Vaḍḍhakino “imaṃ hatthipotakaṃ amhākaṃ dātuṃ āgato bhavissati eso”ti
atk-s0401a:1068_8: ñatvā “amhākaṃ santike tayā kattabbakiccaṃ natthi, pitu santikaṃyeva gacchā”ti pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1068_9: Hatthināgo yāvatatiyaṃ attano santikaṃ āgatampi puna vaḍḍhakīnaṃyeva samīpaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0401a:1068_10: Tato paṭṭhāya vaḍḍhakino hatthipotakaṃ attano santike katvā paṭijagganti. Bhojanakāle
atk-s0401a:1068_11: ekekaṃ bhattapiṇḍaṃ denti, bhattaṃ tassa yāvadatthaṃ ahosi. So vaḍḍhakīhi antogahane
atk-s0401a:1068_12: koṭṭitaṃ dabbasambhāraṃ āharitvā aṅgaṇaṭṭhāne rāsiṃ karoti. Eteneva niyāmena aññampi
atk-s0401a:1069_0: Satthā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharitvā pubbepi sāriputtassa kataññūkatavedibhāvaṃ dīpeti. Sāriputtatthero
atk-s0401a:1069_1: hi tadā mahāhatthī ahosi, aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ āgato ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhu hatthipotako
atk-s0401a:1069_2: ahosi. Saṃyuttanikāyaṃ pana patvā sakalaṃ rādhasaṃyuttaṃ, dhammapade ca –
atk-s0401a:1072: Tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo”ti. –
atk-s0401a:1073: Gāthā therassa dhammadesanā nāma. Aparabhāge pana satthā paṭipāṭiyā there ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento rādhattheraṃ paṭibhāneyyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1075_0: 234. Dvādasame lūkhacīvaradharānanti lūkhacīvaraṃ dhārentānaṃ mogharājā aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1075_1: Ayaṃ hi thero satthalūkhaṃ suttalūkhaṃ rajanalūkhanti tividhenapi lūkhena samannāgataṃ
atk-s0401a:1075_2: paṃsukūlaṃ dhāresi. Tasmā lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:1076_0: Tassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā – ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1076_1: kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā nibbatti, tato aparabhāge satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0401a:1076_2: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1076_3: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto
atk-s0401a:1076_4: kassapadasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva kaṭṭhavāhananagare amaccagehe paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1076_5: gaṇhi. Aparabhāge vayappatto kaṭṭhavāhanarājānaṃ upaṭṭhahanto amaccaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0401a:1077_0: Tasmiṃ kāle kassapadasabalo loke uppajji. Kaṭṭhavāhanarājā “buddho kira loke uppanno”ti
atk-s0401a:1077_1: sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā āha – “tāta, buddho kira loke uppanno, imaṃ paccantanagaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1077_2: ekappahāreneva ubhohi amhehi tucchaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā, tvaṃ tāva majjhimadesaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:1077_3: buddhassa uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā dasabalaṃ imaṃ nagaraṃ ānehī”ti purisasahassena saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1077_4: pesesi. So anupubbena satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0401a:1077_5: tattheva pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Tena saddhiṃ gatapurisā
atk-s0401a:1077_6: pana sabbepi nivattitvā puna rañño santikaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0401a:1078_0: Ayaṃ thero paripuṇṇasīlo kālaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:1078_1: dasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, mogharājamāṇavotissa
atk-s0401a:1078_2: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Kaṭṭhavāhanarājāpi kassapassa bhagavato adhikārakammaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1078_3: saparivāro devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ dasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1078_4: purohitagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, bāvarimāṇavotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So aparena samayena
atk-s0401a:1078_5: tayo vede uggaṇhitvā soḷasannaṃ māṇavakasahassānaṃ sippaṃ vācento carati. Athassa
atk-s0401a:1078_6: pasenadikosalarañño kāle pitu accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṃ adaṃsu. Tadā ayampi mogharājamāṇavo
atk-s0401a:1079_0: Athekadivasaṃ bāvaribrāhmaṇo rahogato attano sippe sāraṃ olokento samparāyikaṃ sāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1079_1: adisvā “ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā samparāyikaṃ gavesessāmī”ti kosalarājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0401a:1079_2: attano pabbajjaṃ anujānāpesi. So tena anuññāto soḷasahi māṇavakasahassehi parivuto
atk-s0401a:1079_3: pabbajjatthāya nikkhami. Kosalarājāpi tena saddhiṃyeva ekaṃ amaccaṃ kahāpaṇasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:1079_4: datvā pesesi – “yasmiṃ ṭhāne ācariyo pabbajati, tatrassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā dethā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1079_5: Bāvaribrāhmaṇo phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ olokento majjhimadesato paṭikkamma assakarañño ca muḷhakarañño
atk-s0401a:1079_6: ca sīmantare godhāvaritīre attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0401a:1080_0: Atheko puriso jaṭilānaṃ dassanāya gato tesaṃ santake bhūmiṭṭhāne tehi anuññāto attano
atk-s0401a:1080_1: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ akāsi. Tena kataṃ disvā aparaṃ kulasataṃ gehasataṃ kāresi. Te sabbepi
atk-s0401a:1080_2: sannipatitvā “mayaṃ ayyānaṃ santake bhūmibhāge vasāma, mudhā vasituṃ na kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1080_3: sukhavāsaṃ vo dassāmā”ti ekeko ekekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ bāvaribrāhmaṇassa vasanaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:1080_4: Sabbehipi ābhatakahāpaṇā satasahassamattā ahesuṃ. Bāvaribrāhmaṇo “kimatthaṃ ete ābhatā”ti
atk-s0401a:1080_5: āha. Sukhavāsadānatthāya, bhanteti. Sacāhaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇena atthiko assaṃ, ahaṃ
atk-s0401a:1080_6: mahantaṃ dhanarāsiṃ pahāya na pabbajeyyaṃ. Tumhākaṃ kahāpaṇe gaṇhitvā gacchathāti.
atk-s0401a:1080_7: Amhehi ayyassa pariccattaṃ na puna gaṇhāma, anusaṃvaccharaṃ pana eteneva niyāmena
atk-s0401a:1080_8: āharissāma, ime gahetvā ayyo dānaṃ detūti. Brāhmaṇo adhivāsetvā kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1080_9: dānamukhe niyyātesi. Tassa aparāparaṃ dāyakabhāvo sakalajambudīpe paññāyittha.
atk-s0401a:1081_0: Tato kāliṅgaraṭṭhe dunniviṭṭhe nāma gāme jūjakabrāhmaṇassa vaṃse jātabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0401a:1081_1: brāhmaṇī uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya brāhmaṇaṃ codeti – “bāvarī, kira dānaṃ deti, gantvā tato
atk-s0401a:1081_2: hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ āharā”ti. So tāya codiyamāno saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto bāvarissa santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1081_3: gacchamāno bāvarimhi dānaṃ datvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nipajjitvā dānaṃ anussaramāne
atk-s0401a:1081_4: gato. Gantvā ca “dānaṃ me, brāhmaṇa, dehi, dānaṃ me, brāhmaṇa, dehī”ti āha. Akāle
atk-s0401a:1081_5: tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, āgato, sampattayācakānaṃ me dinnaṃ, idāni kahāpaṇaṃ natthīti. Na
atk-s0401a:1081_6: mayhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, bahūhi kahāpaṇehi attho, tava ettakaṃ dānaṃ dadantassa na sakkā
atk-s0401a:1081_7: kahāpaṇehi vinā bhavituṃ, mayhaṃ pañca kahāpaṇasatāni dehīti. Brāhmaṇa, pañcapi satāni
atk-s0401a:1081_8: natthi, puna dānakāle sampatte labhissasīti. Kiṃ panāhaṃ tava dānakāle āgamissāmīti?
atk-s0401a:1081_9: Bāvaribrāhmaṇassa paṇṇasāladvāre vālukaṃ thūpaṃ katvā samantato rattavaṇṇāni pupphāni
atk-s0401a:1081_10: vikiritvā mantaṃ jappento viya oṭṭhe cāletvā cāletvā “muddhā phalatu sattadhā”ti vadati.
atk-s0401a:1082_0: Bāvaribrāhmaṇo cintesi – “ayaṃ mahātapo tapacāraṃ gaṇhitvā caraṇabrāhmaṇako mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:1082_1: sattadivasamatthake ‘sattadhā muddhā phālatū’ti vadati, mayhañca imassa dātabbāni
atk-s0401a:1082_2: pañca kahāpaṇasatāni natthi, ekaṃsena maṃ esa ghātessatī”ti. Evaṃ tasmiṃ sokasallasamappite
atk-s0401a:1082_3: nipanne rattibhāgasamanantare anantarattabhāve bāvarissa mātā devatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1082_4: Sā puttassa sokasallasamappitabhāvaṃ disvā āgantvā āha – “tāta, esa muddhaṃ vā muddhaphālanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1082_5: vā na jānāti, tvampi loke buddhānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ na jānāsi. Sace te saṃsayo atthi,
atk-s0401a:1082_6: satthu santikaṃ gantvā puccha, so te etaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathessatī”ti. Brāhmaṇo devatāya
atk-s0401a:1082_7: kathaṃ sutakālato paṭṭhāya assāsaṃ labhitvā punadivase uṭṭhite aruṇe sabbeva antevāsike
atk-s0401a:1082_8: pakkositvā, “tātā, buddho kira loke uppanno, tumhe sīghaṃ gantvā ‘buddho vā no vā’ti
atk-s0401a:1082_9: ñatvā āgantvā mayhaṃ ārocetha, ahaṃ satthu santikaṃ gamissāmi. Apica kho pana mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:1082_10: mahallakabhāvena jīvitantarāyo dujjāno, tumhe tassa santikaṃ gantvā iminā ca iminā
atk-s0401a:1082_11: ca niyāmena pañhe pucchathā”ti muddhaphālanapañhaṃ nāma abhisaṅkharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1083_0: Tato cintesi – “sabbe ime māṇavā paṇḍitā, satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā attano kicce
atk-s0401a:1083_1: matthakaṃ patte puna mayhaṃ santikaṃ āgaccheyyuṃ vā no vā”ti. Atha attano bhāgineyyassa
atk-s0401a:1083_2: ajitamāṇavassa nāma saññaṃ adāsi – “tvaṃ pana ekanteneva mama santikaṃ āgantuṃ arahasi,
atk-s0401a:1083_3: tayā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ āgantvā mayhaṃ katheyyāsī”ti. Atha te soḷasasahassajaṭilā ajitamāṇavaṃ
atk-s0401a:1083_4: jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā soḷasahi jeṭṭhantevāsikehi saddhiṃ “satthāraṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmā”ti
atk-s0401a:1083_5: cārikaṃ carantā gatagataṭṭhāne, “ayyā, kahaṃ gacchatha, kahaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchitā
atk-s0401a:1083_6: “dasabalassa santikaṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ gacchāmā”ti koṭito paṭṭhāya parisaṃ saṃkaḍḍhantā
atk-s0401a:1083_7: anekayojanasataṃ maggaṃ gatā. Satthā “tesaṃ āgamanadivase aññassa okāso na bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:1083_8: idaṃ imissā parisāya anucchavikaṭṭhāna”nti gantvā pāsāṇacetiye piṭṭhipāsāṇe nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1083_9: So ajitamāṇavopi sapariso taṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ āruyha satthu sarīrasampattiṃ disvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0401a:1083_10: puriso imasmiṃ loke vivaṭacchado buddho bhavissatī”ti attano ācariyena pahite pañhe
atk-s0401a:1084_0: Taṃdivasaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sampattaparisā dvādasayojanikā ahosi. Tesaṃ soḷasannaṃ antevāsikānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1084_1: antare mogharājamāṇavo “ahaṃ sabbehi paṇḍitataro”ti mānatthaddho, tassa etadahosi
atk-s0401a:1084_2: – “ayaṃ ajitamāṇavo sabbesaṃ jeṭṭhako, etassa paṭhamataraṃ mama pañhaṃ pucchituṃ
atk-s0401a:1084_3: na yutta”nti. Tassa lajjāyanto paṭhamataraṃ pañhaṃ apucchitvā tena pucchite dutiyo
atk-s0401a:1084_4: hutvā satthāraṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. Satthā “mānatthaddho mogharājamāṇavā, na tāvassa ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:1084_5: paripākaṃ gacchati, assa mānaṃ nivārituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā āha – “tiṭṭha tvaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1084_6: mogharāja, aññe tāva pañhe pucchantū”ti. So satthu santikā apasādaṃ labhitvā cintesi
atk-s0401a:1084_7: – “ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ mayā paṇḍitataro nāma natthīti vicarāmi, buddhā ca nāma ajānitvā
atk-s0401a:1084_8: na kathenti. Satthārā mama pucchāya doso diṭṭho bhavissatī”ti tuṇhī ahosi. So aṭṭhahi
atk-s0401a:1084_9: janehi paṭipāṭiyā pañhe pucchite adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto navamo hutvā puna uṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:1085_0: So punapi tuṇhī hutvā “saṅghanavako dāni bhavituṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti pañcadasamo hutvā
atk-s0401a:1085_1: pañhaṃ pucchi. Atha satthā ñāṇassa paripākabhāvaṃ ñatvā pañhaṃ kathesi. So desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0401a:1085_2: attano parivārena jaṭilasahassena saddhiṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Imināva niyāmena sesānipi
atk-s0401a:1085_3: pannarasa jaṭilasahassāni arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Sabbepi iddhimayapattacīvaradharā
atk-s0401a:1085_4: ehibhikkhūva ahesuṃ. Sesajanā pana na kathiyanti. Ayaṃ mogharājatthero tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:1085_5: tīhi lūkhehi samannāgataṃ cīvaraṃ dhāreti. Evaṃ pārāyane vatthu samuṭṭhitaṃ. Satthā
atk-s0401a:1085_6: pana aparabhāge jetavane nisinno there paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento mogharājattheraṃ
atk-s0401a:1085_7: imasmiṃ sāsane lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapento “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama
atk-s0401a:1085_8: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ yadidaṃ mogharājā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1091: 235. Theripāḷiyā paṭhame yadidaṃ mahāpajāpatigotamīti mahāpajāpatigotamī therī rattaññūnaṃ aggāti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1092_0: Tassā pañhakamme pana ayamanupubbikathā – ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1092_1: kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā aparena samayena satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1092_2: ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ rattaññūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1092_3: patthesi. Sā yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0401a:1092_4: pana ekasmiṃ buddhantare devalokato cavitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ pañcannaṃ dāsisatānaṃ jeṭṭhakadāsī
atk-s0401a:1092_5: hutvā nibbatti. Atha vassūpanāyikasamaye pañca paccekabuddhā nandamūlakapabbhārato
atk-s0401a:1092_6: isipatane otaritvā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā isipatanameva gantvā “vassūpanāyikakuṭiyā
atk-s0401a:1092_7: atthāya hatthakammaṃ yācissāmā”ti cintesuṃ. Kasmā? Vassaṃ upagacchantena hi nālakapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0401a:1092_8: paṭipannenāpi pañcannaṃ chadanānaṃ aññatarena chadanena channe sadvārabaddhe senāsane
atk-s0401a:1092_9: upagantabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabbaṃ, yo upagaccheyya,
atk-s0401a:1092_10: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti. Tasmā vassakāle upakaṭṭhe sace senāsanaṃ labhati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
atk-s0401a:1092_11: No ce labhati, hatthakammaṃ pariyesitvāpi kātabbaṃ. Hatthakammaṃ alabhantena sāmampi
atk-s0401a:1092_12: kātabbaṃ, na tveva asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabbaṃ. Ayamanudhammatā. Tasmā te paccekabuddhā
atk-s0401a:1092_13: “hatthakammaṃ yācissāmā”ti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā sāyanhasamaye nagaraṃ pavisitvā seṭṭhissa
atk-s0401a:1092_14: gharadvāre aṭṭhaṃsu. Jeṭṭhakadāsī kuṭaṃ gahetvā udakatitthaṃ gacchantī paccekabuddhe
atk-s0401a:1092_15: nagaraṃ pavisante addasa. Seṭṭhi tesaṃ āgatakāraṇaṃ sutvā “amhākaṃ okāso natthi, gacchantū”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1093_0: Atha te nagarā nikkhante jeṭṭhakadāsī kuṭaṃ gahetvā pavisantī disvā kuṭaṃ otāretvā
atk-s0401a:1093_1: vanditvā onamitvā mukhaṃ ukkhipitvā, “ayyā, nagaraṃ paviṭṭhamattāva nikkhantā, kiṃ
atk-s0401a:1093_2: nu kho”ti pucchi. Vassūpanāyikakuṭiyā hatthakammaṃ yācituṃ āgatamhāti. Laddhaṃ, bhanteti?
atk-s0401a:1093_3: Na laddhaṃ upāsiketi. Kiṃ panesā kuṭi issareheva kātabbā, udāhu duggatehipi sakkā
atk-s0401a:1093_4: kātunti? Yena kenaci sakkā kātunti. Sādhu, bhante, mayaṃ karissāma, sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0401a:1093_5: gaṇhathāti nimantetvā puna kuṭaṃ gahetvā āgamanatitthamagge ṭhatvā āgatāgatā avasesadāsiyo
atk-s0401a:1093_6: “ettheva hothā”ti vatvā sabbāsaṃ āgatakāle āha – “ammā, kiṃ niccameva parassa dāsikammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1093_7: karissatha, udāhu dāsibhāvato muccituṃ icchathā”ti. Ajjeva muccituṃ icchāma, ayyeti.
atk-s0401a:1093_8: Yadi evaṃ, mayā paccekabuddhā hatthakammaṃ alabhantā svātanāya nimantitā, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:1093_9: sāmikehi ekadivasaṃ hatthakammaṃ dāpethāti. Tā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā sāyaṃ aṭavito
atk-s0401a:1093_10: āgatakāle sāmikānaṃ ārocesuṃ. Te “sādhū”ti jeṭṭhakadāsassa gehadvāre sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1094_0: Atha ne jeṭṭhakadāsī “sve, tātā, paccekabuddhānaṃ hatthakammaṃ dethā”ti ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0401a:1094_1: ācikkhitvā yepi na kātukāmā, te gāḷhena ovādena tajjetvā sabbepi sampaṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1094_2: Sā punadivase paccekabuddhānaṃ bhattaṃ datvā sabbesaṃ dāsaputtānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1094_3: Te tāvadeva araññaṃ pavisitvā dabbasambhāre samodhānetvā sataṃ sataṃ hutvā ekekaṃ
atk-s0401a:1094_4: kuṭiṃ caṅkamanādiparivāraṃ katvā mañcapīṭhapānīya-paribhojanīyādīni ṭhapetvā paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1094_5: temāsaṃ tattheva vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ kāretvā vārabhikkhaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ. Yā attano
atk-s0401a:1094_6: vāradivase na sakkoti, tassā jeṭṭhakadāsī sakagehato nīharitvā deti. Evaṃ temāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:1094_7: paṭijaggitvā jeṭṭhakadāsī ekekaṃ dāsiṃ ekekaṃ sāṭakaṃ sajjāpesi, pañca thūlasāṭakasatāni
atk-s0401a:1094_8: ahesuṃ. Tāni parivattāpetvā pañcannaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ ticīvarāni katvā adāsi. Paccekabuddhā
atk-s0401a:1095_0: Tāpi sabbā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattiṃsu. Tāsu jeṭṭhikā tato cavitvā
atk-s0401a:1095_1: bārāṇasiyā avidūre pesakāragāme pesakārajeṭṭhakassa gehe nibbatti. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0401a:1095_2: padumavatiyā puttā pañcasatā paccekabuddhā bārāṇasiraññā nimantitā rājadvāraṃ āgantvā
atk-s0401a:1095_3: kañci olokentampi adisvā nivattitvā nagaradvārena nikkhamitvā taṃ pesakāragāmaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1095_4: Sā itthī paccekabuddhe disvā sampiyāyamānā sabbe vanditvā bhikkhaṃ adāsi. Te bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0401a:1096_0: Sāpi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsarantī amhākaṃ satthu nibbattito puretarameva
atk-s0401a:1096_1: devadahanagare mahāsuppabuddhassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, gotamītissā nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1096_2: Mahāmāyāya kaniṭṭhabhaginī hoti. Mantajjhāyakā brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇāni pariggaṇhantā
atk-s0401a:1096_3: “imāsaṃ dvinnampi kucchiyaṃ vasitadārakā cakkavattino bhavissantī”ti byākariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1096_4: Suddhodanamahārājā vayappattakāle tā dvepi maṅgalaṃ katvā attano gharaṃ ānesi. Aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1096_5: amhākaṃ bodhisatto tusitapurā cavitvā mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:1096_6: Mahāmāyā tassa jātadivasato sattame divase kālaṃ katvā tusitapure nibbatti. Suddhodanamahārājā
atk-s0401a:1096_7: mahāsattassa mātucchaṃ mahāpajāpatigotamiṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Tasmiṃ kāle
atk-s0401a:1096_8: nandakumāro jāto. Ayaṃ mahāpajāpati nandakumāraṃ dhātīnaṃ datvā sayaṃ bodhisattaṃ parihari.
atk-s0401a:1097_0: Aparena samayena bodhisatto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā sabbaññutaṃ patvā lokānuggahaṃ
atk-s0401a:1097_1: karonto anukkamena kapilavatthuṃ patvā nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Athassa pitā suddhodanamahārājā
atk-s0401a:1097_2: antaravīthiyaṃyeva dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpanno ahosi. Atha dutiyadivase nando pabbaji,
atk-s0401a:1097_3: sattame divase rāhulo. Satthā aparena samayena vesāliṃ upanissāya kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1097_4: viharati. Tasmiṃ samaye suddhodanamahārājā setacchattassa heṭṭhā arahattaṃ sacchikatvā
atk-s0401a:1097_5: parinibbāyi. Tadā mahāpajāpatigotamī pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādesi. Tato rohiṇīnadītīre
atk-s0401a:1097_6: kalahavivādasuttapariyosāne nikkhamitvā pabbajitānaṃ pañcannaṃ kumārasatānaṃ pādaparicārikā
atk-s0401a:1097_7: sabbāva ekacittā hutvā “mahāpajāpatiyā santikaṃ gantvā sabbāva satthu santike pabbajissāmā”ti
atk-s0401a:1097_8: mahāpajāpatiṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ katvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā pabbajitukāmā ahesuṃ. Ayañca
atk-s0401a:1097_9: mahāpajāpati paṭhamameva ekavāraṃ satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācamānā nālattha, tasmā kappakaṃ
atk-s0401a:1097_10: pakkosāpetvā kese chinnāpetvā kāsāyāni acchādetvā sabbā tā sākiyāniyo ādāya vesāliṃ
atk-s0401a:1097_11: gantvā ānandattherena dasabalaṃ yācāpetvā aṭṭhahi garudhammehi pabbajjañca upasampadañca
atk-s0401a:1097_12: alattha. Itarā pana sabbāpi ekatova upasampannā ahesuṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato
atk-s0401a:1098_0: Evaṃ upasampannā pana mahāpajāpati satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0401a:1098_1: aṭṭhāsi, athassā satthā dhammaṃ desesi. Sā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:1098_2: pāpuṇi. Sesā pañcasatā bhikkhuniyo nandakovādasuttapariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1098_3: Evametaṃ vatthu samuṭṭhitaṃ. Aparabhāge satthā jetavane nisinno bhikkhuniyo ṭhānantare
atk-s0401a:1100: 236. Dutiye khemāti evaṃnāmikā bhikkhunī. Ito paṭṭhāya ca panassā pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathāti avatvā sabbattha abhinīhāraṃ ādiṃ katvā vattabbameva vakkhāma.
atk-s0401a:1101_0: Atīte kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ ayaṃ parapariyāpannā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1101_1: Athekadivasaṃ tassa bhagavato aggasāvikaṃ sujātattheriṃ nāma piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:1101_2: tayo modake datvā taṃdivasameva attano kese vissajjetvā theriyā dānaṃ datvā “anāgate
atk-s0401a:1101_3: buddhuppāde tumhe viya mahāpaññā bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammesu
atk-s0401a:1101_4: appamattā hutvā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsarantī kassapabuddhakāle kikissa
atk-s0401a:1101_5: kāsirañño gehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā sattannaṃ bhaginīnaṃ abbhantarā hutvā vīsativassasahassāni
atk-s0401a:1101_6: geheyeva komāribrahmacariyaṃ caritvā tāhi bhaginīhi saddhiṃ dasabalassa vasanapariveṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:1101_7: kāretvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsarantī imasmiṃ buddhuppāde maddaraṭṭhe
atk-s0401a:1101_8: sāgalanagare rājakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, khemātissā nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Tassā sarīravaṇṇo
atk-s0401a:1101_9: suvaṇṇarasapiñjaro viya ahosi. Sā vayappattā bimbisārarañño gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1102_0: Sā tathāgate rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharante “satthā kira rūpe dosaṃ dassetī”ti
atk-s0401a:1102_1: rūpamadamattā hutvā “mayhampi rūpe dosaṃ dasseyyā”ti bhayena dasabalaṃ dassanāya
atk-s0401a:1102_2: na gacchati. Rājā cintesi – “ahaṃ satthu aggupaṭṭhāko, mādisassa ca nāma ariyasāvakassa
atk-s0401a:1102_3: aggamahesī dasabalaṃ dassanāya na gacchati, na me etaṃ ruccatī”ti. So kavīhi veḷuvanuyyānassa
atk-s0401a:1102_4: vaṇṇaṃ bandhāpetvā “khemāya deviyā savanūpacāre gāyathā”ti āha. Sā uyyānassa vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:1102_5: sutvā gantukāmā hutvā rājānaṃ paṭipucchi. Rājā “uyyānaṃ gaccha, satthāraṃ pana adisvā
atk-s0401a:1102_6: āgantuṃ na labhissasī”ti āha. Sā rañño paṭivacanaṃ adatvāva maggaṃ paṭipajji. Rājā
atk-s0401a:1102_7: tāya saddhiṃ gacchante purise āha – “sace devī uyyānato nivattamānā dasabalaṃ passati,
atk-s0401a:1102_8: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. Sace na passati, rājāṇāya naṃ dassethā”ti. Atha kho sā devī divasabhāgaṃ
atk-s0401a:1102_9: uyyāne caritvā nivattantī dasabalaṃ adisvāva gantuṃ āraddhā. Atha naṃ rājapurisā
atk-s0401a:1102_10: attano aruciyāva deviṃ satthu santikaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1103_0: Satthā taṃ āgacchantiṃ disvā iddhiyā ekaṃ devaccharaṃ nimminitvā tālavaṇṭaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0401a:1103_1: bījamānaṃ viya akāsi. Khemā devī taṃ disvā cintesi – “mānamhi naṭṭhā, evarūpā nāma
atk-s0401a:1103_2: devaccharappaṭibhāgā itthiyo dasabalassa avidūre tiṭṭhanti, ahaṃ etāsaṃ paricārikāpi
atk-s0401a:1103_3: nappahomi, mānamadaṃ hi nissāya pāpacittassa vasena naṭṭhā”ti taṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0401a:1103_4: tameva itthiṃ olokayamānā aṭṭhāsi. Athassā passantiyāva tathāgatassa adhiṭṭhānabalena
atk-s0401a:1103_5: sā itthī paṭhamavayaṃ atikkamma majjhimavaye ṭhitā viya majjhimavayaṃ atikkamma pacchimavaye
atk-s0401a:1103_6: ṭhitā viya ca valittacā palitakesā khaṇḍaviraḷadantā ahosi. Tato tassā passantiyāva
atk-s0401a:1103_7: saddhiṃ tālavaṇṭena parivattitvā paripati. Tato khemā pubbahetusampannattā tasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:1103_8: ārammaṇe āpāthagate evaṃ cintesi – “evaṃvidhampi nāma sarīraṃ evarūpaṃ vipattiṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0401a:1103_9: mayhampi sarīraṃ evaṃgatikameva bhavissatī”ti. Athassā evaṃ cintitakkhaṇe satthā
atk-s0401a:1108_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne ṭhitapade ṭhitāyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Agāramajjhe
atk-s0401a:1108_1: vasantena nāma arahattaṃ pattena taṃdivasameva parinibbāyitabbaṃ vā pabbajitabbaṃ
atk-s0401a:1108_2: vā hoti, sā pana attano āyusaṅkhārānaṃ pavattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “attano pabbajjaṃ anujānāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:1108_3: satthāraṃ vanditvā rājanivesanaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ anabhivādetvāva aṭṭhāsi. Rājā iṅgiteneva
atk-s0401a:1108_4: aññāsi – “ariyadhammaṃ pattā bhavissatī”ti. Atha naṃ āha – “devi gatā nu kho satthudassanāyā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1108_5: Mahārāja, tumhehi diṭṭhadassanaṃ parittaṃ, ahaṃ pana dasabalaṃ sudiṭṭhamakāsiṃ, pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:1108_6: me anujānāthāti. Rājā “sādhu, devī”ti sampaṭicchitvā suvaṇṇasivikāya bhikkhuniupassayaṃ
atk-s0401a:1108_7: upanetvā pabbājesi. Athassā “khemātherī nāma gihibhāve ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pattā”ti
atk-s0401a:1108_8: mahāpaññabhāvo pākaṭo ahosi. Idamettha vatthu. Atha satthā aparabhāge jetavane nisinno
atk-s0401a:1108_9: bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento khemātheriṃ mahāpaññānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1110_0: 237. Tatiye uppalavaṇṇāti nīluppalagabbhasadiseneva vaṇṇena samannāgatattā evaṃladdhanāmā
atk-s0401a:1110_1: therī. Sā kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1110_2: mahājanena saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ
atk-s0401a:1110_3: iddhimantīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0401a:1110_4: mahādānaṃ datvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Sā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu
atk-s0401a:1110_5: saṃsarantī kassapabuddhakāle bārāṇasinagare kikissa kāsirañño gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0401a:1110_6: sattannaṃ bhaginīnaṃ abbhantarā hutvā vīsati vassasahassāni brahmacariyaṃ caritvā
atk-s0401a:1111_0: Tato cavitvā puna manussalokaṃ āgacchantī ekasmiṃ gāme sahatthā kammaṃ katvā jīvanakaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1111_1: nibbattā. Sā ekadivasaṃ khettakuṭiṃ gacchantī antarāmagge ekasmiṃ sare pātova pupphitaṃ
atk-s0401a:1111_2: padumapupphaṃ disvā taṃ saraṃ oruyha tañceva pupphaṃ lājapakkhipanatthāya paduminiyā
atk-s0401a:1111_3: pattañca gahetvā kedāre sālisīsāni chinditvā kuṭikāya nisinnā lāje bhajjitvā pañca
atk-s0401a:1111_4: lājasatāni gaṇesi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe gandhamādanapabbate nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhito eko
atk-s0401a:1111_5: paccekabuddho āgantvā tassā avidūre aṭṭhāsi. Sā paccekabuddhaṃ disvā lājehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1111_6: padumapupphaṃ gahetvā kuṭito oruyha lāje paccekabuddhassa patte pakkhipitvā padumapupphena
atk-s0401a:1111_7: pattaṃ pidhāya adāsi. Athassā paccekabuddhe thokaṃ gate etadahosi – “pabbajitā nāma
atk-s0401a:1111_8: pupphena anatthikā, ahaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā piḷandhissāmī”ti gantvā paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0401a:1111_9: hatthato pupphaṃ gahetvā puna cintesi – “sace, ayyo, pupphena anatthiko abhavissa,
atk-s0401a:1111_10: pattamatthake ṭhapetuṃ na adassa, addhā ayyassa attho bhavissatī”ti puna gantvā pattamatthake
atk-s0401a:1111_11: ṭhapetvā paccekabuddhaṃ khamāpetvā, “bhante, imesaṃ me lājānaṃ nissandena lājagaṇanāya
atk-s0401a:1111_12: puttā assu, padumapupphassa nissandena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me pade pade padumapupphaṃ
atk-s0401a:1111_13: uṭṭhahatū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi. Paccekabuddho tassā passantiyāva ākāsena gandhamādanapabbataṃ
atk-s0401a:1111_14: gantvā taṃ padumaṃ nandamūlakapabbhāre paccekabuddhānaṃ akkamanasopānasamīpe pādapuñchanaṃ katvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:1112_0: Sāpi tassa kammassa nissandena devaloke paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:1112_1: cassā pade pade mahāpadumapupphaṃ uṭṭhāsi. Sā tato cavitvā pabbatapāde ekasmiṃ padumassare
atk-s0401a:1112_2: padumagabbhe nibbatti. Taṃ nissāya eko tāpaso vasati, so pātova mukhadhovanatthāya
atk-s0401a:1112_3: saraṃ gantvā taṃ pupphaṃ disvā cintesi – “idaṃ pupphaṃ sesehi mahantataraṃ, sesāni
atk-s0401a:1112_4: ca pupphitāni, idaṃ makuḷitameva, bhavitabbamettha kāraṇenā”ti udakaṃ otaritvā taṃ
atk-s0401a:1112_5: pupphaṃ gaṇhi. Taṃ tena gahitamattameva pupphitaṃ. Tāpaso antopadumagabbhe nipannadārikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1112_6: addasa. Diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya ca dhītusinehaṃ labhitvā padumeneva saddhiṃ paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0401a:1112_7: netvā mañcake nipajjāpesi. Athassā puññānubhāvena aṅguṭṭhake khīraṃ nibbatti. So
atk-s0401a:1112_8: tasmiṃ pupphe milāte aññaṃ navapupphaṃ āharitvā taṃ nipajjāpesi. Athassā ādhāvanavidhāvanena
atk-s0401a:1112_9: kīḷituṃ samatthakālato paṭṭhāya padavāre padavāre padumapupphaṃ uṭṭhāsi, kuṅkumarāsissa
atk-s0401a:1112_10: viyassā sarīravaṇṇo ahosi. Sā appattā devavaṇṇaṃ, atikkantā mānusavaṇṇaṃ ahosi. Sā
atk-s0401a:1113_0: Athekadivasaṃ tassā vayappattakāle pitari phalāphalatthāya gate eko vanacarako taṃ
atk-s0401a:1113_1: disvā cintesi – “manussānaṃ nāma evaṃvidhaṃ rūpaṃ natthi, vīmaṃsissāmi na”nti tāpasassa
atk-s0401a:1113_2: āgamanaṃ udikkhanto nisīdi. Sā pitari āgacchante paṭipathaṃ gantvā tassa hatthato
atk-s0401a:1113_3: kājakamaṇḍaluṃ aggahesi, āgantvā nisinnassa cassa attanā karaṇavattaṃ dassesi. Tadā
atk-s0401a:1113_4: so vanacarako manussabhāvaṃ ñatvā tāpasaṃ abhivādetvā nisīdi. Tāpaso taṃ vanacarakaṃ
atk-s0401a:1113_5: vanamūlaphalāphalehi ca pānīyena ca nimantetvā, “bho purisa, imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne vasissasi,
atk-s0401a:1113_6: udāhu gamisassī”ti pucchi. Gamissāmi, bhante, idha kiṃ karissāmīti. Idaṃ tayā diṭṭhakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:1113_7: etto gantvā akathetuṃ sakkhissasīti. Sace, ayyo, na icchati, kiṃ kāraṇā kathessāmīti
atk-s0401a:1113_8: tāpasaṃ vanditvā puna āgamanakāle maggasañjānanatthaṃ sākhāsaññañca rukkhasaññañca karonto pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:1114_0: So bārāṇasiṃ gantvā rājānaṃ addasa, rājā “kasmā āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ, deva, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:1114_1: vanacarako pabbatapāde acchariyaṃ itthiratanaṃ disvā āgatomhī”ti sabbaṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0401a:1114_2: kathesi. So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā vegena pabbatapādaṃ gantvā avidūre ṭhāne khandhāvāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1114_3: nivesetvā vanacarakena ceva aññehi ca purisehi saddhiṃ tāpasassa bhattakiccaṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:1114_4: nisinnavelāya tattha gantvā abhivādetvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Rājā
atk-s0401a:1114_5: tāpasassa pabbajitaparikkhārabhaṇḍaṃ pādamūle ṭhapetvā, “bhante, imasmiṃ ṭhāne kiṃ
atk-s0401a:1114_6: karoma, gacchāmā”ti āha. Gaccha, mahārājāti. Āma, gacchāmi, bhante. Ayyassa pana
atk-s0401a:1114_7: samīpe visabhāgaparisā atthīti assumha, asāruppā esā pabbajitānaṃ, mayā saddhiṃ gacchatu,
atk-s0401a:1114_8: bhanteti. Manussānaṃ cittaṃ nāma duttosayaṃ, kathaṃ bahūnaṃ majjhe vasissatīti. Amhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:1114_9: rucitakālato paṭṭhāya sesānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā paṭijaggissāmi, bhanteti.
atk-s0401a:1115_0: So rañño kathaṃ sutvā daharakāle gahitanāmavaseneva, “amma, padumavatī”ti dhītaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1115_1: pakkosi. Sā ekavacaneneva paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā pitaraṃ abhivādetvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha
atk-s0401a:1115_2: naṃ pitā āha – “tvaṃ, amma, vayappattā, imasmiṃ ṭhāne raññā diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:1115_3: vasituṃ ayuttā, raññā saddhiṃ gaccha, ammā”ti. Sā “sādhu, tātā”ti pitu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0401a:1115_4: abhivādetvā parodamānā aṭṭhāsi. Rājā “imissā pitu cittaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1115_5: kahāpaṇarāsimhi ṭhapetvā abhisekaṃ akāsi. Atha naṃ gahetvā attano nagaraṃ ānetvā
atk-s0401a:1115_6: āgatakālato paṭṭhāya sesaitthiyo anoloketvā tāya saddhiṃyeva ramati. Tā itthiyo issāpakatā
atk-s0401a:1115_7: taṃ rañño antare paribhinditukāmā evamāhaṃsu – “nāyaṃ, mahārāja, manussajātikā, kahaṃ
atk-s0401a:1115_8: nāma tumhehi manussānaṃ vicaraṇaṭṭhāne padumāni uṭṭhahantāni diṭṭhapubbāni, addhā
atk-s0401a:1115_9: ayaṃ yakkhinī, nīharatha naṃ mahārājā”ti. Rājā tāsaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1116_0: Athassa aparena samayena paccanto kupito. So “garugabbhā padumavatī”ti taṃ nagare
atk-s0401a:1116_1: ṭhapetvā paccantaṃ agamāsi. Atha tā itthiyo tassā upaṭṭhāyikāya lañjaṃ datvā “imissā
atk-s0401a:1116_2: dārakaṃ jātamattameva apanetvā ekaṃ dārughaṭikaṃ lohitena makkhetvā santike ṭhapehī”ti
atk-s0401a:1116_3: āhaṃsu. Padumavatiyāpi nacirasseva gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi. Mahāpadumakumāro ekakova
atk-s0401a:1116_4: kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Avasesā ekūnapañcasatā dārakā mahāpadumakumārassa mātukucchito
atk-s0401a:1116_5: nikkhamitvā nipannakāle saṃsedajā hutvā nibbattiṃsu. Athassa “na tāvāyaṃ satiṃ paṭilabhatī”ti
atk-s0401a:1116_6: ñatvā upaṭṭhāyikā ekaṃ dārughaṭikaṃ lohitena makkhetvā samīpe ṭhapetvā tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:1116_7: saññaṃ adāsi. Tā pañcasatāpi itthiyo ekekā ekekaṃ dārakaṃ gahetvā cundakārakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1116_8: santikaṃ pesetvā karaṇḍake āharāpetvā attanā attanā gahitadārake tattha nipajjāpetvā
atk-s0401a:1117_0: Padumavatīpi kho saññaṃ labhitvā taṃ upaṭṭhāyikaṃ “kiṃ vijātamhi, ammā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:1117_1: Sā taṃ santajjetvā “kuto tvaṃ dārakaṃ labhissasī”ti vatvā “ayaṃ te kucchito nikkhantadārako”ti
atk-s0401a:1117_2: lohitamakkhitaṃ dārughaṭikaṃ purato ṭhapesi. Sā taṃ disvā domanassappattā “sīghaṃ
atk-s0401a:1117_3: naṃ phāletvā apanehi, sace koci passeyya lajjitabbaṃ bhaveyyā”ti āha. Sā tassā kathaṃ
atk-s0401a:1117_4: sutvā atthakāmā viya dārughaṭikaṃ phāletvā uddhane pakkhipi.
atk-s0401a:1118_0: Rājāpi paccantato āgantvā nakkhattaṃ paṭimānento bahinagare khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0401a:1118_1: nisīdi. Atha tā pañcasatā itthiyo rañño paccuggamanaṃ āgantvā āhaṃsu – “tvaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0401a:1118_2: na amhākaṃ saddahasi, amhehi vuttaṃ akāraṇaṃ viya hoti. Tvaṃ mahesiyā upaṭṭhāyikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1118_3: pakkosāpetvā paṭipuccha, dārughaṭikaṃ te devī vijātā”ti. Rājā taṃ kāraṇaṃ na upaparikkhitvāva
atk-s0401a:1118_4: “amanussajātikā bhavissatī”ti taṃ gehato nikkaḍḍhi. Tassā rājagehato saha nikkhamaneneva
atk-s0401a:1118_5: padumapupphāni antaradhāyiṃsu, sarīracchavipi vivaṇṇā ahosi. Sā ekikāva antaravīthiyā
atk-s0401a:1118_6: pāyāsi. Atha naṃ ekā vayappattā mahallikā itthī disvā dhītusinehaṃ uppādetvā “kahaṃ
atk-s0401a:1118_7: gacchasi ammā”ti āha. Āgantukamhi, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ olokentī vicarāmīti. Idhāgaccha,
atk-s0401a:1119_0: Tassā imināva niyāmena tattha vasamānāya tā pañcasatā itthiyo ekacittā hutvā rājānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1119_1: āhaṃsu – “mahārāja, tumhesu yuddhaṃ gatesu amhehi gaṅgādevatāya ‘amhākaṃ deve vijitasaṅgāme
atk-s0401a:1119_2: āgate balikammaṃ katvā udakakīḷaṃ karissāmā’ti patthitaṃ atthi, etamatthaṃ, deva,
atk-s0401a:1119_3: jānāpemā”ti. Rājā tāsaṃ vacanena tuṭṭho gaṅgāyaṃ udakakīḷaṃ kātuṃ agamāsi. Tāpi attanā
atk-s0401a:1119_4: attanā gahitaṃ karaṇḍakaṃ paṭicchannaṃ katvā ādāya nadiṃ gantvā tesaṃ karaṇḍakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1119_5: paṭicchādanatthaṃ pārupitvā pārupitvā udake patitvā karaṇḍake vissajjesuṃ. Tepi kho
atk-s0401a:1119_6: karaṇḍakā sabbe saha gantvā heṭṭhāsote pasāritajālamhi laggiṃsu. Tato udakakīḷaṃ
atk-s0401a:1119_7: kīḷitvā rañño uttiṇṇakāle jālaṃ ukkhipantā te karaṇḍake disvā rañño santikaṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1119_8: Rājā karaṇḍake disvā “kiṃ, tātā, karaṇḍakesū”ti āha. Na jānāma, devāti. So te karaṇḍake
atk-s0401a:1119_9: vivarāpetvā olokento paṭhamaṃ mahāpadumakumārassa karaṇḍakaṃ vivarāpesi. Tesaṃ pana
atk-s0401a:1119_10: sabbesampi karaṇḍakesu nipajjāpitadivaseyeva puññiddhiyā aṅguṭṭhato khīraṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1119_11: Sakko devarājā tassa rañño nikkaṅkhabhāvatthaṃ antokaraṇḍake akkharāni likhāpesi
atk-s0401a:1119_12: “ime kumārā padumavatiyā kucchimhi nibbattā bārāṇasirañño puttā, atha ne padumavatiyā
atk-s0401a:1119_13: sapattiyo pañcasatā itthiyo karaṇḍakesu pakkhipitvā udake khipiṃsu, rājā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:1119_14: jānātū”ti. Karaṇḍake vivaritamatte rājā akkharāni vācetvā dārake disvā mahāpadumakumāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1119_15: ukkhipitvā “vegena rathe yojetha, asse kappetha, ahaṃ ajja antonagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0401a:1119_16: ekaccānaṃ mātugāmānaṃ piyaṃ karissāmī”ti pāsādaṃ āruyha hatthigīvāya sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1119_17: ṭhapetvā bheriṃ carāpesi “yo padumavatiṃ passati, so imaṃ sahassaṃ gaṇhatū”ti.
atk-s0401a:1120_0: Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā padumavatī mātuyā saññaṃ adāsi – “hatthigīvato sahassaṃ gaṇha, ammā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1120_1: Ahaṃ evarūpaṃ gaṇhituṃ na visahāmīti. Sā dutiyampi tatiyampi vutte, “kiṃ vatvā gaṇhāmi
atk-s0401a:1120_2: ammā”ti āha. “Mama dhītā, padumavatiṃ deviṃ passatī”ti vatvā gaṇhāhīti. Sā “yaṃ vā
atk-s0401a:1120_3: taṃ vā hotū”ti gantvā sahassacaṅkoṭakaṃ gaṇhi. Atha naṃ manussā pucchiṃsu – “padumavatiṃ
atk-s0401a:1120_4: deviṃ passasi, ammā”ti. “Ahaṃ na passāmi, dhītā kira me passatī”ti āha. Te “kahaṃ
atk-s0401a:1120_5: pana sā, ammā”ti vatvā tāya saddhiṃ gantvā padumavatiṃ sañjānitvā pādesu nipatiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1120_6: Tasmiṃ kāle sā “padumavatī devī aya”nti ñatvā “bhāriyaṃ vata itthiyā kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0401a:1120_7: yā evaṃvidhassa rañño mahesī samānā evarūpe ṭhāne nirārakkhā vasī”ti āha. Tepi rājapurisā
atk-s0401a:1120_8: padumavatiyā nivesanaṃ setasāṇīhi parikkhipāpetvā dvāre ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1120_9: Rājā suvaṇṇasivikaṃ pesesi. Sā “ahaṃ evaṃ na gamissāmi, mama vasanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:1120_10: yāva rājagehaṃ etthantare varapotthakacittattharaṇe attharāpetvā upari suvaṇṇatārakavicittaṃ
atk-s0401a:1120_11: celavitānaṃ bandhāpetvā pasādhanatthāya sabbālaṅkāresu pahitesu padasāva gamissāmi,
atk-s0401a:1120_12: evaṃ me nāgarā sampattiṃ passissantī”ti āha. Rājā “padumavatiyā yathāruciṃ karothā”ti
atk-s0401a:1120_13: āha. Tato padumavatī sabbapasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā “rājagehaṃ gamissāmī”ti maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0401a:1120_15: uṭṭhahiṃsu. Sā mahājanassa attano sampattiṃ dassetvā rājanivesanaṃ āruyha sabbe cittattharaṇe
atk-s0401a:1121_0: Rājāpi kho tā pañcasatā itthiyo pakkosāpetvā “imāyo te devi dāsiyo katvā demī”ti
atk-s0401a:1121_1: āha. Sādhu, mahārāja, etāsaṃ mayhaṃ dinnabhāvaṃ sakalanagare jānāpehīti. Rājā nagare
atk-s0401a:1121_2: bheriṃ carāpesi – “padumavatiyā dūbbhikā pañcasatā itthiyo etissā eva dāsiyo katvā
atk-s0401a:1121_3: dinnā”ti. Sā “tāsaṃ sakalanagarena dāsibhāvo sallakkhito”ti ñatvā “ahaṃ mama dāsiyo
atk-s0401a:1121_4: bhujissā kātuṃ labhāmi devā”ti rājānaṃ pucchi. Tava icchā devīti. Evaṃ sante tameva
atk-s0401a:1121_5: bhericārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “padumavatideviyā attano dāsiyo katvā dinnā pañcasatā itthiyo
atk-s0401a:1121_6: sabbāva bhujissā katāti puna bheriṃ carāpethā”ti āha. Sā tāsaṃ bhujissabhāve kate
atk-s0401a:1121_7: ekūnāni pañcasattaputtāni tāsaṃyeva hatthe posanatthāya datvā sayaṃ mahāpadumakumāraṃyeva gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:1122_0: Atha aparabhāge tesaṃ kumārānaṃ kīḷanavaye sampatte rājā uyyāne nānāvidhaṃ kīḷanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1122_1: kāresi. Te attano soḷasavassuddesikakāle sabbeva ekato hutvā uyyāne padumasañchannāya
atk-s0401a:1122_2: maṅgalapokkharaṇiyā kīḷantā navapadumāni pupphitāni purāṇapadumāni ca vaṇṭato patantāni
atk-s0401a:1122_3: disvā “imassa tāva anupādinnakassa evarūpā jarā pāpuṇāti, kimaṅgaṃ pana amhākaṃ sarīrassa.
atk-s0401a:1122_4: Idampi hi evaṃgatikameva bhavissatī”ti ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā sabbeva paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:1123_0: Atha tehi saddhiṃ āgatā rājapurisā bahugataṃ divasaṃ ñatvā “ayyaputtā tumhākaṃ velaṃ
atk-s0401a:1123_1: jānāthā”ti āhaṃsu. Te tuṇhī ahesuṃ. Te purisā gantvā rañño ārocesuṃ – “kumārā deva,
atk-s0401a:1123_2: padumakaṇṇikāsu nisinnā, amhesu kathentesupi vacībhedaṃ na karontī”ti. Yathāruciyā
atk-s0401a:1123_3: tesaṃ nisīdituṃ dethāti. Te sabbarattiṃ gahitārakkhā padumakaṇṇikāsu nisinnaniyāmeneva
atk-s0401a:1123_4: aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpesuṃ. Purisā punadivase upasaṅkamitvā “devā velaṃ jānāthā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1123_5: Na mayaṃ devā, paccekabuddhā nāma mayanti. Ayyā, tumhe bhāriyaṃ kathaṃ kathetha,
atk-s0401a:1123_6: paccekabuddhā nāma tumhādisā na honti, dvaṅgulakesamassudharā kāye paṭimukkaaṭṭhaparikkhārā
atk-s0401a:1123_7: hontīti. Te dakkhiṇahatthena sīsaṃ parāmasiṃsu. Tāvadeva gihiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyi,
atk-s0401a:1123_8: aṭṭha parikkhārā kāye paṭimukkāva ahesuṃ. Tato passantasseva mahājanassa ākāsena
atk-s0401a:1124_0: Sāpi kho, padumavatī devī, “ahaṃ bahuputtā hutvā niputtā jātā”ti hadayasokaṃ patvā
atk-s0401a:1124_1: teneva sokena kālaṃ katvā rājagahanagaradvāragāmake sahatthena kammaṃ katvā jīvanakaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1124_2: nibbatti. Aparabhāge kulagharaṃ gantvā ekadivasaṃ sāmikassa khettaṃ yāguṃ haramānā
atk-s0401a:1124_3: tesaṃ attano puttānaṃ antare aṭṭha paccekabuddhe bhikkhācāravelāya ākāsena gacchante
atk-s0401a:1124_4: disvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gantvā sāmikassa ārocesi – “passa, ayya, paccekabuddhe, ete nimantetvā
atk-s0401a:1124_5: bhojessāmā”ti. So āha – “samaṇasakuṇā nāmete aññatthāpi evaṃ caranti, na ete paccekabuddhā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1124_6: Te tesaṃ kathentānaṃyeva avidūre ṭhāne otariṃsu. Sā itthī taṃdivasaṃ attano bhattakhajjabhojanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1124_7: tesaṃ datvā “svepi aṭṭha janā mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha. Sādhu, upāsike, tava
atk-s0401a:1124_8: sakkāro ettakova hotu, āsanāni ca aṭṭheva hontu, aññepi bahū paccekabuddhe disvā
atk-s0401a:1124_9: tava cittaṃ pasādeyyāsīti. Sā punadivase aṭṭha āsanāni paññāpetvā aṭṭhannaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ paṭiyādetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1125_0: Nimantitapaccekabuddhā sesānaṃ saññaṃ adaṃsu – “mārisā, ajja aññattha agantvā sabbeva
atk-s0401a:1125_1: tumhākaṃ mātu saṅgahaṃ karothā”ti. Te tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā sabbeva ekato ākāsena āgantvā
atk-s0401a:1125_2: mātu-gehadvāre pāturahesuṃ. Sāpi paṭhamaṃ laddhasaññatāya bahūpi disvā na kampittha,
atk-s0401a:1125_3: sabbepi te gehaṃ pavesetvā āsanesu nisīdāpesi. Tesu paṭipāṭiyā nisīdantesu navamo
atk-s0401a:1125_4: aññāni aṭṭha āsanāni māpetvā sayaṃ dhurāsane nisīdi. Yāva āsanāni vaḍḍhanti, tāva
atk-s0401a:1125_5: gehaṃ vaḍḍhati. Evaṃ tesu sabbesupi nisinnesu sā itthī aṭṭhannaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1125_6: paṭiyāditaṃ sakkāraṃ pañcasatānampi yāvadatthaṃ datvā aṭṭha nīluppalahatthake āharitvā
atk-s0401a:1125_7: nimantitapaccekabuddhānaṃyeva pādamūle ṭhapetvā āha – “mayhaṃ, bhante, nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1125_8: sarīravaṇṇo imesaṃ nīluppalānaṃ antogabbhavaṇṇo viya hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi. Paccekabuddhā
atk-s0401a:1126_0: Sāpi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1126_1: seṭṭhikule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, nīluppalagabbhasamānavaṇṇatāya cassā uppalavaṇṇātveva
atk-s0401a:1126_2: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Athassā vayappattakāle sakalajambudīparājāno ca seṭṭhino ca seṭṭhissa
atk-s0401a:1126_3: santikaṃ pahiṇiṃsu – “dhītaraṃ amhākaṃ detū”ti. Apahiṇanto nāma nāhosi. Tato seṭṭhi
atk-s0401a:1126_4: cintesi – “ahaṃ sabbesaṃ manaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkhissāmi, upāyaṃ panekaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:1126_5: dhītaraṃ pakkosāpetvā “pabbajituṃ amma sakkhissasī”ti āha. Tassā pacchimabhavikattā
atk-s0401a:1126_6: pituvacanaṃ sīse āsittasatapākatelaṃ viya ahosi, tasmā pitaraṃ “pabbajissāmi, tātā”ti
atk-s0401a:1126_7: āha. So tassā sakkāraṃ katvā bhikkhuniupassayaṃ netvā pabbājesi. Tassā acirapabbajitāya
atk-s0401a:1126_8: eva uposathāgāre kālavāro pāpuṇi. Sā dīpaṃ jāletvā uposathāgāraṃ sammajjitvā dīpasikhāya
atk-s0401a:1126_9: nimittaṃ gaṇhitvā punappunaṃ olokayamānā tejokasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva
atk-s0401a:1126_10: pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahattaphalena saddhiṃyeva ca iddhivikubbane ciṇṇavasī
atk-s0401a:1126_11: ahosi. Sā aparabhāge satthu yamakapāṭihāriyakaraṇadivase “ahaṃ, bhante, pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1126_12: karissāmī”ti sīhanādaṃ nadi. Satthā idaṃ kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā jetavanavihāre
atk-s0401a:1126_13: nisinno paṭipāṭiyā bhikkhuniyo ṭhānantare ṭhapento imaṃ theriṃ iddhimantīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1128_0: 238. Catutthe vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ paṭācārāti paṭācārā therī vinayadharānaṃ aggāti
atk-s0401a:1128_1: dasseti. Sā kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0401a:1128_2: aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vinayadharānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1128_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Sā yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0401a:1128_4: kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaritvā kassapabuddhakāle kikissa kāsirañño gehe paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1128_5: gaṇhitvā sattannaṃ bhaginīnaṃ abbhantarā hutvā vīsati vassasahassāni brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1128_6: caritvā bhikkhusaṅghassa pariveṇaṃ katvā puna devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1128_7: sampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhigehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:1129_0: Sā aparabhāge vayappattā attano gehe ekena kammakārena saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1129_1: attano samānajātikaṃ kulaṃ gacchantī katasanthavassa purisassa saññaṃ adāsi – “na
atk-s0401a:1129_2: tvaṃ sve paṭṭhāya maṃ paṭihārasatenapi daṭṭhuṃ labhissasi, sace te kammaṃ atthi,
atk-s0401a:1129_3: idāni maṃ gaṇhitvā gacchāhī”ti. So “evaṃ hotū”ti anucchavikaṃ hatthasāraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0401a:1129_4: taṃ ādāya nagarato tīṇi cattāri yojanāni paṭikkamitvā ekasmiṃ gāmake vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0401a:1130_0: Atha aparabhāge tassā kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāsi. Sā gabbhe paripakke “idaṃ amhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:1130_1: anāthaṭṭhānaṃ, kulagehaṃ gacchāma sāmī”ti āha. So “ajja gacchāma, sve gacchāmā”ti
atk-s0401a:1130_2: gantuṃ asakkonto kālaṃ vītināmesi. Sā tassa kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “nāyaṃ bālo maṃ nessatī”ti
atk-s0401a:1130_3: tasmiṃ bahi gate “ekikāva kulagehaṃ gamissāmī”ti maggaṃ paṭipajji. So āgantvā taṃ
atk-s0401a:1130_4: gehe apassanto paṭivissake pucchitvā “kulagehaṃ gatā”ti sutvā “maṃ nissāya kuladhītā
atk-s0401a:1130_5: anāthā jātā”ti padānupadikaṃ gantvā sampāpuṇi. Tassā antarāmaggeva gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1130_6: ahosi. Tato “yassatthāya mayaṃ gaccheyyāma, so attho antarāmaggeva nipphanno, idāni
atk-s0401a:1130_7: gantvā kiṃ karissāmā”ti paṭinivattiṃsu. Puna tassā kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāsīti
atk-s0401a:1131_0: Antarāmagge panassā gabbhavuṭṭhāne jātamatteyeva catūsu disāsu mahāmegho uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0401a:1131_1: Sā taṃ purisaṃ āha – “sāmi, avelāya catūsu disāsu megho uṭṭhito, attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1131_2: kātuṃ vāyamāhī”ti. So “evaṃ karissāmī”ti daṇḍakehi kuṭikaṃ katvā “chadanatthāya tiṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:1131_3: āharissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ mahāvammikapāde tiṇaṃ chindati. Atha naṃ vammike nipanno kaṇhasappo
atk-s0401a:1131_4: pāde ḍaṃsi, so tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne patito. Sāpi “idāni āgamissati, idāni āgamissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:1131_5: sabbarattiṃ khepetvā “addhā maṃ so ‘anāthā esā’ti magge chaḍḍetvā gato bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:1131_6: āloke sañjāte padānusārena olokentī vammikapāde patitaṃ disvā “maṃ nissāya naṭṭho
atk-s0401a:1131_7: puriso”ti paridevitvā daharadārakaṃ passenādāya mahallakaṃ aṅgulīhi gāhāpetvā maggena
atk-s0401a:1131_8: gacchantī antarāmagge ekaṃ uttānanadiṃ disvā “dvepi dārake ekappahāreneva ādāya gantuṃ
atk-s0401a:1131_9: na sakkhissāmī”ti jeṭṭhakaṃ orimatīre ṭhapetvā daharaṃ paratīraṃ netvā pilotikacumbaṭake
atk-s0401a:1131_10: nipajjāpetvā puna nivattitvā “itaraṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti nadiṃ otari.
atk-s0401a:1132_0: Athassā nadīmajjhaṃ pattakāle eko seno “maṃsapiṇḍo aya”nti saññāya dārakaṃ vijjhituṃ
atk-s0401a:1132_1: āgacchati. Sā hatthaṃ pasāretvā senaṃ palāpesi. Tassā taṃ hatthavikāraṃ disvā mahallakadārako
atk-s0401a:1132_2: “maṃ pakkosatī”ti saññāya nadiṃ otaritvā sote patito yathāsotaṃ agamāsi. Sopi seno
atk-s0401a:1132_3: tassā asampattāya eva taṃ daharadārakaṃ gaṇhitvā agamāsi. Sā balavasokābhibhūtā antarāmagge
atk-s0401a:1133: “Ubho puttā kālaṅkatā, panthe mayhaṃ patī mato”ti.
atk-s0401a:1134_0: Sā evaṃ vilapamānāva sāvatthiṃ patvā kulasabhāgaṃ gantvāpi sokavaseneva attano gehaṃ
atk-s0401a:1134_1: vavatthapetuṃ asakkontī “imasmiṃ ṭhāne evaṃvidhaṃ nāma kulaṃ atthi, kataraṃ taṃ geha”nti
atk-s0401a:1134_2: paṭipucchi. Tvaṃ taṃ kulaṃ paṭipucchitvā kiṃ karissasi? Tesaṃ vasanagehaṃ vātappahārena
atk-s0401a:1134_3: patitaṃ, tattheva te sabbepi jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā, atha ne khuddakamahallake ekacitakasmiṃyeva
atk-s0401a:1134_4: jhāpenti, passa esā dhūmavaṭṭi paññāyatīti. Sā taṃ kathaṃ sutvāva kiṃ tumhe vadathā”ti
atk-s0401a:1134_5: attano nivatthasāṭakaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontī jātaniyāmeneva bāhā paggayha kandamānā
atk-s0401a:1134_6: ñātīnaṃ citakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ vilāpagītaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā paridevamānā –
atk-s0401a:1135: “Ubho puttā kālaṅkatā, panthe mayhaṃ patī mato;
atk-s0401a:1136: Mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, ekacitakasmiṃ ḍayhare”ti. –
atk-s0401a:1137_0: Āha. Aññena janena sāṭakaṃ dinnampi phāletvā phāletvā chaḍḍeti. Atha naṃ diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1137_1: mahājano parivāretvā carati. Athassā “ayaṃ paṭācāraṃ paṭapariharaṇaṃ vinā caratī”ti
atk-s0401a:1137_2: paṭācārāteva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Yasmā cassā so naggabhāvena alajjīācāro pākaṭo ahosi,
atk-s0401a:1137_3: tasmā patito ācāro assāti paṭācārātveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1138_0: Sā ekadivasaṃ satthari mahājanassa dhammaṃ desente vihāraṃ pavisitvā parisapariyante
atk-s0401a:1138_1: aṭṭhāsi. Satthā mettāpharaṇena pharitvā “satiṃ paṭilabha, bhagini, satiṃ paṭilabha,
atk-s0401a:1138_2: bhaginī”ti āha. Tassā satthu vacanaṃ sutvā balavahirottappaṃ āgataṃ, sā tattheva
atk-s0401a:1138_3: bhūmiyaṃ nisīdi. Avidūre ṭhito puriso uttarisāṭakaṃ khipitvā adāsi. Sā taṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0401a:1138_4: dhammaṃ assosi. Satthā tassā cariyavasena imā dhammapade gāthā āha –
atk-s0401a:1139: “Na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā;
atk-s0401a:1143_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne yathāṭhitāva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0401a:1143_1: vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Satthā “tassā bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gantvā pabbajā”ti pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:1143_2: sampaṭicchi. Sā pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā buddhavacanaṃ gaṇhantī vinayapiṭake
atk-s0401a:1143_3: ciṇṇavasī ahosi. Aparabhāge satthā jetavane nisinno bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare
atk-s0401a:1145_0: 239. Pañcame dhammakathikānanti dhammakathikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dhammadinnā aggāti
atk-s0401a:1145_1: dasseti. Sā kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ parāyattaṭṭhāne nibbattitvā padumuttarassa
atk-s0401a:1145_2: bhagavato aggasāvakassa sujātattherassa adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1145_3: Sā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā sagge nibbatti. Sabbaṃ heṭṭhā khemātheriyā abhinīhāravaseneva
atk-s0401a:1145_4: veditabbaṃ. Phussabuddhakāle panesā satthu vemātikānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhātikānaṃ dānādhikāre
atk-s0401a:1145_5: ṭhapitakammikassa gehe vasamānā “ekaṃ dehī”ti vuttā dve adāsi. Evaṃ sabbaṃ aparihāpentī
atk-s0401a:1145_6: datvā dvenavutikappe atikkamma kassapabuddhakāle kikissa kāsirañño gehe paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1145_7: gaṇhitvā sattannaṃ bhaginīnaṃ abbhantarā hutvā vīsati vassasahassāni brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1145_8: caritvā bhikkhusaṅghassa vasanapariveṇaṃ kāretvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0401a:1145_9: saṃsarantī imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā aparabhāge visākhaseṭṭhino
atk-s0401a:1145_10: gehaṃ gatā. Visākhaseṭṭhi nāma bimbisārassa sahāyako raññā saddhiṃ dasabalassa paṭhamadassanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1145_11: gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito, aparabhāge anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0401a:1146_0: So taṃdivasaṃ gharaṃ gantvā sopānamatthake ṭhitāya dhammadinnāya hatthe pasārite
atk-s0401a:1146_1: hatthaṃ anālambitvāva pāsādaṃ abhiruhi. Bhuñjamānopi “imaṃ detha, imaṃ harathā”ti
atk-s0401a:1146_2: na byāhari. Dhammadinnā kaṭacchuṃ gahetvā parivisamānā cintesi – “ayaṃ me hatthālambakaṃ
atk-s0401a:1146_3: dentiyāpi hatthaṃ na ālambi, bhuñjamānopi kiñci na katheti, ko nu kho mayhaṃ doso”ti?
atk-s0401a:1146_4: Atha naṃ bhuttāviṃ “ko nu kho me, ayya, doso”ti pucchi. Dhammadinne tuyhaṃ doso natthi,
