atk-s0401a:1146_5: ahaṃ pana ajja paṭṭhāya santhavavasena tumhākaṃ santike nisīdituṃ vā ṭhātuṃ vā āharāpetvā
atk-s0401a:1146_6: khādituṃ vā bhuñjituṃ vā abhabbo. Tvaṃ sace icchasi, imasmiṃ gehe vasa. No ce icchasi,
atk-s0401a:1146_7: yattakena te dhanena attho, taṃ gaṇhitvā kulagharaṃ gacchāhīti. Ayyaputta, evaṃ sante
atk-s0401a:1146_8: ahaṃ tumhehi chaḍḍitakheḷaṃ vamitavamanaṃ sīsena ukkhipitvā na carissāmi, mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:1146_9: pabbajjaṃ anujānāthāti. Visākho “sādhu, dhammadinne”ti rañño ārocetvā dhammadinnaṃ
atk-s0401a:1147_0: Sā pabbajitvā cintesi – “ayaṃ tāva seṭṭhi gharamajjhe ṭhitova dukkhassantaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0401a:1147_1: pabbajjaṃ laddhakālato paṭṭhāya pana mayāpi dukkhassantaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1147_2: santikaṃ gantvā, “ayye, mayhaṃ ākiṇṇaṭṭhāne cittaṃ na ramati, gāmakāvāsaṃ gacchāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:1147_3: āha. Theriyo tassā mahākulā nikkhamma pabbajitabhāvena cittaṃ vāretuṃ asakkontiyo
atk-s0401a:1147_4: taṃ gahetvā gāmakāvāsaṃ agamaṃsu. Sā atīte madditasaṅkhāratāya nacirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0401a:1147_5: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Athassā etadahosi – “mayhaṃ kiccaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ, idha vasitvā
atk-s0401a:1147_6: kiṃ karissāmi, rājagahameva gacchāmi, tatra maṃ nissāya bahu ñātisaṅgho puññāni karissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:1148_0: Visākho tassā āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sīghaṃ āgatā ukkaṇṭhitā nu kho bhavissatī”ti sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0401a:1148_1: tassā santikaṃ gantvā abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “ukkaṇṭhitabhāvaṃ pucchituṃ ayutta”nti
atk-s0401a:1148_2: pañcakkhandhādivasena pañhe pucchi, dhammadinnā khaggena uppalanālaṃ chindantī viya
atk-s0401a:1148_3: pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ vissajjesi. Upāsako dhammadinnātheriyā ñāṇassa sūrabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0401a:1148_4: attano adhigataṭṭhāne paṭipāṭiyā tīsu maggesu sabbākārena pañhe pucchitvā uggahavasena
atk-s0401a:1148_5: arahattamaggepi pucchi. Dhammadinnātherīpi upāsakassa yāva anāgāmiphalāva visayabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:1148_6: ñatvā “idāni attano visayaṃ atikkamitvā dhāvatī”ti taṃ nivattentī “accasarā, āvuso
atk-s0401a:1148_7: visākha, pañhe, nāsakkhi pañhānaṃ pariyantaṃ gahetuṃ, nibbānogadhañhi, āvuso visākha,
atk-s0401a:1148_8: brahmacariyaṃ nibbānaparāyaṇaṃ nibbānapariyosānaṃ. Ākaṅkhamāno ca tvaṃ, āvuso visākha,
atk-s0401a:1148_9: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ puccheyyāsi. Yathā ca te bhagavā byākaroti,
atk-s0401a:1149_0: Visākho satthu santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ pucchāvissajjananayaṃ kathesi. Satthā tassa
atk-s0401a:1149_1: vacanaṃ sutvā “mama dhītāya atītānāgatapaccuppannesu khandhesu taṇhā natthī”ti vatvā
atk-s0401a:1150: “Yassa pure ca pacchā ca, majjhe ca natthi kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0401a:1152_0: Tato dhammadinnāya sādhukāraṃ datvā visākhaṃ upāsakaṃ etadavoca – “paṇḍitā, visākha,
atk-s0401a:1152_1: dhammadinnā bhikkhunī, mahāpaññā visākha, dhammadinnā bhikkhunī. Maṃ cepi tvaṃ, visākha,
atk-s0401a:1152_2: etamatthaṃ puccheyyāsi, ahampi taṃ evameva byākareyyaṃ, yathā taṃ dhammadinnāya bhikkhuniyā
atk-s0401a:1152_3: byākataṃ, eso cevetassa attho, evañca naṃ dhārehī”ti. Evametaṃ vatthu samuṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0401a:1152_4: Aparabhāge satthā jetavane nisinno paṭipāṭiyā bhikkhuniyo ṭhānantare ṭhapento idameva
atk-s0401a:1152_5: cūḷavedallaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theriṃ imasmiṃ sāsane dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1154_0: 240. Chaṭṭhe jhāyīnaṃ yadidaṃ nandāti jhānābhiratānaṃ, nandā therī, aggāti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1154_1: Sā kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1154_2: satthu dhammaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ jhānābhiratānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0401a:1154_3: disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Sā tato kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0401a:1154_4: saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ satthu nibbattito puretarameva mahāpajāpatigotamiyā kucchimhi
atk-s0401a:1154_5: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, nandātissā nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Rūpanandātipi vuccati. Sā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1155_0: Sā amhākaṃ dasabale sabbaññutaṃ patvā anupubbena kapilavatthuṃ āgantvā nandañca rāhulañca
atk-s0401a:1155_2: rāhulamātā ca nikkhamitvā satthu santike pabbajitā”ti ñatvā “imāsaṃ pabbajitakālato
atk-s0401a:1155_3: paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ idha kiṃ kamma”nti mahāpajāpatiyā santikaṃ gantvā pabbaji. Pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0401a:1155_4: paṭṭhāya “satthā rūpaṃ garahatī”ti satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati, ovādavāre sampatte
atk-s0401a:1155_5: aññaṃ pesetvā ovādaṃ āharāpeti. Satthā tassā rūpamadamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā “attano ovādaṃ
atk-s0401a:1155_6: attanāva āgantvā gaṇhantu, na bhikkhunīhi aññā pesetabbā”ti āha. Tato rūpanandā aññaṃ
atk-s0401a:1156_0: Satthā tassā caritavasena iddhiyā ekaṃ itthirūpaṃ nimminitvā tālavaṇṭaṃ gahetvā bījamānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1156_1: viya akāsi. Rūpanandā taṃ disvā cintesi – “ahaṃ akāraṇeneva pamattā hutvā nāgacchāmi,
atk-s0401a:1156_2: evarūpāpi itthiyo satthu santike vissatthā caranti. Mama rūpaṃ etāsaṃ rūpassa kalaṃ
atk-s0401a:1156_3: nāgghati soḷasiṃ, ajānitvāva ettakaṃ kālaṃ na āgatamhī”ti tameva itthinimittaṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0401a:1156_4: olokentī aṭṭhāsi. Satthā tassā pubbahetusampannatāya “aṭṭhīnaṃ nagaraṃ kata”nti dhammapade gāthaṃ vatvā –
atk-s0401a:1157: “Caraṃ vā yadi vā tiṭṭhaṃ, nisinno uda vā saya”nti. –
atk-s0401a:1158_0: Suttaṃ abhāsi. Sā tasmiṃyeva rūpe khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:1158_1: ṭhāne idaṃ vatthu heṭṭhā khemātheriyā vatthunā sadisamevāti na vitthāritaṃ. Tato
atk-s0401a:1158_2: paṭṭhāya, rūpanandā, jhānābhiratānaṃ antare dhurappattā ahosi. Satthā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1158_3: jetavane nisinno paṭipāṭiyā bhikkhuniyo ṭhānantare ṭhapento nandātheriṃ jhāyīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:1160_0: 241. Sattame āraddhavīriyānanti paggahitaparipuṇṇavīriyānaṃ soṇā aggāti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1160_1: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1160_2: dhammaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ āraddhavīriyānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:1160_3: adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0401a:1160_4: saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1160_5: gharāvāse vutthā bahū puttadhītaro labhitvā sabbepi visuṃ visuṃ gharāvāse patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1160_6: Te tato paṭṭhāya “ayaṃ amhākaṃ kiṃ karissatī”ti taṃ attano santikaṃ āgataṃ “mātā”ti
atk-s0401a:1160_7: saññampi na kariṃsu. Bahuputtikasoṇā tesaṃ attani agāravabhāvaṃ ñatvā “gharāvāsena
atk-s0401a:1160_8: kiṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Atha naṃ bhikkhuniyo “ayaṃ vattaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0401a:1160_9: ayuttaṃ karotī”ti daṇḍakammaṃ karonti. Puttadhītaro taṃ daṇḍakammaṃ āharantiṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:1160_10: “ayaṃ yāvajjadivasā sikkhāmattampi na jānātī”ti diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne uppaṇḍesuṃ. Sā
atk-s0401a:1160_11: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā uppannasaṃvegā “attano gativisodhanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti nisinnaṭṭhānepi
atk-s0401a:1160_12: ṭhitaṭṭhānepi dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyati. Sā yatheva pubbe bahuputtikasoṇattherīti
atk-s0401a:1160_13: paññāyittha, evaṃ pacchā āraddhavīriyasoṇattherīti pākaṭā jātā.
atk-s0401a:1161_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhuniyo vihāraṃ gacchantiyo “bhikkhunisaṅghassa udakaṃ tāpeyyāsi,
atk-s0401a:1161_1: soṇe”ti vatvā agamaṃsu. Sāpi udakatāpanato puretarameva aggisālāya caṅkamitvā caṅkamitvā
atk-s0401a:1161_2: dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyantī vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhesi. Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova imaṃ
atk-s0401a:1164_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ patvā cintesi – “ahaṃ arahattaṃ pattā, āgantukajano
atk-s0401a:1164_1: ca anupadhāretvāva mayi avaññāya kiñci vatvā bahuṃ apuññampi pasaveyya, tasmā saṃlakkhaṇakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:1164_2: kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Sā udakabhājanaṃ uddhanaṃ āropetvā heṭṭhā aggiṃ na akāsi. Bhikkhuniyo
atk-s0401a:1164_3: āgantvā uddhanaṃ olokentiyo aggiṃ adisvā “imaṃ mahallikaṃ ‘bhikkhunisaṅghassa udakaṃ
atk-s0401a:1164_4: tāpehī’ti avocumha, ajjāpi uddhane aggimpi na karotī”ti āhaṃsu. Ayye, kiṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:1164_5: agginā, uṇhodakena nhāyitukāmā bhājanato udakaṃ gahetvā nhāyathāti? Tāpi “bhavissati
atk-s0401a:1164_6: ettha kāraṇa”nti gantvā udake hatthaṃ otāretvā uṇhabhāvaṃ ñatvā ekakuṭaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0401a:1164_7: udakaṃ gaṇhanti, gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ paripūrati. Tadā sabbāva tassā arahatte ṭhitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:1164_8: ñatvā daharatarā tāva pañcapatiṭṭhitena pādesu patitvā “mayaṃ, ayye, ettakaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0401a:1164_9: tumhe anupadhāretvā viheṭhetvā viheṭhetvā kathayimha, khamatha no”ti khamāpesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1164_10: Vuddhatarāpi ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā “khama, ayye”ti khamāpesuṃ. Tato paṭṭhāya “mahallakakāle
atk-s0401a:1164_11: pabbajitvāpi āraddhavīriyabhāvena nacirasseva aggaphale patiṭṭhitā”ti theriyā guṇo
atk-s0401a:1164_12: pākaṭo ahosi. Aparabhāge satthā jetavane nisīditvā bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare
atk-s0401a:1166_0: 242. Aṭṭhame dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ bakulāti dibbacakkhukānaṃ, bakulā therī, aggāti
atk-s0401a:1166_1: dasseti. Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā satthu
atk-s0401a:1166_2: dhammakathaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0401a:1166_3: disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu
atk-s0401a:1166_4: ca manussesu ca saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1166_5: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddhā pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1166_6: Sā tato paṭṭhāya dibbacakkhumhi ciṇṇavasī ahosi. Aparabhāge satthā jetavane nisinno
atk-s0401a:1166_7: bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento imaṃ theriṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1168_0: 243. Navame khippābhiññānanti khippābhiññānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ, bhaddā kuṇḍalakesā, aggāti
atk-s0401a:1168_1: dasseti. Ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattā satthu dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0401a:1168_2: sutvā satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ khippābhiññānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1168_3: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā kassapabuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:1168_4: kikissa kāsirañño gehe sattannaṃ bhaginīnaṃ abbhantarā hutvā vīsati vassasahassāni
atk-s0401a:1168_5: dasa sīlāni samādāya komārikabrahmacariyaṃ carantī saṅghassa vasanapariveṇaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0401a:1168_6: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahanagare seṭṭhikule
atk-s0401a:1169_0: Taṃdivasaṃyeva ca tasmiṃ nagare purohitaputto jāto. Tassa jātavelāya rājanivesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1169_1: ādiṃ katvā sakalanagare āvudhāni pajjaliṃsu. Purohito pātova rājakulaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1169_2: sukhaseyyaṃ pucchi. Rājā “kuto me, ācariya, sukhaseyyā, ajja sabbarattiṃ rājanivesane
atk-s0401a:1169_3: āvudhāni pajjalitāni disvā bhayappattā ahumhā”ti āha. Mahārāja, tappaccayā mā cintayittha,
atk-s0401a:1169_4: na tumhākaṃyeva gehe āvudhāni pajjaliṃsu, sakalanagare evaṃ ahosīti. Kiṃ kāraṇā,
atk-s0401a:1169_5: ācariyāti? Amhākaṃ gehe coranakkhattena dārako jāto, so sakalanagarassa sattu hutvā
atk-s0401a:1169_6: uppanno, tassetaṃ pubbanimittaṃ. Tumhākaṃ upaddavo natthi, sace pana icchatha, hārema
atk-s0401a:1169_7: nanti. Amhākaṃ pīḷāya asatiyā hāraṇakammaṃ natthīti. Purohito “mama putto attano
atk-s0401a:1169_8: nāmaṃ gahetvāva āgato”ti sattukotevassa nāmaṃ akāsi. Seṭṭhigehepi bhaddā vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0401a:1169_9: purohitagehepi sattuko vaḍḍhati. So attano ādhāvanavidhāvanena kīḷituṃ samatthakālato
atk-s0401a:1169_10: paṭṭhāya attano vicaraṇaṭṭhāne yaṃ yaṃ passati, taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ āharitvā mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:1169_11: gehaṃ pūreti. Pitā naṃ kāraṇasahassampi vatvā vāretuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0401a:1170_0: Aparabhāge panassa vayappattassa sabbākārenāpi vāretuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvaṃ ñatvā dve
atk-s0401a:1170_1: nīlasāṭake datvā sandhicchedanaupakaraṇañca siṅghāṭakayantañca hatthe datvā “tvaṃ
atk-s0401a:1170_2: imināva kammena jīvāhī”ti naṃ vissajjesi. So taṃdivasato paṭṭhāya siṅghāṭakayantaṃ
atk-s0401a:1170_3: khipitvā kulānaṃ pāsāde āruyha sandhiṃ chinditvā parakulesu nikkhittabhaṇḍaṃ attanā
atk-s0401a:1170_4: ṭhapitaṃ viya gahetvā gacchati. Sakalanagare tena aviluttagehaṃ nāma nāhosi. Ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0401a:1170_5: rājā rathena nagare vicaranto sārathiṃ pucchi – “kiṃ nu kho imasmiṃ nagare tasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:1170_6: tasmiṃ ghare chiddameva paññāyatī”ti. Deva imasmiṃ nagare sattuko nāma coro bhittiṃ
atk-s0401a:1170_7: chinditvā kulānaṃ santakaṃ haratīti. Rājā nagaraguttikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “imasmiṃ kira
atk-s0401a:1170_8: nagare evarūpo nāma coro atthi, kasmā naṃ na gaṇhasī”ti āha. Mayaṃ, deva, taṃ coraṃ
atk-s0401a:1170_9: sahoḍḍhaṃ passituṃ na sakkomāti. Sace ajja naṃ coraṃ gaṇhasi, jīvasi. Sace na gaṇhasi,
atk-s0401a:1170_10: rājāṇaṃ te karissāmīti. Evaṃ devāti nagaraguttiko sakalanagare manusse cāretvā taṃ
atk-s0401a:1170_11: bhittiṃ chinditvā parabhaṇḍaṃ avaharantaṃ sahoḍḍhameva gahetvā rañño dassesi. Rājā
atk-s0401a:1170_12: “imaṃ coraṃ dakkhiṇadvārena nīharitvā ghātethā”ti āha. Nagaraguttiko rañño paṭissuṇitvā
atk-s0401a:1170_13: taṃ coraṃ catukke catukke pahārasahassena tāḷento gāhāpetvā dakkhiṇadvāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0401a:1171_0: Tasmiṃ samaye ayaṃ bhaddā nāma seṭṭhidhītā mahājanassa kolāhalasaddena sīhapañjaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1171_1: ugghāṭetvā olokentī taṃ sattukaṃ coraṃ tathā nīyamānaṃ disvā ubhohi hatthehi hadayaṃ
atk-s0401a:1171_2: sandhārentī gantvā sirisayane adhomukhā nipajji. Sā ca tassa kulassa ekadhītā, tenassā
atk-s0401a:1171_3: ñātakā appamattakampi mukhavikāraṃ sahituṃ na sakkonti. Atha naṃ mātā sayane nipannaṃ
atk-s0401a:1171_4: disvā “kiṃ karosi, ammā”ti pucchi. Etaṃ vajjhaṃ katvā nīyamānaṃ coraṃ addasa, ammāti?
atk-s0401a:1171_5: Āma, ammāti. Etaṃ labhamānā jīvissāmi, alabhamānāya me maraṇamevāti. Te taṃ nānappakārenapi
atk-s0401a:1171_6: saññāpetuṃ asakkontā “maraṇā jīvitaṃ seyyo”ti sallakkhesuṃ. Athassā pitā nagaraguttikassa
atk-s0401a:1171_7: santikaṃ gantvā sahassaṃ lañjaṃ datvā “mayhaṃ dhītā core paṭibaddhacittā, yena kenaci
atk-s0401a:1171_8: upāyena imaṃ muñcā”ti āha. So “sādhū”ti seṭṭhissa paṭissuṇitvā coraṃ gahetvā yāva
atk-s0401a:1171_9: sūriyassa atthaṅgamanā ito cito ca papañcāpetvā sūriye atthaṅgate cārakato ekaṃ manussaṃ
atk-s0401a:1171_10: nīharāpetvā sattukassa bandhanaṃ mocetvā sattukaṃ seṭṭhigehaṃ pesetvā tena bandhanena
atk-s0401a:1171_11: itaraṃ bandhitvā dakkhiṇadvārena nīharitvā ghātesi. Seṭṭhidāsāpi sattukaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0401a:1171_12: seṭṭhino nivesanaṃ āgamaṃsu. Taṃ disvā seṭṭhi “dhītu manaṃ pūressāmī”ti sattukaṃ
atk-s0401a:1171_13: gandhodakena nhāpetvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ kāretvā pāsādaṃ pesesi. Bhaddāpi “paripuṇṇo
atk-s0401a:1171_14: me saṅkappo”ti anekālaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā taṃ paricarati.
atk-s0401a:1172_0: Sattuko katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā cintesi – “imissā pasādhanabhaṇḍakaṃ mayhaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:1172_1: kenaci upāyena imaṃ ābharaṇaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti samīpe sukhena nisinnakāle bhaddaṃ
atk-s0401a:1172_2: āha – “mayhaṃ ekaṃ vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ atthī”ti. Seṭṭhidhītā sahassalābhaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0401a:1172_3: viya tuṭṭhamānasā “vissatthaṃ vadehi, ayyā”ti āha. Tvaṃ cintesi – “maṃ nissāya iminā
atk-s0401a:1172_4: jīvitaṃ laddha”nti, ahaṃ pana gahitamattova corapapātapabbate adhivatthāya devatāya
atk-s0401a:1172_5: “sacāhaṃ jīvitaṃ labhissāmi, balikammaṃ te dassāmī”ti āyāciṃ. Taṃ nissāya mayā jīvitaṃ
atk-s0401a:1172_6: laddhaṃ, sīghaṃ balikammaṃ sajjāpehīti. Bhaddā, “ahaṃ tassa manaṃ pūressāmī”ti balikammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1172_7: sajjāpetvā sabbaṃ pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā ekayāne āruyha sāmikena saddhiṃ corapapātapabbataṃ
atk-s0401a:1172_8: gantvā “pabbatadevatāya balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti abhiruhituṃ āraddhā. Sattuko cintesi
atk-s0401a:1172_9: – “sabbesu abhiruhantesu mama imissā ābharaṇaṃ gahetuṃ na okāso bhavissatī”ti tameva
atk-s0401a:1173_0: So bhaddāya saddhiṃ kathento piyakathaṃ na katheti. Sā iṅgiteneva tassa adhippāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1173_1: aññāsi. Atha naṃ so āha – “bhadde, tava uttarisāṭakaṃ omuñcitvā kāyāruḷhaṃ te pasādhanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1173_2: ettha bhaṇḍikaṃ karohī”ti. Sāmi mayhaṃ ko aparādhoti? Kiṃ panāhaṃ, bāle, balikammatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:1173_3: āgatoti saññaṃ karosi? Ahañhi imissā devatāya yakanaṃ ubbaṭṭhetvā dadeyyaṃ, balikammāpadesena
atk-s0401a:1173_4: pana tava ābharaṇaṃ gaṇhitukāmo hutvā āgatomhīti. Kassa pana, ayya, pasādhanaṃ, kassa
atk-s0401a:1173_5: ahanti? Mayaṃ evarūpaṃ na jānāma, aññaṃ tava santakaṃ, aññaṃ mama santakanti. Sādhu,
atk-s0401a:1173_6: ayya, ekaṃ pana me adhippāyaṃ pūretha, alaṅkataniyāmeneva me purato ca pacchato ca
atk-s0401a:1173_7: āliṅgituṃ dethāti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi. Sā tena sampaṭicchitabhāvaṃ ñatvā purato
atk-s0401a:1173_8: āliṅgitvā pacchato āliṅgantī viya hutvā pabbatapapāte pātesi. So patanto ākāseyeva
atk-s0401a:1173_9: cuṇṇavicuṇṇo ahosi. Tāya kataṃ vicitrabhāvaṃ disvā pabbate adhivatthā devatā guṇakittanavasena imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0401a:1174: “Na so sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito;
atk-s0401a:1175: Itthīpi paṇḍitā hoti, tattha tattha vicakkhaṇā.
atk-s0401a:1176: “Na so sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito;
atk-s0401a:1178_0: Tato bhaddā cintesi – “na sakkā mayā iminā niyāmena puna gehaṃ gantuṃ, itova gantvā
atk-s0401a:1178_1: ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti, nigaṇṭhārāmaṃ gantvā nigaṇṭhe pabbajjaṃ yāci. Atha
atk-s0401a:1178_2: naṃ te āhaṃsu – “kena niyāmena pabbajjā hotū”ti? Yaṃ tumhākaṃ pabbajjāya uttamaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1178_3: tadeva karothāti. Te “sādhū”ti tassā tālaṭṭhinā kese luñcitvā pabbājesuṃ. Kesā puna
atk-s0401a:1178_4: vaḍḍhantā rāsirāsivasena kuṇḍalāvattā hutvā vaḍḍhiṃsu. Sā teneva kāraṇena kuṇḍalakesā
atk-s0401a:1178_5: nāma jātā. Sā attano pabbajitaṭṭhāne sabbasippaṃ uggaṇhitvā “etesaṃ ito uttari viseso
atk-s0401a:1178_6: natthī”ti ñatvā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo vicarantī yattha yattha paṇḍitā atthi, tattha
atk-s0401a:1178_7: tattha gantvā tesaṃ jānanasippaṃ sabbameva uggaṇhāti. Athassā bahūsu ṭhānesu sikkhitabhāvena
atk-s0401a:1178_8: paṭivādaṃ dātuṃ samatthā na honti. Sā attanā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ samatthaṃ adisvā yaṃ
atk-s0401a:1178_9: gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā pavisati, tassa dvāre vālukarāsiṃ katvā tattha jambusākhaṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0401a:1178_10: “Yo mama vādaṃ āropetuṃ sakkoti, so imaṃ sākhaṃ maddatū”ti samīpe ṭhitānaṃ dārakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1178_11: saññaṃ deti. Taṃ sattāhampi maddantā na honti. Atha naṃ gahetvā pakkamati.
atk-s0401a:1179_0: Tasmiṃ samaye amhākaṃ bhagavā loke nibbattitvā sāvatthiṃ upanissāya jetavane viharati.
atk-s0401a:1179_1: Kuṇḍalakesāpi kho anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā antonagaraṃ pavisamānā porāṇakaniyāmeneva
atk-s0401a:1179_2: vālukārāsimhi sākhaṃ ṭhapetvā dārakānaṃ saññaṃ datvā pāvisi. Tasmiṃ samaye dhammasenāpati
atk-s0401a:1179_3: bhikkhusaṅghe paviṭṭhe ekakova nagaraṃ pavisanto vālukāthūpe jambusākhaṃ disvā “kasmā
atk-s0401a:1179_4: ayaṃ ṭhapitā”ti pucchi. Dārakā taṃ kāraṇaṃ aparihāpetvā kathesuṃ. Evaṃ sante imaṃ
atk-s0401a:1179_5: gahetvā maddatha, dārakāti. Tesu therassa vacanaṃ sutvā ekacce maddituṃ na visahiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:1179_6: ekacce taṃkhaṇeyeva madditvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ akaṃsu. Kuṇḍalakesā bhattakiccaṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:1179_7: nikkhamantī taṃ sākhaṃ madditaṃ disvā “kassetaṃ kamma”nti pucchi. Athassā dhammasenāpatinā
atk-s0401a:1179_8: kārāpitabhāvaṃ kathayiṃsu. Sā “attano thāmaṃ ajānanto imaṃ sākhaṃ maddāpetuṃ no visahissati,
atk-s0401a:1179_9: addhā mahanto eso bhavissati. Ahampi pana khuddikā bhavantī na sobhissāmi, antogāmameva
atk-s0401a:1179_10: pavisitvā parisāya saññaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā tathā akāsi. Asītikulasahassanivāse
atk-s0401a:1180_0: Theropi bhattakiccaṃ katvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi. Athāyaṃ kuṇḍalakesā mahājanaparivutā
atk-s0401a:1180_1: therassa santikaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ ṭhatvā, “bhante, tumhehi sākhā
atk-s0401a:1180_2: maddāpitā”ti pucchi. Āma, mayā maddāpitāti. Evaṃ sante tumhehi saddhiṃ amhākaṃ vādo
atk-s0401a:1180_3: hotu, bhanteti. Hotu, bhaddeti. Kassa pucchā hotu, kassa vissajjananti? Pucchā nāma
atk-s0401a:1180_4: amhākaṃ pattā, tvaṃ pana tuyhaṃ jānanakaṃ pucchāti. Sā therena dinnaanumatiyā sabbameva
atk-s0401a:1180_5: attano jānanakaṃ vādaṃ pucchi, thero sabbaṃ vissajjesi. Sā sabbaṃ pucchitvā tuṇhī
atk-s0401a:1180_6: ahosi. Atha naṃ thero āha – “tayā bahuṃ pucchitaṃ, mayampi ekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchāmā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1180_7: Pucchatha, bhanteti. Ekaṃ nāma kinti? Kuṇḍalakesā “na jānāmi, bhante”ti āha. Tvaṃ
atk-s0401a:1180_8: ettakampi na jānāsi, aññaṃ kiṃ jānissasīti? Sā therassa pādesu patitvā “tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:1180_9: saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, bhante”ti āha. Mama saraṇagamanakammaṃ natthi, sadevake loke aggapuggalo
atk-s0401a:1180_10: dhuravihāre vasati, taṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāhīti. Sā “evaṃ karissāmi, bhante”ti sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0401a:1180_11: satthu dhammadesanāvelāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0401a:1180_12: aṭṭhāsi. Satthā tassā madditasaṅkhārāya cariyāvasena dhammapade imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:1182: Ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammatī”ti. ;
atk-s0401a:1183_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne yathāṭhitāva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0401a:1183_1: Satthā tassā pabbajjaṃ sampaṭicchi. Sā bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā pabbaji. Aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1183_2: catuparisamajjhe kathā udapādi – “mahantā vatāyaṃ bhaddā kuṇḍalakesā, yā catuppadikagāthāvasāne
atk-s0401a:1183_3: arahattaṃ pattā”ti. Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theriṃ khippābhiññānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1185_0: 244. Dasame pubbenivāsanti pubbe nivutthakkhandhasantānaṃ anussarantīnaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī
atk-s0401a:1185_1: aggāti dasseti. Sā kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā satthu
atk-s0401a:1185_2: dhammadesanaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1185_3: ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Sā kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:1185_4: devamanussesu saṃsaritvā anuppanne buddhe bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0401a:1185_5: attano sāmibhaginiyā saddhiṃ kalahaṃ karontī tāya paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapāte dinne,
atk-s0401a:1185_6: “ayaṃ imassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā attano vasaṃ vattetī”ti paccekabuddhassa hatthato pattaṃ
atk-s0401a:1185_7: gaṇhitvā bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalassa pūretvā adāsi. Mahājano “bālā aya”nti garahitvā,
atk-s0401a:1185_8: “yāya te saddhiṃ kalaho kato, tassā kiñci na karosi, paccekabuddho te kiṃ aparajjhatī”ti
atk-s0401a:1185_9: āha. Sā tesaṃ vacanena lajjāyamānā puna pattaṃ gahetvā kalalaṃ hāretvā dhovitvā gandhacuṇṇena
atk-s0401a:1185_10: ubbaṭṭetvā catumadhurassa pūretvā upari āsittena padumagabbhavaṇṇena sappinā vijjotamānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1185_11: paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapetvā “yathā ayaṃ piṇḍapāto obhāsajāto, evaṃ obhāsajātaṃ
atk-s0401a:1185_12: me sarīraṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesīti sabbaṃ mahākassapattherassa vatthumhi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:1186_0: Mahākassapatthero pana dakkhiṇamaggaṃ gahetvā dasabalassa santikaṃ bahuputtakanigrodhamūlaṃ
atk-s0401a:1186_1: gato, ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī vāmamaggaṃ gaṇhitvā mātugāmassa pabbajjāya ananuññātabhāvena
atk-s0401a:1186_2: paribbājikārāmaṃ agamāsi. Yadā pana mahāpajāpatigotamī pabbajjañca upasampadañca
atk-s0401a:1186_3: labhi, tadā sā therī theriyā santike pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1186_4: vipassanāya kammaṃ karontī arahattaṃ patvā pubbenivāsañāṇe ciṇṇavasī ahosi. Atha
atk-s0401a:1186_5: satthā jetavane nisīditvā bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento imaṃ theriṃ
atk-s0401a:1188_0: 245. Ekādasame mahābhiññāppattānanti mahatiyo abhiññāyo pattānaṃ, bhaddā kaccānā,
atk-s0401a:1188_1: nāma aggāti dasseti. Ekassa hi buddhassa cattārova janā mahābhiññā honti, na avasesasāvakā.
atk-s0401a:1188_2: Avasesasāvakā hi kappasatasahassameva anussarituṃ sakkonti, na tato paraṃ. Mahābhiññāppattā
atk-s0401a:1188_3: pana kappasatasahassādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ anussaranti. Amhākampi satthu sāsane dve
atk-s0401a:1188_4: aggasāvakā bākulatthero bhaddā kaccānāti ime cattāro ettakaṃ anussarituṃ sakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1188_5: Tasmā ayaṃ therī mahābhiññāppattānaṃ aggā nāma jātā. Bhaddā kaccānāti tassā nāmaṃ.
atk-s0401a:1188_6: Bhaddakañcanassa hi uttamasuvaṇṇassa viya tassā sarīravaṇṇo ahosi, sā tasmā bhaddakañcanāti
atk-s0401a:1188_7: nāmaṃ labhi, sā pacchā kaccānātveva saṅkhaṃ gatā. Rāhulamātāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0401a:1189_0: Sā hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1189_1: satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ mahābhiññāppattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1189_2: ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Sā kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:1189_3: devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde suppabuddhasakkassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1190_0: Sā vayappattā bodhisattassa gehaṃ agamāsi. Sā aparabhāge rāhulakumāraṃ nāma puttaṃ
atk-s0401a:1190_1: vijāyi. Tassa jātadivaseva bodhisatto nikkhamitvā bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaṃ patvā lokānuggahaṃ
atk-s0401a:1190_2: karonto anupubbena kapilavatthuṃ āgamma ñātīnaṃ saṅgahaṃ akāsi. Aparabhāge parinibbute
atk-s0401a:1190_3: suddhodanamahārāje mahāpajāpatigotamī pañcahi mātugāmasatehi saddhiṃ satthu santike
atk-s0401a:1190_4: pabbaji. Rāhulamātāpi janapadakalyāṇīpi theriyā santikaṃ gantvā pabbaji. Sā pabbajitakālato
atk-s0401a:1190_5: paṭṭhāya bhaddakaccānattherītveva pākaṭā ahosi. Sā aparabhāge vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0401a:1190_6: arahattaṃ patvā abhiññāsu ciṇṇavasī ahosi, ekapallaṅkena nisinnā ekāvajjanena kappasatasahassādhikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1190_7: asaṅkhyeyyaṃ anussarati. Tassā tasmiṃ guṇe pākaṭe jāte satthā jetavane nisinno bhikkhuniyo
atk-s0401a:1190_8: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento imaṃ theriṃ mahābhiññāppattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1192_0: 246. Dvādasame lūkhacīvaradharānanti tīhi lūkhehi samannāgataṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhārentīnaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1192_1: kisāgotamī, aggāti dasseti. Gotamīti tassā nāmaṃ, thokaṃ kisadhātukattā pana kisāgotamīti
atk-s0401a:1192_2: vuccati. Ayampi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1192_3: suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:1192_4: adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0401a:1192_5: saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ duggatakule nibbattitvā vayappattakāle
atk-s0401a:1192_6: ekaṃ kulaṃ agamāsi. Tattha naṃ “duggatakulassa dhītā”ti paribhaviṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1193_0: Sā aparabhāge puttaṃ vijāyi, athassā sammānamakaṃsu. So panassā dārako ādhāvitvā
atk-s0401a:1193_1: paridhāvitvā kīḷanavaye ṭhito kālamakāsi, tassā soko udapādi. Sā “ahaṃ imasmiṃyeva
atk-s0401a:1193_2: gehe hatalābhasakkārā hutvā puttassa jātakālato paṭṭhāya sakkāraṃ pāpuṇiṃ, ime mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:1193_3: puttaṃ bahi chaḍḍetumpi vāyameyyu”nti puttaṃ aṅkenādāya “puttassa me bhesajjaṃ dethā”ti
atk-s0401a:1193_4: gehadvārapaṭipāṭiyā vicarati. Diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne manussā “kattha te matakassa bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:1193_5: diṭṭhapubba”nti pāṇiṃ paharitvā parihāsaṃ karonti. Sā tesaṃ kathāya neva saññattiṃ
atk-s0401a:1193_6: gacchati. Atha naṃ eko paṇḍitapuriso disvā, “ayaṃ puttasokena cittavikkhepaṃ pattā
atk-s0401a:1193_7: bhavissati, etissā pana bhesajjaṃ na añño jānissati, dasabalova jānissatī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0401a:1193_8: evamāha – “amma, tava puttassa bhesajjaṃ añño jānanto nāma natthi, sadevake pana
atk-s0401a:1193_9: loke aggapuggalo dasabalo dhuravihāre vasati, tassa santikaṃ gantvā pucchāhī”ti.
atk-s0401a:1193_10: Sā “saccaṃ puriso kathetī”ti puttamādāya tathāgatassa buddhāsane nisinnavelāya parisapariyante
atk-s0401a:1193_11: ṭhatvā “puttassa me bhesajjaṃ detha bhagavā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1194_0: Satthā tassā upanissayaṃ disvā “bhaddakaṃ te gotami kataṃ bhesajjatthāya idhāgacchantiyā,
atk-s0401a:1194_1: gaccha nagaraṃ pavisitvā koṭito paṭṭhāya sakalanagaraṃ caritvā yasmiṃ gehe koci matapubbo
atk-s0401a:1194_2: natthi, tato siddhatthakaṃ āharā”ti āha. Sā “sādhu, bhante”ti tuṭṭhamānasā antonagaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1194_3: pavisitvā paṭhamageheyeva “dasabalo mama puttassa bhesajjatthāya siddhatthakaṃ āharāpeti,
atk-s0401a:1194_4: siddhatthakaṃ me dethā”ti āha. “Handa gotamī”ti nīharitvā adaṃsu. Ahaṃ evaṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0401a:1194_5: na sakkomi, imasmiṃ gehe koci matapubbo nāma natthīti? Kiṃ vadesi gotami, ko idha
atk-s0401a:1194_6: matake gaṇetuṃ sakkotīti? “Tena hi alaṃ nāhaṃ gaṇhissāmi, dasabalo maṃ yattha matapubbo
atk-s0401a:1194_7: natthi, tato naṃ gaṇhāpetī”ti āha. Sā imināva niyāmena tatiyagharaṃ gantvā cintesi
atk-s0401a:1194_8: – “sakalanagare ayameva niyāmo bhavissati, idaṃ hitānukampakena buddhena diṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0401a:1194_9: bhavissatī”ti saṃvegaṃ labhitvā tatova bahi nikkhamitvā āmakasusānaṃ gantvā puttaṃ
atk-s0401a:1194_10: hatthena gahetvā, “puttaka, ahaṃ imaṃ maraṇaṃ taveva uppannanti cintesiṃ, na panetaṃ
atk-s0401a:1194_11: taveva, mahājanasādhāraṇo esa dhammo”ti vatvā puttaṃ āmakasusāne chaḍḍetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:1199_0: Evañca pana vatvā satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ satthā “laddho te, gotami, siddhatthako”ti
atk-s0401a:1199_1: āha. Niṭṭhitaṃ, bhante, siddhatthakena kammaṃ, patiṭṭhaṃ pana me dethāti āha. Athassā
atk-s0401a:1201: Suttaṃ gāmaṃ mahoghova, maccu ādāya gacchatī”ti. ;
atk-s0401a:1202_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne yathāṭhitāva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya pabbajjaṃ yāci, satthā
atk-s0401a:1202_1: pabbajjaṃ anujāni. Sā tikkhattuṃ satthāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vanditvā bhikkhuniupassayaṃ
atk-s0401a:1202_2: gantvā pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā nacirasseva yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karontī
atk-s0401a:1202_3: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhesi. Athassā satthā imaṃ obhāsagāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:1203: “Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ amataṃ padaṃ;
atk-s0401a:1204: Ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato amataṃ pada”nti. ;
atk-s0401a:1205_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pattā parikkhāravalañje paramukkaṭṭhā hutvā tīhi lūkhehi
atk-s0401a:1205_1: samannāgataṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā vicari. Aparabhāge satthā jetavane nisinno bhikkhuniyo
atk-s0401a:1205_2: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento imaṃ theriṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1207_1: aggāti dasseti. Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulaghare nibbattā satthu
atk-s0401a:1207_2: dhammakathaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0401a:1207_3: disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0401a:1207_4: saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahanagare seṭṭhikule nibbattā samānajātikaṃ kulaṃ
atk-s0401a:1207_5: gantvā ekaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi, tassa siṅgālakakumāroti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Sāpi teneva kāraṇena
atk-s0401a:1207_6: siṅgālakamātā nāma jātā. Sā ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddhā
atk-s0401a:1207_7: satthu santikaṃ gantvā pabbaji. Pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ
atk-s0401a:1207_8: paṭilabhi. Sā dhammassavanatthāya vihāraṃ gantvā dasabalassa sarīrasampattiṃ olokayamānāva
atk-s0401a:1207_9: tiṭṭhati. Satthā tassā saddhālakkhaṇe abhiniviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā sappāyaṃ katvā pasādanīyameva
atk-s0401a:1207_10: dhammaṃ desesi. Sāpi therī saddhālakkhaṇameva dhuraṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Atha
atk-s0401a:1207_11: naṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavane nisīditvā bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento
atk-s0401a:1213_0: 248. Upāsakapāḷiyā paṭhame paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānanti sabbapaṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:1213_1: gacchantānaṃ tapusso ca bhalliko cāti ime dve vāṇijā aggāti dasseti. Ime kira padumuttarabuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:1213_2: haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇantā
atk-s0401a:1213_3: satthāraṃ dve upāsake paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1213_4: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthayiṃsu. Te kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā
atk-s0401a:1213_5: amhākaṃ bodhisattassa sabbaññutaññāṇapattito puretarameva asitañjananagare kuṭumbiyagehe
atk-s0401a:1213_6: nibbattiṃsu. Jeṭṭhabhātiko tapusso nāma ahosi, kaniṭṭho bhalliko nāma.
atk-s0401a:1214_0: Te aparena samayena gharāvāsaṃ vasantā kālena kālaṃ pañca sakaṭasatāni yojāpetvā
atk-s0401a:1214_1: vāṇijakammaṃ karontā caranti. Tasmiṃ samaye amhākaṃ bodhisatto sabbaññutaṃ patvā
atk-s0401a:1214_2: sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe viharitvā aṭṭhame sattāhe rājāyatanamūle nisīdi. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:1214_3: samaye te vāṇijā pañcamattehi sakaṭasatehi taṃ ṭhānaṃ anuppattā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ anantare
atk-s0401a:1214_4: attabhāve mātā tasmiṃ padese devatā hutvā nibbatti. Sā cintesi – “idāni buddhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1214_5: āhāro laddhuṃ vaṭṭati. Na hi sakkā ito paraṃ nirāhārehi yāpetuṃ. Ime ca me puttā
atk-s0401a:1214_6: iminā maggena gacchanti, tehi ajja buddhānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pañcasu
atk-s0401a:1214_7: sakaṭasatesu yuttagoṇānaṃ gamanupacchedaṃ akāsi. Te “kiṃ nāmeta”nti nānāvidhāni nimittāni
atk-s0401a:1214_8: olokenti. Atha tesaṃ kilamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā ekassa purisassa sarīre adhimuccitvā “kiṃ
atk-s0401a:1214_9: kāraṇā kilamatha? Tumhākaṃ añño yakkhāvaṭṭo vā bhūtāvaṭṭo vā nāgāvaṭṭo vā natthi,
atk-s0401a:1214_10: ahaṃ pana vo atītattabhāve mātā imasmiṃ ṭhāne bhummadevatā hutvā nibbattā. Esa dasabalo
atk-s0401a:1214_11: rājāyatanamūle nisinno, tassa paṭhamaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dethā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1215_0: Te tassā kathaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānasā hutvā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca suvaṇṇathālakena
atk-s0401a:1215_1: ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā “imaṃ bhojanaṃ paṭiggaṇhatha, bhante”ti āhaṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0401a:1215_2: atītabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ olokesi, athassa cattāro mahārājāno selamaye patte upanāmesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1215_3: Satthā “tesaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotū”ti cattāropi patte “ekova patto hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:1215_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe te vāṇijā tathāgatassa patte manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca patiṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:1215_5: paribhuttakāle udakaṃ datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne satthāraṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0401a:1215_6: nisīdiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ satthā dhammaṃ desesi, desanāpariyosāne dvepi janā dvevācike
atk-s0401a:1215_7: saraṇe patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ abhivādetvā attano nagaraṃ gantukāmā, “bhante, amhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:1215_8: paricaraṇacetiyaṃ dethā”ti vadiṃsu. Satthā dakkhiṇena hatthena sīsaṃ parāmasitvā
atk-s0401a:1215_9: dvinnampi janānaṃ aṭṭha kesadhātuyo adāsi. Te ubhopi janā kesadhātuyo suvaṇṇasamuggesu
atk-s0401a:1215_10: ṭhapetvā attano nagaraṃ netvā asitañjananagaradvāre jīvakesadhātuyā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1215_11: Uposathadivase cetiyato nīlasmiyo niggacchanti. Evametaṃ vatthu samuṭṭhitaṃ. Satthā
atk-s0401a:1215_12: pana aparabhāge jetavane nisīditvā upāsake paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento ime dve
atk-s0401a:1215_13: jane paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1217_0: 249. Dutiye dāyakānanti dānābhiratānaṃ sudatto, gahapati, anāthapiṇḍiko aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1217_1: So kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0401a:1217_2: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ upāsakaṃ dāyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1217_3: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:1217_4: buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa gehe nibbatti, sudattotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1218_0: So aparabhāge gharāvāse patiṭṭhito dāyako dānapati hutvā teneva guṇena patthaṭanāmadheyyo
atk-s0401a:1218_1: anāthapiṇḍiko nāma ahosi. So pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya rājagahe attano piyasahāyakassa
atk-s0401a:1218_2: seṭṭhino gehaṃ gantvā tattha buddhassa bhagavato uppannabhāvaṃ sutvā balavapaccūsakāle
atk-s0401a:1218_3: devatānubhāvena vivaṭena dvārena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale
atk-s0401a:1218_4: patiṭṭhāya dutiyadivase ca buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0401a:1218_5: āgamanatthāya satthu paṭiññaṃ gahetvā antarāmagge pañcacattālīsayojanamagge satasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:1218_6: satasahassaṃ datvā yojanikavihāre kāretvā jetavanaṃ koṭisanthārena santharitvā aṭṭhārasahi
atk-s0401a:1218_7: koṭīhi kiṇitvā aṭṭhārasahi koṭīhi vihāraṃ kāretvā vihāre niṭṭhite catunnaṃ parisānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1218_8: purebhattapacchābhattesu yadicchakaṃ dānaṃ dadanto aṭṭhārasahi koṭīhi vihāramahaṃ
atk-s0401a:1218_9: niṭṭhāpesi. Vihāramaho navahi māsehi niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi, “pañcahī”ti apare. Temāse
atk-s0401a:1219_0: Evaṃ catupaṇṇāsakoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā niccakālaṃ gehe evarūpaṃ dānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0401a:1219_1: Devasikaṃ pañca salākabhattasatāni honti, pañca pakkhikabhattasatāni, pañca salākayāgusatāni,
atk-s0401a:1219_2: pañca pakkhikayāgusatāni, pañca dhurabhattasatāni, pañca āgantukabhattasatāni, pañca
atk-s0401a:1219_3: gamikabhattasatāni, pañca gilānabhattasatāni, pañca gilānupaṭṭhākabhattasatāni, pañca
atk-s0401a:1219_4: āsanasatāni gehe niccapaññattāneva hontīti. Atha naṃ aparabhāge satthā jetavane nisinno
atk-s0401a:1219_5: upāsake paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento dāyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1221_0: 250. Tatiye dhammakathikānanti dhammakathikānaṃ upāsakānaṃ citto, gahapati, aggoti
atk-s0401a:1221_1: dasseti. So kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1221_2: dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ upāsakaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0401a:1221_3: disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0401a:1221_4: saṃsaritvā kassapabuddhakāle migaluddakagehe nibbatto aparabhāge araññe kammaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0401a:1221_5: samatthakāle ekadivasaṃ deve vassante migamāraṇatthāya sattiṃ ādāya araññaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:1221_6: migarūpāni olokento ekasmiṃ akatapabbhāre sasīsaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ pārupitvā pāsāṇaphalake
atk-s0401a:1221_7: nisinnaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā “eko ayyo samaṇadhammaṃ karonto nisinno bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:1221_8: saññaṃ uppādetvā vegena gharaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ uddhane hiyyo ābhatamaṃsaṃ, ekasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:1221_9: bhattaṃ pacāpetvā piṇḍācārike dve bhikkhū disvā tesaṃ pattaṃ ādāya paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0401a:1221_10: bhikkhaṃ samādāpetvā, “ayye, parivisathā”ti aññe āṇāpetvā taṃ bhattaṃ kuṭe pakkhipitvā
atk-s0401a:1221_11: paṇṇena mukhaṃ bandhitvā kuṭaṃ ādāya gacchanto antarāmagge nānāvidhāni pupphāni ocinitvā
atk-s0401a:1221_12: pattapuṭakena gahetvā therassa nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kuṭaṃ otāretvā ekamante ṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:1221_13: “mayhaṃ, bhante, saṅgahaṃ karothā”ti vatvā therassa pattaṃ ādāya bhattassa pūretvā
atk-s0401a:1221_14: therassa hatthe patiṭṭhapetvā tehi missakapupphehi theraṃ pūjetvā ekamante ṭhito
atk-s0401a:1221_15: “yathāyaṃ rasapiṇḍapātena saddhiṃ pupphapūjā cittaṃ paritoseti, evaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1221_16: me paṇṇākārasahassāni ceva āgacchantu pañcavaṇṇakusumavassañca vassatū”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1222_0: Thero tassa upanissayaṃ disvā dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā adāsi. So yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0401a:1222_1: kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti, nibbattaṭṭhāne jaṇṇumattena odhinā dibbapupphavassaṃ
atk-s0401a:1222_2: vassi, sayañca aññāhi devatāhi adhikatarena rūpena samannāgato ahosi. So ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1222_3: devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe macchikāsaṇḍanagare seṭṭhikule
atk-s0401a:1222_4: nibbatti, jātakālevassa sakalanagare jaṇṇumattena odhinā pañcavaṇṇakusumavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0401a:1222_5: Athassa mātāpitaro “amhākaṃ putto attanāva attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgato, jātadivasevassa
atk-s0401a:1222_6: sakalanagaraṃ pañcavaṇṇehi pupphehi vicittaṃ jāta”nti cittakumāroti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1223_0: So aparabhāge gharāvāse patiṭṭhito pitu accayena tasmiṃ nagare seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1223_1: Tasmiṃ samaye pañcavaggiyattherānaṃ abbhantaro mahānāmatthero nāma macchikāsaṇḍanagaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1223_2: agamāsi. Citto gahapati tassa iriyāpathe pasīditvā pattaṃ ādāya gehaṃ ānetvā piṇḍapātena
atk-s0401a:1223_3: patimānetvā katabhattakiccaṃ ambāṭakārāmaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ netvā tatthassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1223_4: kāretvā nibaddhaṃ attano gehe piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi. Theropi
atk-s0401a:1223_5: tassa upanissayaṃ disvā dhammaṃ desento saḷāyatanavibhattimeva desesi. Citto gahapati
atk-s0401a:1223_6: purimabhave madditasaṅkhāratāya nacirasseva anāgāmiphalaṃ sampāpuṇi. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0401a:1223_7: isidattatthero tattha gantvā viharanto seṭṭhissa nivesane bhattakiccapariyosāne āyasmatā
atk-s0401a:1223_8: therena pañhaṃ vissajjetuṃ asakkontena ajjhiṭṭho upāsakassa pañhaṃ vissajjetvā tena
atk-s0401a:1223_9: pubbe gihisahāyakabhāve ñāte “na idāni idha vatthabba”nti yathāsukhaṃ pakkāmi. Punekadivasaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1223_10: seṭṭhi gahapati, mahānāmattheraṃ iddhipāṭihāriyakaraṇatthaṃ yāci. Sopi tassa tejosamāpattipāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1223_11: dassetvā “idāni idha vasituṃ na yutta”nti yathāsukhaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:1224_0: Athekadivasaṃ dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusahassaparivārā ambāṭakārāmaṃ agamaṃsu. Seṭṭhi
atk-s0401a:1224_1: gahapati, tesaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ sajjesi. Sudhammatthero taṃ asahamāno seṭṭhiṃ tilasaṅgulikāvādena
atk-s0401a:1224_2: khuṃsetvā tena paṇāmito satthu santikaṃ gantvā ovādaṃ labhitvā dasabalassa ovāde
atk-s0401a:1224_3: ṭhito cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetvā tattheva ambāṭakārāme viharanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0401a:1224_4: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tadā upāsako cintesi – “ahaṃ dasabalaṃ adisvāva ciraṃ vītināmesiṃ,
atk-s0401a:1224_5: satthu santikaṃ gacchantena pana ayuttaṃ tucchahatthena gantu”nti pañcahi sakaṭasatehi
atk-s0401a:1224_6: telamadhuphāṇitādīni ādāya “ye dasabalaṃ passitukāmā, te mayā saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti
atk-s0401a:1224_7: nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā dvīhi purisasahassehi parivuto satthāraṃ passituṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:1224_8: Tiṃsayojane magge devatā paṇṇākāraṃ upaṭṭhapesuṃ. So satthu santikaṃ gantvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0401a:1224_9: satthāraṃ vandi, tasmiṃ khaṇe ākāsā pañcavaṇṇānaṃ pupphānaṃ vassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0401a:1225_0: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayavasena saḷāyatanavibhattimeva kathesi. Tassa aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ
atk-s0401a:1225_1: dasabalassa dānaṃ dentassāpi sakanivesanato nītāni taṇḍulatelamadhuphāṇitādīni na
atk-s0401a:1225_2: khīyiṃsu. Rājagahavāsikehi pahitapaṇṇākārova alaṃ ahosi. So satthāraṃ passitvā attano
atk-s0401a:1225_3: nagaraṃ gacchanto sakaṭehi ābhataṃ sabbaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi. Sakaṭesu tucchesu
atk-s0401a:1225_4: jātamattesveva devatā satta ratanāni pūrayiṃsu. Mahājanantare kathā udapādi “yāva
atk-s0401a:1225_5: sakkārasammānappatto vatāyaṃ citto gahapatī”ti. Taṃ sutvā satthā dhammapade imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:1227: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. ;
atk-s0401a:1228_0: So tato paṭṭhāya ariyasāvakānaṃyeva upāsakānaṃ pañcahi satehi parivuto vicarati.
atk-s0401a:1228_1: Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge upāsake paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento cittasaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0401a:1230_0: 251. Catutthe catūhi saṅgahavatthūhīti catubbidhena saṅgahavatthunā parisaṃ saṅgaṇhantānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1230_1: hatthako āḷavako aggoti dasseti. Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulaghare
atk-s0401a:1230_2: nibbatto aparabhāge satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi
atk-s0401a:1230_3: samannāgataṃ ekaṃ upāsakaṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1230_4: patthesi. So kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde āḷaviraṭṭhe
atk-s0401a:1230_5: āḷavinagare āḷavakassa rañño gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, sve bhattacāṭiyā saddhiṃ āḷavakassa pesetabbo ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1231_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – ekadivasaṃ kira āḷavako rājā migavatthāya araññaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:1231_1: ekaṃ migaṃ anubandhitvā ghātetvā chinditvā dhanukoṭiyaṃ lagetvā nivattetvā āgacchanto
atk-s0401a:1231_2: vātātapena kilantakāyo ekaṃ sandacchāyaṃ nigrodharukkhamūlaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi. Atha
atk-s0401a:1231_3: naṃ muhuttaṃ darathaṃ vinodetvā nikkhamantaṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā “tiṭṭha tiṭṭha,
atk-s0401a:1231_4: bhakkhosi me”ti hatthe gaṇhi. So daḷhaṃ gahitattā aññaṃ upāyaṃ apassanto “devasikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1231_5: te ekekapurisena saddhiṃ cāṭibhattaṃ pesessāmī”ti vatvā nagaraṃ gato. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:1231_6: bandhanāgārato ekekamanussena saddhiṃ cāṭibhattaṃ pesesi. Eteneva niyāmena bandhanāgāre
atk-s0401a:1231_7: manussesu khīṇesu “mahallakamanussesu gayhamānesu raṭṭhakhobho hotī”ti te aggahetvā
atk-s0401a:1231_8: daharakumāre gaṇhituṃ ārabhiṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya nagare dārakamātaro ca gabbhiniyo
atk-s0401a:1232_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā paccūsasamayante lokaṃ volokento āḷavakakumārassa tiṇṇaṃ maggaphalānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1232_1: upanissayaṃ disvā “ayaṃ kumāro kappasatasahassaṃ patthitapatthano devalokā cavitvā
atk-s0401a:1232_2: āḷavakarañño gehe nibbatto, aññaṃ kumāraṃ alabhantā sve kumāraṃ cāṭibhattena saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1232_3: gahetvā gacchissantī”ti cintetvā sāyanhasamaye aññātakavesena āḷavakassa yakkhassa
atk-s0401a:1232_4: bhavanadvāraṃ gantvā tassa dovārikaṃ gadrabhaṃ nāma yakkhaṃ bhavanaṃ pavisanatthāya
atk-s0401a:1232_5: yāci. So āha – “bhagavā tumhe pavisatha, mayhaṃ pana āḷavakassa anārocanaṃ nāma ayutta”nti.
atk-s0401a:1232_6: So himavante yakkhasamāgamaṃ gatassa āḷavakassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Satthāpi taṃ bhavanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1233_0: Tasmiṃ samaye sātāgirahemavatā āḷavakassa bhavanamatthakena yakkhasamāgamaṃ gacchantā
atk-s0401a:1233_1: attano gamane asampajjamāne “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti āvajjentā satthāraṃ āḷavakassa
atk-s0401a:1233_2: bhavane nisinnaṃ disvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā yakkhasamāgamaṃ gantvā āḷavakassa
atk-s0401a:1233_3: tuṭṭhiṃ pavedayiṃsu – “lābhā te, āvuso āḷavaka, yassa te sadevake loke aggapuggalo
atk-s0401a:1233_4: bhavane nisinno, gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇāhī”ti. So tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā cintesi
atk-s0401a:1233_5: – “ime ekassa muṇḍakasamaṇassa mama pallaṅke nisinnabhāvaṃ kathentī”ti anattamano
atk-s0401a:1233_6: kodhābhibhūto hutvā “ajja mayhaṃ etena samaṇena saddhiṃ saṅgāmo bhavissati, tattha
atk-s0401a:1233_7: me sahāyā nāma hothā”ti dakkhiṇapādaṃ ukkhipitvā saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ pabbatakūṭaṃ
atk-s0401a:1233_8: akkami, taṃ bhijjitvā dvidhā ahosi. Ito paṭṭhāya āḷavakayuddhaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Āḷavako
atk-s0401a:1233_9: pana sabbarattiṃ tathāgatena saddhiṃ nānappakārena yujjhantopi kiñci kātuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0401a:1233_10: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭha pañhe pucchi, satthā vissajjesi. Desanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale
atk-s0401a:1234_0: Punadivase uṭṭhite aruṇe cāṭibhattāharaṇavelāya sakalanagare gahetabbayuttaṃ dārakaṃ
atk-s0401a:1234_1: adisvā rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā āha – “gaṇhituṃ ayuttaṭṭhāne pana atthi, tātā”ti. Āma,
atk-s0401a:1234_2: deva, ajja rājakule putto jātoti. Gacchatha, tātā, mayaṃ jīvantā puttaṃ labhissāma,
atk-s0401a:1234_3: cāṭibhattena naṃ pesethāti. Te deviyā vikkandamānāya dārakaṃ gahetvā cāṭibhattena
atk-s0401a:1234_4: saddhiṃ āḷavakassa bhavanadvāraṃ gantvā “handa, ayya, tava bhāgaṃ paṭicchāhī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1234_5: Āḷavako tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā ariyasāvakattā lajjamāno adhomukho nisīdi. Atha naṃ satthā
atk-s0401a:1234_6: āha – “idāni te, āḷavaka, lajjanakiccaṃ natthi, dārakaṃ gahetvā mama hatthe ṭhapehī”ti.
atk-s0401a:1234_7: Te rājapurisā āḷavakakumāraṃ āḷavakassa hatthe ṭhapesuṃ, āḷavako taṃ ādāya dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:1234_8: hatthe ṭhapesi, satthā paṭiggaṇhitvā puna āḷavakassa hatthe ṭhapesi, āḷavako taṃ
atk-s0401a:1234_9: gahetvā rājapurisānaṃ hatthe ṭhapesi. Itissa hatthato hatthaṃ gatattā “hatthako āḷavako”tveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1235_0: Atha naṃ te rājapurisā tuṭṭhamānasā ādāya rañño santikaṃ agamaṃsu. Rājā taṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:1235_1: “ajja cāṭibhattaṃ na sampaṭicchatī”ti saññaṃ katvā “kasmā, tātā, evameva āgatatthā”ti
atk-s0401a:1235_2: āha. Deva, rājakulassa tuṭṭhi ca vaḍḍhi ca, satthā āḷavakassa bhavane nisīditvā āḷavakaṃ
atk-s0401a:1235_3: dametvā upāsakatte patiṭṭhāpetvā kumāraṃ amhākaṃ dāpesīti. Satthāpi āḷavakaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1235_4: gāhāpetvā āḷavinagarābhimukho pāyāsi. So nagaraṃ upasaṅkamanto lajjitvāva osakkati.
atk-s0401a:1235_5: Satthā naṃ oloketvā “lajjasi, āḷavakā”ti pucchi. Āma, bhante, nagaravāsino maṃ nissāya
atk-s0401a:1235_6: mātimaraṇaṃ pitimaraṇaṃ puttadāramaraṇañca pāpuṇiṃsu. Te maṃ passitvā daṇḍehipi leḍḍūhipi
atk-s0401a:1235_7: paharissanti. Tasmā osakkāmi, bhanteti. “Āḷavaka, natthi te mayā saddhiṃ gacchantassa
atk-s0401a:1235_8: bhayaṃ, vissattho ehī”ti vatvā nagarassa avidūre ṭhāne vanasaṇḍe aṭṭhāsi. Āḷavakarājāpi
atk-s0401a:1235_9: nāgare gahetvā satthu paccuggamanaṃ gato. Satthā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0401a:1235_10: desanāvasāne caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ piviṃsu. Te āḷavakassa tattheva
atk-s0401a:1236_0: Āḷavakopi nāgare dhammikāya rakkhāya saṅgaṇhi. Sopi āḷavakakumāro vuḍḍhippatto satthu
atk-s0401a:1236_1: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā tīṇi maggaphalāni paṭivijjhi. So sabbakālaṃ ariyasāvakaupāsakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1236_2: pañcahi satehi parivuto carati. Athekadivasaṃ tehi upāsakehi saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1236_3: gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā suvinītaṃ parisaṃ disvā “mahatī te, āḷavaka,
atk-s0401a:1236_4: parisā, kathaṃ taṃ saṅgaṇhāsī”ti āha. Bhagavā dānena tussantaṃ dānena saṅgaṇhāmi,
atk-s0401a:1236_5: piyavacanena tussantaṃ piyavacanena saṅgaṇhāmi, uppannesu kiccesu tesaṃ nittharaṇena
atk-s0401a:1236_6: tussantaṃ uppannakiccanittharaṇena saṅgaṇhāmi, samānattaṭṭhānena tussantaṃ samānattatāya
atk-s0401a:1236_7: saṅgaṇhāmīti. Evametaṃ vatthu samuṭṭhitaṃ. Atha satthā aparabhāge jetavane nisīditvā
atk-s0401a:1236_8: upāsake ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisaṃ saṅgaṇhantānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1238_0: 252. Pañcame paṇītadāyakānanti paṇītarasadāyakānaṃ mahānāmo sakko aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1238_1: So kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0401a:1238_2: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ upāsakaṃ paṇītarasadāyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1238_3: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:1238_4: buddhuppāde kapilavatthupure sakyarājakule nibbattitvā vayappatto dasabalassa paṭhamadassaneyeva
atk-s0401a:1239_0: Athekasmiṃ samaye satthā verañjāyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ vasitvā anupubbena kapilavatthupuraṃ
atk-s0401a:1239_1: gantvā nigrodhārāme paṭivasati. Mahānāmo “satthā āgato”ti sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:1239_2: abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisinno satthāraṃ evamāha – “bhagavā sutametaṃ ‘bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0401a:1239_3: kira verañjāyaṃ bhikkhācārena kilamatī’ti, mama catumāsaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa paṭijaggane
atk-s0401a:1239_4: paṭiññaṃ detha, ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa sarīre ojaṃ pavesessāmī”ti. Satthā adhivāsesi.
atk-s0401a:1239_5: So satthu adhivāsanaṃ viditvā punadivasato paṭṭhāya buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0401a:1239_6: paṇītarasabhojanacatumadhurādīhi paṭijaggitvā puna catumāsaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā aṭṭha
atk-s0401a:1239_7: māse pūretvā puna catumāsaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā sakalasaṃvaccharaṃ paṭijaggi. Satthā
atk-s0401a:1239_8: tato paraṃ paṭiññaṃ nādāsi. Mahānāmo pana tato paṭṭhāya aparāparaṃ sampattabhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0401a:1239_9: teneva niyāmena sakkāraṃ karoti. Tassa so guṇo sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo jāto. Evametaṃ
atk-s0401a:1239_10: vatthu samuṭṭhitaṃ. Satthā pana aparabhāge jetavane nisīditvā mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ paṇītadāyakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1241_0: 253. Chaṭṭhe manāpadāyakānanti manāpaṃ cittarucitabhojanaṃ dāyakānaṃ uggo gahapati,
atk-s0401a:1241_1: vesāliko aggoti dasseti. So kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0401a:1241_2: aparabhāge satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ upāsakaṃ manāpadāyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1241_3: ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:1241_4: devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ seṭṭhikule nibbatti. Tassa
atk-s0401a:1241_5: jātakāle nāmaṃ aniyāmitaṃ. Aparabhāge panassa attabhāvopi uggato ahosi samiddho,
atk-s0401a:1241_6: alaṅkatatoraṇaṃ viya ussitacittapaṭo viya ca ativirocittha. Guṇāpissa uggatā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1241_7: So imesaṃ dvinnampi uggatattā uggaseṭṭhitveva saṅkhaṃ gato. So panāyaṃ dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:1241_8: paṭhamadassaneyeva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aparabhāge tīṇipi maggaphalāni sacchākāsi.
atk-s0401a:1241_9: So attano mahallakakāle rahogato nisīditvā cintesi – “yaṃ yaṃ mayhaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1241_10: taṃ tadeva dasabalassa dassāmi, idaṃ me satthu sammukhāpi sutaṃ ‘manāpadāyī labhate
atk-s0401a:1241_11: manāpa”’nti. Athassa etadahosi – “api nu kho me cittaṃ jānitvā satthāpi nivesanadvāraṃ āgaccheyyā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1242_0: Satthāpi kho tassa cittaṃ ñatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nivesanadvāreyeva pāturahosi.
atk-s0401a:1242_1: So “satthā āgato”ti sutvā ativiya ussāhajāto dasabalassa santikaṃ gantvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0401a:1242_2: vanditvā satthu pattaṃ paṭiggahetvā gharaṃ pavesetvā paññattavarabuddhāsane satthāraṃ,
atk-s0401a:1242_3: avasesaāsanesu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nānaggarasehi
atk-s0401a:1242_4: parivisitvā bhattakiccapariyosāne ekamantaṃ nisīditvā evamāha – “sammukhā metaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1242_5: bhante, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ ‘manāpadāyī labhate manāpa”’nti. Yaṃ
atk-s0401a:1242_6: yaṃ, bhante, mayhaṃ manāpaṃ, taṃ taṃ mayā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dinnamevā”ti
atk-s0401a:1242_7: satthāraṃ jānāpetvā tato paṭṭhāya yaṃ yaṃ tassa manāpaṃ, taṃ taṃ buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0401a:1242_8: bhikkhusaṅghassa deti. Taṃ pana sabbaṃ pañcakanipāte uggasutte vitthārato āgamissati.
atk-s0401a:1242_9: Evametaṃ vatthu samuṭṭhitaṃ. Satthā aparabhāge jetavane viharanto taṃ upāsakaṃ manāpadāyakānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1244_0: 254. Sattame saṅghupaṭṭhākānanti bhikkhusaṅghassa upaṭṭhākānaṃ hatthigāmako uggato
atk-s0401a:1244_1: gahapati, aggoti dasseti. Sopi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0401a:1244_2: aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ ekaṃ upāsakaṃ saṅghupaṭṭhākānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1244_3: ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:1244_4: devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde hatthigāme seṭṭhikule nibbatti, tassa
atk-s0401a:1245_0: So aparabhāge gharāvāse patiṭṭhito pitu accayena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena samayena
atk-s0401a:1245_1: satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto cārikaṃ caranto hatthigāmaṃ patvā nāgavanuyyāne viharati.
atk-s0401a:1245_2: Tadā ayaṃ uggataseṭṭhi sattāhaṃ pānamadamatto hutvā nāṭakehi parivuto nāgavanuyyānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1245_3: gantvā paricārayamāno dasabalaṃ disvā balavahirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpesi. Athassa
atk-s0401a:1245_4: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamantassa sabbo surāmado abbhatthaṃ agamāsi. So satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0401a:1245_5: ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Athassa satthā dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne tīṇi maggaphalāni
atk-s0401a:1245_6: paṭivijjhi. Tato paṭṭhāya nāṭakāni “tumhe yathāsukhaṃ gacchathā”ti vissajjetvā dānābhirato
atk-s0401a:1245_7: hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa dānameva deti. Devatā rattibhāgasamanantare āgantvā seṭṭhissa
atk-s0401a:1245_8: ārocenti – “gahapati, asuko bhikkhu tevijjo, asuko bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño, asuko sīlavā,
atk-s0401a:1245_9: asuko dussīlo”ti. So tāsaṃ vacanaṃ sutvāpi guṇaṃ tāva yathābhūtato jānāti, deyyadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1245_10: pana samacitteneva deti. Satthu santike nisīditvāpi tameva guṇaṃ katheti. Aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1245_11: satthā jetavane nisīditvā taṃ gahapatiṃ saṅghupaṭṭhākānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1247_0: 255. Aṭṭhame aveccappasannānanti avigacchanasabhāvena acalena pasādena samannāgatānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1247_1: sūrambaṭṭho aggoti dasseti. Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe
atk-s0401a:1247_2: nibbatto satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ ekaṃ upāsakaṃ aveccappasannānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1247_3: ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:1247_4: devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhikule nibbatti, sūrambaṭṭhotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1248_0: So aparabhāge vayappatto gharāvāse patiṭṭhāya aññatitthiyānaṃ upaṭṭhāko hutvā carati.
atk-s0401a:1248_1: Atha satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento tassa sotāpattimaggahetuṃ disvā bhikkhācāravelāya
atk-s0401a:1248_2: nivesanadvāraṃ agamāsi. So dasabalaṃ disvā cintesi – “samaṇo gotamo mahākule ceva
atk-s0401a:1248_3: jāto, loke ca abhiññāto, tenassa santikaṃ agamanaṃ nāma na yutta”nti satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1248_4: gantvā pādesu vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā gharaṃ pavesetvā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0401a:1248_5: bhikkhaṃ datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā tassa caritavasena
atk-s0401a:1248_6: dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Satthāpi taṃ dametvā vihārameva gato.
atk-s0401a:1249_0: Tato māro cintesi – “ayaṃ sūrambaṭṭho nāma amhākaṃ santako, satthā panassa ajja gehaṃ
atk-s0401a:1249_1: gato, kiṃ nu kho satthu dhammaṃ sutvā maggapātubhāvaṃ akaritthāti yāvassa mama visayā
atk-s0401a:1249_2: atikkantabhāvaṃ vā anatikkantabhāvaṃ vā jānāmī”ti attano kāmarūpitāya dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:1249_3: sarikkhakaṃ rūpaṃ māpetvā cīvaraggahaṇampi pattaggahaṇampi buddhākappeneva katvā
atk-s0401a:1249_4: dvattiṃsalakkhaṇadharo hutvā sūrambaṭṭhassa gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Sūrambaṭṭhopi “puna
atk-s0401a:1249_5: dasabalo āgato”ti sutvā “buddhānaṃ aniyyānikagamanaṃ nāma natthi, kena nu kho kāraṇena
atk-s0401a:1249_6: āgato”ti vegena “dasabalo”ti saññāya tassa santikaṃ gantvā abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0401a:1249_7: ṭhito, “bhante, tumhe idāneva imasmiṃ gehe bhattakiccaṃ katvā gatā, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:1249_8: paṭicca puna āgatatthā”ti āha. “Sūrambaṭṭha mayā dhammaṃ kathentena ekaṃ anupadhāretvā
atk-s0401a:1249_9: kathitaṃ. Mayā hi pañcakkhandhā ‘sabbeva aniccā dukkhā anattā’ti kathitā, na panete
atk-s0401a:1249_10: sabbeva evarūpā. Ekacce hi khandhā niccā dhuvā sassatā atthī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1250_0: Tato sūrambaṭṭho cintesi – “ayaṃ kathā ativiya bhāriyā. Buddhānañhi anupadhāretvā
atk-s0401a:1250_1: kathanaṃ nāma natthi, dasabalassa māro kira paṭipakkho, addhā ayaṃ māro bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:1250_2: cintetvā – “mārosi tva”nti āha. Ariyasāvakena kathitakathā tassa pharasuppahāro viya
atk-s0401a:1250_3: ahosi, tasmā sakabhāvena ṭhātuṃ asakkonto “āma, sūrambaṭṭha, ahaṃ māro”ti āha. “Tādisānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1250_4: mārānaṃ satampi sahassampi āgantvā mama saddhaṃ cāletuṃ na sakkoti, mahāgotamo dasabalo
atk-s0401a:1250_5: mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desento ‘sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā’ti bodhetvā desesi, mā me gharadvāre
atk-s0401a:1250_6: tiṭṭhā”ti accharaṃ pahari. Māro tassa vacanaṃ sutvā paṭippharitvā kathetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0401a:1250_7: tattheva antaradhāyi. Sūrambaṭṭhopi sāyanhasamaye satthu santikaṃ gantvā mārena katakiriyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1250_8: kathetvā, “bhante, evaṃ māro mama saddhaṃ cāletuṃ vāyamitthā”ti āha. Satthā etadeva
atk-s0401a:1250_9: kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhupattiṃ katvā imasmiṃ sāsane sūrambaṭṭhaṃ aveccappasannānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1252_0: 256. Navame puggalappasannānanti puggaliyappasādena samannāgatānaṃ upāsakānaṃ jīvako
atk-s0401a:1252_1: komārabhacco aggoti dasseti. So hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:1252_2: Satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ upāsakaṃ puggalappasannānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1252_3: ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:1252_4: devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahanagare abhayarājakumāraṃ paṭicca
atk-s0401a:1252_5: sālavatiyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyā kucchimhi nibbatto. Rūpūpajīviniyo ca nāma vijātakāle
atk-s0401a:1252_6: sace putto hoti, chaḍḍenti. Sace dhītā, paṭijagganti. Iti sā taṃ dārakaṃ kattarasuppakena
atk-s0401a:1252_7: saṅkārakūṭe chaḍḍāpesi. Atha naṃ abhayo rājakumāro rājupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:1252_8: “kiṃ, bhaṇe, etaṃ kākehi samparikiṇṇa”nti manusse pesetvā “dārako devā”ti. Jīvati,
atk-s0401a:1252_9: bhaṇeti, “jīvati, devā”ti sutvā attano antepure posāpesi. Tassa jīvatīti kathitattā
atk-s0401a:1252_10: jīvakoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu, kumārena posāpitoti komārabhaccoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1253_0: So attano soḷasavassuddesikakāle takkasilaṃ gantvā vejjasippaṃ uggaṇhitvā bimbisārarañño
atk-s0401a:1253_1: santikā sakkāraṃ labhitvā caṇḍapajjotassa rañño rogaṃ phāsukaṃ akāsi. So tassa pañca
atk-s0401a:1253_2: taṇḍulasakaṭasatāni soḷasa kahāpaṇasahassāni dussasahassaparivāraṃ anagghaṃ siveyyakaṃ
atk-s0401a:1253_3: dussayugañca pesesi. Tasmiṃ samaye satthā rājagahaṃ upanissāya gijjhakūṭe pabbate
atk-s0401a:1253_4: viharati. Jīvako satthu ussannadhātuke kāye virecanaṃ datvā bhesajjaṃ karonto “cattāro
atk-s0401a:1253_5: paccayā mama santakāva hontū”ti satthāraṃ attano vihāre vasāpetvā satthu bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:1253_6: katvā taṃ dussayugaṃ upanetvā “idaṃ, bhante, tumheyeva paribhogaṃ karothā”ti vatvā
atk-s0401a:1253_7: tena saddhiṃ laddhaṃ dussasahassaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārena
atk-s0401a:1253_8: pana jīvakavatthu khandhake āgatameva. Satthā aparabhāge jetavane viharanto jīvakaṃ
atk-s0401a:1255_0: 257. Dasame vissāsakānanti vissāsikakathaṃ kathentānaṃ upāsakānaṃ antare, nakulapitā
atk-s0401a:1255_1: gahapati, aggoti dasseti. So kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto
atk-s0401a:1255_2: satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ upāsakaṃ vissāsakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0401a:1255_3: disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. So kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0401a:1255_4: saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhaggaraṭṭhe susumāragirinagare seṭṭhikule nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1255_5: Satthāpi bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto cārikaṃ caramāno taṃ nagaraṃ patvā bhesakaḷāvane viharati.
atk-s0401a:1255_6: Athāyaṃ, nakulapitā gahapati, susumāragirivāsīhi saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā paṭhamadassaneneva
atk-s0401a:1255_7: so ca bhariyā cassa dasabalaṃ “ayaṃ amhākaṃ putto”ti saññaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ubhopi satthu
atk-s0401a:1255_8: pādesu nipatitvā, “tāta, tvaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ amhe chaḍḍetvā kahaṃ vicarasī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1255_9: Ayaṃ kira, nakulapitā gahapati, pubbe pañca jātisatāni dasabalassa pitā ahosi, pañca
atk-s0401a:1255_10: jātisatāni cūḷapitā, pañca jātisatāni mahāpitā, pañca jātisatāni mātulo, nakulamātāpi
atk-s0401a:1255_11: pañca jātisatāni mātā ahosi, pañca jātisatāni cūḷamātā, pañca jātisatāni mahāmātā,
atk-s0401a:1255_12: pañca jātisatāni pitucchā. Iti dīgharattaṃ anugatasinehattā dasabalaṃ disvāva “putto”ti
atk-s0401a:1255_13: saññaṃ katvā saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Satthā yāva tesaṃ cittaṃ saññattiṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0401a:1255_14: tāva “apethā”ti nāvoca. Atha nesaṃ yathāmaneneva satiṃ paṭilabhitvā majjhattabhūtānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1255_15: āsayaṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne ubhopi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1256_0: Satthā aparabhāge tesaṃ mahallakakāle puna taṃ nagaraṃ agamāsi. Te “satthā āgato”ti
atk-s0401a:1256_1: sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā svātanāya nimantetvā punadivase
atk-s0401a:1256_2: attano nivesane buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nānaggarasehi parivisitvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1256_3: katabhattakiccaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho nakulapitā
atk-s0401a:1256_4: gahapati, bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “yato me, bhante, nakulamātā gahapatānī, daharasseva
atk-s0401a:1256_5: daharā ānītā, nābhijānāmi nakulamātaraṃ gahapatāniṃ manasāpi aticaritā, kuto pana
atk-s0401a:1256_6: kāyena. Iccheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, diṭṭhe ceva dhamme aññamaññaṃ passituṃ abhisamparāyañca
atk-s0401a:1256_7: aññamaññaṃ passitu”nti. Nakulamātāpi kho, gahapatānī, bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “yato
atk-s0401a:1256_8: ahaṃ, bhante, nakulapituno gahapatissa daharasseva daharā ānītā, nābhijānāmi nakulapitaraṃ
atk-s0401a:1256_9: gahapatiṃ manasāpi aticaritā, kuto pana kāyena. Iccheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, diṭṭhe
atk-s0401a:1256_10: ceva dhamme aññamaññaṃ passituṃ abhisamparāyañca aññamaññaṃ passitu”nti. Atha aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:1256_11: satthā jetavane nisīditvā upāsake paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento imaṃ imesaṃ dvinnampi
atk-s0401a:1256_12: kathaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā nakulapitaraṃ gahapatiṃ vissāsakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1262_0: 258. Upāsikāpāḷiyā paṭhame paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantīnanti sabbapaṭhamaṃ saraṇesu
atk-s0401a:1262_1: patiṭṭhitānaṃ upāsikānaṃ, sujātā nāma, seniyadhītā aggāti dasseti. Sāpi padumuttarabuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:1262_2: haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattā aparabhāge satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:1262_3: upāsikaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikāraṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:1262_4: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ satthu
atk-s0401a:1262_5: nibbattito puretarameva uruvelāyaṃ senānigame seniyakuṭumbikassa gehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0401a:1262_6: vayappattā ekasmiṃ nigrodhamūle patthanaṃ akāsi – “sace samajātikaṃ kulagharaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:1262_7: paṭhamagabbhe puttaṃ labhissāmi, anusaṃvaccharaṃ balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti. Tassā sā patthanā samijjhi.
atk-s0401a:1263_0: Sā mahāsattassa dukkarakārikaṃ karontassa chaṭṭhe vasse paripuṇṇe visākhapuṇṇamadivase
atk-s0401a:1263_1: “pātova balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya dhenuyo duhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1263_2: Vacchakā dhenūnaṃ thanamūlaṃ na āgamaṃsu, thanamūle navabhājanamhi upanītamatte attanova
atk-s0401a:1263_3: dhammatāya khīradhārā patiṃsu. Taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā, sujātā, sahattheneva khīraṃ
atk-s0401a:1263_4: gaṇhitvā navabhājane pakkhipitvā sahattheneva aggiṃ katvā pacituṃ ārabhi. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:1263_5: pāyāse paccamāne mahantamahantā bubbuḷā uṭṭhahitvā dakkhiṇāvattā hutvā sañcaranti,
atk-s0401a:1263_6: ekaphusitampi bahi na niggacchati. Mahābrahmā chattaṃ dhāresi, cattāro lokapālā khaggahatthā
atk-s0401a:1263_7: ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu, sakko alātāni samānento aggiṃ jālesi. Devatā catūsu dīpesu ojaṃ
atk-s0401a:1263_8: saṃharitvā tattha pakkhipiṃsu. Sujātā, ekadivaseyeva imāni acchariyāni disvā puṇṇādāsiṃ
atk-s0401a:1263_9: āmantesi – “amma, puṇṇe ajja amhākaṃ devatā ativiya pasannā, mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-s0401a:1263_10: acchariyaṃ nāma na diṭṭhapubbaṃ, vegena gantvā devaṭṭhānaṃ paṭijaggāhī”ti. Sā “sādhu,
atk-s0401a:1263_11: ayye”ti tassā vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā turitaturitā rukkhamūlaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1264_0: Bodhisattopi kho bhikkhācārakālaṃ āgamayamāno pātova gantvā rukkhamūle nisīdi. Rukkhamūlaṃ
atk-s0401a:1264_1: sodhanatthāya gatā puṇṇā āgantvā sujātāya ārocesi – “devatā rukkhamūle nisinnā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1264_2: Sujātā, “sace je saccaṃ bhaṇasi, adāsiṃ karomī”ti vatvā sabbapasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā
atk-s0401a:1264_3: satasahassagghanake suvaṇṇathāle pāyāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aparāya suvaṇṇapātiyā pidahitvā
atk-s0401a:1264_4: setavatthena sampaliveṭhetvā samantā gandhadāmamālādāmāni osāretvā ukkhipitvā gantvā
atk-s0401a:1264_5: mahāpurisaṃ disvā balavapītiṃ uppādetvā diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya oṇatoṇatā gantvā
atk-s0401a:1264_6: sīsato thālaṃ otāretvā vivaritvā saheva pātiyā pāyāsaṃ mahāpurisassa hatthe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:1264_7: vanditvā “yathā mayhaṃ manoratho nipphanno, evaṃ tumhākampi nipphajjatū”ti vatvā
atk-s0401a:1264_8: pakkāmi. Bodhisatto nerañjarāya nadiyā tīraṃ gantvā suvaṇṇathālaṃ tīre ṭhapetvā nhatvā
atk-s0401a:1264_9: paccuttaritvā ekūnapaṇṇāsa piṇḍe karonto pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ nadiyā
atk-s0401a:1264_10: sampavāhetvā anukkamena bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha sabbaññutaṃ patvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe
atk-s0401a:1264_11: atikkamitvā isipatane migadāye pavattitavaradhammacakko sujātāya puttassa yasadārakassa
atk-s0401a:1264_12: upanissayaṃ disvā gantvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1265_0: Yasopi kulaputto rattibhāgasamanantare vivaṭaṃ itthāgāraṃ disvā sañjātasaṃvego “upaddutaṃ
atk-s0401a:1265_1: vata, bho, upasaṭṭhaṃ vata, bho”ti vatvā nivesanato nikkhamitvāva bahinagare satthu
atk-s0401a:1265_2: santikaṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā tīṇi maggaphalāni paṭivijjhi. Athassa pitā padānupadikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1265_3: gantvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yasassa pavattiṃ pucchi. Satthā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ
atk-s0401a:1265_4: paṭicchādetvā dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne so seṭṭhigahapati sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0401a:1265_5: yaso arahattaphalaṃ pāpuṇi. Taṃ bhagavā “ehi bhikkhū”ti āha, tāvadevassa gihiliṅgaṃ
atk-s0401a:1265_6: antaradhāyi, iddhimayapattacīvaradharo ahosi. Pitāpissa satthāraṃ nimantesi. Satthā
atk-s0401a:1265_7: yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā tassa gharaṃ gantvā katabhattakicco dhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1265_8: desesi, desanāpariyosāne yasassa mātā, sujātā, purāṇadutiyikā ca sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1265_9: Taṃdivasaṃ ayaṃ, sujātā, tevācikasaraṇe patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ suṇisāya. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0401a:1265_10: vitthārato panetaṃ vatthu khandhake āgatameva. Satthā aparabhāge paṭipāṭiyā upāsikāyo
atk-s0401a:1265_11: ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento imaṃ upāsikaṃ paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1267_0: 259. Dutiye dāyikānanti dānābhiratānaṃ upāsikānaṃ, visākhā migāramātā, aggāti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1267_1: Sā kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattā aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1267_2: suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ upāsikaṃ dāyikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1267_3: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā kassapabuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:1267_4: kikissa kāsirañño gehe sattannaṃ bhaginīnaṃ sabbakaniṭṭhā hutvā nibbatti. Tadā kira –
atk-s0401a:1269: Dhammā ceva sudhammā ca, saṅghadāsī ca sattamā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1270: Imā satta bhaginiyo ahesuṃ. Tā etarahi –
atk-s0401a:1273_0: Evaṃnāmā hutvā nibbattā. Tatrāyaṃ saṅghadāsī ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā
atk-s0401a:1273_1: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aṅgaraṭṭhe bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino
atk-s0401a:1273_2: aggamahesiyā sumanadeviyā nāma kucchismiṃ nibbatti, visākhātissā nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Tassā
atk-s0401a:1273_3: sattavassikakāle dasabalo selabrāhmaṇassa ca aññesañca bodhaneyyabandhavānaṃ upanissayasampattiṃ
atk-s0401a:1273_4: disvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro cārikaṃ caramāno tasmiṃ raṭṭhe taṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1274_0: Tasmiñca samaye meṇḍako gahapati tasmiṃ nagare pañcannaṃ mahāpuññānaṃ jeṭṭhako hutvā
atk-s0401a:1274_1: seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ kāresi. Pañca mahāpuññā nāma meṇḍako seṭṭhi, candapadumā nāma tasseva
atk-s0401a:1274_2: aggamahesī, tassa ca putto dhanañcayo nāma, tassa bhariyā sumanadevī nāma, meṇḍakaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0401a:1274_3: dāso puṇṇo nāmāti. Na kevalañca meṇḍakaseṭṭhiyeva, bimbisāramahārājassa pana āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1274_4: pañca amitabhogā nāma ahesuṃ jotiko jaṭilo meṇḍako puṇṇo kākavaliyoti. Tesu ayaṃ
atk-s0401a:1274_5: meṇḍakaseṭṭhi dasabalassa attano nagaraṃ sampattabhāvaṃ sutvā puttassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino
atk-s0401a:1274_6: dhītaraṃ visākhādārikaṃ pakkositvā evamāha – “amma, tuyhampi maṅgalaṃ amhākampi maṅgalaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1274_7: tava paricārikāhi pañcadārikāsatehi saddhiṃ pañca rathasatāni āruyha pañcahi dāsisatehi
atk-s0401a:1274_8: parivutā dasabalassa paccuggamanaṃ karohī”ti. Sā pitāmahassa vacanaṃ sutvā tathā
atk-s0401a:1274_9: akāsi. Kāraṇākāraṇesu pana kusalattā yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā
atk-s0401a:1274_10: pattikāva satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Athassā caritavasena
atk-s0401a:1274_11: satthā dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāpariyosāne pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale
atk-s0401a:1274_12: patiṭṭhāsi. Meṇḍakaseṭṭhipi kho satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0401a:1274_13: aṭṭhāsi. Atha satthā tassapi caritavasena dhammaṃ desesi. So desanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale
atk-s0401a:1274_14: patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ svātanāya nimantetvā punadivase attano nivesane paṇītena khādanīyena
atk-s0401a:1274_15: bhojanīyena buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā etenupāyena aḍḍhamāsaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1274_16: adāsi. Satthā bhaddiyanagare yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:1275_0: Ito paraṃ aññaṃ kathāmaggaṃ vissajjetvā visākhāya uppattikathāva kathetabbā. Sāvatthiyañhi
atk-s0401a:1275_1: kosalarājā bimbisārassa santikaṃ pesesi – “mama āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne amitabhogavindanakulaṃ
atk-s0401a:1275_2: nāma natthi, amhākaṃ amitabhogavindanakulaṃ pesetū”ti. Rājā amaccehi saddhiṃ mantesi.
atk-s0401a:1275_3: Amaccā “mahākulaṃ pesetuṃ na sakkā, ekaṃ pana seṭṭhiputtaṃ pesessāmā”ti meṇḍakaseṭṭhino
atk-s0401a:1275_4: puttaṃ dhanañcayaseṭṭhiṃ āyāciṃsu. Rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā taṃ pesesi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0401a:1275_5: kosalarājā sāvatthito sattayojanamatthake sāketanagare seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ datvā vāsesi.
atk-s0401a:1276_0: Sāvatthiyañca migāraseṭṭhino putto puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumāro nāma vayappatto ahosi. Athassa
atk-s0401a:1276_1: pitā “putto me vayappatto, gharāvāsenassa ābandhanasamayo”ti ñatvā “amhākaṃ samānajātike
atk-s0401a:1276_2: kule dārikaṃ pariyesathā”ti kāraṇākāraṇakusale purise pesesi. Te sāvatthiyaṃ attano
atk-s0401a:1276_3: rucitaṃ dārikaṃ adisvā sāketaṃ agamaṃsu. Taṃdivasañca, visākhā, attano samānavayehi
atk-s0401a:1276_4: pañcahi kumārikāsatehi parivāritā nakkhattakīḷanatthāya ekaṃ mahāgāmaṃ agamāsi. Tepi
atk-s0401a:1276_5: purisā antonagare caritvā attano rucitaṃ dārikaṃ adisvā bahinagaradvāre aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1276_6: Tasmiṃ samaye devo vassituṃ ārabhi. Atha tā visākhāya saddhiṃ nikkhantā dārikā temanabhayena
atk-s0401a:1276_7: vegena sālaṃ pavisiṃsu. Te purisā tāsampi antare yathārucitaṃ dārikaṃ na passiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1276_8: Tāsaṃ pana sabbapacchato, visākhā, devaṃ vassantampi agaṇetvā aturitagamanena temayamānāva
atk-s0401a:1276_9: sālaṃ pāvisi. Te purisā taṃ disvā cintayiṃsu – “rūpavatī tāva kaññā etaparamā bhaveyya,
atk-s0401a:1276_10: rūpaṃ panetaṃ ekaccāya kāritapattaṃ viya hoti, kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā kathentā jānissāma
atk-s0401a:1276_11: madhuravacanā vā no vā”ti. Tato naṃ āhaṃsu – “ativiya pariṇatavayā itthī viya yāsi,
atk-s0401a:1276_12: ammā”ti. Kiṃ disvā kathetha, tātāti? Aññā tayā saddhiṃ kīḷanakumāriyo temanabhayena
atk-s0401a:1276_13: vegena āgantvā sālaṃ paviṭṭhā, tvaṃ pana mahallikā viya padavāraṃ atikkamma nāgacchasi,
atk-s0401a:1276_14: sāṭakassa temanabhāvampi na gaṇesi. Sace taṃ hatthī vā asso vā anubandheyya, kiṃ
atk-s0401a:1276_15: evamevaṃ kareyyāsīti? Tātā, sāṭakā nāma na dullabhā, sulabhā mayhaṃ kule sāṭakā.
atk-s0401a:1276_16: Vayappattā mātugāmā pana paṇiyabhaṇḍasadisā, hatthe vā pāde vā bhagge aṅgavikalaṃ
atk-s0401a:1276_17: mātugāmaṃ jigucchantā niṭṭhubhitvā gacchanti, tasmā saṇikaṃ āgatāmhīti.
atk-s0401a:1277_0: Te cintayiṃsu – “imāya sadisā imasmiṃ jambudīpe itthī nāma natthi, yādisā rūpena,
atk-s0401a:1277_1: kathāyapi tādisāva. Kāraṇākāraṇaṃ ñatvā kathetī”ti tassā upari mālāguḷaṃ khipiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1277_2: Atha, visākhā, cintesi – “ahaṃ pubbe apariggahitā, idāni pana pariggahitāmhī”ti vinītenākārena
atk-s0401a:1277_3: bhūmiyaṃ nisīdi. Atha naṃ tattheva sāṇiyā parikkhipiṃsu. Sā paṭicchannabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0401a:1277_4: dāsigaṇaparivutā gehaṃ agamāsi. Tepi migāraseṭṭhino purisā tāya saddhiṃyeva dhanañcayaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0401a:1277_5: santikaṃ agamaṃsu. “Kataragāmavāsino, tātā, tumhe”ti pucchitā “sāvatthinagare migāraseṭṭhino
atk-s0401a:1277_6: purisamhā”ti vatvā “mayaṃ amhākaṃ seṭṭhinā tumhākaṃ gehe vayappattā dārikā atthīti
atk-s0401a:1277_7: sutvā pesitā”ti. Sādhu, tātā, tumhākaṃ seṭṭhi kiñcāpi bhogena amhehi asadiso, jātiyā
atk-s0401a:1277_8: pana sadiso. Sabbākārasampanno nāma dullabho gacchatha tumhe seṭṭhissa amhehi sampaṭicchitabhāvaṃ ārocethāti.
atk-s0401a:1278_0: Te tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sāvatthiṃ gantvā migāraseṭṭhissa tuṭṭhiṃ vaḍḍhiṃ ca pavedetvā
atk-s0401a:1278_1: “laddhā no sāmi sākete dhanañcayaseṭṭhissa gehe dārikā”ti āhaṃsu. Taṃ sutvā migāraseṭṭhi
atk-s0401a:1278_2: “mahākulagehe kira no dārikā laddhā”ti tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā tāvadeva dhanañcayaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0401a:1278_3: sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “idāneva dārikaṃ ānayissāma, kattabbakiccaṃ karontū”ti. Sopissa paṭisāsanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1278_4: pesesi – “nayidaṃ amhākaṃ bhāriyaṃ, seṭṭhi pana attano kattabbakiccaṃ karotū”ti.
atk-s0401a:1278_5: So kosalarañño santikaṃ gantvā ārocesi – “deva, ekā me maṅgalakiriyā atthi, dāsassa
atk-s0401a:1278_6: te puṇṇavaḍḍhanassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino dhītaraṃ visākhaṃ nāma dārikaṃ ānessāmi, sāketagamanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1278_7: me anujānāthā”ti. Sādhu, mahāseṭṭhi, kiṃ pana amhehipi āgantabbanti? Deva tumhādisānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1278_8: gamanaṃ laddhuṃ sakkāti? Rājā mahākulassa saṅgahaṃ kātukāmo “hotu seṭṭhi, āgamissāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:1278_9: sampaṭicchitvā migāraseṭṭhinā saddhiṃ sāketanagaraṃ agamāsi. Dhanañcayaseṭṭhi “migāraseṭṭhi
atk-s0401a:1278_10: kira kosalarājānaṃ gahetvā āgato”ti sutvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā rājānaṃ gahetvā attano
atk-s0401a:1278_11: nivesanaṃ agamāsi. Tāvadeva rañño ca rājabalassa ca migāraseṭṭhino ca vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1278_12: ceva mālāgandhabhattādīni ca sabbāni paṭiyādesi. “Idaṃ imassa laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, idaṃ
atk-s0401a:1278_13: imassā”ti sabbaṃ attanāva jānāti. Te te janā cintayiṃsu – “seṭṭhi amhākameva sakkāraṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0401a:1279_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā dhanañcayaseṭṭhissa sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “na sakkā seṭṭhinā cirakālaṃ
atk-s0401a:1279_1: amhākaṃ bharaṇaposanaṃ kātuṃ, dārikāya gamanakālaṃ jānātū”ti. Sopi rañño sāsanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1279_2: pesesi – “idāni vassakālo āgato, na sakkā catumāsaṃ vicarituṃ, tumhākaṃ balakāyassa
atk-s0401a:1279_3: yaṃ yaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, sabbaṃ taṃ mama bhāro. Kevalaṃ devo mayā pesitakāle gacchatū”ti.
atk-s0401a:1279_4: Tato paṭṭhāya sāketanagaraṃ niccanakkhattagāmo viya ahosi. Evaṃ tayo māsā atikkantā.
atk-s0401a:1279_5: Dhanañcayaseṭṭhino pana dhītāya mahālatāpasādhanaṃ na tāva niṭṭhaṃ gacchati. Athassa
atk-s0401a:1279_6: kammantādhiṭṭhāyakā āgantvā ārocayiṃsu – “sesaṃ asantaṃ nāma natthi, balakāyassa
atk-s0401a:1279_7: pana bhattapacanadārūni nappahontī”ti. “Gacchatha, tātā, hatthisālā assasālā viyojetvā
atk-s0401a:1279_8: bhattaṃ pacathā”ti. Evaṃ pacantānampi aḍḍhamāso atikkanto. Tato puna ārocayiṃsu –
atk-s0401a:1279_9: “dārūni sāmi nappahontī”ti. “Tātā, imasmiṃ kāle dārūni laddhuṃ na sakkā, dussakoṭṭhāgāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1279_10: pana vivaritvā thūlasāṭake gahetvā vaṭṭiyo katvā telacāṭiyaṃ temetvā bhattaṃ pacathā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1279_11: Iminā niyāmena pacantānaṃ cattāro māsā pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1280_0: Tato dhanañcayaseṭṭhi dhītuyā mahālatāpasādhanassa niṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sve dārikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1280_1: pesessāmī”ti dhītaraṃ samīpe nisīdāpetvā “amma patikule vasantiyā nāma imañcimañca
atk-s0401a:1280_2: ācāraṃ sikkhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ovādaṃ adāsi. Ayaṃ migāraseṭṭhi anantaragabbhe nisinno
atk-s0401a:1280_3: dhanañcayaseṭṭhino ovādaṃ assosi. Sopi seṭṭhi dhītaraṃ evaṃ ovadi –
atk-s0401a:1281_0: “Amma sasurakule vasantiyā nāma antoaggi bahi na nīharitabbo, bahiaggi anto na pavesetabbo,
atk-s0401a:1281_1: dadantasseva dātabbaṃ, adadantassa na dātabbaṃ, dadantassapi adadantassapi dātabbaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1281_2: sukhaṃ nisīditabbaṃ, sukhaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ, sukhaṃ nipajjitabbaṃ, aggi paricaritabbo,
atk-s0401a:1282_0: Imaṃ dasavidhaṃ ovādaṃ datvā punadivase sabbā seniyo sannipātetvā rājasenāya majjhe
atk-s0401a:1282_1: aṭṭha kuṭumbike pāṭibhoge gahetvā “sace me dhītu gataṭṭhāne doso uppajjati, tumhehi
atk-s0401a:1282_2: sodhetabbo”ti vatvā navakoṭiagghanakena mahālatāpasādhanena dhītaraṃ pasādhetvā nhānacuṇṇamūlaṃ
atk-s0401a:1282_3: catupaṇṇāsasakaṭasataṃ dhanaṃ datvā dhītāya saddhiṃ nibaddhaṃ gamanacāriniyo pañcasatā
atk-s0401a:1282_4: dāsiyo pañca ājaññarathasatāni sabbūpakārañca sataṃ sataṃ datvā kosalarājānañca migāraseṭṭhiñca,
atk-s0401a:1282_5: vissajjetvā dhītu gamanavelāyaṃ vajādhiṭṭhāyake purise pakkosāpetvā, “tātā, mama
atk-s0401a:1282_6: dhītāya gataṭṭhāne khīrapānatthaṃ dhenūhi, yānayojanatthaṃ usabhehi ca attho hoti,
atk-s0401a:1282_7: tasmā mama dhītu gamanamagge vajadvāraṃ vivaritvā puthulato aṭṭha usabhāni gogaṇena
atk-s0401a:1282_8: pūretvā tigāvutamatthake asukā nāma kandarā atthi, aggagoyūthe taṃ ṭhānaṃ patte bherisaññāya
atk-s0401a:1282_9: vajadvāraṃ pidaheyyāthā”ti. Te “sādhū”ti seṭṭhissa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tathā akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1282_10: Vajadvāre vivaṭe uḷāruḷārāyeva gāviyo nikkhamiṃsu. Dvāre pidahite pana visākhāya
atk-s0401a:1282_11: puññabalena balavagāvo ca dammagāvo ca bahi laṅghitvā maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu. Atha,
atk-s0401a:1282_12: visākhā, sāvatthinagaradvāraṃ pattakāle cintesi – “paṭicchannayānasmiṃ nu kho nisīditvā
atk-s0401a:1282_13: pavisāmi, udāhu rathe ṭhatvā”ti. Athassā etadahosi – “paṭicchannayānena me pavisantiyā
atk-s0401a:1282_14: mahālatāpasādhanassa viseso na paññāyissatī”ti. Sā sakalanagarassa attānaṃ dassentī
atk-s0401a:1282_15: rathe ṭhatvā nagaraṃ pāvisi. Sāvatthivāsino visākhāya sampattiṃ disvā “esā kira,
atk-s0401a:1282_16: visākhā, nāma evarūpā, ayañca sampatti etissāva anucchavikā”ti āhaṃsu. Iti sā mahāsampattiyā
atk-s0401a:1282_17: migāraseṭṭhino gehaṃ pāvisi. Āgatadivase cassā sakalanagaravāsino “amhākaṃ, dhanañcayaseṭṭhi,
atk-s0401a:1282_18: attano nagaraṃ sampattānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ akāsī”ti yathābalaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1282_19: Visākhā, pahitapahitaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ tasmiṃyeva nagare aññamaññesu kulesu sabbatthakameva
atk-s0401a:1282_20: dāpesi. Athassā rattibhāgasamanantare ekissā ājaññavaḷavāya gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi.
